tika-vin09t0:7_0: Vippasannenāti vividhappasannena. Kathaṃ? “Itipi so…pe… buddho bhagavā, svākkhāto…pe…
tika-vin09t0:7_1: viññūhi, suppaṭipanno…pe… lokassā”ti evamādinā. “Cetasā”ti vuttattā tīsu vandanāsu
tika-vin09t0:7_2: cetovandanā adhippetā. Tanninnatādivasena kāyādīhi paṇāmakaraṇaṃ vandanā, guṇavasena
tika-vin09t0:7_3: manasāpi tathāva karaṇaṃ mānaṃ, paccayappaṭipattiyādīhi pūjākaraṇaṃ pūjā, paccayādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:7_4: abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ sakkacca karaṇaṃ sakkāro, tesaṃ. Bhājananti ādhāro, adhikaraṇaṃ vā.
tika-vin09t0:8_0: Therā mahākassapādayo, tesaṃ vaṃsoti theravaṃso, āgamādhigamasampadāya tassa vaṃsassa
tika-vin09t0:8_1: padīpabhūtāti theravaṃsappadīpā, tesaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ. Asaṃhīrattā thirānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:8_2: Vinayakkameti vinayapiṭake, ārambhānurūpavacanametaṃ. Suttābhidhammesupi te thirā
tika-vin09t0:8_3: eva. “Buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghañca pubbācariyasīhānañcā”ti avatvā kasmā visuṃ vuttanti
tika-vin09t0:8_4: ce? Payojanavisesadassanatthaṃ. Vatthuttayassa hi paṇāmakaraṇassa antarāyanivāraṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:8_5: payojanaṃ attano nissayabhūtānaṃ ācariyānaṃ paṇāmakaraṇassa upakāraññutādassanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:8_6: Tena buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca vanditvā, ca-saddena pubbācariyasīhānañca namo
tika-vin09t0:8_7: katvāti yojanā. Atha vā “vanditvā”ti cetovandanaṃ dassetvā tato “namo katvā”ti vācāvandanā,
tika-vin09t0:9_0: Idāni abhidhānappayojanaṃ dassetuṃ “pāmokkha”ntiādimāha. Tattha pāmokkhanti padhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:9_1: Sīlañhi sabbesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ padhānaṃ ādibhāvato. Yathā ca sattānaṃ khajjabhojjaleyyapeyyavasena
tika-vin09t0:9_2: catubbidhopi āhāro mukhena pavisitvā aṅgamaṅgāni pharati, evaṃ yoginopi cātubhūmakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:9_3: kusalaṃ sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṃ sampādeti. Tena vuttaṃ “mukha”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:9_4: Atha vā mukhanti upāyo, tena mokkhappavesāya nibbānasacchikiriyāya mukhaṃ upāyoti
tika-vin09t0:9_5: attho. Mahesinā yaṃ pātimokkhaṃ pakāsitanti sambandho. Mahante sīlādikkhandhe esi gavesīti mahesi.
tika-vin09t0:10_0: Sūratena nivātenāti “tattha katamaṃ soraccaṃ? Yo kāyiko avītikkamo”tiādinā sūratena,
tika-vin09t0:10_1: nīcavuttinā mānuddhaccavasena attānaṃ anukkhipanabhāvena nivātena. Vinayācārayuttena
tika-vin09t0:10_2: cārittavārittehi yuttena. “Soṇattherena yācito”ti avatvā “sūratenā”tiādi kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:10_3: kiṃ dussīlena vā duṭṭhena vā alajjinā vā yācitena vaṇṇanā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ce?
tika-vin09t0:10_4: Na na vaṭṭati. Therassa vacanaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ na sakkā, evarūpaguṇo therova, yācanavasena
tika-vin09t0:11: Nāmenāti attano guṇanāmena. Saddalakkhaṇasubhato, vinicchayasubhato, viññeyyasubhato ca subhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:14_0: “Āvikatā hissa phāsu hoti, tatthāyasmante pucchāmi…pe… tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:14_1: vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ. Ettheva yāvatatiyānusāvanakathāvasāne
tika-vin09t0:14_2: atha kho uddesakāle “āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:14_3: Tatthāyasmante pucchāmī”tiādinā nayena āgataṃ. Uposathakkhandhakepi evameva āgataṃ.
tika-vin09t0:14_4: Tattha pubbe vuttaṃ pacchā āgatasuttena virujjhati. Tasmā yathā na virujjhati, tathā
tika-vin09t0:14_5: upaparikkhitvā gahetabbaṃ. Evaṃ na virujjhatīti eke. Kathaṃ? “Āvikatā hissa phāsu
tika-vin09t0:14_6: hotī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ. Tatthāyasmante pucchāmī”tiādinā suuddiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:14_7: hotīti etaṃ uddesalakkhaṇaṃ idhāpi khandhakepi vuttattā. Tasmā “phāsu hotī”ti vatvā
tika-vin09t0:14_8: “tatthāyasmante pucchāmī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne avuttampi ānetvā gahetabbaṃ. Kasmā? Idha
tika-vin09t0:14_9: nidānaṃ na dassitaṃ, uddeso uddesakāle uddisitabbalakkhaṇassa tattha vuttattā. Apica
tika-vin09t0:14_10: “nidānuddeso”ti padaṃ uddharitvā nidānuddesaṃ dassetukāmopi “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho…pe…
tika-vin09t0:14_11: āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti pāṭhavasena āgataṃ nidānaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā upari aṭṭhakathāvasena
tika-vin09t0:14_12: yojetabbaṃ pāḷiṃ idha yojetvā “tatthāyasmante pucchāmi…pe… dhārayāmī”ti nidānapāḷiṃ
tika-vin09t0:14_13: paripuṇṇaṃ katvā puna “tattha nidānuddeso”ti uddhaṭapadavasena saṅkhepato nidānuddesalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:14_14: dassetuṃ “evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:14_15: tasmā evaṃ upari ca khandhake ca, atha kho uddesakāle “āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti
tika-vin09t0:14_16: vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ. Tatthāyasmante pucchāmī”tiādi nidānuddesova
tika-vin09t0:15_0: Savanāṇattivacananti ettha saṅghanavakatarena vattuṃ ayuttanti ce? Yuttameva. “Pātimokkhuddesakena
tika-vin09t0:15_1: evaṃ vattabba”nti bhagavatā vuttattā bhagavatova āṇatti, na uddesakassa. Idha navakataravasena
tika-vin09t0:15_2: vuttaṃ. Theropi pana uddisituṃ labhatīti dassanatthaṃ “therādhikaṃ pātimokkha”nti
tika-vin09t0:15_3: vuttaṃ. Iminā suttena navakataro na labhatīti ce? Taṃ dassetuṃ “yo tattha bhikkhū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:16_0: Yathā catuvaggena ṭhapetvā upasampadāpavāraṇāabbhānāni sabbaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin09t0:16_1: vaṭṭati, evaṃ “atirekavīsativaggena imaṃ nāma kammaṃ kātabba”nti avatvā atirekavacanattā
tika-vin09t0:16_2: aññaṃ atthaṃ sūceti, kiṃ tanti “catuvaggādinā”tiādi. Tañhi tehi eva siddhaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin09t0:16_3: Catuvaggena upasampadāpavāraṇā…pe… vīsativaggena na kiñci saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin09t0:16_4: Ettha “dasavaggena abbhānakammamattaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti vadantena catupañcavaggena karaṇīyānipi
tika-vin09t0:16_5: dasavaggena kātuṃ anuññātāni. Tasmā atirekena vaṭṭatīti dīpitaṃ, “ṭhapetvā”ti vacanena
tika-vin09t0:16_6: ūnatarena na vaṭṭatīti dīpitameva. Tasmā na vattabbaṃ atirekavīsativaggoti ce? Vattabbameva.
tika-vin09t0:16_7: Catupañcavaggena kattabbaṃ chasattaaṭṭhanavavaggena kātabbanti ca, dasavaggena kātabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:16_8: ekādasadvādasa…pe… ekūnavīsativaggena kātabbanti ca dīpitaṃ. Ūnatarena na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin09t0:16_9: dīpitaṃ pākaṭato. Sabbappakārena pana atirekavīsatianatirekavīsativagge vuttepi dīpitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:16_10: hotīti vajirabuddhittherena likhitaṃ. Ito paṭṭhāya “likhita”nti vutte vajirabuddhittherenāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:17_0: Sace anuposathepi vaṭṭeyya, “uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti na vadeyya, yasmā anuposathe kātuṃ
tika-vin09t0:17_1: na vaṭṭati, tasmā “ajjuposatho”ti vatvā puna “uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti vuttaṃ. “Pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā
tika-vin09t0:17_2: evā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ tato paraṃ pavāraṇādivasassa natthitāya kataṃ. Uddhaṃ pakatiuposathe
tika-vin09t0:18_1: ce? Vattabbameva. Kasmā? Tividhasampatti nāma nimittasampatti, parisāsampatti, kammavācāsampattītiādiṃ
tika-vin09t0:18_2: vatvā “nimittasampatti nāma pabbatanimittaṃ, pāsāṇanimitta”ntiādi vuttaṃ, na nimittena
tika-vin09t0:18_4: puna tameva pahānaṅgesu dassetuṃ “nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Nadisamuddajātassaresu
tika-vin09t0:18_5: sammatasīmāto kammāni na vipajjanti udakukkhepasīmattāti “vipattisīmāyo nāmā”ti kasmā
tika-vin09t0:18_6: vuttāti ce? Sesalakkhaṇāni sampādetvā nadiyaṃ sīmāya baddhāya udakapariyantaṃ katvā
tika-vin09t0:18_7: sīmāgatattā puna taṃ nadiṃ anto katvā taḷāke kate sace tassā sīmāya kammaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin09t0:18_8: vaṭṭeyya, sīmāto kammāni na vipajjeyyuṃ. Yasmā pana evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmā
tika-vin09t0:19_0: Vīsativaggakaraṇīyattā saṅghakammassa kammārahena saddhiṃ ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ
tika-vin09t0:19_1: na sakkontī”ti vuttaṃ, sukhanisajjāvasena nisīditunti adhippāyo. “Parimaṇḍalākārena
tika-vin09t0:19_2: nisīditu”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tiyojanaṃ atikkamitvāti majjhe ṭhatvā diyaḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:19_3: katvā tiyojanaṃ. Koṇato hi koṇaṃ tiyojanaṃ atikkāmeti, āpattiñca āpajjati, sīmā ca
tika-vin09t0:19_4: asīmā hoti. Kittetvāti nimittāni sampannānipi aññamaññanāmavipariyāyena, animittānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:20_0: Rāsikataṃ paṃsupi rukkhesu jātesu suddhapaṃsupabbato hoti. Guḷapiṇḍaparimāṇo thūlatāya,
tika-vin09t0:20_1: na tulagaṇanāya. Bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito”ti iminā kuṭasarāvādīsu ropitaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin09t0:20_2: tato apanetvā pana taṅkhaṇampi bhūmiyaṃ ropito vaṭṭati. Navamūlasākhāniggamanaṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:20_3: akāraṇaṃ. Khandhaṃ chinditvā ropite pana etaṃ yujjati. Sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇo kaniṭṭhaṅguliparimāṇamatto.
tika-vin09t0:20_4: “Aṭṭhaṅgulubbedho”ti iminā ubbedho paricchinno hoti, “govisāṇamatto”ti iminā pariṇāho.
tika-vin09t0:20_5: “Evaṃ santepi govisāṇapariṇāhe paricchedo natthi, tasmā khuddakopi mahantopi vaṭṭati evāti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:21_0: Jātassare paripuṇṇameva udakaṃ nimittūpagaṃ disvā aparipuṇṇaṃ antarā ṭhitibhūtaṃ
tika-vin09t0:21_1: “jātassare sammatā”ti vuttaṃ vipattiṃ na āpajjatīti “nadiyā sammatā, samudde sammatā,
tika-vin09t0:21_2: jātassare sammatā”ti etthāpi loṇī na gahitā. Baddhasīmaṃ vā nadisamuddajātassare
tika-vin09t0:21_3: vā anokkamitvāti etthāpi “nadiyā vā, bhikkhave, samudde vā jātassare vā”ti etthāpi
tika-vin09t0:21_4: na gahitā. Tasmā loṇī na abaddhasīmāti ce? Abaddhasīmāva. “Yopi nadiṃ vā samuddaṃ
tika-vin09t0:21_5: vā bhinditvā nikkhantaudakena kato sobbho etaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayampi jātassaroyevā”ti
tika-vin09t0:21_6: vuttattā jātassaraggahaṇena gahitāti tattha tattha avuttā. “Yāvatikā tasmiṃ gāmakhette”ti
tika-vin09t0:21_7: vuttattā aññampi gāmaṃ anto katvā samānasaṃvāsakasīmāsammannanakāle tasmiṃ gāme bhikkhū
tika-vin09t0:21_8: āgacchantu vā mā vā, vaṭṭati. Avippavāsasīmāsammannanakāle āgantabbameva.
tika-vin09t0:22: Agamanapathesūti ettha ekadivasena gantvā paccāgantuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṭṭhāneti vadanti, baddhasīmābhāvaṃ paṭikkhipitvāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:23_0: “Samantā udakukkhepā”ti vuttattā sabbadisāsu gahetabbamevāti ce? Yato labbhati, tato
tika-vin09t0:23_1: gahetabbo “yasmiṃ padese pakativīciyo ottharitvā saṇṭhahanti, tato paṭṭhāya kappiyabhūmi,
tika-vin09t0:23_2: tattha ṭhatvā uposathādikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā. Anubandho aḍḍhamāso anvaḍḍhamāso,
tika-vin09t0:23_3: aḍḍhamāsassa vā anu. Yo pana kenaci antamaso tiracchānenapi khaṇitvā akatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:24_0: “Aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopetī”ti vuttattā atikkamitvā
tika-vin09t0:24_1: ṭhito na kopetīti dīpitameva hotīti upatissatthero, taṃ pana “dvinnaṃ udakukkhepānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:24_2: antare añño eko udakukkhepo upacāratthāya ṭhapetabbo”ti vacanena virujjhati. Samantapāsādikāyañhi
tika-vin09t0:24_3: “aññaṃ tattakaṃyevā”ti padaṃ natthi. Tasmā tassādhippāyo pariyesitabbo. Antoudakukkhepasīmāya
tika-vin09t0:24_4: upacāratthāya ṭhapitaṃ udakukkhepaparicchedaṃ anatikkamitvāti attho gahetabbo. Therena
tika-vin09t0:25_1: ce? Na vaṭṭati desanāgāminiṃ sandhāya idha vuttattā. Tasmā eva samuccayakkhandhake
tika-vin09t0:25_2: “sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassa pana santike āvikātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace āvikaroti,
tika-vin09t0:25_3: āpatti āvikatā hoti, dukkaṭā pana na muccatī”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā saṅghena “suṇātu me,
tika-vin09t0:25_4: bhante, saṅgho…pe… paṭikarissatī”ti vatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ labhati, evaṃ tīhi dvīhipi
tika-vin09t0:25_5: aññaṃ suddhaṃ passitvā “paṭikarissāmā”ti vatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Ekenāpi “parisuddhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:25_6: labhitvā paṭikarissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti. Aṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-vin09t0:25_7: “sāmanto bhikkhu evamassa vacanīyoti ettha sabhāgo eva vattabbo. Visabhāgassa hi
tika-vin09t0:25_8: vuccamāne bhaṇḍanakalahasaṅghabhedādīnipi honti, tasmā tassa avatvā ito vuṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin09t0:25_9: paṭikarissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā uposatho kātabboti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”nti vatvā
tika-vin09t0:25_10: tassa appaṭikkhittattā vaṭṭatīti dīpitameva. “Yadā aññaṃ suddhaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpattikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:25_11: passissati, tadā tassa santike”ti vuttattā lahukasseva anuññātattā samuccayakkhandhake
tika-vin09t0:25_12: vuttattā sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ pana ñattiyā ārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:26: Devabrahmā pana “tiracchānagato”ti padaṃ ṭhapetvā yena kenaci padena asaṅgahitāpi iminā saṅgahitāti dassanatthaṃ “yassa upasampadā paṭikkhittā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:27_0: “Cātumāsiniyaṃ pana pavāritānaṃ santike anupagatena vā chinnavassena vā vuṭṭhavassena
tika-vin09t0:27_1: vā”ti avatvā “anupagatena vā chinnavassena vā”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Vuṭṭhavasso pana
tika-vin09t0:27_2: tasmiṃ kāle anupagatattā “anupagato”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatoti. Sabbāya vuṭṭhitāya sabbe
tika-vin09t0:27_3: vuṭṭhahitvā gate sannipātetuṃ na sakkā, ekacce sannipātetvā pārisuddhiṃ ārocetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:27_4: vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Kasmā? Ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā kattabbasaṅghakammābhāvā vaggaṃ na hotīti.
tika-vin09t0:27_5: Pavāraṇāyapi eseva nayo. Ayañhettha viseso – sace purimikāya upagatehi pacchimikāya
tika-vin09t0:27_6: upagatā thokatarā ceva honti samasamā ca, saṅghapavāraṇāya ca gaṇaṃ pūrenti, saṅghapavāraṇāvasena
tika-vin09t0:27_7: ñatti ṭhapetabbāti. “Ekova bhikkhu hoti…pe… aññesaṃ anāgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā”ti vuttattā
tika-vin09t0:27_8: adhiṭṭhānuposathaṃ sīmaṃ pavisitvā kātuṃ na sakkāti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:28_0: “Kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakicca”nti idaṃ na ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā vattabbaṃ. Tañhi ñattito puretarameva
tika-vin09t0:28_1: karīyati. Tasmā “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakiccaṃ, yadi saṅghassa
tika-vin09t0:28_2: pattakalla”nti vattabbaṃ siyāti. Tathāpi na vattabbaṃ. Na hi taṃ ñattiyā anto karīyatīti.
tika-vin09t0:28_3: Evaṃ sante netaṃ vattabbanti āpajjati payojanābhāvāti ce? Na, yathāgataṭṭhāne eva
tika-vin09t0:28_4: vattabbato, parapadāpekkhatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Idaṃ pubbakiccaṃ akatvā uposathakammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:28_5: karonto saṅgho, puggalo vā ṭhapanakkhettātikkame āpajjati. Tasmiñhi khette atikkante
tika-vin09t0:28_6: sammajjanādikaraṇe āpattimokkho na hoti uposathakammato pubbe kattabbakammākaraṇapaccayattā
tika-vin09t0:28_7: tassā āpattiyā. Na sā kammapariyosānāpekkhā etthāgatasampajānamusāvādāpatti viya,
tika-vin09t0:28_8: tasmā pātimokkhuddesako bhikkhu “pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethā”ti vattukāmo paṭhamameva
tika-vin09t0:28_9: pārisuddhāpārisuddhipaccayaṃ pubbakiccaṃ sarāpeti. Tañhi kataṃ pārisuddhipaccayo
tika-vin09t0:28_10: hoti, akataṃ apārisuddhipaccayo. Teneva ubhayāpekkhādhippāyena kataṃ, na katanti
tika-vin09t0:28_11: avatvā “kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakicca”miccevāha. Tattha akatapakkhe tāva pārisuddhiārocanakkamanidassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:28_12: parato “yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyyā”ti ca, katapakkhe “asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī
tika-vin09t0:29_1: sannipatite saṅghe bahi…pe… adentena chando dātabbo”ti ca vadanti. Asannipatitepi
tika-vin09t0:29_2: pana vaṭṭati. Idañhi chandadānasamayadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Uposathakaraṇatthaṃ sannipatite
tika-vin09t0:29_3: saṅghe bahi uposathaṃ katvā āgatassa kattabbākāradassanatthañca vuttaṃ. Padhānagharavāsino
tika-vin09t0:29_4: padhānagharaṃ pavisitukāmā attano sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ chandaṃ datvā sace saṅgho sannipatati,
tika-vin09t0:29_5: “mayhaṃ chando ārocetabbo”ti vatvā padhānagharaṃ pavisanti. Ayaṃ sīhaḷadīpe payogo.
tika-vin09t0:29_6: Ārocentena pana sannipatite ārocetabbaṃ. Pañcasu bhikkhūsu ekasmiṃ vihāre vasantesu
tika-vin09t0:29_7: ekassa chandapārisuddhiṃ āharitvā catunnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ anuññātattā sannipatite
tika-vin09t0:29_8: chando gahetabbo ārocetabboti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ viya. “Theyyasaṃvāsako paṭijānātīti
tika-vin09t0:29_9: vacanato sāmaṇerena āhaṭāpi vaṭṭati. Kammaṃ na kopetī”ti ca, “sace pubbe chandaṃ
tika-vin09t0:29_10: datvā bahisīmāgato puna pavisati, pacchā chandaggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi, tassa payogo
tika-vin09t0:29_11: sīmāsammutivasena veditabbo”ti ca “chandadāne tikkhattuṃ vacane idaṃ payojanaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:29_12: paṭhamaṃ samaggabhāvaṃ, dutiyaṃ pacchā vidhātabbabhāvaṃ, tatiyaṃ chandahārakassa
tika-vin09t0:29_13: dukkaṭamocanaṃ dīpetī”ti ca likhitaṃ. Biḷālasaṅkhalikābaddhāva hoti antogehe eva
tika-vin09t0:29_14: sampayojanattā, yathā sā na katthaci gacchati, tathā sāpi na katthaci gacchatīti
tika-vin09t0:29_15: adhippāyo. Itarathā visesanaṃ niratthakaṃ hotīti ācariyena gahitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:30_0: “Na hi taṃ akatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pubbe dassitattā “idampi hi ubhaya”nti
tika-vin09t0:30_1: kasmā vuttanti ce? Sesāni therena āṇattena kātabbāni dassitāni, ime pana dve therena
tika-vin09t0:30_2: vā pātimokkhuddesakena vā ñattiṭṭhapanakena vā yena vā tena vā kātabbānīti ca, sammajjanādīni
tika-vin09t0:30_3: tattha tattha tādisāni payojanāni nipphādenti, ime pana dve tattha tattha na kiñci
tika-vin09t0:30_4: kammaṃ sādhenti, tasmā “kiṃ iminā”ti avatvā kātabbamevāti dassetuñca “idampi hi ubhaya”ntiādi
tika-vin09t0:30_5: vuttaṃ. “Āyasmantānaṃ pāde vandatī”ti gaṇavasena vatvā puggalavasena na vuttaṃ tena
tika-vin09t0:31_0: Saṅghassa uddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti saṅghena uddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti attho. Samaggassa hi saṅghassāti
tika-vin09t0:31_1: ettha samaggabhāvassa kāyasāmaggikāraṇattā natthi dosoti ce? Taṃ na, uddesepi savanepi
tika-vin09t0:31_2: samaggabhāvassa icchitabbattā. “Suṇātu me, bhante”ti hi iminā cittasāmaggiṃ dīpeti
tika-vin09t0:32_0: Sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjatīti ettha anādariyavasena āpajjanto eva alajjī hoti, na itaroti.
tika-vin09t0:32_1: Āpattiṃ parigūhatīti ettha lajjāya parigūhanto alajjī na hoti, ‘kiṃ iminā’ti anādariyavasena
tika-vin09t0:33_0: “Sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhāna”nti na vattabbaṃ, “channa”nti vattabbanti ce? Sattannamevāti
tika-vin09t0:33_1: vattabbaṃ. Pārājikāpattiṃ āpanno hi sace attano sāpattikabhāvaṃ pakāseti, saṅghassa
tika-vin09t0:33_2: ca uposatho sampajjati, tassa ca gihibhāvena vā sāmaṇerabhāvena vā suddhi hotīti.
tika-vin09t0:34_0: Ekacce ācariyā nāma dhammabhāriko kira ācariyo. Kasmā evaṃ vuttanti ce? Yāvatatiyānusāvanā
tika-vin09t0:34_1: nāma tikkhattuṃ vacanaṃ. Tathā pāṭhe anāgatattā kevalaṃ “yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvita”nti
tika-vin09t0:34_2: padameva disvā “yassa siyā āpatti, so āvikareyyā”ti idaṃ “sace āpattiṃ āpannā, āvikarothā”ti
tika-vin09t0:34_3: imamatthaṃ dīpeti. “Asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabba”nti idampi tamevatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin09t0:34_4: “Tuṇhībhāvena kho panāyasmante parisuddhāti vedissāmī”ti idampi tamevāti evamatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:35: Apareti atthadassitthero kira. Etaṃ sandhāyāti ettha “sakimpi anusāvita”nti padassa vacanena tikkhattuṃ anusāvanā kātabbāti ettakameva dīpitaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin09t0:36: Imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttanti kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce? “Ayamettha ācariyaparamparābhato vinicchayo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:37_0: “Saramānenā”ti iminā sampajānamusāvādassa sacittakattaṃ dasseti. Saṅghamajjhe vātiādi
tika-vin09t0:37_1: lakkhaṇavacanaṃ kira. Saṅghuposathakaraṇatthaṃ saṅghamajjhe ce nisinno, tasmiṃ saṅghamajjhe
tika-vin09t0:37_2: āvikātabbā. Gaṇuposathakaraṇatthañce gaṇamajjhe nisinno, tasmiṃ gaṇamajjhe. Ekasseva
tika-vin09t0:37_3: santike ce pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kattukāmo, tasmiṃ ekapuggale āvikātabbāti, etena na
tika-vin09t0:37_4: kevalaṃ saṅghamajjhe evāyaṃ musāvādo sambhavati, atha kho ettha vuttalakkhaṇena asatipi
tika-vin09t0:37_5: “pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethā”tiādividhāne gaṇuposathepi sāpattiko hutvā uposathaṃ
tika-vin09t0:37_6: kattukāmo anārocetvā tuṇhībhūtova ce karoti, ayaṃ sampajānamusāvādāpattiṃ āpajjatīti
tika-vin09t0:37_7: imassatthassa āvikaraṇato lakkhaṇavacanaṃ kiretanti vuttanti takkikā. Aññathā “gaṇamajjhe
tika-vin09t0:37_8: vā”ti na vattabbanti tesaṃ adhippāyo. Ārocanādhippāyavasena vuttanti ācariyassa takko.
tika-vin09t0:37_9: Ārocento hi “saṅghassa ārocemī”ti adhippāyena āvikaronto saṅghamajjhe āvikaroti nāma,
tika-vin09t0:37_10: ubhatopasse nisinnānaṃ ārocento gaṇamajjhe āvikaroti nāma, “ekasseva ārocessāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:37_11: adhippāyena āvikaronto ekapuggale āvikaroti nāma. Sacepi vematiko hoti…pe… paṭikarissāmīti
tika-vin09t0:37_12: evaṃ kate yāva vematiko hoti, tāva sabhāgāpattiṃ paṭiggahetuṃ labhati, aññesañca
tika-vin09t0:37_13: kammānaṃ parisuddho nāma hoti. Puna nibbematiko hutvā desetabbaṃ vā na vāti neva
tika-vin09t0:37_14: pāḷiyaṃ, na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthi, desite pana doso natthi. Tathā ito vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ
tika-vin09t0:37_15: āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmīti ettha ca sakalasaṅghe sabhāgāpattiṃ āpanne, vematike cāti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:41_0: Idha pana ṭhatvā sikkhāpadānaṃ kamabhedo pakāsetabbo. Kathaṃ – sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:41_1: yathāsambhavaṃ desanākkamo, pahānakkamo, paṭipattikkamo, uppattikkamoti catubbidho
tika-vin09t0:41_2: kamo labbhati. Tattha bhagavatā rājagahe bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujānantena
tika-vin09t0:41_3: pātimokkhuddesassa yo desanākkamo anuññāto, taṃ desanākkamaṃ anukkamantova mahākassapo
tika-vin09t0:41_4: paṭhamaṃ pārājikuddesaṃ pucchi, tadanantaraṃ saṅghādisesuddesaṃ, tadanantaraṃ aniyatuddesaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:41_5: tadanantaraṃ vitthāruddesaṃ. Tadanantaraṃ bhikkhunivibhaṅgañca teneva anukkamena
tika-vin09t0:41_6: pucchi. Tato paraṃ tayo āpattikkhandhe saṅgahetuṃ vinā gaṇanaparicchedena sekhiyadhamme
tika-vin09t0:41_7: pucchi. Āpattikkhandhe sabhāgato paṭṭhāya pucchanto vīsatikhandhake pucchi. Nidānuddesantogadhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:41_8: vā sarūpena anuddiṭṭhānaṃ pucchanatthaṃ khandhake pucchi. Etena khandhake paññattā
tika-vin09t0:41_9: thullaccayāpi saṅgahitā honti. Pucchitānukkameneva āyasmā upālitthero byākāsi. Ayamettha
tika-vin09t0:41_10: desanākkamo. Ubhatovibhaṅgakhandhakato pana uccinitvā tadā parivāro visuṃ pāḷi kato,
tika-vin09t0:41_11: imameva vacanaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “eteneva upāyena khandhakaṃ parivārepi
tika-vin09t0:41_12: āropayiṃsū”tiādi. Apica pāḷiyaṃ “eteneva upāyena ubhatovibhaṅge pucchi. Puṭṭho puṭṭho
tika-vin09t0:41_13: āyasmā upāli vissajjesī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Tasmā thero ubhatovibhaṅge eva pucchi.
tika-vin09t0:41_14: Vissajjanto pana āyasmā upāli niravasesaṃ dassento khandhakaparivāre anto katvā desesi.
tika-vin09t0:41_15: Gaṇasajjhāyakāle pana tadā khandhakaparivārā visuṃ pāḷi katāti ayamettha desanākkamo.
tika-vin09t0:42_0: Yadi evaṃ nidānuddeso paṭhamadesanāti ce? Na, uposathakkhandhake “yāni mayā bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:42_1: sikkhāpadāni paññattāni, tāni nesaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya”nti vacanato, “yassa
tika-vin09t0:42_2: siyā āpattī”ti vacanato ca. Akusalābyākatānaṃ āpattīnaṃ diṭṭhadhammasamparāyikāsavaṭṭhāniyattā
tika-vin09t0:42_3: yathābhūtaṃ sīlasaṃvarakena parivajjanena pahātabbattā pahānakkamopettha sambhavati
tika-vin09t0:42_4: “tāvadeva cattāri akaraṇīyāni ācikkhitabbānī”ti vacanato. Tathā “samādāya sikkhati
tika-vin09t0:42_5: sikkhāpadesū”ti vacanato yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhanasikkhanena paṭipattikkamopi sambhavati.
tika-vin09t0:42_7: kamehi desetabbānametesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ uppattikkamo sambhavati. Tathā
tika-vin09t0:42_8: hi yaṃ yaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ, taṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uppanne eva vatthusmiṃ “yā pana bhikkhunī
tika-vin09t0:42_9: chandaso methunaṃ dhamma”ntiādinā nayena bhikkhunīnampi paññattaṃ. Yato bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:42_10: taṃ anuppannapaññatti na siyā, tato anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthīti parivāravacanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:42_11: na virujjhati. Ettāvatā purimena kamattayena yaṃ paṭhamaṃ desetabbaṃ, taṃ pārājikuddese
tika-vin09t0:42_12: paṭhamuppannattā methunadhammapārājikaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ desetukāmo āyasmā upālitthero
tika-vin09t0:42_13: “tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharatī”ti vesāliyameva pāpetvā ṭhapesi.
tika-vin09t0:43_0: Idāni sabbesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ paññāpanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? “Evañca pana,
tika-vin09t0:43_1: bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti evaṃ sauddesaanuddesabhedato duvidhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:43_2: Tattha pātimokkhe sarūpato āgatā pañca āpattikkhandhā sauddesapaññatti nāma. Sāpi
tika-vin09t0:43_3: dvidhā sapuggalāpuggalaniddesabhedato. Tattha yassā paññattiyā anto āpattiyā saha,
tika-vin09t0:43_4: vinā vā puggalo dassito, sā sapuggalaniddesā. Itarā apuggalaniddesā.
tika-vin09t0:44_0: Tattha sapuggalaniddesā dvidhā adassitadassitāpattibhedato. Tattha adassitāpattikā
tika-vin09t0:44_1: nāma aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā veditabbā. “Pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti hi puggalova tattha
tika-vin09t0:44_2: dassito, nāpatti. Dassitāpattikā nāma bhikkhunipātimokkhe āgatā sattarasa saṅghādisesā
tika-vin09t0:44_3: dhammā. “Ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesa”nti
tika-vin09t0:44_4: hi tattha āpatti dassitā saddhiṃ puggalena.
tika-vin09t0:45: Tathā apuggalaniddesāpi adassitadassitāpattibhedato dvidhā. Tattha adassitāpattikā nāma sekhiyā dhammā. Vuttāvasesā dassitāpattikāti veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:46_0: Sāpi dvidhā aniddiṭṭhakārakaniddiṭṭhakārakabhedato. Tattha aniddiṭṭhakārakā nāma
tika-vin09t0:46_2: vasena pañcadasavidhā honti. Tattha niddiṭṭhakārake missāmissabhedo veditabbo – tattha
tika-vin09t0:46_3: upayogabhummavibhattiyo ekaṃsena missā. Avasesā missā ca amissā ca. Seyyathidaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:46_4: paccattaṃ tāva dvīsu aniyatesu upayogena missaṃ, dvādasasu pāṭidesanīyesu karaṇena
tika-vin09t0:46_6: mohanake upayogasāmibhummehi. Yasmā “vivaṇṇaka”nti bhāvo adhippeto, na kattā, tasmā
tika-vin09t0:46_7: vivaṇṇakasikkhāpadaṃ yadā na sambhavati, evaṃ paccattaṃ pañcavidhaṃ missaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:46_8: Sesesu paṭhamāniyataṃ ṭhapetvā ādimhi “yo pana bhikkhū”ti evamāgataṃ paccattaṃ vā,
tika-vin09t0:46_10: majjhe “yo pana bhikkhū”ti evamāgataṃ paccattaṃ vā, dubbacakuladūsakasaṃsaṭṭhasikkhāpadesu
tika-vin09t0:46_11: ādimhi kevalaṃ “bhikkhū”ti āgataṃ paccattaṃ vā, bhedānuvattakasikkhāpade majjhe āgataṃ
tika-vin09t0:46_12: paccattaṃ vā aññāya vibhattiyā amissameva hoti. Tattha bhedānuvattakatuvaṭṭanadvayasaṃsaṭṭhadutiyapāṭidesanīyasikkhāpadesu
tika-vin09t0:47_0: Tathā upayogo dvīsu vikappanasikkhāpadesu, tantavāyasikkhāpade ca paccattena misso,
tika-vin09t0:47_1: abhihaṭasikkhāpade karaṇena, rājasikkhāpade karaṇasāmipaccattehīti upayogo tidhā
tika-vin09t0:47_4: aṭṭhasu sāminā missanti karaṇaṃ dvidhā missaṃ hoti. Avasesesu chabbassavassikasāṭikadvatticchadanāvasathapiṇḍamahānāmagarulahupāvuraṇasikkhāpadesu
tika-vin09t0:47_5: sattasu karaṇavibhatti aññavibhattiyā amissā, accekaeḷakalomasikkhāpadesu sāmivibhatti
tika-vin09t0:47_7: amissāva hotīti veditabbā. Evaṃ tāva niddiṭṭhakārakesu sikkhāpadesu –
tika-vin09t0:48: Pañcadhā ca tidhā ceva, dvidhā cepi tathekadhā;
tika-vin09t0:50_0: Evaṃ tāva yathāvuttesu sauddesapaññattisaṅkhātesu sikkhāpadesu aggahitaggahaṇena
tika-vin09t0:50_1: paññāsuttaresu tisatesu navutianiddiṭṭhakārake vajjetvā niddiṭṭhakārakāni atirekasaṭṭhidvisatāni
tika-vin09t0:50_2: honti. Tesu paccattakaraṇāni tiṃsuttarāni dvisatāni honti. Tesu amissapaccattakaraṇāni
tika-vin09t0:50_3: dvādasuttarāni dvisatāni, missapaccattakaraṇāni aṭṭhārasa honti. Avasesesu tiṃsatiyā
tika-vin09t0:50_4: sikkhāpadesu missopayogakaraṇāni pañca honti, missakaraṇāni cuddasa, amissāni satta,
tika-vin09t0:50_5: missāmissakaraṇāni dve, amissāni dveti sabbesupi niddiṭṭhakārakesu
tika-vin09t0:50_7: pañcattiṃsesu “yo pana bhikkhū”ti natthi. Dutiyāniyatapaṇītabhojanasamaṇuddesatatiyacatutthapāṭidesanīyesu majjhe atthi.
tika-vin09t0:51_2: ayopanamajjheyopanadukaṃ, ekānekavacanadukanti nava dukāni dassitāni honti. Visesakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:51_3: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade sampatte āvibhavissati. Evaṃ tāva sauddesapaññattiṃ ñatvā
tika-vin09t0:51_4: sesavinayapiṭake yā kāci paññatti anuddesapaññattīti veditabbā. Sā padabhājanantarāpattivinītavatthupaṭikkhepapaññattiavuttasiddhisikkhāpadavasena chabbidhā hoti.
tika-vin09t0:52_0: Tattha “yebhuyyena khayite āpatti thullaccayassa, vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantassa āpatti
tika-vin09t0:52_1: dukkaṭassā”ti evamādikā padabhājane sandissamānāpatti padabhājanasikkhāpadaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:52_2: “Na ca, bhikkhave, sabbamattikāmayā kuṭi kātabbā, yo kareyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādi
tika-vin09t0:52_3: antarāpattisikkhāpadaṃ nāma. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, divāpaṭisallīyantena dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā
tika-vin09t0:52_5: anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo”ti evamādi paṭikkhepasikkhāpadaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:53_0: Yasmā pana tena tena paṭikkhepena “yo pana bhikkhu samaggaṃ saṅghaṃ adhammasaññī
tika-vin09t0:53_1: bhindeyya, pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso. Yo pana bhikkhu duṭṭhacitto bhagavato jīvamānakasarīre
tika-vin09t0:53_2: lohitaṃ uppādeyya, pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti sikkhāpadāni paññattāni honti. Yāni
tika-vin09t0:53_3: sandhāya “ekassa chejjakā hoti, catunnaṃ thullaccayaṃ, catunnañceva anāpatti, sabbesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:53_4: ekavatthukā”ti vuttaṃ. “Atthāpatti tiṭṭhante bhagavati āpajjati, no parinibbute”ti
tika-vin09t0:53_5: ca vuttaṃ. Tena na kevalaṃ “na, bhikkhave, jānaṃ saṅghabhedako anupasampanno upasampādetabbo…pe…
tika-vin09t0:53_6: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idameva sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti sādhakaṃ hoti. “Paṇḍako,
tika-vin09t0:53_7: bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti evamādīsu pana
tika-vin09t0:53_8: upajjhāyādīnaṃ dukkaṭameva paññattaṃ, na paṇḍakādīnaṃ pārājikāpatti. Na hi tesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:53_9: bhikkhubhāvo atthi. Yato siyā pārājikāpatti. Tathā “na acchinne theve pakkamitabba”nti
tika-vin09t0:54_0: Khandhakesu paññattadukkaṭathullaccayāni paññattisikkhāpadaṃ nāma. “Tena hi, sāriputta,
tika-vin09t0:54_1: bhedānuvattake thullaccayaṃ desāpehī”ti vuttaṃ, thullaccayampi tattheva samodhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:54_2: gacchati. Idaṃ tesaṃ vibhattikammakkhaṇe apaññattattā avijjamānampi bhagavato vacanena
tika-vin09t0:54_3: visuddhakkhaṇepi vijjamānaṃ jātanti eke. “Bhedānuvattake desāpehī”ti vacanato sesabhedānuvattakānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:54_4: “yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṅghabhedakānaṃ anuvatteyya, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin09t0:54_5: paññattaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Tathā sabbāni khandhakavattāni, vinayakammāni ca tattheva
tika-vin09t0:54_6: samodhānaṃ gacchanti. Yathāha “paññatte taṃ upāli mayā āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgantukavattaṃ…pe…
tika-vin09t0:54_7: evaṃ supaññatte kho mayā upāli sikkhāpade”tiādi. “Yā pana bhikkhunī naccaṃ vā gītaṃ
tika-vin09t0:54_8: vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyya, pācittiya”nti iminā suttena bhikkhunī nacceyya
tika-vin09t0:54_9: vā gāyeyya vā vādeyya vā, pācittiyanti evamādikaṃ yaṃ kiñci aṭṭhakathāya dissamānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:54_10: āpattijātaṃ vinayakammaṃ vā avuttasiddhisikkhāpadaṃ nāma. Chabbidhampetaṃ chahi ākārehi
tika-vin09t0:54_11: uddesārahaṃ na hotīti anuddesasikkhāpadaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – pañcahi
tika-vin09t0:54_16: Ettāvatā “duvidhaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ sauddesānuddesabhedato”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin09t0:57: Pubbe vattabbavidhānā-bhāvato ca ādito yopanena sahā”ti. –
tika-vin09t0:58_0: Ayaṃ nayo veditabbo. Tassattho – ye te aniddiṭṭhakārakā pubbe vuttappabhedā sukkavisaṭṭhiādayo
tika-vin09t0:58_1: sikkhāpadavisesā, tesu adhippāyakammavatthupuggalapayoge apekkhāya bhāvato kārako
tika-vin09t0:58_2: na niddiṭṭho tesaṃ sāpekkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade
tika-vin09t0:58_3: āvibhavissati, idha pana pārājikapaññattiyaṃ apekkhāya abhāvato kārako niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin09t0:58_4: Yo pana kārako “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmi”ntiādīsu viya pubbe vattabbavidhānābhāvato
tika-vin09t0:58_5: karaṇādivasena aniddisitvā paccattavasena niddiṭṭho apekkhāya abhāvato. Tattha niddisiyamāno
tika-vin09t0:58_7: aniddisitvā “na heva kho pana…pe… obhāsitu”ntiādi viya pubbe vattabbavidhānābhāvato
tika-vin09t0:58_8: eva ādimhi niddiṭṭho. Ādimhi niddisiyamānopi pubbe vuttappabhedesu bhedānuvattakādīsu
tika-vin09t0:58_9: pañcattiṃsesu sikkhāpadesu viya aniddisitvā pubbe vattabbavidhānābhāvato eva “yo
tika-vin09t0:58_10: pana bhikkhū”tiāditova yopana-saddena saha niddiṭṭho. Evaṃ niddisiyamānopi so yasmā
tika-vin09t0:58_11: “yā pana bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭeyyu”ntiādi āpatti viya parappabhavaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:58_12: na āpajjati, tasmā “yo pana bhikkhū”ti ekavacanena niddiṭṭho. Methunadhammāpattipi
tika-vin09t0:58_13: parappabhavā “dvayaṃdvayasamāpattī”ti vacanatoti ce? Taṃ na, adhippāyajānanato. Anekissā
tika-vin09t0:58_14: eva bhikkhuniyā āpatti, na ekissāti niyamo tattha atthi, na evaṃ idha niyamoti aniyamitādhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:58_16: Ayamattho catasso methunadhammapaccayāti aṭṭhavatthukaṃ sandhāya “chejjaṃ siyā methunadhammapaccayā”ti
tika-vin09t0:59_0: Bhedānuvattakasikkhāpade tiṇṇaṃ uddhaṃ na samanubhāsitabbā, na saṅghena saṅghaṃ ekato
tika-vin09t0:59_1: kātabbanti. Nayadassanatthaṃ āditova “bhikkhū hontī”ti bahuvacananiddesaṃ katvā puna
tika-vin09t0:59_2: “eko vā dve vā tayo vā”ti vuttaṃ, aññathā na tato uddhaṃ “anuvattakā hontī”ti āpajjati.
tika-vin09t0:59_3: Tato nidānavirodho. Pañcasatamattā hi tadanuvattakā ahesuṃ. Yaṃ pana sattasatikakkhandhake
tika-vin09t0:59_4: “saṅgho cattāro pācīnake bhikkhū, cattāro pāveyyake bhikkhū sammanneyya …pe… sammatā”tiādi
tika-vin09t0:59_5: ñattidutiyakammaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ “ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametu”nti vuttattā
tika-vin09t0:59_6: tehi kattabbavidhānaṃ. Sammutikaraṇameva vā tatiyaṃ katvā kappati. Na hi te tena
tika-vin09t0:59_7: kammena kammārahā kammakatā honti. Yassa saṅgho kammaṃ karoti, so kammārahoti lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:59_8: Na ca tadā saṅgho tesaṃ aṭṭhannampi bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṃ akāsi. Bhajāpiyamānā te kammapattabhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:59_9: bhajanti. Adhikaraṇavūpasamakammassa pattā yuttā saṅghena katāti katvā kammapattā
tika-vin09t0:59_10: eva hi te honti. “Te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:59_11: vacanato tehi kattabbavidhānaṃ. Sammutikaraṇameva kammaṃ hotīti ce? Taṃ na, adhippāyajānanato,
tika-vin09t0:59_12: tassa paṭinissaggāya eva te bhikkhū kammārahā kātabbā, na dosāgativasenāti ayamettha
tika-vin09t0:59_13: adhippāyo. Na hi pācīnakādīnaṃ sammutiyā adhikaraṇavūpasamasiddhi viya tesaṃ samanubhāsanakammena
tika-vin09t0:59_14: tassa paṭinissaggasiddhi hoti, sammuti nāmesā paṭhamaṃ anumatiṃ gahetvā yācitvāva
tika-vin09t0:59_15: karīyati, na tathā kammanti. Kammakaraṇe pana tadatthasiddhi hotiyeva. Parasammutiyā
tika-vin09t0:60_0: “Methunadhamma”nti evaṃ bāhullanayena laddhanāmakaṃ sakapayogena vā parapayogena
tika-vin09t0:60_1: vā attano nimittassa sakamagge vā paramagge vā paranimittassa vā sakamagge eva pavesanapaviṭṭhaṭṭhitauddharaṇesu
tika-vin09t0:60_2: yaṃ kiñci ekaṃ paṭisādiyanavasena seveyya, pārājiko hoti asaṃvāsoti. Keci pana “pavesanādīni
tika-vin09t0:60_3: cattāri vā tīṇi vā dve vā ekaṃ vā paṭiseveyya, pārājiko hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘so ce
tika-vin09t0:60_4: pavesanaṃ sādiyati, paviṭṭhaṃ sādiyati, ṭhitaṃ sādiyati, uddharaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti
tika-vin09t0:60_5: pārājikassā’tiādī”ti vadanti. Tesaṃ matena catūsupi catasso pārājikāpattiyo āpajjati.
tika-vin09t0:60_6: Teyeva evaṃ vadanti – āpajjatu methunadhammapārājikāpatti, methunadhammapārājikāpattiyā
tika-vin09t0:60_7: taṃbhāgiyāti attano vītikkame pārājikāpattiyo, saṅghādisesāpattiñca āpajjitvā sikkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:60_8: paccakkhāya gahaṭṭhakāle methunādikaṃ pārājikaṃ āpajjitvā puna pabbajitvā upasampajjitvā
tika-vin09t0:60_9: ekaṃ saṅghādisesāpattiṃ ekamanekaṃ vā paṭikaritvāva so puggalo yasmā nirāpattiko
tika-vin09t0:60_10: hoti, tasmā so gahaṭṭhakāle sāpattikovāti. Antimavatthuajjhāpannassāpi attheva āpatti.
tika-vin09t0:60_11: Vuṭṭhānadesanāhi pana asujjhanato “payoge payoge āpatti pārājikassā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:60_12: Gaṇanapayojanābhāvato kiñcāpi na vuttaṃ, atha kho padabhājane “āpatti pārājikassā”ti
tika-vin09t0:61_0: Yadi evaṃ mātikāyampi “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, pārājika”nti
tika-vin09t0:61_1: vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, pārājikassa anavasesavacanampi na yujjeyya. Sabbepi hi āpattikkhandhe,
tika-vin09t0:61_2: bhikkhugaṇanañca anavasesetvā tiṭṭhatīti anavasesavacananti katvā paveseva āpatti,
tika-vin09t0:61_3: na paviṭṭhādīsu. Tamevekaṃ sandhāya “yassa siyā āpattī”ti pārājikāpattimpi anto katvā
tika-vin09t0:61_4: nidānuddesavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tasmā mātikāyaṃ “pārājika”nti avatvā “pārājiko hotī”ti
tika-vin09t0:61_6: “Āpatti pārājikassā”ti padabhājane vacanaṃ antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassāpi pārājikassa
tika-vin09t0:61_7: asaṃvāsassa sato puggalassa atheyyasaṃvāsakabhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Na hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi
tika-vin09t0:61_8: theyyasaṃvāsako hoti, tasmā upasampanno “bhikkhū”tveva vuccati. Tenevāha “asuddho
tika-vin09t0:61_9: hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno, tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno anokāsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:61_10: kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadati, āpatti omasavādena dukkaṭassā”ti anupasampannassa
tika-vin09t0:61_11: tadabhāvato siddho so upasampanno “bhikkhū”tveva vuccatīti, tena padasodhammaṃ, sahaseyyañca
tika-vin09t0:64_0: Ayaṃ nayo veditabbo. Tattha sudinnavatthu -makkaṭivatthu -vajjiputtakavatthu cāti
tika-vin09t0:64_1: tippabhedavatthu imassa sikkhāpadassa nidānaṃ nāma. Tato nidānā “yo pana bhikkhu
tika-vin09t0:64_2: bhikkhūnaṃ…pe… asaṃvāso”ti imissā mātikāya bhedo jāto. Tattha hi “antamaso tiracchānagatāyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:64_3: itthiliṅgavasena “saccaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, tañca kho itthiyā,
tika-vin09t0:64_4: no purise, no paṇḍake, no ubhatobyañjanake cā”ti makkaṭipārājiko viya aññopi lesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:64_5: oḍḍetuṃ sakkoti, tasmā tādisassa alesokāsassa dassanatthaṃ idaṃ vuccati, makkaṭisaṅkhātā
tika-vin09t0:64_6: nidānā “antamaso tiracchānagatāyapī”ti mātikāya vacanabhedo, na itthiyā eva methunasiddhidassanato.
tika-vin09t0:64_7: Tasmā vibhaṅgo tanniyāmako tassā mātikāya adhippetatthaniyāmako vibhaṅgoti. Vibhaṅge
tika-vin09t0:64_8: hi “tisso itthiyo, tayo ubhatobyañjanakā, tayo paṇḍakā, tayo purisā. Manussitthiyā
tika-vin09t0:64_9: tayo magge, tiracchānagatapurisassa dve magge”tiādinā nayena sabbalesokāsaṃ pidahitvā
tika-vin09t0:64_10: niyamo kato. Etthāha – yadi evaṃ sādhāraṇasikkhāpadavasena vā liṅgaparivattanavasena
tika-vin09t0:64_11: vā na kevalaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, bhikkhunīnampi “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti vibhaṅge vattabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:64_12: siyā. Tadavacanena hi bhikkhunī purisaliṅgapātubhāvena bhikkhubhāve ṭhitā evaṃ vadeyya
tika-vin09t0:64_13: “nāhaṃ upasampadākaraṇakāle bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannā, tasmā na apaccakkhātasikkhāpi
tika-vin09t0:64_14: methunadhammena pārājikā homī”ti. Vuccate – yathā vuttaṃ, tathā na vattabbaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgato.
tika-vin09t0:64_15: Tathā vutte bhikkhunīnampi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ atthīti āpajjati. Tañcāniṭṭhaṃ. Idamaparamaniṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:64_17: hotīti dassanatthaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, taṃyeva upajjhaṃ tameva upasampadaṃ tāni
tika-vin09t0:64_18: vassāni bhikkhūhi saṅgamitu”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tato āpattiyā bhedoti tato vibhaṅgato
tika-vin09t0:64_19: “akkhayite sarīre pārājikaṃ, yebhuyyena khayite thullaccaya”ntiādi āpattiyā bhedo
tika-vin09t0:64_20: hoti. Anāpatti tadaññathāti tato eva vibhaṅgato yena ākārena āpatti vuttā, tato aññenākārena
tika-vin09t0:64_21: anāpattibhedova hoti. “Sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa, na sādiyati, anāpattī”ti hi
tika-vin09t0:64_22: vibhaṅge asati na paññāyati. Ettāvatā “nidānā mātikābhedo”ti ayaṃ gāthā samāsato
tika-vin09t0:64_23: vuttatthā hoti. Visesakāraṇaṃ pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade āvibhavissati.
tika-vin09t0:65_0: Paṭhamapaññatti tāva paṭhamabodhiṃ atikkamitvā paññattattā, āyasmato sudinnassa aṭṭhavassikakāle
tika-vin09t0:65_1: paññattattā ca rattaññumahattaṃ pattakāle paññattā, dutiyapaññatti bāhusaccamahattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:65_2: pattakāle. So hi āyasmā makkaṭipārājiko yathā mātugāmappaṭisaṃyuttesu sikkhāpadesu
tika-vin09t0:65_3: tiracchānagatitthī na adhippetā, tathā idhāpīti saññāya “saccaṃ, āvuso…pe… tañca
tika-vin09t0:65_4: kho manussitthiyā, no tiracchānagatāyā”ti āha. Tatiyapaññatti lābhaggamahattaṃ pattakāle
tika-vin09t0:65_5: uppannā “yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā”tiādi vacanato, vepullamahattampi ettheva labbhatīti
tika-vin09t0:65_6: imaṃ paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadaṃ tividhampi vatthuṃ upādāya catubbidhampi taṃ kālaṃ
tika-vin09t0:66_0: Tattha yo panāti anavasesapariyādānapadaṃ. Bhikkhūti tassa atippasaṅganiyamapadaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:66_1: Bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannoti tassa visesanavacanaṃ. Na hi sabbopi bhikkhunāmako,
tika-vin09t0:66_2: yā bhagavatā yāya kāyaci upasampadāya upasampannabhikkhūnaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedena
tika-vin09t0:66_3: sikkhitabbā sikkhā vihitā, “ettha saha jīvantī”ti yo ca sājīvo vutto, taṃ ubhayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:66_4: samāpannova hoti. Kadā pana samāpanno hoti? Yāya kāyaci upasampadāya upasampannasamanantarameva
tika-vin09t0:66_5: tadubhayaṃ jānantopi ajānantopi tadajjhupagatattā samāpannova nāma hoti. Saha jīvantīti
tika-vin09t0:66_6: yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti, pārājikabhāvaṃ vā na pāpuṇāti. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:66_7: “sikkhaṃ paripūrento sikkhāsamāpanno sājīvaṃ avītikkamanto sājīvasamāpanno”ti, taṃ
tika-vin09t0:66_8: ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena vuttaṃ. Na hi sikkhaṃ aparipūrento, kāmavitakkādibahulo
tika-vin09t0:66_9: vā ekaccaṃ sāvasesaṃ sājīvaṃ vītikkamanto vā sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno nāma na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:67_0: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena pana catukkaṃ labbhati – “atthi bhikkhu sikkhāsamāpanno sīlāni
tika-vin09t0:67_1: paccavekkhanto na sājīvasamāpanno acittakaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamanto, atthi na sikkhāsamāpanno
tika-vin09t0:67_2: kāmavitakkādibahulo sājīvasamāpanno nirāpattiko, atthi na sikkhāsamāpanno na ca sājīvasamāpanno
tika-vin09t0:67_3: anavasesaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno, atthi ubhayasamāpanno sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto”ti.
tika-vin09t0:67_4: Ayamettha catuttho bhikkhu ukkaṭṭho idha adhippeto siyā. Na hi bhagavā anukkaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:67_5: vattuṃ yuttoti ce? Na, “tatra yāyaṃ adhisīlasikkhā, ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā
tika-vin09t0:67_6: sikkhā”ti vacanavirodhato, ukkaṭṭhaggahaṇādhippāye sati “sikkhāti tisso sikkhā”ti
tika-vin09t0:67_7: ettakameva vattabbanti adhippāyo. Sikkhattayasamāpanno hi sabbukkaṭṭho. “Methunaṃ
tika-vin09t0:67_8: dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti parato vacanaṃ apekkhitvā adhisīlasikkhāva vuttāti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:67_9: tassāpi abhabbattā. Na hi adhisīlasikkhaṃ paripūrento, sājīvañca avītikkamanto methunadhammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:67_10: paṭisevituṃ bhabbo, taṃ sikkhaṃ aparipūrento, sājīvañca vītikkamantoyeva hi paṭiseveyyāti
tika-vin09t0:67_11: adhippāyā. Tasmā evamettha attho gahetabbo. Yasmā sikkhāpadasaṅkhāto sājīvo adhisīlasikkhameva
tika-vin09t0:67_12: saṅgaṇhāti, na itarasikkhādvayaṃ, tasmā “tatra yāyaṃ adhisīlasikkhā, ayaṃ imasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:67_13: atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā adhisīlasikkhāya saṅgāhako sājīvo sikkhāsājīvoti
tika-vin09t0:67_14: vutto. Iti sājīvavisesanatthaṃ sikkhāggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Tadatthadīpanatthameva vibhaṅge
tika-vin09t0:67_15: sikkhaṃ aparāmasitvā “tasmiṃ sikkhati, tena vuccati sājīvasamāpanno”ti vuttaṃ. Tena
tika-vin09t0:67_16: ekamevidaṃ atthapadanti dīpitaṃ hoti. Tañca upasampadūpagamanantarato paṭṭhāya sikkhanādhikārattā
tika-vin09t0:67_17: “sikkhatī”ti ca “samāpanno”ti ca vuccati. Yo evaṃ “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti saṅkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:67_18: gato, tādisaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca aparabhāge sājīvasaṅkhātameva sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya
tika-vin09t0:67_19: tasmiṃyeva dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyāti ayamattho yujjati.
tika-vin09t0:68_0: Kintu aṭṭhakathānayo paṭikkhitto hoti, so ca na paṭikkhepāraho hoti, adhippāyo panettha
tika-vin09t0:68_1: pariyesitabbo. Sabbesu sikkhāpadesu idameva bhikkhulakkhaṇaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ yadidaṃ “bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:68_2: sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti. Khīṇāsavopi sāvako āpattiṃ āpajjati acittakaṃ, tathā sekkho,
tika-vin09t0:68_3: puthujjano pana sacittakampi, tasmā sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṃ sāmaññamidaṃ bhikkhulakkhaṇanti
tika-vin09t0:68_4: katvā kevalaṃ sikkhāsamāpanno, kevalaṃ sājīvasamāpanno, ubhayasamāpanno cāti sarūpekadesaekasesanayena
tika-vin09t0:68_6: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ukkaṭṭhova vutto. Tameva sampādetuṃ “tasmiṃ sikkhati, tena vuccati
tika-vin09t0:68_7: sājīvasamāpanno”ti ettha sikkhāsaddassa avacane parihāraṃ vatvā yasmā pana so sikkhampi
tika-vin09t0:68_8: samāpanno, tasmā sikkhāsamāpannotipi atthato veditabboti ca vatvā “yaṃ sikkhaṃ samāpanno,
tika-vin09t0:68_9: taṃ apaccakkhāya, yañca sājīvaṃ samāpanno, tattha dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti vuttanti
tika-vin09t0:68_10: ayamaṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo veditabbo. Etasmiṃ pana adhippāye adhisīlasikkhāya eva
tika-vin09t0:68_11: gahaṇaṃ sabbatthikattā, sīlādhikārato ca vinayassāti veditabbaṃ. Yathā ca sikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin09t0:68_12: samādiyanto sīlaṃ samādiyatīti vuccati, evaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paccakkhanto sīlaṃ paccakkhātīti
tika-vin09t0:68_13: vattuṃ yujjati, tasmā tattha vuttaṃ “yaṃ sikkhaṃ samāpanno, taṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:68_14: Ettāvatā samāsato “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti ettha vattabbavinicchayo niṭṭhito hoti.
tika-vin09t0:69_0: Kiṃ iminā visesavacanena payojanaṃ, nanu “yo pana bhikkhu sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:69_1: anāvikatvā…pe… asaṃvāso”ti ettakameva vattabbanti ce? Na vattabbaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgato.
tika-vin09t0:69_2: “Yo pana sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno theyyasaṃvāsādiko kevalena samaññāmattena, paṭiññāmattena
tika-vin09t0:69_3: vā bhikkhu, tassāpi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ atthi, sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya ca methunaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:69_4: paṭisevantassa pārājikāpatti. Yo vā pacchā pārājikaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno,
tika-vin09t0:69_5: tassa ca, yo vā pakkhapaṇḍakattā paṇḍakabhāvūpagamanena na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno,
tika-vin09t0:69_6: tassa ca tadubhayaṃ atthīti āpajjati. Paṇḍakabhāvapakkhe ca paṇḍako upasampadāya
tika-vin09t0:69_7: na vatthū”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā itarasmiṃ pakkhe vatthūti siddhaṃ. Tasmiṃ pakkhe upasampanno
tika-vin09t0:69_8: paṇḍakabhāvapakkhe paṇḍakattā na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno, so pariccajitabbāya sikkhāya
tika-vin09t0:69_9: abhāvena sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya mukhena parassa aṅgajātaggahaṇanayena methunaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:69_10: paṭiseveyya, tassa kuto pārājikāpattīti adhippāyo. Ayaṃ nayo apaṇḍakapakkhaṃ alabhamānasseva
tika-vin09t0:69_11: parato yujjati, labhantassa pana arūpasattānaṃ kusalādisamāpattikkhaṇe bhavaṅgavicchede
tika-vin09t0:69_12: satipi amaraṇaṃ viya paṇḍakabhāvapakkhepi bhikkhubhāvo atthi. Saṃvāsaṃ vā sādiyantassa
tika-vin09t0:69_13: na theyyasaṃvāsakabhāvo atthi antimavatthuajjhāpannassa viya. Na ca sahaseyyādiṃ
tika-vin09t0:69_14: janeti. Gaṇapūrako pana na hoti antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno viya. Na so sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno.
tika-vin09t0:69_15: Itarasmiṃ pana pakkhe hoti, ayaṃ imassa tato viseso. Kimayaṃ sahetuko, udāhu ahetukoti?
tika-vin09t0:69_16: Na ahetuko. Yato upasampadā tassa apaṇḍakapakkhe anuññātā sahetukappaṭisandhikattā.
tika-vin09t0:69_17: Paṇḍakabhāvapakkhepi kissa nānuññātāti ce? Paṇḍakabhūtattā opakkamikapaṇḍakassa viya.
tika-vin09t0:70_0: Apica “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti iminā tassa sikkhāsamādānaṃ dīpetvā taṃ samādinnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:70_1: sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya, tattha ca dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti vattuṃ yujjati, na aññathāti
tika-vin09t0:70_2: iminā kāraṇena yathāvuttāniṭṭhappasaṅgato “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno
tika-vin09t0:70_3: sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yathā cettha, evaṃ “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:70_4: sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā gāmā vā araññā vā
tika-vin09t0:70_5: adinnaṃ…pe… yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya
tika-vin09t0:70_6: dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeyyā”ti sabbattha yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:71_0: “Antamaso tiracchānagatāyapī”ti manussitthiṃ upādāya vuttaṃ. Na hi pageva paṇḍake,
tika-vin09t0:71_1: purise vāti vattuṃ yujjati. Sesaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayameva. Ayaṃ tāva mātikāya
tika-vin09t0:72_1: ca kasmā mahāvibhaṅge ñatticatutthaupasampadāyeva āgatāti? Paṭikkhittāya saraṇagamanūpasampadāya
tika-vin09t0:72_2: anuññātappasaṅgabhayāti upatissatthero. Āpattiyā bhabbataṃ sandhāya tasmimpi vutte
tika-vin09t0:72_3: pubbe paṭikkhittāpi bhagavatā puna anuññātāti bhikkhūnaṃ micchāgāho vā vimati vā
tika-vin09t0:72_4: uppajjati, tasmā na vuttāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:73_1: tasmā “akuppenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā akuppakammampi ekaccaṃ na ṭhānārahaṃ, yena apatto
tika-vin09t0:73_2: osāraṇaṃ suosāritoti vuccati, tasmā “ṭhānārahenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “ṭhānārahenā”ti
tika-vin09t0:73_3: idameva vattabbaṃ iminā akuppasiddhitoti ce? Na, aṭṭhānārahena akuppena upasampanno
tika-vin09t0:73_4: imasmiṃ atthe na adhippeto aniṭṭhappasaṅgato. Dvīhi panetehi ekato vuttehi ayamattho
tika-vin09t0:73_5: paññāyati – kevalaṃ tena akuppena upasampanno ayampi imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti,
tika-vin09t0:73_6: ṭhānārahena ca akuppena ca upasampanno ayampi imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti,
tika-vin09t0:74_2: hontī’ti vuttattā puna cattāri vassāni icchitabbāni, ‘paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāyā’ti
tika-vin09t0:74_3: idaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vasena vutta”nti eke. “Keci vadantī”ti yattha yattha likhīyati,
tika-vin09t0:74_4: tattha tattha vicāretvā atthaṃ suṭṭhu upalakkhaye. Opakkamike paṇḍakabhāvo āruḷhanayena
tika-vin09t0:74_5: veditabbo. “Pakkhapaṇḍako apaṇḍakapakkhe pabbājetvā paṇḍakapakkhe nāsetabbo”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:75: “Binduṃ adatvā ce nivāseti, theyyasaṃvāsako na hotī”ti vadanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. Liṅgānurūpassāti sāmaṇerārahassa saṃvāsassa sāditattāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:76_0: Rājabhayādīhi gahitaliṅgānaṃ “gihī maṃ ‘samaṇo’ti jānantū”ti vañcanacitte satipi
tika-vin09t0:76_1: bhikkhūnaṃ vañcetukāmatāya ca tehi saṃvasitukāmatāya ca abhāvā doso na jātoti. “Yo
tika-vin09t0:76_2: evaṃ pabbajati, so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotī”ti vā “evaṃ kātuṃ na labbhatī”ti vā
tika-vin09t0:76_3: “evaṃ pabbajito sāmaṇero na hotī”ti vā na jānāti, vaṭṭati. “Jānāti, na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin09t0:76_4: ca likhitaṃ. “Rājadubbhikkhādiatthāya cīvaraṃ pārupitvā saṃvāsaṃ sādiyanto theyyasaṃvāsako
tika-vin09t0:76_5: hoti. Kasmā? Asuddhacittattā. Puna so ‘suddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ karissāmi, kiṃ etenāti
tika-vin09t0:76_6: vippaṭisārena vā paccayādisulabhatāya vā karissāmī’ti suddhamānaso hutvā yāva so
tika-vin09t0:76_7: saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti, tāva theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti. Evaṃ suddhacittuppattito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:76_8: saṃvāsaṃ sādiyati ce, theyyasaṃvāsako hotīti adhippeto. Itarathā sabbaṃ virujjhatī”ti eke.
tika-vin09t0:77: “Nābhiparāmāsādinā jāto tathārūpaṃ pitaraṃ ghāteti ce, pitughātako hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:78_0: Yo pana kāyasaṃsaggena sīlavināsaṃ pāpeti, na so bhikkhunidūsako “tiṇṇaṃ maggāna”nti
tika-vin09t0:78_1: vacanato. Bhikkhuniṃ pana ekatoupasampannaṃ dūsetvāpi bhikkhunidūsako hoti, sopi
tika-vin09t0:78_2: pārājiko hotīti vinicchayo. Bhikkhunī pana theyyasaṃvāsikā, mātupituarahantaghātikā,
tika-vin09t0:78_3: lohituppādikā, titthiyapakkantikā ca hoti, aṭṭhakathāsu anāgataṃ vinayadharā sampaṭicchanti.
tika-vin09t0:79_0: “Sampajānamusāvāde pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ mariyādaṃ avītikkamanto tasmiñca sikkhāpade
tika-vin09t0:79_1: sikkhatīti vuccati. Sikkhāpadanti asabhāvadhammo saṅketova, idha paññatti adhippetā.
tika-vin09t0:79_2: “Methunasaṃvarassetaṃ adhivacana”nti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ panatthaṃ sandhāyāti
tika-vin09t0:79_3: likhitaṃ. Sikkhāti taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ, sikkhanabhāvena pavattacittuppādo. Sājīvanti
tika-vin09t0:79_5: Yasmā sikkhāya guṇasammatāya puññasammatāya tantiyā abhāvato lokassa dubbalyāvikammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:79_6: tattha na sambhavati. Patthanīyā hi sā, tasmā “yañca sājīvaṃ samāpanno, tasmiṃ dubbalabhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:79_7: appakāsetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Āṇāya hi dubbalyaṃ sambhavatīti upatisso. Dubbalyāvikammapadaṃ
tika-vin09t0:79_8: sikkhāpaccakkhānapadassa byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya vā parivārakabhāvena vā veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:79_9: Atha vā yasmā sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ekaccaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ akataṃ hoti, tasmā taṃ
tika-vin09t0:79_10: sandhāya “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti padassa atthaṃ vivaranto “dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti
tika-vin09t0:79_11: āha. Tattha siyā yasmā na sabbaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ, tasmā “dubbalyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:79_12: anāvikatvā”ti paṭhamaṃ vatvā tassa atthaniyamatthaṃ “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti vattabbanti?
tika-vin09t0:79_13: Taṃ na, kasmā? Atthānukkamābhāvato. “Sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti hi vuttattā “yaṃ sikkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:79_14: samāpanno, taṃ apaccakkhāya, yañca sājīvaṃ samāpanno, tattha dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti
tika-vin09t0:79_15: vuccamāne anukkameneva attho vutto hoti, na aññathā, tasmā idameva paṭhamaṃ vuttanti.
tika-vin09t0:81_0: Pavesanaṃ nāma aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa aṅgajātena samphusanaṃ. Paviṭṭhaṃ nāma yāva
tika-vin09t0:81_1: mūlaṃ pavesentassa vippakatakālo vāyāmakālo. Sukkavisaṭṭhisamaye aṅgajātaṃ ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:81_2: nāma. Uddharaṇaṃ nāma nīharaṇakālo. Vinayagaṇṭhipade pana “vāyāmato oramitvā ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:81_3: ṭhitaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ asaṅkarato dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Pavesanapaviṭṭhauddharaṇakālesupi
tika-vin09t0:81_4: sukkavisaṭṭhi hotiyeva. Sādiyanaṃ nāma sevanacittassa adhivāsanacittassa uppādanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:82_0: Ubhatovibhaṅge eva paññattāni sandhāya “idañhi sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ nidāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:82_1: “Vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā”ti vuttattā idha tatiyā sahayogena vuttā.
tika-vin09t0:82_2: Tasmā vīsatipi bhikkhū ce nisinnā, pañcamo vinayadharova icchitabbo, evaṃ sati pārājiko
tika-vin09t0:82_3: ce vinayadharo, upasampadākammaṃ kopetīti ce? Na, parivārāvasāne kammavagge yaṃ kammavipattilakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:82_4: vuttaṃ, tassa tasmiṃ natthitāya. “Kathaṃ vatthuto vā ñattito vā anussāvanato vā sīmato
tika-vin09t0:82_5: vā parisato vā”ti ettakaṃ vuttaṃ, nanu ayaṃ “parisato vā”ti vacanena saṅgahitoti
tika-vin09t0:82_6: ce? Na, “dvādasahi ākārehi parisato kammāni vipajjantī”ti suttassa hi vibhaṅge tassa
tika-vin09t0:82_7: anāmaṭṭhattāti ayamattho yasmā tattha tattha sarūpena vuttapāḷivaseneva sakkā jānituṃ,
tika-vin09t0:82_8: tasmā nayamukhaṃ dassetvā saṃkhittoti likhitaṃ. “Aṅga”nti padaṃ uddharitvā “sabbasikkhāpadesu
tika-vin09t0:82_9: āpattīnaṃ aṅgānaṅgaṃ veditabba”nti vuttaṃ, idha pana “aṅga”nti vuttaṃ, kasmā? Samuṭṭhanādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:82_10: parivārādīsu saṅkhepena āgatattā tattha gahetvā idhāpi niddiṭṭhānaṃ anaṅgānaṃ vavatthānābhāvato,
tika-vin09t0:82_11: sabbattha saṅkhepato ca vitthārato ca anaṅgatte vuccamāne ativitthāratāya tasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:82_12: tasmiṃ sikkhāpade anūnaṃ vattabbato cāti veditabbo, sabbāpattīnaṃ saṅgāhakavasenāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:83_0: Yāni sikkhāpadāni “kiriyānī”ti vuccanti, tesaṃ vasena kāyavācā saha viññattiyā veditabbā,
tika-vin09t0:83_1: akiriyānaṃ vasena vinā viññattiyā veditabbā. Cittaṃ panettha appamāṇaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānassa
tika-vin09t0:83_2: kiriyattā, acittakattā ca. Tattha kiriyā āpattiyā anaṅgantaracittasamuṭṭhānā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:83_3: Aviññattijanakampi ekaccaṃ bāhullanayena “kiriya”nti vuccati yatheva paṭhamapārājikaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:83_4: Viññattiyā abhāvepi “so ce sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa, na sādiyati, anāpattī”ti
tika-vin09t0:83_5: hi vuttaṃ, viññattisaṅkhātāpi kiriyā vinā sevanacittena na hoti vuttacittajattā,
tika-vin09t0:83_6: vikārarūpattā, cittānuparivattikattā ca. Tasmā kiriyāsaṅkhātamidaṃ viññattirūpaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:83_7: itaraṃ cittajarūpaṃ viya janakacittena vinā na tiṭṭhati, itaraṃ saddāyatanaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:83_8: tasmā kiriyāya sati ekantato tajjanakaṃ sevanacittaṃ atthi evāti katvā na sādiyati,
tika-vin09t0:83_9: anāpattīti na yujjatīti. Yasmā viññattijanakampi samānaṃ sevanacittaṃ na sabbakālaṃ
tika-vin09t0:83_10: viññattiṃ janeti, tasmā vināpi viññattiyā sayaṃ uppajjatīti katvā “sādiyati, āpatti
tika-vin09t0:83_11: pārājikassā”ti vuttaṃ. Nuppajjati ce, na sādiyati nāma, tassa anāpatti. Teneva bhagavā
tika-vin09t0:83_12: “kiṃcitto tvaṃ bhikkhū”ti citteneva āpattiṃ paricchindati, na kiriyāyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:84_0: Ettha samuṭṭhānaggahaṇaṃ kattabbato vā akattabbato vā kāyādibhedāpekkhameva āpattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:84_1: āpajjati, na aññathāti dassanappayojanaṃ. Tesu kiriyāggahaṇaṃ kāyādīnaṃ saviññattikāviññattikabhedadassanappayojanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:84_2: Saññāggahaṇaṃ āpattiyā aṅgānaṅgacittavisesadassanappayojanaṃ. Tena yaṃ cittaṃ kiriyalakkhaṇe
tika-vin09t0:84_3: vā akiriyalakkhaṇe vā sannihitaṃ, yato vā kiriyā vā akiriyā vā hoti, na taṃ avisesena
tika-vin09t0:84_4: āpattiyā aṅgaṃ vā anaṅgaṃ vā hoti. Kintu yāya saññāya “saññāvimokkha”nti vuccati,
tika-vin09t0:84_5: tāya sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ aṅgaṃ, itaraṃ anaṅganti dassitaṃ hoti. Idāni yena cittena
tika-vin09t0:84_6: sikkhāpadaṃ sacittakaṃ hoti, tadabhāvā acittakaṃ, tena tassa avisesena sāvajjatāya
tika-vin09t0:84_7: “lokavajjamevā”ti vuttaṃ. Kintu sāvajjaṃyeva samānaṃ ekaccaṃ lokavajjaṃ, ekaccaṃ
tika-vin09t0:84_9: vuccati, tasmā manokammampi siyā āpattīti aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇappayojanaṃ kammaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:85_0: Yaṃ panettha akiriyalakkhaṇaṃ kammaṃ, taṃ kusalattikavinimuttaṃ siyāti aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇappayojanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:85_1: kusalattikaggahaṇaṃ. Yā panettha abyākatāpatti, taṃ ekaccaṃ avedanampi nirodhaṃ samāpanno
tika-vin09t0:85_2: āpajjatīti vedanāttikaṃ ettha na labbhatīti aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ vedanāttikaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:85_5: āpajjati acittako vuṭṭhāti, atthāpatti kusalacitto āpajjati kusalacitto vuṭṭhātī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:85_7: nosaññāvimokkhaṃ vītikkamanājānanaṃ. Idameva tesaṃ nānātta”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:86_0: Sacittakapakkheti ettha ayaṃ tāva gaṇṭhipadanayo – sacittakapakkheti surāpānādiacittake
tika-vin09t0:86_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sacittakesu pana yaṃ ekantamakusaleneva samuṭṭhāti, tañca ubhayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:86_2: lokavajjaṃ nāma. Surāpānasmiñhi “surā”ti vā “pātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vā jānitvā pivane
tika-vin09t0:86_3: akusalamevāti. Tattha “na vaṭṭatīti jānitvā”ti vuttavacanaṃ na yujjati paṇṇattivajjassapi
tika-vin09t0:86_4: lokavajjatāpasaṅgato. Imaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgaṃ pariharitukāmatāya ca vajirabuddhittherena
tika-vin09t0:86_5: likhitaṃ – “idha ‘sacittaka’nti ca ‘acittaka’nti ca vicāraṇā vatthuvijānane eva hoti,
tika-vin09t0:86_6: na paññattivijānane. Yadi paññattivijānane hoti, sabbasikkhāpadāni lokavajjāneva
tika-vin09t0:86_7: siyuṃ, na ca sabbasikkhāpadāni lokavajjāni. Tasmā vatthuvijānane eva hotīti idaṃ
tika-vin09t0:86_8: yujjati. Kasmā? Yasmā sekhiyesu paññattivijānanameva pamāṇaṃ, na vatthumattavijānana”nti.
tika-vin09t0:86_9: Ayaṃ panettha attho sikkhāpadasīsena āpattiṃ gahetvā yassa sikkhāpadassa sacittakassa
tika-vin09t0:86_10: cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, taṃ lokavajjaṃ, sacittakācittakasaṅkhātassa acittakassa
tika-vin09t0:86_11: ca sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, tampi surāpānādilokavajjanti imamatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:86_12: sandhāya “yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, ayaṃ lokavajjā nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:86_13: “Sacittakapakkhe”ti hi idaṃ vacanaṃ acittakaṃ sandhāyāha. Na hi ekaṃsato sacittakāya
tika-vin09t0:86_14: “sacittakapakkhe”ti visesane payojanaṃ atthīti, evaṃ santepi aniyamena vuttañca niyamavasena
tika-vin09t0:87_0: Tiracchānānaṃ panāti pana-saddena thullaccayādikāraṃ nivatteti. Kiriyāti ettha “ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:87_1: sādiyatī”ti vuttattā taṃ kathanti ce? “Sādiyatī”ti vuttattā kiriyā eva. Evaṃ sante
tika-vin09t0:87_2: “kāyakammaṃ manokamma”nti vattabbanti ce? Na, pacuravohāravasena “kāyakamma”nti vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:87_3: Ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalikāya labbhati evāti likhitaṃ. Pubbe vuttanayena saṃsandetvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:87_4: “Dunnikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hotī”ti vadantenāpi
tika-vin09t0:87_5: atthassa sukhaggahaṇatthameva padabyañjanassa sunikkhittabhāvo icchito, na akkharavacanāya,
tika-vin09t0:90_0: Gāmā vā araññā vāti lakkhaṇānupaññattikattā ādimhi vuttā. Sabbasmiñhi vinayapiṭake
tika-vin09t0:90_1: gāmo, gāmūpacāro, gāmakkhettaṃ, gāmasīmā, gāmasīmūpacāroti pañcavidho gāmabhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:90_2: Tathā āraññakasīmāya ekaṃ agāmakaṃ araññaṃ, saṃvidhānasikkhāpadānaṃ ekaṃ, sagāmakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:90_3: ekaṃ, avippavāsasīmāya ekaṃ, gaṇamhāohīyanakassa ekanti pañcavidho araññabhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:90_4: Tattha atthi gāmo na gāmaparihāraṃ katthaci labhati, atthi gāmo na gāmakiccaṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:90_5: tathā atthi araññaṃ na araññaparihāraṃ katthaci labhati, atthi araññaṃ na araññakiccaṃ
tika-vin09t0:91_1: gāmo nāma parikkhitto ce, parikkhepassa anto, aparikkhitto ce, parikkhepokāsato anto
tika-vin09t0:91_3: āgato anāsaṅkato. Yathāha “antaraghare nikkhipeyyāti samantā gocaragāme nikkhipeyyā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:91_4: Tathā antaragharappaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ sekhiyānaṃ ayameva paricchedo veditabbo. “Yā pana
tika-vin09t0:91_5: bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyyā”ti etthāpi ayameva paricchedo adhippeto “parikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:91_6: gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantiyā, aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkamantiyā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:92_0: Yesu purāṇapotthakesu “upacāraṃ okkamantiyā”ti likhitaṃ, taṃ vikāle gāmappavesanasikkhāpadesu
tika-vin09t0:92_1: āciṇṇaṃ nayaṃ gahetvā pamādena likhīyati, na pamāṇaṃ. Yesu ca potthakesu vikāle gāmappavesanasikkhāpadassa
tika-vin09t0:92_2: vibhaṅge “gāmaṃ paviseyyāti parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa, aparikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:92_3: gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkamantassā”ti likhīyati, sā pamādalekhā. Upacāraṃ okkamantassāti
tika-vin09t0:92_4: tattha pāṭho. Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro adinnādāne
tika-vin09t0:92_5: vuttanayeneva veditabbo”ti. Idha kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyampi vuttaṃ “santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchitvāti…pe…
tika-vin09t0:93_0: Yaṃ pana katthaci potthake “bhikkhuniyā gāmantarādhikāre ekena pādena itarassa gāmassa
tika-vin09t0:93_1: parikkhepaṃ vā atikkamante, upacāraṃ vā okkante thullaccayaṃ, dutiyena atikkantamatte,
tika-vin09t0:93_2: okkantamatte ca saṅghādiseso”ti pāṭho dissati. Tattha “okkante, okkantamatte”ti etāni
tika-vin09t0:93_3: padāni adhikāni, kevalaṃ likhitakehi aññehi likhitāni. Katthaci potthake “okkantamatte
tika-vin09t0:93_4: cā”ti padaṃ na dissati, itaraṃ dissati. Tāni dve padāni pāḷiyā virujjhanti. “Aparikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:93_5: gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkāmentiyā”ti hi pāḷi. Tathā samantapāsādikāya virujjhanti. “Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:93_6: ekena pādena atikkamati, thullaccayaṃ, dutiyena atikkamati, saṅghādiseso. Apicettha
tika-vin09t0:93_7: sakagāmato…pe… ekena pādena itarassa gāmassa parikkhepe vā upacāre vā atikkante thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:94_0: Gaṇṭhipade cassa “parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā”ti vatvā “upacārepi eseva nayo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:94_1: Anugaṇṭhipade ca “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ ‘okkamantiyā’tipi potthakesu ekaccesu
tika-vin09t0:94_2: dissati, taṃ na gahetabba”nti vuttaṃ. Aparampi vuttaṃ “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:94_3: ‘atikkāmentiyā’ti vacanenāpi evaṃ veditabbaṃ – vikāle gāmappavesane dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:94_4: eva vasena upacāro paricchinditabbo, itarathā yathā ettha parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ parikkhepaṃ
tika-vin09t0:94_5: viya katvā ‘atikkāmentiyā’ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ tatthāpi ‘aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:94_6: atikkāmentassā’ti vadeyya. Yasmā pana tattha parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato uttarimeko leḍḍupāto
tika-vin09t0:94_7: upacāroti adhippeto. Tasmā tadatthadīpanatthaṃ ‘aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:95_0: Yaṃ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃyeva upacāranti sallakkhetvā “parikkhepapaakkhepārahaṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:95_2: “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkamantassa idha upacāro parikkhepo yathā bhaveyya,
tika-vin09t0:95_3: taṃ upacāraṃ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentassa āpatti dukkaṭassa, dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentassa
tika-vin09t0:95_4: āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na gahetabbameva pāḷiyā visesasambhavatoti. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin09t0:95_5: “upacāraṃ atikkāmentiyā bhikkhuniyā gāmantarāpattī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā idha kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyā
tika-vin09t0:95_6: “ekena pādena itarassa…pe… atikkantamatte saṅghādiseso”ti ayameva pāṭho veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:95_7: Ettāvatā imesu yathāvuttesu ṭhānesu yathāvuttaparicchedova gāmoti veditabbo. Imassa
tika-vin09t0:95_8: atthassa dīpanatthaṃ “gāmo nāma ekakuṭikopī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Imassa vasena asatipi parikkhepātikkame,
tika-vin09t0:95_9: upacārokkamane vā antarārāmato vā bhikkhunupassayato vā titthiyaseyyato vā paṭikkamanato
tika-vin09t0:95_10: vā taṃ gāmaṃ pavisantassa antarārāmaparikkhepassa, upacārassa vā atikkamanavasena
tika-vin09t0:96_0: Gāmūpacāro pana “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti ettha parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepova,
tika-vin09t0:96_2: parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepo, aparikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepokāso. Tesu adhiṭṭhitatecīvariko
tika-vin09t0:96_3: bhikkhu parihāraṃ na labhatī”ti. Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ, yena ayaṃ gāmo, gāmūpacāro
tika-vin09t0:96_4: ca idha aññathā, aññattha tathāti? Aṭṭhuppattito “tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū
tika-vin09t0:96_5: ‘bhagavatā ticīvarena avippavāsasammuti anuññātā’ti antaraghare cīvarāni nikkhipantī”ti
tika-vin09t0:96_6: imissā hi aṭṭhuppattiyā “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā yattha antaragharasaññā,
tika-vin09t0:96_7: tattha avippavāsasīmā na gacchatīti veditabbā. Tena ca udositasikkhāpade “antogāme
tika-vin09t0:96_8: cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā antogāme vatthabba”nti ca “sabhāye vā dvāramūle vā, hatthapāsā
tika-vin09t0:96_9: vā na vijahitabba”nti ca vuttaṃ. Kappiyabhūmiyaṃ vasantoyeva hi kappiyabhūmiyaṃ nikkhittacīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:96_10: rakkhati. Sāsaṅkasikkhāpade pana “yasmā yattha gāme cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tena gāmena
tika-vin09t0:96_11: vippavasanto cīvarena vippavasatīti vuccati, tasmā puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā
tika-vin09t0:96_12: pakkamatī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmiñhi sikkhāpade gāmasīmā gāmo nāmāti adhippeto. Tattha vikāle
tika-vin09t0:96_14: āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vacanato parikkhepo na gāmo. Kintu gāmūpacāroti lesena dassitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:96_15: hoti. Imasmiṃ pana sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti ārabhitvā “aparikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:96_16: gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti iminā aparikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:96_17: parikkhepokāso gāmūpacāroti siddhaṃ. Tadatthasambhavato tasmiṃ gharūpacāre ṭhitassa
tika-vin09t0:96_18: leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāroti kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ, mahāpaccariyampi vuttaṃ. Upacāro hi “gāmo
tika-vin09t0:96_19: ekūpacāro nānūpacāro”tiādīsu dvāraṃ, “ajjhokāso ekūpacāro”ti ettha samantā sattabbhantarasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin09t0:96_20: pamāṇaṃ, tasmā “gāmūpacāroti parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepo, aparikkhittassa gāmassa
tika-vin09t0:96_21: parikkhepokāso”ti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tathā kurundiyaṃ, mahāpaccariyañca.
tika-vin09t0:96_22: Tathā pāḷiyampi “ajjhārāmo nāma parikkhittassa ārāmassa anto ārāmo, aparikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:96_23: upacāro. Ajjhāvasatho nāma parikkhittassa āvasathassa anto āvasatho, aparikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:96_24: upacāro”tiādīsu dissati. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “gāmūpacāro”tiādīsu dissati. Tasmā
tika-vin09t0:97_0: “Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti pāḷivisesasambhavato
tika-vin09t0:97_1: ca paṭhamo leḍḍupāto gāmo eva, dutiyo gāmūpacāroti vuttaṃ. Parikkhittassa pana gāmassa
tika-vin09t0:97_2: indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāroti vuttanti ettha bhedo
tika-vin09t0:97_3: natthi. Ettāvatā parikkhittassa duvidho upacāro, aparikkhittassa catubbidho upacāro
tika-vin09t0:97_4: yattha sambhavati, yattha ca na sambhavati, taṃ sabbaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:98: Gāmakhettassa ca gāmasīmāya ca lakkhaṇaṃ aṭṭhakathāyameva vuttaṃ. Ubhayañhi atthato ekaṃ. Tattha gāmasīmāya gāmabhāvo sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavasena veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:99_0: Gāmasīmūpacāro nāma manussānaṃ kaṭṭhatiṇapupphaphalādiatthikānaṃ vanacarakānaṃ valañjanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:99_1: Imassa gāmasīmūpacārabhāvo udositasikkhāpade, “agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā”ti
tika-vin09t0:99_2: āgataṭṭhāne khandhake ca veditabbo. Ettha hi bhagavā gāmantavāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīmaṃ
tika-vin09t0:99_3: dassento “yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharatī”ti vatvā dasseti. Tadanantarameva
tika-vin09t0:99_4: “agāmake”tiādinā sattabbhantarasīmaṃ dasseti. Tasmā yo bhikkhu gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:99_5: upanissāya na viharati, kevalaṃ nāvāyaṃ vā thalamaggena vā addhānamaggappaṭipanno
tika-vin09t0:99_6: hoti, tassa tattha tattha sattabbhantarasīmā labbhatīti veditabbo. Vuttañhi “ekakulassa
tika-vin09t0:99_7: sattho hoti, satthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā purato vā pacchato vā sattabbhantarā na vijahitabba”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:99_8: Idameva araññaṃ sandhāya “āraññakasīmāya ekaṃ agāmakaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:100: Yaṃ sandhāya “agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Idaṃ saṃvidhānasikkhāpadānaṃ ekaṃ agāmakaṃ araññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:101_0: Purimena pana sagharaṃ saṅgahitaṃ, iminā tamasaṅgahitanti. Yaṃ sandhāya gaṇamhā ohīyanādhikāre
tika-vin09t0:101_1: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “agāmake araññeti ettha ‘nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña’nti
tika-vin09t0:101_2: evaṃ vuttaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ araññaṃ. Taṃ paneta kevalaṃ gāmābhāvena ‘agāmaka’nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:101_3: na viñjhāṭavisadisatāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:101_4: pacchima”nti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ āraññakasenāsanaṃ nāma parikkhittassa parikkhepato bahi,
tika-vin09t0:101_5: aparikkhittassa pana parikkhepokāsato bahi sarukkhaṃ vā arukkhaṃ vā vihāre kunnadisamākiṇṇampi
tika-vin09t0:101_6: araññaṃ nāma. Tathā “gaṇamhā ohīyanakassa eka”nti vuttaṃ. Idaṃ araññaṃva. Idaṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:101_7: pubbe agāmakabhāvena āgataṭṭhāne vuttalakkhaṇameva hutvā nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā
tika-vin09t0:101_8: dassanūpacāravijahane ekameva āpattiṃ karoti, tato uddhaṃ anāpatti. “Saṃvidhānasikkhāpadānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:101_9: eka”nti vuttaṃ pana addhayojane addhayojane ekekaṃ āpattiṃ karoti, na tato oraṃ.
tika-vin09t0:101_10: Itarāni tīṇi yathāvuttaparicchedato orameva tattha vuttavidhiṃ na sampādenti, paraṃ
tika-vin09t0:102_0: Tattha pañcavidhe gāme yo “parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa leḍḍupāto”ti
tika-vin09t0:102_1: vutto, so na katthaci vinayapiṭake upayogaṃ gato, kevalaṃ aparikkhittassa parikkhepokāsato
tika-vin09t0:102_2: aparo eko leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāro nāmāti dīpanatthaṃ vutto. Parikkhittassapi ce gāmassa
tika-vin09t0:102_3: eko leḍḍupāto kappiyabhūmisamāno upacāroti vutto, pageva aparikkhittassa parikkhepokāsato
tika-vin09t0:102_4: eko. So pana pākaṭattā ca ajjhokāsattā ca okkamantassa āpattiṃ karoti ṭhapetvā bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin09t0:102_5: gāmantarāpattiṃ. Bhikkhuniyo hi tasmiṃ dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhāte gāmūpacāre vasantī
tika-vin09t0:102_6: āpattiñca āpajjanti, gāmaṃ pavisantī gāmantarāpattiñca. Tāsañhi ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ araññasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:102_7: gacchati “tāvadeva chāyā metabbā…pe… tassā tayo ca nissaye, aṭṭha ca akaraṇīyāni
tika-vin09t0:102_10: ca “ekā gaṇamhā ohīyeyyāti agāmake araññe dutiyikāya bhikkhuniyā dassanūpacāraṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:102_11: savanūpacāraṃ vā vijahantiyā āpatti thullaccayassā”tiādisikkhāpadapaññattito ca bhikkhunikkhandhakanayaena
tika-vin09t0:102_12: vā yasmā parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīlato paṭṭhāya aparikkhittassa upacārato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:102_13: nīyati, tattha antaraghare nikkhittacīvare sati caturaṅgasamodhānena bhikkhū vasanti,
tika-vin09t0:103_0: Avippavāsasīmāya ekaṃ nāma “na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā araññe vatthabbaṃ, yā vaseyya,
tika-vin09t0:103_1: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato bhikkhunīnaṃ araññavāso nāma natthīti siddhaṃ. Tāya
tika-vin09t0:103_2: hi araññe bhikkhunupassaye sati antoāvāsepi dutiyikāya dassanasavanūpacāraṃ vijahantiyā
tika-vin09t0:103_3: āpatti. Tasmā avippavāsasīmādhikāre “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti ettha yaṃ
tika-vin09t0:103_4: ṭhānaṃ ṭhapitaṃ, tattheva bhikkhunupassayopi kappati, na tato paraṃ.
tika-vin09t0:104_0: Tāsañca avippavāsasīmākammavācāyaṃ “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vacanaṃ natthīti
tika-vin09t0:104_1: katvā tesveva gāmagāmūpacāresu pharati. Tato paraṃ dutiyesu leḍḍupātādīsu tāsaṃ akappiyabhūmikattā
tika-vin09t0:104_2: na samānasaṃvāsakasīmā araññe pharati bhikkhūnaṃ gāmagāmūpacāraṃ viya. Tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-vin09t0:105_0: Evaṃ tāva pañcavidhaṃ gāmabhedaṃ, araññabhedañca ñatvā idāni “atthi gāmo na gāmaparihāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:105_1: katthaci labhatī”tiādibhedo veditabbo. Tattha yo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “amanusso nāma yo
tika-vin09t0:105_2: sabbaso vā manussānaṃ abhāvena yakkhapariggahabhūto”ti vutto, so gāmo na gāmaparihāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:105_3: katthaci sikkhāpade labhati. Yañhi sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle,
tika-vin09t0:105_4: cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hoti, sesakāle suññaṃ hoti yakkhapariggahita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:105_5: Yo pana paṭirājacorādīhi viluttattā, kevalaṃ bhayena vā chaḍḍito sagharova antarahitagāmabhūto,
tika-vin09t0:105_6: so “gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttapācittiyaṃ janeti, vikāle gāmappavesanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:105_7: sekhiye cattāri janetīti veditabbā. Yo pana gāmo yato vā manussā kenacideva karaṇīyena
tika-vin09t0:105_8: punapi āgantukāmā eva apakkantāti vutto, amanusso so pakatigāmasadisova.
tika-vin09t0:106_0: Atthi araññaṃ na araññaparihāraṃ katthaci labhatīti ettha “ajjhokāso ekūpacāro nāma
tika-vin09t0:106_1: agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā ekūpacāro, tato paraṃ nānūpacāro”ti ettha yvāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:106_2: nānūpacāroti vutto, taṃ veditabbaṃ. Yo pana parikkhittassa ekaleḍḍupātasaṅkhāto gāmūpacāranāmako
tika-vin09t0:106_3: gāmo, yo vā sattho nātirekacātumāsaniviṭṭho, so atthi gāmo na gāmakiccaṃ karoti.
tika-vin09t0:106_4: Na hi taṃ ṭhānaṃ okkamanto gāmappavesanāpattiṃ āpajjati. Yaṃ pana gāmasīmāya pariyāpannaṃ
tika-vin09t0:106_5: manussānaṃ valañjanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ araññaṃ, taṃ atthi araññaṃ na araññakiccaṃ karoti
tika-vin09t0:106_6: nāma. Na hi tattha āraññakasīmā labbhatīti. Ettāvatā “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti imissā
tika-vin09t0:107_0: “Gonisādiniviṭṭhopi gāmo”ti ettha sace tassa gāmassa gāmakhettaparicchedo atthi,
tika-vin09t0:107_1: sabbopi eko gāmo. No ce, upacārena vā parikkhepena vā paricchinditabbo. Sace gāmakhette
tika-vin09t0:107_2: sati kānici tāni gharāni aññamaññaupacārappahonakaṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā dūre dūre
tika-vin09t0:107_3: katāni honti, vikāle gāmappavese upacārova pamāṇaṃ. Antaragharappaṭisaṃyuttesu sekhiyesu,
tika-vin09t0:107_4: bhikkhuniyā gāmantarāpattīsu ca gharānaṃ parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ pamāṇaṃ, uposathādikammānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:107_5: gāmakhettaṃ pamāṇaṃ, āraññakasenāsanassa āsannagharassa dutiyaleḍḍupātato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:107_6: pañcadhanusatantaratā pamāṇanti evaṃ no paṭibhānanti ācariyā.
tika-vin09t0:108_0: “Yampi ekasmiṃyeva gāmakhette ekaṃ padesaṃ ‘ayampi visuṃgāmo hotū’ti paricchinditvā
tika-vin09t0:108_1: rājā kassaci deti, sopi visuṃgāmasīmā hotiyevā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato taṃ pavisantiyā
tika-vin09t0:108_2: bhikkhuniyā gāmantarāpatti hoti eva. Sace tattha vihāro vā devakulaṃ vā sabhā vā
tika-vin09t0:108_3: gehaṃ vā natthi, kevalaṃ vatthumattakameva hoti, gāmoti vinayakammaṃ sabbaṃ tattha
tika-vin09t0:108_4: kappati. “Amanusso gāmo”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tañca ṭhānaṃ itarassa gāmassa parikkhepabbhantare
tika-vin09t0:108_5: vā upacārabbhantare vā hoti, vikāle gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ. No ce,
tika-vin09t0:108_6: araññaṃ viya yathāsukhaṃ gantabbaṃ. Tattha ce ārāmo vā titthiyaseyyādīsu aññatarovā
tika-vin09t0:108_7: hoti, laddhakappameva. Bhikkhunupassayo ce hoti, gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantiyā bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin09t0:108_8: gāmantarāpatti pariharitabbā. “Araññaṃ nāma ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:108_9: araññaṃ nāmā”ti ettha parikkhepe sati yathāvuttaparicchedaṃ gāmameva ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:108_10: tassa upacāraṃ, tato parañca araññaṃ nāma, parikkhepe asati yathāvuttaparicchedaṃ
tika-vin09t0:108_11: gāmūpacārameva ṭhapetvā tato paraṃ avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmāti adhippāyo. Evaṃ sati “nikkhamitvā
tika-vin09t0:108_12: bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti vuttalakkhaṇe agāmake araññe gaṇamhāohīyanāpatti,
tika-vin09t0:108_13: tattha avippavāsasīmāya pharaṇaṃ vikāle gāmappavesanāpattiyā anāpattīti evamādivinayavidhi
tika-vin09t0:109_0: “Ṭhapetvā gāmūpacāraṃ avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmā”ti vutte gāmūpacārato paro araññanti
tika-vin09t0:109_1: siddhe “ṭhapetvā gāma”nti visesattho na dissati, gāmassa pana araññabhāvappasaṅgabhayā
tika-vin09t0:109_2: vuttanti ce? Na, gāmūpacārassa abhāvappasaṅgato. Sati hi gāme gāmūpacāro hoti, so
tika-vin09t0:109_3: ca tava matena araññabhūto. Kuto dāni gāmūpacāro. Gāmūpacāropi ce araññasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:109_4: gacchati, parova gāmoti katvā na yuttaṃ gāmassa araññabhāvappasaṅgato ca. Tasmā “gāmā
tika-vin09t0:109_5: vā araññā vā”ti ettha gāmūpacāropi “gāmo” tveva saṅgahito. Tasmā gāmassa araññabhāvappasaṅgo
tika-vin09t0:109_6: na yujjati. Yadi evaṃ “ṭhapetvā gāmaṃ avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmā”ti ettakaṃ vattabbanti
tika-vin09t0:109_7: ce? Na, araññassa paricchedajānanappasaṅgato. Tathā hi vutto “araññaparicchedo na
tika-vin09t0:109_8: paññāyatī”ti no laddhi. Gāmūpacārapariyanto hi idha gāmo nāma. Yadi evaṃ “gāmassa
tika-vin09t0:109_9: ca araññassa ca paricchedadassanatthaṃ vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vattabbaṃ, “araññassa
tika-vin09t0:109_10: paricchedadassanatthaṃ vutta”nti kimatthaṃ vuttanti ce? Vuccate – aṭṭhakathācariyena
tika-vin09t0:109_12: hi bāhiraindakhīlato paṭṭhāya gāmūpacāraṃ araññaṃ nāma. Gāmaparicchedavacane payojanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:109_13: panettha natthi parikkhepeneva pākaṭabhūtattā. Dutiyagāmūpacārova gāmassa paricchedadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:109_14: vutto parikkhepabhāvena apākaṭattā. Tattha paṭhamagāmūpacāro ce araññaparicchedadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:109_15: vutto, tattha na vattabbo. “Nikkhamitvā indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:109_16: Evaṃ sante subyattataraṃ araññaparicchedo dassito hoti, micchāgāho ca na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:110_0: “Majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti hi vutte ayaṃ gāmūpacārova araññaṃ gāmūpacārassa
tika-vin09t0:110_1: vibhaṅgattā. Yadi araññaparicchedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, avuttakameva, araññato paranti
tika-vin09t0:110_2: ca micchāgāho hotīti ce, nanu vuttaṃ “paṭhamameva idaṃ parikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraniyamanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:110_4: ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupātoti pana evaṃ vacanappayojanaṃ. Aparikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:110_5: ca gāmassa yvāyaṃ leḍḍupāto upacāro”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto, tassa niyamananti
tika-vin09t0:110_6: vuttaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce? “Araññaṃ nāmā”ti padaṃ anuddharitvā “gāmūpacāro
tika-vin09t0:110_7: nāmā”ti uddharaṇassa katattā. Tattha “gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti mātikāyaṃ avijjamānaṃ padaṃ
tika-vin09t0:110_8: uddharanto tayo atthavase dasseti. Seyyathidaṃ – araññaparicchedadassanameko attho,
tika-vin09t0:110_9: aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacārena saddhiṃ paricchedadassanameko, na kevalaṃ aparikkhittassayeva
tika-vin09t0:110_10: upacāro vinayādhikāre sappayojano dassitabbo, nippayojanopi parikkhittassa upacāro
tika-vin09t0:110_11: iminā pariyāyena labbhatīti anusaṅgappayojanameko atthopi veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:111_0: “Aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti
tika-vin09t0:111_1: idaṃ bhagavā tayo atthavase paṭicca abhāsi. Seyyathidaṃ – aparikkhittassa gāmassa
tika-vin09t0:111_2: paricchedadassanameko, avippavāsasīmādhikāre ayameva gāmūpacāroti dassanameko, tattha
tika-vin09t0:111_3: ṭhitassa dutiyo leḍḍupāto sabbattha gāmappaṭisaṃyuttesu sikkhāpadesu sakiccako upacāroti
tika-vin09t0:111_4: dassanamekoti evaṃ bhagavā attano desanāvilāsappattiyā ekekapaduddhāraṇena tayo atthavase
tika-vin09t0:112_0: Tathā avippavāsasīmākammavācāya “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti etthāpi parikkhepe
tika-vin09t0:112_1: sati gāmaṃ ṭhapetvā, asati gāmūpacāraṃ ṭhapetvāti attho. Parikkhittassa, aparikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:112_2: ca majjhe ārāme avippavāsasīmāsammannanakāle ayaṃ nayo ativiya yujjati. Ubhayaparivajjanato
tika-vin09t0:112_3: pubbe vuttanayena vā ubhayattha ubhayaṃ labbhateva. “Antarārāmesu pana āciṇṇakappā
tika-vin09t0:112_5: sekhiyānaṃ antarārāmesu asambhavato antarārāmo na gāmasaṅkhaṃ gacchati, tasmā tatthapi
tika-vin09t0:112_6: avippavāsasīmā ruhatevā”ti eke. Te bhikkhū dutiyassa gāmūpacārassa gāmasaṅkhāsabhāvato
tika-vin09t0:112_7: tāsaṃ imāya dutiyāya avippavāsakammavācāya abhāvaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā. Ajjhārāmo
tika-vin09t0:112_8: pana gāmopi samāno titthiyaseyyādi viya kappiyabhūmīti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:119_0: Ayañhi upacārasaddo vinayapiṭake “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, agilānenapi ārāme ārāmūpacāre
tika-vin09t0:119_1: chattaṃ dhāretu”nti evamādīsu bāhire upacāre dissati. Bāhiro upacāro nāma parikkhepato,
tika-vin09t0:119_2: parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato vā eko leḍḍupāto. “Ajjhārāmo nāma parikkhittassa ārāmassa
tika-vin09t0:119_3: antoārāmo, aparikkhittassa upacāro. Ajjhāvasatho nāma parikkhittassa āvasathassa
tika-vin09t0:119_4: antoāvasatho, aparikkhittassa upacāro”tiādīsu pana upacārasaddo abbhantare upacāre
tika-vin09t0:119_5: dissati. Abbhantaro upacāro ca nāma parikkhepo, parikkhepārahaṭṭhānañca hoti. Idha
tika-vin09t0:119_6: pana parikkhepo “ajjhārāmo, ajjhāvasatho”ti vā na vuccati, anto eva ārāmo, āvasathoti
tika-vin09t0:119_7: vā. Tesu bāhirabbhantarabhedabhinnesu dvīsu upacāresu avippavāsasīmādhikāre “ṭhapetvā
tika-vin09t0:119_8: gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti ettha gāmūpacāro nāma abbhantarūpacāro adhippeto, na bāhiro.
tika-vin09t0:119_9: Bhikkhuniyā araññasaññitatāya tassa bāhirassa, tassā gāmantarāpattiyā ṭhānabhūtattā
tika-vin09t0:119_10: ca abbhantaraupacārassāti idamettha kāraṇadvayaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha idha adinnādānapārājikavibhaṅgeyeva
tika-vin09t0:119_11: paṭhamo gāmūpacāro dassito, so bāhiro, dutiyo abbhantaroti veditabbo. Paṭhamena ca
tika-vin09t0:119_12: aparikkhittassa gāmassa dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhāto bāhiro upacāro, dutiyena ca parikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:119_13: gāmassa parikkhepato bāhirasaṅkhāto abbhantaro upacāro lesena dassitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:119_14: Evaṃ cattāropi upacārā idha bhagavatā desanāvilāsappattena desanālīlāya dassitā hontīti
