tika-vin09t0:119_15: ayaṃ nayo suṭṭhu lakkhetvā ācariyehi sammantayitvā yathānurūpaṃ tattha yojetabbo. Itarathā –
tika-vin09t0:132_0: Tattha hi pāḷiyaṃ “gāmassa upacāro gāmūpacāro, gāmasaṅkhāto upacāro gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti
tika-vin09t0:132_1: uddharitvā gāmassa upacāraṃ dassento “indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti
tika-vin09t0:132_2: vatvā puna gāmasaṅkhātaṃ upacāraṃ dassento “gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa
tika-vin09t0:133_0: Atthato ekanti ettha saṅkhāsaddaṃ saṅkhātasaddena samānayati. “Ādiyeyyā”ti idaṃ pañcavīsatiyā
tika-vin09t0:133_1: avahārānaṃ sādhāraṇapadaṃ. Ṭhānācāvanavasena ca khīlādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena
tika-vin09t0:133_2: cāti attho. Ṭhānācāvane yathā sāmikassa dhuranikkhepādiṃ anoloketvāva āpatti, tathā ihāpīti gahetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:134: “Asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ avaharissāmī”ti sabbesaṃ ekāsayattā “ekenāpī”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi āṇatti icchitabbā, saṃvidhāvahāro nāma eko avahāro parihāyitabbo.
tika-vin09t0:135_0: Okāsaparikappe ṭhānācāvanāya gahitampi okāsaparikappitattā rakkhati. Okāsātikkamova
tika-vin09t0:135_1: pamāṇaṃ pubbe asuddhacittena gahitattā. Idāni suddhacittena gahitepi hoti evāti vadanti,
tika-vin09t0:135_2: taṃ na sundaraṃ. Ettha pana vinicchayo samantapāsādikaṃ oloketvā gahetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:137_0: Uddhatamatte avahāro sakalassa payogassa niṭṭhāpitattā, na atthasādhakavasena. Uddhāreyeva
tika-vin09t0:137_1: rakkhatīti ettha eva-saddena pātane na rakkhatīti atthe siddhepi atthasādhakavasena
tika-vin09t0:138_1: likhitaṃ. Kiñcāpi bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ, idaṃ pana ekaṃ bimbisāramevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Rājānoti
tika-vin09t0:138_2: kiñci aniddisitvā sādhāraṇavasena kiñcāpi vuttaṃ, idaṃ pana bimbisāramevāti.
tika-vin09t0:139_0: Pubbappayogeti ettha gamanakāle maggasodhanādhikaraṇe apācittiyakhette dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:139_1: latācchedanādīsu pācittiyameva. Gantvā pana kumbhimatthake jātalatādicchedane sahapayogattā
tika-vin09t0:139_2: dukkaṭaṃ. “Ekabhaṇḍe evaṃ bhāriyamidaṃ, ‘tvampi ekapassaṃ gaṇha, ahampi ekapassaṃ
tika-vin09t0:139_3: gaṇhāmī’ti saṃvidahitvā ubhayesaṃ payogena ṭhānācāvane kate kāyavācācittehi samuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin09t0:139_4: Aññathā sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti, āṇattikaṃ vā sāhatthikassāti vuttalakkhaṇena
tika-vin09t0:139_5: virujjhatī”ti vinayagaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ. Pi-saddo panettha tattheva likhito.
tika-vin09t0:141: Tatra vācaṅgaṃ cittaṃva, kammaṃ nassā vidhīyati.
tika-vin09t0:143: Na yuttaṃ taṃ viruddhattā, kammamekaṃva yujjatīti. ;
tika-vin09t0:146_0: Yathā ñātapariññā dhammānaṃ sabhāvajānanameva “idaṃ rūpaṃ, ayaṃ vedanā”ti, tīraṇapariññā
tika-vin09t0:146_1: pana dhammasabhāvena saddhiṃ aniccādivasena pavattamānaṃ “rūpaṃ aniccanti vā”tiādi,
tika-vin09t0:146_2: evamidha saddhiṃ cetetvā ekattenāpi pāṇātipātābhāvā “jīvitā voropeyyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:146_4: dassetuṃ “kalalato paṭṭhāyā”ti āha. Ettha jīvitā voropento paccuppannato viyojeti.
tika-vin09t0:146_5: Tattha khaṇapaccuppannaṃ na sakkā voropetuṃ, santatipaccuppannaṃ vā addhāpaccuppannaṃ
tika-vin09t0:146_6: vā sakkā. Kathaṃ? Tasmiñhi upakkame kate laddhūpakkamaṃ jīvitadasakaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:146_7: dubbalassa parihīnavegassa paccayo hoti. Santatipaccuppannaṃ yathā dve tayo javanavāre
tika-vin09t0:146_8: javitvā nirujjhati, addhāpaccuppannañca tadanurūpaṃ katvā nirujjhati, tathā paccayo
tika-vin09t0:146_9: hoti. Tato santatipaccuppannaṃ vā addhāpaccuppannaṃ vā yathāparicchinnakālaṃ apatvā
tika-vin09t0:146_10: antarāva nirujjhati. Evaṃ tadubhayampi voropetuṃ sakkā. Tasmā paccuppannaṃ viyojeti.
tika-vin09t0:147_1: veditabbo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāyaviññattisahitāya cetanāya payujjatīti payogo, ko so?
tika-vin09t0:147_2: Sarīre satthādīnaṃ gamanaṃ paharaṇanti kāyavacīviññattisahitāya cetanāya parasarīre
tika-vin09t0:147_3: satthapātanaṃ. Dūre ṭhitanti dūre vā tiṭṭhatu, samīpe vā. Hatthato muttena pahāro
tika-vin09t0:147_4: nissaggiyo. Tatthāti nissaggiyappayoge. Yo koci maratūti ettha mahājanasamūhe na
tika-vin09t0:147_5: sakkā. Yassūpari saro patati, tasseva jīvitamaraṇaṃ kātuṃ, na yassa kassaci jīvitamaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:147_7: na sāvetī”ti vuttaṃ. Āṇattiniyāmakāti āṇattikappayogasādhikā. Etesu hi avirajjhitesu
tika-vin09t0:150: Duṭṭhacitto sace yāti, hoti so itthimārako.
tika-vin09t0:151: Bhikkhatthāya sace yāti, jānantopi na mārako;
tika-vin09t0:152: Anatthiko hi so tassā, maraṇena upekkhako.
tika-vin09t0:153: Viyogena ca me jāyā, jananī ca na jīvati;
tika-vin09t0:154: Iti jānaṃ viyuñjanto, tadatthiko hoti mārako.
tika-vin09t0:156: Anatthiko hi so tassā, maraṇena upekkhako.
tika-vin09t0:157_0: Hārakasaddassa bhedato atthaṃ vitthāretvā ubhayampi ekamevāti dassetuṃ “satthañca
tika-vin09t0:157_1: taṃ hārakañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Etena thāvarappayogaṃ dasseti sāhatthikādīsu payogesu.
tika-vin09t0:157_2: “Iti cittamano”ti uddharitvāpi itisaddassa attho na tāva vutto. Kiñcāpi na vutto,
tika-vin09t0:157_3: adhikāravasena pana āgataṃ itisaddaṃ yojetvā iti cittasaṅkappoti ettha “maraṇasaññī
tika-vin09t0:157_4: maraṇacetano maraṇādhippāyo”ti vuttattā maraṇaṃyeva vakkhatīti veditabbo. Vuttanayenāti
tika-vin09t0:157_6: uppannakāyaviññattiyā sāhatthikatā veditabbā. Āṇattike pana sattahipi cetanāhi saha
tika-vin09t0:157_7: vacīviññattisambhavato satta satta saddā ekato hutvā ekekakkharabhāvaṃ gantvā yattakehi
tika-vin09t0:157_8: akkharehi attano adhippāyaṃ viññāpenti, tadavasānakkharasamuṭṭhāpikāya sattamacetanāya
tika-vin09t0:160_0: Idheva saṅgahanti “iti jānāmi, iti passāmī”ti pade kathanti ce, “iti jānāmī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:160_1: Kevalaṃ “pāpicchatāyā”ti vacanato mandattā momūhattā samudācarantassa anāpattīti
tika-vin09t0:160_2: dīpitaṃ. “Atītakāle sotāpannomhī”ti vadanto pariyāyena vadati, “yo te vihāre vasati,
tika-vin09t0:160_3: so bhikkhu arahā”tiādīsu viya sikkhāpadepi “iti jānāmī”ti paccuppannameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:162_1: ca cattāro paṭhamapārājikaṃ āpannā evāti katvā kuto catuvīsatīti ce? Na, adhippāyājānanato.
tika-vin09t0:162_2: Mātughātakādayo hi cattāro idhānupasampannā eva adhippetā, lambīādayo cattāro kiñcāpi
tika-vin09t0:162_3: paṭhamapārājikena saṅgahitā, yasmā pana ekena pariyāyena methunadhammaṃ paṭisevino
tika-vin09t0:162_4: honti, tasmā visuṃ vuttā. Na labhati bhikkhūhīti ettha “uposathādibhedaṃ saṃvāsa”nti
tika-vin09t0:162_6: vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ “saṃvāso nāma ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatā”ti vuttaṃ. Tividhenāpi
tika-vin09t0:162_7: saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti paṭikkhittaṃ. “Na, bhikkhave, gahaṭṭhena nisinnaparisāya
tika-vin09t0:162_8: pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”ntiādi pātimokkhappavāraṇāsu eva āgataṃ, aññesu ca evarūpesu
tika-vin09t0:162_9: ṭhānesu sesaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ natthi paṭikkhepo. Ācariyāpi “sesaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:162_10: natthi āpattī”ti vadanti. “Antimavatthu ajjhāpannaṃ amūlakena pārājikena codentassa
tika-vin09t0:162_11: saṅghādiseso, saṅghādisesena codentassa pācittiyanti bhikkhuno viya vuttaṃ, na anupasampannassa
tika-vin09t0:162_12: viya dukkaṭaṃ. Tasmā tena sahaseyyā, tassa paṭiggahaṇañca bhikkhussa vaṭṭatīti ācariyā
tika-vin09t0:162_13: vadantī”ti likhitaṃ. “Yathā pure tathā pacchāti ‘ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatā’ti
tika-vin09t0:162_14: evaṃ vuttasaṃvāsassa abhabbatāmattaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:163_0: Idāni catunnampi sādhāraṇaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ – methunadhammaṃ paṭisevanto atthi koci pārājiko
tika-vin09t0:163_1: hoti asaṃvāso, atthi koci na pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso, atthi koci na pārājiko saṃvāso
tika-vin09t0:163_2: dukkaṭavatthusmiṃ vā thullaccayavatthusmiṃ vā paṭisevanto, atthi koci na pārājiko
tika-vin09t0:163_3: pakkhapaṇḍako apaṇḍakapakkhe upasampanno paṇḍakapakkhe methunadhammaṃ paṭisevanto.
tika-vin09t0:163_4: So āpattiṃ nāpajjatīti na pārājiko nāma. Na hi abhikkhussa āpatti nāma atthi. So
tika-vin09t0:163_5: anāpattikattā apaṇḍakapakkhe āgato kiṃ asaṃvāso hoti, na hotīti? Hoti. “Abhabbo tena
tika-vin09t0:163_6: sarīrabandhanenā”ti hi vuttaṃ. “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno…pe…
tika-vin09t0:163_7: asaṃvāso”ti vuttattā yo bhikkhubhāvena methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, so eva abhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:163_8: Nāyaṃ apārājikattāti ce? Na, “byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo”ti vuttaṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:163_9: yathā abhikkhunā kammavācāya sāvitāyapi kammaṃ ruhati kammavipattiyā asambhavato,
tika-vin09t0:163_10: evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ viseso – upasampannapubbo evaṃ ce kammavācaṃ
tika-vin09t0:163_11: sāveti, saṅgho ca tasmiṃ upasampannasaññī eva ce, kammaṃ ruhati, nāññathāti no khantīti ācariyo.
tika-vin09t0:164_0: Gahaṭṭho vā titthiyo vā paṇḍako vā kammavācaṃ sāveti, saṅghena kammavācā na vuttā
tika-vin09t0:164_1: hoti. “Saṅgho upasampādeyya saṅgho upasampādeti, upasampanno saṅghenā”ti hi vacanato
tika-vin09t0:164_3: vā ekena vuttāya saṅghena vuttā hotīti veditabbo, na gahaṭṭhatitthiyapaṇḍakādīsu
tika-vin09t0:165_0: Tathā atthi methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto koci nāsetabbo, “yo bhikkhunidūsako, ayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:165_1: nāsetabbo”ti vuttattā tena eva so anupasampannova sahaseyyāpattiṃ vā aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ
tika-vin09t0:165_2: janeti, tassa omasane ca dukkaṭaṃ hoti. Abhikkhuniyā methunadhammaṃ paṭisevanto na
tika-vin09t0:165_3: nāsetabbo, “antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo”ti
tika-vin09t0:165_4: pāḷiyā abhāvato, teneva so upasampannasaṅkhaṃ gacchati, sahaseyyāpattiādiṃ na janeti,
tika-vin09t0:165_5: kevalaṃ asaṃvāsoti katvā gaṇapūrako na hoti. Ekakammaekuddeso hi saṃvāsoti vutto,
tika-vin09t0:165_6: samasikkhatāpi saṃvāsoti katvā so tena saddhiṃ natthīti. Padasodhammāpattiṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:165_7: janetīti kāraṇacchāyā dissatīti. Yathā bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ekakammādino
tika-vin09t0:165_8: saṃvāsassa abhāvā bhikkhunī asaṃvāsā bhikkhussa, tathā bhikkhu ca bhikkhuniyā, padasodhammāpattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:165_9: pana na janeti. Tathā antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannopi ekecco “yo nāsetabboti vutto”ti
tika-vin09t0:165_10: iminā nidassanena sakāraṇacchāyā ajjhupekkhitā hotīti na gahaṇaṃ gacchati. Apica
tika-vin09t0:165_11: “ubho nāsetabbā, dūsako nāsetabbo”ti vacanato, “mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā”ti vacanato
tika-vin09t0:165_12: ca yo saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisitvā anuvijjakena anuvijjiyamāno parājito, sopi anupasampannova,
tika-vin09t0:166_0: Apicettha sikkhāpaccakkhātakacatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ. Atthi hi puggalo sikkhāpaccakkhātako
tika-vin09t0:166_1: na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno, atthi puggalo na sikkhāpaccakkhātako sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno,
tika-vin09t0:166_2: atthi puggalo sikkhāpaccakkhātako ceva sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno ca, atthi puggalo neva
tika-vin09t0:166_3: sikkhāpaccakkhātako na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno. Tattha tatiyo bhikkhunī sikkhāpaccakkhātakā
tika-vin09t0:166_4: veditabbā. Sā hi yāva na liṅgaṃ pariccajati, kāsāvesu saussāhāva samānā sāmaññā cavitukāmā
tika-vin09t0:166_5: sikkhaṃ paccakkhantīpi bhikkhunī eva sikkhāsājīvasamāpannāva. Vuttañhi bhagavatā
tika-vin09t0:166_6: “natthi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā sikkhāpaccakkhāna”nti. Kadā pana sā abhikkhunī hotīti?
tika-vin09t0:166_7: Yadā sā vibbhantāti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Vuttañhi bhagavatā “yadeva sā vibbhantā, tadeva
tika-vin09t0:166_8: sā abhikkhunī”ti. Kittāvatā pana vibbhantā hotīti? Sāmaññā cavitukāmā kāsāvesu anālayā
tika-vin09t0:166_9: kāsāvaṃ vā apaneti, naggā vā gacchati, tiṇapaṇṇādinā vā paṭicchādetvā gacchati, kāsāvaṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:166_10: vā gihinivāsanākārena nivāseti, odātaṃ vā vatthaṃ nivāseti, liṅgeneva vā saddhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:166_11: titthiyesu pavisitvā kesaluñcanādivataṃ samādiyati, titthiyaliṅgaṃ vā samādiyati,
tika-vin09t0:166_12: tadā vibbhantā nāma hoti. Tattha yā saliṅge ṭhitāva titthiyavataṃ samādiyati, sā
tika-vin09t0:166_13: titthiyapakkantabhikkhu viya pacchā pabbajjampi na labhati. Sesā pabbajjameva labhati,
tika-vin09t0:166_14: na upasampadaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ kiñcāpi “yā, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī sakāvāsā titthāyatanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:166_15: saṅkantā, sā āgatā na upasampādetabbā”ti vacanato yā paṭhamaṃ vibbhamitvā pacchā
tika-vin09t0:166_16: titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantā, sā āgatā upasampādetabbāti anuññātaṃ viya dissati. Saṅgītiācariyehi
tika-vin09t0:166_17: pana “catuvīsati pārājikānī”ti vuttattā na puna sā upasampādetabbā. Tasmā eva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:166_18: nānuññātaṃ bhagavatā. Antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannā pana bhikkhunī eva. Pakkhapaṇḍakīpi
tika-vin09t0:166_19: bhikkhunī eva. Imaṃ nayaṃ catūsupi yojetvā yathārahaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:170_0: Aññatra supinantāti svāyaṃ dubbalavatthukattā cetanāya paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asamatthā,
tika-vin09t0:170_1: supine upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittañhi dubbalaṃ. Pavatte pana aññehi kusalākusalehi upatthambhitā
tika-vin09t0:170_2: vipākaṃ deti. Kiñcāpi vipākaṃ deti, atha kho avisaye uppannattā abbohārikāva supinantacetanāti
tika-vin09t0:170_3: likhitaṃ. Yaṃ panettha “supine upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittañhi dubbala”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ anekantaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:170_4: na ca ārammaṇadubbalatāya cittappavatti dubbalā atītānāgatārammaṇāya, paññattārammaṇāya
tika-vin09t0:170_5: vā adubbalattā. Tasmā dubbalavatthukattāti dubbalahadayavatthukattāti no takkoti
tika-vin09t0:170_6: ācariyo. Avatthukatāya dubbalabhāvo yujjatīti ce? Na, avatthukāya bhāvanāpabhavāya
tika-vin09t0:170_7: atirekabalavasambhavato. Bhāvanābalasamappitañhi cittaṃ arūpampi samānaṃ atibhārampi
tika-vin09t0:170_8: karajakāyaṃ gahetvā ekacittakkhaṇeneva brahmalokampi pāpetvā ṭhapeti, tappaṭibhāgaṃ
tika-vin09t0:170_9: anappitampi kāmāvacaracittaṃ karajakāyaṃ ākāse laṅghanasamatthaṃ karoti. Kiṃ panettha
tika-vin09t0:170_10: taṃ anumānakaraṇaṃ? Yena cittasseva ānubhāvoti paññāyeyya cittānubhāvena ṭhapanalaṅghanādikiriyāvisesanibbattidassanato.
tika-vin09t0:170_11: Pakaticittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ viya asaṃsaṭṭhattā, nikkhamanattā ca vatthisīsaṃ, kaṭi,
tika-vin09t0:170_12: kāyoti tidhā sukkassa ṭhānaṃ pakappenti ācariyā. Sappavisaṃ viya taṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:170_13: na ca vise ṭhānaniyamo, kodhavasena passantassa hoti. Evamassa na ṭhānaniyamo, rāgavasena
tika-vin09t0:171_0: “Dakasotaṃ anotiṇṇepī”ti idaṃ “otiṇṇamatte”ti iminā virujjhatīti ce, taṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:171_1: “ṭhānato pana cuta”ntiādimāha. Tassattho – nimitte upakkamaṃ katvā sukkaṃ ṭhānā cāvetvā
tika-vin09t0:171_2: puna vippaṭisāravasena dakasotorohaṇaṃ nivāretuṃ na sakkā, tathāpi adhivāsādhippāyena
tika-vin09t0:171_3: adhivāsetvā antarā dakasotato uddhaṃ nivāretuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya “bahi nikkhante vā”ti
tika-vin09t0:171_4: vuttaṃ, tasmā ṭhānā cutañhi avassaṃ dakasotaṃ otaratīti aṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo. Tasmā
tika-vin09t0:172_0: Etthāha – kasmā imasmiṃ sikkhāpade “yo pana bhikkhū”tiādinā kārako na niddiṭṭhoti?
tika-vin09t0:172_1: Vuccate – adhippāyāpekkhāya bhāvato kārako na niddiṭṭho tassa sāpekkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:172_3: methunarāgavasena ūruādīsu dukkaṭavatthūsu, vaṇādīsu thullaccayavatthūsu ca upakkamantassa
tika-vin09t0:172_4: sukkavisaṭṭhiyā satipi na saṅghādiseso “anāpatti bhikkhu na mocanādhippāyassā”ti
tika-vin09t0:172_5: vacanato. Tasmā tadatthadassanatthaṃ idha kārako na niddiṭṭho. Aññathā “yo pana bhikkhu
tika-vin09t0:172_6: sañcetanikaṃ sukkavisaṭṭhiṃ āpajjeyya, saṅghādiseso”ti niddiṭṭhe kārake “ceteti na
tika-vin09t0:172_7: upakkamati muccati, anāpattī”ti vuttavacanavirodho. Tathā “sañcetanikāya sukkavisaṭṭhiyā
tika-vin09t0:172_8: aññatra supinantā saṅghādiseso”ti bhumme niddiṭṭhepi so eva virodho hetvatthaniyamasiddhito.
tika-vin09t0:172_9: Tasmā tadubhayampi vacanakkamaṃ avatvā “sañcetanikā sukkavisaṭṭhi aññatra supinantā
tika-vin09t0:172_10: saṅghādiseso”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha nimittatthe bhummavacanābhāvato hetvatthaniyamo na
tika-vin09t0:172_11: kato hoti. Tasmiṃ akate sañcetanikā sukkavisaṭṭhi aññatra supinantā saṅghādisesoti,
tika-vin09t0:172_12: upakkame asati anāpattīti ayamattho dīpito hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:173_0: Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade dve āpattisahassāni honti. Kathaṃ? Attano hatthādibhede ajjhattarūpe
tika-vin09t0:173_1: rāgūpatthambhanavasena aṅgajāte kammaniyappatte ārogyatthāya nīlaṃ mocentassa ekā
tika-vin09t0:173_2: āpatti, ajjhattarūpe eva rāgūpatthambhe pītakādīnaṃ mocanavasena navāti dasa. Evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:173_5: sabbaṃ pañcasataṃ. Yathā ajjhattarūpe pañcasataṃ, evaṃ bahiddhārūpe vā ajjhattabahiddhārūpe
tika-vin09t0:173_6: vā ākāse vā kaṭiṃ kampentoti dve sahassāni āpattiyo hontīti.
tika-vin09t0:176_1: adhivacana”nti vuttaṃ. “Vipariṇatena…pe… saddhi”nti imināssa vāyāmo dassito. “Saddhi”nti
tika-vin09t0:176_2: hi padaṃ saṃyogaṃ dīpeti, so ca saṃyogo samāgamo. Kena cittena? Vipariṇatena cittena,
tika-vin09t0:176_4: vāyamato phassappaṭivijānanā dassitā hoti. Vāyamitvā phassaṃ paṭivijānanto hi samāpajjati
tika-vin09t0:176_5: nāma. Evamassa tivaṅgasampatti dassitā hoti. Atha vā otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena
tika-vin09t0:176_6: yakkhādinā satto viya. Upayogatthe vā etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, otiṇṇo vipariṇataṃ cittaṃ
tika-vin09t0:176_7: kūpādiṃ viya satto. Atha vā “rāgato uttiṇṇo bhavissāmī”ti bhikkhubhāvaṃ upagatopi
tika-vin09t0:176_8: yo pana bhikkhu tato uttiṇṇādhippāyato vipariṇatena cittena hetubhūtena tameva rāgaṃ
tika-vin09t0:176_9: otiṇṇo. Mātugāmena attano samīpaṃ vā āgatena, attanā upagatena vā. Etena mātugāmassa
tika-vin09t0:176_10: sārattatā vā hotu, virattatā vā, sā idha appamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:177_0: Hatthaggāhaṃ vāti ettha hatthena sabbopi upādinnako kāyo saṅgahito, na bhinnasantāno
tika-vin09t0:177_1: tappaṭibaddho vatthālaṅkārādi. Veṇiggahaṇena anupādinnako abhinnasantāno kesalomanakhaggadantaggādiko
tika-vin09t0:177_2: kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhāno gahitoti veditabbaṃ. Tenevāha “antamaso lomena lomaṃ phusantassāpī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:177_3: Tena aññatarassa vā…pe… parāmasananti ettha anupādinnakānampi sesalomādīnaṃ aṅgabhāvo
tika-vin09t0:177_4: veditabbo. Evaṃ sante “phassaṃ paṭijānantassa saṅghādiseso”ti iminā virujjhatīti
tika-vin09t0:177_5: ce? Na, tadatthajānanato. Phuṭṭhabhāvaṃ paṭivijānantopi phassaṃ paṭijānāti nāma,
tika-vin09t0:177_6: na kāyaviññāṇuppattiyā eva. Anekantikañhettha kāyaviññāṇaṃ. Tasmā eva idha phassappaṭivijānanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:177_7: aṅgantveva na vuttaṃ. Tasmiñhi vutte ṭhānametaṃ vijjati “na ca me lomaghaṭṭanena
tika-vin09t0:177_8: kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ, tasmiṃ ‘na phassaṃ paṭijānāmī’ti anāpannasaññī siyā”ti. “Veṇī
tika-vin09t0:177_9: nāma kahāpaṇamālādisampayuttaṃ, tattha ‘veṇiṃ gaṇhissāmī’ti kahāpaṇamālādiṃ eva gaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:177_10: na lomaṃ, natthi saṅghādiseso”ti vadanti. Vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:180_0: “Kadā te mātā pasīdissatī”ti āyācanaṃ duṭṭhullavācāya sikhāpattalakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:180_2: vacanaṃ pana purisanimittena asaṅghādisesavatthunā missavacanaṃ, purisaubhatobyañjanakassa
tika-vin09t0:180_3: ca itthinimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ, itaraṃ pākaṭaṃ. Yadi tampi janeti, kathaṃ ‘animittāsī’tiādīni
tika-vin09t0:180_4: padāni na saṅghādisesaṃ janentī”ti eke, taṃ na yuttaṃ purisassāpi nimittādhivacanattā.
tika-vin09t0:180_5: “Methunupasaṃhitāhi saṅghādiseso”ti mātikāyaṃ lakkhaṇassa vuttattā ca methunupasaṃhitāhi
tika-vin09t0:180_6: obhāsane paṭivijānantiyā saṅghādiseso, appaṭivijānantiyā thullaccayaṃ, itarehi obhāsane
tika-vin09t0:180_7: paṭivijānantiyā thullaccayaṃ, appaṭivijānantiyā dukkaṭanti eke, vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:180_9: avatvā “dvivedana”nti vuttanti? Rāgavasena ayaṃ āpatti, na paṭighavasena. Tasmā rāgavaseneva
tika-vin09t0:180_10: pavatto akkoso idha adhippeto. Tasmā “dvivedana”nti vacanaṃ suvuttameva.
tika-vin09t0:183_1: attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇabhaṇane dukkaṭaṃ, “yo te vihāre vasati, tassa aggadānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:183_2: methunaṃ dhammaṃ dehī”ti pariyāyavacanepi dukkaṭaṃ, “attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:183_3: bhāseyya, yā mādisaṃ sīlavanta”nti ca vuttattāti eke. Pañcasu aṅgesu sabbhāvā saṅghādisesovāti
tika-vin09t0:183_4: eke, vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ. “Imasmiṃ sikkhāpadadvaye kāyasaṃsagge viya yakkhipetīsupi
tika-vin09t0:183_5: duṭṭhullattakaāmavacane thullaccayanti vadanti. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana nāgata”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:186_0: Alaṃvacanīyāti na vacanīyā, nivāraṇe alaṃ-saddo, na alaṃvacanīyā nālaṃvacanīyā. “Paṭiggaṇhāti
tika-vin09t0:186_1: vīmaṃsati paccāharati, āpatti saṅghādisesassā”ti vuttattā yassa ekantena saṅghādiseso
tika-vin09t0:186_2: hoti, tassa paṭiggaṇhanavīmaṃsanapayogā ete dukkaṭathullaccayā natthīti vadantīti
tika-vin09t0:186_3: likhitaṃ. Kiñcāpi ettha “itthī nāma manussitthī, na yakkhī na petī na tiracchānagatā.
tika-vin09t0:186_4: Puriso nāma manussapuriso, na yakkho na peto na tiracchānagato”ti pāḷi natthi, tathāpi
tika-vin09t0:186_5: kāyasaṃsaggādīsu “mātugāmo nāma manussitthī”ti itthivavatthānassa katattā idhāpi
tika-vin09t0:186_6: manussitthī evāti paññāyati. Methunapubbabhāgasāmaññato itthivavatthānena purisavavatthānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:186_7: katameva hoti. Tenevāha “yesu sañcarittaṃ samāpajjati, tesaṃ manussajātikatā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:186_8: Kāyasaṃsaggādīsu ca paṇḍakayakkhipetiyo thullaccayavatthukāva vuttā, tathā idhāpi,
tika-vin09t0:186_9: paṇḍakasabhāvattā manussaubhatobyañjanako ca thullaccayavatthukova hoti. Sesā manussapurisaamanussapaṇḍakaubhatobyañjanakatiracchānagatapurisādayo
tika-vin09t0:189_0: Kiṃ bhanteti ettakepi vutte. Pucchito yadatthāya paviṭṭho, taṃ kathetuṃ labhati pucchitapaññattā
tika-vin09t0:189_1: bhikkhācāravatteti likhitaṃ. Hatthakammaṃ yācito “upakaraṇaṃ, mūlaṃ vā dassatī”ti
tika-vin09t0:189_2: yācati, vaṭṭati, na vaṭṭatīti? Vaṭṭati senāsane obhāsaparikathādīnaṃ laddhattāti
tika-vin09t0:189_3: eke. Tihatthā vāti ettha vaḍḍhakihatthena tihatthā. “Pamāṇayutto mañcoti pakatividatthiyā
tika-vin09t0:189_4: navavidatthippamāṇamañco, so tattha ito ca na sañcarati, tasmā catuhatthavitthārā
tika-vin09t0:189_5: na hotī”tiādi likhitaṃ. Akuṭiyā pana vatthudesanākiccaṃ natthi ullittāvalittaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin09t0:189_7: ce? Yasmā mattikāmayabhittiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā upari ullittaṃ vā avalittaṃ vā ubhayaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:189_8: bhittiyā ghaṭitaṃ karontassa āpatti eva vināpi bhittilepenā”ti likhitaṃ. Evamettha
tika-vin09t0:189_9: thambhatulāpiṭṭhasaṅghāṭādi niratthakaṃ siyā. Tasmā vicāretvāva gahetabbaṃ. “Uposathāgārampi
tika-vin09t0:189_10: bhavissati, ahampi vasissāmī”ti vā “bhikkhūhi vā sāmaṇerehi vā ekato vasissāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:189_11: vā karontassa vaṭṭati eva. Kasmā? “Attuddesa”nti vuttattāti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:190_0: Idaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ catutthapārājikaṃ viya nidānāpekkhaṃ. Na hi vaggumudātīriyā
tika-vin09t0:190_1: bhikkhū sayameva attano asantaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ musāvādalakkhaṇaṃ pāpetvā bhāsiṃsu.
tika-vin09t0:190_2: Aññamaññañhi te uttarimanussadhammavaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu. Na ca tāvatā pārājikavatthu hoti,
tika-vin09t0:190_3: tattakena pana lesena bhagavā taṃ vatthuṃ nidānaṃ katvā pārājikaṃ paññapesi, tathā
tika-vin09t0:190_4: idhāpi. Na hi nidāne “adesitavatthukāyo sārambhāyo aparikkamanāyo”ti vuttaṃ. “Appamāṇikāyo”ti
tika-vin09t0:190_5: pana vuttattā pamāṇamatikkamantassa saṅghādisesova nidānāpekkho. Tattha sārambhe
tika-vin09t0:190_6: aparikkamane saṅghādisesappasaṅgaṃ viya dissamānaṃ “vibhaṅgo taṃniyamako”ti vuttattā
tika-vin09t0:191_0: Etthāha – kimatthaṃ mātikāyaṃ dukkaṭavatthu vuttaṃ, nanu vibhaṅge eva vattabbaṃ siyāti?
tika-vin09t0:191_1: Evametaṃ. Kiṃ nu bhikkhū abhinetabbā vatthudesanāya, tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu desetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:191_2: kīdisaṃ? Anārambhaṃ saparikkamananti. Itarañhi “sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane”ti
tika-vin09t0:191_3: evaṃ anuppasaṅgavasena āgatattā vuttaṃ. Yasmā vatthu nāma atthi sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:191_4: atthi anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, atthi sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ, atthi anārambhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:191_5: aparikkamananti bahuvidhaṃ, tasmā bahuvidhattā vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:191_6: netaranti vuttaṃ hoti. Kimatthikā panettha vatthudesanāti ce? Garukāpattipaññāpanahetuparivajjanupāyattā.
tika-vin09t0:191_8: attadukkhaparadukkhahetubhūto ca sārambhabhāvoti ete vatthudesanāpadesena upāyena
tika-vin09t0:191_9: parivajjitā honti. Na hi bhikkhū akappiyakuṭikaraṇatthaṃ gihīnaṃ vā pīḷānimittaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:191_10: sārambhavatthukuṭikaraṇatthaṃ vā vatthuṃ desentīti. Honti cettha –
tika-vin09t0:195: Vajjitā honti yaṃ tasmā, sārambhādi jahāpita”nti.
tika-vin09t0:198_0: Kiriyāmattato samuṭṭhānabhāvato akiriyamevetaṃ. Taṃ desanāakaraṇavasena. Bhikkhū
tika-vin09t0:198_1: vā anabhineyyāti ettha vā-saddo avadhāraṇatthoti veditabbo. “Āyasmā channo cetiyarukkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:201_0: “Kasmā mama vandanādīni…pe… ‘ghaṭiteyeva sīsaṃ etī’ti vuttattā antimavatthuajjhāpannakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:201_1: vandituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Parivārāvasāne upālipañcake “kati
tika-vin09t0:201_2: nu kho, bhante, avandiyā”tiādinā vuttapāḷiyaṃ avuttattā, “pacchā upasampannena pure
tika-vin09t0:201_3: upasampanno vandiyo”ti vuttattā ca, tasmā eva imissaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “upasampannoti
tika-vin09t0:201_4: saṅkhyupagamana”nti vuttaṃ. Suttādhippāyo pana evaṃ gahetabbo – avandanto sāmīcippaṭikkhepasaṅkhātāya
tika-vin09t0:201_5: codanāya codeti nāmāti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti. Tasmā eva “ettāvatā ca codanā nāma
tika-vin09t0:201_6: hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Idha adhippetaṃ āpattiāpajjanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “‘kasmā mama vandanādīni
tika-vin09t0:202_0: Katūpasampadanti yassa upasampadā ruhati, taṃ, paṇḍakādayo. Ṭhapanakkhettanti ettha
tika-vin09t0:202_1: sabbasaṅgāhikaṃ, puggalikañcāti duvidhaṃ pavāraṇāṭhapanaṃ. Tattha sabbasaṅgāhike
tika-vin09t0:202_2: “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho…pe… tevācikaṃ pavāre”ti su-kārato yāva re-kāro. Puggalikaṭhapane
tika-vin09t0:202_3: pana “saṅghaṃ, bhante, pavāremi…pe… passanto paṭī”ti saṃ-kārato yāva ayaṃ sabbapacchimo
tika-vin09t0:202_4: ṭi-kāro, etthantare ekapadepi ṭhapentena ṭhapitā hoti. Uposathe pana iminānusārena
tika-vin09t0:205_0: Aññabhāgo vā assa atthīti yathā suvaṇṇassedaṃ sovaṇṇamityatra suvaṇṇavā anena suvaṇṇo
tika-vin09t0:205_1: ityuccate. Taṃ paṭimāya sarīraṃ, silāputtakassa sarīranti ca nidassanaṃ. Chagalakassa
tika-vin09t0:205_2: “dabbo”ti dinnaṃ nāmaṃ “deso”ti vuccati. Kasmā? Theraṃ anuddhaṃsetuṃ therassāpi apadisitabbattā.
tika-vin09t0:205_3: Aññampi vatthuṃ na theraṃyeva. Lissati silissati vohāramattenevana atthato. Īsakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:205_4: allīyatīti lesoti adhippāyo. Lisaselachakolaallībhāve. Tena vuttaṃ “īsakaṃ allīyatīti
tika-vin09t0:205_5: leso”ti. Yasmā desalesā atthato ninnānākaraṇaṃ, tasmā “kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:205_6: padaṃ uddharitvā “dasa lesā jātileso”tiādi padabhājane vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:206_0: Aṭṭhuppattivaseneva āvibhūtanti ettha kiñca bhiyyo aniyamattā. Na hi mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:206_1: viya aññesaṃ sabbesampi “chagalakamevettha aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti, aññaṃ gomahiṃsādikampi
tika-vin09t0:206_2: hoti, na ca mettiyabhūmajakā viya sabbepi nāmalesamattameva upādiyanti, aññampi jātilesādiṃ
tika-vin09t0:206_3: upādiyanti, tasmā aniyamattā na vibhattaṃ. Kiñca bhiyyo tathāvutte chagalakasseva
tika-vin09t0:206_4: aññabhāgiyatā sambhavati, na aññassa, yena sova dassito. Leso ca nāma lesova, na
tika-vin09t0:206_5: jātiādi, yena sova dassitoti evaṃ micchāgāhappasaṅgatoti veditabbaṃ. Idha ca…pe…
tika-vin09t0:206_6: saññinopīti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade ca amūlakasikkhāpade cāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:211: Tiṇṇaṃ uddhaṃ kammārahā…pe… karotīti ettha “ime cattāro”ti vā “imañca imañcā”ti vā vatvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:214: Dukkhena vattabbo dubbaco. Vuccamāno na sahati.
tika-vin09t0:217_1: kiriyā bhikkhūnaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti jānitvā sace chādeti, channāva hotīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:218_0: Vatthu ceva gottañcāti ettha vatthūti vītikkamanaṃ asucimuccanaṃ. Gottanti gaṃ tāyatīti
tika-vin09t0:218_1: gottaṃ, sajātito aññattha gantuṃ adatvā gaṃ buddhiṃ, vacanañca tāyatīti attho. Vatthu
tika-vin09t0:218_2: ca sajātimeva gacchati. Sajāti nāmettha aññehi visiṭṭhāvisiṭṭhabhūtā kiriyā, na kāyasaṃsaggādi.
tika-vin09t0:218_3: Nāmañceva āpatti cāti ettha āpattīti vītikkamenāpannāpattiyā nāmaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:219_0: Puna āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocentenāti ettha dvinnaṃ ārocentena “āyasmantā dhārentu”tiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:219_1: vā atirekānaṃ vā ārocentena “āyasmanto dhārentū”ti evaṃ ārocanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:219_2: Vattabhedañca ratticchedañca akatvāti ettha ṭhapetvā navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ avasesānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:219_4: ovadane, kammikānaṃ garahaṇe cātiādīsu vattabhedo hoti. Dassanasavanavisayesu anārocane
tika-vin09t0:219_5: ca bhikkhūhi ekacchanne vasane ca ajānantasseva vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ āgantvā gamane
tika-vin09t0:219_6: cātiādīsu ratticchedo hoti. Nānāsaṃvāsakehi vinayakammābhāvato tesaṃ anārocane ratticchedo
tika-vin09t0:219_7: na hoti. “Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā”ti vacanato anto na vaṭṭati. Nikkhittavatteneva
tika-vin09t0:219_8: hutvā vicarantena yassa santike pubbe samādiyitvā ārocitaṃ, tassāpi santike pacchā
tika-vin09t0:219_9: nikkhipanakāle ārocetvāva nikkhipitabbaṃ. Tasmā puna samādānakālepi so ce tato gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:219_10: taṃ divasaṃ agantvā divā ārocetvāpi yadi evaṃ atītadivasaṃ hoti, “aruṇe uṭṭhite tassa
tika-vin09t0:219_11: santike ārocetvā vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vihāraṃ gantabbanti tassa santike ārocetvā vattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:219_12: nikkhipitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Apica “vihāraṃ gantvā yaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati,
tika-vin09t0:219_13: tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Sace ratticchedo hoti, vihārasīmāpariyāpannānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:219_14: sabbesaṃ ārocetabbaṃ siyā. “Tassa ārocetvā”ti idaṃ pana pubbe anārocitaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin09t0:219_15: vattabhedarakkhaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā eva samantapāsādikāyaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ “aññaṃ vihārato
tika-vin09t0:220_0: Suddhantaparivāse pana sace “māsamattaṃ asuddhomhī”ti aggahesi, parivasanto puna
tika-vin09t0:220_1: ūnaṃ vā adhikaṃ vā sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti, tattakampi parivasitabbameva, parivāsadānakiccaṃ
tika-vin09t0:220_2: natthi. Ayañhi suddhantaparivāso nāma uddhampi ārohati, heṭṭhāpi orohati. Idamassa lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:221_0: Samodahitvāti mūlāpattiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā, pakkhipitvāti attho. Appaṭicchannā ce antarāpatti,
tika-vin09t0:221_1: mūlāya paṭikassanaṃ akatvā pubbe gahitaparivāseneva parivasitabbaṃ. Yo pana āpattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:221_2: āpajjitvā vibbhamitvā puna upasampanno hutvāpi paṭicchādeti, yo ca pubbe paṭicchādetvā
tika-vin09t0:221_3: pacchā na paṭicchādeti, yo ca ubhayattha paṭicchādeti, sabbesaṃ paṭicchannadivasavasena
tika-vin09t0:221_4: parivāso dātabbo. “Purimasmiṃ āpattikkhandhe vā”ti ca “pacchimasmiṃ āpattikkhandhe
tika-vin09t0:221_5: vā”ti ca pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā dve bhikkhū visuddhikaṃ āpannā honti, te suddhikadiṭṭhino
tika-vin09t0:221_6: honti. Eko chādeti, eko na chādeti. Yo chādeti, so dukkaṭaṃ desāpetabbo. “Ubhopi
tika-vin09t0:221_7: yathādhammaṃ kārāpetabbā”ti vacanato yaṃ kañci āpattiṃ chādetvā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:222_0: Tesu gatesu vā agatesu vā purimanayeneva paṭipajjitabbanti ettha ūne gaṇe caraṇaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:222_1: anuṭṭhahanaṃ ekarattampi gaṇena vippavāsaṃ, sace rattiyā ekakkhaṇena saṅgho vasati,
tika-vin09t0:222_2: sace so pure aruṇameva kenaci karaṇīyena gatoti etthapi mānattepi evaṃ jāte. “Ayañca
tika-vin09t0:222_3: yasmā gaṇassa ārocetvā, bhikkhūnañca atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāva vasi, tenassa ūne
tika-vin09t0:222_4: gaṇe caraṇadoso vā vippavāso vā na hotī”ti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā tena
tika-vin09t0:222_5: ārocite muhuttampi nisīditvā gatepi vippavāso natthi. Pārivāsikassa, ukkhittakassa
tika-vin09t0:222_6: ca pakatattena tasmiṃ vasanaṃ udakapātena vāritaṃ, tasmā nānūpacārepi ekacchanne na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:223_0: Idāni pāṭhavicāraṇā veditabbā – “nava paṭhamāpattikā cattāro yāvatatiyakā”ti idaṃ
tika-vin09t0:223_1: sabhāvaniyamavacanaṃ. Tena vuṭṭhānaṃ aniyamanti dasseti. Ekaccāpattivuṭṭhānañhi kammatopi
tika-vin09t0:223_2: hoti akammatopi, na evaṃ āpajjananti vuttaṃ hoti. Aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vāti tesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:223_3: dvidhā bhinnānampi vuṭṭhānakkamabhedābhāvadīpakavacanaṃ. Yāvatīhaṃ, tāvatīhanti ettha
tika-vin09t0:223_4: ahaparicchedo aruṇavasena. “Jāna”nti iminā jānanappaṭicchannassa akāmā parivatthabbanti
tika-vin09t0:223_5: dasseti. Tena bhikkhunā akāmā parivatthabbanti tena bhikkhunā vasatā akāmā parivatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:223_6: na parivattitaliṅgenāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Parivutthaparivāsenāti ādimhi parivutthaparivāseneva
tika-vin09t0:223_7: parivāsato uttari itivārena ādito bhikkhunāva chārattaṃ, parivattitaliṅgena uddhampi
tika-vin09t0:223_8: bhikkhumānattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ, na parivāse viya tappaccayā aciṇṇamānatto. Ciṇṇamānattova
tika-vin09t0:223_9: abbhetabbo, na itaro, na parivāse viya mānattārahe, pakkhamānattañca carantiyā bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin09t0:223_10: liṅgaṃ parivattātikkame sati ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu hoti, puna bhikkhumānattaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin09t0:224_0: Yattha siyāti yassaṃ samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyampi vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho atthi. Ekenapi
tika-vin09t0:224_1: ce ūno vīsatigaṇoti na yujjati, ūno ce. Na hi vīsatigaṇo, saṅgho ce ūno. Tasmā “ekenapi
tika-vin09t0:224_2: ce ūno saṅgho”ti ettakameva vattabbanti ce? Na, catuvaggapañcavaggadasavaggappasaṅganivāraṇappayojanato.
tika-vin09t0:224_3: Tasmā vīsativaggo bhikkhusaṅgho ce bhikkhunā ekenapi ūno, naṭṭho daṭṭhabbo. Keci
tika-vin09t0:224_4: pana vinaye appakataññuno “yathā atirekacatuvaggopi saṅgho catuvaggakaraṇīye kamme
tika-vin09t0:224_7: maññeyyuṃ, tesaṃ maññanānivāraṇatthaṃ “ekenapi ce ūno”tiādi vuttaṃ. Atha vā vīsati
tika-vin09t0:224_8: bhikkhusaṅgho ce, ṭhapetvā ekenapi ce ūno appakatatto, taṃ ṭhapetvā ekenapi ceti
tika-vin09t0:224_9: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṃ tattha sāmīcīti vacanaṃ yaṃ vuttaṃ sabbattha “tassa
tika-vin09t0:224_10: āpattiyā parivāsaṃ deti, mūlāya paṭikassati, mānattaṃ deti, abbhetī”ti, tassa āvibhāvakaraṇatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:224_11: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tena tesu ayaṃ yathāvuttā sāmīci niyatā icchitabbā, na rājasikkhāpadādīsu
tika-vin09t0:224_12: viya aniyatā. Tattha hi kenaci antarāyena taṃ sāmīcimakarontepi anāpattīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:228_0: Aniyate āditova idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – idaṃ aniyatakaṇḍaṃ nippayojanaṃ tattha
tika-vin09t0:228_2: Ettha hi “sā ce evaṃ vadeyya ‘ayyo mayā…pe… so ca taṃ paṭijānāti, āpattiyā kāretabbo”’tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:228_3: āpattiyā garukāya, lahukāya ca āropanakkamalakkhaṇaṃ, “na kāretabbo”ti iminā anāropanakkamalakkhaṇañca
tika-vin09t0:228_4: dassitaṃ. Lakkhaṇadīpanato ādimhi, ante vā uddisitabbanti ce? Na, asambhavato. Kathaṃ
tika-vin09t0:228_5: na tāva ādimhi sambhavati, yesamidaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ, tesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ adassitattā.
tika-vin09t0:228_6: Na ante garukamissakattā. Tasmā garukalahukānaṃ majjhe eva uddisitabbataṃ arahati
tika-vin09t0:228_7: ubhayamissakattā. Yā tattha pācittiyasaṅkhātā lahukāpatti dassitā, sāpi garukāti
tika-vin09t0:228_9: garukānaṃ eva anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhantipi eke. Evaṃ sati paṭhamāniyatamevālaṃ tāvatā
tika-vin09t0:228_11: “Paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye”ti okāsaniyamato hi tabbiparīte okāse idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:228_12: na vikappitanti micchāgāho hoti. Taṃnivāraṇato dutiyāniyatampi sātthakamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:228_14: ca rahonisajjassādabhedo jāto. Dvinnaṃ rahonisajjasikkhāpadānaṃ nānāttajānanañca
tika-vin09t0:228_15: siyā tathā kāyasaṃsaggabhedadīpanato. Nālaṃ kammaniyepi hi okāse appaṭicchanne, paṭicchannepi
tika-vin09t0:228_16: vā nisinnāya vātapānakavāṭacchiddādīhi nikkhantakesādiggahaṇena kāyasaṃsaggo labbhatīti
tika-vin09t0:229_1: Paṭicchannampi hi ekaccaṃ nālaṃkammaniyaṃ vātapānādinā antaritattā, ubhayappaṭicchannampi
tika-vin09t0:229_2: ekaccaṃ nālaṃkammaniyaṃ vijānataṃ ajjhokāsattā. Rahobhedadīpanatoti ettha rahabhāvasāmaññepi
tika-vin09t0:229_4: methunassādavasena nisajjā, duṭṭhullassādavasena nisajjāti tādisassa bhedassa dīpanatoti
tika-vin09t0:229_5: attho. “Idha āgatanayattā bhikkhunipātimokkhe idaṃ kaṇḍaṃ parihīnanti veditabba”nti
tika-vin09t0:229_6: vadanti. “Aṭṭhuppattiyā tattha anuppannattā”ti eke, taṃ anekantabhāvadīpanato ayuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:229_7: Sabbabuddhakāle hi bhikkhūnaṃ pañca, bhikkhunīnaṃ cattāro ca uddesā santi. Pātimokkhuddesapaññattiyā
tika-vin09t0:229_8: asādhāraṇattā tattha niddiṭṭhasaṅghādisesapācittiyānanti eke. Tāsañhi bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:229_10: vā sādiyeyya, kāyaṃ vā tadatthāya upasaṃhareyyā”ti vacanato sādiyanampi, “santiṭṭheyya
tika-vin09t0:229_11: vā”ti vacanato ṭhānampi, “saṅketaṃ vā gaccheyyā”ti vacanato gamanampi, “channaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:229_12: anupaviseyyā”ti vacanato paṭicchannaṭṭhānappavesopi hoti, tathā “rattandhakāre appadīpe,
tika-vin09t0:229_13: paṭicchanne okāse ajjhokāse ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā”ti vacanato duṭṭhullavācāpi
tika-vin09t0:229_14: pācittiyavatthukanti katvā tāsaṃ aññathā aniyatakaṇḍassa avattabbatāpattito na vuttanti
tika-vin09t0:230_0: “Desanāvuṭṭhānagāminīnaṃ āpattīnaṃ vasena alajjiādayo lajjīnaṃ codessantī”ti āgatattā
tika-vin09t0:230_1: lajjipaggahatthāya patirūpāyapi upāsikāya vacanena akatvā bhikkhusseva paṭiññāya
tika-vin09t0:230_2: kātabbanti āpattiyo pana lakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ paññattaṃ vitthāranayameva gahetvā
tika-vin09t0:230_3: vattuṃ yuttaṃ “ime kho panāyasmanto dve aniyatā dhammā”ti uddesadassanattāti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:230_4: Sotassa rahoti ettha rahoti vacanasāmaññato vuttaṃ. Duṭṭhullasāmaññato duṭṭhullārocanappaṭicchādanasikkhāpadesu
tika-vin09t0:230_5: pārājikavacanaṃ viya. Tasmā “cakkhusseva pana raho ‘raho’ti idha adhippeto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:230_6: Kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce? “Mātugāmo nāma…pe… antamaso tadahujātāpi dārikā”ti vuttattā
tika-vin09t0:230_7: duṭṭhullobhāsanaṃ idha nādhippetanti dīpitamevāti. Antodvādasahatthepīti pi-saddena
tika-vin09t0:230_8: apihitakavāṭassa gabbhassa dvāre nisinnopīti attho. Acelakavagge rahopaṭicchannāsanasikkhāpade
tika-vin09t0:230_9: “yo koci viññū puriso dutiyo hotī”ti imassa anurūpato “itthīnaṃ pana satampi anāpattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:230_10: na karotiyevā”ti vuttaṃ. “Alaṃkammaniyeti sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti
tika-vin09t0:230_11: vibhaṅge vacanato rahonisajjassādo cettha methunadhammasannissitakileso, na dutiye
tika-vin09t0:230_12: viya duṭṭhullavācassādakileso. Tasmā ca paññāyati sotassa raho nādhippetoti.
tika-vin09t0:231_0: Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena vadeyyāti rahonisajjasikkhāpadavasena nisinnassa tassānusārena
tika-vin09t0:231_1: pācittiyameva avatvā pārājikasaṅghādisesāyapi āpattiyā bhedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:231_2: Puna āpattippaṭijānanaṃ avatvā kasmā “nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamāno”ti vatthuppaṭijānanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:231_3: vuttanti? Vuccate – āpattiyā codite vinayadharena “kismiṃ vatthusmi”nti pucchite
tika-vin09t0:231_4: cuditakena “imasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti vutte vinayadharena “īdisaṃ nāma akāsī”ti pucchite
tika-vin09t0:231_5: so vatthuṃ paṭijānamānova kāretabboti dassanatthaṃ “nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamāno”ti
tika-vin09t0:231_6: vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānopi āpattiyāva kāretabboti? Anurūpameva. Evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:231_7: pana gahetabbaṃ – tiṇṇampi āpattīnaṃ vatthūni aggahetvā idha sikkhāpadavasena nisajjameva
tika-vin09t0:231_8: vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ gahitepi hi āpatti gahitāva hotīti. Yena vā sāti ettha vā-saddo “tena
tika-vin09t0:231_9: so bhikkhu kāretabbo vā”ti yojetabbo. So ca vikappattho. Tasmā “kāretabbo vā paṭijānamāno,
tika-vin09t0:231_10: na vā kāretabbo appaṭijānamāno”ti attho. Tena vuttaṃ “paṭijānamāno vā”tiādi. Rahonisajjasikkhāpadavasena
tika-vin09t0:231_11: nisajjapaccayā āpattiyā vuttattā sesesupi sesasikkhāpadavasena āpatti gahetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:231_12: “Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisānevā”ti vuttattā idha duṭṭhullobhāsanassa anadhippetabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:234_0: Saṅghādisesena vāti kāyasaṃsaggaduṭṭhullobhāsanena. Tasmā evaṃ kāyasaṃsaggavāro pāḷiyampi
tika-vin09t0:234_1: vutto. Anandho abadhiroti anandho kāyasaṃsaggaṃ passati, abadhiro duṭṭhullaṃ suṇāti,
tika-vin09t0:234_2: tasmā eva adinnādānasadisānevāti vutta”nti likhitaṃ. Ettha ca kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:234_3: kathanti ce? Kāyasaṃsaggañhi samāpajjanto duṭṭhullampi bhaṇati, duṭṭhullaṃ bhaṇanto
tika-vin09t0:234_4: nisīdati cāti sambhavati, duṭṭhullameva vā sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tañhi adinnādānasamuṭṭhānanti.
tika-vin09t0:244: Nissaggiyakaṇḍe tiṇṇaṃ kathinasikkhāpadānaṃ, vassikasāṭikaaccekacīvarasāsaṅkasikkhāpadānañca ekadesanāya tathākiṇṇāpattikkhandhāva veditabbā –
tika-vin09t0:247_0: Tattha kathinanti “saṅghassa anumodanāya, gaṇassa anumodanāya, puggalassa atthārā
tika-vin09t0:247_1: saṅghassa atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti vacanato tesaṃyeva anumodanādidhammānaṃ saṅgaho
tika-vin09t0:247_2: kathinaṃ nāma. Yathāha “kathinaṃ jānitabbanti tesaññeva dhammānaṃ saṅgaho samavāyo
tika-vin09t0:247_3: nāmaṃ nāmakamma”ntiādi. Tasmā kathinanti idaṃ bahūsu dhammesu nāmamattaṃ, na paramatthato
tika-vin09t0:247_4: eko dhammo. Ko panassa atthāroti? Tadekadesova khīrassa dhārā viya. Yathā cāha “atthāro
tika-vin09t0:247_5: ekena dhammena saṅgahito vacībhedenā”ti. Sahajā nāma aṭṭha mātikā, dve palibodhā,
tika-vin09t0:247_6: pañcānisaṃsāti ime pannarasa dhammā. Samayadvayaṃ nāma kathinatthārasamayo, cīvarasamayo
tika-vin09t0:247_7: cāti. Tattha kathinatthārasamayo vassānassa pacchimo māso. Cīvarasamayo nāma anatthate
tika-vin09t0:247_8: kathine ayaṃ kattikamāso, atthate cattāro hemantikā cāti pañca māsā.
tika-vin09t0:248_0: Tattha aṭṭha mātikā nāma pakkamanantikādayo. Tā sabbāpi atthārena ekato uppajjanti
tika-vin09t0:248_1: nāma. Tabbhāvabhāvitāya atthāre sati uddhāro sambhavati. Tattha kathinatthārena ekuppādā
tika-vin09t0:248_2: ekanirodhā antarubbhāro sahubbhāro, avasesā kathinubbhārā ekuppādā, nānānirodhā ca.
tika-vin09t0:248_3: Tattha ekanirodhāti atthārena saha nirodhā, antarubbhārasahubbhārānaṃ uddhārābhāvo
tika-vin09t0:248_4: ekakkhaṇe hotīti attho. Sesā nānā nirujjhanti nāma. Tesu hi uddhārabhāvaṃ pattesupi
tika-vin09t0:248_5: atthāro tiṭṭhati evāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthavibhāvanā. Sace atthate kathine bhikkhusmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:248_6: sāpekkhe tamhā āvāsā pakkamante saṅgho antarubbhāraṃ karoti, tassa bhikkhuno paṭhamameva
tika-vin09t0:248_7: mūlāvāse niṭṭhitacīvarapalibodhābhāvepi sati antarubbhāre palibodho chijjati satipi
tika-vin09t0:248_8: sāpekkhatāya saussāhattā. Iminā pariyāyena pakkamanantiko kathinuddhāro atthārena
tika-vin09t0:248_9: ekuppādo nānānirodho hoti. Tathā antarubbhāre sati suṇantassāpi yāva cīvaraniṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:248_10: na gacchati, tāva parihārasambhavato niṭṭhānantiko. Yāva sanniṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:248_11: tāva parihārasambhavato sanniṭṭhānantiko. Yāva na nassati, tāva parihārasambhavato
tika-vin09t0:248_12: nāsanantiko. Yāva na suṇāti, tāva parihārasambhavato savanantiko. Yāva cīvarāsā na
tika-vin09t0:248_13: chijjati, tāva parihārasambhavato āsāvacchediko. Yāva sīmaṃ nātikkamati, tāva parihārasambhavato
tika-vin09t0:248_14: sīmātikkantiko. Atthārena ekuppādo nānānirodho hotīti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:249_0: Tattha antarubbhārasahubbhārā dve antosīmāyaṃ eva sambhavanti, na bahisīmāyaṃ. Pakkamanasavanasīmātikkantikā
tika-vin09t0:249_1: bahisīmāyameva sambhavanti, na antosīmāyaṃ. Niṭṭhānasaaāṭṭhānāsāvacchedikā antosīmāyañceva
tika-vin09t0:250_0: Tattha “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti iminā cīvarapalibodhābhāvameva dīpeti. Na āvāsapalibodhābhāvaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:250_1: “Ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti iminā ubhayapalibodhābhāvaṃ dīpeti, tasmā ubhayapalibodhābhāvadīpanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:250_2: tadeva vattabbanti ce? Na, visesattā. Kathaṃ? Kāmañcetaṃ tasmā “ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti
tika-vin09t0:250_3: kesañci kathinuddhārānaṃ nānānirodhattā, saṅghapuggalādhīnānadhīnattā ca antobahiubhayasīmāsu
tika-vin09t0:250_4: niyamāniyamato ca ubbhatasmiṃ kathine saṅghassa, na puggalassa ubbhataṃ hoti, tathāpi
tika-vin09t0:250_5: “ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti idaṃ sāmaññavacanaṃ. Tasmā “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti iminā niyameti.
tika-vin09t0:251_0: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – saṅghassa antarubbhārena ubbhatasmiṃ kathine acchinnacīvarapalibodho
tika-vin09t0:251_1: bahisīmāgato pacchā gantvā attano sīmāgato aniṭṭhitacīvaro ānisaṃsaṃ labhati evāti
tika-vin09t0:251_2: katvā “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Tattha āvāsapalibodho nāma vasati
tika-vin09t0:251_3: vā tasmiṃ āvāse, sāpekkho vā pakkamati. Cīvarapalibodho nāma cīvaraṃ akataṃ vippakataṃ,
tika-vin09t0:251_4: cīvarāsānupacchinnā, tabbiparītena apalibodho veditabbo. Tattha anatthatakathinānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:251_5: cīvarakālasamaye niyamato cattāro ānisaṃsā labbhanti, asamādānacāro aniyamato. Tena
tika-vin09t0:251_6: sāsaṅkasikkhāpadaṃ vuttaṃ. Kathaṃ cattāro niyatāti ce? “Cīvarakālasamayo nāma anatthate
tika-vin09t0:251_7: kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso”ti vacanato anatthatakathinānaṃ tasmiṃ māse yāvadatthacīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:251_8: siddhaṃ, tathā tatiyakathinasikkhāpade akālacīvaraṃ nāma piṭṭhisamayato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:251_9: taṃ paṭiggahetvā saṅghato labhitabbaṃ ce, yāva cīvarakālasamayaṃ nikkhipitvā bhājetvā
tika-vin09t0:251_10: gahetabbaṃ. Puggalikaṃ ce, vassānassa chaṭṭhapakkhassa pañcamito paṭṭhāya yāva cīvarakālasamayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:251_11: anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ vaṭṭati accekacīvarasikkhāpadena anuññātattā, na tato paraṃ.
tika-vin09t0:251_12: Tadā uppannacīvarassa paṭisiddhattā paṭhamakathinena. Tattha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayo
tika-vin09t0:251_13: saṅghikaṃ sandhāya, tathā porāṇagaṇṭhipade cāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:252_0: Paṭhamakathine paṭhamapaññattiyā, avisesena vā ekādasame divase āpatti. Vassānassa
tika-vin09t0:252_1: hi antonivāraṇatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāya “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti
tika-vin09t0:252_2: vuttaṃ. Eseva nayo dutiye, tatiye ca. Tena cīvarakālato pure vā anto vā uppannaṃ
tika-vin09t0:252_3: cīvarakālato uddhaṃ ekadivasampi parihāraṃ na labhati. Yadi labheyya, accekacīvarasikkhāpadavirodho.
tika-vin09t0:252_4: “Yāva cīvarakālasamayaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ, tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya, nissaggiya”nti
tika-vin09t0:252_5: hi tattha vuttaṃ. Vassāvāsikabhāvena saṅghato laddhaṃ vuṭṭhavassattā attano santakabhūtaṃ
tika-vin09t0:252_6: accekacīvaraṃ cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmayato eva āpatti, na accekacīvarakālaṃ atikkāmayato
tika-vin09t0:252_7: āpattīti. “Anatthate kathine ekādasamāse uppanna”nti vacanato yo ca tattha cīvaruppādo,
tika-vin09t0:252_8: so ca nesaṃ bhavissatīti siddhaṃ, anāmantacāragaṇabhojanasikkhāpade “aññatra samayā”ti
tika-vin09t0:252_9: vuttattā sesadvayaṃ siddhameva. Tasmā “kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ, etaṃ akālacīvara”nti
tika-vin09t0:252_10: vacanato ādissa dinnacīvaraṃ parihāraṃ na labhati.
tika-vin09t0:253_0: Aparakattikāyameva vā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine labhati, evaṃ “ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti vuttattāti
tika-vin09t0:253_1: ce? Na vattabbaṃ. Cha ṭhānāni hi sāpekkhatāya vuttāni. Duṭṭhadosadvaye adhikaraṇacatutthaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:253_2: paṭhamāniyate sotassa raho, tatiyakathine ādissa dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ, accekacīvarasikkhāpade
tika-vin09t0:253_4: pārājikavacanañca, tīsu kathinasikkhāpadesu “aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ aññatarāyā”ti vacananti.
tika-vin09t0:253_5: Tattha ādissa dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghikaṃ bhājitabbacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na puggalikaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:253_6: Saññāṇaṃ katvā nikkhipitabbanti vassāvāsikacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Avuṭṭhavassena
tika-vin09t0:253_7: pacchā dātabbattā saññāṇaṃ kātabbaṃ, na ñātippavāritato laddhaṃ puggalikaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin09t0:253_8: Tasmā duvidhaṃ accekacīvaraṃ saṅghe ninnaṃ, puggale ninnañcāti siddhaṃ. Tattha saṅghe
tika-vin09t0:253_9: pariṇataṃ accekacīvaraṃ vassūpanāyikadivasato paṭṭhāya, piṭṭhisamayato paṭṭhāya vā
tika-vin09t0:253_10: yāva pavāraṇā nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati eva saṅghikattā, puggalikampi “vassaṃvuṭṭhakāle
tika-vin09t0:253_11: gaṇhathā”ti dinnattā. Tādisañhi yāva vassaṃvuṭṭho na hoti, tāva tasseva dāyakassa
tika-vin09t0:254_1: accekacīvarakasseva so aparādho. Yena “virodho”ti vacanaṃ dasseyyāti na vinaye visesahetu
tika-vin09t0:254_2: pariyesitabbo. Buddhavisayattā pamāṇanti ce? Na, yadi evaṃ ettha attano santakabhūtampi
tika-vin09t0:254_3: accekacīvaraṃ saññāṇaṃ katvā nikkhipitabbameva, na adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ na vikappetabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:254_4: na vissajjetabbaṃ. Tato “anāpatti, antosamaye adhiṭṭheti vikappeti vissajjetī”tiādivacanavirodho
tika-vin09t0:254_5: adhivāsetabbo siyā. Tathā “vassānassa pacchime māse kathinuddhāre kate tasmiṃ māse
tika-vin09t0:254_6: atthate kathine kathinuddhāradivasaṃ atikkāmeti, nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti vacanato nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:254_7: hotīti ayampi atthavirodho adhivāsetabbo siyā. Tasmiñca “anaccekacīvare anāpattī”ti
tika-vin09t0:254_8: vuttaṃ, tañca anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitamevāti ettako visesahetu. Atirekacīvarañcetaṃ
tika-vin09t0:254_9: paṭhamasikkhāpadenāpatti, itaraṃ ce anāpattiyevāti imassa atthassa ayaṃ bhagavato
tika-vin09t0:254_10: visesahetu. Tathā atirekadasāhānāgatāyeva kattikapuṇṇamāya saṅghassa vassāvāsikatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:254_11: accekacīvaraṃ viya dadamānaṃ na gahetabbaṃ, dasāhānāgatāya eva gahetabbanti ettako
tika-vin09t0:254_12: visesahetu. Tato aṭṭhakathānayavirodho ca adhivāsetabbo siyā. Tattha “adhiṭṭhitato
tika-vin09t0:254_13: paṭṭhāya uppannaṃ accekacīvaraṃ na hotī”ti vatvā aññathā nayo dassito. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade
tika-vin09t0:254_14: so ca nayo saṅghikaṃ upādāya vuttattā na virujjhatīti neva so ca paṭikkhitto. Yathā
tika-vin09t0:254_15: anaccekacīvaraṃ chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya uppannaṃ atirekadasāhānāgatāyapi paṭiggahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:254_16: paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmayatopi anāpattīti ayampi nayo adhivāsetabbo
tika-vin09t0:254_17: siyā. Tato paṭhamakathinavirodho. Dasāhānāgatāya eva paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paṭiggahetvā
tika-vin09t0:254_18: cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmayato anāpattīti ce, taṃ dve dasāhe labhatīti ettako visesahetu.
tika-vin09t0:255_0: Antarā anāpattikkhettacīvarakālappaviṭṭhattā adhiṭṭhahitvā paccuddhaṭaṃ viya taṃ
tika-vin09t0:255_1: punapi dasāhe labhatīti ce? Na, kālappaveso adhiṭṭhānaṃ viya hotīti ce? Na, “vassikasāṭikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:255_2: vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ, tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti vacanavirodhaṃ katvā, tato
tika-vin09t0:255_3: paraṃ dasāhaṃ avikappentassāpi anāpatti siyā. Apica yaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vassikasāṭikā
tika-vin09t0:255_4: antovasse laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca, antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbā, dasāhātikkame niṭṭhitā,
tika-vin09t0:255_5: tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbā, dasāhe appahonte cīvarakālaṃ nātikkāmetabbā”ti. Tena āpattito
tika-vin09t0:255_6: na mucceyya. Kālappaveso hi adhiṭṭhānapariyāyo na jātoti. Ettāvatā yathāvutto atthavikappo
tika-vin09t0:256_0: Apicettha yaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dasāhe appahonte cīvarakālaṃ nātikkāmetabbā”ti,
tika-vin09t0:256_1: tatthapi cīvarakāle uppannaṃ, dasāhe appahonte cassa karaṇaṃ natthi, taṃ accekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:256_2: akālacīvaramiva cīvarakālaṃ nātikkāmetabbanti siddhametaṃ. Pāḷito ca tañce antokāle
tika-vin09t0:256_3: uppajjati, dasāhe appahontepi uppajjati, evaṃ uppannaṃ accekacīvaraṃ accekacīvarameva
tika-vin09t0:256_4: na hoti. Na hi taṃ kālavisesavasena accekacīvarasaṅkhaṃ gacchati. Vuttañhetaṃ “accekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:256_5: nāma senāya vā gantukāmo hoti, pavāsaṃ vā gantukāmo hoti, gilāno vā hoti, gabbhinī
tika-vin09t0:256_6: vā hoti, assaddhassa vā saddhā uppannā hoti…pe… ‘vassāvāsikaṃ dassāmī’ti evaṃ ārocitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:256_7: etaṃ accekacīvaraṃ nāmā”ti. Tasmā yathā taṃ cīvaraṃ nātikkāmetabbaṃ, tathā anaccekacīvarampīti
tika-vin09t0:256_8: siddhaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dasāhe appahonte cīvarakālaṃ nātikkāmetabbā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:256_9: Apica yadi evaṃ taṃ accekacīvarasikkhāpadameva accekacīvaraṃ cīvarakālaṃ nātikkāmetabbanti
tika-vin09t0:256_10: imassa pana atthavisesassa dassanatthaṃ bhagavatā paññattaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:257_0: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana taṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ – kāmañcedaṃ “dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:257_1: dhāretabba”nti iminā siddhaṃ, aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin09t0:257_2: sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapitanti atthavisesadīpanapayojanato. Tasmā taṃ tassa atthavisesadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:257_3: vuttanti siddhameva. Tasmāpi veditabbameva yaṃ kiñci cīvaraṃ cīvarakālasamayaṃ nātikkāmetabbanti.
tika-vin09t0:257_4: Apica yaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi
tika-vin09t0:257_5: paccuddhāretvā ṭhapitacīvarampi etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatī”ti. Tena “anaccekacīvare anaccekacīvarasaññī
tika-vin09t0:257_6: cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeti, anāpattī”ti imināpi anaccekacīvarassāpi accekacīvaraparihāralābhaṃ dīpetīti.
tika-vin09t0:258: Ettāvatā yathāvutto dutiyo atthavikappo pāḷinayena, aṭṭhakathānayena ca patiṭṭhāpito hoti. Evaṃ tāva pakiṇṇakāya adhikathā parato pāṭhato vitthāritā hotīti apakiṇṇakaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:259_0: Cīvarapalibodho, āvāsapalibodho cāti dve palibodhā. Tesu ekapalibodhepi sati anāmantacārādiānisaṃsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:259_1: labhati, taṃ idha natthīti dassetuṃ “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti
tika-vin09t0:259_2: vuttaṃ. Tasmā eva “atthatakathinassa hi bhikkhuno”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kathinatthārārahassāti
tika-vin09t0:259_3: ettha “aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ – pubbakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:259_4: jānāti, paccuddhāraṃ jānāti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ jānāti, atthāraṃ jānāti, mātikaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:259_5: palibodhaṃ jānāti, uddhāraṃ jānāti, ānisaṃsaṃ jānātī”ti vacanato imehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi
tika-vin09t0:259_6: samannāgato puggalo kathinatthārāraho nāma. Pubbakaraṇaṃ nāma dhovanavicāraṇacchedanasibbanarajanakappakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:260_0: “Cīvaraṃ nāma khoma”ntiādinā pāḷivasena jātiñca pamāṇañca dassetvā idāni atirekacīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:260_1: dassetuṃ “yaṃ pana vuttaṃ adhiṭṭhitavikappitesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā”ti
tika-vin09t0:260_2: vuttepi yasmiṃ ṭhāne yaṃ ṭhapitaṃ, tasmiṃ taṃ pacchā hotu vā, mā vā, adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:260_3: ruhateva. Pure pacchā ṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ na pamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:261: Antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassa bhikkhubhāvapariccāgavasena setavatthanivāsanaṃ vā kāsāvacajanaṃ vā hīnāyāvattanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:262_0: Ekādasame aruṇuggamaneti antimaṃ ṭhapetvā tato purimatarasminti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:262_1: Tattha antimaṃ nāma aparakattikāya paṭhamāruṇuggamanaṃ. Tañhi kālattā nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:262_2: na karoti. Idha “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā”ti karaṇavacanaṃ nidānānapekkhaṃ nidāne
tika-vin09t0:262_3: karaṇābhāvato. Tasmā eva “dasāhaparama”nti ayamettha anupaññattīti vuttaṃ. “Anujānāmi,
tika-vin09t0:262_4: bhikkhave, ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”ntiādi vacanato ca idha “vikappetī”ti
tika-vin09t0:262_5: avisesena vuttavacanaṃ viruddhaṃ viya dissati, na ca viruddhaṃ tathāgatā bhāsanti,
tika-vin09t0:262_6: tasmā evamassa attho veditabbo – ticīvaraṃ ticīvarasaṅkhepena parihārato adhiṭṭhātumeva
tika-vin09t0:262_7: anujānāmi, na vikappetuṃ. Vassikasāṭikaṃ pana catumāsato paraṃ vikappetumeva, na
tika-vin09t0:262_8: adhiṭṭhātunti. Evañca pana sati yo ticīvare ekena cīvarena vippavasitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin09t0:262_9: tassa ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ paccuddharitvā vippavāsasukhatthaṃ vikappanāya okāso dinno
tika-vin09t0:262_10: hoti, dasāhātikkame ca anāpattīti. Etena upāyena sabbattha vikappanāya apaṭisiddhabhāvo
tika-vin09t0:263_0: Imassa pana sikkhāpadassa ayaṃ saṅkhepavinicchayo – anatthate kathine hemantānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:263_1: paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya, atthate kathine gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya uppannacīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:263_3: kārāpentassāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānamevā”ti vacanato arajitepi adhiṭṭhānaṃ ruhatīti.
tika-vin09t0:263_4: Tena sūcikammaṃ katvā rajitvā kappabinduṃ datvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti niyamo kātabbo,
tika-vin09t0:263_5: na kātabboti? Kattabbova. Patto viya adhiṭṭhito yathā puna setabhāvaṃ vā tambabhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:263_6: vā patto adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati, na ca pana tādiso yaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ upagacchati,
tika-vin09t0:263_7: evametaṃ daṭṭhabbanti. “Sve kathinaṃ uddharissatī”ti laddhacīvaraṃ sace ajjeva na
tika-vin09t0:263_8: adhiṭṭhāti, aruṇuggamane eva nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Kasmā? “Niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”ntiādinā
tika-vin09t0:263_9: sikkhāpadassa vuttattā. Kathinabbhantare dasāhato uttaripi parihāraṃ labhati, kathinato
tika-vin09t0:263_10: pana pacchā ekadivasampi na labhati. Yathā kiṃ – yathā atthatakathino saṅgho ticīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:263_11: atthatadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva ubbhārā ānisaṃsaṃ labhati, na tato paraṃ, evaṃ atthatadivasato
tika-vin09t0:263_12: paṭṭhāya yāva ubbhārā labhati, uddhate pana kathine ekadivasampi na labhati. Etthāha
tika-vin09t0:263_13: – ubbhatadivasato paṭṭhāya puna dasāhaṃ labhatīti? Na, kasmā? “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin09t0:263_14: dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretu”nti vacanato. Kathinabbhantarepi ekādase aruṇuggamane
tika-vin09t0:263_15: nissaggiyanti āpannaṃ. Taṃ pana atippasaṅgaṃ nivāretuṃ “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”ntiādi
tika-vin09t0:263_16: vuttaṃ, na kathinadivasāni adivasānīti dīpanatthaṃ. Ayamattho tattha tattha āvibhavissati.
tika-vin09t0:263_17: Atha vā vassikasāṭikā anatirittappamāṇā nāmaṃ gahetvā vuttanayeneva cattāro vassike
tika-vin09t0:263_18: māse adhiṭṭhātabbā, tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbāti vuttaṃ. Ettha “paccuddharitvā”ti
tika-vin09t0:263_19: vacane uposathadivase eva paccuddharitvā vikappetvā ṭhapitaṃ hoti, tato paraṃ hemantassa
tika-vin09t0:263_20: paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya paccuddharaṇābhāvā. Evaṃ kathinabbhantare uppannacīvarampi
tika-vin09t0:266_0: “Atthatakathinassa pañca māse baddhasīmāyaṃ yattha katthaci cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā pakkamantassa
tika-vin09t0:266_1: anāpattī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Abaddhasīmāyapi vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ abaddhasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:270_1: saṅghāṭi nādhiṭṭhātabbā. Sace adhiṭṭhāti, na ruhatī”ti vatvā upasampadāpekkhānampi
tika-vin09t0:270_2: diguṇaṃyeva saṅghāṭiṃ datvā upasampādenti, te iminā suttalesena saññāpetabbā. Bhagavatā
tika-vin09t0:270_3: hi “chinnakaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ, chinnakaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ, chinnakaṃ antaravāsaka”nti paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:270_4: anuññātaṃ. Tato “aññatarassa bhikkhuno ticīvare kariyamāne sabbaṃ chinnakaṃ nappahoti.
tika-vin09t0:270_5: Dve chinnakāni ekaṃ achinnakaṃ nappahoti, dve achinnakāni ekaṃ chinnakaṃ nappahotī”ti
tika-vin09t0:270_6: imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, anvādhikampi āropetu”nti anuññātaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin09t0:270_7: ekaccikāpi saṅghāṭi vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Yā chijjamānāpi nappahoti, tassā kuto diguṇatāti?
tika-vin09t0:270_8: Aṭṭhakathāyampissa vuttaṃ “anvādhikampi āropetunti āgantukapattampi dātuṃ, idaṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:270_9: appahonake āropetabbaṃ. Sace pahoti, āgantukapattaṃ na vaṭṭati, chinditabbamevā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:270_10: Kathinaṃ pana chinnakameva vaṭṭati, āveṇikalakkhaṇattā, “chinnakaṃ diguṇaṃ nappahotī”ti
tika-vin09t0:271_1: tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānābhāvato “adhiṭṭhitenevā”ti vattabbaṃ hotūti ce? Na, dhutaṅgabhedena
tika-vin09t0:271_2: virodhappasaṅgato. Catutthacīvarasādiyanena hi dhutaṅgabhedo, na ticīvaravippavāsena,
tika-vin09t0:271_3: nāpi atirekacīvarasādiyanena, nāpi atirekacīvaradhāraṇena. Yasmā pana bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:271_4: eva bhagavatā adhiṭṭhānavasena nava cīvarāni anuññātāni, jātivasena ca vuttāni, na
tika-vin09t0:271_5: evaṃ anupasampannānaṃ, tasmā nesaṃ cīvaraniyamābhāvā na taṃ dhutaṅgaṃ anuññātaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:271_6: viya. Tasmā tassa samādānavidhāne avacanato ca sanniṭṭhānamettha gantabbanti.
tika-vin09t0:272_0: Sāsaṅkasammatoti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ sāsaṅkasikkhāpade visuṃ aṅgāni na vuttāni, “sesamettha
tika-vin09t0:272_1: cīvaravaggassa dutiyasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabba”nti vuttaṃ, na ca panetaṃ
tika-vin09t0:272_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha rattivippavāso catutthamaṅgaṃ, idha chārattavippavāso, ayamettha visesoti.
tika-vin09t0:272_3: Tasmā aṅgasāmaññato ca sammutisāmaññato ca sāsaṅkasikkhāpadamevidanti idaṃ nippadesaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:272_4: taṃ sappadesaṃ māsaparamattā. Tattha bahigāmepi gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamantassa
tika-vin09t0:272_5: anāpatti, idha na tathā. Idha anantare anantare aruṇuggamane nissaggiyaṃ, tattha
tika-vin09t0:272_6: sattameti ayaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ viseso. Aṅgāni pana cīvaranikkhepanaṅgasampattito vipariyāyena,
tika-vin09t0:272_7: idha vuttanayena ca siddhattā na vuttāni. Tāni kāmaṃ na vuttāni, tathāpi catutthamaṅgaṃ
tika-vin09t0:272_8: visesitabbaṃ, na pana visesitaṃ. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Idha vuttanissajjanakkamena nissajjitvā
tika-vin09t0:272_10: pageva chārattavippavutthaṃ. Evaṃ santepi tattha yathāvuttaaṅgasampattiyā sati tattha
tika-vin09t0:272_11: vuttanayeneva nissajjitabbaṃ. Hemante, gimhe vā nissajjati ce? Idha vuttanayenāpi
tika-vin09t0:272_12: nissajjituṃ vaṭṭatīti ñāpanatthaṃ catutthamaṅgaṃ na visesitanti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin09t0:272_14: na ūnamāsaṃ hutvā “dasāhātikkanta”nti vatvā, māsātikkanta”nti vatvāti eke. Tathāpi
tika-vin09t0:272_15: sace paccāsācīvaraṃ hoti, nissaggiyaṃ. “Dasāhātikkanta”nti vatvā mūlacīvaraṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:273_0: “Santaruttara”nti vā “saṅghāṭi”nti vā “cīvara”nti vā kiṃ ticīvaraṃ, udāhu aññampīti?
tika-vin09t0:273_2: Atha aññampi “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti evamādinā virodhoti? Vuccate – na niyamato veditabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:273_3: yathāsambhavaṃ gahetabbato. Tathā hi “cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:273_4: pakkamantī”ti evamādīsu ticīvarameva, “na, bhikkhave, santaruttarena gāmo pavisitabbo,
tika-vin09t0:273_5: santaruttaraparamaṃ tato cīvaraṃ sāditabba”nti evamādīsu yaṃ kiñci, tathā “saguṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:273_6: katvā saṅghāṭiyo dātabbā, nivāsanaṃ dātabbaṃ, saṅghāṭi dātabbā, handa te, āvuso,
tika-vin09t0:273_7: saṅghāṭi, dehi me paṭa”nti evamādīsu. Vuttañhetaṃ “sabbañhi cīvaraṃ saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena
tika-vin09t0:273_8: ‘saṅghāṭī’ti vuccatī”ti. Tathā “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti etthāpīti eke. Antosamaye yāvadatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:273_9: cīvaraṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ kariyamānaṃ kadā niṭṭhānaṃ gacchissati, tasmā ticīvaramevāti eke.
tika-vin09t0:274_0: Acīvarassānāpatti paccuddhārādisiddhitoti kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – udositasikkhāpadassa
tika-vin09t0:274_1: nippayojanabhāvappasaṅgato ticīvaravippavāse tecīvarassa āpattīti eke. Tatthetaṃ
tika-vin09t0:274_2: vuccati na hoti āpatti paccuddhārādisiddhito. “Anāpatti antoaruṇe paccuddharati vissajjetī”ti
tika-vin09t0:274_3: hi vuttaṃ. Aññathā paccuddharantassa, antoaruṇe vissajjentassa ca yāva añño nādhiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin09t0:274_4: tāva āpattiṃ āpajjati yathāvuttanayeneva. Aññathā sattabbhantarena vippavāsassāti
tika-vin09t0:274_5: vippavāsato yathārutaṃyeva sati vippavāse vippavāsato, avippavāse sati avippavāsatoti.
tika-vin09t0:277_0: Aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānassa dubbijānattā taṃ dassetuṃ “apica bhikkhūna”ntiādi
tika-vin09t0:277_1: vuttaṃ. Vihārapariyante niviṭṭhadhuvasannipātaṭṭhānato vā pariyante ṭhitabhojanasālato
tika-vin09t0:277_2: vā nibaddhavasanakaāvāsato vāti evaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Sace vihāre sannipatitabhikkhūhi
tika-vin09t0:277_3: saddhiṃ ekābaddhā hutvā yojanasatampi pūretvā nisīdanti, yojanasatampi upacārasīmā
tika-vin09t0:277_4: hotīti attho. “Samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyā”ti vutte khaṇḍasīmādīsu ṭhitānaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin09t0:277_5: tāsaṃ visuṃ samānasaṃvāsakasīmattāti ca samānasaṃvāsakaavippavāsasīmānaṃ idaṃ nānattaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:277_6: “Avippavāsasīmāya dammī”ti dinnaṃ pana gāme ṭhitānaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Kasmā? “Ṭhapetvā
tika-vin09t0:277_7: gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vacanato. “Samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyā”ti dinnaṃ pana yasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:277_8: avippavāsasīmā atthi, tattha ṭhitānampi. “Tatra ṭhitānañca pāpuṇātī”ti ca, “khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:277_9: ṭhatvā ‘sīmaṭṭhakasaṅgho gaṇhātū’ti vutte upacārasīmāya eva paricchinditvā dātabba”nti
tika-vin09t0:277_10: ca, “tesaṃ bahisīmaṭṭhānampi pāpuṇāti yāva kathinassubbhārāti attho”ti ca, “anatthate
tika-vin09t0:277_11: pana kathine antohemante sace vihāraṃ pavisitvā ‘vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassa dammī’ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:277_12: ye tattha vassacchedaṃ akatvā pacchimavassaṃvuṭṭhā, tesaṃ bahisīmaṭṭhānampi pāpuṇātī”ti
tika-vin09t0:277_13: vinayadharā paricchindanti, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana anāgataṃ. Tasmā samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:277_14: “lakkhaṇaññū vadantī”ti vuttanti ca, “‘cīvaramāsato paṭṭhāya yāva hemantassa pacchimo
tika-vin09t0:277_15: divaso, tāva vassāvāsikaṃ demā’ti vutte kathinaṃ atthataṃ vā hotu, anatthataṃ vāti
tika-vin09t0:277_16: yaṃ samantapāsādikāvacanaṃ, etthāpi yadi atthataṃ, purimavassaṃvuṭṭhā pañca māse.
tika-vin09t0:277_17: Yadi anatthataṃ, pacchimavassaṃvuṭṭhā cattāro māse labhantīti vinicchayo”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:278_0: “Yehi mayhaṃ yāgu pītāti yehi nimantitehi mayhaṃ yāgu pītāti adhippāyo. Tasmā yehi
tika-vin09t0:278_1: nimantitehi yāgu pītā, tesaṃyeva pāpuṇātīti vuttaṃ. Aññathā ‘yehi mayhaṃ yāgu pītā’ti
tika-vin09t0:278_2: vutte nimantitā vā hontu, animantitā vā, yehi pītā, tesaṃ pāpuṇitabbānī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:278_3: Ettha “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti vadanto ñāpeti etthantare
tika-vin09t0:278_4: tiṇṇampi akālacīvarānaṃ uppattiabhāvanti. Kasmā pana padabhājane vitthāritānīti?
tika-vin09t0:278_5: Vuccate – idaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya na vuttaṃ kintu paṭhamasikkhāpade
tika-vin09t0:278_6: dasāhaparamaṃ anujānitvā tasmiṃ appahonte sace paccāsā atthi, tameva vaḍḍhetvā māsamanujānanto
tika-vin09t0:278_7: imampi atthavisesaṃ dīpeti. Akālacīvaraṃ nāma sammukhībhūtena bhājetabbaṃ. Taṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:278_8: “ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabba”nti iminā sikkhāpadena vaḍḍhetvā vuttanti.
tika-vin09t0:279_0: “Khippameva kāretabbanti sīghaṃ antodasāheyeva kāretabba”nti idaṃ pana pahonakabhāve
tika-vin09t0:279_1: purimasikkhāpadalakkhaṇenāti dīpetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā evaṃ “sīgha”nti vā “lahu”nti vā
tika-vin09t0:279_2: ādinā avatvāpi “dasāhā”ti vuttanti. Atthatakathinassa evaṃ hotu, anatthate pana kathine
tika-vin09t0:279_3: kathanti vutte anatthatassa paṭikkhepataṃ dassetīti vutto apassanto vighātaṃ āpajjatīti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:282_0: “Sākiyāniyo viya suddhabhikkhusaṅghe vā”ti idaṃ “bhikkhunī nāma ubhatosaṅghe upasampannā”ti
tika-vin09t0:282_1: iminā virujjhatīti ce? Na, adhippāyājānanato. Bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampadāya paṭikkhittattā
tika-vin09t0:283_0: Ekena vatthunāti yena kenaci paṭhamena. Avuttā vā dhovatīti avuttā dhovati, rajati
tika-vin09t0:283_1: ākoṭetīti attho. “‘Avuttā’ti vacanato avādāpetvā dhovanādīsu anāpattī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:283_2: Idha cīvaraṃ nāma nivāsanapārupanūpagameva. Yadi evaṃ “nivāsanapārupanūpagameva vattabba”nti
tika-vin09t0:283_3: ce? Taṃ na vattabbaṃ “purāṇacīvara”nti imināva siddhattā. Vuttañhetaṃ “purāṇacīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:286: Upacāro dvādasahattho. Acittakattā kathaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ vaṭṭatīti ce? Tāya tassa bhikkhuno adinnattā, bhikkhunā ca tato bhikkhunito aggahitattā ca.
tika-vin09t0:289: Ñātakappavārite vā viññāpentassāti ettha ca saṅghavasena pavāritesu pamāṇameva vaṭṭati. Puggalikappavāraṇāya yaṃ yaṃ pavāreti, taṃ taṃyeva viññāpetabbanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:292_0: Pakatiyā santaruttarena carati kathinapalibodhavasena vā sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavasena
tika-vin09t0:292_1: vā. Ettha siyā – “na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ cīvaraṃ viññāpessanti, dussavāṇijjaṃ vā”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:292_2: ujjhāyantānaṃ sutvā bhagavāpi chabbaggiye bhikkhū “kathañhi nāma tumhe moghapurisā
tika-vin09t0:292_3: na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ cīvaraṃ viññāpessathā”ti vatvā sikkhāpadassa paññattattā
tika-vin09t0:292_5: samantapāsādikāyaṃ “na hi anacchinnacīvarā attano atthāya sākhāpalāsaṃ bhañjituṃ
tika-vin09t0:292_6: labhanti, acchinnacīvarānaṃ pana atthāya labhantī”ti vuttattā ca aññassatthāya pamāṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:292_7: viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ce? Na, kasmā? Aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadassa aṭṭhuppattiyā eva
tika-vin09t0:292_8: aññātakaviññatti vāritā. Tassa sikkhāpadassa anāpatti. Pāḷiyaṃ “aññassatthāyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:292_9: imissā anāpattipāḷiyā aññassatthāya viññāpento tassa ñātakappavārite eva viññāpeti,
tika-vin09t0:292_10: na aññeti vacanato ca vāritā. Tasmā bhagavāpi “bahuṃ cīvaraṃ viññāpessathā”ti vigarahitvā
tika-vin09t0:292_11: sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpento “abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyyā”ti vuttanayeneva pamāṇato gahaṇaṃ anujāni,
tika-vin09t0:292_12: na aññassatthāya pamāṇato viññāpanaṃ. Yasmā panimaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:292_13: paññattaṃ, tasmā idha “aññassatthāyā”ti na vuttaṃ, na na labbhatīti katvā.
tika-vin09t0:293_0: Aṭṭhakathāsu “aññātakappavāritaṭṭhāne pakatiyā bahumpi vaṭṭati, acchinnakāraṇā pamāṇameva
tika-vin09t0:293_1: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ “anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti vuttaanāpattipāḷiyā na
tika-vin09t0:293_2: sametīti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttattā idhāpi vuttanayeneva ñātakappavārite viññāpentassa
tika-vin09t0:293_3: attano dhanena gaṇhantassa anāpattīti likhitaṃ. “Aññassatthāyā”ti nidānavirodhato
tika-vin09t0:293_4: na vuttaṃ, tathāpi anantare vuttanayeneva labbhati evāti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:296: Paṭhamaupakkhaṭe “pubbe appavārito”ti vacanato tasmiṃ khaṇe pavāritopi appavāritova hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:299_0: Dutiyaupakkhaṭena kiṃ payojananti ce? Natthi payojanaṃ, kevalaṃ aṭṭhuppattivasena
tika-vin09t0:299_1: pana paññattaṃ bhikkhuniyā rahonisajjasikkhāpadaṃ viya. Evaṃ sante saṅgītikārakehi
tika-vin09t0:299_2: saṅgītiṃ anāropetabbaṃ bhaveyya vināpi tena tadatthasiddhito, anissarattā, anāropetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:299_3: anuññātattā ca. Vuttañhetaṃ “ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, saṅgho…pe… samūhaneyyā”ti. Idaṃ
tika-vin09t0:299_4: sabbamakāraṇaṃ. Na hi buddhā appayojanaṃ vacanaṃ nicchārenti, pageva sikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:299_5: Tenevāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Idañhi purimassa anupaññattisadisa”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:299_6: Anupaññatti ca nippayojanaṃ natthi. Taṃsadisañcetaṃ, na nippayojananti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:299_7: Evaṃ sante ko panettha atthavisesoti? Tato āha “kevalaṃ tattha ekassa pīḷā katā,
tika-vin09t0:299_8: idha dvinnaṃ, ayamettha viseso”ti. Iminā atthavisesena ko panañño atirekattho dassitoti?
tika-vin09t0:299_9: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade tāva vuttaṃ “ekasmimpi vatthusmiṃ ubhinnampi pīḷā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin09t0:299_10: ayamatirekattho dassito”ti. Tenetaṃ dīpeti “na kevalaṃ paṭiladdhacīvaragaṇanāya eva
tika-vin09t0:305: Apicetaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ taṃjātikesu sikkhāpadesu sabbesupi gahetabbavinicchayassa dassanappayojananti veditabbaṃ. Āha ca –
tika-vin09t0:310_0: Tassāyaṃ saṅkhepato adhippāyapubbaṅgamā vicāraṇā – purāṇacīvaraṃ ekameva bhikkhu
tika-vin09t0:310_1: bhikkhunīhi dvīhi, bahūhi vā dhovāpeti, bhikkhunigaṇanāya pācittiyagaṇanā. Tathā
tika-vin09t0:310_2: dvinnaṃ, bahūnaṃ vā sādhāraṇaṃ ekameva cīvaraṃ aññatra pārivattakā paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:310_3: idhāpi tathā dvinnaṃ, bahūnaṃ vā sādhāraṇamekaṃ viññāpeti, viññattapuggalagaṇanāya
tika-vin09t0:310_4: āpattigaṇanā. Tathā aññesupi evarūpesu sikkhāpadesu nayo netabbo. Ayaṃ tāva bahutāya nayo.
tika-vin09t0:311_0: Vimissatāya pana ñātikāya, aññātikāya ca ekaṃ dhovāpeti, ekato niṭṭhāpane ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:311_1: Atha ñātikā paṭhamaṃ thokaṃ dhovitvā ṭhitā, puna aññātikā sudhotaṃ karoti, nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:311_2: pācittiyaṃ. Atha aññātikā paṭhamaṃ dhovati, pacchā ñātikā sudhotaṃ karoti, aññātikāya
tika-vin09t0:311_3: payogavasena bhikkhuno dukkaṭameva. Aññātikāya, ñātikāya ca aññātikasaññī, vematiko,
tika-vin09t0:311_4: ñātikasaññī vā dhovāpeti, yathāvuttanayena nissaggiyadukkaṭādiāpattibhedagaṇanā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:311_5: Tathā aññātikāya, ñātikāya ca santakaṃ cīvaraṃ ubhohi ekato diyyamānaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:311_6: nissaggiyameva. Atha aññātikāya eva hatthato paṭiggaṇhāti, nissaggiyameva. Atha ñātikāya
tika-vin09t0:311_7: hatthato paṭiggaṇhāti, anāpatti. Atha ubhosu aññātikādisaññī, vuttanayeneva nissaggiyadukkaṭādiāpattibhedagaṇanā
tika-vin09t0:311_8: veditabbā. Tathā aññātikaviññattiādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ nayo netabbo. Ayaṃ vimissatāya nayo.
tika-vin09t0:312_0: Ādisaddena pana aneke aññātikā viññattā, viññattapuggalagaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ. Eko deti,
tika-vin09t0:312_1: eko na deti, nissaggiyaṃ. Atha aviññatto deti, na nisaggiyaṃ. Atha viññattāviññattānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:312_2: sādhāraṇaṃ viññatto deti, nissaggiyaṃ. Ubho denti, nissaggiyameva. Aviññatto deti,
tika-vin09t0:312_3: nissaggiyena anāpatti. Viññattassa vacanena aviññatto deti, anāpatti eva. Tathā upakkhaṭādīsupi
tika-vin09t0:313_0: Ettāvatā saṅkhepato aññātikāyādigāthā vuttādhippāyā hoti. Yaṃ panettha bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin09t0:313_1: rahonisajjasikkhāpadaṃ nippayojanatāya nidassanaṃ vuttaṃ, tassa payojanaviseso tasmiṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:313_2: āvibhavissatīti. Evameva aññatthapi vacanena, visesaaṭṭhuppattivasena ca sikkhāpadesu
tika-vin09t0:316_0: “Ṭhānaṃ bhañjati, āgatakāraṇaṃ vināsetī”ti vuttattā puna codanaṃ na labhatīti eke.
tika-vin09t0:316_1: Āgamanassa sātthakaṃ na hoti, cīvaraṃ na labhissati paṭisanthārassa katattāti eke.
tika-vin09t0:316_2: Codanālakkhaṇaṃ na hotīti katvā vuttanti eke. “Dhammadesanādhippāyādinā na paṭisanthāro
tika-vin09t0:316_3: kātabbo”ti upatissatthero “‘āgatakāraṇaṃ vināsetī’ti codanāṭhānāni bhañjati, codetukāmo
tika-vin09t0:316_4: akattabbamakāsi, tappaccayā vattabhede dukkaṭa”nti ca vadati. Dhammasiritthero pana
tika-vin09t0:316_5: “āsane ce nisīdati, ekāya nisajjāya dve ṭhānāni bhañjati. Āmisaṃ ce paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:316_6: ekena paṭiggahaṇena dve ṭhānāni bhañjati. Dhammaṃ ce bhāsati, dhammadesanāsikkhāpade
tika-vin09t0:316_7: vuttaparicchedāya ekāya vācāya dve ṭhānāni bhañjati. Taṃ sandhāya ‘āgatakāraṇaṃ vināsetī’ti
tika-vin09t0:316_8: vutta”nti vadati. “Eso kho”ti vuttena saññatto eko, “ayaṃ veyyāvaccakaroti…pe… avuttepi
tika-vin09t0:316_9: codetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutto dutiyo, sace pana dūto gacchantova “ahaṃ tassa hatthe dassāmī”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:316_10: vutto tatiyo, “aññaṃ vā pesetvā ārocāpetī”ti vutto catutthoti yathā bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhā
tika-vin09t0:316_11: cattāro, tatheva dūtena niddiṭṭhā cattāro. Mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako, parammukhakappiyakārako
tika-vin09t0:316_12: ceti etesu aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabbanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:321_0: Kārāpeyyāti attano ca parassa ca ubhinnañca kosiyaṃ ekato gaṇhitvā vuttaṃ, ubho vā
tika-vin09t0:321_1: ekato karontīti atthato veditabbaṃ. Tattha attanā kataṃ ce, “nissajjanakāle sayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:321_2: kataṃ nissaggiya”nti vattabbaṃ. Ubhohi ce kataṃ, yathāpāḷimeva.
tika-vin09t0:324_0: Yathā paṭhame “ekenapi kosiyaṃsunā”ti vuttaṃ, tathā idha “ekenapi aññena amissitāna”nti
tika-vin09t0:324_1: vacanābhāvato aññena missabhāve satipi apaññāyamānarūpakaṃ ce, “suddhakāḷaka”micceva vuccatīti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:327_0: “Tulayitvā”ti vacanato yathā tulādhāraṇāya kāḷakādhikā na honti, tathā kāḷakānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:327_1: dve bhāgā gahetabbā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena. “Ekassāpi kāḷakalomassa atirekabhāve nissaggiyanti
tika-vin09t0:327_2: vacanaṃ tulādhāraṇāya kiñcāpi na sameti, acittakattā pana sikkhāpadassa pubbe tulāya
tika-vin09t0:327_3: dhārayitvā ṭhapitesu ekampi lomaṃ tattha pateyya, nissaggiyanti ayamadhippāyoti no
tika-vin09t0:327_4: takko”ti ācariyo. Vuttaparicchedena aggahaṇaṃ akiriyā, santhatakaraṇaṃ kiriyā.
tika-vin09t0:330_0: “Orena ce channaṃ vassāna”nti vuttattā chabbasse paripuṇṇe kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti niṭṭhānadivasato
tika-vin09t0:330_1: paṭṭhāya channaṃ vassānaṃ paricchedo veditabbo. Yāni panettha atirekachabbassavasena
tika-vin09t0:330_2: vā sammutivasena vā katāni, sabbāni tāni ekato paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭantīti. Gilānassa
tika-vin09t0:330_3: ca ekaṃ nappahotīti anekampi vaṭṭati. Yato paṭṭhāya rogassa mandatāya santhataṃ ādāya
tika-vin09t0:330_4: gantuṃ sakkoti, tato paṭṭhāya sammuti vā rogo vā na rakkhatīti eke. Apica chavassabuddhanimmalaṃ
tika-vin09t0:330_5: sikkhāpadaṃ vicāretuṃ gambhīrattā. Tasmā chavasse kammaṃ katanti.
tika-vin09t0:333_0: Kasmā panettha “santhataṃ pana bhikkhunā”ti sikkhāpadaṃ apaññapetvā “nisīdanasanthata”nti
tika-vin09t0:333_1: paññattaṃ, nanu ettha kāraṇena bhavitabbanti? Atthi kāraṇaṃ, cīvarasaññitāya santhatānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:333_2: ujjhitattā tesaṃ acīvarabhāvadassanatthaṃ tathā paññattaṃ bhagavatāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:333_3: Tasmā te bhikkhū tecīvarikadhutaṅgabhedabhayā santhate catutthacīvarasaññitāya santhatāni
tika-vin09t0:333_4: ujjhitvā terasa dhutaṅgāni samādayiṃsu, bhagavā ca tesaṃ santhataṃ anujāni. Tato
tika-vin09t0:333_5: tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ hoti “nisīdanacīvarasaṇṭhānampetaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ no bhagavatā
tika-vin09t0:333_6: anuññātaṃ catutthacīvarabhāvena, pageva katasanthataṃ vā”ti. Tato “santhate tesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:333_7: cīvarasaññitā na bhavissatī”ti tadatthaṃ bhagavatā “santhata”nti apaññapetvā “nisīdanasanthata”nti
tika-vin09t0:333_8: paññattanti adhippāyo. Imesu pana pañcasu santhatesu purimāni tīṇi vinayakammaṃ katvā
tika-vin09t0:333_9: paṭilabhitvāpi paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti akappiyattā, pacchimāni dve vaṭṭantīti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:333_10: Kathaṃ paññāyatīti ce? “Anāpatti aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjatī”ti vacanatoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:336_1: tiyojanaparamameva haritabbāni, pageva appaṭipannassāti dasseti. Paṭipannassa ce,
tika-vin09t0:336_2: addhānaṃ nāma paṭipannassa akāmā vassaṃvuṭṭhabhikkhuniyā maggappaṭipatti viyāti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:336_3: Addhānamaggappaṭipannassa nissaggiyanti vā sambandho. Teneva vāsādhippāyassa paṭippassaddhagamanussāhattā
tika-vin09t0:336_4: “appaṭipanno”ti saṅkhaṃ gatassa anāpattīti siddhaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana atthavikappe “bhikkhuno
tika-vin09t0:336_5: paneva eḷakalomāni uppajjeyyuṃ…pe… asantepi hārake addhānamaggappaṭipannassa nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:336_6: pācittiya”nti yojanā veditabbā. Yasmā vā eḷakalomānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya tiyojanaparamatā
tika-vin09t0:336_7: adhippetā, maggaṃ appaṭipannassa ca tiyojanaparamatā natthi, tasmā “addhānamaggappaṭipannassa
tika-vin09t0:336_8: uppajjeyyu”nti vuttaṃ. Tena acchinnaṃ paṭilabhitvā harato ca anāpattīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:337_0: “Ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbānī”ti iminā attanā paṭiggahitānaṃyeva tiyojanātikkame
tika-vin09t0:337_1: āpattīti dasseti. Tena anākaṅkhamānena parasantakāni paṭiggahitāni harantassa anāpattīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:338_0: Aṅgesu “attano santakatā”ti natthi, ayamattho “bhikkhuno uppajjeyyu”nti iminā, “acchinnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:338_1: paṭilabhitvā”ti iminā ca dīpito hotīti veditabbo. Porāṇagaṇṭhipade ca “aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin09t0:338_2: harāpento gacchati ce, dvinnampi anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmā dve bhikkhū tiyojanaparamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:338_3: patvā aññamaññassa bhaṇḍaṃ parivattetvā ce haranti, anāpattīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:339_0: Tiyojanaparamaṃ sahatthā haritabbānīti tiyojanaparamameva attanā haritabbāni, taṃ
tika-vin09t0:339_1: kimatthanti? Sīmāya etaparamato. Vuttañhetaṃ “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tiyojanaparamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:339_2: sīmaṃ sammannitu”nti. Vāsādhippāyena, paccāgamanādhippāyena vā gacchato etaparamatā
tika-vin09t0:339_3: ca. Vuttañhetaṃ “chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atimahatiyo sīmāyo sammannanti…pe… bhikkhū uposathaṃ
tika-vin09t0:339_4: āgacchantā uddissamānepi pātimokkhe āgacchanti, uddiṭṭhamattepi āgacchanti, antarāpi parivasantī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:340_0: Asante hāraketi āṇattiyā hārake asati. Kambalassa upari nisīditvā gacchantassa sace
tika-vin09t0:340_1: ekampi lomaṃ cīvare laggaṃ hoti, tiyojanātikkame āpatti eva kambalato vijaṭitattāti
tika-vin09t0:340_2: likhitaṃ. Taṃ kambalassa paṭiggahitattā attano atthāya paṭiggahitameva hotīti yuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:349: Asante pācittiyaṃ desetabbamevāti ettha kiṃ suddhikaṃ pācittiyaṃ, udāhu nissaggiyanti? Nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyameva.
tika-vin09t0:352: Aṭṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ parena attano atthāya diyyamānassa vā pārivattakabhāvena diyyamānassa vā paṃsukūlassa vā rūpiyassa uggaṇhanauggaṇhāpanasādiyanāni paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin09t0:353: Navamaṃ parassa vā attano vā rūpiyaparivattanaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin09t0:354_0: Dasamaṃ arūpiyaparivattanaṃ. “Arūpiye arūpiyasaññī pañcannaṃ saha anāpattī”ti ca
tika-vin09t0:354_1: vacanaṃ itarehi saha āpattīti dīpeti. Arūpiyañca dukkaṭavatthu. Tasmā tassa parivattane
tika-vin09t0:354_2: sati nissaggiyanti ekantena vuttaṃ. Pañcannaṃ saha dukkaṭavatthūnaṃ parivattane anāpattippasaṅgato
tika-vin09t0:354_3: anāpatti evāti porāṇāti ce? Na, kappiyavatthūnaṃyeva tattha āgatattā. Yadi kappiyavatthu
tika-vin09t0:354_4: nissaggiyaṃ, pageva dukkaṭavatthūti ce? Na, āpattigarukalahukabhāvena vatthugarukalahukaniyamābhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:355_0: Nissaggiyavatthuto hi muttāmaṇiveḷuriyādi mahagghappahonakampi dukkaṭavatthūti katvā
tika-vin09t0:355_1: nissaggiyavatthuto muttādi lahukaṃ hoti. Lahukepi vatthusmiṃ yatheva dukkaṭavatthuno
tika-vin09t0:355_2: paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ, tatheva tassa vā tena vā cetāpanepi dukkaṭaṃ yuttanti aṭṭhakathācariyā.
tika-vin09t0:356_0: Atha vā yaṃ vuttaṃ “kappiyavatthūnaṃyeva tattha āgatattā”ti, tattha kiñcāpi dukkaṭavatthūnipi
tika-vin09t0:356_1: adhippetāni, na pana pāḷiyaṃ vuttāni anāpattivārappasaṅgabhayāti vuttaṃ hoti. Muttādīsupi
tika-vin09t0:356_2: vuttesu anāpattiyaṃ kappiyakārakassa ācikkhati, “idaṃ muttādi amhākaṃ atthi, amhākañca
tika-vin09t0:356_3: iminā ca iminā ca veḷuriyādinā attho”ti bhaṇati, dasamena āpajjatīti adhippāyo siyā.
tika-vin09t0:356_4: Yasmā ca idaṃ kappiyakārakassa ācikkhanādisaṃvohāro ca, tasmā taṃ navamena vuttanti
tika-vin09t0:356_5: veditabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi kayavikkayeva hoti kappiyavatthūhi anuññātaṃ, imināva nayena
tika-vin09t0:356_6: kiñcāpi dukkaṭavatthupi dasame adhippetaṃ āpajjati, aṭṭhakathāvirodhato pana nādhippetamicceva gahetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:357_0: Kā panettha kāraṇacchāyāti, pañcannaṃ saha tattha anāpattippasaṅgato anāpatti evāti
tika-vin09t0:357_1: ce? Na, tattha anāgatattā. Anāgatakāraṇā vuttanti ce? Na, pañcannaṃ saha āpattivatthukassa
tika-vin09t0:357_2: anāpattivāralābhe visesakāraṇābhāvā, akappiyattā pañcannaṃ sahāpi āpattiyā bhavitabbanti
