tika-vin09t0:358_0: Aparo nayo – yadi dukkaṭavatthunā kayavikkaye nissaggiyaṃ, kappiyavatthumhi vuttapariyāyo
tika-vin09t0:358_1: tattha labbheyya, na pana labbhatīti navame eva tāni vattabbāni. Tasmā saṃvohāro
tika-vin09t0:358_2: nāma kayavikkayopi aññathā parivattanaṃ pariyādiyitvā pavatto, kayavikkayañca mocetvā
tika-vin09t0:358_3: “iminā imaṃ dehī’ti cetāpeti, vaṭṭatī”ti avatvā dasamassa anāpattivāre vuttanayeneva
tika-vin09t0:358_4: tesaṃ parivattane nissaggiyānumativirodhato aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva dukkaṭavatthunā
tika-vin09t0:358_5: cetāpane dukkaṭameva. Nesaṃ kayavikkayena nissaggiyanti ce? Na, sabbassapi kayavikkayattā.
tika-vin09t0:358_6: Teneva vuttaṃ “andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘sace kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:358_7: pācittiya’nti bhāsitaṃ, taṃ dubbhāsitaṃ. Kasmā? Na hi dānaggahaṇato añño kayavikkayo
tika-vin09t0:358_8: nāma atthī”ti, attano matiyā kayavikkayalakkhaṇasammate dasamassa anāpattivāre vuttanayeneva
tika-vin09t0:358_9: tesaṃ parivattane nissaggiyānumativirodhato ca. Bhavatu vā attano paṭisiddhamidaṃ
tika-vin09t0:358_10: kāraṇaṃ, dasame avassameva jānitabbānīti tāni kayavikkayānevāti tesaṃ nissaggiyabhāvañca
tika-vin09t0:359_0: Etthāhu porāṇā – “attano santakaṃ rūpiyaṃ parahatthagataṃ karoti ajjhācarati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:359_1: Parassa rūpiyaṃ attano hatthagataṃ karoti, aṭṭhamena nissaggiyaṃ. Uggahitavatthuparivattane
tika-vin09t0:359_2: kathaṃ jātaṃ? Abbohārikaṃ jātaṃ. Atha parassa rūpiyaṃ attano hatthagataṃ paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:359_3: karoti, rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇassa katattā aṭṭhamena nissaggiyaṃ. Attano santakaṃ rūpiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:359_4: parassa hatthagataṃ pacchā karoti, saṃvohārena nissaggiya”nti. “Rūpiyassa gahaṇamattena
tika-vin09t0:359_5: aṭṭhamena āpatti, pacchā parivattane navamenā”ti hi tattha vuttaṃ, taṃ pana yuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:359_7: dassitova. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadi dvīhi nissaggiyehi bhavitabbaṃ, nissajjanavidhāne
tika-vin09t0:359_8: “ahaṃ, bhante, rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahesiṃ, nānāppakārakañca rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajji”nti
tika-vin09t0:359_9: vattabbaṃ bhaveyya “rūpiyaṃ cetāpetī”ti sabbattha pāḷiyaṃ rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇassa vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:360_0: Ettāvatā yaṃ porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ “dukkaṭavatthunā kayavikkayaṃ pariharantena
tika-vin09t0:360_1: catūsu nissaggiyavatthūsu ekekasmiṃ gahite aṭṭhamena nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Dukkaṭavatthunā
tika-vin09t0:360_2: dukkaṭavatthunti “iminā idaṃ dehī”ti gahite teneva nissaggiyaṃ hoti. “Kayavikkayampi
tika-vin09t0:360_3: nīharitvā gahite dukkaṭaṃ, cetāpitarūpiyaggahaṇe aṭṭhamena, parivattane navamenātiādinā
tika-vin09t0:360_4: attanā anuggahetvā kappiyavasena nīharitvā pañcahi sahadhammikehi saddhiṃ parivattetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:360_5: vaṭṭatī”ti, taṃ visodhitaṃ hoti. Aparampi tattha vuttaṃ “nissajjitabbe asati kathaṃ
tika-vin09t0:360_6: pācittiyaṃ, dunnissaṭṭharūpiyampi ‘na chaḍḍetī’ti vadantassa vissaṭṭho upāsako taṃ
tika-vin09t0:360_7: gahetvā aññaṃ ce bhikkhuno deti, kappatī”ti, tañca duvuttaṃ. Na hi gahitattā tato
tika-vin09t0:360_8: aññaṃ vatthu hoti. Puna aparañca tattha vuttaṃ “imaṃ ‘gaṇhāhī’ti vadantassa saddhādeyyavinipātadukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:360_9: ‘etaṃ dehī’ti vadantassa viññattidukkaṭa”nti, tañca duvuttaṃ. Tattha hi payogadukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin09t0:365_0: Dve apattā, tasmā ete bhājanaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbā, naadhiṭṭhānūpagānavikappanūpagatāti
tika-vin09t0:365_1: atthoti ca. Samaṇasāruppena pakkanti ayopatto pañcahi pākehi pakko hoti, mattikāpatto
tika-vin09t0:365_3: katvā ‘purāṇapattaṃ paccuddharitvā’ti vutta”nti ca likhitaṃ, taṃ na yuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:365_4: “sanniccayaṃ kareyyāti anadhiṭṭhito avikappito”ti vuttattā. So hi kathinakkhandhake
tika-vin09t0:365_5: niccayasannidhi viya ekopi punadivase “sanniccayo”ti vuccati. Anantarasikkhāpade
tika-vin09t0:365_6: pana “dutiyo vārito”ti adhiṭṭhānaṃ niyataṃ. Tasmā dve patte adhiṭṭhātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin09t0:365_7: Sace ekato adhiṭṭhāti, dvepi anadhiṭṭhitā honti. Visuṃ visuṃ adhiṭṭhāti, dutiyo anadhiṭṭhito.
tika-vin09t0:365_8: Vikappetuṃ pana bahūpi labhati. Kākaṇikamattampīti ettha pi-kāro “ekapākampi janetī”ti
tika-vin09t0:365_9: pākaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Atha vā sace ekapākeneva sāruppo, vaṭṭatīti pākaparimāṇaṃ na vuttanti
tika-vin09t0:365_10: gahetabbaṃ. Apattattā adhiṭṭhānūpago na hoti. Apaccuddharantena vikappetabboti purāṇapattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:365_11: apaccuddharantena so patto vikappetabboti atthoti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:368: Pavāriteti ettha saṅghavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne pañcabandhaneneva vaṭṭati, puggalikavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne ūnapañcabandhanenāpi vaṭṭatīti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:369: Yo ūnapañcabandhanatthaṃ, vuttampi cetaṃ karo so;
tika-vin09t0:373_1: ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitanti likhitaṃ. “Yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti vacanena yesaṃ maṃsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:373_2: na kappati, tesaṃ sappiādi na kappatīti vadantā ajānitvā vadanti. Yesañhi maṃsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:373_4: Tathā paṇītabhojanasikkhāpade yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappati, tesaṃyeva khīrādi paṇītabhojanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:373_5: netaranti dassetuṃ vuttanti. Madhu nāma madhukaribhamaramakkhikānaṃ āsayesu niyyāsasadisaṃ
tika-vin09t0:373_6: mahāmadhu hoti, taṃ yāvajīvikanti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:380_0: Devadatto kāle viññāpetvā bhuñjati, tappaccayā bhagavatā “gaṇabhojane pācittiya”nti
tika-vin09t0:380_1: sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ. Padabhājane pana “nimantitā bhuñjantī”ti nimantanameva gahetvā
tika-vin09t0:380_2: vibhattaṃ. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vatthuvasena viññattiyā yācanampi vuttanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:380_3: Kasmā? Parivāre eva “gaṇabhojanaṃ dvīhākārehi pasavati viññattito vā nimantanato
tika-vin09t0:380_4: vā”ti vuttattā. Tasmā aṭṭhuppattiyaṃyeva pākaṭattā padabhājane na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:380_5: “‘Ekato gaṇhantī’ti ca gahitabhattāpi aññe yāva gaṇhanti, tāva ce tiṭṭhanti, ekato
tika-vin09t0:380_6: gaṇhanti eva nāmā”ti ca, “yo koci pabbajitoti sahadhammikesu, titthiyesu vāti attho”ti
tika-vin09t0:380_7: ca, “samayābhāvoti sattannaṃ anāpattisamayānaṃ abhāvo”ti ca, “samayaladdhakena saha
tika-vin09t0:380_8: cattāro hontī”ti ca, “samayaladdhako sayameva muccati, sesānaṃ gaṇapūrakattā āpattikaro
tika-vin09t0:381_0: Etthāha – “paṭiggahaṇameva hettha pamāṇa”nti vuttaṃ, atha kasmā pāḷiyaṃ “gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:381_1: nāma yattha cattāro…pe… bhuñjantī”ti vuttanti? Vuccate – tattha “bhuñjantī”ti paṭiggahaṇaniyamavacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:384_0: Aññatra samayāti pana nimantanato pasavanato bhojanāpekkhaṃ pācittiyanti eke. Eko
tika-vin09t0:384_1: bhikkhu piṇḍāya caranto bhattaṃ labhati, tamañño cūpāsako nimantetvā ghare nisīdāpesi,
tika-vin09t0:384_2: na ca tāva bhattaṃ sampajjati. Sace so bhikkhu piṇḍāya caritvā laddhabhattaṃ bhuñjati,
tika-vin09t0:384_3: āpatti. Kasmāti ce? “Paramparabhojanaṃ nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena
tika-vin09t0:384_4: nimantito taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati, etaṃ
tika-vin09t0:384_5: paramparabhojanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttattā. Paṭhamakathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:387_1: gahetabbā. “Mā kho tvaṃ ettha paṭiggaṇhī”ti apātheyyādiatthāya sajjitasaññāya atirekappaṭiggahaṇena
tika-vin09t0:387_2: ārocane, asaṃvibhāge ca na muccati acittakattā sikkhāpadassa. Atha uggahitakaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:387_3: na muccati eva. Asaṃvibhāge pana anāpatti akappiyattā. Acittakatā paṇṇattijānanābhāveneva,
tika-vin09t0:387_4: na vatthujānanābhāvenāti eke. “Na pātheyyādiatthāya sajjitabhāvajānana”nti aṅgesu
tika-vin09t0:387_5: avuttattā sace sañcicca na vadati, pācittiyanti porāṇā vadanti. Atirekappaṭiggahaṇanti
tika-vin09t0:387_6: tattha pañcamaṃva aṅgaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā appaṭiggahitattā na pācittiyaṃ, kattabbākaraṇato
tika-vin09t0:387_7: pana dukkaṭaṃ. Aññathā kiriyākiriyaṃ idaṃ āpajjati. Anivāraṇaṃ, anārocanaṃ vā chaṭṭhamaṅgaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin09t0:390_0: Bhuttāvī pavāraṇaṃ nāma pañcaṅgikaṃ. Tesu “asanaṃ paññāyattī”ti eteneva “bhuttāvī”ti
tika-vin09t0:390_1: etassa siddhattā visuṃ atthasiddhi na dissati. Dissati ce, aṅgānaṃ chakkattadassananti
tika-vin09t0:391_0: Koṭṭetvā katacuṇṇampīti pi-kārena kuṇḍakaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Samapākabhajjitānaṃ pana ātapasukkhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:391_1: vā kuṇḍakaṃ vā ye keci taṇḍulā vāti ettakameva vuttattā samapākabhajjitānaṃ vīhīnaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:391_2: vīhipalāsānaṃ vā taṇḍulacuṇṇaṃ pavāreti. Tathā kharapākabhajjitānaṃ kuṇḍakampi pavāreti.
tika-vin09t0:391_3: Bhajjitasattuyo piṇḍetvā kato apakkasattumodakopi pavāretīti likhitaṃ. Sace avasiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:391_4: natthi, na pavāreti. Kasmā? Asanasaṅkhātassa vippakatabhojanassa abhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:392_0: Akappiyamaṃsaṃ pana kiñcāpi paṭikkhipitabbaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ, khādiyamānaṃ pana maṃsabhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:392_1: na jahāti, tasmā pavāreti. Bhojanasālāya bhuñjanto ce attano apāpuṇanakoṭṭhāsaṃ abhihaṭaṃ
tika-vin09t0:392_2: paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti. Kāmaṃ paṭikkhipati, patte pana ārāmikā ākiranti, taṃ bhuñjituṃ
tika-vin09t0:392_3: na vaṭṭati. Idañhi buddhappaṭikuṭṭhāya anesanāya uppanneyeva saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Yathā
tika-vin09t0:392_4: hi saṅghato laddhaṃ piṇḍaṃ dussīlo deti, tañce paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti, evaṃsampadamidanti
tika-vin09t0:392_5: ca, vibhāgo lajjī ce deti, taṃ so na ajjhoharitukāmatāya paṭikkhipati, pavāretīti
tika-vin09t0:392_6: ca, “samaṃsarasaṃ samaccharasa”nti āpajjanato “maṃsarasa”nti vutte pana paṭikkhipato
tika-vin09t0:392_7: hoti, “maṃsassa rasaṃ maṃsarasa”nti ayaṃ viggaho nādhippetoti ca vuttaṃ. Bhattamissakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:392_8: yāguṃ āharitvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, na pavāreti. “Bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vutte
tika-vin09t0:392_9: pavāreti. Kasmā? Yenāpucchito, tassa atthitāya. Ettha pana “yāgumissakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin09t0:392_10: vadati, tatra ce yāgu bahutarā vā hoti, samasamā vā. Bhattaṃ mandaṃ, na pavāreti.
tika-vin09t0:392_11: Yāgu ce mandā, bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ, pavāreti. Idañca sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttattā na
tika-vin09t0:392_12: sakkā paṭikkhipituṃ. Kāraṇaṃ panettha duddasaṃ. “Bhattamissakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati.
tika-vin09t0:392_13: Tatra bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ vā samakaṃ vā appataraṃ vā hoti, pavāreti eva. Bhattaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:392_14: yāguṃ vā anāmasitvā “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati. Tatra ce bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ, samakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:392_15: vā hoti, pavāreti. Appataraṃ na pavāreti. Taṃ sabbaṃ vīmaṃsitabbanti.
tika-vin09t0:393_0: Phalaṃ vā kandamūlādi vā pañcahi samaṇakappehi kappiyaṃ akatanti ettha kappiyaṃ akārāpitehi
tika-vin09t0:393_1: kadaliphalādīhi saddhiṃ atirittaṃ kārāpetvāpi taṃ kadaliphalādiṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:393_2: bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Amissakarasattā puna tāni kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā aññasmiṃ bhājane
tika-vin09t0:393_3: ṭhapetvā kāretvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Pubbe tesu vinayakammassa anāruḷhattāti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:394_0: Patte rajaṃ patitaṃ appaṭiggahitameva hoti. Tasmā paṭiggahetvāva bhikkhā gaṇhitabbā.
tika-vin09t0:394_1: “Apaṭiggahetvā gaṇhato vinayadukkaṭa”nti vuttattā etamaññesampi na vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:394_2: “Taṃ pana puna paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantassa anāpattī”ti etthāpi evameva. Imasmiṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:394_3: “atirittaṃ kataṃ anatirittakataṃ hotī”ti etthāpi evameva. Imasmiṃ pana “atirittaṃ
tika-vin09t0:394_4: kataṃ, anatirittaṃ kataṃ hotī”tiādīhi upaparikkhitvā vinicchayo veditabboti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:394_5: Alametaṃ sabbanti idampi te adhikaṃ, ito aññaṃ na lacchasīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:395_0: Āhāratthāyāti vikāle evāti eke. “Paṭhamakathinasadisāni. Idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti
tika-vin09t0:395_1: pāṭho. Kāyakammaṃ ajjhoharaṇato. Vacīkammaṃ vācāya “atirittaṃ karotha, bhante”ti
tika-vin09t0:398: “Bhuttasmiṃ pācittiya”nti mātikāyaṃ vuttattā “bhojanapariyosāne pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ, na ajjhohāre ajjhohāre.
tika-vin09t0:404: “Duddhoto hotī”tiādinā nayena idha vuttattā, “duddhotaṃ pattaṃ dhovitvā puna
tika-vin09t0:405_0: Tattha acchodakaṃ vā āsiñcitvā, aṅguliyā vā ghaṃsitvā nisnehabhāvo jānitabbo”ti samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:405_1: vuttattā ca mattikāpattassa kapālena pīto sneho sannidhiṃ karotīti siddhanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:405_2: Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattamevāti ettha apariccattaṃ nāma anupasampannānaṃ nirapekkhaapariccattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:405_4: dhammasiritthero, taṃ “paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti pāḷiyā virujjhati. Tassa
tika-vin09t0:408_0: “Tesaṃ maṃsañca khīradadhīni ca idha adhippetānī”ti idaṃ pācittiyavatthuparicchedo,
tika-vin09t0:408_1: na pana kappiyakhīrādiparicchedo, tasmā yassa kassaci khīrādīni vaṭṭantīti ca, “mahānāmasikkhāpadena
tika-vin09t0:408_2: kāretabbo”ti saṅghavasena pavārite bhesajjatthāya sappiādibhesajjapañcakaṃ viññāpeti
tika-vin09t0:408_3: ce, tattha “na bhesajjakaraṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpetī”ti ettha saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:411_1: atthatesu na vaṭṭati, kallakhette tattha vaṭṭatī”ti ca, “sāmaṃ gahetvā”ti iminā na
tika-vin09t0:411_2: kevalaṃ sappadaṭṭhaṃyeva, aññampi daṭṭhaṃ viseseti. Sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:427: Catutthaṃ paṭhamāniyate, pañcamaṃ dutiyāniyate vuttanayameva. Idha pañcamaṃ upanandassa catutthaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:430_0: Sabhatto samānoti nimantanabhattoti porāṇā. Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ, anāpucchā, purebhattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:430_1: pacchābhattaṃ, aññatra samayāti ayamettha catubbidhā anupaññatti. Tattha samayā dve
tika-vin09t0:430_2: samayā. Bhattiyagharanti nimantitassa gharaṃ vā salākābhattādidāyakānaṃ vā gharaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:430_3: “Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamakathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho, “idha nimantanā
tika-vin09t0:432: Siyā paramparāpatti, pacchābhattaṃ na sā siyā.
tika-vin09t0:443_1: saṅghavasena pavārite bhesajjatthāya sappiādibhesajjapañcakaṃ viññāpeti ce, “nabhesajjena
tika-vin09t0:443_2: karaṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpetī”ti vacanena pācittiyanti likhitaṃ. “Tayā imināva pavāritamhā,
tika-vin09t0:443_3: amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca attho”ti yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhitvā viññāpetuṃ gilānova labhati,
tika-vin09t0:443_4: na itaroti ca, “aññassa atthāyā”ti assa ñātakappavārite, attano vā ñātakappavāriteti
tika-vin09t0:443_5: atthoti ca, “apariyantappavāraṇāya pavārite”ti saṅghavasena, puggalavasena ca pavāretvā
tika-vin09t0:443_6: dāyakā. Tasmā “saṅghappavāraṇatā”ti vatvā “puggalappavāraṇatā”ti na vuttanti ca,
tika-vin09t0:443_7: “pariyantātikkamo”ti vacanena gilāno gahito, tasmā “gilānāgilānatā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:443_8: Evaṃ santepi “saṅghappavāraṇāya pavāraṇatā”ti pāṭhoti ca likhitaṃ, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:446: Hatthiādīsu ekamekanti antamaso ekapurisāruḷhahatthimpi, ekaṃ sarahatthaṃ purisampi. Samuṭṭhānādīni eḷakalomasadisāni, idaṃ pana lokavajjaṃ, akusalacittaṃ tivedana”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:449: Kenaci palibuddhassāti verikena vā issarena vā kenaci ruddhassa. Senāparikkhepena vā parikkhepārahaṭṭhānena vā sañcaraṇaṭṭhānapariyantena vā paricchinditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:454_0: “Surā”ti vā “na vaṭṭatī”ti vā jānitvā pivane akusalamevāti likhitaṃ. Akusalacittanti
tika-vin09t0:454_1: yebhuyyena taṃ sandhāya kira vuttaṃ. Atha kasmā vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “akusaleneva pātabbatāyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:457_1: upasampanne eva pācittiyanti evaṃ puggalāpekkhaṃ dassetuṃ “aṅgulipatodake pācittiya”nti
tika-vin09t0:457_2: vuttaṃ. Sati karaṇīyeti ettha purisaṃ sati karaṇīye āmasatoti adhippāyo, na itthiṃ.
tika-vin09t0:460_0: “Cikkhallaṃ vā”ti vacanato sakkharampi khipanakīḷāya kīḷato dukkaṭameva. Uparigopphake
tika-vin09t0:460_1: pācittiyaṃ, aññattha dukkaṭanti pācittiyavatthuatthavasena “udake hasadhamme pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:463: Ettāvatā kathaṃ kīḷā, iti kīḷāyaṃ evāyaṃ;
tika-vin09t0:469_0: Tassa vacananti “ayaṃ ukkhittako vā vambhito vā garahito vā imassa vacanaṃ akataṃ
tika-vin09t0:469_1: bhavissatī”ti anādariyaṃ karoti. Dhammanti kathāyaṃ dhammo nasseyya vā vinasseyya
tika-vin09t0:469_2: vā antaradhāyeyya vā, taṃ vā asikkhitukāmo anādariyaṃ karoti. “Lokavajjaṃ atikkamitvā
tika-vin09t0:469_3: ‘idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyuggaho’ti vadantassa na vaṭṭatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:477: Morakkhimaṇḍalamaṅgulapiṭṭhīnanti na ekantato, adhikaṃ, orañcāti vadanti. Ekakoṇepi vaṭṭati, evaṃ yattha katthaci ekabindupi vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin09t0:480: “Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamakathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho. Ettha paribhogena kāyakammaṃ. Apaccuddharaṇena vacīkammaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:488: Vatthugaṇanāya kammabandhagaṇanācetanāmāraṇānaṃ, na kammabandhagaṇanāya cetanāmāraṇā. Ettha ekacetanāya bahupāṇakā marantīti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:491_0: Sappāṇakanti pāṇakānaṃ maraṇavasena pācittiyaṃ, na sappāṇakaudakaparibhogavasena
tika-vin09t0:491_1: pācittiyaṃ, tasmā eva “paṇṇattivajja”nti vuttaṃ. Asuddhacittattā pācittiyaṃ, suddhacitte
tika-vin09t0:491_2: anāpatti. Padīpujjalane viya paṇṇattivajjatā vuttāti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:493: Evaṃ ubhinnaṃ nānāttaṃ, ñeyyaṃ ñāṇavatā sadāti.
tika-vin09t0:499: Dukkaṭaṃ vihitaṃ yasmā, ācariyassa gaṇassa ca;
tika-vin09t0:503: Idha ekatoupasampannā, sikkhamānā, sāmaṇerīti imā tissopi saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, imāsaṃ pana tissannaṃ samayo rakkhati, ayamimāsaṃ, mātugāmassa ca visesoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:506_0: “Taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhenāti laddhinānāsaṃvāsakaṃ sandhāyā”ti likhitaṃ. Ticittanti
tika-vin09t0:506_1: ettha vipākābyākatacittena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyyāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Aññathā sacittakattā
tika-vin09t0:509_0: “Ayaṃ samaṇuddeso pārājiko hoti. Sace taṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjati, saṅghassa ārocetvā
tika-vin09t0:509_1: saṅghānumatiyā pabbājetabbo”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Daṇḍakammanāsanā
tika-vin09t0:509_2: hi idhādhippetā. Yadi so pārājiko hoti, liṅganāsanā nāma siyā. “Te paṭisevato nālaṃ
tika-vin09t0:509_3: antarāyāyā”ti ca diṭṭhi satthari asatthādidiṭṭhi na hoti. Sace sā yassa uppajjati,
tika-vin09t0:509_4: so pārājiko hoti, tasmimpi evameva paṭipajjitabbaṃ, saṃvare atiṭṭhanto liṅganāsanāya
tika-vin09t0:514_0: Aṅgesu na mokkhādhippāyatā viya amaraṇādhippāyatā vattabbāti ce? Na vattabbā. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:514_1: Yo bhikkhu sayaṃ pahāraṃ dātukāmo, so adhippāyena tassa maraṇe payogavirahovāti katvā
tika-vin09t0:514_2: amaraṇādhikārattā kevalaṃ amaraṇādhippāyo eva soti tā viya tā na vuttā. Mokkhādhippāyassa
tika-vin09t0:514_3: pana kopo natthi, tasmā anāpattīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:517_0: Talameva talasattikaṃ. “Pothanasamatthaṭṭhena sattika”nti eke. Yasmā paharitukāmatāya
tika-vin09t0:517_1: paharato purimena pācittiyaṃ, kevalaṃ uccāretukāmatāya uggiraṇamatte kate iminā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:517_2: Iminā pana virajjhitvā pahāro dinno, tasmā napaharitukāmatāya dinnattā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:517_3: Kimidaṃ dukkaṭaṃ pahārapaccayā, udāhu uggiraṇapaccayāti? Pahārapaccayā eva dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:517_4: purimaṃ uggiraṇapaccayā pācittiyanti sadukkaṭaṃ pācittiyaṃ yujjati. Purimañhi uggiraṇaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:517_5: pacchā pahāro. Na ca pacchimaṃ pahāraṃ nissāya purimaṃ uggiraṇaṃ anāpattivatthukaṃ
tika-vin09t0:520: Paro kukkuccaṃ uppādetu vā, mā vā, taṃ appamāṇaṃ. “Kukkuccupādana”nti tatiyamaṅgaṃ tassa adhippāyavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:523_0: Upassutinti yathā upakujjhaṃ “samīpakujjha”nti vuccati, tathā upassuti “samīpassutī”ti
tika-vin09t0:523_1: veditabbā. Yattha ṭhito suṇāti, taṃ ṭhānanti attho. Sutīti panettha paresaṃ vacanasaddo
tika-vin09t0:523_2: ca. So hi suyyatīti suti nāma. Upasuyyati vā etthāti upassuti. Okāso hi suti nāma.
tika-vin09t0:524_0: Samuṭṭhānādīni atītadvayasadisānīti na gahetabbāni. Theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Siyā
tika-vin09t0:524_1: kiriyaṃ gantvā savane. Siyā akiriyaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā vadantānaṃ ajānāpanavasena
tika-vin09t0:524_2: samuṭṭhānato. “Saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:527_0: Appamattakavissajjanakena pana cīvaraṃ karontassa senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttappabhedāni
tika-vin09t0:527_1: sūciādīni anapaloketvāpi dātabbāni. Tato atirekaṃ dentena apalokanakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:527_2: Evaṃ kataṃ pana apalokanaṃ kammalakkhaṇamevāti adhippāyo. Evaṃ sabbattha kammalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:527_3: veditabbaṃ. Gāmasīmāvihāresu osāraṇādīni saṅghakammāniyeva na vaṭṭanti. Vissajjiyavebhaṅgiyāni
tika-vin09t0:527_4: pana vaṭṭanti. “Saṅghassa santaka”nti sāmaññato avatvā “imasmiṃ vihāre saṅghassa
tika-vin09t0:527_5: santaka”nti apaloketabbanti ca, “samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedana”nti
tika-vin09t0:530: Sannipātaṃ anāgantvā ce chandaṃ na deti, anāpattīti eke. Dukkaṭanti eke dhammakammantarāyakaraṇādhippāyattā.
tika-vin09t0:533_1: demā”ti dinnaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tehi pana “vihārassa demā”ti vutte suvaṇṇarajatamayādiakappiyamañcāpi
tika-vin09t0:533_3: sace ārāmikādayo paṭisāmetvā paṭidenti, paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ca, “kaṃsalohādibhājanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:533_4: saṅghassa dinnampi pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttattā attano hatthena
tika-vin09t0:533_5: gahetvā paṭisāmituṃ na labhatīti ca, “vedhako kāyabandhanassāti vadantī”ti ca, “hiṅgu
tika-vin09t0:533_6: hiṅguliharitālamanosilā añjanānī”ti pāṭhoti ca, “dārumayo vā…pe… apādakopi samuggo”ti
tika-vin09t0:533_7: pāṭhoti ca, “dārumayo tumboti dārumayo udakatumbo”ti ca, “thambhatulāsopānaphalakādīsū”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:536_0: Eko bhikkhu ukkhittakassa dātukāmo hoti, tassa dānaṃ nivāretvā aññassa dāpeti, anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:536_1: Tathā saddhādeyyavinipātanaṃ karontassa dāpeti, attano nissitakā itthannāmassa pattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:536_2: dātukāmā āpucchanti, “visabhāgo eso, sabhāgassa dehī”ti vadati. Anāpatti attano bhārabhūtattā.
tika-vin09t0:536_3: Tassa pana dātukāmaṃ aññassa dāpeti, āpatti eva. Sabbattha āpucchitvā dātukāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ vicāretuṃ labhati.
tika-vin09t0:541_0: Asayanighareti parikkhittassa bahibhūtesu rukkhamūlādīsu. “Sace khattiyova hoti,
tika-vin09t0:541_1: nābhisitto, abhisittova hoti, na khattiyo, rakkhatī”ti ācariyo “khattiyatā, abhisittatā”ti
tika-vin09t0:541_2: āpattiyā aṅgabhāvena vuttattā. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamakathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:544: Sabbopi kathāmaggo bhaṇḍāgārikasīsena nikkhipanaṃ, gopanañca paṭikkhipitvā pavatto.
tika-vin09t0:547: “Santaṃ bhikkhu”nti ca “anāpucchā”ti ca “tathārūpā accāyikāti ca imāti ettha tisso”ti pāṭho. “Samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:550: Taṃ assāti taṃ bhedanakaṃ assa pācittiyassa atthi paṭhamaṃ bhedanaṃ katvā pacchā desetabbattā. Esa nayo itaresupi. Vāsijaṭeti vāsidaṇḍake.
tika-vin09t0:556: Kiñcāpi paṭilābheyeva pācittiyaṃ viya dissati, paribhoge eva pana āpatti daṭṭhabbā. “Aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanaṃ ettha sādhakaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:559_0: Kiñcāpi nisīdanassa jāti na dissati ettha, tathāpi cīvarakkhandhake anuññātattā,
tika-vin09t0:559_1: “nava cīvarāni adhiṭṭhātabbānī”ti ettha ca pariyāpannattā cīvarajāti evassa jātīti
tika-vin09t0:559_2: veditabbaṃ. “Lābhe sadasaṃ, alābhe adasampi vaṭṭatī”ti eke, taṃ na yuttaṃ “nisīdanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:565: Yāmakālikādīsu āhāratthāya eva dukkaṭaṃ. Tampi āmisena asambhinnarase, sambhinne pana ekarase pāṭidesanīyameva.
tika-vin09t0:571: Ārāme vā ārāmūpacāre vā paṭiggahetvā ajjhoharantassāti ārāme vā ārāmūpacāre vā paṭiggahetvā ārāme vā ārāmūpacāre vā ajjhoharantassāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:572_0: Bahārāme paṭiggahitaṃ ajjhārāme bhuñjantassa anāpatti. Aṅgesu ca “ajjhārāme vā ārāmūpacāre
tika-vin09t0:572_1: vā paṭiggahaṇa”nti gahetabbaṃ. Ajjhārāme hi dassite ārāmūpacāraṃ dassitamevāti. “Samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin09t0:576_0: Sekhiyesu satipi vītikkame anādariyāpekkhasseva āpattīti dassanatthaṃ kārako na vutto.
tika-vin09t0:576_1: Ayañhi vinayadhammatā, yadidaṃ sāpekkhe kārakaniddeso, so vuttaniyame vidhi, bhummakaraṇañca.
tika-vin09t0:576_2: Aṭṭhaṅgulādhikampi otāretvā nivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tato paraṃ otārentassa dukkaṭanti
tika-vin09t0:576_3: mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ārāme vāti buddhupaṭṭhānādikāle. Pārupitabbanti uttarāsaṅgakiccavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:577_0: Ṭhatvāti ettha gacchantopi parissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ labhatiyevāti likhitaṃ. Yathā
tika-vin09t0:577_1: vāsūpagatassa antaraghare kāyaṃ vivaritvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati, tathā tassa santike
tika-vin09t0:577_2: gantukāmassapi kāyabandhanaṃ abandhitvā saṅghāṭiṃ apārupitvā gāmappavesanamanārocetvā
tika-vin09t0:577_3: yathākāmaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmā addhānamaggagamanakāle eko bhikkhu gāmappavesanavattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:577_4: pūretvā gāmaṃ pavisitvā ekaṃ āvasathaṃ puratova ṭhitaṃ patvā parikkhāraṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin09t0:577_5: vāsūpagato ce hoti, itarehi tassa santikaṃ yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Ko pana vādo
tika-vin09t0:577_6: catūhapañcāhaṃ vāsamadhiṭṭhāya vasitabhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantuñca vāsūpagatānaṃ santikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:577_7: gantuñca vaṭṭatīti. Buddhapūjampi yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati. Vuttampi cetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:577_8: “anāpatti kāraṇaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ oloketī”ti. Tattha kāraṇaṃ nāma āmisapūjāti
tika-vin09t0:579_0: Yasmā “samatittiko piṇḍapāto paṭiggahetabbo”ti vacanaṃ piṇḍapāto samapuṇṇo paṭiggahetabboti
tika-vin09t0:579_1: dīpeti, tasmā attano hatthagate patte piṇḍapāto diyyamāno thūpīkatopi ce hoti, vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin09t0:579_2: dīpito hoti. Sūpodanaviññattiyaṃ mukhe pakkhipitvā vippaṭisāre uppanne puna uggiritukāmassāpi
tika-vin09t0:579_3: sahasā ce pavisati, ettha asañcicca bhuñjati nāma. Viññattikatañca akatañca ekasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:579_4: ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ sahasā anupadhāretvā gahetvā bhuñjati, assatiyā bhuñjati nāma.
tika-vin09t0:580: Sayaṃ yānagato hutvā, yathā yānagatassa ce;
tika-vin09t0:581: Alaṃ vatthuṃ tathā nālaṃ, sachatto chattapāṇino.
tika-vin09t0:582: “Sūpodanaviññattisikkhāpadaṃ theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedana”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:588: Abhilāpamattamevāti ettha daharavasena “bhante”ti ca vuḍḍhavasena “āvuso”ti ca tattha duvidho abhilāpo, idha pana vuḍḍhadaharānaṃ “ayyā”ti ekameva.
tika-vin09t0:589_0: Kāyasaṃsagge vuttanayenāti ettha tabbahulanayena kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā vuttā. “Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ
tika-vin09t0:589_1: samāpajjeyyā”ti avatvā pana “sādiyeyyā”ti vuttattā akiriyatopi samuṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:589_2: Yathā cettha, evaṃ heṭṭhā “manussitthiyā tayo magge methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa
tika-vin09t0:589_3: āpatti pārājikassā”tiādinā nayena kiriyasamuṭṭhānataṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ “bhikkhupaccatthikā
tika-vin09t0:589_4: manussitthiṃ bhikkhussa santikaṃ ānetvā vaccamaggena aṅgajātaṃ abhinisīdenti, so
tika-vin09t0:589_5: ce pavesanaṃ sādiyatī”tiādinā nayena akiriyasamuṭṭhānassapi vuttattā paṭhamapārājikāyapi
tika-vin09t0:589_6: tabbahulanayeneva kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā veditabbā. Na hi pavesanasādiyanādimhi kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā dissati.
tika-vin09t0:590_0: Aṅgajātacalanañcettha na sārato daṭṭhabbaṃ “so ce pavesanaṃ na sādiyati, paviṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:590_1: na sādiyati, ṭhitaṃ na sādiyati, uddharaṇaṃ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassā”ti ettha
tika-vin09t0:591_0: Apica bhikkhuniyāpi paṭhamapārājike tassa sādiyanassa sarūpena vuttattā tadanurūpavasena
tika-vin09t0:591_2: kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā vuttā, tathā surādīnaṃ akusaleneva pātabbatā. Itarathā “yaṃ akusaleneva
tika-vin09t0:591_3: āpajjati, ayaṃ lokavajjā, sesā paṇṇattivajjā”ti vutte lokavajjapaṇṇattivajjānaṃ niyamalakkhaṇasiddhi
tika-vin09t0:591_4: hoti, tathā taṃ avatvā “yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, ayaṃ lokavajjā,
tika-vin09t0:591_5: sesā paṇṇattivajjā”ti vutte lokavajjavacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā vatthuajānanapakkhepi
tika-vin09t0:591_6: akusaleneva pātabbattā. Yasmā tattha surāpānavītikkamassa akusalacittuppādo natthi,
tika-vin09t0:591_7: tasmā khandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “majjapāne pana bhikkhuno ajānitvāpi bījato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:591_8: majjaṃ pivantassa pācittiyaṃ. Sāmaṇero jānitvāva pivanto sīlabhedaṃ āpajjati, na
tika-vin09t0:591_9: ajānitvā”ti vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ “vatthuajānanapakkhe pāṇātipātādīnaṃ siddhikaraakusalacittuppādasadise
tika-vin09t0:591_10: cittuppāde satipi sāmaṇero sīlabhedaṃ nāpajjatī”ti. Abhinivesavacanaṃ pāṇātipātādīhi
tika-vin09t0:591_11: samānagatikattā sāmaṇerānaṃ surāpānassa. “Surāmerayime”ti vatthuṃ jānitvā pātabbatādivasena
tika-vin09t0:591_12: vītikkamantassa akusalassa asambhavo natthi. Tena vuttaṃ “yassā sacittakapakkhe”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:592_0: Kiñcettha – yuttivacanena arahantānaṃ appavisanato sacittakācittakapakkhesu akusalaniyamoti
tika-vin09t0:592_1: ce? Na, dhammatāvasena sekkhānampi appavisanato. Acittakapakkhe akusalaniyamābhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:592_2: supantassa mukhe pakkhittajalabindumiva surābinduādayo udāharitabbā. Tabbahulanayena
tika-vin09t0:592_3: hi atthe gahite pubbenāparaṃ aṭṭhakathāya sameti saddhiṃ pāḷiyā cāti. Ācariyāpi surāpāne
tika-vin09t0:592_4: akusalaniyamābhāvameva vadanti. Ekacce pana kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā panassa tabbahulanayameva,
tika-vin09t0:592_5: na paṭhamapārājike. Kathaṃ? Kāyasaṃsaggasikkhāpadaṃ paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Ettha
tika-vin09t0:592_6: bhikkhussa ca bhikkhuniyā ca kāyasaṃsaggabhāve sati bhikkhunī kāyaṅgaṃ acopayamānāpi
tika-vin09t0:592_7: citteneva adhivāseti, āpajjati, na evaṃ bhikkhu. Bhikkhu pana copayamānova āpajjati,
tika-vin09t0:592_8: evameva paṭhamapārājikepi copane sati eva āpajjati, nāsati. Pavesanaṃ sādiyatīti
tika-vin09t0:592_9: ettha pavesanasādiyanaṃ nāma sevanacittuppādanaṃ, maggena vā maggappaṭipannampi icchanti.
tika-vin09t0:592_10: Tassāpi kāyacalanaṃ ekantaṃ atthi eva. Evaṃ santepi vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbanti vadantīti likhitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:596_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ patvā vuṭṭhānavidhayo sandassanatthaṃ “ayaṃ bhikkhunī…pe…
tika-vin09t0:596_1: āpannā”ti puggalaniyamaṃ katvā pārājikato adhippāyanti “nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesa”nti
tika-vin09t0:596_2: āpattināmaggahaṇañca kataṃ. “Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamakathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyamevā”ti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:599: Katthaci agantvā nisinnaṭṭhāne eva nisīditvā karontiyā vācācittato, khaṇḍasīmādigatāya kāyavācācittato.
tika-vin09t0:602_0: “Ābhogaṃ vinā”ti vuttattā ābhoge sati anāpatti, imasmiṃ pana sikkhāpade samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:602_1: upacārātikkame āpatti vuttā, idha okkame. Dvīsupi vuttaṃ atthato ekameva gāmantaragamanasaṅghādisesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:602_2: upacārassa sandhāya vuttattā. Gaṇamhā ohīyanassa virodho. “Araññe”ti idaṃ atthavasena
tika-vin09t0:603: Sikkhāpadā buddhavarena vaṇṇitāti gāthāya vasena, aṭṭhakathāyampi gāmantarapariyāpannaṃ nadipāranti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:608: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjaṃ;
tika-vin09t0:610_0: Imāya virujjhati. Tasmā pamādalekhā viya dissatīti gavesitabbo ettha attho. Bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:610_2: dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā”ti vuttaṃ, idha pana “gāmūpacārato ca bhikkhūnaṃ vihārūpacārato
tika-vin09t0:610_3: ca dve leḍḍupāte”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatra bhikkhūnaṃ vuttappakārappadesaṃ atikkamitvā
tika-vin09t0:610_4: gāmepi taṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, bhikkhunīnaṃ pana gāme na vaṭṭati. Tasmā evaṃ vuttanti
tika-vin09t0:610_5: eke. Apare pana bhikkhūnampi gāme na vaṭṭati. Bhikkhuvihāro nāma pubbe eva gāmūpacāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:610_6: atikkamitvā ṭhito, tasmā gāmaṃ avatvā vihārūpacārameva heṭṭhā vuttaṃ. Bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:610_7: vihāro gāme eva vaṭṭati, na bahi, tasmā gāmūpacārañca vihārūpacārañca ubhayamevettha
tika-vin09t0:610_8: dassitaṃ. Tasmā ubhayatthāpi atthato nānāttaṃ natthīti vadanti. Yaṃ yujjati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:613: Dutiye idha bhājāpitāya laddhacīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti, taṃ vinayakammaṃ katvāpi attanā na labbhati.
tika-vin09t0:614: Tatiye “samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedana”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:615: Catutthe paṭhamaṃ viññattaṃ alabhitvā aññaṃ tato ūnatarampi labheyya, nissaggiyameva aṅgasampattito.
tika-vin09t0:619_0: Paṭhame haritapattavaṇṇo haritako. Cāpalasuṇaṃ amiñjako. Aṅkuramattameva hi tassa
tika-vin09t0:619_1: hoti. Palaṇḍukādayo sabhāveneva vaṭṭanti. Sūpasampākādī vināpi antamaso yāgubhattepi
tika-vin09t0:619_2: pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti likhitaṃ, “bhikkhuniyāpi gilānāya purebhattameva lasuṇaṃ kappati,
tika-vin09t0:620: Dutiye ābādhapaccayā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ āpucchitvā saṃharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati, bhikkhussa ettha ca lasuṇe ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:622: Navame kuṭṭo nāma gharakuṭṭo. Pākāro nāma parikkhepapākāro.
tika-vin09t0:623_0: Chaḍḍitakhetteti purāṇakhette. Saṅghasantake bhikkhussa chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati saṅghapariyāpannattā.
tika-vin09t0:623_1: Bhikkhunīnampi saṅghasantake bhikkhusaṅghasantake vuttanayeneva vaṭṭati. Evaṃ santepi
tika-vin09t0:624_0: Dasame “sayaṃ tāni vatthūni karontiyā”tiādi idha sikkhāpade natthi. Kasmā? Eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānattā.
tika-vin09t0:624_1: Yadi evaṃ kasmā vuttanti ce? Suttānulomamahāpadesato. Yadi naccādīni passituṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:624_2: suṇituṃ vā na labhati, pageva attanā kātunti nayato labbhamānattā vuttaṃ. Itarathā
tika-vin09t0:624_3: mahāpadesā niratthakā siyuṃ. “Evaṃ aññatthapi nayo netabbo. Samuṭṭhānampi idha vuttameva
tika-vin09t0:624_4: aggahetvā chasamuṭṭhānavasena gahetabba”nti ācariyā. Idha vuttaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ nāma
tika-vin09t0:624_5: mūlabhūtassa antarā vuttāpattiyā, tasmā eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānamevāti apare. Ārāme ṭhatvāti
tika-vin09t0:624_6: na kevalaṃ ṭhatvā, tato gantvā pana sabbiriyāpathehipi labhati. Ārāme ṭhitāti pana
tika-vin09t0:624_7: ārāmapariyāpannāti attho. Itarathā nisinnāpi na labheyyāti.
tika-vin09t0:627: Pañcame upacāro dvādasahattho. “Samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:628: Sattame dhuvapaññatteti bhikkhunīnaṃ atthāya. Kulānīti kulagharāni.
tika-vin09t0:633: Chaṭṭhe aññasmiṃ parikkhāre dukkaṭanti thālakādīnaṃ vā sappitelādīnaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ.
tika-vin09t0:639: “Cittāgāraṃ nāma yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kataṃ hotī”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā cittāgārādīni sabbesaṃ atthāya katāni, na rañño eva.
tika-vin09t0:640: Sattame etena nissajjituṃ kappiyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Nissajjitvā paribhuñjatī”ti pāḷi ca atthi. “Samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho. Aṭṭhamepi esova pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:643: Dasame “samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:646: Paṭhamadutiyatatiyesu “gihigatā”ti vā “kumāribhūtā”ti vā na vattabbā. Vadanti ce, kammaṃ kuppati.
tika-vin09t0:647_0: Ekādasame chandaṃ avissajjetvāti “yathāsukha”nti avatvā. Ettha pana ayaṃ vinicchayo
tika-vin09t0:647_2: vuttaṃ. Etassa pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ “vuṭṭhitāya parisāyāti chandaṃ vissajjetvā
tika-vin09t0:647_3: kāyena vā vācāya vā chandavissajjanamattena vā vuṭṭhitāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Idha chandassa
tika-vin09t0:647_4: pana avissaṭṭhattā kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Tasmā chandaṃ avissajjetvāva dvādasahatthapāse
tika-vin09t0:650: Tatiye “sesaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ, idaṃ pana akusalacitta”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:652: Ekādasame “samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:653: Dvādasame “samuṭṭhānādīni padasodhammasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:654_0: Terasame “saṃkaccikaṃ nāma adhakkhakaṃ ubbhanābhi, tassā paṭicchādanatthāyā”ti pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:654_2: Aparikkhepe āpattiparicchedaṃ samantapāsādikavasena aggahetvā idha vuttanayena gahetabbanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:658_0: Samuṭṭhānānaṃ vinicchaye pana giraggasamajjādīni “acittakāni lokavajjānī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin09t0:658_1: “nacca”nti vā “gandha”nti vā ajānitvāpi dassanena, vilimpanena vā āpajjanato vatthuajānanacittena
tika-vin09t0:658_2: acittakāni. “Nacca”nti vā “gandha”nti vā jānitvā passantiyā, vilimpantiyā vā akusalattā
tika-vin09t0:658_3: eva lokavajjāni. Corivuṭṭhāpanādīni “corī”tiādinā vatthuṃ jānitvā karaṇeyeva āpajjanattā
tika-vin09t0:660: Vuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ dvidhā idha, sakanāmena aññātaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:664: Ekaṃ lomādike matanti, ayaṃ bhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:665: Sesamettha uttānaṃ, anuttānatthe vuttavinicchayattā na uddhaṭanti;
tika-vin09t0:677: Bodhitohaṃ sadā vande, taṃ saṅghaṃ kumudākaraṃ.
tika-vin09t0:686: Sādhavo taṃ nisāmetha, sakkaccaṃ mama bhāsatoti.
tika-vin09t0:688_1: atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmoyamācariyo paṭhamaṃ tāva “buddhaṃ dhamma”ntiādinā ratanattayappaṇāmakaraṇena
tika-vin09t0:688_2: attano cittasantānaṃ punāti. Visuddhacittasantānanissayā hi paññā tikkhavisadabhāvappattiyā
tika-vin09t0:689_0: Tattha buddhasaddassa tāva “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:689_1: niddesanayena attho veditabbo. Atha vā savāsanāya aññāṇaniddāya accantavigamato,
tika-vin09t0:689_2: buddhiyā vā vikasitabhāvato buddhavāti buddho jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena. Atha vā
tika-vin09t0:689_3: kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena, ñeyyavisesassa ca kammabhāvena
tika-vin09t0:689_4: aggahaṇato kammavacanicchāya abhāvena avagamanatthavaseneva kattuniddeso labbhatīti
tika-vin09t0:689_5: buddhavāti buddho yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti. Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvitena
tika-vin09t0:690: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto, balesu ca vasībhāva”nti,
tika-vin09t0:692_0: Dhāretīti dhammo. Ayañhi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyadukkhe, saṃsāradukkhe
tika-vin09t0:692_1: ca apatamāne dhāretīti, tannibbattakakilesaviddhaṃsanañcettha dhāraṇaṃ. Evañca katvā
tika-vin09t0:692_2: ariyamaggo, tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāya nibbānañcāti ubhayameva nippariyāyato dhāreti.
tika-vin09t0:692_4: ca tadadhigamahetutāyāti ubhayampi pariyāyato dhāretīti veditabbaṃ, taṃ dhammaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:692_5: Ca-saddo samuccayattho. Tena yathāvuttaṃ buddhaṃ, imañca dhammaṃ vanditvāti buddharatanena
tika-vin09t0:693_0: Na kevalaṃ idaṃ dvayamevāti āha “saṅghañcā”ti. Ariyena diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhato
tika-vin09t0:693_1: ghaṭitoti saṅgho, aṭṭhaariyapuggalasamūho. Tehi tehi vā maggaphalehi kilesadarathānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:693_3: pubbabhāgappaṭipadāya ṭhitattā purimacetanāya viya dāne ettheva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:693_4: Sopi hi kiñcāpi ariyena diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena asaṃhato, niyyānikapakkhiyena pana pothujjanikena
tika-vin09t0:693_5: saṃhatattā dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātāraho saṅghoyevāti, taṃ saṅghaṃ. Ca-saddassattho etthāpi
tika-vin09t0:694_2: vandanāmānapūjāsakkārabhājanaṃ saṅghañcā”ti. Tattha sadevakena lokena arahatādīhi
tika-vin09t0:694_3: guṇehi seṭṭhabhāvena kariyamāno paṇāmo vandanā, sammāno māno, gandhapupphādīhi upahāro
tika-vin09t0:694_4: pūjā, abhisaṅkhatapaccayadānaṃ sakkāro, vandanā ca māno ca pūjā ca sakkāro ca vandanāmānapūjāsakkārā,
tika-vin09t0:694_6: Iminā ratanattayassa arahatādīhi guṇehi asamabhāvaṃ dasseti. Tandassanampi takkatassa
tika-vin09t0:694_7: nipaccakārassa sasantānapavanādivasena yathādhippetāya atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya nipphādanasamatthabhāvadīpanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:695_1: visesena vā pasannena manasā saddhiṃ kāyavācāhi karaṇabhūtāhi abhivandiyāti attho,
tika-vin09t0:695_2: tīhi dvārehi namassitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tividhā cāyaṃ vandanā kāyavacīmanovandanānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:695_3: vasena. Tattha buddhādiguṇārammaṇā kāmāvacarakusalakiriyānaṃ aññataracetanā kāyavacīviññattiyo
tika-vin09t0:695_4: samuṭṭhāpetvā kāyavacīdvāravasena uppannā kāyavacīvandanāti vuccati, ubhayaviññattiyo
tika-vin09t0:695_5: pana asamuṭṭhāpetvā manodvāravasena uppannā manovandanāti. Imassa padassa “vaṇṇanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:696_0: Evaṃ ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ dassetvā idāni attano nissayabhūtānaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyānañca
tika-vin09t0:696_2: namo katvāti sambandho. Kato añjali karapuṭo etenāti katañjalī. Chandānurakkhaṇatthañhettha
tika-vin09t0:696_3: dīgho, katañjalī hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pubbācariyā porāṇaṭṭhakathākārā tambapaṇṇiyā
tika-vin09t0:696_4: mahātherā, te eva parissayasahanato, paṭipakkhabhūtakilesahananato, paravādimigehi
tika-vin09t0:696_5: apadhaṃsanīyato ca sīhasadisattā sīhāti pubbācariyasīhā, tesaṃ pubbācariyasīhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:696_6: Kīdisā te pubbācariyasīhā, yesaṃ tayā namo karīyatīti āha “theravaṃsappadīpāna”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:696_7: Tattha theravaṃsappadīpānanti thirehi sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgatāti therā, mahākassapādayo,
tika-vin09t0:696_8: tesaṃ vaṃso anvayoti theravaṃso. Etena bhinnaladdhikānaṃ sattarasabhedānaṃ mahāsaṅghikādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:696_9: vaṃsaṃ paṭikkhipati, theravaṃsapariyāpannā hutvā pana āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena
tika-vin09t0:696_10: tassa theravaṃsassa dīpanato theravaṃsappadīpā, pubbācariyasīhā, tesaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:696_11: Asaṃhīrattā thirānaṃ. Vinayakkameti ārambhānurūpavacanametaṃ, te pana suttābhidhammesupi thirā eva.
tika-vin09t0:697_0: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyānampi paṇāmaṃ dassetvā idāni saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammavisesassa abhidhānānisaṃsaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:697_1: desakasampattiyo ca dassento “pāmokkha”ntiādimāha. Tattha mahesinā yaṃ pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:697_2: pakāsitanti sambandho. Tattha mahesināti mahante sīlādike pañca dhammakkhandhe esī
tika-vin09t0:697_3: gavesīti mahesi. Mahantehi esitoti vā puthujjanasekhāsekhaisīhi visiṭṭhattā mahanto
tika-vin09t0:697_4: isīti vā mahesi, sammāsambuddho, tena mahesinā. Pātimokkhanti sattāpattikkhandhasaṃvarabhūtaṃ
tika-vin09t0:697_6: Kimbhūtanti āha “pāmokkha”ntiādi. Pamukhe sādhūti pamokkhaṃ, pamokkhameva pāmokkhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:697_8: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādi patiṭṭhābhūtanti attho. “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ
tika-vin09t0:697_9: paññañca bhāvaya”nti hi vuttaṃ. Mukhamivāti mukhaṃ, dvāraṃ. Yathā hi sattānaṃ khajjabhojjaleyyapeyyavasena
tika-vin09t0:697_10: catubbidhopi āhāro mukhena pavisitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni pharati, evaṃ yoginopi cātubhūmakakusalaṃ
tika-vin09t0:697_11: sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṃ sampādeti. Tena vuttaṃ “mukhamivāti mukha”nti.
tika-vin09t0:697_12: Atha vā mukhaṃ dvāraṃ mokkhappavesāya nibbānasacchikiriyāyāti attho. Vuttañhi –
tika-vin09t0:700_0: “Avippaṭisāro pāmojjatthāya, pāmojjaṃ pītatthāya, pīti passaddhatthāya, passaddhi
tika-vin09t0:700_1: sukhatthāya, sukhaṃ samādhatthāya, samādhi yathābhūtañāṇadassanatthāya, yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:700_2: nibbidatthāya, nibbidā virāgatthāya, virāgo vimuttatthāya, vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanatthāya,
tika-vin09t0:701_0: Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammassa abhidhānādiṃ dassetvā idāni saṃvaṇṇanāya nimittaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:701_1: “sūratenā”tiādinā catutthagāthamāha. Tattha sūratenāti sobhane ratoti sūrato u-kārassa
tika-vin09t0:701_2: dīghaṃ katvā, tena sūratena, sobhane kāyikavācasikakamme ratenāti attho, vinītenāti
tika-vin09t0:701_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Nivātenāti nīcavuttinā. Sucisallekhavuttināti sucibhūtā kilesasallikhanasamatthā
tika-vin09t0:701_4: vutti paṭipatti etassāti sucisallekhavutti, tena sucisallekhavuttinā, parisuddhāya
tika-vin09t0:701_6: Atha vā vinayoti cettha pātimokkhasaṃvarādibhedo saṃvaravinayo. Ācāroti ācāragocaraniddese
tika-vin09t0:701_7: āgatasamaṇasāruppācāro. Soṇattherenāti ettha soṇoti tassa nāmaṃ. Thirehi sīlakkhandhādīhi
tika-vin09t0:701_8: samannāgatattā thero. Yācitoti abhiyācito. Thero hi pātimokkhassa gambhīratāya duravagāhataṃ,
tika-vin09t0:701_9: ācariyassa ca taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya sāmatthiyaṃ ñatvā “pātimokkhassa tayā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā
tika-vin09t0:701_10: kātabbā. Evañhi sāsanassa suciraṭṭhitikatā hotī”ti sānisaṃsagāravena yācanaṃ akāsi.
tika-vin09t0:701_11: Tadassa yācanaṃ attano saṃvaṇṇanāya nidānabhūtaṃ dassento “yācito”ti āha.
tika-vin09t0:702_0: Ettha ca “sūratenā”ti imināssa soraccaṃ vuccati. “Nivātenā”ti iminā nīcamanatā nivātavuttitā,
tika-vin09t0:702_1: yāya nivātavuttitāya samannāgato puggalo nihatamāno, nihatadappo, pādapuñchanacoḷakasamo,
tika-vin09t0:702_2: bhinnavisāṇūsabhasamo, uddhaṭadāṭhasappasamo ca hutvā saṇho sakhilo sukhasambhāso
tika-vin09t0:702_5: tassa abhitthavanaṃ yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgatassa sabrahmacārino ajjhesanaṃ na sakkā
tika-vin09t0:702_6: paṭibāhitunti paramagambhīrassāpi pātimokkhassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pavattāti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:702_7: Kiñca – tādisassa ajjhesanaṃ nissāya kariyamānā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā tassa ajjhesanādhipaccena,
tika-vin09t0:702_8: mamañca ussāhasampattiyā na cirena pariyosānaṃ gacchatīti katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:703_0: Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāya nimittaṃ dassetvā idāni tassavane sotujanassādaraṃ janetuṃ tappayojanakaraṇappakāranissayābhidhānādiṃ
tika-vin09t0:703_1: dassento “tatthā”tiādigāthādvayamāha. Tattha tatthāti “yaṃ mahesinā pātimokkhaṃ pakāsita”nti
tika-vin09t0:703_2: vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ pātimokkhe. Sañjātakaṅkhānanti padapadatthavinicchayavasena sañjātakaṅkhānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:703_4: Tassāti pātimokkhassa. Vaṇṇīyati attho kathīyati etāyāti vaṇṇanā, aṭṭhakathā, taṃ
tika-vin09t0:703_5: vaṇṇanaṃ. Imassa ca “vaṇṇayissāmī”ti iminā sambandho. Kiṃbhūtanti āha “paripuṇṇavinicchaya”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:703_7: ca nidānādivasena sattarasappabhedassa ca sabbasikkhāpadasādhāraṇavinicchayassa pakāsanato
tika-vin09t0:704_0: Mahāvihāravāsīnanti mahāmeghavanuyyānabhūmibhāge patiṭṭhito vihāro mahāvihāro, yo
tika-vin09t0:704_1: satthuno mahābodhinā vibhūsito, tattha vasanti sīlenāti mahāvihāravāsino, tesaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:704_3: sīhaḷaṭṭhakathānayaṃ idha nissāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vaṇṇayissāmīti pavattayissāmi. Nāmenāti
tika-vin09t0:704_4: attano guṇanāmena. Kaṅkhāvitaranti etāyāti kaṅkhāvitaraṇī, taṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiṃ. Subhanti
tika-vin09t0:704_6: ca subhaṃ parisuddhaṃ. Ettha ca “kaṅkhāvitaraṇatthāyā”ti iminā payojanaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin09t0:704_9: iminā attano ajjhāsayaṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Vattayissāmī”tipi pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:707_0: Evaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmādisahitaṃ saññādikaṃ dassetvā idāni “pātimokkhassa vaṇṇanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:707_1: vaṇṇayissāmī”ti vuttattā pātimokkhaṃ tāva vacanatthato, sarūpabhedato, ganthabhedato,
tika-vin09t0:707_2: uddesavibhāgato, uddesaparicchedato ca vavatthapetvā taduddesakkamenāyaṃ vaṇṇanā
tika-vin09t0:708_0: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ gāthāpade. Paatimokkhanti pakārato ativiya sīlesu mukhabhūtaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:708_1: Atipamokkhanti tameva padaṃ upasaggabyattayena vadati. Atha vā pa ati mokkhanti padacchedo,
tika-vin09t0:708_2: tassa upasaggabyattayenatthamāha “atipamokkha”nti. Evaṃ pabhedato padavaṇṇanaṃ katvā
tika-vin09t0:708_3: saddatthato vadati “atiseṭṭhaṃ atiuttamanti attho”ti. Ettha ca sīlapātimokkhaṃ sabbaguṇānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:708_4: mūlabhāvato seṭṭhaṃ, ganthapātimokkhaṃ pana seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato seṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:708_5: Uttamanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Itīti evaṃ. Iminā yathāvuttavacanatthaṃ nidasseti.
tika-vin09t0:708_6: Nidassanattho hi ayaṃ iti-saddo “sabbamatthīti kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto, sabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:708_7: natthīti kho, kaccāna, ayaṃ dutiyo anto”tiādīsu viya. Imināti āsannapaccakkhavacanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:708_8: iti-saddena anantaranidassitassa, paṭiggāhakehi ca sotaviññāṇādivīthiyā paṭipannassa
tika-vin09t0:708_9: vacanatthassa vacanato. Atha vā imināti āsannapaccakkhabhāvakaraṇavacanaṃ yathāvuttassa
tika-vin09t0:708_11: ekakoṭṭhāsampi. Sīlaganthabhedato duvidhaṃ hotīti puna sīlaganthasaṅkhātena pabhedena
tika-vin09t0:708_12: duvidhaṃ hoti, sīlapātimokkhaṃ, ganthapātimokkhañcāti duvidhaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:709_0: Idāni tadubhayassāpi sutte āgatabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pāti
tika-vin09t0:709_1: rakkhatīti pāti, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhaṃ, saṃvaraṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:709_2: saṃvaro, kāyavācāhi avītikkamo, pātimokkhameva saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro, pātimokkhasaṃvarena
tika-vin09t0:710: Ādimetanti etaṃ sikkhāpadasīlaṃ pubbuppattiatthena ādi. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:711: “Tasmātiha tvaṃ, uttiya, ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. Ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ? Sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ, diṭṭhi ca ujukā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:712_0: Yathā hi nagaravaḍḍhakī nagaraṃ māpetukāmo paṭhamaṃ nagaraṭṭhānaṃ sodheti, tato aparabhāge
tika-vin09t0:712_1: vīthicatukkasiṅghāṭakādiparicchedena vibhajitvā nagaraṃ māpeti, yathā vā pana rajako
tika-vin09t0:712_2: paṭhamaṃ tīhi khārehi vatthaṃ dhovitvā parisuddhe vatthe yadicchakaṃ raṅgajātaṃ upaneti,
tika-vin09t0:712_3: yathā vā pana cheko cittakāro rūpaṃ likhitukāmo āditova bhittiparikammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:712_4: tato aparabhāge rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, evameva yogāvacaro āditova sīlaṃ visodhetvā aparabhāge
tika-vin09t0:712_5: samathavipassanādayo dhamme sacchikaroti. Tasmā sīlaṃ “ādī”ti vuttaṃ. “Mukhameta”ntiādīni
tika-vin09t0:713_0: Sīlanti cārittavārittavasena duvidhaṃ vinayapiṭakapariyāpannaṃ sikkhāpadasīlaṃ, dhammato
tika-vin09t0:713_1: pana sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa, vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo
tika-vin09t0:713_2: dhammā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “kiṃ sīlanti cetanā sīlaṃ cetasikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:713_3: sīlaṃ saṃvaro sīlaṃ avītikkamo sīla”nti “ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhānī”ti bhikkhubhikkhunīpātimokkhavasena
tika-vin09t0:713_4: ubhayāni pātimokkhāni, dve mātikāti attho. Assāti bhikkhunovādakassa. Vitthārenāti
tika-vin09t0:713_5: ubhatovibhaṅgena saddhiṃ. Svāgatānīti suṭṭhu āgatāni. Ādisaddena “pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyā”tiādipāḷiṃ
tika-vin09t0:713_6: saṅgaṇhāti. Tatthāti tesu sīlaganthapātimokkhesu. Yoti aniyamaniddeso, yo koci puggalo.
tika-vin09t0:713_7: Nanti vinayapariyāpannasīlaṃ. Rakkhatīti samādiyitvā avikopento pāleti. Taṃ “pātī”ti
tika-vin09t0:713_8: laddhanāmaṃ pātimokkhasīle ṭhitaṃ. Mocetīti sahakārikāraṇabhāvato mokkheti. Apāye
tika-vin09t0:713_9: jātaṃ āpāyikaṃ, dukkhaṃ, taṃ ādi yesaṃ tāni āpāyikādīni. Ādisaddena tadaññaṃ sabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:713_10: saṃsāradukkhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Attānuvādādīhīti attānaṃ anuvādo attānuvādo, so ādi yesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:713_11: tāni attānuvādādīni, tehi attānuvādādīhi. Ādisaddena parānuvādadaṇḍaduggatibhayāni
tika-vin09t0:713_12: saṅgaṇhāti. Tassa pātimokkhassa jotakattāti tassa sīlapātimokkhassa dīpanattā. Ādimhi
tika-vin09t0:713_13: pana vutto vacanatthoti “atiseṭṭha”ntiādinā ādimhi vutto vacanattho. Ubhinnampi sādhāraṇo
tika-vin09t0:713_14: hoti sīlapātimokkhaṃ sabbaguṇānaṃ mūlabhāvato seṭṭhaṃ, ganthapātimokkhaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato seṭṭhanti.
tika-vin09t0:714_1: Ganthapātimokkhassa tāva yujjatu, kathaṃ sīlapātimokkhassa yujjatīti āha “ganthe
tika-vin09t0:714_2: hī”tiādi. Hīti kāraṇatthe nipāto. Tassāti ganthassa. Atthoti sīlaṃ. Vaṇṇitova hotīti
tika-vin09t0:714_3: ganthavaṇṇanāmukhena atthasseva vaṇṇanato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā ganthe vaṇṇite
tika-vin09t0:714_4: tadavinābhāvato tassattho vaṇṇito hoti, tasmā sīlapātimokkhassapi yujjatīti.
tika-vin09t0:715_0: Evaṃ sarūpabhedato vavatthapetvā idāni ganthabhedato vavatthapetuṃ “taṃ paneta”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:715_1: Tatthāti tesu bhikkhupātimokkhabhikkhunīpātimokkhesu dvīsu. Uddesā paricchijjanti
tika-vin09t0:715_2: yehi vakkhamānavacanappabandhehi, te uddesaparicchedā, tehi. Vavatthitanti asaṅkarato ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:716_0: Evaṃ ganthabhedato vavatthapetvā idāni uddesavibhāgato vavatthapetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:716_1: Uddisīyati sarūpena kathīyati ettha, etenāti vā uddeso, nidānassa uddesoti nidānuddeso.
tika-vin09t0:717_1: Tattha tatthāti tesu pañcasu uddesesu. Nidānuddeso uddiṭṭho hotīti sambandho. Yaṃ
tika-vin09t0:717_2: panettha nidānuddesaparicchedaṃ dassentena “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho…pe… āvikatā
tika-vin09t0:717_3: hissa phāsu hotī”ti idhāgatanidānapāḷiṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ uddesakāle vattabbassāpi
tika-vin09t0:717_4: “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna”nti imassa pāṭhassa yojanaṃ akatvā “tatthāyasmante
tika-vin09t0:717_5: pucchāmī”tiādinā anusāvanādikameva yojetvā dassitaṃ, taṃ pana aparipuṇṇanidānapāḷidassanapubbakanidānuddesaparicchedadassanatthaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:717_6: khuddakapeyyālavasena vā pākaṭattā tassa ayojanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ, uddesakāle
tika-vin09t0:717_7: pana yojetvāva vattabbaṃ. Vakkhati hi “taṃ panetaṃ pārājikādīnaṃ avasāne dissati,
tika-vin09t0:717_8: na nidānāvasāne. Kiñcāpi na dissati, atha kho uddesakāle ‘āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī’ti
tika-vin09t0:717_9: vatvā ‘uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ, tatthāyasmante pucchāmī’tiādinā nayena vattabbamevā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:717_10: Avasese sutena sāviteti avasiṭṭhaṃ pārājikuddesādicatukkaṃ “sutā kho panāyasmantehi
tika-vin09t0:717_11: cattāro pārājikā dhammā…pe… avivadamānehi sikkhitabba”nti evaṃ sutavasena sāvite.
tika-vin09t0:718_0: Eteneva nayena sesā tayo pātimokkhuddesaparicchedā veditabbāti dassetuṃ “pārājikuddesādīna”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:718_1: Pārājikuddesādīnaṃ paricchedā yojetabbāti sambandho. Nidānassa ādito paṭṭhāya pārājikādīni
tika-vin09t0:718_2: osāpetvāti nidānaṃ, pārājikañca, tadubhayaṃ saṅghādisesañca, taṃtikaṃ aniyatañcāti
tika-vin09t0:718_3: evaṃ yathākkamaṃ uddisitvā pārājikādīni pariyosāpetvā. Yojetabbāti “avasese sutena
tika-vin09t0:718_4: sāvite uddiṭṭho hoti pārājikuddeso”tiādinā yojetabbā. Avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbanti
tika-vin09t0:719_0: “Pañcime, bhikkhave, pātimokkhuddesā nidānaṃ uddisitvā avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:719_1: ayaṃ paṭhamo pātimokkhuddeso. Nidānaṃ uddisitvā cattāri pārājikāni uddisitvā avasesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:720_0: Evaṃ vuttattā. Yasmiṃ vippakateti yasmiṃ uddese apariyosite. Antarāyo uppajjatīti
tika-vin09t0:720_1: dasasu antarāyesu yo koci antarāyo uppajjati. Dasa antarāyā nāma – rājantarāyo, corantarāyo,
tika-vin09t0:720_2: agyantarāyo, udakantarāyo, manussantarāyo, amanussantarāyo, vāḷantarāyo, sarīsapantarāyo,
tika-vin09t0:720_3: jīvitantarāyo, brahmacariyantarāyoti. Tattha sace bhikkhūsu “uposathaṃ karissāmā”ti
tika-vin09t0:720_4: nisinnesu rājā āgacchati, ayaṃ rājantarāyo. Corā āgacchanti, ayaṃ corantarāyo. Davadāho
tika-vin09t0:720_5: vā āgacchati, āvāse vā aggi uṭṭhahati, ayaṃ agyantarāyo. Megho vā uṭṭhahati, ogho
tika-vin09t0:720_6: vā āgacchati, ayaṃ udakantarāyo. Bahū manussā āgacchanti, ayaṃ manussantarāyo. Bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin09t0:720_7: yakkho gaṇhāti, ayaṃ amanussantarāyo. Byagghādayo caṇḍamigā āgacchanti, ayaṃ vāḷantarāyo.
tika-vin09t0:720_8: Bhikkhuṃ sappādayo ḍaṃsanti, ayaṃ sarīsapantarāyo. Bhikkhu gilāno vā hoti, kālaṃ
tika-vin09t0:720_9: vā karoti, verino vā taṃ māretukāmā gaṇhanti, ayaṃ jīvitantarāyo. Manussā ekaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:720_10: bahū vā bhikkhū brahmacariyā cāvetukāmā gaṇhanti, ayaṃ brahmacariyantarāyo. Iti yaṃ
tika-vin09t0:720_11: vuttaṃ “antarāyo uppajjatīti dasasu antarāyesu yo koci antarāyo uppajjatī”ti, tassattho pakāsito hotīti.
tika-vin09t0:721_0: Tena saddhinti vippakatuddesena saddhiṃ. Avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ uddiṭṭhauddesāpekkhattā
tika-vin09t0:721_2: Sutena sāvetabbaṃ nāma natthi uposathassa antarāyova hotīti adhippāyo. Aniyatuddeso
tika-vin09t0:721_3: parihāyatīti bhikkhunīnaṃ aniyatasikkhāpadapaññattiyā abhāvato. Tadabhāvo ca “idameva
tika-vin09t0:721_4: lakkhaṇaṃ tatthāpi anugata”nti katvāti veditabbaṃ. Sesanti avasesuddesaparicchedadassanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:721_5: Etesaṃ dvinnaṃ pātimokkhānanti sambandho. Tāvāti paṭhamaṃ. Idanti idāni vattabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:721_6: buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānaṃ sāmaññena dasseti, idaṃ akkharapadaniyamitaganthitaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:721_7: vuccati kathīyatīti attho. Kiṃ tanti āha, “suṇātu metiādīna”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:722_0: Tattha suṇātu metiādīnanti “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho ajjuposatho”tiādīnaṃ bhikkhupātimokkhe
tika-vin09t0:722_1: āgatānaṃ suttapadānaṃ. Atthanicchayanti abhidheyyatthassa ceva adhippāyatthassa ca
tika-vin09t0:722_2: nicchayanaṃ, vavatthāpananti attho. Imāya hi aṭṭhakathāya tesaṃ abhidheyyattho ceva
tika-vin09t0:722_3: adhippāyattho ca anekadhā vavatthāpīyati. Atha vā nicchinnoti nicchayo. Gaṇṭhiṭṭhānesu
tika-vin09t0:722_4: khīlamaddanākārena pavattā vimaticchedakathā, attho ca nicchayo ca atthanicchayo,
tika-vin09t0:722_5: taṃ atthanicchayaṃ, mayā vuccamānaṃ atthañca vinicchayañcāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sīlasampannāti
tika-vin09t0:722_6: samantato pannaṃ pattaṃ puṇṇanti sampannaṃ, sīlaṃ sampannametesanti sīlasampannā,
tika-vin09t0:722_7: paripuṇṇasīlāti attho. Atha vā sammadeva pannā gatā upāgatāti sampannā, sīlena sampannā
tika-vin09t0:722_9: tissopi sikkhitabbaṭṭhena sikkhā, taṃ kāmentīti sikkhākāmā. Suṇantu meti te sabbepi
tika-vin09t0:722_10: bhikkhavo mama santikā nisāmentu. Iminā attano saṃvaṇṇanāya sakkaccaṃ savane niyojeti.
tika-vin09t0:722_11: Sakkaccasavanapaṭibaddhā hi sabbāpi sāsanasampattīti. Ettha ca sīlasampannānaṃ sikkhākāmānaṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:722_12: bhikkhūnaṃ gahaṇaṃ tadaññesaṃ imissā saṃvaṇṇanāya abhājanabhāvato. Na hi te vinayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:723_0: Etthāti etasmiṃ gāthāpade, etesaṃ vā gāthāya saṅgahitānaṃ “suṇātu me”tiādīnaṃ padānamantare.
tika-vin09t0:723_1: Savane āṇattivacanaṃ savanāṇattivacanaṃ. Kiñcāpi savanāṇattivacanaṃ, tathāpi pātimokkhuddesakena
tika-vin09t0:723_2: evaṃ vattabbanti bhagavatā vuttattā bhagavato āṇatti, na uddesakassāti navakatarenāpi
tika-vin09t0:723_3: idaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati saṅghagāravena, saṅghabahumānena ca sahitattā sagāravasappatissavacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:723_4: Saṅgho hi suppaṭipannatādiguṇavisesayuttattā uttamaṃ gāravappatissavaṭṭhānaṃ. Idañca
tika-vin09t0:723_5: sabbaṃ kena kattha kadā vuttanti āha “sabbameva ceta”ntiādi. Pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujānantenāti –
tika-vin09t0:724: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ, evañca pana, bhikkhave, uddisitabbaṃ, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo ‘suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”’ti –
tika-vin09t0:725_0: Evamādinā anujānantena. Rājagaheti evaṃnāmake nagare. Tañhi mandhātumahāgovindādīhi
tika-vin09t0:725_1: pariggahitattā “rājagaha”nti vuccati. Taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle, cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:725_2: hoti, sesakāle suññaṃ hoti yakkhapariggahitaṃ, tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin09t0:725_3: Tasmāti yasmā idaṃ pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbavacanaṃ, tasmā. Kiṃ te ubhopi pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:725_4: uddisanti, yenevaṃ vattabbanti āha “saṅghatthero vā hī”tiādi. Therādhikanti therādhīnaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:725_5: therāyattaṃ bhavitunti attho. “Therādheyya”nti vā pāṭho, soyevattho. Tatthāti tissaṃ
tika-vin09t0:725_6: parisāyaṃ. Byattoti paññāveyyattiyena samannāgato, paguṇamātikoti attho. Paṭibaloti
tika-vin09t0:725_7: vattuṃ samattho, abhītoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha ca kiñcāpi daharassāpi byattassa pātimokkho
tika-vin09t0:725_8: anuññāto, atha kho etthāyaṃ adhippāyo – sace therassa pañca vā cattāro vā tayo vā
tika-vin09t0:725_9: pātimokkhuddesā nāgacchanti, dve pana akkhaṇḍā suvisadā vācuggatā honti, therāyattova
tika-vin09t0:725_10: pātimokkho. Sace pana ettakampi visadaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, byattassa bhikkhuno āyattoti.
tika-vin09t0:726_0: Idāni “saṅgho”ti avisesena vuttattā idhādhippetasaṅghaṃ visesetvā dassetuṃ “saṅghoti
tika-vin09t0:726_1: iminā pana padenā”tiādimāha kiñcāpīti anuggahatthe nipāto, tassa yadi nāmāti attho
tika-vin09t0:726_2: veditabbo. Dakkhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi vaḍḍhantīti dakkhiṇā,
tika-vin09t0:726_3: paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbaṃ dānaṃ, taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ arahati, dakkhiṇāya vā hito, yasmā
tika-vin09t0:726_4: naṃ mahapphalakāritāya visodhetīti dakkhiṇeyyo, diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātena saṃhatoti saṅgho,
tika-vin09t0:726_5: dakkhiṇeyyo ca so saṅgho cāti dakkhiṇeyyasaṅgho. Sammutiyā catuvaggādivinayapaññattiyā
tika-vin09t0:726_6: siddho saṅgho sammutisaṅgho. Avisesenāti “ariyā”ti vā “puthujjanā”ti vā avisesetvā
tika-vin09t0:726_7: sāmaññena. Soti sammutisaṅgho. Idhāti imissaṃ uposathañattiyaṃ. Adhippeto uposathañattiyā
tika-vin09t0:726_8: avisesattā. Nanu ca sopi pañcavidho hoti, tattha katamo idhādhippetoti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha
tika-vin09t0:726_9: “so panesā”tiādi. Kammavasenāti vinayakammavasena. Pañca vidhā pakārā assa sammutisaṅghassāti
tika-vin09t0:726_10: pañcavidho. Tathā hi vidhayuttagatappakārasadde samānatthe vaṇṇayanti. Catunnaṃ vaggo
tika-vin09t0:726_11: samūhoti catuvaggo, catuparimāṇayutto vā vaggo catuvaggo. Evaṃ pañcavaggādi.
tika-vin09t0:727_0: Idāni yesaṃ kammānaṃ vasenāyaṃ pañcavidho hoti, taṃ visesetvā dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:727_1: Tattha tatthāti pañcavidhe saṅghe. Majjhimesu janapadesu upasampadakammassa dasavaggakaraṇīyattā
tika-vin09t0:727_2: vuttaṃ “ṭhapetvā…pe… upasampadañcā”ti. “Tathā”ti iminā “na kiñci saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ
tika-vin09t0:727_3: na vaṭṭatī”ti imamatthaṃ atidisati. Yadi evaṃ kimatthaṃ atirekavīsativaggo vuttoti
tika-vin09t0:727_4: āha “so panā”tiādi. Atirekatarenāti catuvaggādikaraṇīyaṃ pañcavaggādinā atirekatarena,
tika-vin09t0:727_6: Idameva cānena kattabbaṃ kammanti “kammavasena pañcavidho”ti vuttaṃ. Kammassāniyame
tika-vin09t0:727_7: kathametaṃ yujjeyyāti īdisī codanā anavakāsāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imasmiṃ panattheti uposathe.
tika-vin09t0:728_1: “āyāmāvuso kappina, uposathaṃ gamissāmā”tiādīsu timokkhuddese āgato, “evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato
tika-vin09t0:728_2: kho, visākhe, uposatho upavuttho”tiādīsu sīle, “suddhassa ve sadā phaggu, suddhassuposatho
tika-vin09t0:728_3: sadā”tiādīsu upavāse, “uposatho nāma nāgarājā”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ, “na, bhikkhave,
tika-vin09t0:728_4: tadahuposathe sabhikkhukā āvāsā”tiādīsu divase, idhāpi divaseyeva vattamāno adhippetoti
tika-vin09t0:728_5: āha “ajja uposathadivaso”tiādi. Upavasanti etthāti uposatho. Upavasantīti sīlena
tika-vin09t0:728_6: vā sabbaso āhārassa abhuñjanasaṅkhātena anasanena vā khīrapānamadhupānādimattena
tika-vin09t0:729_0: Sabbesampi vākyānaṃ eva-kāratthasahitattā “uposatho”ti etassa “uposatho evā”ti ayamattho
tika-vin09t0:729_1: labbhatīti āha “etena anuposathadivasaṃ paṭikkhipatī”ti. Iminā avadhāraṇena nirākataṃ
tika-vin09t0:729_2: dasseti, atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti “uposatho”ti etassa
tika-vin09t0:729_3: “anuposatho na hotī”ti ayamatthoti vuttaṃ “etena anuposathadivasaṃ paṭikkhipatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:729_4: “Esa nayo pannaraso”ti iminā aññaṃ uposathadivasaṃ paṭikkhipatīti etthāpi. Etenāti
tika-vin09t0:729_5: “uposatho”ti etena saddena. Pañcadasannaṃ tithīnaṃ pūraṇavasena pannaraso. Pannarasoti
tika-vin09t0:729_6: iminā aññaṃ uposathadivasaṃ paṭikkhipatī”ti saṃkhittena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:729_7: “divasavasena hī”tiādimāha. Catuddasiyaṃ niyutto cātuddasiko. Evaṃ pannarasiko. Sāmaggiuposatho
tika-vin09t0:729_8: nāma saṅghasāmaggikatadivase kātabbauposatho. Hemantagimhavassānānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ utūnanti
tika-vin09t0:729_9: ettha hemantautu nāma aparakattikassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya phaggunapuṇṇamapariyosānā
tika-vin09t0:729_10: cattāro māsā, gimhautu nāma phaggunassa kālapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya āsāḷhapuṇṇamapariyosānā
tika-vin09t0:729_11: cattāro māsā, vassānautu nāma āsāḷhassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya aparakattikapuṇṇamapariyosānā
tika-vin09t0:729_12: cattāro māsā. Tatiyasattamapakkhesu dve dve katvā cha cātuddasikāti hemantassa utuno
tika-vin09t0:729_13: tatiye ca sattame ca pakkhe dve cātuddasikā, evamitaresaṃ utūnanti cha cātuddasikā.
tika-vin09t0:729_14: Sesā pannarasikāti sesā aṭṭhārasa pannarasikā. Honti cettha –
tika-vin09t0:738_1: pana sati aññasmiṃ cātuddasepi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tenāha “saki”ntiādi. Sakinti ekasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:738_2: vāre. Āvāsikānaṃ anuvattitabbanti āvāsikehi “ajjuposatho cātuddaso”ti pubbakicce
tika-vin09t0:738_3: kariyamāne anuvattitabbaṃ, na paṭikkositabbaṃ. Ādisaddena “āvāsikehi āgantukānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:738_4: anuvattitabba”nti vacanaṃ, “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tehi bhikkhūhi dve tayo uposathe
tika-vin09t0:738_5: cātuddasike kātuṃ, kathaṃ mayaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi paṭhamataraṃ pavāreyyāmā”ti vacanañca
tika-vin09t0:738_6: saṅgaṇhāti. Ettha ca paṭhamasuttassa ekekassa utuno tatiyasattamapakkhassa cātuddase
tika-vin09t0:738_7: vā avasesassa pannarase vā sakiṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabbanti pakaticārittavasenapi
tika-vin09t0:738_9: satīti aññasmimpi cātuddasike uposathaṃ kātuṃ anurūpe “āvāsikā bahutarā hontī”ti
tika-vin09t0:738_10: evamādike paccaye sati. Aññasmimpi cātuddaseti tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ tatiyasattamapakkhacātuddasato aññasmiṃ cātuddase.
tika-vin09t0:739_0: Na kevalaṃ uposathadivasāva hontīti āha “purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ panā”tiādi. Mā iti
tika-vin09t0:739_1: cando vuccati tassa gatiyā divasassa minitabbato, so ettha sabbakalāpāripūriyā puṇṇoti
tika-vin09t0:739_2: puṇṇamā, pubbakattikāya puṇṇamā pubbakattikapuṇṇamā, assayujapuṇṇamā. Sā hi pacchimakattikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:739_3: nivattetuṃ evaṃ vuttā. Tesaṃyevāti purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃyeva. Bhaṇḍanakārakehīti
tika-vin09t0:739_4: kalahakārakehi. Paccukkaḍḍhantīti ukkaḍḍhanti. Bhaṇḍanakārakehi anuvādavasena assayujapuṇṇamādiṃ
tika-vin09t0:739_5: pariccajantā pavāraṇaṃ kāḷapakkhaṃ, juṇhapakkhanti uddhaṃ kaḍḍhantīti attho. “Suṇantu
tika-vin09t0:739_6: me āyasmanto āvāsikā, yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, idāni uposathaṃ kareyyāma, pātimokkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:739_7: uddiseyyāma, āgame kāḷe pavāreyyāmā”ti “suṇantu me āyasmanto āvāsikā, yadāyasmantānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:739_8: pattakallaṃ, idāni uposathaṃ kareyyāma, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāma, āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā”ti
tika-vin09t0:739_9: ca evaṃ ñattiyā pavāraṇaṃ ukkaḍḍhantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:740_0: Athāti anantaratthe nipāto. Catuddasannaṃ pūraṇo cātuddaso, divaso. Yaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin09t0:740_1: “āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā”ti ñattiṃ ṭhapayiṃsu, tasmiṃ pana āgame juṇhe komudiyā cātumāsiniyā
tika-vin09t0:740_2: avassaṃ pavāretabbaṃ. Na hi taṃ atikkamitvā pavāretuṃ labbhati. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:741_0: “Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā
tika-vin09t0:741_1: saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā tampi juṇhaṃ anuvaseyyuṃ, tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi sabbeheva
tika-vin09t0:741_2: āgame juṇhe komudiyā cātumāsiniyā akāmā pavāretabba”nti.
tika-vin09t0:742_0: Tenevāha “pacchimavassaṃvuṭṭhānañca pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā evā”ti. Yadi hi taṃ atikkamitvā
tika-vin09t0:742_1: pavāreyya, dukkaṭāpattiṃ āpajjeyya. Vuttañhetaṃ “na ca, bhikkhave, apavāraṇāya pavāretabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:742_2: aññatra saṅghasāmaggiyā”ti. Visuddhipavāraṇāyogato pavāraṇādivasā. Pisaddena na kevalaṃ
tika-vin09t0:742_3: pavāraṇādivasāyeva, atha kho uposathadivasāpi hontīti dasseti. Idāni yo so sāmaggiuposathadivaso
tika-vin09t0:742_4: vutto, tañca tappasaṅgena sāmaggipavāraṇādivasañca dassento “yadā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:742_5: Osārite tasmiṃ bhikkhusminti ukkhittake bhikkhusmiṃ osārite, taṃ gahetvā sīmaṃ gantvā
tika-vin09t0:742_6: āpattiṃ desāpetvā kammavācāya kammappaṭippassaddhivasena pavesiteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:742_7: Tassa vatthussāti tassa adhikaraṇassa. Tadā ṭhapetvā…pe… uposathadivaso nāma hotīti
tika-vin09t0:742_8: sambandho. Kiṃ kāraṇanti āha “tāvadevā”tiādi. Tattha tāvadevāti taṃ divasameva. Vacanatoti
tika-vin09t0:742_9: kosambakakkhandhake vuttattā. Yattha pana pattacīvarādīnaṃ atthāya appamattakena
tika-vin09t0:742_10: kāraṇena vivadantā uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapenti, tattha tasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchite
tika-vin09t0:742_11: “samaggā jātamhā”ti antarā sāmaggiuposathaṃ kātuṃ na labhanti. Karontehi anuposathe
tika-vin09t0:742_12: uposatho kato nāma hoti. Kattikamāsabbhantareti ettha kattikamāso nāma pubbakattikamāsassa
tika-vin09t0:742_13: kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva aparakattikapuṇṇamā, tāva ekūnatiṃsarattidivo,
tika-vin09t0:742_14: tassabbhantare, tato pacchā vā pana pure vā na vaṭṭati. Ayameva yo koci divasoyeva.
tika-vin09t0:742_15: Idhāpi kosambakakkhandhake sāmaggiyā sadisāva sāmaggī veditabbā. Ye pana kismiñcideva
tika-vin09t0:742_16: appamattake pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā samaggā honti, tehi pavāraṇāyameva pavāraṇā kātabbā,
tika-vin09t0:742_17: tāvadeva na kātabbā. Karontehi appavāraṇāya pavāraṇā katā hoti. Na kātabboyevāti
tika-vin09t0:742_18: niyamena yadi karoti, dukkaṭanti dasseti. Tattha hi uposathakaraṇe dukkaṭaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin09t0:742_19: “na, bhikkhave, anuposathe uposatho kātabbo aññatra saṅghasāmaggiyā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:743: “Pattakālameva pattakalla”nti iminā sakatthe bhāvappaccayoti dasseti. Nāsatīti anvayato vuttameva byatirekato daḷhaṃ karoti.
tika-vin09t0:744_0: Anurūpāti arahā anucchavikā, sāminoti vuttaṃ hoti. Sabbantimenāti sabbaheṭṭhimena
tika-vin09t0:744_1: cattāro, na tehi vinā taṃ uposathakammaṃ karīyati, na tesaṃ chando vā pārisuddhi
tika-vin09t0:744_2: vā eti. Avasesā pana sacepi sahassamattā honti, sace samānasaṃvāsakā, sabbe chandārahāva
tika-vin09t0:744_3: honti, chandapārisuddhiṃ datvā āgacchantu vā, mā vā, kammaṃ na kuppati. Pakatattāti
tika-vin09t0:744_4: anukkhittā, pārājikaṃ anajjhāpannā ca. Hatthapāso nāma diyaḍḍhahatthappamāṇo.
tika-vin09t0:745_0: Sīmā ca nāmesā katamā, yattha hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ṭhitā kammappattā nāma hontīti
tika-vin09t0:745_1: anuyogaṃ sandhāya sīmaṃ dassento vibhāgavantānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanamukheneva
tika-vin09t0:745_2: hotīti “sīmā ca nāmesā”tiādimāha. Sambhindantenāti missīkarontena. Ajjhottharantenāti
tika-vin09t0:745_3: maddantena, anto karontenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Imā vipattisīmāyo nāmāti sambandho. Kasmā
tika-vin09t0:745_4: vipattisīmāyo nāmāti āha “ekādasahī”tiādi. Ākārehīti kāraṇehi. Vacanatoti kammavagge
tika-vin09t0:745_5: kathitattā. Saṅghakammaṃ nāmetaṃ vīsativaggakaraṇīyaparamanti āha “yattha ekavīsati
tika-vin09t0:745_6: bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkontī”ti. Yassaṃ sīmāyaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedena kammārahena
tika-vin09t0:745_7: saddhiṃ ekavīsati bhikkhū parimaṇḍalākārena nisīdituṃ na sakkonti, ayaṃ atikhuddakā
tika-vin09t0:745_8: nāmāti attho. Evarūpā ca sīmā sammatāpi asammatā, gāmakhettasadisāva hoti, tattha
tika-vin09t0:745_9: kataṃ kammaṃ kuppati. Esa nayo sesasīmāsupi.
tika-vin09t0:746_0: Sammatāti baddhā, vācitakammavācāti attho. Kammavācāya vācanameva hi bandhanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:746_1: Nimittaṃ na upagacchatīti animittupago, taṃ animittupagaṃ, animittārahanti vuttaṃ
tika-vin09t0:746_2: hoti. Tacasārarukkho nāma tālanāḷikerādikā. Paṃsupuñjavālukāpuñjānanti paṃsurāsivālukārāsīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:746_3: majjhe. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Potthakesu pana katthaci “paṃsupuñjaṃ vā vālukāpuñjaṃ
tika-vin09t0:746_4: vā aññatara”nti pāṭho dissati, so pana apāṭho. Na hi so “aññatara”nti iminā yujjatīti.
tika-vin09t0:746_5: Antarāti nimittupaganimittānamantarā. Ettha ca yā tīhi nimittehi bajjhamānā animittupagesu
tika-vin09t0:746_6: tacasārarukkhādīsu aññataraṃ antarā ekaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā, sā khaṇḍanimittā
tika-vin09t0:746_7: nāma hoti. Yā pana catupañcanimittādīhi bajjhamānā imesu tacasārarukkhādīsu aññataraṃ
tika-vin09t0:746_8: antarā ekaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā, sā khaṇḍanimittā nāma na hotīti viññāyati nimittupagānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:746_9: nimittānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sabbhāvato. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana avisesena vuttaṃ, tasmā upaparikkhitvā
tika-vin09t0:746_10: gahetabbaṃ. Sabbena sabbanti sabbappakārena. Nimittānaṃ bahi ṭhitena sammatāti tesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:746_11: bahi ṭhitena vācitakammavācā. Nimittāni pana anto ca bahi ca ṭhatvā kittetuṃ vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin09t0:747_0: Evaṃ sammatāpīti nimittāni kittetvā kammavācāya sammatāpi. Imassa “asammatāva hotī”ti
tika-vin09t0:747_1: iminā sambandho. Sabbā, bhikkhave, nadī asīmāti yā kāci nadīlakkhaṇappattā nadī nimittāni
tika-vin09t0:747_2: kittetvā “etaṃ baddhasīmaṃ karomā”ti katāpi asīmā, baddhasīmā na hotīti attho. Attano
tika-vin09t0:747_3: sabhāvena pana sā baddhasīmāsadisā. Sabbattha saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Samuddajātassaresupi
tika-vin09t0:747_4: eseva nayo. “Saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapā”ti iminā aññamaññassa āsannataṃ dīpeti. Baddhā hotīti
tika-vin09t0:747_5: pacchimadisābhāge sīmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tassā padesanti tassā ekadesaṃ. Yattha ṭhatvā
tika-vin09t0:747_6: bhikkhūhi kammaṃ kātuṃ sakkā hoti, tādisaṃ ekadesanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yattha pana ṭhitehi
tika-vin09t0:747_7: kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā, tādisaṃ padesaṃ anto karitvā bandhantā sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindanti
tika-vin09t0:747_8: nāma, na tu ajjhottharanti nāmāti gahetabbaṃ. Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “sambhindanaṃ paresaṃ
tika-vin09t0:747_9: sīmāya ekaṃ vā dve vā nimitte kittetvā lekhāmattaṃ gahetvā bandhanaṃ. Ajjhottharaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:747_10: nāma paresaṃ sīmāya nimitte kittetvā taṃ sakalaṃ vā tassekadesaṃ vā anto karontena
tika-vin09t0:747_11: tassā bahi ekissaṃ dvīsu vā disāsu nimitte kittetvā bandhana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:748_0: Pabbatādīnaṃ nimittānaṃ sampadā nimittasampatti. Pabbatova nimittaṃ pabbatanimittaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:748_1: Evaṃ sesesupi. Evaṃ vuttesūti uposathakkhandhake sīmāsammutiyaṃ vuttesu. Imehi ca
tika-vin09t0:748_2: pana aṭṭhahi nimittehi asammissehipi aññamaññamissehipi sīmaṃ sammannituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:748_3: Tenāha “tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge yathāladdhāni nimittupagāni nimittānī”ti. Ekena,
tika-vin09t0:748_4: pana dvīhi vā nimittehi sammannituṃ na vaṭṭati, tīṇi pana ādiṃ katvā vuttappakārānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:748_5: nimittānaṃ satenāpi vaṭṭati. “Puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimitta”nti vinayadharena pucchitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:748_6: “pabbato, bhante”ti vutte puna vinayadhareneva “eso pabbato nimitta”nti evaṃ nimittaṃ
tika-vin09t0:748_7: kittetabbaṃ. “Etaṃ pabbataṃ nimittaṃ karoma, nimittaṃ karissāma, nimittaṃ kato, nimittaṃ
tika-vin09t0:748_8: hotu, hoti bhavissatī”ti evaṃ pana kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Pāsāṇādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:748_9: Tenāha “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimitta”ntiādi. “Pabbato, bhante, udakaṃ, bhante”ti
tika-vin09t0:748_10: evaṃ pana upasampanno vā ācikkhatu, anupasampanno vā, vaṭṭatiyeva. Ādisaddena “puratthimāya
tika-vin09t0:748_11: anudisāya kiṃ nimittaṃ? Pāsāṇo, bhante, eso pāsāṇo nimittaṃ. Dakkhiṇāya disāya, dakkhiṇāya
tika-vin09t0:748_12: anudisāya, pacchimāya disāya, pacchimāya anudisāya, uttarāya disāya, uttarāya anudisāya
tika-vin09t0:748_13: kiṃ nimittaṃ? Udakaṃ, bhante, etaṃ udakaṃ nimitta”nti idaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Ettha pana
tika-vin09t0:748_14: aṭṭhatvā puna “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ? Pabbato, bhante, eso pabbato nimitta”nti
tika-vin09t0:748_15: evaṃ paṭhamaṃ kittitanimittaṃ kittetvāva ṭhapetabbaṃ. Evañhi nimittena nimittaṃ ghaṭitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:748_16: hoti. Sammā kittetvāti aññamaññanāmavipariyāyena, animittānaṃ nāmena ca akittetvā
tika-vin09t0:748_17: yathāvutteneva nayena kittetvā. Sammatāti “suṇātu me, bhante”tiādinā nayena uposathakkhandhake
tika-vin09t0:748_18: vuttāya parisuddhāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya baddhā. Tattha nimittāni sakiṃ kittitānipi
tika-vin09t0:748_19: kittitāneva honti. Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tikkhattuṃ sīmamaṇḍalaṃ sambandhantena
tika-vin09t0:749_0: Tatrāti tesu aṭṭhasu nimittesu. Nimittupagatāti nimittayogyatā. “Hatthippamāṇato
tika-vin09t0:749_1: paṭṭhāyā”ti vacanato hatthippamāṇopi nimittupagoyeva. Hatthī pana sattaratano vā
tika-vin09t0:749_2: aḍḍhaṭṭharatano vā. Tato omakataroti tato hatthippamāṇato khuddakataro. Sace catūsu
tika-vin09t0:749_3: disāsu cattāro vā tīsu vā tayo pabbatā honti, catūhi, tīhi vā pabbatanimitteheva
tika-vin09t0:749_4: sammannitumpi vaṭṭati, dvīhi pana nimittehi, ekena vā sammannituṃ na vaṭṭati. Ito
tika-vin09t0:749_5: paresu pāsāṇanimittādīsupi eseva nayo. Tasmā pabbatanimittaṃ karontena pucchitabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:749_6: “ekābaddho, na ekābaddho”ti. Sace ekābaddho hoti, na kātabbo. Tañhi catūsu vā aṭṭhasu
tika-vin09t0:749_7: vā disāsu kittentenāpi ekameva nimittaṃ kittitaṃ hoti. Tasmā yo evaṃ cakkasaṇṭhānena
tika-vin09t0:749_8: vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhito pabbato, taṃ ekadisāya kittetvā aññāsu disāsu taṃ bahiddhā
tika-vin09t0:749_9: katvā anto aññāni nimittāni kittetabbāni. Sace pabbatassa tatiyabhāgaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:749_10: vā antosīmāya kattukāmā honti, pabbataṃ akittetvā yattakaṃ padesaṃ anto kattukāmā,
tika-vin09t0:749_11: tassa parato tasmiṃyeva pabbate jātarukkhavammikādīsu aññataraṃ nimittaṃ kittetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:749_12: Sace yojanadviyojanappamāṇaṃ sabbaṃ pabbataṃ anto kattukāmā honti, pabbatassa parato
tika-vin09t0:750_0: Saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti gaṇanaṃ vohāraṃ gacchatīti attho. Dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍaparimāṇoti
tika-vin09t0:750_1: thūlatāya, na tulagaṇanāya. Tattha “ekapalaṃ nāma dasakalañja”nti vadanti. Iṭṭhakā
tika-vin09t0:750_2: mahantāpi na vaṭṭati. Tathā animittupagapāsāṇānaṃ rāsi, pageva paṃsuvālukārāsi. Bhūmisamo
tika-vin09t0:750_3: khalamaṇḍalasadiso piṭṭhipāsāṇo vā bhūmito khāṇuko viya uṭṭhitapāsāṇo vā hoti, sopi
tika-vin09t0:750_4: pamāṇūpago ce, vaṭṭati. “Piṭṭhipāsāṇo pana atimahantopi pāsāṇasaṅkhameva gacchatīti
tika-vin09t0:750_5: āha “piṭṭhipāsāṇo panā”tiādi. Tasmā sace mahato piṭṭhipāsāṇassa ekaṃ padesaṃ antosīmāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:750_6: kattukāmā honti, taṃ akittetvā tassupari añño pāsāṇo kittetabbo. Sace piṭṭhipāsāṇupari
tika-vin09t0:750_7: vihāraṃ karonti, vihāramajjhena ca piṭṭhipāsāṇo vinivijjhitvā gacchati, evarūpo piṭṭhipāsāṇo
tika-vin09t0:750_8: na vaṭṭati. Sace hi taṃ kittenti, nimittassupari vihāro hoti, nimittañca nāma bahisīmāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:750_9: hoti, vihāropi bahisīmāyaṃ āpajjati. Vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitapiṭṭhipāsāṇo pana
tika-vin09t0:751_0: Vananimitte tiṇavanaṃ vā tacasārarukkhavanaṃ vā na vaṭṭatīti āha “antosārehī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:751_1: Antosārā nāma ambajambupanasādayo. Antosāramissakehīti anto sāro yesaṃ te antosārā,
tika-vin09t0:751_2: tehi missakā antosāramissakā, tehi. Catupañcarukkhamattampīti heṭṭhimaparicchedanāha.
tika-vin09t0:751_3: Ukkaṃsato pana yojanasatikampi vanaṃ vaṭṭati. Ettha pana caturukkhamattañce, tayo
tika-vin09t0:751_4: sārato, eko asārato. Pañcarukkhamattañce, tayo sārato, dve asāratoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:751_5: Sace pana vanamajjhe vihāraṃ karonti, taṃ vanaṃ na kittetabbaṃ. Ekadesaṃ antosīmāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:751_6: kattukāmehipi vanaṃ akittetvā tattha rukkhapāsāṇādayo kittetabbā, vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā
tika-vin09t0:751_7: ṭhitavanaṃ ekattha kittetvā aññattha na kittetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:752_0: Rukkhanimittepi tacasārarukkho na vaṭṭatīti āha “antosāro”ti. “Bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito”ti
tika-vin09t0:752_1: iminā kuṭasarāvādīsu ṭhitaṃ paṭikkhipati. Tato apanetvā pana taṅkhaṇampi bhūmiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:752_2: ropetvā koṭṭhakaṃ katvā udakaṃ āsiñcitvā kittetuṃ vaṭṭati, navamūlasākhāniggamanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:752_3: akāraṇaṃ. Khandhaṃ chinditvā ropite pana etaṃ yujjati. Sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇoti “sīhaḷadīpe
tika-vin09t0:752_4: lekhanadaṇḍappamāṇo”ti vadanti, so ca kaniṭṭhaṅguliparimāṇoti daṭṭhabbo. Idaṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:752_6: Ekābaddhaṃ pana suppatiṭṭhitanigrodhasadisaṃ rukkhaṃ ekattha kittetvā aññattha kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:753_0: Magganimitte araññakhettanadītaḷākamaggādayo na vaṭṭantīti āha “jaṅghamaggo vā hotū”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:753_1: Yo pana jaṅghamaggo sakaṭamaggato okkamitvā puna sakaṭamaggameva otarati, ye vā jaṅghamaggasakaṭamaggā
tika-vin09t0:753_2: avalañjitā, te na vaṭṭanti. Tenāha “jaṅghasatthasakaṭasatthehī”tiādi. Ettha ca sace
tika-vin09t0:753_3: sakaṭamaggassa antimacakkamaggaṃ nimittaṃ karonti, maggo bahisīmāya hoti. Sace bāhiracakkamaggaṃ
tika-vin09t0:753_4: nimittaṃ karonti, bāhiracakkamaggova bahisīmāya hoti, sesaṃ antosīmaṃ bhajatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:753_5: Sacepi dve maggā nikkhamitvā pacchā sakaṭadhuramiva ekībhavanti, dvidhā bhinnaṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:753_6: vā sambandhaṭṭhāne vā sakiṃ kittetvā puna na kittetabbā. Ekābaddhanimittañhetaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:754_0: Sace vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā cattāro maggā catūsu disāsu gacchanti, majjhe ekaṃ kittetvā
tika-vin09t0:754_1: aparaṃ kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Ekābaddhanimittañhetaṃ. Koṇaṃ vinivijjhitvā gataṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:754_2: parabhāge kittetuṃ vaṭṭati. Vihāramajjhena vinivijjhitvā gatamaggo pana na kittetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:754_3: Kittite pana nimittassa upari vihāro hoti. Imañca maggaṃ kittentena “maggo pajjo
tika-vin09t0:754_4: patho”tiādinā vuttesu dasasu nāmesu yena kenaci nāmena kittetuṃ vaṭṭati. Parikhāsaṇṭhānena
tika-vin09t0:754_5: vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā gatamaggo ekattha kittetvā aññattha kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:755_0: Yaṃ pana abaddhasīmālakkhaṇe nadiṃ vakkhāmāti “yassā dhammikānaṃ rājūnaṃ kāle”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:755_1: udakukkhepasīmāyaṃ nadiyā vakkhamānattā vuttaṃ. Yā pana nadī maggo viya sakaṭadhurasaṇṭhānena
tika-vin09t0:755_2: vā parikhāsaṇṭhānena vā vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā gatā, naṃ ekattha kittetvā aññattha
tika-vin09t0:755_3: kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Vihārassa catūsu disāsu aññamaññaṃ vinivijjhitvā gate nadīcatukkepi
tika-vin09t0:755_4: eseva nayo. Asammissanadiyo pana catassopi kittetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace vatiṃ karonto viya
tika-vin09t0:755_5: rukkhapāde nikhaṇitvā vallipalālādīhi nadīsotaṃ rumbhanti, udakampi ajjhottharitvā
tika-vin09t0:755_6: āvaraṇaṃ pavattatiyeva, nimittaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Yathā pana udakaṃ nappavattati, evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:755_7: setumhi kate appavattamānā nadī nimittaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Pavattanaṭṭhāne nadīnimittaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:756_0: Yā pana dubbuṭṭhikāle vā gimhe vā nirudakabhāvena nappavattati, sā vaṭṭati. Mahānadito
tika-vin09t0:756_1: udakamātikaṃ nīharanti, sā kunnadīsadisā hutvā tīṇi sassāni sampādentī niccaṃ pavattati.
tika-vin09t0:756_2: Kiñcāpi pavattati, nimittaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Yā pana mūle mahānadito niggatāpi kālantarena
tika-vin09t0:756_3: teneva niggatamaggena nadiṃ bhinditvā sayameva gacchati, gacchantī ca parato susumārādisamākiṇṇā
tika-vin09t0:756_4: nāvādīhi sañcaritabbā nadī hoti, taṃ nimittaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:757_0: Asandamānanti appavattamānaṃ. Sandamānaṃ nāma oghanadīudakavāhakamātikāsu udakaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:757_2: atiṭṭhantaṃ. Bhājanagatanti nāvācāṭiādīsu bhājanesu gataṃ. Yaṃ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:757_3: “gambhīresu āvāṭādīsu ukkhepimaṃ udakaṃ nimittaṃ na kātabba”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ duvuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:757_4: attano matimattameva. Ṭhitaṃ pana antamaso sūkarakhatāyapi gāmadārakānaṃ kīḷanavāpiyampi
tika-vin09t0:757_5: sace yāva kammavācāpariyosānaṃ tiṭṭhati, appaṃ vā hotu, bahu vā, vaṭṭatiyeva. Tasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:757_6: pana ṭhāne nimittasaññākaraṇatthaṃ pāsāṇavālikāpaṃsuādirāsi vā pāsāṇatthambho vā
tika-vin09t0:758_0: Evaṃ nimittasampattiyuttataṃ dassetvā idāni yehi ākārehi baddhā parisāsampattiyuttā
tika-vin09t0:758_1: nāma hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “parisāsampattiyā yuttā nāmā”tiādimāha. Imassa pana kammassa
tika-vin09t0:758_2: catuvaggakaraṇīyattā “catūhi bhikkhūhī”ti vuttaṃ. Imañca sīmaṃ bandhitukāmehi sāmantavihāresu
