tika-vin09t0:881_4: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Ādisaddena sīsakampanadassanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:882_1: yakkhehi katacittavikkhepo, yakkhummattakoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ubhinnaṃ pana viseso anāpattivāre
tika-vin09t0:882_2: āvibhavissati. Vedanāṭṭoti balavatiyā dukkhavedanāya phuṭṭho mucchāpareto, tena vippalapantena
tika-vin09t0:882_3: paccakkhātāpi apaccakkhātāva hoti. Manussajātiko hotīti sabhāgo vā visabhāgo vā gahaṭṭho
tika-vin09t0:882_4: vā pabbajito vā viññū yokoci manusso hoti. Ummattakādīnanti etthādisaddena khittacittavedanāṭṭadevatātiracchānagatānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:882_6: ajānanabhāvena apaccakkhātāva hoti. Devatāya pana santike atikhippaṃ jānanabhāvena.
tika-vin09t0:882_7: Devatā nāma mahāpaññā tihetukappaṭisandhikā atikhippaṃ jānanti, cittañca nāmetaṃ
tika-vin09t0:882_8: lahuparivattaṃ, tasmā “cittalahukassa puggalassa cittavaseneva mā atikhippaṃ vināso
tika-vin09t0:882_9: ahosī”ti devatāya santike sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ paṭikkhipi. Tena vuttaṃ “na ca ummattakādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:882_10: aññataro”ti. Dūtena vāti “mama sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ kathehī”ti mukhasāsanavasena
tika-vin09t0:882_11: dūtena vā. Paṇṇena vāti paṇṇe likhitvā pahiṇavasena paṇṇena vā.
tika-vin09t0:883_0: Sace te sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ jānantīti sambandho. Āvajjanasamayeti atthābhogasamaye.
tika-vin09t0:883_1: Iminā taṃ khaṇaṃyeva pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ dujjānanti dasseti. Vacanānantaramevāti
tika-vin09t0:883_2: vacanassa anantarameva, āvajjanasamayevāti attho. Eva-saddena pana cirena jānanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:883_3: paṭikkhipati. Ukkaṇṭhitoti anabhiratiyā imasmiṃ sāsane kicchajīvikaṃ patto. Atha
tika-vin09t0:883_4: vā “ajja yāmi, sve yāmi, ito yāmi, ettha yāmī”ti uddhaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ katvā viharamāno
tika-vin09t0:883_5: vikkhitto, anekaggoti vuttaṃ hoti. Idañca “anabhirato sāmaññā cavitukāmo”tiādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:883_6: upalakkhaṇaṃ. Yena kenaci…pe… jānantīti sace te“ukkaṇṭhito”ti vā “gihibhāvaṃ patthetī”ti
tika-vin09t0:883_7: vā “anabhirato”ti vā “sāmaññā cavitukāmo”ti vā yena kenaci ākārena sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:883_9: ca ekaparicchedāni, āvajjanasamaye ñāte eva sīsaṃ enti. “Kiṃ ayaṃ bhaṇatī”ti kaṅkhatā
tika-vin09t0:883_10: cirena ñāte sīsaṃ na enti. Tenāha “atha aparabhāge”tiādi. Atha dvinnaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:883_11: dvinnampi niyametvā “etesaṃ ārocemī”ti vadati, tesu ekasmiṃ jānantepi dvīsu jānantesupi
tika-vin09t0:883_12: paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Evaṃ sambahulesupi veditabbaṃ. Vuttanayenāti “tassa vacanānantara”ntiādinā
tika-vin09t0:883_13: vuttena nayena. Yo koci manussajātikoti antamaso navakammikaṃ upādāya yo koci manusso.
tika-vin09t0:884_0: “Sace pana anabhiratiyā pīḷito sabhāge bhikkhū parisaṅkamāno ‘yo koci jānātū’ti uccāsaddaṃ
tika-vin09t0:884_1: karonto ‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī’ti vadati, tañca avidūre ṭhito navakammiko vā añño vā
tika-vin09t0:884_2: samayaññū puriso sutvā ‘ukkaṇṭhito ayaṃ samaṇo gihibhāvaṃ pattheti, sāsanato cuto’ti
tika-vin09t0:885_0: Sace vacanatthaṃ ñatvāpi “ayaṃ ukkaṇṭhito”ti vā “gihibhāvaṃ patthetī”ti vā na jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:885_1: apaccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Sace pana vacanatthaṃ ajānitvāpi “ukkaṇṭhito”ti vā “gihibhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:885_2: patthetī”ti vā jānāti, paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā. Davāyapīti kīḷādhippāyenapi. Cittādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:885_3: vā vasenāti cittādīnaṃ vā chaḷaṅgānaṃ vasena. Hoti cettha –
tika-vin09t0:886: “Cittaṃ khettañca kālo ca, payogo puggalo tathā;
tika-vin09t0:888_0: Sabbaso vā pana apaccakkhānenāti “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādīsu yena yena pariyāyena
tika-vin09t0:888_1: sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti, tato ekassapi paccakkhānassa abhāvena. Iminā pana “idaṃ
tika-vin09t0:888_2: padaṃ sāvessāmi, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ pavattacittuppādassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:888_3: Yassa hi evarūpo cittuppādo natthi, so sabbaso na paccakkhāti nāmāti. Sikkhāpaccakkhānassāti
tika-vin09t0:888_5: paccakkhāmī”ti vadati viññāpeti, evampi, bhikkhave, dubbalyāvikammañceva hoti, sikkhā
tika-vin09t0:888_6: ca paccakkhātā”tiādinā vuttehi yehi vacanehi sikkhāpaccakkhānañceva hoti dubbalyāvikammañca,
tika-vin09t0:888_7: taṃ “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādikaṃ atthabhūtaṃ dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā. “Buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādimhi
tika-vin09t0:888_8: pana vutte sikkhāparipūraṇe dubbalabhāvassāpi gamyamānattā sikkhāpaccakkhānassa idaṃ
tika-vin09t0:888_9: dubbalyāvikammaṃ atthoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca “atthabhūta”nti iminā “yannūnāhaṃ buddhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:888_10: paccakkheyya”ntiādikaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ paṭikkhipati. Yena hi sikkhāpaccakkhānañceva
tika-vin09t0:888_11: hoti dubbalyāvikammañca, tadeva sikkhāpaccakkhānassa atthabhūtaṃ. Yena pana dubbalyāvikammameva
tika-vin09t0:888_12: hoti, na sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ, na taṃ tassa atthabhūtanti.
tika-vin09t0:889_0: Rāgapariyuṭṭhānena sadisabhāvāpattiyā mithunānaṃ ayanti “methuno”ti dhammova vuccatīti
tika-vin09t0:889_2: methunarāgassa pavattiyā pariyonaddhacittatāyāti attho. Dhammoti ajjhācāro. “Palambate
tika-vin09t0:889_3: vilambate”tiādīsu viya upasaggassa koci atthaviseso natthīti āha “seveyyā”ti. Ajjhāpajjeyyāti
tika-vin09t0:889_5: sabbāsaṃ antimena. Tiracchānagatāyāti tiracchānesu uppannāya. Tenāha “paṭisandhivasenā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:889_6: Pārājikāya vatthubhūtā eva cettha tiracchānagatitthī “tiracchānagatā”ti gahetabbā,
tika-vin09t0:892_0: Tattha ahiggahaṇena sabbāpi ajagaragonasādibhedā dīghajāti saṅgahitā. Tasmā dīghajātīsu
tika-vin09t0:892_1: yattha tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ sakkā tilaphalamattampi pavesetuṃ, sā pārājikavatthu,
tika-vin09t0:892_2: avasesā dukkaṭavatthūti veditabbā. Macchaggahaṇena sabbāpi macchakacchapamaṇḍūkādibhedā
tika-vin09t0:892_3: odakajāti saṅgahitā. Tatrāpi dīghajātiyaṃ vuttanayeneva pārājikavatthu ca dukkaṭavatthu
tika-vin09t0:892_4: ca veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – pataṅgamukhamaṇḍūkā nāma honti, tesaṃ mukhasaṇṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:892_5: mahantaṃ, chiddaṃ appakaṃ, tattha pavesanaṃ nappahoti, mukhasaṇṭhānaṃ pana vaṇasaṅkhepaṃ
tika-vin09t0:892_6: gacchati, tasmā taṃ thullaccayavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Kukkuṭiggahaṇena sabbāpi kākakapotādibhedā
tika-vin09t0:892_7: pakkhijāti saṅgahitā. Tatrāpi vuttanayeneva pārājikavatthu ca dukkaṭavatthu ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:892_9: Tatrāpi vuttanayeneva pārājikavatthu ca dukkaṭavatthu ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:893_0: Pārājiko hotīti parājito hoti parājayaṃ apanno. Ayañhi pārājikasaddo sikkhāpadāpattipuggalesu
tika-vin09t0:893_1: vattati. Tattha “aṭṭhānametaṃ, ānanda, anavakāso, yaṃ tathāgato vajjīnaṃ vā vajjiputtakānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:893_2: vā kāraṇā sāvakānaṃ pārājikaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ samūhaneyyā”ti evaṃ sikkhāpade
tika-vin09t0:893_3: vattamāno veditabbo. “Āpattiṃ tvaṃ bhikkhu āpanno pārājika”nti evaṃ āpattiyaṃ. “Na
tika-vin09t0:893_4: mayaṃ pārājikā, yo avahaṭo, so pārājiko”ti evaṃ puggale vattamāno veditabbo. “Pārājikena
tika-vin09t0:893_5: dhammena anuddhaṃseyyā”tiādīsu pana dhamme vattatīti vadanti. Yasmā pana tattha “dhammo”ti
tika-vin09t0:893_6: katthaci āpatti, katthaci sikkhāpadameva adhippetaṃ, tasmā so visuṃ na vattabbo.
tika-vin09t0:893_7: Tattha sikkhāpadaṃ yo taṃ atikkamati, taṃ parājeti, tasmā “pārājika”nti vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:893_8: Āpatti pana yo naṃ ajjhāpajjati, taṃ parājeti, tasmā “pārājikā”ti vuccati. Puggalo
tika-vin09t0:893_9: yasmā parājito parājayamāpanno, tasmā “pārājiko”ti vuccati. Idha pana puggalo veditabboti
tika-vin09t0:893_10: āha “pārājiko hotī”tiādi. Imināpi idaṃ dasseti – “parājitasadde upasaggassa vuddhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:893_11: katvā, ta-kārassa ca ka-kāraṃ katvā pārājiko hotīti niddiṭṭho”ti.
tika-vin09t0:894_0: Apalokanādi catubbidhampi saṅghakammaṃ sīmāparicchinnehi pakatattehi bhikkhūhi ekato
tika-vin09t0:894_1: kattabbattā ekakammaṃ nāma. Ādisaddena ekuddesasamasikkhatānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tattha pañcavidhopi
tika-vin09t0:894_2: pātimokkhuddeso ekato uddisitabbattā ekuddeso nāma. Nahāpitapubbakādīnaṃ viya odissa
tika-vin09t0:894_3: anuññātaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ sabbampi sikkhāpadaṃ sabbehipi lajjipuggalehi samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato
tika-vin09t0:894_4: samasikkhatā nāma. Yasmā sabbepi lajjino etesu ekakammādīsu saha vasanti, na ekopi
tika-vin09t0:894_5: tato bahiddhā sandissati, tasmā tāni sabbānipi gahetvā ekakammādiko tividhopi saṃvāso
tika-vin09t0:894_6: nāmāti āha “so ca vuttappakāro saṃvāso tena puggalena saddhiṃ natthi, tena kāraṇena
tika-vin09t0:895_0: Idāni yasmā na kevalaṃ manussitthiyā eva nimittaṃ pārājikavatthu, atha kho amanussitthitiracchānagatitthīnampi.
tika-vin09t0:895_1: Na ca itthiyā eva. Atha kho ubhatobyañjanakapaṇḍakapurisānampi, tasmā te satte, tesañca
tika-vin09t0:895_2: yaṃ yaṃ nimittaṃ vatthu hoti, taṃ taṃ nimittaṃ, tattha ca yathā paṭisevanto pārājiko
tika-vin09t0:895_3: hoti, tañca sabbaṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ “ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo”tiādimāha. Etthāti
tika-vin09t0:895_4: imasmiṃ sikkhāpade. Tesūti ye tiṃsamaggā vuttā, tesu. Attano vāti lambimudupiṭṭhike
tika-vin09t0:895_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Santhatassa vāti yena kenaci vatthena vā paṇṇena vā vākapaṭṭena
tika-vin09t0:895_6: vā cammena vā tipusīsādīnaṃ paṭṭena vā paliveṭhetvā, anto vā pavesetvā paṭicchannassa.
tika-vin09t0:895_7: Akkhāyitassa vāti soṇasiṅgālādīhi akkhāditassa. Yebhuyyena akkhāyitassāti yāva upaḍḍhakkhāyito
tika-vin09t0:895_8: nāma na hoti, evaṃ akkhāyitassa. Allokāseti tintokāse. Santhatanti tesaṃyeva vatthādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:895_9: yena kenaci paṭicchannaṃ. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – na hettha anupādinnakaṃ anupādinnakena
tika-vin09t0:895_10: chupati, mutti atthi, atha kho upādinnakena vā anupādinnakaṃ ghaṭṭiyatu, anupādinnakena
tika-vin09t0:895_11: vā upādinnakaṃ, anupādinnakena vā anupādinnakaṃ, upādinnakena vā upādinnakaṃ. Sace
tika-vin09t0:895_12: yattake paviṭṭhe pārājikaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ, tattakaṃ sevanacittena paveseti, sabbatthāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:896_0: Evaṃ sevanacitteneva pavesentassa āpattiṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā taṃ pavesanaṃ nāma
tika-vin09t0:896_1: na kevalaṃ attūpakkameneva, parūpakkamenāpi hoti. Tatrāpi sādiyantasseva āpatti paṭisevanacittasamaṅgissa,
tika-vin09t0:896_2: na itarassāti dassetuṃ “parena vā”tiādimāha. Tattha parenāti bhikkhupaccatthikādinā
tika-vin09t0:896_3: yena kenaci aññena. Pavesanapaviṭṭhaṭṭhitauddharaṇesūti ettha aggato yāva mūlā pavesanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:896_4: pavesanaṃ nāma. Aṅgajātassa yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pavesanārahaṃ, tattakaṃ anavasesato paviṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:896_5: paviṭṭhaṃ nāma. Evaṃ paviṭṭhassa uddharaṇārambhato antarā ṭhitakālo ṭhitaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:896_6: Samantapāsādikāyaṃ pana mātugāmassa sukkavisaṭṭhiṃ patvā sabbathā vāyāmato oramitvā
tika-vin09t0:896_7: ṭhitakālaṃ sandhāya “sukkavisaṭṭhisamaye”ti vuttaṃ. Uddharaṇaṃ nāma yāva aggā nīharaṇakālo.
tika-vin09t0:896_8: Sādiyatīti sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhapeti. Asādhāraṇavinicchayoti adinnādānādīhi sabbehi
tika-vin09t0:897_1: janettīti attho. Nidadāti desanaṃ desavasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:897_2: Paññāpīyatīti paññatti, tassā pakāro paññattividhi aṅgeti gameti ñāpetīti aṅgaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:897_3: kāraṇaṃ. Samuṭṭhahanti āpattiyo etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ, uppattikāraṇaṃ, tassa vidhi
tika-vin09t0:897_4: samuṭṭhānavidhi. Vajjakammappabhedañcāti ettha pabhedasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo “vajjappabhedaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:897_5: kammappabhedañcā”ti. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade.
tika-vin09t0:898_0: Paññattiṭṭhānanti paññattiṭṭhapanassa ṭhānaṃ, sikkhāpadānaṃ paññattidesoti attho.
tika-vin09t0:898_1: Puggaloti ettha ādikammikoyeva adhippetoti āha “puggalo nāma yaṃ yaṃ ārabbha taṃ
tika-vin09t0:898_2: taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññatta”nti, so so puggaloti adhippāyo. Honti cettha –
tika-vin09t0:906: Caṇḍakāḷī sambahulā, dve ca bhikkhuniyo parā;
tika-vin09t0:907: Bhikkhunīnaṃ tu satteva, honti tā ādikammikā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:908_0: Tassa tassa puggalassāti yaṃ yaṃ sudinnādikaṃ puggalaṃ ārabbha sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:908_1: tassa tassa puggalassa. Paññattīti paṭhamapaññatti. Paṭhamapaññattiyā pacchā ṭhapitā
tika-vin09t0:908_2: paññatti anupaññatti. Anuppanne dose ṭhapitā paññatti anuppannapaññatti. Sabbattha
tika-vin09t0:908_3: majjhimadese ceva paccantimesu janapadesu cāti sabbesu padesesu ṭhapitā paññatti
tika-vin09t0:908_4: sabbatthapaññatti. Majjhimadeseyeva ṭhapitā paññatti padesapaññatti. Bhikkhūnañceva
tika-vin09t0:908_5: bhikkhunīnañca sādhāraṇabhūtā paññatti sādhāraṇapaññatti. Suddhabhikkhūnameva, suddhabhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:908_6: vā paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ asādhāraṇapaññatti. Ubhinnampi paññatti ubhatopaññatti.
tika-vin09t0:908_8: paṭṭhāya katā upāhanā, na ekadvitipaṭalā. Cammattharaṇanti attharitabbaṃ cammaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:908_9: Etesaṃ vasena catubbidhā padesapaññatti nāmāti etesaṃ vasena catubbidhā paññatti
tika-vin09t0:908_10: majjhimadeseyeva paññattāti padesapaññatti nāma. Tenevāha “majjhimadeseyeva hī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:908_11: Yasmā majjhimadeseyeva yathāvuttavatthuvītikkame āpatti hoti, na paccantimajanapade,
tika-vin09t0:908_12: tasmā padesapaññattīti attho. Dhuvanhānaṃ paṭikkhepamattanti niccanahānappaṭisedhanameva.
tika-vin09t0:908_13: Ettha ca mattasaddena aññāni tīṇi sikkhāpadāni paṭikkhipati. Tāni hi “anujānāmi,
tika-vin09t0:908_14: bhikkhave, sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampada”ntiādinā
tika-vin09t0:908_15: cammakkhandhake āgatāni. Tenevāha “tato aññā padesapaññatti nāma natthī”ti. Sabbānīti
tika-vin09t0:908_16: tato avasesāni sabbāni sikkhāpadāni. Tasmāti yasmā anuppannapaññatti aṭṭhagarudhammavasena
tika-vin09t0:908_17: bhikkhunīnaṃyeva āgatā, yasmā ca dhuvanhānaṃ paṭikkhepamattaṃ ṭhapetvā pātimokkhe
tika-vin09t0:908_18: sabbāni sikkhāpadāni sabbatthapaññattiyeva honti, yasmā ca sādhāraṇapaññattidukañca
tika-vin09t0:908_19: ekatopaññattidukañca byañjanamattaṃ nānaṃ, atthato ekaṃ, tasmā. Sabbatthāti sabbesu
tika-vin09t0:908_20: sikkhāpadesu. Āpattibhedo hettha uttarapadalopena “āpattī”ti vuttoti āha “āpattīti
tika-vin09t0:908_22: dve āpattikkhandhā sīlavipatti nāma, avasesā pañca ācāravipatti nāma, micchādiṭṭhi
tika-vin09t0:908_23: ca antaggāhikādiṭṭhi ca diṭṭhivipatti nāma, ājīvahetu paññattāni cha sikkhāpadāni
tika-vin09t0:908_24: ājīvavipatti nāma, iti imāsaṃ sīlaācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattīnaṃ aññatarāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:909_0: Na kevalaṃ yathāvuttanayeneva vuccantīti āha “yāni sikkhāpadasamuṭṭhānānītipi vuccantī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:909_1: Etāni hi kiñcāpi āpattiyā samuṭṭhānāni, na sikkhāpadassa, vohārasukhatthaṃ panevaṃ
tika-vin09t0:909_2: vuccantīti. Tatthāti tesu chasu samuṭṭhānesu. Tesūti sacittakācittakesu. Ekaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:909_3: uppattikāraṇaṃ etissāti ekasamuṭṭhānā, ekena vā samuṭṭhānaṃ etissāti ekasamuṭṭhānā.
tika-vin09t0:910: Samuṭṭhānavasenāti samuṭṭhānasīsavasena. Paṭhamapārājikaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ etissāti paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānā. Tathā adinnādānasamuṭṭhānā”tiādīsupi.
tika-vin09t0:911_0: Sayaṃ pathavikhaṇane kāyena, pare āṇāpetvā khaṇāpane vācāya ca āpattisambhavato “pathavikhaṇanādīsu
tika-vin09t0:911_1: viyā”ti vuttaṃ. Ādisaddena adinnādānādīnaṃ pariggaho. Paṭhamakathināpatti kāyavācato
tika-vin09t0:911_2: kattabbaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vā vikappanaṃ vā akarontassa hoti, no karontassāti āha “paṭhamakathināpatti
tika-vin09t0:911_3: viyā”ti. Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvarappaṭiggahaṇāpatti tassā hatthato cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:911_4: paṭiggaṇhantassa, parivattakaṃ adentassa ca hotīti kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti. “Siyā
tika-vin09t0:911_5: karontassā”tiādīsu siyāti “siyā kho pana te brāhmaṇa evamassā”tiādīsu viya “kadācī”ti
tika-vin09t0:911_6: iminā samānattho nipāto. Rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇāpatti siyā kiriyā gahaṇena āpajjanato,
tika-vin09t0:911_7: siyā akiriyā paṭikkhepassa akaraṇatoti āha “rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇāpatti viyā”ti. Kuṭikārāpatti
tika-vin09t0:911_8: vatthuṃ desāpetvā pamāṇātikkantakaraṇe karontassa siyā, adesāpetvā pana pamāṇātikkantakaraṇe
tika-vin09t0:911_9: pamāṇayuttaṃ vā karontassa ca akarontassa ca siyāti āha “kuṭikārāpatti viyā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:912_0: Saññāya abhāvena vimokkho assāti saññāvimokkhoti majjhepadalopasamāso daṭṭhabboti
tika-vin09t0:912_1: āha “yato vītikkamasaññāyā”tiādi. Itarā nāma yato vītikkamasaññāya abhāvena na muccati,
tika-vin09t0:912_2: sā itarasaddassa vuttappaṭiyogivisayattā. Yā acittakena vā sacittakamissakena vā
tika-vin09t0:912_3: samuṭṭhātīti yā āpatti kadāci acittakena vā kadāci sacittakamissakena vā samuṭṭhānena
tika-vin09t0:912_4: samuṭṭhāti. Ettha ca saññādukaṃ anāpattimukhena vuttaṃ, sacittakadukaṃ āpattimukhenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:913_0: Yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hotīti yassā sacittakāya āpattiyā cittaṃ
tika-vin09t0:913_1: akusalameva hoti, yassā ca sacittakācittakasaṅkhātāya surāpānādiacittakāya āpattiyā
tika-vin09t0:913_2: vatthuvijānanacittena sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, ayaṃ lokavajjā. “Sacittakapakkhe”ti
tika-vin09t0:913_3: hi idaṃ vacanaṃ sacittakācittakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi ekaṃsato sacittakassa “sacittakapakkhe”ti
tika-vin09t0:913_4: visesane payojanaṃ atthīti. Yaṃ panettha gaṇṭhipade “surāpānasmiñhi ‘surā’ti vā ‘na
tika-vin09t0:913_5: vaṭṭatī’ti vā jānitvā pivane akusalamevā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha “na vaṭṭatīti vā jānitvā”ti
tika-vin09t0:913_6: vuttavacanaṃ na yujjati paṇṇattivajjassāpi lokavajjabhāvappasaṅgato. Yassā pana “sacittakapakkhe
tika-vin09t0:913_7: cittaṃ akusalamevā”ti niyamo natthi, sā paṇṇattivajjāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha “sesā
tika-vin09t0:913_8: paṇṇattivajjā”ti. Tathā hi tassā vatthuvijānanacittena sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ siyā
tika-vin09t0:913_9: kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākatanti “akusalamevā”ti niyamo natthi. Ubhayattha
tika-vin09t0:913_10: āpajjitabbāti kāyadvāre, vacīdvāre cāti ubhayattha āpajjitabbā āpatti, tā pana adinnādānādayo.
tika-vin09t0:913_11: “Manodvāre āpatti nāma natthī”ti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ upanikkhittasādiyanādīsu
tika-vin09t0:914_1: āpattiṃ akusalacitto āpajjati. Anupasampannaṃ padasodhammaṃ vācento, mātugāmassa
tika-vin09t0:914_2: dhammaṃ desentoti evarūpaṃ āpattiṃ kusalacitto āpajjati. Asañciccasahaseyyādiṃ abyākatacitto
tika-vin09t0:914_3: āpajjati. Yaṃ arahā āpajjati, sabbaṃ abyākatacittova āpajjati. Tenāha “kusalābyākatacitto vā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:915_0: Dukkhavedanāsamaṅgī vāti duṭṭhadosādibhedaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjanto dukkhavedanāsamaṅgī
tika-vin09t0:915_1: āpajjati. Methunadhammādibhedaṃ pana sukhavedanāsamaṅgī āpajjati. Yaṃ sukhavedanāsamaṅgī
tika-vin09t0:915_2: āpajjati, taṃyeva majjhatto hutvā āpajjanto adukkhamasukhavedanāsamaṅgī āpajjati.
tika-vin09t0:915_3: Tenāha “itaravedanādvayasamaṅgī vā”ti. Idampi ca tikadvayaṃ yebhuyyavaseneva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:915_4: Nipajjitvā nirodhasamāpanno hi acittako avedano sahaseyyāpattiṃ āpajjatīti. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin09t0:915_5: evaṃ aniyamena vuttaṃ, viseso panettha atthīti dassetuṃ “evaṃ santepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:915_6: Evaṃ santepīti hi visesābhidhānanimittābhyūpagameva yujjati. Sabbesaṃ vasena tīṇi
tika-vin09t0:915_7: cittānīti kusalākusalābyākatānaṃ vasena padasodhammādīsu tīṇi cittāni.
tika-vin09t0:916_0: Idāni taṃ yathāvuttanidānādivedanāttikapariyosānaṃ sattarasappakāraṃ imasmiṃ sikkhāpade
tika-vin09t0:916_1: yojetuṃ “idha panā”tiādimāha. Idhāti imasmiṃ paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpade. Vesāliyanti
tika-vin09t0:916_2: evaṃnāmake itthiliṅgavasena pavattavohāre nagare. Tañhi nagaraṃ tikkhattuṃ pākāraparikkhepavaḍḍhanena
tika-vin09t0:916_3: visālībhūtattā “vesālī”ti vuccati. Idampi ca nagaraṃ sabbaññutaṃ sampatteyeva sammāsambuddhe
tika-vin09t0:916_4: sabbākāravepullattaṃ pattanti veditabbaṃ. “Sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti ca “antamaso tiracchānagatāyapī”ti
tika-vin09t0:916_5: ca dve anupaññattiyoti makkaṭivajjiputtakavatthūnaṃ vasena vuttā. “Antamaso tiracchānagatāyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:916_6: ca “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti ca imā dve anupaññattiyo. Āpattikarā ca hotīti paṭhamapaññattito
tika-vin09t0:916_7: visuṃyevāpattikarā ca hoti. Aññavādakasikkhāpadādīsu viyāti aññavādakasikkhāpadādīsu
tika-vin09t0:916_8: “vihesake”tiādikā viyāti attho. Ādisaddena ujjhāpanakassa pariggaho. Ettha hi aññavādakādito
tika-vin09t0:916_9: visuṃyeva vihesakādīsupi pācittiyaṃ hoti. Yathāha “ropite vihesake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:916_10: vā āpattiyā vā anayuñjiyamāno taṃ nakathetukāmo taṃ naugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ
tika-vin09t0:916_11: viheseti, āpatti pācittiyassā”tiādi. Supinante vijjamānāpi mocanassādacetanā abbohārikattā
tika-vin09t0:916_12: anāpattikarāti āha “aññatra supinantātiādikā viyā”ti. Tathā hi thinamiddhena abhibhūtattā
tika-vin09t0:916_13: supine cittaṃ abbohārikaṃ, cittassa abbohārikattā opakkamanakiriyāpavattanikāpi cetanā
tika-vin09t0:916_14: abbohārikā. Vuttañhetaṃ “atthesā, bhikkhave, cetanā, sā ca kho abbohārikā”ti, tasmā
tika-vin09t0:916_15: “aññatra supinantā”ti ayaṃ anupaññatti anāpattikarā jātā. Ādisaddena “aññatra adhimānā”tiādikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:916_16: saṅgaṇhāti. Adinnādānādīsu viyāti adinnādānādīsu “araññā vā”tiādikā viyāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:916_17: Ettha pana ādisaddena paṭhamapārājikādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Ettha hi “tañca kho gāme, no
tika-vin09t0:916_18: araññe”tiādinā nayena lesaṃ oḍḍentānaṃ lesapidahanatthaṃ “araññā vā”tiādikā anupaññatti
tika-vin09t0:916_19: vuttāti upatthambhakarāva hoti. Teneva hi “nanu, āvuso, tathevetaṃ hotī”ti bhikkhūhi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:917_1: Imassa pana “chinne”ti iminā sambandho. Tacādīni anavasesetvāti nimittappadese bahi
tika-vin09t0:917_2: ṭhitāni chavicammāni anavasesetvā. Nimittasaṇṭhānamattaṃ paññāyatīti nimittamaṃsassa
tika-vin09t0:917_3: pana abbhantare chavicammassa ca vijjamānattā vuttaṃ. Cammakhilanti cammakkhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:917_4: “Uṇṇigaṇḍo”tipi vadanti. Tañhi nimitte jātattā nimittameva. Tenāha “sevanacitte sati
tika-vin09t0:917_5: pārājika”nti. Sevanacitteti methunasevanacitte. Kāyasaṃsaggasevanacitte pana sati
tika-vin09t0:917_6: saṅghādisesova. Naṭṭho kāyappasādo etthāti naṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ, sukkhapīḷakaṃ vā matacammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:917_7: vāti attho. Mate akkhāyite, yebhuyyena akkhāyite ca pārājikāpattivacanato pana naṭṭhakāyappasādepi
tika-vin09t0:917_10: vaṇasaṅgahavasena. Vaṇe thullaccayañca “amaggena amaggaṃ paveseti, āpatti thullaccayassā”ti
tika-vin09t0:917_11: imassa suttassa vasena veditabbaṃ. Tasmiñhi sutte dvīsu sambhinnavaṇesu ekena vaṇena
tika-vin09t0:917_12: pavesetvā dutiyena nīharantassa thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ. Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:917_13: “imassa sattassa anulomavasena sabbattha vaṇasaṅkhepe thullaccayaṃ veditabba”nti.
tika-vin09t0:917_14: Manussānaṃ pana akkhiādayopi vaṇasaṅgahaṃ gacchantīti vaṇena ekaparicchedaṃ katvā
tika-vin09t0:917_17: manussānaṃ. Vatthikosesūti vatthipuṭesu purisānaṃ aṅgajātakosesu. Hatthiassādīnañca
tika-vin09t0:917_19: panāti sabbesampi tiracchānagatānaṃ. Sabbesanti yathāvuttamanussādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:918_0: Evaṃ jīvamānakasarīre labbhamānaṃ āpattivisesaṃ dassetvā idāni matasarīre labbhamānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:918_2: catūsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā yadā apare dve koṭṭhāsā khāditā, tadā upaḍḍhakkhāyitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:918_3: nāma hoti. Na kuthitaṃ hotīti uddhumātakādibhāvena kuthitaṃ na hoti, allanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:918_4: Yadā pana sarīraṃ uddhumātakaṃ hoti kuthitaṃ nīlamakkhikasamākiṇṇaṃ kimikulasamākulaṃ
tika-vin09t0:918_5: navahi vaṇamukhehi paggaḷitapubbakuṇapabhāvena upagantumpi asakkuṇeyyaṃ, tadā pārājikavatthuñca
tika-vin09t0:918_6: thullaccayavatthuñca vijahati, dukkaṭavatthumeva hotīti āha “kuthite dukkaṭa”nti.
tika-vin09t0:918_7: Kuthiteti uddhumātakabhāvappatte. Īdise hi sarīre yattha katthaci upakkamato dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:918_8: Tathā vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassāti vivaṭṭe mukhe cattāri
tika-vin09t0:918_9: passāni, tālukañca apphusantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa dukkaṭanti attho. Sace pana
tika-vin09t0:918_10: heṭṭhā vā upari vā ubhayapassehi vā chupantaṃ paveseti, pārājikaṃ. Catūhi passehi
tika-vin09t0:918_11: acchupantaṃ pavesetvā abbhantare tālukaṃ chupati, pārājikameva. Bahi nikkhantajivhāya
tika-vin09t0:918_12: vā dantesu vā aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa thullaccayanti sambandho. Jīvamānakasarīrepi
tika-vin09t0:918_13: bahi nikkhantajivhāya thullaccayameva. Yadi pana bahi jivhāya paliveṭhetvā antomukhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:918_14: paveseti, pārājikameva. Yadi pana dantā suphusitā, antomukhe okāso natthi, dantā
tika-vin09t0:918_15: ca bahi oṭṭhamaṃsena paṭicchannā, tattha vātena asamphuṭṭhaṃ allokāsaṃ tilaphalamattampi
tika-vin09t0:918_16: pavesentassa pārājikameva. Uppāṭite pana oṭṭhamaṃse dantesuyeva upakkamantassa thullaccayaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:918_17: Yopi danto bahi nikkhamanto tiṭṭhati, na sakkā oṭṭhehi pidahituṃ, tatthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:919_0: Vedanāya aṭṭo pīḷito vedanāṭṭo. Ummattakoti cettha pittummattako adhippetoti āha
tika-vin09t0:919_1: “yo pittavasenā”tiādi. Pittavasenāti baddhapittavasena. Tasmiñhi baddhapitte pittakosato
tika-vin09t0:919_2: calitvā bahi nikkhamante sattā ummattakā honti, vipallatthasaññā hirottappaṃ chaḍḍetvā
tika-vin09t0:919_3: asāruppacariyaṃ caranti, lahukagarukāni sikkhāpadāni maddantāpi na jānanti, bhesajjakiriyāyapi
tika-vin09t0:919_4: atekicchā honti, evarūpassa ummattakassa anāpatti. Abaddhapittaṃ pana lohitaṃ viya
tika-vin09t0:919_5: sabbaṅgagataṃ, tamhi kupite sattānaṃ kaṇḍukacchusarīrakampādīni honti, tāni bhesajjakiriyāya
tika-vin09t0:919_6: vūpasamanti. Tena vuttaṃ “baddhapittavasenā”ti. Khittacitto nāma vissaṭṭhacitto yakkhummattako
tika-vin09t0:919_7: vuccatīti āha “yakkhehi katacittavikkhepo khittacitto”ti. Yakkhā kira bheravāni ārammaṇāni
tika-vin09t0:919_8: dassetvā mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā, hadayarūpaṃ vā maddantā satte vikkhittacitte
tika-vin09t0:919_9: vipallatthasaññe karonti, evarūpassa khittacittassa anāpatti. Tesaṃ pana ubhinnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:919_10: ayaṃ viseso – pittummattako niccameva ummattako hoti, pakatisaññaṃ na labhati. Yakkhummattako
tika-vin09t0:919_11: antarantarā pakatisaññaṃ paṭilabhati. Idha pana pittummattako vā hotu, yakkhummattako
tika-vin09t0:919_12: vā, yo sabbaso muṭṭhassati kiñci na jānāti, aggimpi suvaṇṇampi gūthampi candanampi
tika-vin09t0:919_13: ekasadisaṃ maddantova vicarati, evarūpassa anāpatti. Antarantarā pakatisaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā
tika-vin09t0:919_14: ñatvā karontassa pana āpattiyeva. Tenāha “dvinnampi ca etesa”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:920_0: Adhimattavedanāyāti adhikappamāṇāya dukkhavedanāya. Ādikamme niyutto ādikammiko,
tika-vin09t0:920_1: yo ca ādikamme niyutto, so tasmiṃ kamme ādibhūto hotīti āha “yo”tiādi. Idha pana
tika-vin09t0:920_2: sudinnatthero ādikammiko, tassa anāpatti. Avasesānaṃ makkaṭisamaṇavajjiputtakādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:920_3: āpattiyeva. Paṭipādanaṃ sampādanaṃ. Karontoyeva hi taṃ āpajjatīti kiriyaṃ. Idaṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:920_4: yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ methunadhamme parūpakkame sati sādiyantassa akiriyasamuṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:920_5: Methunappaṭisaṃyuttāya hi kāmasaññāya abhāvena muccanato saññāvimokkhaṃ. “Anāpatti
tika-vin09t0:920_6: ajānantassa, asādiyantassā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Methunacitteneva naṃ āpajjati, na vinā cittenāti
tika-vin09t0:920_7: sacittakaṃ. Rāgavaseneva āpajjitabbato lokavajjaṃ. Kāyadvāreneva samuṭṭhānato kāyakammaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:920_8: Cittaṃ panettha aṅgamattaṃ hoti, na tassa vasena kammabhāvo labbhati. Lobhacitteneva
tika-vin09t0:920_9: āpajjitabbato akusalacittaṃ. Sukhasamaṅgī vā upekkhāsamaṅgī vā āpajjatīti dvivedanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:920_10: Nanu samuṭṭhānādīni āpattiyā honti, na sikkhāpadassa, atha kasmā sikkhāpadassa samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin09t0:920_11: vuttānīti āha “imāni ca samuṭṭhānādīni nāmā”tiādi. Āpattiyā hontīti ajjhācārassa honti.
tika-vin09t0:921: Munanato anumunanato muti, ñāṇaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti mutimā, ñāṇavāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:924_0: Etthāti etesu dvīsu. Ekakuṭikādibhedo sabbopi gāmoti veditabboti sambandho. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:924_1: ekakuṭikādibhedoti yasmiṃ gāme ekā eva kuṭi ekaṃ gehaṃ seyyathāpi malayajanapade,
tika-vin09t0:924_2: ayaṃ ekakuṭiko gāmo nāma. Ādisaddena “dvikuṭikopi gāmo, tikuṭikopi gāmo, catukkuṭikopi
tika-vin09t0:924_3: gāmo”ti vuttappabhedaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Abhinavaniviṭṭho ekakuṭikādigāmo pana yāva manussā
tika-vin09t0:924_4: pavisitvā vāsaṃ na kappenti, tāva gāmasaṅkhaṃ na gacchati. Kiṃbhūtoti āha “parikkhitto
tika-vin09t0:924_5: vā”tiādi. Tattha parikkhitto nāma iṭṭhakapākāraṃ ādiṃ katvā antamaso kaṇṭakasākhāhipi
tika-vin09t0:924_6: parikkhitto. Tabbiparīto aparikkhitto. Amanusso nāma yo sabbaso vā manussānaṃ abhāvena
tika-vin09t0:924_7: yakkhapariggahabhūto, yato vā manussā kenaci karaṇīyena punapi āgantukāmā eva apakkantā,
tika-vin09t0:924_8: yato pana nirapekkhā hutvā pakkamanti, so gāmasaṅkhaṃ na gacchati. Na kevalaṃ ekakuṭikādibhedovāti
tika-vin09t0:924_9: āha “antamaso”tiādi. Yo koci satthopīti jaṅghasatthasakaṭasatthādīsu yo koci satthopi.
tika-vin09t0:924_10: Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade nigamanagarāni viya gāmaggahaṇeneva gāmūpacāropi saṅgahitoti āha
tika-vin09t0:924_11: “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti. Aññathā pana mātikāya anavasesato avahāraṭṭhānapariggaho
tika-vin09t0:924_12: kato nāma na hoti, na ca buddhā sāvasesaṃ pārājikaṃ paññāpenti.
tika-vin09t0:925_0: Tatthāti tesu gāmagāmūpacāresu. Dvāreti nibbakosassa udakapatanaṭṭhānato abbhantare.
tika-vin09t0:925_1: Antogeheti pamukhassa abbhantare. Kataparikkhepoti pākāravatiādīhi kataparikkhepo.
tika-vin09t0:925_2: Suppapatanādiparicchedo panettha aparikkhittagharaṃ sandhāya vutto. Na kevalaṃ gharassa
tika-vin09t0:925_3: purato, atha kho samantato tattakova paricchedo gharūpacāro nāmāti gahetabbaṃ. “Purato”tiādikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:925_4: pana lokiyehi tathākaraṇato vuttaṃ. Thāmamajjhimassāti majjhimathāmassa, neva appathāmassa,
tika-vin09t0:925_5: na mahāthāmassāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Yathā taruṇamanussā”tiādinā yathā mātugāmo kāke uḍḍāpento
tika-vin09t0:925_6: ujukameva hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā leḍḍuṃ khipati, yathā ca udakukkhepe udakaṃ khipanti,
tika-vin09t0:925_7: evaṃ khittassa leḍḍussa patitaṭṭhānaṃ paṭikkhipati. Pavattitvāti luṭhitvā, parivattitvāti
tika-vin09t0:925_8: vuttaṃ hoti. Tassa sace dve indakhīlā hontīti tassa parikkhittassa gāmassa sace anurādhapurasseva
tika-vin09t0:925_9: dve ummārā honti. Yassa pana eko, tassa gāmadvārabāhānaṃ vemajjhe ṭhitassa leḍḍupātabbhantaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:925_10: gāmūpacāro nāma. Yatra pana indakhīlo natthi, tatra gāmadvārabāhānaṃ vemajjhaṃ. Yatra
tika-vin09t0:925_11: dvārabāhāpi natthi, tattha ubhosu passesu vatiyā vā pākārassa vā koṭivemajjhaṃva
tika-vin09t0:925_12: indakhīlaṭṭhāniyattā indakhīloti gahetabbaṃ. Yo pana gāmo pubbe mahā hutvā pacchā
tika-vin09t0:925_13: kulesu naṭṭhesu appako hoti, so gharūpacārato leḍḍupāteneva paricchinditabbo. Purimaparicchedo
tika-vin09t0:925_14: panassa parikkhittassāpi aparikkhittassāpi appamāṇamevāti. Nanu cetaṃ aparikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:925_15: upacāradassanaṃ padabhājanena viruddhamiva dissati. Tattha hi “gāmūpacāro nāma parikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:925_16: gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti vatvā “aparikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:925_17: gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:925_18: na pana taṃ leḍḍupātaṃ gāmasaṅkhepaṃ katvā tato paraṃ gāmūpacāroti vuttoti āha “padabhājanepi
tika-vin09t0:926_0: Ayamettha adhippāyo – idha gāmo nāma duvidho hoti parikkhitto ca aparikkhitto ca.
tika-vin09t0:926_1: Tatra parikkhittassa parikkhepoyeva paricchedo. Tasmā tassa visuṃ paricchedaṃ avatvā
tika-vin09t0:926_2: “gāmūpacāro nāma parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa
tika-vin09t0:926_3: leḍḍupāto”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Aparikkhittassa pana gāmassa gāmaparicchedo vattabbo.
tika-vin09t0:926_4: Tasmā tassa gāmassa gāmaparicchedadassanatthaṃ “aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre
tika-vin09t0:926_5: ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti vuttaṃ. Gāmaparicchede ca dassite gāmūpacāralakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:926_6: pubbe vuttanayeneva sakkā ñātunti puna “tattha ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti
tika-vin09t0:926_7: na vuttaṃ, attho pana tatthāpi ayameva yathāvuttoti. Yo pana gharūpacāre ṭhitassa
tika-vin09t0:926_8: leḍḍupātaṃyeva “gāmūpacāro”ti vadati, tassa gharūpacāro “gāmo”ti āpajjati. Tato gharaṃ
tika-vin09t0:926_9: gharūpacāro, gāmo gāmūpacāroti esa vibhāgo saṅkarīyati. Asaṃkarato cettha vinicchayo
tika-vin09t0:926_10: veditabbo. Tasmā pāḷiñca aṭṭhakathañca saṃsanditvā vuttanayenevettha gāmo, gāmūpacāro ca veditabboti.
tika-vin09t0:927_0: Tatthāti tesu dvīsu upacāresu. Yvāyaṃ upacāro dassitoti sambandho. Vikāle gāmappavesanādīsūti
tika-vin09t0:927_1: ettha ādisaddena asaṃkaccikāgāmappavesanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Yo pana parikkhittassa gāmassa
tika-vin09t0:927_2: upacāro vutto, so na katthaci vinayapiṭake upayogaṃ gato. Kevalaṃ aparikkhittassa
tika-vin09t0:927_3: parikkhepokāsato aparo eko leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāro nāmāti ñāpanatthaṃ vutto. Evaṃ vutte
tika-vin09t0:927_4: hi ñāyati “parikkhittassāpi ce gāmassa eko leḍḍupāto kappiyabhūmi samāno upacāroti
tika-vin09t0:927_5: vutto, pageva aparikkhittassa parikkhepokāsato eko”ti. Imesaṃ paricchedadassanatthanti
tika-vin09t0:927_6: imesaṃ gāmāraññānaṃ paricchedadassanatthaṃ vuttā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Pārājikavatthunti
tika-vin09t0:928_0: Adinnanti dantaponasikkhāpade attano santakampi appaṭiggahitakaṃ kappiyaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:928_1: vuccati, idha pana yaṃ kiñci parapariggahitaṃ sasāmikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, tadetaṃ tehi sāmikehi
tika-vin09t0:928_2: kāyena vā vācāya vā na dinnanti adinnaṃ. Avahārappahonakameva pana dassetuṃ “aññassa
tika-vin09t0:928_3: manussajātikassa santaka”nti vuttaṃ. Saṅkhāsaddasseva ta-kārena vaḍḍhetvā vuttattā
tika-vin09t0:928_4: “saṅkhā saṅkhātanti atthato eka”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha atthato ekanti padatthato ekaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:928_5: anatthantaranti vuttaṃ hoti. Koṭṭhāsassetaṃ nāmaṃ bhāgato saṅkhāyati upaṭṭhātīti
tika-vin09t0:928_6: katvā. Papañcasaṅkhāti sattānaṃ saṃsāre papañcenti cirāyantīti papañcā, taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo,
tika-vin09t0:928_7: yassa vā uppannā, taṃ “ratto”ti vā “matto”ti vā “micchādiṭṭhiniviṭṭho”ti vā papañcenti
tika-vin09t0:928_8: byañjentīti papañcā, saṅkhā vuccati koṭṭhāso, papañcāva saṅkhā papañcasaṅkhā, papañcakoṭṭhāsāti
tika-vin09t0:928_9: attho, taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyoti vuttaṃ hoti. Theyyacittasaṅkhātoti “theyyacitto”ti kathito.
tika-vin09t0:928_11: cittakoṭṭhāso. Theyyasaṅkhātenāti theyyabhūtacittakoṭṭhāsena. Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā
tika-vin09t0:928_12: etassa vibhaṅge “theyyacitto avaharaṇacitto”ti vuttanti āha “yo cā”tiādi. Byañjanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:928_13: anādiyitvāti byañjane ādaraṃ akatvāti attho, saddatthamanapekkhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:929_0: Te pana avahārāti te pañcavīsati avahārā. Saviññāṇakāviññāṇakavasena nānāvidho bhaṇḍo
tika-vin09t0:929_1: etassa pañcakassāti nānābhaṇḍaṃ, pañcannaṃ avahārānaṃ samūho pañcakaṃ, pañcaparimāṇamassāti
tika-vin09t0:929_2: vā pañcakaṃ, nānābhaṇḍameva pañcakaṃ nānābhaṇḍapañcakaṃ. Saviññāṇakavasena eko bhaṇḍo
tika-vin09t0:929_3: etassāti ekabhaṇḍaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Sāhatthikova pañcakaṃ sāhatthikapañcakaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:929_4: Ādipadavasena cetaṃ nāmaṃ kusalādittikassa kusalattikavohāro viya. Tasmā sāhatthikādipañcakanti
tika-vin09t0:929_5: atthato daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo sesesu pañcakadvayesu. Etassevāti “ādiyeyyā”ti etasseva
tika-vin09t0:929_6: mātikāpadassa. Imesaṃ padānaṃ vasenāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ padānaṃ vasena. Ettha ca
tika-vin09t0:929_7: paṭhamapadaṃ abhiyogavasena vuttaṃ, dutiyapadaṃ aññesaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ harantassa gacchato
tika-vin09t0:929_8: vasena, tatiyapadaṃ upanikkhittabhaṇḍavasena, catutthaṃ saviññāṇakavasena, pañcamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:930_0: Idāni nesaṃ atthayojanaṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti tesu dvīsu pañcakesu.
tika-vin09t0:930_1: Itaranti ekabhaṇḍapañcakaṃ. Ārāmanti pupphārāmaphalārāmaṃ. Abhiyuñjatīti parasantakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:930_2: “mama santakova aya”nti musā bhaṇitvā abhiyuñjati codeti, aṭṭaṃ karotīti attho. Sampajānamusāvādepi
tika-vin09t0:930_3: adinnādānassa pubbapayogattā dukkaṭanti āha “āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti, dukkaṭasaṅkhātā
tika-vin09t0:930_4: āpatti bhaveyyāti attho. Atha vā dukkaṭasaññitassa vītikkamassa āpajjananti attho.
tika-vin09t0:930_5: Esa nayo “āpatti thullaccayassā”tiādīsu. Sāmikassa vimatiṃ uppādetīti vinicchayakusalatāya,
tika-vin09t0:930_6: balavanissitādibhāvena vā ārāmasāmikassa saṃsayaṃ janeti. Kathaṃ? Tañhi tathā vinicchayappasutaṃ
tika-vin09t0:930_7: disvā sāmiko cinteti “sakkhissāmi nu kho ahaṃ imaṃ ārāmaṃ attano kātuṃ, na sakkhissāmi
tika-vin09t0:930_8: nu kho”ti. Evaṃ tassa vimati uppajjamānā tena uppāditā hoti. Dhuraṃ nikkhipatīti
tika-vin09t0:930_9: yadā pana sāmiko “ayaṃ thaddho kakkhaḷo jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyampi me kareyya,
tika-vin09t0:930_10: alaṃ dāni mayhaṃ iminā ārāmenā”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati, ussāhaṃ ṭhapeti, attano santakakaraṇe
tika-vin09t0:930_11: nirussāho hotīti attho. Āpatti pārājikassa sace sayampi katadhuranikkhepo cāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:930_12: Atha pana sāmikena dhure nikkhittepi abhiyuñjako dhuraṃ anikkhipitvāva “imaṃ suṭṭhu
tika-vin09t0:930_13: pīḷetvā mama āṇāpavattiṃ dassetvā kiṅkārappaṭissāvibhāve ṭhapetvā dassāmī”ti dātabbabhāve
tika-vin09t0:930_14: saussāho, rakkhati tāva. Athāpi abhiyuñjako acchinditvā “na dāni imaṃ imassa dassāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:930_15: dhuraṃ nikkhipati, sāmiko pana dhuraṃ na nikkhipati, pakkhaṃ pariyesati, kālaṃ āgameti,
tika-vin09t0:930_16: “lajjiparisaṃ tāva labhāmi, pacchā jānissāmī”ti gahaṇeyeva saussāho hoti, rakkhatiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:930_17: Yadā pana “sopi na dassāmī”ti, “sāmikopi na lacchāmī”ti evaṃ ubho dhuraṃ nikkhipanti,
tika-vin09t0:931_0: Aññassa bhaṇḍaṃ harantoti vetanena vā mittabhāvena vā aññassa bhaṇḍaṃ haranto. Sīse
tika-vin09t0:931_1: bhāranti sīse ṭhitabhāraṃ. Sīsassa tāva purimagale galavāṭako, piṭṭhigale kesañci
tika-vin09t0:931_2: kesante āvaṭṭo hoti, galasseva ubhosu passesu kesañci kesā oruyha jāyanti, ye “kaṇṇacūḷikā”ti
tika-vin09t0:931_3: vuccanti, tesaṃ adhobhāgo cāti ayaṃ heṭṭhimako paricchedo, tato upari sīsaṃ, etthantare
tika-vin09t0:931_4: ṭhitabhāranti vuttaṃ hoti. Khandhaṃ oropetīti ubhosu passesu kaṇṇacūḷikāhi paṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:931_5: heṭṭhā, kapparehi paṭṭhāya upari, piṭṭhigalāvaṭṭato ca galavāṭakato ca paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā,
tika-vin09t0:931_6: piṭṭhivemajjhāvaṭṭato ca uraparicchedamajjhe, hadayāvāṭakato ca paṭṭhāya upari khandho, taṃ oropeti.
tika-vin09t0:932_0: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – yo bhikkhu “idaṃ gahetvā ettha yāhī”ti sāmikehi anāṇatto
tika-vin09t0:932_1: sayameva “mayhaṃ idaṃ nāma detha, ahaṃ vo bhaṇḍaṃ vahāmī”ti tesaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sīsena
tika-vin09t0:932_2: ādāya gacchanto theyyacittena taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āmasati, dukkaṭaṃ. Yathāvuttasīsaparicchedaṃ
tika-vin09t0:932_3: anatikkamantova ito cito ca ghaṃsanto sāretipi paccāsāretipi, thullaccayaṃ. Khandhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:932_4: oropitamatte kiñcāpi sāmikānaṃ “vahatū”ti cittaṃ atthi, tehi pana anāṇattattā pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:932_5: Khandhaṃ pana anoropetvāpi sīsato kesaggamattampi cāventassa pārājikaṃ. Yamakabhārassa
tika-vin09t0:932_6: pana eko bhāgo sīse patiṭṭhāti, eko piṭṭhiyaṃ, tattha dvinnaṃ ṭhānānaṃ vasena vinicchayo
tika-vin09t0:932_7: veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana suddhasīsabhārasseva vasena vutto. Yo cāyaṃ sīsabhāre vutto,
tika-vin09t0:933_0: Upanikkhittaṃ bhaṇḍanti saṅgopanatthāya attano hatthe parehi ṭhapitabhaṇḍaṃ. Ahaṃ
tika-vin09t0:933_1: na gaṇhāmīti sambandho. Atītatthe cetaṃ vattamānavacanaṃ, nāhaṃ gahesinti attho.
tika-vin09t0:933_2: Dukkaṭaṃ sampajānamusāvādepi adinnādānassa pubbapayogattā. “Kiṃ tumhe bhaṇatha, nevidaṃ
tika-vin09t0:933_3: mayhaṃ anurūpaṃ, na tumhāka”ntiādīni vadantassāpi dukkaṭameva. Sāmikassa vimatiṃ
tika-vin09t0:933_4: uppādetīti “raho mayā etassa hatthe ṭhapitaṃ, na añño koci jānāti, dassati nu kho
tika-vin09t0:933_5: me, no”ti sāmikassa vimatiṃ uppādeti. Dhuraṃ nikkhipatīti tassa pharusādibhāvaṃ disvā
tika-vin09t0:933_6: ussāhaṃ ṭhapeti. Tatra sacāyaṃ bhikkhu “kilametvā naṃ dassāmī”ti dāne saussāho, rakkhati
tika-vin09t0:933_7: tāva. Sace so dāne nirussāho, bhaṇḍasāmiko pana gahaṇe saussāho, rakkhateva. Yadi
tika-vin09t0:933_8: pana so tasmiṃ dāne nirussāho, bhaṇḍasāmikopi “na mayhaṃ dassatī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati,
tika-vin09t0:933_9: evaṃ ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepena bhikkhuno pārājikaṃ. Yadipi mukhena “dassāmī”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:933_10: cittena pana adātukāmo, evampi sāmikassa dhuranikkhepena bhikkhuno pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:934_0: Sahabhaṇḍahārakaṃ nessāmīti “sahabhaṇḍahārakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ nessāmī”ti cintetvā. Paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:934_1: pādaṃ atikkāmetīti bhaṇḍahārakaṃ tajjetvā tassa gamanapathaṃ vāretvā attanā rucitamaggaṃ
tika-vin09t0:934_2: ekapādaṃ atikkāmeti. Thalaṭṭhanti thale nikkhittaṃ, bhūmitale vā pāsāṇapabbatatalādīsu
tika-vin09t0:934_3: vā yattha katthaci paṭicchanne vā appaṭicchanne vā ṭhapitanti attho. Phandāpeti,
tika-vin09t0:934_4: thullaccayanti yo phandāpeti, tassa payoge payoge thullaccayaṃ, āmasane dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:934_5: phandāpane thullaccayañca visuṃ visuṃ theyyacittena āmasanaphandāpanapayoge karontasseva
tika-vin09t0:934_6: hoti. “Ekapayogena gaṇhantassa pana uddhāre pārājikameva, na dukkaṭathullaccayānī”ti
tika-vin09t0:934_7: vadanti. Ṭhānāti ṭhitaṭṭhānato. Sace taṃ thalaṭṭhaṃ rāsikataṃ hoti, antokumbhiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:934_9: pakkamadhuphāṇitavinicchayena vinicchinitabbaṃ. Sace garukaṃ hoti bhārabaddhaṃ lohapiṇḍitelamadhughaṭādi
tika-vin09t0:934_10: vā, kumbhiyaṃ ṭhānācāvanavinicchayena vinicchinitabbaṃ. Saṅkhalikābaddhassa ca ṭhānabhedo
tika-vin09t0:934_11: sallakkhetabbo. Pattharitvā ṭhapitaṃ pana pāvārattharaṇakaṭasārakādiṃ ujukaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin09t0:934_12: ākaḍḍhati, pārimante orimantena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ atikkante pārājikaṃ. Tatheva gahetvā
tika-vin09t0:934_13: parato pellati, pārimante phuṭṭhokāsaṃ orimante atikkante pārājikaṃ. Vāmato vā dakkhiṇato
tika-vin09t0:934_14: vā apanāmentassa vāmantena vā dakkhiṇantena vā phuṭṭhokāsaṃ dakkhiṇante vā vāmante
tika-vin09t0:934_15: vā atikkante pārājikaṃ. Veṭhetvā uddharati, kesaggamattaṃ ākāsagataṃ karontassa pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:935_0: Sako hattho sahattho, tena nibbatto, tassa vā sambandhīti sāhatthiko, avahāro. Āṇāpanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:935_1: āṇatti, tāya āṇattiyā nibbatto avahāro āṇattiko. Nissajjanaṃ nissaggo, suṅkaghātaṭṭhāne,
tika-vin09t0:935_2: parikappitokāse ca ṭhatvā bhaṇḍassa bahi nipātanaṃ, nissaggova nissaggiyo. Kiriyāsiddhito
tika-vin09t0:935_3: puretarameva pārājikāpattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sādhetīti atthasādhako. Dhurassa ālayasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin09t0:935_4: bhārassa nikkhipanaṃ pariccajanaṃ nirussāhabhāvāpajjanaṃ dhuranikkhepo. Idāni byañjane
tika-vin09t0:935_5: ādaraṃ akatvā tesaṃ atthamattameva dassento “tattha sāhatthiko nāmā”tiādimāha. Sahatthāti
tika-vin09t0:935_6: sahatthena. Karaṇatthe hi idaṃ nissakkavacanaṃ. “Asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti aññaṃ
tika-vin09t0:935_7: āṇāpetīti etthāpi āṇattikkhaṇe eva āpatti daṭṭhabbā. Yadi evaṃ imassa, atthasādhakassa
tika-vin09t0:935_8: ca ko visesoti? Taṃ khaṇaṃ eva gahaṇe niyuñjanaṃ āṇattikapayogo, kālantarena gahaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:935_9: niyogo atthasādhakoti ayametesaṃ visesoti. Tenevāha “asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ yadā sakkosi,
tika-vin09t0:936_1: tesaṃ. Tattha suṅkaghātanti rukkhapabbatādisaññāṇena niyamitassa suṅkaṭṭhānassetaṃ
tika-vin09t0:936_2: adhivacanaṃ. Tañhi yasmā tato rājadeyyabhāgaṃ suṅkaṃ adatvā nīharantā rañño suṅkaṃ
tika-vin09t0:937_0: Koci parapariveṇādīni paviṭṭho kiñci lobhaneyyabhaṇḍaṃ disvā dvārappamukhādivasena
tika-vin09t0:937_1: yaṃ ṭhānaṃ “sace maṃ etthantare passissanti, daṭṭhukāmatāya gahetvā vicaranto viya
tika-vin09t0:937_2: dassāmi, no ce passissanti, harissāmī”ti parikappeti, ayaṃ parikappitokāso. Āṇattikkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin09t0:937_3: pārājikanti atthasādhakacetanākkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ. Sacepi avahārako saṭṭhivassātikkamenapi
tika-vin09t0:937_4: taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati, āṇāpako ca antarāyeva kālaṃ karoti, hīnāya vā āvattati, assamaṇova
tika-vin09t0:937_5: hutvā kālaṃ vā karissati, hīnāya vā āvattissati, avahārakassa pana avahārakkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin09t0:937_6: pārājikaṃ. Pādagghanakatelanti ettha pādo nāma kahāpaṇassa catuttho bhāgo, taṃ agghatīti
tika-vin09t0:937_7: pādagghanakaṃ, pādagghanakañca taṃ telañcāti pādagghanakatelaṃ. Upāhanā ādi yesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:937_8: vatthūnaṃ tāni upāhanādīni. Ādisaddena dukūlasāṭakacammakkhaṇḍādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Pakkhipatīti
tika-vin09t0:937_9: theyyacittena pakkhipati. Tenāha “hatthato muttamatteyeva pārājika”nti sace pana
tika-vin09t0:937_10: attanopi kumbhiyaṃ añño sappiṃ vā telaṃ vā ākirati, tatra cāyaṃ theyyacittena telapivanakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:938_0: Kāyena vā vācāya vā payuñjanaṃ āṇāpanaṃ payogo, āṇattassa bhaṇḍaggahaṇato pubbattā
tika-vin09t0:938_1: pubbo, iti pubbo ca so payogo cāti pubbapayogo. Payogena saha vattamāno avahāro sahapayogo.
tika-vin09t0:938_2: Samaṃ ekī hutvā vidahitvā mantetvā avaharaṇaṃ saṃvidhāvahāro, aññamaññaṃ saññuppattiyā
tika-vin09t0:938_3: katāvahāroti vuttaṃ hoti. Pubbaṇhādikālaparicchedena sañjānanaṃ saṅketo, tassa kammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:938_4: saṅketakammaṃ. Nimittassa kammaṃ nimittakammaṃ, saññuppādanatthaṃ kassaci nimittassa
tika-vin09t0:938_5: karaṇanti attho. Tatthāti yathāvuttesu pubbapayogādīsu pañcasu. Khilādīni saṅkāmetvā
tika-vin09t0:938_6: khettādiggahaṇavasenāti khilaṃ, rajjuṃ, vatiṃ, mariyādaṃ vā pākāraṃ vā saṅkāmetvā
tika-vin09t0:938_7: khettaggahaṇavasena, khilaṃ, rajjuṃ, vatiṃ, mariyādaṃ vā pākāraṃ vā saṅkāmetvā vatthuggahaṇavasena.
tika-vin09t0:938_8: Sace pana dvīhi khilehi gahetabbaṃ hoti, paṭhame khile thullaccayaṃ, dutiye pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:938_9: Sace tīhi gahetabbaṃ hoti, paṭhame dukkaṭaṃ, dutiye thullaccayaṃ, tatiye pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:938_10: Evaṃ bahukesupi avasāne dve ṭhapetvā purimehi dukkaṭaṃ, avasāne dvinnaṃ ekena thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:938_11: itarena pārājikaṃ. Rajjupasāraṇādīsupi eseva nayo. Yaṃ pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ “tañca
tika-vin09t0:938_12: kho sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepenā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ “khettaṃ abhiyuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādi
tika-vin09t0:938_13: -adhikāre vuttattā abhiyogavasena gahaṇaṃ sandhāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saṃvidahitvāti etasseva
tika-vin09t0:938_14: vevacanaṃ. Saṃmantayitvāti ekacchandatāya ekajjhāsayatāya bhaṇitvāti attho. Imasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:938_15: avahāre asammohatthaṃ “evaṃ saṃvidahitvā gatesu hī”tiādimāha. Sañjānanakammanti pubbaṇhādikālaparicchedavasena
tika-vin09t0:939_0: Ettha ca “purebhattaṃ avaharā”ti vutte ajja vā purebhattaṃ avaharatu, sve vā, anāgate
tika-vin09t0:939_1: vā saṃvacchare, natthi visaṅketo, ubhinnampi pārājikaṃ. Sace pana “ajja purebhattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:939_2: avaharā”ti vutte sve avaharati. “Ajjā”ti niyamitaṃ saṅketaṃ atikkamma pacchā avahaṭaṃ
tika-vin09t0:939_3: hoti. Sace “sve purebhattaṃ avaharā”ti vutte ajja purebhattaṃ avaharati, “sve”ti
tika-vin09t0:939_4: niyamitaṃ taṃ saṅketaṃ apatvā pure avahaṭaṃ hoti, evaṃ avaharantassa avahārakasseva
tika-vin09t0:939_5: pārājikaṃ, mūlaṭṭhassa anāpatti. “Sveva purebhatta”nti vutte tadaheva vā, sve pacchābhattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:939_6: vā avaharantopi taṃsaṅketato pure ca pacchā ca avaharati. Yo pana evaṃakatvā yathāparicchinnakālameva
tika-vin09t0:939_7: avaharati, ayaṃ saṅketato apure apacchā taṃ avaharatīti veditabbo. Esa nayo pacchābhattarattindivesupi,
tika-vin09t0:939_9: veditabbā. Parabhaṇḍāvahārasaññuppādassa hetuttā akkhinikhaṇādīneva nimittanti akkhinikhaṇādinimittaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:940_0: Theno vuccati coro, tassa bhāvo theyyaṃ, tena avaharaṇaṃ theyyāvahāro. Pasayha abhibhavitvā
tika-vin09t0:940_1: avaharaṇaṃ pasayhāvahāro. Vatthasuttādikaṃ paricchijja kappanaṃ parikappo, tena avaharaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:940_2: parikappāvahāro. Tiṇapaṇṇādīhi paṭicchannassa avahāro paṭicchannāvahāro. Kusena avahāro
tika-vin09t0:940_3: kusāvahāro. Kūṭamānakūṭakahāpaṇādīhīti ettha kūṭamānaṃ nāma hadayabhedasikhābhedarajjubhedavasena
tika-vin09t0:940_4: tividhaṃ mānakūṭaṃ. Tattha hadayanti nāḷiādimānabhājanānaṃ abbhantaraṃ, tassa bhedo
tika-vin09t0:940_5: chiddakaraṇaṃ hadayabhedo, so sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhāchiddena
tika-vin09t0:940_6: mānena “saṇikaṃ āsiñcā”ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto
tika-vin09t0:940_7: ca chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti.
tika-vin09t0:941: Sikhābhedo pana tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti.
tika-vin09t0:942: Rajjubhedo khettavatthuminanakāle labbhati. Khettādiṃ minantā hi amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti, mahantampi amahantaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:943_0: Tambakaṃsādimayo kūṭo kahāpaṇo kūṭakahāpaṇo. Ādisaddena tulākūṭakaṃsakūṭavañcanādiṃ
tika-vin09t0:943_1: saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha tulākūṭaṃ rūpakūṭaṃ, aṅgakūṭaṃ, gahaṇakūṭaṃ, paṭicchannakūṭanti
tika-vin09t0:943_2: catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā
tika-vin09t0:943_3: gaṇhāti, dadanto khuddikāya deti. Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ
tika-vin09t0:943_4: akkamati, dadanto pubbabhāge akkamati. Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:943_5: dadanto agge. Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā
tika-vin09t0:943_6: gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti, dadanto aggabhāge.
tika-vin09t0:944_0: Kaṃso vuccati suvaṇṇapāti, tāya vañcanaṃ kaṃsakūṭaṃ. Kathaṃ? Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā
tika-vin09t0:944_1: aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti. Tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:944_2: kulaṃ pavisitvā “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇāthā”ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā
tika-vin09t0:944_3: honti. Tato tehi “kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte “vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin09t0:944_4: suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbā pātiyo datvā gacchati.
tika-vin09t0:945_0: Vañcanaṃ nāma tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ. Tatridamekaṃ vatthu – eko kira
tika-vin09t0:945_1: luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati, tameko dhutto “kiṃ bho migo agghati,
tika-vin09t0:945_2: kiṃ migapotako”ti āha. “Migo dve kahāpaṇe, migapotako eka”nti vutte ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:945_3: datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivattento “na me bho migapotakena attho,
tika-vin09t0:945_4: migaṃ me dehī”ti āha. “Tena hi dve kahāpaṇe dehī”ti āha. So āha “nanu bho mayā paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:945_5: eko kahāpaṇo dinno”ti. Āma dinno, imaṃ migapotakaṃ gaṇha, evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo, ayañca
tika-vin09t0:945_6: kahāpaṇagghanako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti. So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā
tika-vin09t0:946_0: Pasayhāti pare abhibhuyya. Gāmaṃ ghātentīti gāmaghātakā, gāmaṃ paharantā corā, te
tika-vin09t0:946_1: ādi yesaṃ te gāmaghātakādayo. Ādisaddena cettha panthaghātakādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Uddhāreyeva
tika-vin09t0:946_2: pārājikanti “sace sāṭako bhavissati, gaṇhissāmī”ti parikappassa pavattattā, sāṭakassa
tika-vin09t0:946_3: ca tattha sabbhāvato. Padavārena kāretabboti bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvāva vīmaṃsitattā
tika-vin09t0:946_4: vuttaṃ. Bhaṇḍadeyyanti yaṃ parassa naṭṭhaṃ, tassa mūlaṃ vā tadeva vā bhaṇḍaṃ dātabbanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:947: Tassāti yo evaṃ parikappeti, tassa. Imassa “avahāro hotī”ti iminā sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:948_0: Paresanti kīḷantānaṃ, pavisantānaṃ vā paresaṃ manussānaṃ. “Pacchā gaṇhissāmī”ti paṃsunā
tika-vin09t0:948_1: vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetīti “sace idāneva onamitvā gaṇhissāmi, ‘kiṃ samaṇo gaṇhātī’ti
tika-vin09t0:948_2: maṃ jānitvā viheṭheyyuṃ pacchā gaṇhissāmī”ti paṃsunā vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādeti.
tika-vin09t0:948_3: Uddhāro natthīti ṭhānācāvanaṃ natthīti attho. Sāmikāti antāgāmaṃ pavisitukāmā bhaṇḍasāmikā
tika-vin09t0:948_4: manussā. Uddhāreti uddharaṇe, ṭhānācāvaneti attho. Ṭhānācāvanañcettha heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena
tika-vin09t0:948_5: veditabbaṃ. Pavesetīti ṭhānācāvanavasena paveseti, heṭṭhimantena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ kesaggamattampi
tika-vin09t0:949_0: Samagghataranti appagghataraṃ. Uddhaṭamatte avahāroti sakabhāvappayogassa niṭṭhāpitattā,
tika-vin09t0:949_1: na atthasādhakavasena. Uddhāre rakkhati attano koṭṭhāse pātetukāmatāya uddhaṭattā.
tika-vin09t0:949_2: Eseva nayo pātanepi rakkhatīti etthāpi. “Uddhāreyeva rakkhatī”ti imināva pātane na
tika-vin09t0:949_3: rakkhatīti atthe siddhepi atthasādhakavasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ uddharitvā”tiādi
tika-vin09t0:949_4: vuttaṃ. Sace pana dvīsupi koṭṭhāsesu patitadaṇḍake adassanaṃ gameti, tato avasesabhikkhūsu
tika-vin09t0:949_5: gatesu itaro “mayhaṃ, bhante, daṇḍako na paññāyatī”ti, “mayhampi, āvuso, na paññāyatī”ti,
tika-vin09t0:949_6: “katamo pana, bhante, mayhaṃ bhāgo”ti. “Ayaṃ tuyhaṃ bhāgo”ti attano bhāgaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:949_7: Tasmiṃ vivaditvā vā avivaditvā vā taṃ gaṇhitvā gate itaro tassa bhāgaṃ uddharati,
tika-vin09t0:949_8: uddhāre pārājikaṃ. Sacepi tena “ahaṃ mama bhāgaṃ tuyhaṃ na demi, tvaṃ pana attano
tika-vin09t0:949_9: bhāgaṃ ñatvā gaṇhā”ti vuttepi “nāyaṃ mamā”ti jānantopi tasseva bhāgaṃ gaṇhāti, uddhāre
tika-vin09t0:949_10: pārājikaṃ. Sace pana itaro “ayaṃ tuyhaṃ bhāgo, ayaṃ mayhaṃ bhāgoti kiṃ iminā vivādenā”ti
tika-vin09t0:949_11: cintetvā “mayhaṃ vā patto hotu, tumhākaṃ vā, yo varabhāgo, taṃ tumhe gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin09t0:949_12: vadati, dinnakaṃ nāma gahitaṃ hoti, natthettha avahāro. Sace so vivādabhīruko bhikkhu
tika-vin09t0:949_13: “yaṃ tuyhaṃ ruccati, taṃ gaṇhā”ti vutto attano pattaṃ varabhāgaṃ ṭhapetvā lāmakaṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:949_14: gahetvā gacchati, tato itarassa vicinitāvasesaṃ gaṇhantassāpi avahāro nattheva. Evamimāni
tika-vin09t0:949_15: pañca pañcakāni samodhānetvā ime pañcavīsati avahārā veditabbā. Niṭṭhito “ādiyeyyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:949_16: imassa padassa vinicchayo. Tenāha “iti yaṃ vuttaṃ…pe… yassattho pakāsito hotī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:950_0: Rājānoti kiñcāpi avisesena vuttaṃ, aparādhānurūpaṃ pana chejjabhejjānusāsako pamāṇabhūtova
tika-vin09t0:950_1: idhādhippetoti āha “rājānoti idaṃ bimbisāraṃyeva sandhāya vutta”nti. So hi dhammikarājattā
tika-vin09t0:950_2: yathāpaveṇiyāva karoti. Aññe pana kākaṇikamattassapi sīsaṃ chindeyyuṃ, bahukassāpi
tika-vin09t0:950_3: na vā kiñci kareyyuṃ. Tenāha “aññe panā”tiādi. Hananaṃ nāma pothanañceva chedanañcāti
tika-vin09t0:950_4: āha “hatthādīhi vā”tiādi. Ādisaddena pādakasāvettaaḍḍhadaṇḍakānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Rajjubandhanādīhīti
tika-vin09t0:950_6: gahaṇaṃ. Nīhareyyunti raṭṭhato nikkhāmeyyuṃ. Corosi…pe… thenosīti ettha “paribhāseyyu”nti
tika-vin09t0:950_7: padaṃ ajjhāharitabbaṃ ūnattā padappayogassa. Tenāha “imehi vacanehi paribhāseyyu”nti.
tika-vin09t0:950_8: Yathārūpaṃ pana yasmā pādato paṭṭhāya hoti, tasmā “pādassa vā pādārahassa vā”ti āha.
tika-vin09t0:950_9: Porāṇakassa kahāpaṇassa catuttho bhāgo pādo, pādaṃ arahatīti pādāraho, tassa pādassa
tika-vin09t0:950_10: vā pādārahassa vā. Ettha ca pādena kahāpaṇassa catutthabhāgaṃ akappiyabhaṇḍameva
tika-vin09t0:950_11: dasseti, pādārahena pādagghanakaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ. Ettāvatā heṭṭhimantadassanena sabbākārena
tika-vin09t0:950_12: dutiyapārājikappahonakavatthu dassitaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Porāṇakassāti porāṇasatthānurūpaṃ
tika-vin09t0:950_13: uppāditassa lakkhaṇasampannassa nīlakahāpaṇasadisassa kahāpaṇassa. Etena rudradāmakādīni paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin09t0:951_0: Evaṃ asādhāraṇavinicchayaṃ dassetvā idāni sādhāraṇavinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ “rājagahe”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:951_1: Raññoti bimbisārarañño. Māsako nāma porāṇakassa kahāpaṇassa vīsatimo bhāgo. Yo loke
tika-vin09t0:951_2: “mañjeṭṭhī”tipi vuccati. Idāni imasmiṃ adinnādāne vinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbatthā”tiādi
tika-vin09t0:951_4: agghassa parihīnāparihīnavasena. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana evaṃ veditabbo
tika-vin09t0:951_5: – idañhi adinnādānaṃ vinicchinantena otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ sahasā avinicchinitvā pañca
tika-vin09t0:951_6: ṭhānāni oloketabbāni. Yāni sandhāya porāṇā āhu –
tika-vin09t0:954_0: Tattha ca vatthūti bhaṇḍaṃ. Avahārakena hi “mayā idaṃ nāma avahaṭa”nti vuttepi āpattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:954_1: anāropetvāva taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sasāmikaṃ vā asāmikaṃ vāti upaparikkhitabbaṃ. Sasāmikepi
tika-vin09t0:954_2: sāmikānaṃ sālayabhāvo vā nirālayabhāvo vā upaparikkhitabbo. Sace tesaṃ sālayakāle
tika-vin09t0:954_3: avahaṭaṃ, bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā āpatti kāretabbā. Sace nirālayakāle, na pārājikena kāretabbo.
tika-vin09t0:954_4: Bhaṇḍasāmikesu pana bhaṇḍaṃ āharāpentesu bhaṇḍaṃ dātabbaṃ. Ayamettha sāmīci. Evaṃ vatthu oloketabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:955_0: Kāloti avahārakālo. Tadeva hi bhaṇḍaṃ kadāci samagghaṃ hoti, kadāci mahagghaṃ. Tasmā
tika-vin09t0:955_1: taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yasmiṃ kāle avahaṭaṃ, tasmiṃyeva kāle yo tassa aggho, tena agghena āpatti
tika-vin09t0:956_0: Desoti avahāradeso. Tañhi bhaṇḍaṃ yasmiṃ dese avahaṭaṃ, tasmiṃyeva dese yo tassa
tika-vin09t0:956_1: aggho, tena agghena āpatti kāretabbā. Bhaṇḍuṭṭhānadese hi bhaṇḍaṃ samagghaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:957_0: Agghoti bhaṇḍaggho. Navabhaṇḍassa hi yo aggho, so pacchā parihāyati. Yathā navadhoto
tika-vin09t0:957_1: patto aṭṭha vā dasa vā agghati, so pacchā bhinno vā chiddo vā āṇigaṇṭhikāhato vā
tika-vin09t0:957_2: appaggho hoti, tasmā na sabbadā bhaṇḍaṃ pakatiaggheneva kātabbanti. Evaṃ aggho oloketabbo.
tika-vin09t0:958_0: Paribhogoti bhaṇḍassa paribhogo. Paribhogenāpi hi vāsiādibhaṇḍassa aggho parihāyati,
tika-vin09t0:958_1: tasmā evaṃ upaparikkhitabbaṃ – sace koci kassaci pādagghanakaṃ vāsiṃ harati, tatra
tika-vin09t0:958_2: vāsisāmiko pucchitabbo “tayā ayaṃ vāsi kittakena kītā”ti. “Pādena, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ
tika-vin09t0:958_3: pana te kiṇitvāva ṭhapitā, udāhu taṃ valañjesī”ti? Sace vadati “ekadivasaṃ me dantakaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:958_4: vā rajanachalli vā pattapacanadāru vā chinnaṃ, ghaṃsitvā vā nisitā”ti. Athassa porāṇo
tika-vin09t0:958_5: aggho bhaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathā ca vāsiyā, evaṃ añjaniyā vā añjanisalākāya vā kuñcikāya
tika-vin09t0:958_6: vā palālena vā thusehi vā iṭṭhakacuṇṇena vā ekavāraṃ ghaṃsitvā dhovanamattenāpi aggho
tika-vin09t0:958_8: sakiṃ nivāsanapārupanenāpi, paribhogasīsena aṃse vā sīse vā ṭhapanamattenāpi, taṇḍulādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:958_9: papphoṭanenāpi tato ekaṃ vā dve vā apanayanenapi, antamaso ekaṃ pāsāṇasakkharaṃ uddharitvā
tika-vin09t0:958_10: chaḍḍitamattenāpi, sappitelādīnaṃ bhājanantaraparivattanenapi, antamaso tato makkhikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:958_11: vā kipillikaṃ vā uddharitvā chaḍḍitamattenapi, guḷapiṇḍakassa madhurabhāvajānanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:958_12: nakhena vijjhitvā aṇumattaṃ gahitamattenapi aggho bhassati. Tasmā yaṃ kiñci pādagghanakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:958_13: vuttanayeneva sāmikena paribhogena ūnaṃ kataṃ hoti, na taṃ avahārako bhikkhu pārājikena
tika-vin09t0:959: Evaṃ imāni tulayitvā pañca ṭhānāni dhāreyya atthaṃ vicakkhaṇo āpattiṃ vā anāpattiṃ vā garukaṃ vā lahukaṃ vā āpattiṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhapeyyāti.
tika-vin09t0:960_0: Evaṃ tattha vinicchayaṃ dassetvā idāni anāpattiṃ dassento “sakasaññissā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:960_1: Tattha sakasaññissāti “mayhaṃ santakaṃ idaṃ bhaṇḍa”nti evaṃ sakasaññissa parabhaṇḍampi
tika-vin09t0:960_2: gaṇhato gahaṇe anāpatti, gahitaṃ pana puna dātabbaṃ. Sace sāmikehi “dehī”ti vutto
tika-vin09t0:960_3: na deti, tesaṃ dhuranikkhepe pārājikaṃ. Vissāsaggāheti vissāsaggahaṇepi anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:961: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa vissāsaṃ gahetuṃ, sandiṭṭho ca hoti, sambhatto ca ālapito ca jīvati ca jānāti ca ‘gahite me attamano”’ti.
tika-vin09t0:962_0: Tattha sandiṭṭhoti diṭṭhamattakamitto. Sambhattoti daḷhamitto. Ālapitoti “mama santakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:962_1: yaṃ icchasi, taṃ gaṇheyyāsi, āpucchitvā gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ natthī”ti vutto. Jīvatīti
tika-vin09t0:962_2: anuṭṭhānaseyyāya sayitopi yāva jīvitindriyupacchedaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Gahite ca attamanoti
tika-vin09t0:962_3: gahite tuṭṭhacitto. Evarūpassa santakaṃ “gahite me attamano bhavissatī”ti jānantena
tika-vin09t0:962_4: gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Anavasesapariyādānavasena cetāni pañcaṅgāni vuttāni. Vissāsaggāho
tika-vin09t0:962_5: pana tīhi aṅgehi ruhati. Kathaṃ? Sandiṭṭho, jīvati, gahite attamano, sambhatto, jīvati,
tika-vin09t0:962_6: gahite attamano, ālapito, jīvati, gahite attamanoti evaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:963_0: Yo pana jīvati, na ca gahite attamano hoti, tassa santakaṃ vissāsabhāvena gahitampi
tika-vin09t0:963_1: puna dātabbaṃ. Dadantena ca matakadhanaṃ tāva ye tassa dhane issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā
tika-vin09t0:963_2: vā, tesaṃ dātabbaṃ. Anattamanassa santakaṃ tasseva dātabbaṃ. Yo pana paṭhamaṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:963_3: “suṭṭhu kataṃ tayā mama santakaṃ gaṇhantenā”ti vacībhedena vā cittuppādamattena vā
tika-vin09t0:963_4: anumoditvā pacchā kenaci kāraṇena kupito, so paccāharāpetuṃ na labhati. Yo ca adātukāmo,
tika-vin09t0:963_5: cittena pana adhivāseti, na kiñci vadati, sopi puna paccāharāpetuṃ na labhati. Yo
tika-vin09t0:963_6: pana “mayā tumhākaṃ santakaṃ gahita”nti vā “paribhutta”nti vā vutto gahitaṃ vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:963_7: paribhuttaṃ vā, “mayā pana taṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena ṭhapitaṃ, pākatikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin09t0:964_0: Tāvakāliketi “paṭidassāmi paṭikarissāmī”ti evaṃ gaṇhantassa tāvakālikepi gahaṇe anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:964_1: Gahitaṃ pana sace bhaṇḍasāmiko puggalo vā gaṇo vā “tuyhevetaṃ hotū”ti anujānāti,
tika-vin09t0:964_2: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce anujānāti, āharāpente dātabbaṃ. Saṅghasantakaṃ pana paṭidātumeva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:965_0: Petapariggaheti ettha pana pettivisaye upapannāpi, kālaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve
tika-vin09t0:965_1: nibbattāpi, cātumahārājikādayo devāpi sabbe “petā”tveva saṅkhyaṃ gatā, tesaṃ pariggahe
tika-vin09t0:965_2: anāpatti. Devatāya pana uddissa balikammaṃ karontehi rukkhādīsu laggitasāṭake vattabbameva
tika-vin09t0:965_3: natthi. Tañca kho ārakkhakehi apariggahite, pariggahitaṃ pana gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:966_0: Tiracchānagatapariggaheti nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ pariggahe. Sacepi hi
tika-vin09t0:966_1: devo vā nāgasupaṇṇo vā manussarūpena āpaṇaṃ pasāreti, tato cassa santakaṃ koci dibbacakkhuko
tika-vin09t0:966_2: bhikkhu taṃ ñatvā gahetvā gacchati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:967_0: Paṃsukūlasaññissāti “asāmikaṃ idaṃ paṃsukūla”nti evasaññissāpi gahaṇe anāpatti. Sace
tika-vin09t0:967_1: pana taṃ sasāmikaṃ hoti, āharāpente dātabbaṃ. Ummattakādīni pubbe vuttappakārāneva.
tika-vin09t0:967_2: Ādikammiko panettha dhaniyo. Avasesānaṃ pana rajakabhaṇḍikādicorānaṃ chabbaggiyādīnaṃ āpattiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:968_0: Sacittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhānehi idaṃ samuṭṭhātīti āha “adinnādānasamuṭṭhāna”nti. Tathā
tika-vin09t0:968_1: hi sāhatthikaṃ kāyacittato samuṭṭhāti. Āṇattikaṃ vācācittato samuṭṭhāti. Sāhattikāṇattikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:968_2: kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhāti, tañca kho “bhāriyamidaṃ, tvaṃ ekapassaṃ gaṇha, ahaṃ ekapassa”nti
tika-vin09t0:968_3: saṃvidhāya ubhayesaṃ payogena ekassa vatthuno ṭhānācāvane labbhati. “Kāyavacīkamma”nti
tika-vin09t0:968_4: avacanaṃ pana kāyavācānaṃ īdise ṭhāne aṅgamattattā. Yāya pana cetanāya samuṭṭhāpito
tika-vin09t0:968_5: payogo sāhatthiko vā āṇattiko vā padhānabhāvena ṭhānācāvanaṃ sādheti, tassā vasena
tika-vin09t0:968_6: āpatti kāretabbā. Aññathā sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti, āṇattikaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:968_7: sāhatthikassāti idaṃ virujjhati. “Adinnaṃ ādiyāmī”ti saññāya abhāvena muccanato saññāvimokkhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:968_8: Kāyena kataṃ kammaṃ kāyakammaṃ, kāyadvārena katanti attho. Vacīkammanti etthāpi eseva
tika-vin09t0:968_9: nayo. Tuṭṭho vā bhīto vā majjhatto vā naṃ āpajjatīti tivedanaṃ. Sesaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpade
tika-vin09t0:971_0: Santi sahatthe upasaggo. Tena saddhiṃ ussukkavacanametaṃ “sañciccā”ti āha “sañcetetvā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:971_1: Ussukkavacananti ettha ussukkavacanaṃ nāma pubbakālakiriyāvacanaṃ. Ayañhi samānakattukesu
tika-vin09t0:971_3: cetetvā”ti iminā saṅkhepena vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “pāṇo”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:971_4: Tattha “pāṇo”ti saññāya saddhiṃyevāti “pāṇo”ti saññaṃ avijahitvā eva, “pāṇo”ti saññuppattiyā
tika-vin09t0:971_5: anantaranti vuttaṃ hoti. Evañca katvā kathaṃ ekakkhaṇe ekassa cittassa ubhayārammaṇabhāvoti
tika-vin09t0:971_6: edisī codanā anavakāsāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Keci pana “ñātapariññāya diṭṭhasabhāvesu dhammesu
tika-vin09t0:971_7: tīraṇapariññāya tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā ‘rūpaṃ anicca’ntiādinā sabhāvena saddhiṃ ekakkhaṇe
tika-vin09t0:971_8: aniccādilakkhaṇajānanaṃ viya ‘pāṇo’ti saññāya saddhiṃyeva ‘vadhāmi na’nti jānātī”ti
tika-vin09t0:971_9: vadanti. Apare pana ācariyā tatthāpi evaṃ na kathenti. Ettha ca manussaviggaho”ti
tika-vin09t0:971_10: avatvā “pāṇo”ti vacanaṃ “manusso aya”nti ajānitvā kevalaṃ sattasaññāya ghātentassāpi
tika-vin09t0:971_11: pārājikabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Cetetvāti cintetvā. Pakappetvāti abhivicāretvā,
tika-vin09t0:972_0: Idāni manussaattabhāvaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ “manussaviggaha”ntiādimāha. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:972_1: kalalato paṭṭhāyāti paṭisandhiviññāṇena saddhiṃ uppannakalalarūpato paṭṭhāya. Kalalarūpaṃ
tika-vin09t0:972_2: nāma itthipurisānaṃ kāyavatthubhāvadasakavasena samatiṃsa rūpāni, napuṃsakānaṃ kāyavatthudasakavasena
tika-vin09t0:972_3: vīsati. Tattha itthipurisānaṃ kalalarūpaṃ jātiuṇṇāya ekena aṃsunā uddhaṭatelabindumattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:975_0: Evaṃ parittakaṃ vatthuṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva maraṇakālā etthantare anupubbena vuḍḍhippatto
tika-vin09t0:975_1: attabhāvo manussaviggaho nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti. Idañca yebhuyyavaseneva vuttaṃ. Opapātikasaṃsedajāpi
tika-vin09t0:975_2: hi manussā pārājikavatthuyeva. Kalalakālepīti paṭhamasattāhepi. Tattha hi santativasena
tika-vin09t0:975_3: pavattamānaṃ kalalasaṅkhātaṃ attabhāvaṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ sakkā, na pana sabbapaṭhamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:975_4: kalalarūpaṃ. Paṭisandhicittena hi saddhiṃ tiṃsa kammajarūpāni nibbattanti. Tesu pana
tika-vin09t0:975_5: ṭhitesuyeva soḷasa bhavaṅgacittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti. Etasmiṃ antare gahitapaṭisandhikassa
tika-vin09t0:975_6: dārakassa vā mātuyā vā panassa antarāyo natthi. Ayañhi maraṇassa anokāso nāma. Bhesajjasampadānenāti
tika-vin09t0:975_7: gabbhapātanabhesajjadānena. Tato vā uddhampīti abbudapesikālādīsupi. Jīvitā viyojeyyāti
tika-vin09t0:976_0: Imassa panatthassāti “sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeyyā”ti imassa atthassa.
tika-vin09t0:976_1: Āvibhāvatthanti pakāsanatthaṃ. Pāṇassa atipāto pāṇātipāto, pāṇavadho pāṇaghātoti
tika-vin09t0:976_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Sattoti khandhasantāno. Tattha hi sattapaññatti. Jīvitindriyanti rūpārūpajīvitindriyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:976_3: Rūpajīvitindriye hi vikopite itarampi taṃsambandhatāya vinassatīti. Yāya cetanāyāti
tika-vin09t0:976_4: tasmiṃ pāṇe pāṇasaññino kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattāya yāya cetanāya. Manodvāre
tika-vin09t0:976_5: pana pavattāya vadhakacetanāya pāṇātipātabhāvo natthi. Sā cetanāti sā jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-vin09t0:976_6: kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yāya cetanāya
tika-vin09t0:976_7: pavattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissayabhūtesu mahābhūtesu upakkamakaraṇahetu taṃmahābhūtapaccayā
tika-vin09t0:976_8: uppajjanakamahābhūtā nuppajjissanti, sā tādisapayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pāṇātipāto.
tika-vin09t0:976_9: Laddhūpakkamāni hi mahābhūtāni itarabhūtāni viya na visadānīti samānajātikānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na hontīti.
tika-vin09t0:977_0: Pāṇātipāto assa atthīti pāṇātipātī. Saṃsagge ayamīkāro. Tenāha “vuttacetanāya samaṅgipuggalo”ti.
tika-vin09t0:977_1: Sako hattho sahattho, tena nibbatto payogo sāhatthiko. Nissajjanaṃ nissaggo, sova
tika-vin09t0:977_2: nissaggiyo. Evaṃ āṇattiko. Vijjāmayo mantaparijappanayogo. Iddhimayo kammavipākajiddhimayo.
tika-vin09t0:978_0: Idāni yathāvutteyeva cha payoge vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:978_1: tatthāti tesu chasu payogesu. Sāhatthikoti ettha hattho upalakkhaṇabhāvena gahitoti
tika-vin09t0:978_2: āha “kāyena vā”tiādi. Tattha kāyenāti hatthena vā pādena vā muṭṭhinā vā jāṇunā vā
tika-vin09t0:978_3: yena kenaci aṅgapaccaṅgena. Kāyekadeso hettha hatthādikāyo avayave samudāyopacāro
tika-vin09t0:978_4: yathā “gāmo daḍḍho”ti. Kāyappaṭibaddhenāti kāyato amocitena asiādinā paharaṇena.
tika-vin09t0:978_5: Paharaṇanti kāyaviññattisahitāya vadhakacetanāya adhippetatthasādhanaṃ. Kāyena vā
tika-vin09t0:978_6: sattiādīnaṃ, kāyappaṭibaddhena vā usuyantapāsāṇādīnaṃ nissajjananti yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-vin09t0:978_7: yojetabbaṃ. Tatthāti tesu sāhatthikanissaggiyesu. Uddissānuddissabhedatoti uddisitvā
tika-vin09t0:978_8: ca anuddisitvā ca pavattibhedena. Uddisanaṃ uddiso, so etassa atthīti uddisako, payogo,
tika-vin09t0:978_9: tasmiṃ. Bajjhati etenāti baddho, kammameva baddho kammabaddho, pāṇātipātoti attho.
tika-vin09t0:978_10: Atha vā bandhanaṃ baddho, kammunā baddho kammabaddho, so assa hoti, pāṇātipātakammamassa
tika-vin09t0:978_11: siddhanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ubhayatthāpīti uddisake, anuddisake cāti dvīsupi. Pacchā vā
tika-vin09t0:978_12: teneva rogena maratūti yojanā. Paharitakkhaṇeyevāti maraṇāya pahonakappahārassa laddhakkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin09t0:978_13: kammabaddho. Yadi avassaṃ tena maratīti adhippāyo. Sace pana maraṇādhippāyena pahāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:978_14: datvā tena amatassa puna aññena cittena pahāre dinne pacchāpi paṭhamappahāreneva
tika-vin09t0:978_15: marati, tadāva kammabaddho. Atha dutiyapahārena marati, natthi pāṇātipāto. Ubhayehi
tika-vin09t0:978_16: matepi paṭhamappahāreneva kammabaddho, ubhayehipi amate nevatti pāṇātipāto. Esa nayo
tika-vin09t0:978_17: bahūhipi ekassa pahāre dinne. Tatrāpi hi yassa pahārena marati, tasseva kammabaddhoti.
tika-vin09t0:979_0: Idāni imasmiṃ āṇattikapayoge saṅketavisaṅketabhāvajānanatthaṃ chabbidhaṃ niyamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:979_1: dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ āṇattikapayoge. Āṇattiniyāmakāti
tika-vin09t0:979_2: āṇattikapayogasādhikā. Etesu hi avirajjhitesuyeva āṇattikapayogo hoti, na aññathāti.
tika-vin09t0:980_0: Puggaloti māretabbo puggalo. Tenāha “yaṃ hī”tiādi. Āṇāpakassa āpattīti āṇāpakassa
tika-vin09t0:980_1: āṇattikkhaṇe āpatti, āṇattassa māraṇakkhaṇe. Āṇāpako muccatīti āṇattasseva kammabaddho,
tika-vin09t0:980_2: vatthuvisesena panettha kammaviseso ca āpattiviseso ca hotīti. “Purebhattaṃ mārehī”ti
tika-vin09t0:980_3: āṇatto purebhattameva māretīti “ajja sve”ti aniyametvā “purebhattaṃ mārehī”ti āṇatto
tika-vin09t0:980_4: yadā kadāci purebhattaṃ māreti. Yo pana “ajja pubbaṇhe”ti vutto majjhanhe vā sāyanhe
tika-vin09t0:980_5: vā sve vā pubbaṇhe māreti, visaṅketo hoti, āṇāpakassa natthi kammabaddho. Pubbaṇhe
tika-vin09t0:980_6: māretuṃ vāyamantassa majjhanhe jātepi eseva nayo. Etena nayena sabbakālappabhedesu
tika-vin09t0:981_0: Evaṃ vatthukālesu saṅketavisaṅketataṃ dassetvā idāni okāsādīsu saṅketavisaṅketataṃ
tika-vin09t0:981_1: atidisanto “iminā nayenā”tiādimāha. Tattha okāsoti gāmo vā vanaṃ vā gehadvāraṃ vāti
tika-vin09t0:981_2: evamādiko. Āvudhanti asi vā usu vā satti vāti evamādi. Iriyāpathoti māretabbassa
tika-vin09t0:981_3: gamanaṃ vā nisajjā vāti evamādi. Kiriyāvisesoti vijjhanaṃ vā chedanaṃ vā bhedanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:981_4: vā saṅkhamuṇḍakaṃ vāti evamādi. Imesu yathā yathā vadhako āṇatto, tathā tathā kate
tika-vin09t0:981_5: āṇāpakassa āpatti, aññathā kate visaṅketo hoti. Tenāha “iminā nayenā”tiādi. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:984: Āṇattiyaṃ pana ayaṃ viseso – adhiṭṭhāyāti adhiṭṭhahitvā āṇāpeti “evaṃ vijjha, evaṃ pahara, evaṃ ghātehī”ti vuttāya pāḷiyā labbhatīti ñātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:985_0: Opatanti etthāti opāto, āvāṭo, tassa khaṇanaṃ opātakkhaṇanaṃ. Apassenasaṃvidhānanti
tika-vin09t0:985_1: apassenassa saṃvidhānaṃ. Niccaparibhogo mañco vā pīṭhaṃ vā apassenaphalakaṃ vā divāṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:985_2: nisīdantassa apassenakatthambho vā tatthajātakarukkho vā caṅkame apassāya tiṭṭhantassa
tika-vin09t0:985_3: ālambanarukkho vā ālambanaphalakaṃ vā, sabbampetaṃ apassanīyaṭṭhena apassenaṃ nāma,
tika-vin09t0:985_4: tasmiṃ apassene yathā apassayantaṃ vijjhati vā chindati vā, tathā katvā vāsipharasusattiārakaṇṭakādīsu
tika-vin09t0:986_0: Upanikkhipanaṃ nāma samīpe nikkhipanaṃ. Manāpassa vā amanāpassa vā rūpassa upaharaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:986_1: samīpe ṭhapanaṃ rūpūpahāro, attanā vā yakkhapetādivesaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhanaṃ. Ādisaddena
tika-vin09t0:986_2: saddūpahārādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Etthāpīti thāvarapayogepi. Uddissānuddissabhedo veditabbo,
tika-vin09t0:986_3: yato tatthapi pubbe vuttanayeneva kammabaddho hoti. Ayaṃ pana viseso – mūlaṭṭhena
tika-vin09t0:986_4: opātādīsu paresaṃ mūlena vā mudhā vā dinnesupi yadi tappaccayā koci marati, mūlaṭṭhasseva
tika-vin09t0:986_5: kammabaddho. Yadipi tena, aññena vā tatra opāte vināsetvā bhūmisame katepi paṃsuhārakā
tika-vin09t0:986_6: vā paṃsuṃ gaṇhantā, mūlakhaṇakā vā mūlāni khaṇantā āvāṭaṃ karonti, deve vā vassante
tika-vin09t0:986_7: kaddamo jāyati, tattha ca koci otaritvā vā laggitvā vā marati, mūlaṭṭhasseva kammabaddho.
tika-vin09t0:986_8: Yadi pana yena laddhaṃ, so vā añño vā vitthatataraṃ vā gambhīrataraṃ vā karoti, tappaccayā
tika-vin09t0:986_9: ca koci marati, ubhayesampi kammabaddho. Yathā tu mūlāni mūlehi saṃsandanti, tathā
tika-vin09t0:986_10: tattha thale kate muccati. Evaṃ apassenasaṃvidhānādīsupi yāva tesaṃ pavatti, tāva
tika-vin09t0:987_0: Vijjāparijappananti āthabbaṇikehi, vijjādharehi ca mantaparijappanaṃ. Kammavipākajāya
tika-vin09t0:987_1: iddhiyāti sātisayakammanibbattāya kammavipākena sahajātāya iddhiyā, kammassa vā vipākabhāvena
tika-vin09t0:987_2: jātāya iddhiyā. Payojananti pavattanaṃ, karaṇanti attho, dāṭhāvudhādīnaṃ dāṭhākoṭanādīnamiva
tika-vin09t0:988_0: Kammasādhano vāyaṃ hārakasaddo bahulaṃvidhānena tatthāpi ṇvupaccayassa sijjhanatoti
tika-vin09t0:988_1: āha “atha vā”tiādi. Jīvitaharaṇakaṃ, upanikkhipitabbaṃ vā satthameva hārakanti vikappadvayena
tika-vin09t0:988_2: vuttanti āha “satthañca taṃ hārakañcāti satthahāraka”nti. “Hārakasattha”nti vattabbe
tika-vin09t0:988_3: visesanassa paranipātaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pariyeseyyāti gaveseyya.
tika-vin09t0:988_4: “Yathā labhati, tathā kareyyā”ti iminā pana adhippāyatthamāha, “upanikkhipeyyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:988_5: iminā sikhāpattamatthaṃ. Itarathā hi “pariyeseyyā”ti imassa “upanikkhipeyyā”ti ayamattho
tika-vin09t0:988_6: adhippeto na siyā. Pariyiṭṭhamatteyevāti pariyesitamatteyeva. Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā
tika-vin09t0:988_7: pāḷiyaṃ “satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyāti asiṃ vā sattiṃ vā bheṇḍiṃ vā laguḷaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:988_8: pāsāṇaṃ vā satthaṃ vā visaṃ vā rajjuṃ vā”ti vuttanti āha “padabhājane panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:988_9: Assāti “satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyā”ti imassa padassa. Byañjanānurūpato paripuṇṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:988_10: katvā atthassa avuttattā “byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Sasati hiṃsatīti satthaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:988_11: sasanti hiṃsanti etenāti vā satthaṃ. Ādisaddena “sattiṃ vā”tiādipāḷisesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:988_12: Tattha laguḷanti muggaro. Satthanti vuttāvasesaṃ yaṃ kiñci samukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:989_0: Yo evaṃ maratīti yo satthaṃ vā āharitvā, visaṃ vā khāditvā, rajjuyā vā ubbandhitvā,
tika-vin09t0:989_1: sobbhādīsu vā patitvā, aññehi vā aggipavesanaudakapavesanādīhi upāyehi marati. “So
tika-vin09t0:989_2: dhanaṃ vā labhatī”tiādinā nayenāti so dhanaṃ vā labhati, yasaṃ vā labhati, saggaṃ
tika-vin09t0:989_3: vā gacchati, dhammo vāssa hotīti iminā nayena. Kimanena veditabbanti āha “etenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:989_4: Tattha etenāti “maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyyā”ti etena vacanena. Nayidha evanti idha
tika-vin09t0:989_5: manussaviggahapārājike na evaṃ, na pariyāyakathāya muccatīti attho. Tenāha “saṃvaṇṇeyyā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:990_0: “Satthaṃ vā āharā”tiādināti ettha ādisaddena “visaṃ vā khāda, rajjuyā vā ubbandhitvā
tika-vin09t0:990_1: kālaṃ karohi, sobbhe vā narake vā papāte vā papatā”tiādiṃ sabbaṃ maraṇūpāyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:990_2: Ettha ca narako nāma tattha tattha phalantiyā bhūmiyā sayameva nibbattā mahādarī,
tika-vin09t0:990_3: yattha hatthīpi patanti, corāpi nilīyitvā tiṭṭhanti. Papātoti pabbatantare vā thalantare
tika-vin09t0:990_4: vā ekato chinno. Pāpakenāti lāmakena. Dujjīvitenāti dukkhabahulattā dukkhena jīvitena.
tika-vin09t0:990_5: Mataṃ te jīvitā seyyāti tava maraṇaṃ jīvitā sundarataraṃ. Cittamassa atthīti citto.
tika-vin09t0:990_6: Tathā mano. Iti-saddo “sabbamatthīti kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto, sabbaṃ natthīti
tika-vin09t0:990_7: kho, kaccāna, ayaṃ dutiyo anto”tiādīsu viya nidassane daṭṭhabbo yathāvuttassa buddhiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:990_8: viparivattamānassa maraṇassa nidassanato. Tenevāha “mataṃ te jīvitā seyyo”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:991_0: Nanu cettha “mano”ti idampi atthato cittameva, atha kasmā vuttanti āha “ettha cā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:991_1: Cittassa atthadīpanatthaṃ vuttanti nāyaṃ cittasaddo “cittasaṅkappo”tiādīsu viya vicittādiattho,
tika-vin09t0:991_2: atha kho viññāṇavacanoti tassa atthadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Iminā punaruttidosābhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:991_3: dasseti. Kathametaṃ viññāyatīti āha “tenevassā”tiādi. Citto nānāppakārako saṅkappo
tika-vin09t0:991_4: assāti cittasaṅkappo. Vicittattho hettha cittasaddo “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekanikāyampi
tika-vin09t0:991_5: samanupassāmi evaṃ cittaṃ, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā”tiādīsu viya. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:991_7: adhikāravasena itisaddo āharitabbo. Idañhi “iti cittasaṅkappo”ti evaṃ avuttampi adhikārato
tika-vin09t0:991_8: vuttameva hotīti. Saṅkappoti cettha “takko vitakko saṅkappo”tiādīsu viya na vitakkasseva
tika-vin09t0:991_9: nāmaṃ, atha kho tassa ca aññesañcāti dassetuṃ “saṅkappoti cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Saṃvidahanamattassāti
tika-vin09t0:991_10: saññācetanāvitakkasaṅkhātassa sabbassa saṃvidahanassa. Sāmaññattho hettha mattasaddo
tika-vin09t0:991_11: “brāhmaṇamattaṃ bhojetī”tiādīsu viya. Tenāha “tañca saṃvidahana”ntiādi. Iminā saṃvidahanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:991_12: nāmettha na vidhānanti dasseti. Adhippāyo nāma vitakko.
tika-vin09t0:992_0: Uccāvacena kāraṇenāti mahantāmahantena upāyena. Tattha maraṇavaṇṇasaṃvaṇṇane tāva
tika-vin09t0:992_1: jīvite ādīnavadassanavasena avacākāratā, maraṇe vaṇṇabhaṇanavasena uccākāratā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:992_2: Samādapane pana muṭṭhijāṇunippothanādīhi maraṇasamādapanavasena uccākāratā, ekato
tika-vin09t0:992_3: bhuñjantassa nakhe visaṃ pakkhipitvā maraṇādisamādapanavasena avacākāratā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:993_0: Evaṃ asādhāraṇavinicchayaṃ vatvā idāni sādhāraṇavinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ “vesāliya”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:993_1: Opātakkhaṇanādīsu dukkaṭanti ettha sacepi jātapathaviṃ khaṇati, pāṇātipātassa pubbapayogattā
tika-vin09t0:993_2: payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ. Manussaviggaho nāgasupaṇṇādisadiso tiracchānagato tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho,
tika-vin09t0:993_3: yakkho ca peto ca tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho ca yakkhapetatiracchānagatamanussaviggahā,
tika-vin09t0:993_4: tesaṃ. “Tathā”ti iminā thullaccayaṃ atidisati. Idāni “iminā nayenā”tiādinā apassenasaṃvidhānādīsupi
tika-vin09t0:993_5: yathāvuttaāpattibhedaṃ atidisati. Sabbatthāti apassenasaṃvidhānādīsu sabbesu payogesu.
tika-vin09t0:994_0: Idāni anāpattiṃ dassetuṃ “asañciccā”tiādimāha. Ettha ca “asañciccā”ti idaṃ maraṇasaṃvattanikaupakkamassa
tika-vin09t0:994_1: asallakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, “ajānantassā”ti idaṃ pana maraṇasaṃvattanikaupakaraṇassa
tika-vin09t0:994_2: ajānanaṃ sandhāya, “namaraṇādhippāyassā”ti idaṃ upakkamaṃ jānantassāpi maraṇādhippāyassa
tika-vin09t0:994_3: abhāvaṃ. Tenāha “asañciccā”tiādi. Acetetvāti asallakkhetvā, virajjhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:995_0: Musalussāpanavatthusmiṃ viyāti “tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhattagge
tika-vin09t0:995_1: antaraghare āsanaṃ paññapento musale ussite ekaṃ musalaṃ aggahesi. Dutiyo musalo
tika-vin09t0:995_2: paripatitvā aññatarassa dārakassa matthake avatthāsi. So kālamakāsi. Tassa kukkuccaṃ
tika-vin09t0:995_3: ahosi…pe… kiṃcitto tvaṃ bhikkhūti. Asañcicca ahaṃ bhagavāti. Anāpatti bhikkhu asañciccā”ti
tika-vin09t0:996_0: Visagatapiṇḍapātavatthusmiṃ viyāti “tena kho pana samayena aññataro piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu
tika-vin09t0:996_1: visagataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā paṭikkamanaṃ haritvā bhikkhūnaṃ aggakārikaṃ adāsi.
tika-vin09t0:996_2: Te bhikkhū kālamakaṃsu. Tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosi…pe… kiṃcitto tvaṃ bhikkhūti. Nāhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:996_3: bhagavā jānāmīti. Anāpatti bhikkhu ajānantassā”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ viya.
tika-vin09t0:997_0: Bhesajjavatthusmiṃ viyāti “tena kho pana samayena aññatarā vañjhā itthī kulūpakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:997_1: bhikkhuṃ etadavoca “iṅghāyya bhesajjaṃ jānāhi, yenāhaṃ vijāyeyya’nti. ‘Suṭṭhu bhaginī’ti
tika-vin09t0:997_2: tassā bhesajjaṃ adāsi. Sā kālamakāsi. Tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosi…pe… anāpatti bhikkhu
tika-vin09t0:997_3: pārājikassa, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ viya. Idha ādikammikā aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin09t0:997_4: jīvitā voropitabhikkhū, tesaṃ anāpatti. Avasesānaṃ maraṇavaṇṇasaṃvaṇṇanakādīnaṃ āpattiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:998_0: Atha kathaṃ dukkhavedananti, nanu rājāno coraṃ disvā hasamānāpi “gacchatha, naṃ ghātethā”ti
tika-vin09t0:998_1: vadantīti? Saccaṃ hasamānā vadanti, so pana hāso tesaṃ aññavisayo, sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā
tika-vin09t0:998_2: dukkhasampayuttāva. Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “sacepi hi sirisayanaṃ āruḷho
tika-vin09t0:998_3: rajjasampattisukhamanubhavanto rājā ‘coro deva ānīto’ti vutte ‘gacchatha naṃ mārethā’ti
tika-vin09t0:998_4: hasamāno bhaṇati, domanassacitteneva bhaṇatīti veditabbo. Sukhavokiṇṇattā, pana anuppabandhābhāvā
tika-vin09t0:1001_0: Anabhijānanti na abhijānaṃ. Yena hi yo dhammo adhigato, so tassa pākaṭo hotīti āha
tika-vin09t0:1001_2: ukkaṭṭhamanussānanti attho. Dhammanti mahaggatalokuttarabhūtaṃ adhigatadhammaṃ. Atha
tika-vin09t0:1001_3: vā uttarimanussadhammāti uttarimanussadhammo. Manussadhammo nāma vinā bhāvanāmanasikārena
tika-vin09t0:1001_4: pakatiyā manussehi nibbattetabbo dasakusalakammapathadhammo. So hi manussānaṃ cittādhiṭṭhānamattena
tika-vin09t0:1001_5: ijjhanato tesaṃ so bhāvitadhammo viya ṭhitoti tathā vutto, manussaggahaṇañcettha
tika-vin09t0:1001_6: tesu bahulaṃ pavattanato. Jhānādikaṃ pana tabbidhuranti tatuttari, iti uttari manussadhammāti
