tika-vin09t0:1001_7: uttarimanussadhammo, taṃ uttarimanussadhammanti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Samudācarantoti ārocento.
tika-vin09t0:1002_0: Kiñcāpi lokiyalokuttarā sabbāva paññā “ñāṇa”nti vuccati, idha pana mahaggatalokuttarāva
tika-vin09t0:1002_1: veditabbāti āha “mahaggatalokuttarapaññā jānanaṭṭhena ñāṇa”nti. Kilesehi ārakattā
tika-vin09t0:1002_2: parisuddhaṭṭhena ariyanti āha “ariyaṃ visuddhaṃ uttama”nti. Ariyasaddo cettha visuddhapariyāyo,
tika-vin09t0:1002_3: na lokuttarapariyāyo. Jhānādibhedeti ādisaddena “vimokkho, samādhi, samāpatti, ñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1002_4: maggabhāvanā, phalasacchikiriyā, kilesappahānaṃ, vinīvaraṇatā cittassa, suññāgāre
tika-vin09t0:1002_5: abhiratī”ti ime saṅgaṇhāti. Viññussa manussajātikassāti ārocetabbapuggalanidassanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1002_6: Etassa hi ārocite ārocitaṃ hoti, na devabrahmānaṃ, nāpi petayakkhatiracchānagatānanti.
tika-vin09t0:1002_7: Āroceyyāti vadeyya, viññāpeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vinā aññāpadesenāti “yo te vihāre vasati,
tika-vin09t0:1002_8: so bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī”tiādinā nayena aññāpadesaṃ vināti attho. Idhevāti
tika-vin09t0:1002_9: “iti jānāmi, iti passāmī”ti imasmiṃyeva pade. “Tena vutta”ntiādi nigamanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1003_0: Samanuggāhīyamānoti codiyamāno, yaṃ vatthu ārocitaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “kiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1003_1: te adhigataṃ, kinti te adhigataṃ, kadā te adhigataṃ, kattha te adhigataṃ, katame
tika-vin09t0:1003_2: te kilesā pahīnā, katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī’ti kenaci vuccamāno”ti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1004_0: “Bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā abhabbo jhānādīni adhigantu”nti sikkhāpadātikkamassa antarāyakarattā
tika-vin09t0:1004_1: vuttaṃ. Bhikkhubhāvo hissa saggantarāyo ceva hoti maggantarāyo ca. Vuttañhetaṃ “sāmaññaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1004_2: dupparāmaṭṭhaṃ, nirayāyupakaḍḍhatī”ti. Aparampi vuttaṃ “sithilo hi paribbājo, bhiyyo
tika-vin09t0:1004_3: ākirate raja”nti. Bhikkhubhāvoti pārājikaṃ āpajjitvā “samaṇo aha”nti paṭijānanato
tika-vin09t0:1005_0: Ajānamevāti ettha evāti avadhāraṇatthe nipāto. “Ajānameva”ntipi paṭhanti. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:1005_1: pana “evaṃ jānāmi, evaṃ passāmī”ti avacanti yojetabbaṃ. Vacanatthavirahatoti “paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1005_2: jhānaṃ samāpajji”nti ādivacanassa atthabhūtena jhānādinā vajjitattā tucchaṃ udakādisuññaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1005_3: bhājanaṃ viya. Musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa paravisaṃvādako vacīpayogo, kāyapayogo
tika-vin09t0:1005_4: vā. Tenāha “vañcanādhippāyato musā”ti. Musā ca vañcanādhippāyo ca pubbabhāgakkhaṇe,
tika-vin09t0:1005_5: taṅkhaṇe ca. Vuttañhi “pubbe vāssa hoti ‘musā bhaṇissa’nti, bhaṇantassa hoti ‘musā
tika-vin09t0:1005_6: bhaṇāmī”’ti. Etañhi dvayaṃ aṅgabhūtaṃ, itaraṃ pana hotu vā, mā vā, akāraṇametaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1006_0: Aññatra adhimānāti adhigato māno, adhiko vā māno adhimāno, thaddhamānoti attho, taṃ
tika-vin09t0:1006_1: vināti attho. Kassa panāyaṃ adhimāno uppajjati, kassa nuppajjati? Ariyasāvakassa
tika-vin09t0:1006_3: sañjātasomanasso ariyaguṇappaṭivedhe nikkaṅkho, tasmā sotāpannādīnaṃ “ahaṃ sakadāgāmī”tiādivasena
tika-vin09t0:1006_4: māno nuppajjati. Dussīlassa nuppajjati. So hi ariyaguṇādhigame nirāsova. Sīlavatopi
tika-vin09t0:1006_6: pana kammaṭṭhāne appamattassa nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā paccayapariggahena vitiṇṇakaṅkhassa
tika-vin09t0:1006_7: tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa āraddhavipassakassa uppajjati. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1006_10: āraddhavipassakassa. Apatteti attano santāne uppattivasena apatte, anadhigateti vuttaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1006_12: adhimāno uppajjati. Uppanno ca suddhasamathalābhiṃ vā suddhavipassanālābhiṃ vā antarā
tika-vin09t0:1006_13: ṭhapeti. So hi dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi vassāni kilesasamudācāraṃ apassanto “ahaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1006_14: sotāpanno”ti vā “sakadāgāmī”ti vā “anāgāmī”ti vā maññati. Samathavipassanālābhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1006_15: pana arahatteyeva ṭhapeti. Tassa hi samādhibalena kilesā vikkhambhitā, vipassanābalena
tika-vin09t0:1006_16: saṅkhārā supariggahitā, tasmā saṭṭhimpi vassāni, asītimpi vassāni, vassasatampi kilesā
tika-vin09t0:1006_17: na samudācaranti, khīṇāsavasseva cittācāro hoti. So evaṃ dīgharattaṃ kilesasamudācāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1006_18: apassanto antarā aṭṭhatvāva “arahā aha”nti maññatīti. “Taṃ adhimānaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1006_19: iminā “aññatrā”ti padaṃ apekkhitvā “adhimānā”ti upayogatthe nissakkavacananti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1007_0: Pāpicchatāyāti pāpā icchā etassāti pāpiccho, tassa bhāvo pāpicchatā, tāya, pāpikāya
tika-vin09t0:1007_1: icchāyāti attho. Yā sā “idhekacco dussīlova samāno ‘sīlavā’ti maṃ jano jānātū”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1007_2: nayena vuttā, tāya asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Iminā pana mandattā
tika-vin09t0:1007_3: momūhattā samudācarantassa anāpattīti dasseti. Ayampīti pi-saddena na kevalaṃ purimā tayovāti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1008_0: Asantanti abhūtaṃ. Jhānādidhammanti jhānaṃ, vimokkho, samādhi, samāpatti, ñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1008_1: maggabhāvanā, phalasacchikiriyā, kilesappahānaṃ, vinīvaraṇatā cittassa, suññāgāre
tika-vin09t0:1008_2: abhiratī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ. Yassa ārocetīti vācāya vā hatthavikārādīhi
tika-vin09t0:1008_3: vā aṅgapaccaṅgacopanehi viññattipathe ṭhitassa yassa puggalassa āroceti. Viññattipathaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1008_4: pana atikkamitvā ṭhito koci ce dibbena cakkhunā, dibbāya ca sotadhātuyā disvā ca
tika-vin09t0:1008_5: sutvā ca jānāti, na pārājikaṃ. Yopi “kiṃ ayaṃ bhaṇatī”ti saṃsayaṃ vā āpajjati, ciraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1008_6: vīmaṃsitvā vā pacchā jānāti, “avijānanto”icceva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Yo pana jhānādīni
tika-vin09t0:1008_7: attano adhigamavasena vā uggahaparipucchādivasena vā na jānāti, kevalaṃ “jhāna”nti
tika-vin09t0:1008_8: vā “vimokkho”ti vā vacanamattameva sutaṃ hoti, sopi tena vutte “jhānaṃ kira samāpajjī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1008_9: esa vadatīti yadi ettakamattampi jānāti, “jānāti”cceva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati, tassa vutte
tika-vin09t0:1008_10: pārājikameva. Seso pana ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā bahūnaṃ vā niyamitāniyamitavasena viseso
tika-vin09t0:1008_11: sabbo sikkhāpaccakkhānakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Pariyāyabhāsane pana “aha”nti
tika-vin09t0:1008_12: avuttattā paṭivijānantassa vuttepi thullaccayaṃ. Visaṃvādanādhippāyena musāvādapayogassa
tika-vin09t0:1008_13: katattā appaṭivijānantassāpi dukkaṭanti āha “yo te vihāre vasati…pe… dukkaṭa”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1008_15: attho. Ummattakādayo pubbe vuttanayā eva. Idha pana ādikammikā vaggumudātīriyabhikkhū, tesaṃ anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1011_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ bhikkhupātimokkhe. Uddiṭṭhapārājikaparidīpanamevāti uddiṭṭhānaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1011_1: pārājikānaṃ paridīpanavacanameva. Avadhāraṇaṃ pana na aññesampīti dassanatthaṃ. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1011_2: “samodhānetvā panā”tiādi. Tattha samodhānetvāti tattha tattha āgatāni ettheva samodahitvā,
tika-vin09t0:1011_3: pakkhipitvā rāsiṃ katvāti attho. Pāḷiyaṃ āgatānīti uddesapāḷiyaṃ āgatāni. Bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1011_5: aṭṭhavatthukāti imāni bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni cattāri. Paṇḍakādīnañhi
tika-vin09t0:1011_9: tesaṃ saggo avārito, maggo pana vārito. Abhabbā hi te maggappaṭilābhāya vatthuvipannattā.
tika-vin09t0:1011_10: Pabbajjāpi nesaṃ paṭikkhittā, tasmā tepi pārājikāva. Theyyasaṃvāsako, titthiyapakkantako,
tika-vin09t0:1011_11: mātughātako, pitughātako, arahantaghātako, bhikkhunidūsako, lohituppādako, saṅghabhedakoti
tika-vin09t0:1011_12: ime aṭṭha attano kiriyāya vipannattā abhabbaṭṭhānaṃ pattāti pārājikāva. Tesu theyyasaṃvāsako,
tika-vin09t0:1011_13: titthiyapakkantako, bhikkhunidūsakoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saggo avārito, maggo pana vāritova.
tika-vin09t0:1011_14: Itaresaṃ pañcannaṃ ubhayampi vāritaṃ. Te hi anantarāva narake nibbattanakasattā.
tika-vin09t0:1011_15: Yadā bhikkhunī vibbhamitukāmā hutvā kāsāvameva vā gihivatthaṃ vā gihinivāsanākārena
tika-vin09t0:1011_16: nivāseti, tadā pārājikamāpannā nāma hotīti āha “gihibhāvaṃ patthayamānāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1011_17: Sā hi ajjhācāravītikkamaṃ akatvāpi ettāvatā assamaṇī nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1012_0: Dīghatāya lambamānaṃ aṅgajātametassāti lambī. Na so ettāvatā pārājiko, atha kho yadā
tika-vin09t0:1012_1: anabhiratiyā pīḷito attano aṅgajātaṃ mukhe vā vaccamagge vā paveseti, tadā pārājiko
tika-vin09t0:1012_2: hoti. Mudukatā piṭṭhi etassāti mudupiṭṭhiko, kataparikammāya mudukāya piṭṭhiyā samannāgato.
tika-vin09t0:1012_3: Sopi yadā anabhiratiyā pīḷito attano aṅgajātaṃ attano mukhamaggavaccamaggesu aññataraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1012_4: paveseti, tadā pārājiko hoti. Parassa aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gaṇhātīti yo anabhiratiyā
tika-vin09t0:1012_5: pīḷito parassa suttassa vā pamattassa vā aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gaṇhāti. Parassa aṅgajāte
tika-vin09t0:1012_6: abhinisīdatīti yo anabhiratiyā pīḷito parassa aṅgajātaṃ kammaniyaṃ disvā attano vaccamaggena
tika-vin09t0:1012_7: tassūpari nisīdati, taṃ attano vaccamaggaṃ pavesetīti attho. Etāni hi cattāri yasmā
tika-vin09t0:1012_8: ubhinnaṃ rāgavasena sadisabhāvūpagatānaṃ dhammo “methunadhammo”ti vuccati, tasmā
tika-vin09t0:1012_9: ekena pariyāyena methunadhammaṃ appaṭisevitvāyeva kevalaṃ maggena maggappavesanavasena
tika-vin09t0:1013_1: lambiādayo cattāro ca paṭhamapārājikaṃ āpannā evāti katvā kuto catuvīsatīti ? Vuccate
tika-vin09t0:1013_2: – mātughātakādayo hi cattāro idha anupasampannā eva adhippetā, lambiādayo cattāro
tika-vin09t0:1013_3: kiñcāpi paṭhamapārājikena saṅgahitā, yasmā pana ekena pariyāyena methunadhammaṃ appaṭisevino
tika-vin09t0:1013_4: honti, tasmā visuṃ vuttāti. Dutiyavikappe kaccitthāti ettha kacci atthāti padacchedo kātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1018_0: Piyavacanena ālapananti piyāyitabbavacanenālapanaṃ, sādhūnaṃ samālapananti vuttaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1018_1: hoti. Sādhavo hi pare “bhonto”ti vā “devānaṃpiyā”ti vā “bhadrabhava”nti vā “āyasmanto”ti vā samālapanti.
tika-vin09t0:1020_0: Saṃ-saddo vijjamānatthoti āha “saṃvijjatī”ti. Cetanāti vītikkamavasappavattā pubbabhāgacetanā,
tika-vin09t0:1020_1: mocanassādacetanāti attho. Assāti sukkavissaṭṭhiyā. Aññapadatthasamāseneva sukkavissaṭṭhiyā
tika-vin09t0:1020_2: vuttattā ika-saddassa visuṃ attho natthīti āha “sañcetanāva sañcetanikā”ti. Idāni
tika-vin09t0:1020_3: ika-saddova atthiatthaṃ pakāsetīti dassento “sañcetanā vā”tiādimāha. Saṃvijjamānā
tika-vin09t0:1020_4: cetanā sañcetanā. Sukkassāti sambhavassa. Visaṭṭhīti vissaggo.
tika-vin09t0:1021_0: Idāni taṃ yasmiṃ kāle moceti, yenādhippāyena moceti, yena copāyena moceti, yañca
tika-vin09t0:1021_1: tassa adhippāyassa vatthu, taṃ sabbaṃ saṅkhepato vibhāvetvā sarūpato taṃ visaṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1021_2: dassetuṃ “rāgūpatthambhādīsū”tiādimāha. Tattha rāgassa balavabhāvo, rāgena vā aṅgajātassūpatthambho
tika-vin09t0:1021_3: thaddhabhāvo rāgūpatthambho, so ādi yesaṃ te rāgūpatthambhādayo, tesu rāgūpatthambhādīsu.
tika-vin09t0:1021_5: gahaṇaṃ. Kammaññataṃ patteti mocanakammakkhamatāya kammaniyataṃ patte, ajjhattarūpādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1021_6: upakkamārahabhāvaṃ patteti attho. Arogassa bhāvo ārogyaṃ, taṃ ādi yesaṃ te ārogyādayo,
tika-vin09t0:1021_8: Ajjhattarūpaṃ ajjhattaṃ upādinnarūpaṃ, taṃ ādi yesaṃ te ajjhattarūpādayo, tesu. Ādisaddena
tika-vin09t0:1021_10: mocanassādo, mocanatthaṃ pubbabhāge pavattarāgo, sampayuttaassādasīsena cettha rāgo
tika-vin09t0:1021_11: vutto, tena sampayuttā cetanā mocanassādacetanā, tāya. Iminā muccanassādo muttassādo
tika-vin09t0:1021_12: methunassādo phassassādo kaṇḍuvanassādo dassanassādo nisajjassādo vācassādo gehasitapemaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1021_13: vanabhaṅgiyanti imehi sampayuttā cetanāyo paṭikkhipati, tāhi nimitte upakkamantassa
tika-vin09t0:1021_14: muttepi anāpatti. “Nimitte upakkamantassā”ti iminā pana ūrumaddāpanādīni paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin09t0:1021_15: Tena hi satipi mocanassāde nimitte upakkamābhāvato muttepi anāpatti. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1022_1: dhātūnaṃ, rasasoṇitādīnaṃ vā sattannaṃ dhātūnaṃ nānāttato. Ṭhānā cāvanāti sukkassa
tika-vin09t0:1022_2: yaṃ ṭhānaṃ, tato cuti. Sukkassa hi vatthisīsaṃ kaṭi kāyoti tidhā ṭhānaṃ pakappenti.
tika-vin09t0:1022_3: Eko kirācariyo “vatthisīsaṃ sukkassa ṭhāna”nti āha, eko “kaṭī”ti, eko “sakalo kāyo”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1022_4: Tesu tatiyassa bhāsitaṃ subhāsitaṃ. Kesalomanakhadantānañhi maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1022_5: uccārapassāvakheḷasiṅghāṇikā, thaddhasukkhacammāni ca vajjetvā avaseso chavimaṃsalohitānugato
tika-vin09t0:1022_7: Tathā hi rāgapariyuṭṭhānenābhibhūtānaṃ hatthīnaṃ ubhohi kaṇṇacūḷikāhi sambhavo nikkhamati.
tika-vin09t0:1023_0: Ettha ca “rāgūpatthambhādīsū”tiādinā kālo dassito. Rāgūpatthambhādikālesu hi aṅgajātaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1023_1: kammaniyaṃ hoti. Yassa kammaniyatte sati moceti, ito paraṃ añño kālo natthi. Na hi
tika-vin09t0:1023_2: vinā rāgūpatthambhādīhi pubbaṇhādayo kālabhedā mocane nimittaṃ honti. “Ārogyādīsū”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1023_3: pana adhippāyo dassito. Evarūpena hi adhippāyabhedena moceti, na aññathā. “Ajjhattarūpādīsū”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1023_4: upāyo dassito. Ajjhattarūpe vā hi moceyya, bahiddhārūpe vā, ubhayattha vā, ākāse
tika-vin09t0:1023_5: vā kaṭiṃ kampento, ito paraṃ añño upāyo natthi. Nīlādivasenā”tiādīhi pana dasahi
tika-vin09t0:1023_6: navamassa adhippāyassa vatthu dassitaṃ. Vīmaṃsanto hi nīlādīsu aññataravasena vīmaṃsati,
tika-vin09t0:1023_7: na tehi vinimuttanti. “Ṭhānā cāvanā”ti iminā pana atthato vissaṭṭhi dassitā. Yathāha
tika-vin09t0:1023_8: “vissaṭṭhīti ṭhānato cāvanā vuccatī”ti. Sā cāyaṃ tassa sukkassa ṭhānā cāvanā rāgavasena.
tika-vin09t0:1023_10: Aññatra supinantāti supino eva supinanto, taṃ ṭhapetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “yā
tika-vin09t0:1023_11: supine”tiādi. Saṅghādisesoti imassa āpattinikāyassa nāmaṃ. Tenāha “yā aññatra supinantā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1023_12: Āpattinikāyoti āpattisamūho. Kiñcāpi ayaṃ ekāva āpatti, ruḷhisaddena, pana avayave
tika-vin09t0:1023_13: samūhavohārena vā “nikāyo”ti vutto “eko vedanākkhandho, eko viññāṇakkhandho”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin09t0:1024_0: Assāti āpattinikāyassa. Nanu ca ayuttoyaṃ niddeso “saṅgho ādimhi ceva sese ca icchitabbo
tika-vin09t0:1024_1: assā”ti. Na hi āpattinikāyassa ādimhi ceva sese ca saṅgho icchito, kiñcarahi vuṭṭhānassāti
tika-vin09t0:1024_2: imaṃ codanaṃ manasi nidhāya yathā na virujjhati, tathā adhippāyaṃ vivarituṃ “kiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1024_3: vuttaṃ hotī”tiādimāha. Āpattito vuṭṭhānassa ādimhi ceva sese ca icchito saṅgho āpattiyāva
tika-vin09t0:1024_4: icchito nāma hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo. Āpattivuṭṭhānanti āpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ, anāpattikabhāvūpagamananti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1025_0: Dakasotanti passāvamaggaṃ, aṅgajātappadesanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1025_1: “dakasotaṃ otiṇṇamatte”ti vuttanti āha “ṭhānato pana cuta”ntiādi. Avassameva dakasotaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1025_2: otarati adhivāsetvā antarā nivāretuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Dakasotorohanato paṭṭhāya pana
tika-vin09t0:1025_3: upādinnato vinimuttattā sambhavarūpaṃ utusamuṭṭhānameva avasissati, sesaṃ tisamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1025_4: natthīti veditabbaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā ṭhānato cutaṃ dakasotaṃ otarati, tasmā.
tika-vin09t0:1026_0: Amocanādhippāyassāti bhesajjena nimittaṃ ālimpantassa uccārādīni vā karontassa. Supinaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1026_1: passantassāti dhātukkhobhato vā anubhūtapubbato vā devatopasaṃhārato vā pubbanimittato
tika-vin09t0:1026_2: vāti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi supinaṃ passantassa. Kiṃ panetaṃ passanto sutto passati,
tika-vin09t0:1026_3: paṭibuddho, udāhu neva sutto, na paṭibuddhoti? Kiñcettha – yadi tāva sutto passati,
tika-vin09t0:1026_4: abhidhammavirodho āpajjati. Bhavaṅgacittena hi supati, taṃ rūpanimittādiārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1026_5: vā rāgādisampayuttaṃ vā na hoti. Supinaṃ passantassa ca īdisāni cittāni uppajjanti.
tika-vin09t0:1026_6: Atha paṭibuddho passati, vinayavirodho āpajjati. Yañhi paṭibuddho passati, taṃ sabbohārikacittena
tika-vin09t0:1026_7: passati. Sabbohārikacittena ca kate vītikkame anāpatti nāma natthi. Supinaṃ passantena
tika-vin09t0:1026_8: pana katepi vītikkame ekantaṃ anāpatti eva. Atha neva sutto na paṭibuddho passati,
tika-vin09t0:1026_9: ko nāma passati, evañca sati supinassa abhāvova āpajjatīti? Na abhāvo, kasmā? Yasmā
tika-vin09t0:1026_10: kapimiddhapareto passati. Vuttañhetaṃ “kapimiddhapareto kho mahārāja supinaṃ passatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1026_11: Kapimiddhaparetoti makkaṭaniddāya yutto. Yathā hi makkaṭassa niddā lahuparivattā
tika-vin09t0:1026_12: hoti, evaṃ yā niddā punappunaṃ kusalādicittavokiṇṇattā lahuparivattā, yassā pavattiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1026_13: punappunaṃ bhavaṅgato uttaraṇaṃ hoti, tāya yutto supinaṃ passati. Yassa ca evaṃ passantassa
tika-vin09t0:1026_14: supine methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa viya, kāyasaṃsaggādīni āpajjantassa viya ca
tika-vin09t0:1026_15: supinanteneva kāraṇena asuci muccati, tassapi anāpatti. Supine pana uppannāya assādacetanāya
tika-vin09t0:1026_16: sacassa visayo hoti, niccalena bhavitabbaṃ, na hatthena nimittaṃ kīḷāpetabbaṃ. Kāsāvapaccattharaṇarakkhaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1026_17: pana hatthapuṭena gahetvā jagganatthāya udakaṭṭhānaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1029_0: “Otiṇṇo”ti idaṃ kammasādhanaṃ, kattusādhanaṃ vā hotīti tadubhayavasena atthaṃ dassento
tika-vin09t0:1029_2: yathā te ratijanakā rūpādayo visayā aniccadukkhāsubhānattākārena avaṭṭhitā, tathā
tika-vin09t0:1029_3: apassitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pariṇatenāti parivattena. Tenāha “yathā parivattamāna”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1029_4: Vuttarāgavasenāti kāyasaṃsaggarāgavasena. Tadahujātāyapīti tasmiṃ ahani jātaṃ jananaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1029_5: etissāti tadahujātā, tasmiṃ ahani jātāti vā tadahujātā, tāya, taṃ divasaṃ jātāyapīti
tika-vin09t0:1030_0: Assāti “kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyā”ti padassa. Idāni hatthādīnaṃ vibhāgadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1030_1: “tattha hattho nāma kapparato paṭṭhāyā”tiādimāha. Kapparato paṭṭhāyāti dutiyamahāsandhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1030_2: upādāya. Aññattha pana maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya yāva agganakhā hattho. Vinandhitvā vā
tika-vin09t0:1030_3: avinandhitvā vā katakesakalāpassetaṃ adhivacananti sambandho. Tattha vinandhitvāti
tika-vin09t0:1030_4: tīhi kesavaṭṭīhi ganthitvā. Suvaṇṇacīrakanti suvaṇṇapāḷiṃ. Hatthañca veṇiñca ṭhapetvā
tika-vin09t0:1031_0: Yo hi sevanādhippāyopi niccalena kāyena kevalaṃ phassaṃ paṭivijānāti sādiyati anubhoti,
tika-vin09t0:1031_1: tassa cittuppādamatte āpattiyā abhāvato anāpattīti āha “kāyena avāyamitvā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1031_2: Mokkhādhippāyenāti itthito muccitukāmatādhippāyena. Asañciccāti “iminā upāyena imaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1031_3: phusissāmī”ti acetetvā. Evañhi acetetvā pattappaṭiggahaṇādīsu mātugāmassa aṅge phuṭṭhepi
tika-vin09t0:1031_4: anāpatti. Asatiyāti aññavihito hoti, “mātugāmaṃ phusissāmī”ti sati natthi, evaṃ asatiyā
tika-vin09t0:1031_5: hatthapādapasāraṇādikāle phusantassa anāpatti. Ajānantassāti dārakavesena ṭhitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1031_6: dārikaṃ “itthī”ti ajānanto kenacideva karaṇīyena phusati, evaṃ “itthī”ti ajānantassa
tika-vin09t0:1031_7: phusato anāpatti. Asādiyantassāti kāyasaṃsaggaṃ asādiyantassa bāhāparamparāya nītabhikkhussa
tika-vin09t0:1031_8: viya anāpatti. Idha pana udāyitthero ādikammiko. Tassa anāpatti ādikammikassāti.
tika-vin09t0:1034_0: Duṭṭhullavācassādarāgavasenāti duṭṭhullā vācā duṭṭhullavācā, tāya assādacetanā duṭṭhullavācassādo,
tika-vin09t0:1034_3: jānituṃ samatthaṃ. Yā pana mahallikāpi bālā eḷamūgā, ayaṃ idhānadhippetā. Vaṇṇo nāma
tika-vin09t0:1034_4: dve magge uddissa “itthilakkhaṇena subhalakkhaṇena samannāgatāsī”tiādinā thomanā.
tika-vin09t0:1034_5: Avaṇṇo nāma dve magge uddissa vuttavipariyāyena garahanā, “itthilakkhaṇena subhalakkhaṇena
tika-vin09t0:1034_6: asamannāgatāsī”tiādīhi khuṃsanāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yācanā nāma “dehi me, arahasi me dātu”nti
tika-vin09t0:1034_7: vacanaṃ. Āyācanā nāma “kadā te mātā pasīdissati, kadā te pitā pasīdissati, kadā te
tika-vin09t0:1034_8: devatāyo pasīdissanti, kadā te sukhaṇo sulayo sumuhutto bhavissati, kadā te methunaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1034_9: dhammaṃ labhissāmī”ti vacanaṃ. Pucchanaṃ nāma “kathaṃ tvaṃ sāmikassa desi, kathaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1034_10: jārassa desī”ti vacanaṃ. Paṭipucchanaṃ nāma “evaṃ kira tvaṃ sāmikassa deti, evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1034_11: jārassa desī”ti vacanaṃ. Ācikkhanaṃ nāma puṭṭhassa “evaṃ dehi, evaṃ dentā sāmikassa
tika-vin09t0:1034_12: piyā bhavissasi, manāpā cā”ti bhaṇanaṃ. Anusāsanaṃ nāma apuṭṭhassa “evaṃ dehi, evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1034_13: dentā sāmikassa piyā bhavissasi, manāpā cā”ti bhavanaṃ. Akkosanaṃ nāma “animittāsi,
tika-vin09t0:1034_14: nimittamattāsi, alohitāsi, dhuvalohitāsi, dhuvacoḷāsi, paggharantīsi, sikharaṇīsi,
tika-vin09t0:1034_15: itthipaṇḍakāsi, vepurisikāsi, sambhinnāsi, ubhatobyañjanakāsī”ti vacanaṃ. Yasmā methunupasaṃhitāya
tika-vin09t0:1034_16: vācāya adhikaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā “methunupasaṃhitāhī”ti idaṃ duṭṭhullavācāya
tika-vin09t0:1034_17: sikhāpattalakkhaṇadassananti vuttaṃ, na pana methunupasaṃhitāyeva duṭṭhullavācattā.
tika-vin09t0:1034_19: Ubhatobyañjanakāsīti purisanimittena, itthinimittena cāti ubhatobyañjanehi samannāgatā.
tika-vin09t0:1035_0: Ettha ca vaṇṇabhaṇane tāva “itthilakkhaṇena subhalakkhaṇena samannāgatāsī”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1035_1: na tāva sīsaṃ eti. “Tava vaccamaggo ca passāvamaggo ca subho subhasaṇṭhāno dassanīyo,
tika-vin09t0:1035_2: īdisena nāma itthilakkhaṇena subhalakkhaṇena samannāgatāsī”ti vadati, sīsaṃ eti,
tika-vin09t0:1036_0: Avaṇṇabhaṇane pana “animittāsī”tiādīhi ekādasahi padehi avaṇṇe aghaṭite sīsaṃ na
tika-vin09t0:1036_1: eti, ghaṭitepi tesu “sikharaṇīsi sambhinnāsi ubhatobyañjanakāsī”ti imehi tīhi ghaṭiteyeva saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin09t0:1037: Yācanāyapi “dehi me”ti ettakeneva sīsaṃ na eti, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ dehī”ti evaṃ methunadhammena ghaṭite eva saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin09t0:1038_0: “Kadā te mātā pasīdissatī”tiādīsu āyācanavacanesupi ettakeneva sīsaṃ na eti, “kadā
tika-vin09t0:1038_1: te mātā pasīdissati, kadā te methunaṃ dhammaṃ labhissāmī”ti vā “tava mātari pasannāya
tika-vin09t0:1038_2: vā methunaṃ dhammaṃ labhissāmī”tiādinā pana nayena methunadhammena ghaṭiteyeva saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin09t0:1039: “Kathaṃ tvaṃ sāmikassa desī”tiādīsu pucchāvacanesupi “methunaṃ dhamma”nti vutteyeva saṅghādiseso. “Evaṃ kira tvaṃ sāmikassa desī”ti paṭipucchāvacanesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:1040_0: Ācikkhanāya ca “evaṃ dehī”ti, “evaṃ dadamānā”ti vuttepi sīsaṃ na eti, “methunaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1040_1: evaṃ dehi, evaṃ upanehi, evaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ dadamānā upanayamānā sāmikassa piyā
tika-vin09t0:1040_2: hotī”tiādinā pana nayena methunadhammena ghaṭiteyeva saṅghādiseso. Anusāsanivacanesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:1041_0: Akkosavacanesu pana ekādasasu “sikharaṇīsi sambhinnāsi ubhatobyañjanakāsī”ti imāni
tika-vin09t0:1041_1: tīṇiyeva padāni suddhāni sīsaṃ enti, iti imāni ca tīṇi, purimāni ca vaccamaggapassāvamaggamethunadhammapadāni
tika-vin09t0:1041_2: tīṇīti cha padāni suddhāni āpattikarāni, sesāni “animittāsī”tiādīni animitte “methunaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1041_3: dhammaṃ me dehī”ti vā “animittāsi, methunaṃ dhammaṃ me dehī”ti vā ādinā nayena methunadhammena
tika-vin09t0:1042_0: Adhakkhakanti akkhakato paṭṭhāya adho. Ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalanti jāṇumaṇḍalato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:1042_1: uddhaṃ. Ubbhakkhakanti akkhakato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ. Adhojāṇumaṇḍalanti jāṇumaṇḍalato
tika-vin09t0:1042_2: paṭṭhāya adho. Akkhakaṃ, pana jāṇumaṇḍalañca ettheva dukkaṭakhette saṅgahaṃ gacchati
tika-vin09t0:1042_3: bhikkhuniyā kāyasaṃsagge viya. Na hi buddhā garukāpattiṃ sāvasesaṃ paññāpentīti.
tika-vin09t0:1042_4: Kāyappaṭibaddhanti vatthaṃ vā pupphaṃ vā ābharaṇaṃ vā.
tika-vin09t0:1043_1: aṭṭhakathaṃ vā sajjhāyaṃ karonto atthapurekkhāro nāma, pāḷiṃ vācento, sajjhāyaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:1043_2: karonto dhammapurekkhāro nāma, “idānipi animittāsi, ubhatobyañjanakāsi, appamādaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1043_3: dāni kareyyāsi, yathā āyatimpi evarūpā mā hohisī”ti bhaṇanto anusāsanipurekkhāro
tika-vin09t0:1043_4: nāma. Iti atthañca dhammañca anusāsaniñca purakkhitvā bhaṇantānaṃ anāpatti. Yo pana
tika-vin09t0:1043_5: bhikkhunīnaṃ pāḷiṃ vācento pakativācanāmaggaṃ pahāya hasanto hasanto “sikharaṇīsi,
tika-vin09t0:1043_6: sambhinnāsi, ubhatobyañjanakāsī”ti punappunaṃ bhaṇati, tassa āpattiyeva. Idha ādikammiko
tika-vin09t0:1043_7: udāyitthero, tassa anāpatti ādikammikassa. Nanu “sikharaṇī”tiādīhi akkosantassa paṭighacittaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1043_8: uppajjatīti dukkhavedanāyapi bhavitabbaṃ, atha kasmā dvivedananti? Nāyaṃ doso. Rāgavasena
tika-vin09t0:1043_9: hi ayaṃ āpatti, na paṭighavasena, tasmā rāgavaseneva pavatto akkoso idhādhippeto,
tika-vin09t0:1046_1: itthī adhippetāti āha “duṭṭhullobhāsena vuttappakārāya itthiyā”ti. Samīpeti savanūpacāre.
tika-vin09t0:1046_2: “Ṭhatvā”ti pāṭhaseso. Attakāmapāricariyāti kāmīyatīti kāmo, methunadhammo, paricaraṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1046_3: upaṭṭhānaṃ paricariyā, sāva pāricariyā, kāmena pāricariyā kāmapāricariyā, attano
tika-vin09t0:1046_4: kāmapāricariyā attakāmapāricariyā, attano atthāya methunadhammena upaṭṭhānanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1046_5: Atha vā kāmitāti kāmā, pāricariyā, attano kāmā attakāmā, attakāmā ca sā pāricariyā
tika-vin09t0:1046_6: cāti attakāmapāricariyā, sayaṃ methunarāgavasena patthitaupaṭṭhānanti attho. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1046_8: atthattayaṃ dasseti, dutiyena adhippāyapāricariyāsaṅkhātaṃ atthadvayaṃ. Byañjane
tika-vin09t0:1046_9: pana ādaraṃ akatvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ “attano kāmaṃ attano hetuṃ attano adhippāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1046_10: attano pāricariya”nti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ. “Attano kāmaṃ attano hetuṃ attano pāricariya”nti
tika-vin09t0:1046_11: hi vutte jānissanti paṇḍitā “ettāvatā attano atthāya kāmapāricariyā vuttā”ti, “attano
tika-vin09t0:1046_12: adhippāyaṃ attano pāricariya”nti vuttepi jānissanti “ettāvatā attanā icchitakāmitaṭṭhena
tika-vin09t0:1047_0: Kalyāṇena bhaddakena guṇena samannāgatattā kalyāṇadhammaṃ. Tenāha “tadubhayenāpī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1047_1: Abhirameyyāti toseyya. Etadagganti esā aggā. Pāricariyānanti pāricariyānaṃ majjhe,
tika-vin09t0:1047_2: niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Nanu duṭṭhallavācāsikkhāpade methunayācanaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1047_3: atha kasmā idaṃ vuttaṃ? Nāyaṃ doso. Tattha hi duṭṭhullavācassādarāgavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1048_0: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇeti bhaṇitakkhaṇe. Ubhatobyañjanako pana paṇḍakagatikattā visuṃ na
tika-vin09t0:1048_1: vutto. “Imasmiṃ sikkhāpadadvaye kāyasaṃsagge viya yakkhipetīsupi duṭṭhullattakāmavacane
tika-vin09t0:1048_2: thullaccaya”nti vadanti. Tasmiṃyevāti paṇḍakeyeva itthisaññino attakāmapāricariyāya
tika-vin09t0:1048_3: vaṇṇabhaṇanepi dukkaṭaṃ. “Yo te vihāre vasati, tassa aggadānaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ dehī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1048_4: pariyāyavacanepi dukkaṭaṃ. “Attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyya yā mādisaṃ ‘sīlavanta’nti
tika-vin09t0:1048_5: vuttattā”ti eke. “Pañcasu aṅgesu sabbhāvā saṅghādisesovā”ti apare. “Methunupasaṃhitenā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1051_0: Sañcaraṇaṃ sañcaro, so etassa atthīti sañcarī, sañcaraṇasīloti vā sañcarī, tassa
tika-vin09t0:1051_1: bhāvo sañcarittaṃ, sañcaraṇanti attho. Tañca parato “itthiyā vā purisamati”ntiādivacanato
tika-vin09t0:1051_2: itthipurisānaṃ vemajjheti āha “itthipurisānaṃ antare sañcaraṇabhāva”nti. Paṭiggaṇhanavīmaṃsanapaccāharaṇānīti
tika-vin09t0:1051_3: ettha paṭiggaṇhanaṃ nāma purisena vā itthiyā vā ubhinnaṃ mātādīhi vā “bhante, itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1051_4: itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā evaṃ bhaṇāhī”ti vutte tesaṃ vacanaṃ “sādhū”ti vā “hotū”ti vā
tika-vin09t0:1051_5: “bhaṇāmī”ti vā yena kenaci ākārena vacībhedaṃ katvā, sīsakampanādīhi vā sampaṭicchanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1051_6: Vīmaṃsanaṃ nāma vuttappakārena sāsanaṃ gahetvā tassā itthiyā vā purisassa vā tesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1051_7: avassaṃ ārocanakānaṃ mātāpitubhātābhaginiādīnaṃ vā santikaṃ gantvā tassa sāsanassa
tika-vin09t0:1051_8: ārocanaṃ. Paccāharaṇaṃ nāma tena gantvā ārocite sā itthī vā puriso vā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchatu
tika-vin09t0:1051_9: vā, mā vā, lajjāya vā tuṇhī hotu, puna āgantvā tassā itthiyā vā purisassa vā tassā
tika-vin09t0:1052_0: Itthiyā vā purisamatiṃ purisassa vā itthimatinti ettha “āroceyyā”ti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1052_1: Tenevāha “tatthā”tiādi. Jāyābhāveti bhariyābhāve. Jārabhāveti patibhāve, nimittatthe
tika-vin09t0:1052_2: cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Tasmā bhariyābhāvanimittaṃ patibhāvanimittaṃ, bhariyābhāvahetu
tika-vin09t0:1052_3: patibhāvahetu, bhariyābhāvapaccayā patibhāvapaccayā ārocetīti attho. Esa nayo “jāyattane
tika-vin09t0:1052_4: ārocetī”tiādīsupi. “Jāyattane vā jārattane vā”ti hi idaṃ yadatthaṃ taṃ tesaṃ matiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1052_5: āroceti, taṃ dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Idāni pana padabhājaniyaṃ vuttanayenāpi atthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1052_7: vā jārattane vā”ti pana niddesassa ubhayaliṅgasādhāraṇattā purisaliṅgavasenāpi yojetvā
tika-vin09t0:1052_8: vattabbanti āha “eteneva upāyenā”tiādi. Muhuttikāti gaṇikā. “Antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1053_0: Aññatra nālaṃvacanīyāyāti desacārittavasena paṇṇadānādinā apariccattaṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin09t0:1053_1: Sañcarittavasena bhikkhunā vacanīyā na hotīti nālaṃvacanīyā, taṃ ṭhapetvāti keci.
tika-vin09t0:1053_2: Appena vā bahunā vā dhanena kītā dhanakkītā. Yasmā pana sā na kītamattāyeva bhariyā,
tika-vin09t0:1053_3: saṃvāsatthāya pana kītattā bhariyā, tasmāssa niddese “dhanena kiṇitvā vāsetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1053_4: Chandavāsinīti chandena attano ruciyā vasatīti chandavāsinī. Yasmā pana sā na attano
tika-vin09t0:1053_5: chandamatteneva bhariyā hoti, purisena pana sampaṭicchitattā, tasmāssa niddese “piyo
tika-vin09t0:1053_6: piyaṃ vāsetī”ti vuttaṃ. Ādisaddena “bhogavāsinī, paṭavāsinī, odapattakinī, obhaṭacumbaṭā,
tika-vin09t0:1053_7: dāsī ca bhariyā ca, kammakārī ca bhariyā ca, dhajāhaṭā, muhuttikā”ti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1053_8: ākārānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Yathā ca “chandavāsinī”tiādīsu aññataravasena vadato visaṅketo
tika-vin09t0:1053_9: natthi, evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ avuttesupi “hohi kira itthannāmassa bhariyā, jāyā, pajāpati,
tika-vin09t0:1053_10: puttamātā, gharaṇī, gharasāminī, bhattarandhikā, sussūsikā, paricārikā”ti evamādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1053_11: saṃvāsaparidīpakesu vacanesu aññataravasena vadantassāpi visaṅketo natthi, tivaṅgasampattiyā āpattiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1054_0: Māturakkhitaṃ brūhīti ettha māturakkhitā nāma mātarā rakkhitā, yathā purisena saha
tika-vin09t0:1054_1: saṃvāsaṃ na kappeti, evaṃ mātarā rakkhitāti attho. Tenevassa padabhājanepi “mātā
tika-vin09t0:1054_2: rakkhati gopeti, issariyaṃ kāreti, vasaṃ vattetī”ti vuttaṃ. Piturakkhitādīsūti “piturakkhitā,
tika-vin09t0:1054_3: mātāpiturakkhitā, bhāturakkhitā, bhaginirakkhitā, ñātirakkhitā, gottarakkhitā, dhammarakkhitā,
tika-vin09t0:1054_4: sārakkhā, saparidaṇḍā”ti evaṃ vuttesu piturakkhitādīsu. Yathā ca ettha, evaṃ “piturakkhitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1055_0: Saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā gilānassa vā kiccena gacchantassāti ettha bhikkhusaṅghassa
tika-vin09t0:1055_1: uposathāgāraṃ vā kiñci vā vippakataṃ hoti. Tattha kārukānaṃ bhattavetanatthāya upāsako
tika-vin09t0:1055_2: vā upāsikāya santikaṃ bhikkhuṃ pahiṇeyya, upāsikā vā upāsakassa, evarūpena saṅghakiccena
tika-vin09t0:1055_3: gacchantassa anāpatti. Cetiyakamme kariyamānepi eseva nayo. Gilānassa bhesajjatthāyapi
tika-vin09t0:1055_4: upāsakena vā upāsikāya santikaṃ, upāsikāya vā upāsakassa santikaṃ pahitassa gacchato anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1056_0: Kiñcāpi ettha “itthī nāma manussitthī, na yakkhī na petī na tiracchānagatā. Puriso
tika-vin09t0:1056_1: nāma manussapuriso, na yakkho”tiādi natthi, tathāpi manussajātikāva itthipurisā idha
tika-vin09t0:1056_2: adhippetāti āha “tesaṃ manussajātikatā”ti. Nanālaṃvacanīyatāti yathāvuttanayena pariccattā
tika-vin09t0:1056_3: alaṃvacanīyā. Nivāraṇattho hi ettha alaṃ-saddo. Na alaṃvacanīyā nālaṃvacanīyā, na
tika-vin09t0:1056_4: nālaṃvacanīyā, tassā bhāvo nanālaṃvacanīyatā, “alaṃvacanīyatā”icceva vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1057_0: Paṇṇattinti, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ. Kāyavikārenāti sīsukkhipanādikāyavikārena. Tatheva
tika-vin09t0:1057_1: vīmaṃsitvā tatheva paccāharantassāti hatthamuddādinā kāyavikārena vīmaṃsitvā puna
tika-vin09t0:1057_2: āgantvā tatheva ārocentassa. Āgamissatīti tava santike dhammassavanādiatthaṃ āgamissati.
tika-vin09t0:1057_3: Kenaci vutteti āsanasālādīsu nisinnassa kenaci purisena vutte. Sace hi khīṇāsavassa
tika-vin09t0:1057_4: mātāpitaro kujjhitvā alaṃvacanīyā honti, tañca bhikkhuṃ gharaṃ upagataṃ pitā vadati
tika-vin09t0:1057_5: “mātā te, tāta, maṃ mahallakaṃ chaḍḍetvā ñātikulaṃ gatā, gaccha naṃ maṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1057_6: pesehī”ti. So ce gantvā taṃ vatvā puna pituno tassā āgamanaṃ vā anāgamanaṃ vā āroceti,
tika-vin09t0:1057_7: evaṃ ārocentassa tassapi kāyavācato samuṭṭhāti. Tenāha “paṇṇattiṃ ajānantassa panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1057_8: Khīṇāsavassapīti ettha pi-saddena sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ vattabbameva natthīti dīpeti.
tika-vin09t0:1057_9: Pituvacanenāti attano pituvacanena. Gantvāti tassā samīpaṃ gantvā. Paṇṇattiṃ, alaṃvacanīyabhāvañcāti
tika-vin09t0:1057_10: ubhayaṃ ajānantassapi kāyavācato samuṭṭhāti. Tadubhayanti paṇṇattiṃ, alaṃvacanīyabhāvañca.
tika-vin09t0:1057_11: Yaṃ pana paṇṇattiṃ jānitvā eteheva tīhi nayehi sañcarittaṃ samāpajjato kāyacittato,
tika-vin09t0:1057_12: vācācittato, kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti. Imāni tīṇi paṇṇattijānanacittena “sacittakasamuṭṭhānānī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1057_13: vuttaṃ, taṃ ayuttaṃ. Na hi paṇṇattiṃ jānitvāpi “nālaṃvacanīyā”ti maññamānassa sacittakehi
tika-vin09t0:1057_14: samuṭṭhānehi āpatti samuṭṭhātīti vattuṃ yujjati vītikkamacetanāya asambhavato.
tika-vin09t0:1060_0: Saññācikāya panāti ettha santi attavācako tatiyatthe nipāto, yācikāti bhāvasādhano,
tika-vin09t0:1060_1: tesañca majjhepadalopasamāso. Panāti nipātamattameva. Tenāha “sayaṃ pavattitayācanā
tika-vin09t0:1060_2: vuccatī”ti. Yā hi attanā pavattitā, sā attano nāma hotīti āha “tasmā”tiādi. Nanu
tika-vin09t0:1060_3: na sakkā yācanāyeva kuṭiṃ kātunti anuyogaṃ sandhāya tassādhippāyatthaṃ dassetuṃ “sayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1060_4: yācitakehī”tiādimāha. Tattha sayaṃ yācitakehīti “vāsiṃ detha, pharasuṃ dethā”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1060_5: sayaṃ yācitakehi. Upakaraṇehīti vāsiyādīhi. Parena bhaṇḍasāmikena “mama ida”nti apariccāgārakkhaṇagopanavasena
tika-vin09t0:1060_6: pariggahitaṃ parapariggahitakaṃ, parasantakanti vuttaṃ hoti. Mūlacchedavasenāti mūlassa
tika-vin09t0:1060_7: chindanavasena, parasantakabhāvato mocetvā attano santakaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Evañhi
tika-vin09t0:1060_8: aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato yācantassa aññātakaviññattiyā dukkaṭaṃ. Tāvakālikaṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:1060_9: vaṭṭatīti tāvakālikaṃ katvā yācituṃ vaṭṭati. Sakakammaṃ na yācitabbāti pāṇātipātasikkhāpadarakkhaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1060_10: vuttaṃ. “Hatthakammaṃ dethā”ti aniyametvāpi na yācitabbā. Evaṃ yācitā hi te “sādhu,
tika-vin09t0:1060_11: bhante”ti bhikkhuṃ uyyojetvā migepi māretvā āhareyyuṃ. Niyametvā pana “vihāre kiñci
tika-vin09t0:1060_12: kattabbaṃ atthi, tattha hatthakammaṃ dethā”ti yācitabbā. “Kuṭi nāma ullittā vā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1060_13: avalittā vā ullittāvalittā vā”ti padabhājane vuttattā “kuṭinti ullittādīsu aññatara”nti
tika-vin09t0:1060_14: vuttaṃ. Tattha uddhaṃ mukhaṃ littā ullittā. Anto limpantā hi evaṃ limpanti. Adho
tika-vin09t0:1060_15: mukhaṃ littā avalittā. Bahi limpantā hi evaṃ limpanti. Tenāha “tattha ullittā nāmā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1060_16: Piṭṭhasaṅghāṭoti dvārabāhā. “Sudhāya vā mattikāya vā”ti etena ṭhapetvā ime dve lepe
tika-vin09t0:1061_0: Yasmā pana saññācikāya kuṭiṃ karontenāpi idha vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ, tasmā
tika-vin09t0:1061_1: “sayaṃ vā karontena āṇattiyā vā kārāpentenā”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca “sayaṃ vā karontenā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1061_2: iminā sāmatthiyato labbhamānamatthamāha, na tu padatthato. “Āṇattiyā vā kārāpentenā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1061_3: pana padatthato. Evañca katvā yadi pana “karontena vā kārāpentena vā”ti vadeyya,
tika-vin09t0:1061_4: byañjanaṃ vilomitaṃ bhaveyya. Na hi kārāpento karonto nāma hotīti edisī codanā anavakāsāti
tika-vin09t0:1061_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Natthi sāmī pati etissāti asāmikā, taṃ asāmikaṃ, anissaranti attho. Anissaratā
tika-vin09t0:1061_6: cettha kārāpanenāti āha “kāretā dāyakena virahita”nti. Uddesoti uddisitabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1062_0: Tatrāti sāmismiṃ bhummavacananti āha “tassā kuṭiyā”ti. Dīghasoti nissakkavacananti
tika-vin09t0:1062_1: āha “dīghato”ti. Bahikuṭṭeti kuṭṭassa bahi, thusena missako piṇḍo thusapiṇḍo, tassa
tika-vin09t0:1062_3: hoti. Thusapiṇḍassūpari setakammaṃ pana abbohārikaṃ. Abbhantare bhavo abbhantarimo,
tika-vin09t0:1062_4: tena. Yatthāti yassaṃ kuṭiyaṃ. Pamāṇayuttoti pakatividatthiyā navavidatthipamāṇo.
tika-vin09t0:1062_5: “Tiriyaṃ sattantarā”ti ukkaṃsato pamāṇassa vuttattā “heṭṭhimakoṭiyā catuhatthavitthārā na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1063_0: Sodhetvāti samatalasīmamaṇḍalasadisaṃ katvā. Padabhājane vuttanayena saṅghaṃ tikkhattuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1063_1: yācitvāti “saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1063_2: pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo ‘ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1063_3: saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo asāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ kuṭivatthuolokanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1063_4: yācāmī”’ti padabhājane vuttanayena tikkhattuṃ yācitvā. Saṅghena vā sammatāti padabhājaniyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1063_5: vuttena ñattidutiyakammena, apalokanakammavasena vā saṅghena sammatā. Vatthūti kuṭivatthu.
tika-vin09t0:1063_6: Anārambhanti anupaddavaṃ. Parito kamati gacchati etthāti parikkamanaṃ, tena saha
tika-vin09t0:1063_7: vattatīti saparikkamanaṃ, saupacāranti attho. Tenāha “tehi bhikkhūhī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1064_0: Kipillikādīnanti ettha kipillikā nāma rattakāḷapiṅgalādibhedā yā kāci, tā ādi yesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1064_1: tāni kipillikādīni, tesaṃ. Ādisaddena upacikādīnaṃ saṅgahaṇaṃ. Āsayoti nibaddhavasanaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1064_2: so ādi yesaṃ te āsayādayo, tehi. Ādisaddena cettha nissitassa gahaṇaṃ. Soḷasahi upaddavehīti
tika-vin09t0:1064_3: “kipillikānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, upacikānaṃ vā undūrānaṃ vā ahīnaṃ vā vicchikānaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:1064_4: satapadīnaṃ vā hatthīnaṃ vā assānaṃ vā sīhānaṃ vā byagghānaṃ vā dīpīnaṃ vā acchānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1064_5: vā taracchānaṃ vā yesaṃ kesañci tiracchānagatānaṃ pāṇānaṃ vā āsayo hoti, pubbaṇṇanissitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1064_7: vā hotī”ti evaṃ vuttehi soḷasahi upaddavehi. Tattha ca abbhāghātaṃ nāma kāraṇāgharaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1064_8: Āghātanaṃ nāma dhammagandhikā. Susānanti mahāsusānaṃ. Saṃsaraṇaṃ nāma anibbijjhagamanīyo gatapaccāgatamaggo.
tika-vin09t0:1065_1: Tena bhikkhunāti kuṭikārakena bhikkhunā. Yācitehīti “ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā
tika-vin09t0:1065_2: vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa
tika-vin09t0:1065_3: vacanīyo ‘ahaṃ, bhante, saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo asāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1065_4: saṅghaṃ kuṭivatthudesanaṃ yācāmī”’ti tikkhattuṃ yācitehi. Ñattidutiyena kammenāti –
tika-vin09t0:1066_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo asāmikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1066_1: attuddesaṃ, so saṅghaṃ kuṭivatthudesanaṃ yācati. Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho
tika-vin09t0:1066_2: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kuṭivatthuṃ deseyya. Esā ñatti. Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin09t0:1066_3: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo asāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ, so saṅghaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1066_4: kuṭivatthudesanaṃ yācati. Saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kuṭivatthuṃ deseti, yassāyasmato
tika-vin09t0:1066_5: khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kuṭivatthussa desanā, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati,
tika-vin09t0:1066_6: so bhāseyya. Desitaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kuṭivatthu, khamati saṅghassa,
tika-vin09t0:1067_0: Evaṃ padabhājane vuttena ñattidutiyena kammena. Āḷavikā nāma āḷaviraṭṭhe jātā dārakā,
tika-vin09t0:1067_1: te pabbajitakālepi “āḷavikā”tveva paññāyiṃsu. Te sandhāya vuttaṃ āḷavike bhikkhū”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1067_2: Lepe ghaṭiteti antolepe vā antolepena saddhiṃ bhittiñca chadanañca ekābaddhaṃ katvā
tika-vin09t0:1067_3: ghaṭite, bahilepe vā bahilepena saddhiṃ ghaṭite. Dve ca dukkaṭāni sārambhaaparikkamanavasena.
tika-vin09t0:1067_4: Ubhayavipannāti ubhayehi desanāpamāṇehi vipannā virahitā ubhayavipannā, adesitavatthukā
tika-vin09t0:1067_5: pamāṇātikkantāti attho. Tasminti dvārabandhe vā vātapāne vā. Lepo na ghaṭiyatīti
tika-vin09t0:1067_6: pubbe dinnalepo dvārabandhena vā vātapānena vā saddhiṃ na ghaṭiyati, ekābaddhaṃ hutvā
tika-vin09t0:1067_7: na tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tanti dvārabandhaṃ vā vātapānaṃ vā parāmasati. Paṭhamamevāti
tika-vin09t0:1067_8: lepakiccassa niṭṭhitattā dvārabandhavātapānānaṃ ṭhapanato pubbeyeva, lepassa niṭṭhitakkhaṇeyevāti
tika-vin09t0:1067_9: adhippāyo. “Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti desitavatthukaṃ pamāṇikaṃ sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1067_10: āpatti dukkaṭassa. Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti desitavatthukaṃ pamāṇikaṃ anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1067_11: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti padabhājaniyaṃ vuttattā “kevalaṃ sārambhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vippakatanti
tika-vin09t0:1067_12: aniṭṭhitaṃ. Aññassa dadato cāti aññassa puggalassa vā saṅghassa vā dadato ca. Guhā
tika-vin09t0:1067_13: nāma iṭṭhakaguhā vā silāguhā vā dāruguhā vā bhūmiguhā vā. Tiṇakuṭi nāma sattabhūmikopi
tika-vin09t0:1067_14: pāsādo tiṇacchadano “tiṇakuṭikā”ti vuccati. Aññassāti ācariyassa vā upajjhāyassa
tika-vin09t0:1067_15: vā saṅghassa vā. Vāsāgāraṃ ṭhapetvāti attano vasanatthāya vāsāgāraṃ ṭhapetvā. Uposathāgārādīsūti
tika-vin09t0:1067_17: catuhatthavitthiṇṇatā. Adesāpetvā karototi vatthuṃ adesāpetvā pamāṇātikkantaṃ, pamāṇayuttaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1067_18: vā karoto. Ettha ca vatthuno adesāpanaṃ akiriyā. Kuṭikaraṇaṃ kiriyā.
tika-vin09t0:1070_0: Mahantaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti mahallako, taṃ mahallakaṃ. Yo ca yaṃ gaṇhāti, so tassa atthīti
tika-vin09t0:1070_1: āha “mahantabhāvo etassa atthīti mahallako”ti. So ca mahantabhāvo kena, kuto cāti
tika-vin09t0:1070_2: āha “sasāmikabhāvenā”tiādi. Na kevalaṃ sasāmikabhāvenevāti āha “yasmā vā”tiādi. Yadi
tika-vin09t0:1070_3: evaṃ atha kasmā “mahallako nāma vihāro sasāmiko vuccatī”ti ettakameva padabhājane
tika-vin09t0:1070_4: vuttanti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi. Viharanti etthāti vihāro, āvāso. Mātikāyaṃ bhikkhū
tika-vin09t0:1070_5: vā anabhineyyāti ettha vā-saddo “ayaṃ vā so mahānāgo”tiādīsu viya avadhāraṇattho.
tika-vin09t0:1071_0: Kosambiyanti evaṃnāmake nagare. Tassa kira nagarassa ārāmapokkharaṇiādīsu tesu tesu
tika-vin09t0:1071_1: ṭhānesu kosambarukkhāva ussannā ahesuṃ, tasmā taṃ “kosambī”ti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. “Kusumbassa
tika-vin09t0:1071_2: nāma isino assamato avidūre māpitattā”ti eke. Channattheraṃ ārabbhāti yo abhinikkhamanakāle
tika-vin09t0:1071_3: saddhiṃ nikkhanto, yassa ca satthārā parinibbānakāle brahmadaṇḍo āṇatto, taṃ channattheraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1071_4: ārabbha. Cetiyarukkhanti cittīkataṭṭhena cetiyaṃ, pūjārahānaṃ devaṭṭhānānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1071_5: “cetiya”nti sammataṃ rukkhaṃ cetiyarukkhaṃ. Vatthuno adesanāya āpajjanato “akiriyamattato
tika-vin09t0:1071_6: samuṭṭhānabhāvo”ti vuttaṃ. Matta-saddena kiriyato samuṭṭhānataṃ paṭikkhipati. Keci
tika-vin09t0:1071_7: pana “vatthuadesanāya, kuṭikaraṇena ca samuṭṭhānato kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhātī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1074_0: Dūsīyatīti duṭṭho, dūseti paraṃ vināsetīti doso. Tenāha “dūsito cevā”tiādi. Idāni
tika-vin09t0:1074_1: “dūsito ceva dūsako cā”ti iminā saṅkhepena vuttamevatthaṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ “uppanne
tika-vin09t0:1074_2: hi dose”tiādimāha. Pakatibhāvaṃ jahāpitoti sommabhāvaṃ jahāpitoti attho, vikāramāpāditoti
tika-vin09t0:1074_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Ākāranānāttenāti dūsitākārassa ceva dūsakākārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1074_4: ākārānaṃ nānābhāvena. Nappatitoti pītisukhādīhi na abhigato anupagato, na upagatoti
tika-vin09t0:1074_5: attho. Yo ca pītisukhādīhi anupagato, so tehi vajjito nāma hotīti āha “pītisukhādīhi
tika-vin09t0:1074_6: vivajjito”ti. Yo ca tehi vajjito, na so tehi abhisaṭo nāma hotīti āha “na abhisaṭo”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1074_7: pītisukhādīhi na patthaṭoti attho. Nāssa mūlanti amūlakaṃ. Taṃ pana amūlakattaṃ yasmā
tika-vin09t0:1074_8: codakavasena adhippetaṃ, na cuditakavasena, tasmā tadatthaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ codakenā”tiādi
tika-vin09t0:1074_9: vuttaṃ. Tattha yanti pārājikaṃ. Etanti cuditakassa āpannānāpannattaṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade.
tika-vin09t0:1075_0: Idāni attanā vuttameva diṭṭhādiṃ vivarituṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tathevāti “pasādasotena
tika-vin09t0:1075_1: vā dibbasotena vā”ti imamatthaṃ atidisati. Parisaṅkitaṃ pana tividhaṃ diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1075_2: sutaparisaṅkitaṃ, mutaparisaṅkitanti. Tattha bhikkhuñca mātugāmañca tathārūpe ṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:1075_3: disvā “addhā imehi kata”nti vā “karissantī”ti vā parisaṅkitaṃ, idaṃ diṭṭhaparisaṅkitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1075_4: nāma. Andhakāre vā paṭicchannokāse vā bhikkhussa ca mātugāmassa ca vacanaṃ sutvā
tika-vin09t0:1075_5: dutiyassa atthibhāvaṃ ajānato pubbe vuttanayena parisaṅkitaṃ, idaṃ sutaparisaṅkitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1075_6: nāma. Dhuttehi itthīhi saddhiṃ paccantavihāre maṇḍape vā sālādīsu vā pupphagandhamaṃsasurādīni
tika-vin09t0:1075_7: anubhavitvā gataṭṭhānaṃ disvā “kena nu kho idaṃ kata”nti vīmaṃsantena tatra kenaci
tika-vin09t0:1075_8: bhikkhunā gandhādīhi pūjā katā hoti, bhesajjatthāya ariṭṭhaṃ vā pītaṃ, so tassa gandhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1075_9: ghāyitvā “ayaṃ so bhavissatī”ti parisaṅkitaṃ, idaṃ mutaparisaṅkitaṃ nāma. Evaṃ tividhassa
tika-vin09t0:1075_10: parisaṅkitassa abhāvo aparisaṅkitaṃ. Tenāha “diṭṭhasutamutavasena cetasā aparisaṅkita”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1075_11: Tañca panetaṃ diṭṭhādikaṃ na kevalaṃ attano vāti āha “attano vā parassa vā”ti. Yasmā
tika-vin09t0:1075_12: “tvaṃ paṇḍako”tiādivacanenāpi codayato āpattiyeva, tasmā “bhikkhuno anurūpesu ekūnavīsatiyā
tika-vin09t0:1075_13: aññatarenā”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā padabhājane “pārājikena dhammenāti catunnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1075_14: aññatarenā”ti vuttanti āha “padabhājane panā”tiādi. Upasagganipātānaṃ vācakasaddasanniṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:1075_16: Tenāha “abhibhaveyyā”ti. “Tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī”tiādinā nayena pavattāti
tika-vin09t0:1075_17: “tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevi, adinnaṃ ādiyi, manussaṃ ghātayittha, abhūtaṃ ārocayitthā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1075_18: evaṃ pavattā. Ettha ca “assamaṇosī’ti avandanakāraṇassa avuttattā antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno
tika-vin09t0:1075_19: na vanditabbo”ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ avandiyesu antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassa
tika-vin09t0:1075_20: avuttattā, “pacchā upasampannena pure upasampanno vandiyo”ti vuttattā ca. Idaṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:1076_0: Samīpeti dvādasahatthapamāṇe padese. Sikkhāpaccakkhānameva hi hatthamuddāya sīsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1076_1: na eti, idaṃ pana anuddhaṃsanaṃ, abhūtarocanañca etiyeva. Tenāha “hatthamuddāya eva
tika-vin09t0:1076_2: vā”ti. Brahmacariyāti brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ pasatthaṃ cariyanti brahmacariyaṃ, brahmūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1076_3: vā seṭṭhānaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakānaṃ, brahmānañca cariyanti brahmacariyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1076_4: tamhā brahmacariyā. Tenāha “seṭṭhacariyā”ti. Sādhu vatassa ekantena bhaddakaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin09t0:1076_7: vīmaṃsanādhippāyo, upaparikkhādhippāyo. Anuvijjakenāti saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1076_8: vinicchinituṃ nisinnena vinayadharena. Kiṃ te diṭṭhanti tayā kiṃ diṭṭhaṃ, paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1076_9: pārājikaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho, dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthaṃ pārājikaṃ āpajjanto diṭṭhoti
tika-vin09t0:1076_10: vuttaṃ hoti. Ādisaddena “kinti te diṭṭhaṃ, kadā te diṭṭhaṃ, kattha te diṭṭha”nti
tika-vin09t0:1077_0: Samanatthāya pavattamānehi samathehi adhikātabbanti adhikaraṇaṃ. Yathā hi samanavasena
tika-vin09t0:1077_1: samathānaṃ vivādādīsu adhikatabhāvo, evaṃ vivādādīnaṃ tehi adhikattabbatāti. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1077_3: vuttā. Adhikaraṇanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇanti
tika-vin09t0:1077_4: catubbidhaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ. Vivādādīni adhikaraṇāni samenti vūpasamentīti samathā, sammukhāvinayādayo.
tika-vin09t0:1077_5: Atha vā adhikarīyanti etthāti adhikaraṇaṃ. Ke adhikarīyanti? Samathā. Kathaṃ adhikarīyanti?
tika-vin09t0:1077_6: Samanavasena. Adhikaraṇaṃ samenti vūpasamentītipi samathāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1077_7: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā sesādhikaraṇehi codanāya abhāvato “idaṃ pana pārājikasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1077_8: āpattādhikaraṇameva adhippeta”nti vuttaṃ. Āpattiyeva adhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1077_9: Anuddhaṃsitakkhaṇeyeva saṅghādiseso, so ce taṅkhaṇeyeva jānātīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1078_0: Mettiyabhūmajaketi mettiyañca bhūmajakañca. Chabbaggiyānaṃ aggapurisā ete. Suddhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1078_1: vāti pārājikamanāpannaṃ vā. “Sace so taṅkhaṇeyeva jānātī”ti iminā āvajjanasamayamāha.
tika-vin09t0:1078_2: Taṅkhaṇeyeva jānanaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ, samayena āvajjitvā ñāte pana ñātameva hoti. Pacchā
tika-vin09t0:1078_4: sabbāneva hi imāni ekaparicchedāni. Yasmā pana parammukhā sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi
tika-vin09t0:1078_5: vadato dukkaṭameva, tasmā “parammukhā codentassa pana sīsaṃ na etī”ti vuttaṃ. Vuttanayāpattiyoti
tika-vin09t0:1078_6: “vācāya vācāyā”tiādinā vuttanayā saṅghādisesadukkaṭāpattiyo. Tathevāti vācāya vācāyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1078_7: Vadantassāti sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi upasampannaṃ sammukhā vadantassa. Vuttanayenevāti
tika-vin09t0:1078_8: vācāya vācāyeva. Okāsaṃ kāretvā upasampannaṃ sammukhā vadantassa vācāya vācāya pācittiyanti
tika-vin09t0:1078_9: āha “okāsaṃ kāretvā vadantassa pācittiyamevā”ti. Evasaddena dukkaṭaṃ nivattīyati.
tika-vin09t0:1078_10: Asammukhā sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi vadantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Sattavidhampi kammanti
tika-vin09t0:1078_11: tajjanīyaṃ, niyasaṃ, pabbājanīyaṃ, paṭisāraṇīyaṃ, tividhañca ukkhepanīyanti sattavidhampi kammaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1079_0: Uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapentassa ca okāsakammaṃ natthīti ettha uposathato pure
tika-vin09t0:1079_1: vā pacchā vā ṭhapitopi aṭṭhapito hoti. Khette ṭhapito pana ṭhapito hoti, tasmā “suṇātu
tika-vin09t0:1079_2: me, bhante, saṅgho, ajjuposatho pannaraso, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho uposathaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1079_3: kareyyā”ti ettha yāva re-kāraṃ bhaṇati, tāva ṭhapetabbo, idaṃ khettaṃ. Yya-kāre pana
tika-vin09t0:1079_4: vutte ṭhapentena pacchā ṭhapito nāma hoti. “Suṇātu me”ti anāraddhe ṭhapentena pure
tika-vin09t0:1079_5: ṭhapito hoti. Pavāraṇāṭṭhapanaṃ pana sabbasaṅgāhikaṃ, puggalikañcāti duvidhaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:1079_6: sabbasaṅgāhike “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho…pe… saṅgho tevācikaṃ pavāreyyā”ti su-kārato
tika-vin09t0:1079_7: yāva re-kāro, tāva apariyositāva hoti pavāraṇā, etthantare ekapadepi ṭhapentena ṭhapitā
tika-vin09t0:1079_8: hoti pavāraṇā. Yya-kāre pana patte pariyositāva hoti, tasmā tato paṭṭhāya ṭhapentena
tika-vin09t0:1079_9: aṭṭhapitā hoti. Puggalikaṭṭhapane pana “saṅghaṃ, bhante, pavāremi…pe… tatiyampi bhante
tika-vin09t0:1079_10: saṅghaṃ pavāremi diṭṭhena vā…pe… passanto paṭī”ti saṃ-kārato yāva ayaṃ sabbapacchimo
tika-vin09t0:1079_11: ṭi-kāro, tāva apariyositāva hoti pavāraṇā, etthantare ekapadepi ṭhapentena ṭhapitā
tika-vin09t0:1079_12: hoti pavāraṇā. “Karissāmī”ti vutte pana pariyositā hoti, tasmā “karissāmī”ti etasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1079_13: pade sampatte ṭhapitāpi aṭṭhapitā hoti. Eseva nayo dvevācikaekavācikasamānavassikāsu.
tika-vin09t0:1079_14: Etāsupi hi ṭi-kārāvasānaṃyeva ṭhapanakkhettanti. Tenāha “ṭhapanakkhettaṃ pana jānitabba”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1079_15: Osaṭe vatthusminti codakena attanā vattabbe saṅghamajjhe udāhaṭe. Idañca idañca karotīti
tika-vin09t0:1079_16: pāṇātipātaṃ, adinnādānañca karoti, jātarūparajatañca paṭiggaṇhāti. Asuko ca asuko
tika-vin09t0:1079_17: ca assamaṇo, anupāsakoti akkosādhippāyena parammukhā vadantassa dukkaṭaṃ, sammukhā
tika-vin09t0:1079_18: vadantassa pana pācittiyameva. Tenāha “sace pana odissa niyametvā”tiādi. Saṅkhyupagamananti vohārūpagamanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1082_0: Aññabhāgassāti aññakoṭṭhāsassa, yaṃ codetukāmo, tassa jātiādito aññassa tiracchānajātiādikoṭṭhāsassāti
tika-vin09t0:1082_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Idanti napuṃsakaniddesena chagalakādiṃ niddisati, ayaṃ chagalakādikoti
tika-vin09t0:1082_2: attho, adhikaraṇasaddāpekkhāya vā napuṃsakaniddeso, idaṃ chagalakādisaṅkhātaṃ adhikaraṇanti
tika-vin09t0:1082_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Aññabhāgo vāti tiracchānajātiādibhedo añño koṭṭhāso vā. Assāti chagalakādikassa.
tika-vin09t0:1082_4: Aññabhāgiyaṃ chagalakādi. Ettha ca “aññabhāgasambandhi aññabhāgiya”nti paṭhamaviggahassa
tika-vin09t0:1082_5: attho, “aññabhāgavantaṃ aññabhāgiya”nti dutiyaviggahassa. Ṭhapetvā pana tiracchānajātiādikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1082_6: paramatthato visuṃ chagalakādike asatipi “paṭimāya sarīra”ntiādīsu viya abhedepi
tika-vin09t0:1082_7: bhedakappanāya pavattalokavohāravasena “aññabhāgassa idaṃ, aññabhāgo vā assa atthī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1082_8: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Adhikarīyati etthāti adhikaraṇaṃ. Tenāha “ādhāro veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1082_9: Ādharīyati asminti ādhāro, patiṭṭhānaṃ. Tenāha “vatthu adhiṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1083_0: Idāni “aññabhāgassa ida”ntiādinā saṅkhepena vuttamevatthaṃ kevalaṃ nayadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1083_1: aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ āgatameva gahetvā vibhajanto “yo hi so”tiādimāha. Tena nanu anāgate
tika-vin09t0:1083_2: evaṃ codentānaṃ pāpabhikkhūnaṃ lesokāsapidahanatthaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1083_3: na pana mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ. Tesañhi ādikammikattā anāpatti, tasmā sāmaññena attho
tika-vin09t0:1083_4: vibhajitabbo. Na pana “yo hi so aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ dabbo mallaputto”tiādinā visesenāti
tika-vin09t0:1083_5: edisī codanā anavakāsāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Hīti kāraṇatthe nipāto, yasmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1083_6: Aṭṭhuppattiyanti atthassa uppatti atthuppatti, atthuppattiyeva aṭṭhuppatti, tassaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1083_7: aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ, sikkhāpadassa nidāneti vuttaṃ hoti. Chagalakoti setachagalako. Soti
tika-vin09t0:1083_8: chagalako. Imassa pana “hotī”ti iminā sambandho. Aññassa…pe… chagalakabhāvassa cāti
tika-vin09t0:1083_9: “tiracchānajātiyā ceva chagalakabhāvassa cā”ti saṅkhātassa aññassa bhāgassa koṭṭhāsassa, pakkhassāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1084_0: Kutoyamañño, yato “aññassa bhāgassā”ti vuttanti āha “yvāyaṃ…pe… tato”ti. Tattha manussajāti
tika-vin09t0:1084_1: ceva bhikkhubhāvo cāti yo ayaṃ bhāgo koṭṭhāso pakkhoti sambandho, “manussajāti ceva
tika-vin09t0:1084_2: bhikkhubhāvo cā”ti saṅkhāto yo ayaṃ bhāgo koṭṭhāso pakkhoti attho. Tatoti “manussajāti
tika-vin09t0:1084_3: ceva bhikkhubhāvo cā”ti bhāgato. So vā aññabhāgoti yathāvuttatiracchānajātichagalakabhāvasaṅkhāto
tika-vin09t0:1084_4: so aññabhāgo vā. Assāti chagalakassa. Atthīti upalabbhati. Tasmāti yasmā aññabhāgassa
tika-vin09t0:1084_5: chagalako hoti, yasmā ca so vā aññabhāgo assa atthi, tasmā. Aññabhāgiyasaṅkhyaṃ labhatīti
tika-vin09t0:1084_6: ettha “so yvāya”nti idha so-saddameva ānetvā so aññabhāgiyasaṅkhaṃ labhatīti yojetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1084_7: “so”ti vā pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo. Ca-saddo samuccayattho. So pana adhikaraṇasaddato
tika-vin09t0:1084_8: paraṃ daṭṭhabbo, “adhikaraṇa”nti ca veditabboti. Tesanti mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ. Imaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1084_9: mayaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karomāti chagalakaṃ ajikāya vippaṭipajjantaṃ disvā
tika-vin09t0:1084_10: “mayaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ chagalakaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karomā”ti vadantānaṃ. Nāmakaraṇasaññāyāti
tika-vin09t0:1084_11: nāmakaraṇasaṅkhātāya saññāya. Etthāpi “yo so”tiādikaṃ ānetvā tassā nāmakaraṇasaññāya
tika-vin09t0:1084_12: yo so aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ “dabbo mallaputto nāmā”ti chagalako vutto, so yasmā ādhāro vatthu
tika-vin09t0:1085_0: Idāni kathametaṃ viññāyati “adhikaraṇa”nti cettha ādhāro veditabbo, na vivādādhikaraṇādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1085_1: aññataranti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “tañhi sandhāyā”tiādi. Tattha tanti tassā nāmakaraṇasaññāya
tika-vin09t0:1085_2: adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ chagalakaṃ paccāmasati. Vivādādhikaraṇādīsu aññataraṃ sandhāya na
tika-vin09t0:1085_3: vuttanti sambandho. Tattha kāraṇaṃ pucchati “kasmā”ti. Kāraṇamāha “asambhavato”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1085_4: Idāni tameva asambhavaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na hi upādiyiṃsūti
tika-vin09t0:1085_5: sambandho. Upādiyiṃsūti gaṇhiṃsu. Kiṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānampi leso atthi, yenevaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1085_6: vuttanti āha “na ca catunnaṃ adhikaraṇāna”ntiādi. Idāni tameva samatthetuṃ “jātilesādayo
tika-vin09t0:1085_7: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha jātiyeva leso jātileso. Ādisaddena nāmalesādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Hoti cettha –
tika-vin09t0:1088_0: Āpattileso nāma lahukaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjanto diṭṭho hoti. Tañce pārājikena codeti “assamaṇosi,
tika-vin09t0:1088_1: asakyaputtiyosī”ti, āpatti vācāya vācāya saṅghādisesassāti evaṃ āpattilesampi puggalasmiṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:1088_2: āropetvā vuttattā “puggalānaṃyeva lesā vuttā”ti vuttaṃ. Tañca “dabbo mallaputto”ti
tika-vin09t0:1088_3: nāmanti mettiyabhūmajakehi chagalakassa kataṃ taṃ “dabbo mallaputto”ti nāmañca. Evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1088_4: asambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni imināva pasaṅgena desalesasaddānaṃ atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “ettha
tika-vin09t0:1088_5: cā”tiādimāha. Etthāti etesu dvīsu desalesesu. Deso nāma jātiādibhedo vohāro. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1088_6: “jātiādīsū”tiādi. Aññampi vatthunti yasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ, taṃ muñcitvā aññampi
tika-vin09t0:1088_7: vatthuṃ. Kathaṃ silissatīti āha “vohāramattenevā”tiādi, vohāramatteneva, na tu atthatoti
tika-vin09t0:1088_8: adhippāyo. “Īsakaṃ allīyatī”ti iminā “leso”ti lisa allībhāveti imassa rūpanti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1088_9: Kiñcāpi desalesānaṃ vuttanayena byañjanato nānākaraṇaṃ atthi, atthato pana natthīti
tika-vin09t0:1089_0: Yadi pana nāmakaraṇasaññāya ādhārabhūtaṃ chagalakaṃ sandhāya “aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1089_1: vuttaṃ, atha kasmā padabhājane taṃ avibhajitvā “aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassāti āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1089_2: vā hoti adhikaraṇaññabhāgiyaṃ vā”tiādi vuttanti āha “padabhājane panā”tiādi. Tanti
tika-vin09t0:1089_3: ādhārasaṅkhātaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ. Āvibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Atthuddhāravasenāti tena vattabbaatthānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1089_4: uddharaṇavasena. Nanu ca “atthamattaṃ pati saddā abhinivisantī”ti na ekena saddena
tika-vin09t0:1089_5: anekatthā abhidhīyantīti? Saccametaṃ saddavisese apekkhite, tesaṃ tesaṃ pana atthānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1089_6: adhikaraṇasaddavacanīyatāsāmaññaṃ upādāya vuccamāno ayaṃ vicāro adhikaraṇasaddassa
tika-vin09t0:1089_7: atthuddhāroti vutto. Tenevāha “adhikaraṇanti vacanasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena pavattāni
tika-vin09t0:1089_8: cattāri adhikaraṇānī”ti. Aññabhāgiyatāti aññapakkhiyatā. Tabbhāgiyatāti tappakkhiyatā.
tika-vin09t0:1089_9: Apākaṭā padabhājanato aññatra dassitaṭṭhānābhāvato. Avasāne āpattaññabhāgiyena codanañcāti
tika-vin09t0:1089_10: “bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, saṅghādisese saṅghādisesadiṭṭhi
tika-vin09t0:1089_11: hoti, tañce pārājikena codetī”tiādicodanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “adhikaraṇaññabhāgiya”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1089_12: Ekamekañhi adhikaraṇaṃ itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ aññapakkhiyaṃ aññakoṭṭhāsiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1089_13: hoti vatthuvisabhāgattā. Ādisaddena “kathaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ adhikaraṇassa aññabhāgiya”ntiādiko
tika-vin09t0:1090_0: Kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāyāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, tassāpi asambhavadassanappasaṅgena
tika-vin09t0:1090_1: heṭṭhā vuttattā “sesā vinicchayakathā aṭṭhame vuttasadisāyevā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha sesā
tika-vin09t0:1090_3: vinicchayakathā. Vuttasadisāyevāti ettha imasmiṃ sikkhāpade yā vattabbā, tena sikkhāpadena
tika-vin09t0:1090_4: sādhāraṇabhūtā sā vuttasadisāyevāti adhippetā, na asādhāraṇabhūtā apubbavaṇṇanāya
tika-vin09t0:1090_5: adhippetattā. Tenevāha “ayaṃ panā”tiādi. Purimasmiṃ sikkhāpadepi tathāsaññino anāpattikattā
tika-vin09t0:1090_6: “idha cā”ti vuttaṃ. Tathāsaññinopīti “pārājikaṃyeva ayaṃ āpanno”ti evaṃsaññinopi.
tika-vin09t0:1090_7: Itisaddo ādiattho vā pakārattho vā. Tena kenaci bhikkhunā añño koci khattiyajātiko
tika-vin09t0:1090_8: pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, atha so aññaṃ attano veriṃ khattiyajātikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1090_9: bhikkhuṃ passitvā taṃ khattiyajātilesaṃ gahetvā evaṃ codeti “khattiyo mayā diṭṭho
tika-vin09t0:1090_10: pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto, tvaṃ khattiyo pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi, atha
tika-vin09t0:1090_11: vā tvaṃ kho khattiyo, na añño, pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannosi, assamaṇosi, asakyaputtiyosi,
tika-vin09t0:1090_12: natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti, āpatti vācāya vācāya
tika-vin09t0:1090_13: saṅghādisesassa. Ettha ca tesaṃ khattiyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ asadisassa tassa tassa dīghādino
tika-vin09t0:1090_14: vā diṭṭhādino vā vasena aññabhāgiyatā, khattiyajātipaññattiyā ādhāravasena adhikaraṇatā
tika-vin09t0:1091_0: Āpattilese pana kenaci bhikkhunā koci bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjanto diṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1091_1: so cetaṃ bhikkhuṃ pārājikena codeti, āpatti vācāya vācāya saṅghādisesassa. Yadi evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1091_2: kathaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hotīti? Yañhi so lahukaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno, taṃ pārājikassa
tika-vin09t0:1091_3: aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ, tassa pana aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa leso nāma. Yo so
tika-vin09t0:1091_4: sabbakhattiyānaṃ sādhāraṇo khattiyabhāvo viya sabbāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇo āpattibhāvo.
tika-vin09t0:1091_5: Eteneva upāyena “kenaci bhikkhunā koci bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho
tika-vin09t0:1096_0: Sahitassāti kāyacittehi ekībhūtassa. Tenāha “cittena ca sarīrena ca aviyuttassāti
tika-vin09t0:1096_1: attho”ti. Assāti “samaggassā”ti padassa. Samānasaṃvāsakoti samāno ekūposathādibhedo
tika-vin09t0:1096_2: saṃvāso assāti samānasaṃvāsako, laddhinānāsaṃvāsakena vā kammanānāsaṃvāsakena vā
tika-vin09t0:1096_3: virahito. Kāyasāmaggidānatoti kāyena, kāyassa vā sāmaggiyā sahitabhāvassa dānato,
tika-vin09t0:1096_4: tesu tesu saṅghakammesu hatthapāsūpagamanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ bhijjeyyāti
tika-vin09t0:1096_5: ayaṃ saṅgho kena nu kho upāyena vaggo bhaveyya. Vāyāmeyyāti ussāhaṃ kareyya, pakkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1096_6: pariyeseyya, gaṇaṃ bandheyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Attano phalaṃ karotīti karaṇaṃ, yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin09t0:1096_7: kāraṇaṃ, adhikaṃ karaṇanti adhikaraṇaṃ, visesakāraṇaṃ, visesakāraṇañca saṅghabhedassāti
tika-vin09t0:1097_0: “Idhupāli bhikkhū adhammaṃ ‘dhammo’ti dīpenti, dhammaṃ ‘adhammo’ti dīpenti. Avinayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1097_1: ‘vinayo’ti dīpenti, vinayaṃ ‘avinayo’ti dīpenti. Abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘bhāsitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1097_2: lapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpenti, bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1097_3: tathāgatenā’ti dīpenti. Anāciṇṇaṃ tathāgatena ‘āciṇṇaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpenti, āciṇṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1097_5: tathāgatenā’ti dīpenti, paññattaṃ tathāgatena ‘apaññattaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpenti.
tika-vin09t0:1097_6: Anāpattiṃ ‘āpattī’ti dīpenti, āpattiṃ ‘anāpattī’ti dīpenti. Lahukaṃ āpattiṃ ‘garukā
tika-vin09t0:1097_7: āpattī’ti dīpenti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ ‘lahukā āpattī’ti dīpenti. Sāvasesaṃ āpattiṃ ‘anavasesā
tika-vin09t0:1097_8: āpattī’ti dīpenti, anavasesaṃ āpattiṃ ‘sāvasesā āpattī’ti dīpenti. Duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1097_9: ‘aduṭṭhullā āpattī’ti dīpenti, aduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ ‘duṭṭhullā āpattī’ti dīpentī”ti –
tika-vin09t0:1098: Evaṃ kammakkhandhake vuttānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ bhedakaraṇānaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ. Kāraṇañhi tadāyattavuttitāya phalaṃ ettha vasatīti “vatthū”ti vuccati. Honti cettha –
tika-vin09t0:1103_0: Paggayhāti paggahitaṃ abbhussitaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā. Tiṭṭheyyāti yathāsamādinnaṃ, yathāpaggahitameva
tika-vin09t0:1103_1: ca katvā accheyya. Yasmā pana evaṃ paggaṇhatā, tiṭṭhatā ca taṃ dīpitañceva avinissaṭṭhañca
tika-vin09t0:1103_2: hoti, tasmā “dīpeyya ceva nappaṭinissajjeyya cā”ti vuttaṃ. Kīva dūre sutvā gantvā
tika-vin09t0:1103_3: avadantānaṃ dukkaṭanti āha “sabbantimena paricchedenā”tiādi. Pi-saddo cettha aṭṭhānappayutto,
tika-vin09t0:1103_5: iminā ekavihāre vattabbameva natthīti dīpeti. “Gantvā”ti iminā dūtaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:1103_6: pesetvā vadatopi āpattimokkho natthi, sayameva pana gantvā “garuko kho, āvuso, saṅghabhedo,
tika-vin09t0:1104_0: Samāgacchatūti ekībhavatu. Ekībhāvo ca samānaladdhivasena hotīti āha “ekaladdhiko
tika-vin09t0:1104_1: hotū”ti. Ekā laddhi gahaṇaṃ assāti ekaladdhiko, ekadiṭṭhikoti attho. Aññamaññasampattiyāti
tika-vin09t0:1104_3: sampattiyā”ti keci. Asamaggo hi visuṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisati, bahisīmāyaṃ vā anupariveṇiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1104_4: vāti na ekuddeso. Tenāha “ekato pavattapātimokkhuddesoti attho”ti. Appaṭinissajjato
tika-vin09t0:1104_5: dukkaṭanti visuṃ visuṃ vadantānaṃ gaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ. Samanubhāsanakammaṃ kātabbanti
tika-vin09t0:1104_6: yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanakammaṃ kātabbaṃ, “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo
tika-vin09t0:1104_7: bhikkhu samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkamatī”tiādinā padabhājane vuttāhi ñatticatutthāhi
tika-vin09t0:1104_8: tīhi samanubhāsanakammavācāhi kammaṃ kātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. “Bhedāya parakkameyyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1104_9: visuṃ vuttattā bhedanasaṃvattanikassa adhikaraṇassa samādāya paggaṇhanato pubbepi
tika-vin09t0:1104_11: veditabbaṃ. Paṭinissajjantassa anāpattibhāvato “sotthibhāvo tassa bhikkhuno”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1105_0: Kiñcāpi bhikkhunī saṅghaṃ na bhindati, apica kho bhedāya parakkamatīti “sādhāraṇapaññattī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1105_1: vuttaṃ. Saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjantassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā
tika-vin09t0:1105_2: ca paṭippassambhantīti āha “samanubhāsanakamme”tiādi. Tañca dukkaṭaṃ te ca thullaccayā
tika-vin09t0:1105_3: paṭippassambhantīti yañca ñattipariyosāne dukkaṭaṃ āpanno, ye ca dvīhi kammavācāhi
tika-vin09t0:1105_4: thullaccaye, tā tissopi āpattiyo liṅgaparivattena asādhāraṇāpattiyo viya paṭippassambhanti.
tika-vin09t0:1105_5: Sace panassa ñattipariyosāne lajjidhammo okkamati, saṃvaro uppajjati, taṃ paṭinissajjati,
tika-vin09t0:1105_6: ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ desetvā muccati. Atha taṃ na paṭinissajjati, bhedāya parakkamati
tika-vin09t0:1105_7: ceva bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭhati ca, ñattidukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1105_8: paṭippassambhati, paṭhamakammavācāya thullaccaye patiṭṭhāti. Esa nayo itarakammavācāyampi.
tika-vin09t0:1105_10: ñattito pubbe vā ñattikkhaṇe vā ñattipariyosāne vā paṭhamāya vā anussāvanāya dutiyāya
tika-vin09t0:1105_11: vā tatiyāya vā yāva yya-kāraṃ na sampāpuṇāti, tāva paṭinissajjantassa saṅghādisesena
tika-vin09t0:1106_0: Ettha pana “devadatto samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, tasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti
tika-vin09t0:1106_1: parivāre āgatattā devadatto ādikammiko, so ca kho saṅghabhedāya parakkamanasseva,
tika-vin09t0:1106_2: na appaṭinissajjanassa. Na hi tassa taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ. Kathamidaṃ jānitabbanti ce?
tika-vin09t0:1106_3: Suttato. Tathā hi “ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1106_4: samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajji, tasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti parivāre āgatattā ariṭṭhassa
tika-vin09t0:1106_5: kammaṃ katanti paññāyati, na tathā devadattassa. Athāpissa katena bhavitabbanti koci
tika-vin09t0:1106_6: attano rucimattena vadeyya, tathāpi appaṭinissajjane ādikammikassa anāpatti nāma
tika-vin09t0:1106_7: natthi. Na hi paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamantassa aññatra odissa anuññātato anāpatti
tika-vin09t0:1106_8: nāma dissati. Yampi ariṭṭhasikkhāpadassa padabhājane anāpattiyaṃ “ādikammikassā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1106_9: potthakesu likhitaṃ, taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ, pamādalikhitabhāvo ca tassa “paṭhamaṃ ariṭṭho
tika-vin09t0:1106_10: bhikkhu codetabbo, codetvā sāretabbo, sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetabbo”ti evaṃ kammakkhandhake
tika-vin09t0:1107_0: Idha bhedāya parakkamane ādikammikassa devadattassa yasmā taṃ kammaṃ na kataṃ, tasmāssa
tika-vin09t0:1107_1: āpattiyeva na jātā. Sikkhāpadaṃ pana taṃ ārabbha paññattanti katvā “ādikammiko”ti
tika-vin09t0:1107_2: vutto. Iti āpattiyā abhāvatoyevassa anāpatti vuttā. Sā panesā kiñcāpi “asamanubhāsiyamānassā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1107_3: imināva siddhā. Yasmā pana asamanubhāsiyamāno nāma yassa kevalaṃ samanubhāsanaṃ na
tika-vin09t0:1107_4: karonti, so vuccati, na ādikammiko. Ayañca devadatto ādikammikoyeva. Tasmā “ādikammikassā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1107_5: vuttaṃ. Eteneva upāyena ṭhapetvā ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ sabbasamanubhāsanāsu vinicchayo
tika-vin09t0:1107_7: kāyavikāraṃ vā vacībhedaṃ vā akarontasseva pana āpajjanato akiriyaṃ. “Nappaṭinissajjāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1107_8: saññāya abhāvena muccanato saññāvimokkhaṃ. “Nappaṭinissajjāmī”ti jānanacitteneva sacittakaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1110_0: Tassevāti bhedāya parakkamantasseva. Khoti nipātamattaṃ. Panāti visese nipāto. Yaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1110_1: vacanaṃ samaggepi vagge avayavabhūte karoti bhindati, taṃ kalahakārakavacanaṃ idha
tika-vin09t0:1110_3: bhavā asāmaggipakkhiyā, kalahakārakā, tesaṃ vacanaṃ asāmaggipakkhiyavacanaṃ, asāmaggipakkhe
tika-vin09t0:1110_4: vā bhavaṃ vacanaṃ asāmaggipakkhiyavacanaṃ. “Na hi saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ karotī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1110_5: idaṃ niggahavasena kattabbaṃ kammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, ubbāhikādikammaṃ pana bahūnampi
tika-vin09t0:1110_6: kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Dhammavādīti bhūtavādī. Vinayavādīti vūpasamavādī. Jānāti noti
tika-vin09t0:1110_7: etthāpi “chandañca ruciñcā”ti idaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Tenāha “amhākaṃ chandādīni
tika-vin09t0:1110_8: jānātī”ti. Bhāsatīti ettha “no”ti idaṃ vibhattivipariṇāmena yujjati. Tenāha “evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1110_9: karomāti amhehi saddhiṃ bhāsatī”ti. “Eta”nti iminā tassa kammaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti āha
tika-vin09t0:1110_10: “yaṃ so karotī”tiādi. Soti saṅghabhedāya parakkamanto. Sametāyasmantānanti ettha
tika-vin09t0:1110_12: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā aññabhāgiyasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāya vaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.
tika-vin09t0:1113_0: Dukkhena vattabbo anusāsituṃ asakkuṇeyyo sabhāvo assāti dubbacajātiko, vilomabhāvī.
tika-vin09t0:1113_1: Tenāha “dubbacasabhāvo”tiādi. Vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti kismiñci vuccamāne asahanato ovadituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1113_2: asakkuṇeyyo. Uddisīyatīti uddeso, pātimokkho, tasmiṃ pariyāpannā antogadhā uddesapariyāpannā,
tika-vin09t0:1113_3: tesu uddesapariyāpannesu. Tenāha “uddese”tiādi. Atha sabbāneva sikkhāpadāni kathaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1113_4: pātimokkhuddesapariyāpannānīti āha “yassa siyā āpatti, so ‘āvikareyyā’ti evaṃ saṅgahitattā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1113_5: “Yassa siyā āpattī”ti iminā sabbāpi āpattiyo nidānuddese saṅgahitā eva honti. Sikkhāpadesūti
tika-vin09t0:1113_6: adhisīlasikkhāya adhigamūpāyabhūtesu vinayapaññattīsūti attho. So pana pākaṭoyevāti
tika-vin09t0:1113_8: Sikkhitabbattāti labbhamānavasena sikkhitabbattā. Tathā hi tehi yathāsakaṃ sikkhā
tika-vin09t0:1113_9: sikkhīyati, na sabbā. Buddhapaññattenāti buddhena ṭhapitena, vihitenāti attho. Atha
tika-vin09t0:1113_10: vā sahadhammikena sakāraṇena vuccamānoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Vacanāyāti nissakke
tika-vin09t0:1116_0: Nagarassāpi gāmavisesattā idha gāmaggahaṇeneva nagarampi gahitanti āha “nagarampi
tika-vin09t0:1116_1: gāme antogadhamevā”ti, vā-saddena vā anuttavikappatthena gahaṇanti evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha
tika-vin09t0:1116_2: ca apākāraparikkhepo sāpaṇo nigamo, sapākārāpaṇaṃ nagaraṃ, taṃtaṃviparīto gāmoti
tika-vin09t0:1116_3: imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ viseso daṭṭhabbo. Kulāni dūsetīti khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddavasena
tika-vin09t0:1116_4: cattāri kulāni vikāraṃ āpādeti. Dūsento ca na asucikaddamādīhi dūseti, atha kho attano
tika-vin09t0:1116_5: duppaṭipattiyā tesaṃ pasādaṃ vināseti. Tenāha “pupphadānādīhī”tiādi. Tattha haritvā
tika-vin09t0:1116_6: vā harāpetvā vā pakkositvā vā pakkosāpetvā vā sayaṃ vā upagatānaṃ yassa kassaci attano
tika-vin09t0:1116_7: santakassa pupphassa kulasaṅgahatthāya dānaṃ pupphadānaṃ, taṃ ādi yesaṃ te pupphadānādayo,
tika-vin09t0:1116_9: gahaṇaṃ. Saddhaṃ vināsentoti tathā akarontesu aññesu pesalesu bhikkhūsu appasādaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1116_10: adassanaṃ gamento. Pupphadānādīhi ca tehi katasaṅgahehi aññe pesale tathā akaronte
tika-vin09t0:1116_11: te manussā issanti na allīyantīti so tesaṃ pasādaṃ vināseti nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pāpakā
tika-vin09t0:1116_12: samācārāti buddhappaṭikuṭṭhattā lāmakā samācārā. Te pana yasmā kulasaṅgahatthaṃ mālāvaccharopanādayo
tika-vin09t0:1116_13: idha adhippetā, tasmā “mālāvaccharopanādayo”ti vuttaṃ. Ārāmādīnamatthāya pana kappiyavohārādīhi
tika-vin09t0:1116_14: ropāpanādikaṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha mālāvacchanti taruṇapuppharukkhaṃ. Taruṇakā hi puppharukkhāpi
tika-vin09t0:1116_15: pupphagacchāpi “mālāvacchā”tveva vuccanti, tassa ropanaṃ mālāvaccharopanaṃ, taṃ ādi
tika-vin09t0:1116_16: yesaṃ te mālāvaccharopanādayo. Ādisaddena cettha ropāpanasiñcanasiñcāpanaocinanaocināpanaganthanaganthāpanānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1117_0: Mātikāyaṃ dissantīti ye paccakkhato passanti, tehi dissanti. Suyyantīti ye parato
tika-vin09t0:1117_1: suṇanti, tehi sotadvārena sutvā upadhārīyanti. Duṭṭhānīti dūsitāni. Alaṃ te idha
tika-vin09t0:1117_2: vāsenāti tava idha vāsena alaṃ, mā idha tava vāso hotūti attho. Vāraṇattho hi idha
tika-vin09t0:1117_3: alaṃ-saddo. Pabbājanīyakammakatoti codetvā sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetvā “suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1117_4: saṅgho, ime assajipunabbasukā”tiādinā padabhājane vuttāya ñatticatutthakammavācāya
tika-vin09t0:1117_5: katapabbājanīyakammo. Yasmiñca vihāre vasatīti gāmato bahivihāramāha. Neva tasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1117_6: gāme…pe… carituṃ labhatīti sacepi gāmo vā nigamo vā dvādasayojanaparamo hoti, tiyojanaparamo
tika-vin09t0:1117_7: ca vihāro hoti, neva tasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā piṇḍāya carituṃ labhati, na vihāre
tika-vin09t0:1117_8: vasituṃ. Tasmiṃ vihāre vasantena sāmantagāmepi piṇḍāya na caritabbaṃ, sāmantavihārepi
tika-vin09t0:1117_9: vasantena tasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya na caritabbaṃ. Sāmantavihāre vasantena pana sāmantagāme
tika-vin09t0:1117_10: carituṃ vaṭṭati. Āpajjitabbā āpattiyoti kulasaṅgahatthaṃ attano santakadāne dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1117_11: issaravatāya saṅghasantakadāne thullaccayaṃ, pasayha dāne pārājikanti imā āpattiyo.
tika-vin09t0:1117_12: Mātikāyaṃ “pakkamatā yasmā”ti pabbājanīyakammakatassa vattavasena vuttaṃ. Ādimhi
tika-vin09t0:1117_13: pana pabbājanīyakammavasena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Assajipunabbasuketi assajiñceva punabbasukañca.
tika-vin09t0:1120_0: Paṭhamāpattikāti avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsatthoti āha “paṭhamaṃ āpatti etesanti
tika-vin09t0:1120_2: samanubhāsanakammakkhaṇaṃ paṭikkhipati. Ahassa yattako paricchedo yāvatīhaṃ. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1121_0: Vatthuvasena vāti asucimocanādivītikkamamattavasena vā. Idanti idaṃ vītikkamaṃ. Nāmamattavasena
tika-vin09t0:1121_1: vā ayaṃ itthannāmā āpattīti “ayaṃ saṅghādiseso nāma āpattī”ti evaṃ vinā vatthuṃ nāmavasena
tika-vin09t0:1121_2: vā. Mattasaddena cettha vatthuṃ paṭikkhipati. Potthakesu pana katthaci “nāmagottavasena
tika-vin09t0:1121_3: vā”ti likhanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ “ayaṃ itthannāmā āpattī”ti vuttattā. Idāni naṃ kassaci
tika-vin09t0:1121_4: na ārocessāmīti sambandho. Dhuraṃ nikkhipitvāti ārocane ussāhaṃ ṭhapetvā. Na kevalaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1121_5: vatthunāmavaseneva āpattisaññī hutvā chādentasseva, atha kho yopi evaṃ ajānanto kevalaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1121_6: “āpattiṃ chādemī”ti āpattisaññāya chādeti, tassapi channā hotīti veditabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin09t0:1121_7: panettha anāpattisaññī vā hoti, aññāpattikkhandhasaññī vā vematiko vā hutvā “na dāni
tika-vin09t0:1121_8: naṃ kassaci ārocessāmī”ti evaṃ chādetukāmova dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin09t0:1121_9: acchannāva hotīti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. Anāpatti pana āpattisaññāyapi anāpattisaññāyapi
tika-vin09t0:1121_10: chādentena acchāditāva hoti. Lahukaṃ vā “garukā”ti garukaṃ vā “lahukā”ti chādeti,
tika-vin09t0:1121_11: alajjipakkhe tiṭṭhati, āpatti pana acchannā hoti. Garukaṃ “lahukā”ti maññamāno deseti,
tika-vin09t0:1122_0: Pakato sabhāvabhūto attā assāti pakatatto, na kammehi vikatattoti attho. Tenāha “anukkhitto
tika-vin09t0:1122_1: samānasaṃvāsako”ti. Vuttanayenevāti “na dāni naṃ kassaci ārocessāmī”tiādinā vuttaneva
tika-vin09t0:1122_2: nayena. Atha “mayhaṃ saṅghena kammaṃ kata”nti apakatattasaññī hutvā chādeti, acchannāva
tika-vin09t0:1122_3: hoti. Apakatattena pana pakatattasaññinā vā pakatattena apakatattasaññinā vā chāditāpi
tika-vin09t0:1125: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjaṃ;
tika-vin09t0:1128_0: Dasasu antarāyesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Sace pana yo bhīrukajātikatāya
tika-vin09t0:1128_1: andhakāre amanussacaṇḍamigabhayena antarāyikasaññī hutvā chādeti, acchannāva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1128_2: Yassapi pabbatavihāre vasantassa kandaraṃ vā nadiṃ vā atikkamitvā ārocetabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1128_3: antarāmagge ca caṇḍavāḷaamanussādibhayaṃ atthi, magge ajagarā nipajjanti, nadī pūrā
tika-vin09t0:1128_4: hoti, etasmiṃ satiyeva antarāye antarāyikasaññī hutvā chādeti, acchannāva hoti. Antarāyikassa
tika-vin09t0:1128_5: pana antarāyikasaññāya vā anantarāyikasaññāya vā chādayato acchannāva.
tika-vin09t0:1129_0: Bhikkhunoti sabhāgassa bhikkhuno. Sacassa mukhe appamattako gaṇḍo vā hoti, hanukavāto
tika-vin09t0:1129_1: vā vijjhati, danto vā rujjati, bhikkhā vā mandā laddhā hoti, tāvatakena pana neva
tika-vin09t0:1129_2: vattuṃ na sakkoti, na gantuṃ. Apica kho “na sakkomī”ti saññī hoti, ayaṃ pahu hutvā
tika-vin09t0:1129_3: appahusaññī nāma. Iminā chāditāpi acchāditā. Appahunā pana vattuṃ vā gantuṃ vā asamatthena
tika-vin09t0:1129_4: pahusaññinā vā appahusaññinā vā chāditāpi acchāditāva.
tika-vin09t0:1130_0: Idaṃ uttānamevāti idaṃ aṅgadvayaṃ uttānatthameva. Sace pana “chādessāmī”ti dhuranikkhepaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1130_1: katvā purebhatte vā pacchābhatte vā paṭhamayāmādīsu vā lajjidhammaṃ okkamati, antoaruṇeyeva
tika-vin09t0:1130_2: āroceti, ayaṃ chādetukāmo na chādeti nāma.
tika-vin09t0:1131_0: Yassa pana abhikkhuke ṭhāne vasantassa āpattiṃ āpajjitvā sabhāgassa bhikkhuno āgamanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1131_1: āgamentassa vā, sabhāgassa santikaṃ vā gacchantassa aḍḍhamāsopi māsopi atikkamati,
tika-vin09t0:1131_2: ayaṃ nacchādetukāmo chādeti nāma. Ayampi acchannāva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1132_0: Yo pana āpannamattova aggiṃ akkantapuriso viya sahasā apakkamitvā sabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1132_1: gantvā āvi karoti, ayaṃ nacchādetukāmova na chādeti nāma. Sabhāgamattameva pamāṇanti
tika-vin09t0:1132_2: averisabhāgamattameva pamāṇaṃ. Averisabhāgassa hi santike ārocetabbaṃ. Yo pana visabhāgo
tika-vin09t0:1132_3: hoti sutvā pakāsetukāmo, evarūpassa upajjhāyassapi santike na ārocetabbā. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:1132_4: purebhattaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hotu, pacchābhattaṃ vā divā vā rattiṃ vā, yāva aruṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1132_5: na uggacchati, tāva ārocetabbaṃ. Uddhaste aruṇe paṭicchannā hoti, paṭicchādanapaccayā
tika-vin09t0:1132_6: ca dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Saṅkhepatoti samāsato. Vitthārato pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1133_0: Akāmā parivatthabbanti appaṭikammakatāya āpattiyā saggamokkhāvaraṇabhāvato anicchantenāpi
tika-vin09t0:1133_1: parivasitabbanti attho. Tenāha “na kāmenā”tiādi. Parivāsaṃ samādāyāti parivāsavattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1133_2: saṅghamajjhe samādiyitvā. Yadipi catubbidho parivāso appaṭicchannaparivāso, paṭicchannaparivāso,
tika-vin09t0:1133_3: suddhantaparivāso, samodhānaparivāsoti, tathāpi appaṭicchannaparivāso idha na adhippetoti
tika-vin09t0:1133_4: āha “tattha paṭicchanna…pe… tividho parivāso”ti. Tatthāti tasmiṃ vākye. Paṭicchannāya
tika-vin09t0:1133_5: āpattiyā sati dātabbo parivāso paṭicchannavisayatāya paṭicchannaparivāso. Suddhantato
tika-vin09t0:1133_6: paṭṭhāya dātabbo parivāso suddhantaparivāso. Samodahitvā dātabbo parivāso samodhānaparivāso.
tika-vin09t0:1134_0: Idāni te tividheyeva parivāse sarūpato dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha. Hīti yasmā. Ekāhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1134_1: paṭicchannā ekāhappaṭicchannā. Vuttanayenāti “āpatti ca hotī”tiādinā vuttena nayena.
tika-vin09t0:1134_2: Ekāhappaṭicchannanti ettha itisaddo “iti vā, iti evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1134_3: viya ādiattho. Tena “sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavisaṭṭhiyā
tika-vin09t0:1134_4: ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācāmī”ti imaṃ pāḷisesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Evaṃ parivāsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1134_5: yācāpetvāti evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā. Khandhake āgatanayenāti samuccayakkhandhake
tika-vin09t0:1134_6: āgatanayena. Tatoti pakkhato paṭṭhāya. Atirekapakkhappaṭicchannanti pakkhassa atireko
tika-vin09t0:1134_7: atirekapakkho, taṃ paṭicchannanti attho. Tatoti tiṃsatimadivasato paṭṭhāya. Māsappaṭicchannanti
tika-vin09t0:1134_8: sattānaṃ āyuṃ minanto viya siyati antaṃ karotīti māso, tiṃsarattindivo, taṃ paṭicchannanti
tika-vin09t0:1134_9: attho. Saṃvacchare puṇṇeti taṃ taṃ sattaṃ, dhammappavattiñca saṅgamma vadanto viya
tika-vin09t0:1134_10: sarati pavattatīti saṃvaccharo, dvādasa māsā, tasmiṃ paripuṇṇe.
tika-vin09t0:1135_0: Vatthukittanavasena vāti nāmena saha vatthukittanavasena vāti attho. Teneva hi upari
tika-vin09t0:1135_1: “nāmamattavasena vā”ti mattaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nāmamattavasenāti vatthukittanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1135_2: vinā kevalaṃ nāmasseva vasena. Tasmāti yasmā duvidhe nāme “āpattī”ti sabbasādhāraṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1135_3: nāmaṃ, tasmā. Sukkavissaṭṭhīti sukkavissaṭṭhi nāmāyaṃ. Itisaddo hettha vacanīyatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1135_5: icchitabbattā. Vatthu ceva gottañcāti vītikkamattā vatthu ceva anaññasādhāraṇattā
tika-vin09t0:1135_6: gottañca. Gaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ, sajātito aññattha kāyasaṃsaggādīsu gantuṃ adatvā buddhiṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1135_7: vacanañca rakkhatīti attho. Saṅghādisesoti saṅghādiseso nāmāyaṃ. Ettha pana itisaddo
tika-vin09t0:1135_8: vacanavacanīyasamudāyaṃ nidasseti. Tenāha “nāmañceva āpatti cā”ti, sajātisādhāraṇanāmattā
tika-vin09t0:1135_9: nāmañceva tena tena vītikkamenāpajjitabbattā āpatti cāti attho. Idampi nidassanamattameva
tika-vin09t0:1135_10: “āpattiyo”ti imassāpi nāmādibhāvena icchitabbattā. Itisaddo vā ādiattho. Evañca katvā
tika-vin09t0:1136_0: Tayidaṃ kammavācāya kena vacanena gahitanti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1136_1: “Āpattī”ti sabbasādhāraṇanāmattā, vītikkamena āpajjitabbattā ca nāmañceva āpatti
