tika-vin09t0:1136_2: ca hotīti āha “āpattiyoti vacanenāpī”ti. Tasmāti yasmā idaṃ parivāsādivinayakammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1136_3: vatthuvasena, gottavasena, nāmavasena, āpattivasena ca kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva, tasmā.
tika-vin09t0:1136_4: Etesūti vatthuādīsu, sukkavissaṭṭhiādīsu vā. Vattaṃ samādātabbanti yathāvuttesu dvīsu
tika-vin09t0:1136_5: padesu ekenapi samādātabbaṃ. Dvīhi pana susamādinnaṃyeva. Teneva vakkhati “samādānepi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1138_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1138_1: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya
tika-vin09t0:1138_2: ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā
tika-vin09t0:1138_3: ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ parivasāmi, vedayāmahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1139_0: Evamādinā taṃ taṃ yojanānurūpaṃ ārocetvā. Imañca panatthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci bhāsāya
tika-vin09t0:1139_1: ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. “Puna āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocentenā”ti idaṃ āgantukaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1139_2: bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ettha ca ekassa ārocentena avasāne “vedayatīti maṃ āyasmā
tika-vin09t0:1139_3: dhāretu”, dvinnaṃ “āyasmantā dhārentu”, tiṇṇaṃ “āyasmanto dhārentū”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1139_4: Vattabhedañca ratticchedañca akatvāti “na, bhikkhave, pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sāditabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1139_5: pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccupaṭṭhāna”ntiādinā pārivāsikakkhandhake yāni
tika-vin09t0:1139_6: catunavuti vattāni vuttāni, tesaṃ bhedañca, yo ca “tayo kho, upāli, pārivāsikassa
tika-vin09t0:1139_7: bhikkhuno ratticchedā sahavāso vippavāso anārocanā”ti ratticchedo vutto, tañca akatvā.
tika-vin09t0:1140_0: Ayaṃ hettha vinicchayo – sace āgantukā muhuttaṃ vissamitvā vā avissamitvā eva vā
tika-vin09t0:1140_1: vihāramajjhena gacchanti, tesampi ārocetabbaṃ. Sace tassa ajānantasseva gacchanti,
tika-vin09t0:1140_2: ayañca gatakāle jānāti, gantvā ārocetabbaṃ. Sampāpuṇituṃ asakkontassa ratticchedova
tika-vin09t0:1140_3: hoti, na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ. Yepi antovihāraṃ appavisitvā upacārasīmaṃ okkamitvā
tika-vin09t0:1140_4: gacchanti, ayañca nesaṃ chattasaddaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddaṃ vā khipitasaddaṃ vā sutvāva
tika-vin09t0:1140_5: āgantukabhāvaṃ jānāti, gantvā ārocetabbaṃ. Gatakāle jānantenāpi anubandhitvā ārocetabbameva.
tika-vin09t0:1140_6: Sampāpuṇituṃ asakkontassa ratticchedova hoti, na vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ. Yopi rattiṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:1140_7: āgantvā rattiṃyeva gacchati, sopissa ratticchedaṃ karoti. Aññātattā pana vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1140_8: natthi. Sace ajānitvāva abbhānaṃ karoti, akatameva hotīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā
tika-vin09t0:1140_9: adhikā rattiyo gahetvā kātabbaṃ. Ayaṃ apaṇṇakappaṭipadā.
tika-vin09t0:1141_0: Nadiādīsu nāvāya gacchantampi paratīre ṭhitampi ākāse gacchantampi pabbatatalaaraññādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1141_1: dūre ṭhitampi bhikkhuṃ disvā sace “bhikkhū”ti vavatthānaṃ atthi, nāvādīhi vā gantvā,
tika-vin09t0:1141_2: mahāsaddaṃ katvā vā vegena anubandhitvā vā ārocetabbaṃ, anārocentassa ratticchedo
tika-vin09t0:1141_3: ceva vattabhedadukkaṭañca. Sace vāyamantopi sampāpuṇituṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
tika-vin09t0:1142_0: Aññaṃ kañci vihāraṃ gatenapi bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbameva. Sace sabbe ekaṭṭhāne ṭhite
tika-vin09t0:1142_1: passati, ekaṭṭhāne ṭhiteneva ārocetabbaṃ. Atha rukkhamūlādīsu visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitā honti,
tika-vin09t0:1142_2: tattha tattha gantvā ārocetabbaṃ. Sañcicca anārocentassa ratticchedo ca hoti, vattabhede
tika-vin09t0:1142_3: ca dukkaṭaṃ. Atha vicinanto ekacce na passati, ratticchedova hoti, na ca vattabhedadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1142_4: Sañcicca anārocentassa pana ratticchedo ceva hoti, vattabhede ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1143_0: Tatthevāti māḷakasīmāyameva. Māḷakato pana bhikkhūsu nikkhantesu ekassapi santike
tika-vin09t0:1143_1: nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati. Māḷakato nikkhamitvā satiṃ paṭilabhantena saha gacchantassa
tika-vin09t0:1143_2: santike nikkhipitabbaṃ. Tenāha “ekapuggalassa vā santike”ti. Sace sopi pakkanto,
tika-vin09t0:1143_3: aññassa yassa māḷake nārocitaṃ, tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Pakatattaṭṭhāneti
tika-vin09t0:1143_4: saṅghakammānaṃ arahaṭṭhāne. Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāti bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyanasaddasavanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1143_5: vuttaṃ. Mahāmaggato okkammāti maggappaṭipannabhikkhūnaṃ upacāravijahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1143_6: Gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāneti dassanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Vattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1143_7: samādiyitvā ārocetabbanti vuttanayeneva vattaṃ samādiyitvā parivāso ārocetabbo. “Ārocetabba”nti
tika-vin09t0:1143_8: pana sāmaññena vuttaṃ. Ārocentena ca sace navakataro hoti, “āvuso”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin09t0:1143_9: vuḍḍhataro, “bhante”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace añño koci bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ
tika-vin09t0:1143_10: ṭhānaṃ āgacchati. Sace esa naṃ passati, saddaṃ vā tassa suṇāti, ārocetabbaṃ. Anārocentassa
tika-vin09t0:1143_11: ratticchedo ceva vattabhedo ca. Tenāha “yampi aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati, tassāpi ārocetabbamevā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1143_12: Atha dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva gacchati, ratticchedo hotiyeva,
tika-vin09t0:1143_13: vattabhedo pana natthi. Uṭṭhiteti uggate. Yaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ bhikkhunti vihārato nikkhamantaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1143_14: vā āgantukaṃ vā sabbapaṭhamaṃ yaṃ aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati. Tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbanti
tika-vin09t0:1143_15: anārocentassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na tu ratticchedaṃ sandhāya. Itarathā
tika-vin09t0:1143_16: hi “vihārasīmāpariyāpannānaṃ sabbesaṃ ārocetvā”ti vadeyya. Yāva rattiyo pūrentīti
tika-vin09t0:1143_17: yattakā rattiyo āpatti paṭicchannā hoti, tattakā rattiyo yāva pūrenti, tāva parivatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1143_18: Samantapāsādikāyaṃ pana “evaṃ yattakāni divasāni āpatti paṭicchannā hoti, tattakāni,
tika-vin09t0:1143_19: tato adhikatarāni vā kukkuccavinodanatthāya parivasitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Vitthāroti papañco.
tika-vin09t0:1144_0: Itaresu pana dvīsūti suddhantaparivāso, samodhānaparivāsoti dvinnaṃ majjhe. Khandhaketi
tika-vin09t0:1144_1: samuccayakkhandhake. Cūḷasuddhanto mahāsuddhantoti ettha yo upasampadato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:1144_2: anulomakkamena vā ārocitadivasato paṭṭhāya paṭilomakkamena vā “asukañca asukañca
tika-vin09t0:1144_3: divasaṃ vā pakkhaṃ vā māsaṃ vā saṃvaccharaṃ vā tava suddhabhāvaṃ jānāsī”ti pucchiyamāno
tika-vin09t0:1144_4: “āma, bhante, jānāmi, ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ ahaṃ suddho”ti vadati, tassa dinno suddhantaparivāso
tika-vin09t0:1145_0: Taṃ gahetvā parivasantena yattakaṃ kālaṃ attano suddhabhāvaṃ jānāti, tattakaṃ apanetvā
tika-vin09t0:1145_1: avasesaṃ māsaṃ vā dvemāsaṃ vā parivasitabbaṃ. Sace “māsamattaṃ asuddhomhī”ti sallakkhetvā
tika-vin09t0:1145_2: parivāsaṃ aggahesi, parivasanto ca puna aññaṃ māsaṃ sarati, tampi māsaṃ parivasitabbameva,
tika-vin09t0:1145_3: puna parivāsadānakiccaṃ natthi. Atha “dvemāsaṃ asuddhomhī”ti sallakkhetvā aggahesi,
tika-vin09t0:1145_4: parivasanto ca “māsamattamevāhaṃ asuddhomhī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti, māsameva parivasitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1145_5: puna parivāsadānakiccaṃ natthi. Ayañhi suddhantaparivāso uddhampi ārohati, heṭṭhāpi
tika-vin09t0:1146_0: Yo pana yathāvuttena anulomappaṭilomavasena pucchiyamānopi rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti
tika-vin09t0:1146_1: nassarati, rattipariyante vematiko vā hoti, tassa dinno suddhantaparivāso “mahāsuddhanto”ti
tika-vin09t0:1146_2: vuccati. Taṃ gahetvā gahitadivasato yāva upasampadadivaso, tāva rattiyo gaṇetvā parivasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1146_3: Ayaṃ uddhaṃ nārohati, heṭṭhā pana orohati. Tasmā sace parivasanto rattiparicchede
tika-vin09t0:1146_4: sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti “māso vā saṃvaccharo vā mayhaṃ āpannassā”ti, māsaṃ vā saṃvaccharaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1146_5: vā parivasitabbaṃ. Ettha ca kiñcāpi “ettakaṃ kālaṃ ahaṃ suddho”ti vadantassa cūḷasuddhanto
tika-vin09t0:1146_6: dīyati, tathāpi niyameneva jānanābhāvā “duvidhopi cesa…pe… dātabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Tassa
tika-vin09t0:1146_7: dānavidhi khandhake āgatoti tassa duvidhassāpi suddhantassa dānavidhi “tena, bhikkhave,
tika-vin09t0:1146_8: bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā…pe… evamassa vacanīyo”tiādinā samuccayakkhandhake
tika-vin09t0:1146_9: āgato. Tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabboti adhippāyo. Esa nayo vinicchayakathā
tika-vin09t0:1147_0: Odhunitvā avadhuya pahāya samodhāno odhānasamodhāno. Cirappaṭicchannānaṃ agghena
tika-vin09t0:1147_1: samodhāno agghasamodhāno. Missakānaṃ samodhāno missakasamodhāno. Idāni taṃ tividhampi
tika-vin09t0:1147_3: paṭicchādentassāti yo parivāsaṃ gahetvā anikkhittavatto hutvā parivasanto apariniṭṭhiteyeva
tika-vin09t0:1147_4: parivāse antarā vemajjhe saṅghādisesāpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādeti, tassa. Parivutthadivaseti
tika-vin09t0:1147_5: lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ, tena “mānattaciṇṇadivase cā”tipi vuttameva hoti. Makkhetvāti
tika-vin09t0:1147_6: ñatticatutthena kammena mūlāya paṭikassanavasena makkhetvā. Samodahitvāti mūlāpattiṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:1147_7: ṭhapetvā, pakkhipitvāti attho. Dātabbaparivāsoti “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1147_8: ñatticatutthena kammena dātabbaparivāso. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo paṭicchannāya āpattiyā
tika-vin09t0:1147_9: parivāsaṃ gahetvā parivasanto vā mānattāraho vā mānattaṃ caranto vā abbhānāraho vā
tika-vin09t0:1147_10: anikkhittavatto aññaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā purimāpattiyā samā vā ūnatarā vā rattiyo
tika-vin09t0:1147_11: paṭicchādeti, tassa mūlāya paṭikassanena te parivutthadivase ca mānattaciṇṇadivase
tika-vin09t0:1147_12: ca sabbe odhunitvā adivase katvā pacchā āpannāpattiṃ mūlāpattiyaṃ samodhāya parivāso dātabboti.
tika-vin09t0:1148_0: Sace pana antarāpatti mūlāpattito atirekappaṭicchannā hoti, taṃ mūlāpattiṃ katvā
tika-vin09t0:1148_1: tattha itaraṃ samodhāya parivāso dātabbo. Sace pana antarāpatti appaṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1148_2: mūlāya paṭikassanaṃ akatvā pubbe gahitaparivāseneva parivasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1149_0: Yā ekā vā…pe… sabbacirappaṭicchannāyoti yā ekā vā āpatti sabbacirappaṭicchannā, yā
tika-vin09t0:1149_1: dve vā tisso vā sambahulā vā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyoti attho. Tāsanti sabbacirappaṭicchannānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1149_2: āpattīnaṃ. Dānavidhi panassa khandhake vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1150_0: Yassa pana sataṃ āpattiyo dasāhapaṭicchannā, aparampi sataṃ āpattiyo dasāhapaṭicchannā,
tika-vin09t0:1150_1: aparampi sataṃ āpattiyo dasāhapaṭicchannāti evaṃ dasakkhattuṃ katvā āpattisahassaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1150_2: divasasatapaṭicchannaṃ hoti, tena kiṃ kātabbanti? Sabbaṃ samodahitvā dasa divase
tika-vin09t0:1150_3: parivasitabbaṃ. Evaṃ ekeneva dasāhena divasasatampi parivasitameva hoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:1154: Idāni missakasamodhānaṃ niddisituṃ “missakasamodhāno nāmā”tiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ nayo –
tika-vin09t0:1155_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ, ekaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1155_1: kāyasaṃsaggaṃ, ekaṃ duṭṭhullavācaṃ, ekaṃ attakāmaṃ, ekaṃ sañcarittaṃ, ekaṃ kuṭikārakaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1155_2: ekaṃ vihārakārakaṃ, ekaṃ duṭṭhadosaṃ, ekaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ, ekaṃ saṅghabhedaṃ, ekaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1155_3: bhedānuvattakaṃ, ekaṃ dubbacaṃ, ekaṃ kuladūsakaṃ, sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1156_0: Tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā tadanurūpāya kammavācāya parivāso dātabbo. Ettha ca “saṅghādisesā
tika-vin09t0:1156_1: āpattiyo āpajjiṃ nānāvatthukāyo”tipi “saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji”ntipi evaṃ pubbe
tika-vin09t0:1156_2: vuttanayena vatthuvasenapi gottavasenapi nāmavasenapi āpattivasenapi yojetvā kammavācaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1156_3: kātuṃ vaṭṭhatiyevāti. Ayaṃ missakasamodhāno. Sabbaparivāsakammavācāvasāne pana nikkhittānikkhittavattādikathā
tika-vin09t0:1156_4: purimanayeneva veditabbā. Tividhepi samodhānaparivāse atthamattasseva vuttattā, vinicchayādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1156_5: vā anāmaṭṭhattā “ayaṃ tividhepi samodhānaparivāse saṅkhepakathā”ti vuttaṃ. Mahāvisayattā
tika-vin09t0:1156_6: samodhānavicāraṇāya sā niravasesā kuto laddhabbāti āha “vitthāro”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1157_0: Chārattanti rā saddo tīyati chijjati etthāti ratti, sattānaṃ saddassa vūpasamanakāloti
tika-vin09t0:1157_1: attho, cha rattiyo samāhaṭā, channaṃ rattīnaṃ vā samāhāro charattaṃ, charattameva
tika-vin09t0:1157_2: chārattaṃ, avayavabyatirekena samudāyassābhāvato cha rattiyoti attho vutto.
tika-vin09t0:1158_0: Parivāsaṃ adatvā mānattameva dātabbanti yasmā āpatti appaṭicchannā, yasmā ca āpannabhāveneva
tika-vin09t0:1158_1: mānattāraho hoti, tasmā parivāsaṃ adatvā kevalaṃ mānattameva dātabbaṃ. Yaṃ paṭicchannāya
tika-vin09t0:1158_2: āpattiyā parivutthaparivāsassa dīyati, idaṃ paṭicchannamānattaṃ nāmāti āha “yassa
tika-vin09t0:1158_3: paṭicchannā hotī”tiādi. Idanti paṭicchannamānattaṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ vākye. Kathaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1158_4: pana tesaṃ dvinnaṃ mānattānaṃ dānavidhi ca vinicchayakathā ca veditabbāti āha “ubhinnampi panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1159_0: Ayanti vakkhamānaṃ sandhāyāha. Parivāse vuttappakāraṃ padesanti parikkhittassa vihārassa
tika-vin09t0:1159_1: parikkhepato, aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggato
tika-vin09t0:1159_2: okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ. Samādiyitvāti antoaruṇeyeva samādiyitvā. Ārocetvāti –
tika-vin09t0:1160_0: “Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1160_1: sohaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya
tika-vin09t0:1160_2: chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ, tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā
tika-vin09t0:1160_3: appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ mānattaṃ carāmi, vedayāmahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1161_0: Āpattidivasānurūpaṃ ārocetvā. Imañca pana atthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci bhāsāya ārocetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1161_1: vaṭṭatiyeva. Ārocitakālato paṭṭhāya ca ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā sesehi sati karaṇīye
tika-vin09t0:1161_2: gantumpi vaṭṭati. Aruṇe uṭṭhite tassa bhikkhussa santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin09t0:1161_3: sopi kenaci kammena pure aruṇeyeva gacchati, aññaṃ vihārato nikkhantaṃ vā āgantukaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1161_4: vā yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati, tassa santike ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Ayañca yasmā gaṇassa
tika-vin09t0:1161_5: ārocetvā, bhikkhūnañca atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāva vasi, tenassa ūne gaṇe caraṇadoso
tika-vin09t0:1161_6: vā vippavāso vā na hoti. Sace pana kañci na passati, vihāraṃ gantvā yaṃ paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1161_7: passati, tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ. Tenāha “tato tesu gatesu vā agatesu vā purimanayena paṭipajjitabba”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1162_0: Yattha siyāti yassaṃ samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyaṃ vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho atthi. Avhātabboti
tika-vin09t0:1162_1: abbhānakammavasena pakkositabbo. Abbhānakammaṃ pana kathanti āha “abbhānakammaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1162_2: Pāḷivasenāti “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”tiādinā pāḷivasena. Vinicchayavasenāti “abbhantehi
tika-vin09t0:1162_3: ca paṭhamaṃ abbhānāraho kātabbo. Ayañhi nikkhittavattattā pakatattaṭṭhāne ṭhito,
tika-vin09t0:1162_4: pakatattassa ca abbhānaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, tasmā vattaṃ samādapetabbo. Vatte samādinne
tika-vin09t0:1162_5: abbhānāraho hoti. Tenāpi vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetvā abbhānaṃ yācitabbaṃ. Anikkhittavattassa
tika-vin09t0:1162_6: pana vattasamānakiccaṃ natthi. So hi chārattātikkameneva abbhānāraho hotī”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1162_7: vinicchayavasena. Taṃ panetaṃ sabbaṃ parivāsādikammaṃ pāḷivasena ca aṭṭhakathāvasena
tika-vin09t0:1162_8: ca suviññeyyattā ativitthārabhayena na vitthārayimha, atthikehi pana tatova gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1162_9: Imassa pana kammassa vīsativaggakaraṇīyattā tato ūnatarena kataṃ kuppati. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1162_10: “ekenāpi ce…pe… anabbhito”ti. Ayanti ayaṃ yathāvuttā. Sāmīcīti vattaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1168_1: vuttaṃ. Rahoti appakāsaṃ. Appakāsatā ca yo anāpattiṃ karoti, tassa apaccakkhabhāvatoti
tika-vin09t0:1168_2: āha “cakkhussa raho”ti. Nanu “raho nāma cakkhussa raho, sotassa raho. Cakkhussa raho
tika-vin09t0:1168_3: nāma na sakkā hoti akkhiṃ vā nikhaṇiyamāne, bhamukaṃ vā ukkhipiyamāne, sīsaṃ vā ukkhipiyamāne
tika-vin09t0:1168_4: passituṃ. Sotassa raho nāma na sakkā hoti pakatikathā sotu”nti padabhājanapāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1168_5: sotassa rahoti āgataṃ, atha kasmā taṃ avatvā “cakkhussa raho”ti ettakameva vuttanti
tika-vin09t0:1168_6: āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi. Iminā pāḷiyaṃ “sotassa raho”ti idaṃ atthuddhāravasena vuttanti
tika-vin09t0:1168_7: dasseti. Atha kathametaṃ viññāyati “cakkhusseva raho idha adhippeto”ti? “Paṭicchanne
tika-vin09t0:1168_8: āsane”ti vacanato “sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti ca vuttattā. Tenevāha
tika-vin09t0:1168_10: dasseti. Apihitakavāṭassa pana dvāre nisinno anāpattiṃ karoti, na kevalaṃ apihitakavāṭassa
tika-vin09t0:1168_11: gabbhassa dvāre nisinnova anāpattiṃ karoti, antodvādasahatthe okāse nisinnopīti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1168_12: Tenāha “yattha pana sakkā daṭṭhu”ntiādi. Yasmā nisīditvā niddāyanto kapimiddhapareto
tika-vin09t0:1168_13: kañci kālaṃ cakkhūni ummīleti, kañci kālaṃ nimīleti, na ca mahāniddaṃ okkamati, tasmā
tika-vin09t0:1168_14: “niddāyantopi anāpattiṃ karotī”ti vuttaṃ. Nipajjitvā niddāyanto pana tādiso na hotīti
tika-vin09t0:1168_15: āha “nipajjitvā niddāyantopi na karotī”ti, anāpattiṃ na karotīti attho. Methunassa
tika-vin09t0:1168_16: mātugāmo dutiyo na hoti. Itthiyo hi aññamaññissā vajjaṃ paṭicchādenti. Teneva vesāliyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1168_17: mahāvane dvāraṃ vivaritvā nipanne bhikkhumhi sambahulā itthiyo yāvadatthaṃ katvā
tika-vin09t0:1168_18: pakkamiṃsu. Tenāha “itthīnaṃ pana satampi na karotī”ti. Taṃ kammanti ajjhācārakammaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1168_19: Yasmā nisīditvāva nipajjati, tasmā nipajjanampi antokatvā “nisajjaṃ kappeyyā”ti vuttanti
tika-vin09t0:1168_20: dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādimāha. Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabboti nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānassa
tika-vin09t0:1168_21: tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarasamāyogo hotiyevāti vuttaṃ. Pārājikena, pana saṅghādisesena
tika-vin09t0:1168_22: ca pācittiyena ca tenākārena nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānova kāretabbo. Na appaṭijānamānoti
tika-vin09t0:1168_23: nisajjaṃ appaṭijānamāno tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena na kāretabboti. Alajjīpi hi paṭijānamānova
tika-vin09t0:1168_24: āpattiyā kāretabbo. Yāva na paṭijānāti, tāva “neva suddho”ti vā “na asuddho”ti vā
tika-vin09t0:1169: “Paṭiññā lajjīsu katā, alajjīsu evaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin09t0:1171_0: Na kevalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena codanāyameva evaṃ paṭiññāya kāretabbo, atha
tika-vin09t0:1171_1: kho nisajjādinā ākārena saddhiṃ codanāyapīti dassetuṃ “yena vā sā saddheyyavacasā
tika-vin09t0:1171_2: upāsikā vadeyya, tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “nisajjādīsu ākāresū”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1171_3: Ettha ca “paṭijānamāno”ti avuttepi adhikārattā “paṭijānamānova tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo”ti
tika-vin09t0:1171_4: vuttaṃ. Tathārūpāya upāsikāya vacane aññathattābhāvato diṭṭhaṃ nāma tathāpi hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1171_5: aññathāpi hotīti dassane aññathattasambhavaṃ dasseti. Anekaṃsikatāya na niyatoti
tika-vin09t0:1172_0: Rahonisajjassādena mātugāmassa santikaṃ gantukāmo akkhiṃ añjeti, dukkaṭaṃ. Nivāsanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1172_1: nivāseti, kāyabandhanaṃ bandhati, cīvaraṃ pārupati, sabbattha payoge payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1172_2: Gacchati, padavāre padavāre dukkaṭaṃ. Gantvāna nisīdati, dukkaṭameva. Tenāha “methunadhammasannissitakilesasaṅkhātenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1172_3: Ettha ca rahonisajjassādassa asatipi methunarāgabhāve tappaṭibaddhakilesattā vuttaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1172_5: “itthannāmāya saddhiṃ raho nisīditvā hasitalapitādikaṃ kareyya”nti uppannaassādahetu.
tika-vin09t0:1172_6: Nisajjāya pācittiyaṃ asati upacāragate nipajjitvā aniddāyante anandhe viññupuriseti
tika-vin09t0:1172_7: adhippāyo. Sace sā itthī kenaci karaṇīyena uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya punappunaṃ nisīdati, nisajjāya
tika-vin09t0:1172_8: nisajjāya pācittiyaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya gato, sā na diṭṭhā, aññā āgantvā nisīdati, assāde
tika-vin09t0:1172_9: uppanne pācittiyaṃ. Sace sambahulā āgacchanti, mātugāmagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ. Sace
tika-vin09t0:1172_10: uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya punappunaṃ nisīdanti, nisajjāgaṇanāyapi pācittiyāni. Aniyametvā “diṭṭhadiṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:1172_11: saddhiṃ rahassādaṃ kappissāmī”ti gantvā nisinnassāpi āgatāgatānaṃ vasena, punappunaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1172_12: nisajjāya vasena ca vuttanayeneva āpattiyo veditabbā. Vuttappakāre puriseti anandhe
tika-vin09t0:1172_13: viññupurise. Upacāragate satīti dvādasahatthabbhantaragate sati. Sace suddhacittena
tika-vin09t0:1172_14: gantvā nisinnassa santikaṃ āgantvā nisinnāya itthiyā rahassādo uppajjati, evampi anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1175_0: Naheva kho pana paṭicchannanti ettha pana yampi bahi parikkhittaṃ anto vivaṭaṃ pariveṇaṅgaṇādi,
tika-vin09t0:1175_1: tampi antogadhanti veditabbaṃ. “Evarūpañhi ṭhānaṃ appaṭicchanneyeva gahita”nti mahāpaccariyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1175_3: vā. Teneva hi padabhājane “sā ce evaṃ vadeyya ‘ayyo, mayā diṭṭho nisinno mātugāmena
tika-vin09t0:1175_4: saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanto”’tiādi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ duṭṭhullavācāvasena
tika-vin09t0:1175_5: āgataṃ. Duṭṭhullavācañca sutvā taṃ mātugāmopi na paṭicchādeti. Tathā hi duṭṭhullavācāsikkhāpade
tika-vin09t0:1175_6: yā pana tā itthiyo hirimanā, tā nikkhamitvā bhikkhū ujjhāpesuṃ, tasmā idha itthīpi
tika-vin09t0:1175_7: anāpattiṃ karotīti āha “itthīpī”ti. Atha vā idha appaṭicchannattā itthīpi anāpattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1175_8: karoti, paṭhame pana paṭicchannattā itthisatampi anāpattiṃ na karotīti evamettha
tika-vin09t0:1175_9: attho daṭṭhabbo. Anandho abadhiroti ettha kāyasaṃsaggavasena anandho vutto, duṭṭhullavācāvasena abadhiro.
tika-vin09t0:1176_0: Samuṭṭhānādīsu idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ tisamuṭṭhānaṃ – kāyacittato vācācittato kāyavācācittato
tika-vin09t0:1176_1: samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1176_3: adinnādānasadisānevā”ti. Ettha ca kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanto duṭṭhullampi bhaṇati,
tika-vin09t0:1176_4: duṭṭhullaṃ bhaṇanto nisīdati cāti “kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhātī”ti vuttaṃ, duṭṭhullameva
tika-vin09t0:1178: “Aniyatuddeso cāyaṃ diṭṭhādisamūlakacodanāya vatthuṃ paṭijānamānova āpattiyā kāretabbo, na itaroti āpattiropanāropanalakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ vutto”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1185_0: Niṭṭhitacīvarasminti niṭṭhitañca taṃ cīvarañcāti niṭṭhitacīvaraṃ, niṭṭhite ānisaṃsamūlake
tika-vin09t0:1185_1: cīvare, paccāsācīvare cāti attho. Yasmā pana taṃ cīvaraṃ karaṇenapi niṭṭhitaṃ hoti
tika-vin09t0:1185_2: nāsanādīhipi, tasmā “sūcikammapariyosānena vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ kiñci sūciyā
tika-vin09t0:1185_4: tena. Naṭṭhanti corādīhi haṭaṃ. Etampi hi karaṇapalibodhassa niṭṭhitattā “niṭṭhita”nti
tika-vin09t0:1185_5: vuccati. Vinaṭṭhanti upacikādīhi khāditaṃ. Daḍḍhanti agginā daḍḍhaṃ. Cīvarāsā vā
tika-vin09t0:1185_6: upacchinnāti “asukasmiṃ nāma kule cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti yā cīvarāsā uppannā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1185_7: sā upacchinnā. Etesampi karaṇapalibodhasseva niṭṭhitattā niṭṭhitabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1185_8: Tenāha “imesu vā”tiādi. Etena cīvarapalibodhābhāvo vutto. Tenāha “cīvarassa karaṇapalibodhe
tika-vin09t0:1185_9: upacchinneti attho”ti. Kathametaṃ viññāyatīti āha “atthatakathinassa hī”tiādi. Pañcānisaṃse
tika-vin09t0:1185_10: aññattha gantuṃ adatvā saṅgaṇhanaṭṭhena kathinaṃ, thiranti attho, atthataṃ kathinaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1185_11: yena so atthatakathino, tassa atthatakathinassa. Hīti kāraṇatthe nipāto. Tāva kathinānisaṃsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1185_12: labhatīti ettha yo atthatakathino bhikkhūti ajjhāharitabbaṃ, tāva so atthatakathino
tika-vin09t0:1185_13: bhikkhūti veditabbo, anāmantacārādikaṃ kathinānisaṃsaṃ labhatīti attho. “Atthatakathinassa
tika-vin09t0:1185_14: bhikkhuno”ti idaṃ vā “atthatakathino bhikkhū”ti vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1185_15: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – cīvarapalibodho āvāsapalibodhoti dve palibodhā. Tesu ekapalibodhepi
tika-vin09t0:1185_16: sati yasmā anāmantacārādikaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ labhati, nāsati. Kasmā? “Niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti
tika-vin09t0:1185_17: etassa cīvarassa karaṇapalibodhe upacchinneti ayamattho viññāyatīti. Saṅghassāti
tika-vin09t0:1185_18: saṅghena. Kattari cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Ubbhateti aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānamaññatarena, antarubbhārena vā uddhaṭe.
tika-vin09t0:1186_0: Tatrāti tasmiṃ kathine. Ubbhāro uddharaṇaṃ. Purimavassaṃvuṭṭhe tiṃsamatte pāveyyake
tika-vin09t0:1186_1: bhikkhū uddissa “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathinaṃ attharitu”nti
tika-vin09t0:1186_2: kathinakkhandhake bhagavatā kathinassa anuññātattā “ayañhi kathinatthāro nāma…pe…
tika-vin09t0:1186_3: anuññāto”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānanti vassacchedaṃ akatvā purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānanti
tika-vin09t0:1186_4: attho. Etena vuṭṭhavassavasena tāva purimikāya vassaṃ upagatāyeva kathinatthāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1186_5: labhanti, na pacchimikāya upagatāti dasseti. Vuṭṭhavassavasena tāva evaṃ hotu, gaṇanavasena
tika-vin09t0:1186_6: taṃ kittakā labhantīti āha “so”tiādi. Soti kathinatthāro. Sabbantimena paricchedenāti
tika-vin09t0:1186_7: gaṇanavasena pacchimakoṭiyā. Pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatīti pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro kathinadussassa
tika-vin09t0:1186_8: dāyakā, eko paṭiggāhakoti pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭati. Keci pana “pañcavaggakaraṇīyattā
tika-vin09t0:1186_9: ‘pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vutta”nti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ “tatra, bhikkhave,
tika-vin09t0:1186_10: yvāyaṃ catuvaggo bhikkhusaṅgho ṭhapetvā tīṇi kammāni upasampadaṃ pavāraṇaṃ abbhāna”nti
tika-vin09t0:1186_11: campeyyakkhandhake vuttattā. Tasmāti yasmā vuṭṭhavassavasena purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1186_12: anaññāto, yasmā ca sabbantimena paricchedena pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā. Yatthāti
tika-vin09t0:1186_13: yasmiṃ vihāre. Ānisaṃseti anāmantacārādike kathinānisaṃse. Atha pana cattāro bhikkhū
tika-vin09t0:1186_14: vassaṃ upagatā, eko paripuṇṇavasso sāmaṇero sace pacchimikāya upasampajjati, gaṇapūrako
tika-vin09t0:1186_15: ceva hoti, ānisaṃsañca labhati. Tayo bhikkhū, dve sāmaṇerā, dve bhikkhū, tayo sāmaṇerā,
tika-vin09t0:1186_16: eko bhikkhu, cattāro sāmaṇerāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:1188_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, idaṃ saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppannaṃ. Yadi saṅghassa
tika-vin09t0:1188_1: pattakallaṃ, saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyya kathinaṃ attharituṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1188_2: esā ñatti. Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, idaṃ saṅghassa kathinadussaṃ uppannaṃ, saṅgho
tika-vin09t0:1188_3: imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno deti kathinaṃ attharituṃ. Yassāyasmato
tika-vin09t0:1188_4: khamati imassa kathinadussassa itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dānaṃ kathinaṃ attharituṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1188_5: so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya. Dinnaṃ idaṃ saṅghena kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa
tika-vin09t0:1188_6: bhikkhuno kathinaṃ attharituṃ, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin09t0:1189_0: Evaṃ kathinakkhandhake vuttāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya. Kathinatthārārahassāti kathinaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1189_1: attharituṃ bhabbassa. So ca kho pubbakaraṇajānanādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatoti
tika-vin09t0:1189_2: veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ vinayavinicchaye “aṭṭhadhammakovido bhikkhu, kathinatthāramarahatī”ti. Parivārepi vuttaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:1190_0: “Aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ. Katamehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi
tika-vin09t0:1190_1: samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ? Pubbakaraṇaṃ jānāti, paccuddhāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1190_2: jānāti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ jānāti, atthāraṃ jānāti, mātikaṃ jānāti, palibodhaṃ jānāti, uddhāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1190_3: jānāti, ānisaṃsaṃ jānāti, imehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharitu”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1191_1: Paccuddhāro nāma purāṇasaṅghāṭiādīnaṃ paccuddharaṇaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma kathinacīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1191_2: Atthāro nāma kathinatthāro. Mātikā nāma aṭṭha mātikā. Palibodho nāma āvāsapalibodho
tika-vin09t0:1191_3: cīvarapalibodhoti dve palibodhā. Uddhāro nāma pakkamanantikādayo. Ānisaṃso nāma pañcānisaṃsā.
tika-vin09t0:1192_0: Yaṃ pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttaṃ “kathinaṃ pana kena attharitabbaṃ? Yassa saṅgho
tika-vin09t0:1192_1: kathinacīvaraṃ deti, saṅghena pana kassa dātabbaṃ? Yo jiṇṇacīvaro hoti, sace bahū
tika-vin09t0:1192_2: jiṇṇacīvarā honti, vuḍḍhassa dātabbaṃ. Vuḍḍhesupi yo mahāpariso tadaheva cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1192_3: katvā attharituṃ sakkoti, tassa dātabbaṃ. Sace vuḍḍho na sakkoti, navakataro sakkoti,
tika-vin09t0:1192_4: tassa dātabbaṃ. Apica saṅghena mahātherassa saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā ‘tumhe,
tika-vin09t0:1192_5: bhante, gaṇhatha, mayaṃ katvā dassāmā’ti vattabba”nti, tampi kathinatthārārahaṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:1192_6: gahetvāva dātabbaṃ. Dentena pana tīsu cīvaresu yaṃ yaṃ jiṇṇaṃ hoti, taṃ tadatthāya
tika-vin09t0:1192_7: dātabbaṃ. Pakatiyā dupaṭṭacīvarassa dupaṭṭatthāyeva dātabbaṃ. Sacepissa ekapaṭṭacīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1192_8: ghanaṃ hoti, kathinasāṭako ca pelavo, sāruppatthāya dupaṭṭappahonakameva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1192_9: “Ahaṃ alabhanto ekapaṭṭaṃ pārupāmī”ti vadantassāpi dupaṭṭaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Yo pana
tika-vin09t0:1192_10: lobhapakatiko hoti, tassa na dātabbaṃ. Tenāpi kathinaṃ attharitvā pacchā sibbetvā
tika-vin09t0:1193_0: Tenāti kathinatthārakena bhikkhunā. Tadahevāti tasmiṃyeva divase. Pañca vā atirekāni
tika-vin09t0:1193_1: vā khaṇḍāni chinditvāti yathā pañcakhaṇḍikādīnaṃ saṅghāṭiādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1193_2: aññatarappahonakāni mahāmaṇḍalaaḍḍhamaṇḍalādivasena pañca khaṇḍāni vā atirekāni vā
tika-vin09t0:1193_3: sattādikhaṇḍāni honti, evaṃ chinditvā. Tasmiñca kathinacīvare kariyamāne “ahaṃ thero”ti
tika-vin09t0:1193_4: vā “bahussuto”ti vā ekenāpi akātuṃ na labbhati. Anādariyena akarontassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1193_5: Tasmā sabbeheva sannipatitvā dhovanachedanasibbanarajanāni niṭṭhāpetabbāni. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1193_7: kathinadussaṃ. Sabbantimena paricchedena antaravāsakopi chinditvāva kātabbo aññathā
tika-vin09t0:1194: “Kathañca pana, bhikkhave, anatthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ? Na ullikhitamattena atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ…pe… na aññatra pañcakena vā atirekapañcakena vā tadaheva sañchinnenā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1195_0: Tenevāha “acchinnāsibbitaṃ pana na vaṭṭatī”ti. Tena bhikkhunāti atthārakena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin09t0:1195_1: Attharitabbanti attharaṇaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tañca kho tathāvacībhedakaraṇamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāha –
tika-vin09t0:1196: “Sace saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharitukāmo hoti, porāṇikā saṅghāṭi paccuddharitabbā, navā saṅghāṭi adhiṭṭhātabbā, ‘imāya saṅghāṭiyā kathinaṃ attharāmī’ti vācā bhinditabbā”ti –
tika-vin09t0:1197: Vitthāro. “Bhante, āvuso”ti ca “anumodatha, anumodāhī”ti ca vacanabhedaṃ sandhāya “therānañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1198_0: Evaṃ atthārakena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassetvā idāni anumodakehi paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1198_1: dassetuṃ “tehipī”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Anumodāmā”ti attanāva attani gāravavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1198_2: Kiñcāpi evaṃ vuttaṃ, tathāpi ekakena “anumodāmā”ti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati, “anumodāmi”cceva
tika-vin09t0:1198_3: vattabbanti vadanti, vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Idāni kathinānisaṃse dassetuṃ bhūmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1198_5: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ atthārakassa ca anumodakassa
tika-vin09t0:1198_6: cā”ti. Teti atthārakaanumodakā. Tato paṭṭhāyāti atthārānumodanato paṭṭhāya. Yāva
tika-vin09t0:1198_7: kathinassubbhārāti na kevalaṃ cīvaramāseyeva, atha kho aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ aññatarena
tika-vin09t0:1198_8: vā antarubbhārena vā yāva kathinassubbhārā pañcānisaṃse labhanti, uddhaṭe pana na labhantīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1199_0: Idāni te pañcānisaṃse sarūpato dassetuṃ “anāmantacāro”tiādimāha. Tattha anāmantacāro
tika-vin09t0:1199_1: nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantitassa santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā kulesu
tika-vin09t0:1199_2: cārittāpajjanaṃ. Asamādānacāro nāma nāmenādhiṭṭhitassa cīvarassa asamādānacaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1199_3: nāmenādhiṭṭhitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānamaññataraṃ cīvaraṃ yattha katthaci nikkhipitvā
tika-vin09t0:1199_4: aññattha aruṇuṭṭhāpananti attho, cīvaravippavāsoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yāvadatthacīvaranti
tika-vin09t0:1199_5: yāvatā cīvarena attho hoti, tāvatakaṃ anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ cīvaradhāraṇaṃ, dasāhamatikkamitvā
tika-vin09t0:1199_6: cīvarassa ṭhapananti attho. Gaṇassa bhojanaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ. Gaṇoti cettha cattāro
tika-vin09t0:1199_7: vā tatuttari vā bhikkhū. Tesaṃ viññattito vā nimantanato vā laddhassa odanādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1199_8: pañcannaṃ aññatarabhojanassa saha gahaṇanti attho. Yo ca tattha cīvaruppādoti tattha
tika-vin09t0:1199_9: kathinatthatasīmāya matakacīvaraṃ vā hotu, saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnaṃ vā saṅghikena tatruppādena
tika-vin09t0:1199_10: ābhataṃ vā yena kenaci ākārena yaṃ saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ uppajjati, taṃ tesaṃ bhavissatīti
tika-vin09t0:1200_0: “Yaṃ pana tattha saṅghassa uppannaṃ pattādi vā aññaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vā, taṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin09t0:1200_1: Yaṃ pana tatruppādena taṇḍulādinā vatthaṃ cetāpitaṃ, atthatakathinānameva tāni vatthāni
tika-vin09t0:1200_2: pāpuṇanti. Vatthehi pana taṇḍulādīsu cetāpitesu sabbesaṃ tāni pāpuṇantī”ti gaṇṭhipade
tika-vin09t0:1200_3: vuttaṃ, tampi cetāpitakālato paṭṭhāya cīvaruppādo na hotīti suvuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1200_4: Anatthatakathinā pana imesu pañcasu ānisaṃsesu cīvaramāse asamādānacāraṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin09t0:1200_5: sesānisaṃse labhanti. Yadi asamādānacāropi labbheyya, pāveyyakā bhikkhū vassaṃvuṭṭhā
tika-vin09t0:1200_6: okapuṇṇehi cīvarehi na bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkameyyuṃ. Yasmā taṃ na labbhati, tasmā cīvaramāsepi
tika-vin09t0:1201_0: Evaṃ kathinatthāraṃ dassetvā idāni ubbhāraṃ dassento “taṃ panetaṃ kathina”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1201_1: Tattha mātikāti mātaro, janettiyoti attho. Kathinubbhārañhi etā aṭṭha janenti. Tāsu
tika-vin09t0:1201_2: pakkamanaṃ anto etissāti pakkamanantikā. Evaṃ sesāpi veditabbā. Tattha yo bhikkhu
tika-vin09t0:1201_3: atthatakathino kathinacīvaraṃ ādāya tasmiṃ āvāse nirapekkho “na paccessa”nti pakkamati,
tika-vin09t0:1201_4: tassevaṃ pakkamato kathinuddhāro atikkantamattāya sīmāya hotīti pakkamanantiko kathinuddhāroti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1202_0: Yo pana ānisaṃsacīvaraṃ ādāya pakkamati, tassa bahisīmāgatassa evaṃ hoti “idhevimaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1202_1: karissāmi, na puna taṃ vihāraṃ gacchissāmī”ti tasmiṃ āvāse nirapekkho hutvā taṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1203: Yadi pana ānisaṃsamūlacīvaraṃ ādāya bahisīmāgato “nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ karissāmi, na ca taṃ āvāsaṃ gacchissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti, tadā sanniṭṭhānantiko kathinuddhāro.
tika-vin09t0:1204_0: Tadeva ānisaṃsacīvaraṃ laddhā taṃ ādāya bahisīmaṃ gantvā “idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ karissāmi,
tika-vin09t0:1204_1: na gacchissāmī”ti karontassa sace taṃ cīvaraṃ nassati vinassati ḍayhati, nāsanantiko kathinuddhāro hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1205: Sace pana ānisaṃsacīvaraṃ laddhā tasmiṃ vihāre sāpekkhova bahisīmāgato “vihāre bhikkhūhi antarubbhāraṃ kata”nti suṇāti, tassa savanantiko kathinuddhāro hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1206_0: Āsāya avacchedo etissāti āsāvacchedikā. Yo pana yena kenaci “tuyhaṃ cīvaraṃ dassāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1206_1: vutto tasmiṃ cīvare āsāya vihāre apekkhaṃ pahāya bahisīmāgato puna tena “na sakkomi
tika-vin09t0:1206_2: dātu”nti vutte āsaṃ chindati, tassa āsāvacchediko kathinuddhāro hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1207: Yo pana vassaṃvuṭṭhavihārato aññaṃ vihāraṃ sāpekkhova gantvā āgacchanto antarāmaggeyeva kathinuddhāraṃ vītināmeti, tassa sīmātikkamanantiko kathinuddhāro.
tika-vin09t0:1208: Saha ubbhārenāti sahubbhārā. Ānisaṃsacīvaraṃ ādāya sāpekkhova bahi gantvā kathinuddhāraṃ sambhuṇantassa kathinuddhāro sahubbhāroti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1209_0: “Etasmiṃ pana pakkamanantike kathinuddhāre paṭhamaṃ cīvarapalibodho chijjatī”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1209_3: tatthāgatattā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesapalibodhābhāvanti avasesassa palibodhassa
tika-vin09t0:1210_0: Assāti kālassa. Dasāhaparamanti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacananti āha “taṃ dasāhaparamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1210_1: kāla”nti. Atirekanti adhikaṃ, so ca adhikabhāvo adhiṭṭhitavikappitacīvaratoti āha
tika-vin09t0:1210_3: sesāni. Kambalaṃ nāma manussalomavāḷalome ṭhapetvā sesalomehi vāyitvā katavatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1210_4: Sāṇaṃ nāma sāṇavākehi katavatthaṃ. Bhaṅgaṃ nāma khomasuttādīhi pañcahi missetvā katavatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1210_5: “Pāṭekkaṃ vākamayamevā”tipi vadanti. Tadanulomānaṃ vāti dukūlaṃ pattuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭṭaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1210_6: cīnapaṭṭaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnanti tesaṃ khomādīnaṃyeva anulomānaṃ channaṃ cīvarānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1210_7: vā, tattha dukūlaṃ sāṇassa anulomaṃ vākamayattā. Pattuṇṇadese pāṇakehi sañjātavatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1210_8: pattuṇṇaṃ. Somāradese jātaṃ vatthaṃ somārapaṭṭaṃ. Tathā cīnapaṭṭaṃ. Imāni tīṇipi
tika-vin09t0:1210_9: koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā. Iddhijaṃ ehibhikkhūnaṃ puññiddhiyā
tika-vin09t0:1210_10: nibbattacīvaraṃ. Taṃ pana khomādīnamaññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃyeva anulomaṃ. Devehi dinnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1210_11: cīvaraṃ devadinnaṃ, taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jāliniyā devakaññāya anuruddhattherassa
tika-vin09t0:1210_12: dinnavatthasadisaṃ, tampi khomādīnaṃyeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:1211_0: Dīghato vaḍḍhakihatthappamāṇaṃ, vitthārato tato upaḍḍhappamāṇaṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchimaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1211_1: Aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ sugataṅgulenāti ettha sugataṅgulaṃ nāma idāni majjhimassa purimassa tīṇi
tika-vin09t0:1211_2: aṅgulāni, tena sugataṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ vaḍḍhakihatthappamāṇanti attho. Caturaṅgulavitthatanti
tika-vin09t0:1211_3: etthāpi yathāvuttānusāreneva attho veditabbo. Yesaṃ pana adhiṭṭhānavikappanānaṃ abhāvato
tika-vin09t0:1211_4: adhiṭṭhitavikappitesu apariyāpannattā idaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1212_0: Taṃ adhiṭṭhānavikappanaṃ kenākārena jānitabbanti anuyogaṃ sandhāya taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1212_1: pana vutta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha yaṃ pana vuttanti atirekacīvaraṃ dassetuṃ “adhiṭṭhitavikappitesu
tika-vin09t0:1212_2: apariyāpannattā”ti amhehi yaṃ vuttanti attho. Ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātunti nāmaṃ vatvā
tika-vin09t0:1212_3: adhiṭṭhātuṃ. Na vikappetunti saṅghāṭiādināmena vikappetuṃ na anujānāmīti attho. “Imaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1212_4: cīvaraṃ vikappemī”ti pana vikappetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Sāmaññavacanaṃ pana ticīvarassa
tika-vin09t0:1212_5: kaṇḍupaṭicchādivassikasāṭikānaṃ viya kālavasena visesābhāvā cassa vikappetabbatāti
tika-vin09t0:1212_6: dassanatthaṃ, na pana sabbathā vikappanapaṭisedhanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi purāṇacīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1212_8: ca ticīvarassapi vikappanāya okāso dinno. Esa nayo sabbattha. Ticīvarādīni hi adhiṭṭhahantena
tika-vin09t0:1212_9: “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”tiādinā taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Vikappentena
tika-vin09t0:1212_10: pana “imaṃ saṅghāṭi”ntiādinā tassa tassa cīvarassa nāmaṃ aggahetvā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1212_11: tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti vikappetabbaṃ. Ticīvaraṃ vā hotu, aññaṃ vā, yadi taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1212_12: gahetvā vikappeti, avikappitaṃ hoti, atirekacīvaraṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati. Tato paraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1212_13: vikappetunti catumāsato paraṃ “imaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappemī”ti vikappetuṃ. Idañca paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1212_14: anuññātaṃ. Keci pana “tato paraṃ vikappetvā yāva āgāmisaṃvacchare vassānaṃ catumāsaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1212_15: tāva ṭhapetuṃ anuññāta”nti vadanti. Tato paranti ābādhato paraṃ. “Imāsañca pana vassikasāṭikakaṇḍupaṭicchādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1212_16: tato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhogassa anuññātattā tathāvikappitaṃ aññanāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin09t0:1212_18: adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ vikappetabbanti evaṃ adhiṭṭhānavikappanā jānitabbāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1213_0: Pañcaparimāṇaṃ assāti pañcakaṃ, muṭṭhissa muṭṭhihatthassa sambandhaṃ pañcakaṃ muṭṭhipañcakaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1213_1: Esa na yo muṭṭhittikanti etthāpi. Pārupanenapi sakkā nābhiṃ paṭicchādetunti āha “dvihatthopi
tika-vin09t0:1213_2: vaṭṭatī”ti. Na kevalaṃ aḍḍhateyyova vaṭṭati, atha kho dvihatthopi vaṭṭatīti pi-saddassa
tika-vin09t0:1213_3: attho daṭṭhabbo. Atirekañcāti sugatacīvarappamāṇampi tato adhikampi. Paccuddharāmīti
tika-vin09t0:1213_4: ṭhapemi, pariccajāmīti vā attho. “Imaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti evampi vattuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1213_5: vaṭṭati. Kāyavikāraṃ karontenāti hatthādinā cīvaraṃ parāmasantena, cālentena vā.
tika-vin09t0:1213_6: Idañhi adhiṭṭhānaṃ yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena aphusantassa na vaṭṭati. Duvidhanti
tika-vin09t0:1213_7: sammukhāparammukhabhedena duvidhaṃ. Vācā bhinditabbāti vacanaṃ nicchāretabbaṃ. Antogabbhādīsūti
tika-vin09t0:1213_8: antogabbhauparipāsādesu. Sāmantavihāreti yattha tadaheva gantvā nivattetuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin09t0:1213_9: evarūpe samīpavihāre. Idañca desanāsīsamattaṃ, tasmā dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātabbanti
tika-vin09t0:1213_10: vadanti. “Ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā”ti iminā cīvarasaṃlakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Na hi ṭhapitaṭṭhānamattasallakkhaṇena
tika-vin09t0:1214_1: adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitavatthehi. Adhiṭṭhānato pubbe saṅghāṭiādivohārassa abhāvato “imaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1214_2: paccuddharāmī”ti paccattharaṇādīnaṃ visuṃ paccuddharaṇavidhiṃ dasseti. Paccattharaṇādināmena
tika-vin09t0:1214_3: pana adhiṭṭhātabbattā “imaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ paccuddharāmī”tiādinā vuttepi nevatthi
tika-vin09t0:1214_4: doso. Puna adhiṭṭhātabbānīti saṅghāṭiādināmena adhiṭṭhātabbāni. Parikkhāracoḷakassa
tika-vin09t0:1214_5: pana parikkhāracoḷavasena adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitavatthehipi saṅghāṭiādimhi kate paccuddharitvā
tika-vin09t0:1214_6: puna adhiṭṭhātabbanti natthi. Pubbe katādhiṭṭhānameva adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Adhiṭṭhitena pana
tika-vin09t0:1214_7: tena saddhiṃ mahantatarameva dutiyaṃ paṭṭaṃ vā khaṇḍaṃ vā saṃsibbantena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1214_8: same vā khuddake vā adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi. Sukhaparibhogatthanti vippavāsadosābhāvato
tika-vin09t0:1214_9: yattha katthaci ṭhapetvā dhammassavanādinā kiccena aññattha aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā āgantvā
tika-vin09t0:1214_10: nissajjanaṃ vināva paribhuñjituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya sukhaparibhogatthaṃ. Parikkhāracoḷaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1215_0: Anatirittapamāṇāti “dīghaso cha vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā, tiriyaṃ aḍḍhateyyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1215_2: apanetvā vikappetabbā, hemantassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya antodasāhe vassikasāṭikāvassikasāṭikabhāvato
tika-vin09t0:1215_3: apanetvā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ tuyhaṃ vikappemī”tiādinā nayena vikappetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1215_5: adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī”ti vakkhamānattā vassānamāsato paraṃ asati adhiṭṭhāne kiṃ paccuddhareyyāti
tika-vin09t0:1216_0: Keci pana “yathā kathinamāsabbhantare uppannacīvaraṃ kathinamāsātikkame nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1216_1: hoti, evamayaṃ vassikasāṭikāpi vassānamāsātikkame nissaggiyā hoti. Tasmā kattikapuṇṇamadivase
tika-vin09t0:1216_2: paccuddharitvā tato paraṃ hemantassa paṭhamadivase vikappetabbāti evamattho gahetabbo,
tika-vin09t0:1216_3: paccuddharitvā tato paraṃ vikappetabbāti padayojanā veditabbā”ti ca vadanti, taṃ
tika-vin09t0:1216_4: na yuttaṃ. Kathinamāse uppannañhi cīvaraṃ atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitattā avasānadivase
tika-vin09t0:1216_5: anadhiṭṭhitaṃ kathinamāsātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ pana vassikasāṭikā adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin09t0:1216_6: ṭhapitattā na tena sadisāti vassānātikkame kathaṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti anadhiṭṭhitaavikappitameva
tika-vin09t0:1216_7: hi taṃ kālātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hoti, tasmā hemantepi vassikasāṭikā dasāhaparihāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1216_8: labhati. Evaṃ kaṇḍupaṭicchādipi adhiṭṭhānavijahanato paraṃ dasāhaparihāraṃ labhati.
tika-vin09t0:1216_9: Dasāhaṃ pana anatikkāmetvā vikappetabbā. Nahānatthāya anuññātattā vaṇṇabhedamattarattāpi
tika-vin09t0:1216_10: cesā vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. “Dve pana na vaṭṭantī”ti dvinnaṃ adhiṭṭhānābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1216_11: “Sace vassāne aparā vassikasāṭikā uppannā hoti, purimavassikasāṭikaṃ paccuddharitvā,
tika-vin09t0:1217_0: Pamāṇayuttanti “dīghaso sugatavidatthiyā dve vidatthiyo, vitthārato diyaḍḍhaṃ dasā
tika-vin09t0:1217_1: vidatthī”ti iminā pamāṇena yuttaṃ. Pamāṇikāti “sugatavidatthiyā dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo,
tika-vin09t0:1217_2: tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo”ti evaṃ vuttappamāṇayuttā. Paccuddharitvā vikappetabbāti ettha
tika-vin09t0:1217_3: yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Yasmā bhikkhūnaṃ ticīvare paripuṇṇe, atthe ca
tika-vin09t0:1217_4: sati parissāvanādīhi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, parikkhāracoḷaka”nti bahūnaṃ pattatthavikaparissāvanādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1217_6: vuttaṃ. Bhagavatā hi yaṃ yaṃ bhikkhū labhanti, taṃ taṃ iminā vidhānena adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin09t0:1217_7: puna “yena yena parissāvanādinā attho hoti, taṃ taṃ katvā gaṇhantū”ti anukampāya
tika-vin09t0:1217_10: cā”ti iminā attano santakaṃ paṭikkhipati. Keci pana “anivāsetvā, apārupitvā ca kevalaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1217_11: pañcapīṭhesuyeva attharitvā paribhuñjiyamānaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ attano santakampi anadhiṭṭhitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1217_12: vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti, taṃ ayuttaṃ senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinna”nti paccattharaṇassa
tika-vin09t0:1218_0: Adhiṭṭhitañca panetaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjato kathaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti āha “sabbañca
tika-vin09t0:1218_1: paneta”ntiādi. Tattha acchinditvā gahaṇenāti corādīhi acchinditvā gahaṇena. Hīnāyāvattanenāti
tika-vin09t0:1218_2: gihibhāvāya āvattanena, vibbhamenāti attho, “sīlavantova hutvā gihī bhavissāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1218_4: vā kāsāyacajanaṃ vā hīnāyāvattana”nti keci. “‘Hīnāyāvattanenā’ti iminā bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin09t0:1218_5: eva adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ gahitaṃ hoti. Sā hi yadā vibbhamati, tadā assamaṇī hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1218_6: Bhikkhu pana vibbhamantopi yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti, tāva bhikkhuyevāti adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1218_7: na vijahatī”ti apare. Sikkhāpaccakkhānenāti liṅge ṭhitasseva sikkhāya paccakkhānena.
tika-vin09t0:1218_8: Yo hi bhikkhuliṅge ṭhitova sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti, tassa kāyalaggampi cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1218_9: vijahatīti. Kālaṅkiriyāyāti maraṇena. Liṅgaparivattanenāti purisaliṅgassa, itthiliṅgassa
tika-vin09t0:1218_10: vā parivattanena, purisassa itthiliṅgapātubhāvena, itthiyā vā purisaliṅgapātubhāvenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1219_1: Yo pana dubbalaṭṭhāne paṭhamaṃ aggaḷaṃ datvā pacchā dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ chinditvā apaneti,
tika-vin09t0:1219_2: adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhijjati. Maṇḍalaparivattanepi eseva nayo. Dupaṭṭassa pana ekasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1219_3: paṭale chidde vā jāte, galite vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhijjati. Khuddakaṃ cīvaraṃ mahantaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1219_4: karoti, mahantaṃ vā khuddakaṃ karoti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhijjati. Ubho koṭiyo majjhe
tika-vin09t0:1219_5: karonto sace pana paṭhamaṃ chinditvā pacchā ghaṭeti, adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhijjati. Atha ghaṭetvā
tika-vin09t0:1219_6: chindati, na bhijjati. Rajakehi dhovāpetvā setaṃ karontassāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānameva.
tika-vin09t0:1219_7: Vassānamāsātikkamenāpīti ettha pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena na kevalaṃ pubbe vuttena
tika-vin09t0:1219_8: dānādinā aṭṭhavidheneva kāraṇena vassikasāṭikā adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati, atha kho vassānamāsātikkamenapīti
tika-vin09t0:1219_9: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Esa nayo ābādhavūpasamenāpīti etthāpi. Vikappanasikkhāpadeti
tika-vin09t0:1220_0: Taṃ atikkāmayatoti ettha tanti cīvaraṃ, kālaṃ vā parāmasatīti āha “taṃ yathāvuttajātippamāṇa”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1220_1: Assāti bhikkhussa. Tassa yo aruṇoti tassa cīvaruppādadivasassa yo atikkanto aruṇo.
tika-vin09t0:1220_2: Cīvaruppādadivasena saddhinti cīvaruppādadivasassa aruṇena saddhiṃ. Divasasaddena
tika-vin09t0:1220_3: cettha taṃdivasanissito aruṇo vutto. Idāni yassa ca nissajjitabbaṃ, yathā ca nissajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1220_4: taṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ gahetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ nayoti tasmiṃ nissajjane ayaṃ vidhi.
tika-vin09t0:1220_5: Aññathāpīti bhāsantarenāpi, yāya kāyaci bhāsāyapīti attho. Paṭibalenāti vattuṃ samatthena.
tika-vin09t0:1220_6: Āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsīti upari saṃvaramāpajjeyyāsi, saṃvutakāyavacīdvāro bhaveyyāsīti
tika-vin09t0:1220_7: attho. Imāni ca “passasī”tiādīni yathākkamaṃ paṭiggāhakadesakehi vattabbavacanāni.
tika-vin09t0:1220_8: Tathā hi “passasī”ti paṭiggāhakena vattabbavacanaṃ, “āma passāmī”ti tadanudesakena
tika-vin09t0:1220_10: suṭṭhu saṃvarissāmī”ti tadanudesakena vattabbavacanaṃ. Iminā ca attano āyatiṃ saṃvare
tika-vin09t0:1220_11: patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Dvīsu, pana sambahulāsu vāti dvīsu vā sambahulāsu vā āpattīsu
tika-vin09t0:1220_12: purimanayeneva vacanabhedo kātabbo. Ñattiyaṃ āpattiṃ sarati vivaratīti ettha “dve
tika-vin09t0:1220_13: āpattiyo”ti vā “sambahulā āpattiyo”ti vā vacanabhedo kātabbo. Dvīsu, bahūsu vā vacanabhedo
tika-vin09t0:1220_14: kātabboti “saṅgho imāni cīvarānī”ti vatthuvasena vacanabhedo kātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1221_0: Evaṃ saṅghassa nissajjanavidhiṃ dassetvā gaṇassa nissajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “gaṇassa
tika-vin09t0:1221_2: “āyasmantāna”ntiādinā vuttavacanabhedaṃ vinā avasesaṃ saṅghassa nissajjanādīsu vuttasadisamevāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1222_0: Idāni puggalassa nissajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “puggalassa panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:1222_1: dvīsu, tīsu vāti dvīsu, tīsu vā āpattīsu ceva dātabbacīvaresu ca. Yathā ca gaṇassa
tika-vin09t0:1222_2: nissajjane, evaṃ dvinnaṃ nissajjanepi pāḷi veditabbā. Yadi hi viseso bhaveyya, yatheva
tika-vin09t0:1222_3: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tiṇṇaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kātuṃ, evañca pana, bhikkhave,
tika-vin09t0:1222_4: kātabbo – byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena te bhikkhū ñāpetabbā”tiādinā nayena tiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1222_5: pārisuddhiuposathaṃ vatvā “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ kātuṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1222_6: evañca pana, bhikkhave, kattabbo – therena bhikkhunā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅga”ntiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1222_7: nayena visuṃyeva dvinnaṃ pārisuddhiuposatho vutto, evaṃ idhāpi visuṃ pāḷiṃ vadeyya.
tika-vin09t0:1222_8: Yasmā pana natthi, tasmā avatvāva gatoti gaṇassa vuttā pāḷiyevettha pāḷi. Āpattippaṭiggahaṇe
tika-vin09t0:1222_9: pana ayaṃ viseso – yathā gaṇassa nissajjitvā āpattiyā desiyamānāya āpattippaṭiggāhako
tika-vin09t0:1222_10: bhikkhu ñattiṃ ṭhapeti, evaṃ aṭṭhapetvā dvīsu aññatarena yathā ekapuggalo paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:1222_11: evaṃ āpatti paṭiggahetabbā. Dvinnañhi ñattiṭṭhapanaṃ nāma natthi. Yadi siyā, dvinnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1222_12: pārisuddhiuposathaṃ visuṃ na vadeyya. Nissaṭṭhacīvaradānepi yathā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato
tika-vin09t0:1222_13: dammī”ti eko vadati, evaṃ “mayaṃ imaṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato demā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Ito
tika-vin09t0:1222_14: garukatarānipi hi ñattidutiyakammāni apaloketvā kātabbānīti vuttāni atthi, tesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1222_15: etaṃ anulomaṃ. Tenevāha “dvinnaṃ panā”tiādi. Nissaṭṭhacīvaraṃ pana dātabbameva, adātuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1222_16: na labbhati. Vinayakammamattameva hetaṃ. Na taṃ tena saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa
tika-vin09t0:1223_0: Anissajjitvā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭanti sakiṃ nivatthaṃ vā sakiṃ pārutaṃ vā kāyato
tika-vin09t0:1223_1: amocetvā divasampi carati, ekameva dukkaṭaṃ. Mocetvā nivāseti vā pārupati vā, payoge
tika-vin09t0:1223_2: payoge dukkaṭaṃ. Dunnivatthaṃ vā duppārutaṃ vā saṇṭhāpentassa anāpatti. Aññassa taṃ
tika-vin09t0:1223_4: sādhakaṃ. Dasāhaṃ anatikkantepi atikkantasaññino, vematikassa ca dukkaṭanti etthāpi
tika-vin09t0:1223_6: atikkante cīvare “anatikkantaṃ ida”nti evaṃ saññino, dasāhe vā atikkante “anatikkanto
tika-vin09t0:1224_1: “tathā”tiādimāha. Tathāti yathā dasāhaṃ atikkante saññābhedena tikapācittiyaṃ, tathā
tika-vin09t0:1224_2: anadhiṭṭhitādīsu sattasu vikappesu adhiṭṭhitādisaññābhedatoti attho. Tattha avissajjite
tika-vin09t0:1224_3: vissajjitasaññinoti kassaci adinne apariccatte “dinnaṃ pariccattaṃ mayā”ti evaṃ saññino.
tika-vin09t0:1224_4: Anaṭṭhe naṭṭhasaññinoti attano cīvarena saddhiṃ bahūni aññesaṃ cīvarāni ekato ṭhapitāni,
tika-vin09t0:1224_5: tāni ce corā haranti, tatresa attano cīvare anaṭṭhe naṭṭhasaññī hoti, tassa naṭṭhasaññino.
tika-vin09t0:1224_6: Esa nayo avinaṭṭhādīsupi. Avilutteti ettha pana gabbhaṃ bhinditvā pasayhāvahāravasena
tika-vin09t0:1225_0: Vissajjiteti aññassa dinne. Kathaṃ pana dinnaṃ hoti, kathaṃ gahitaṃ? “Imaṃ tuyhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1225_1: demi, dadāmi, dajjāmi, oṇojemi, pariccajāmi, vissajjāmi, nissajjāmī”ti vā vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1225_2: “itthannāmassa demi…pe… nissajjāmī”ti vā vadati, sammukhāpi parammukhāpi dinnaṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:1225_3: hoti. “Tuyhaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vutte “mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti vadati, sudinnaṃ, suggahitañca.
tika-vin09t0:1225_4: “Tava santakaṃ karohi, tava santakaṃ hotu, tava santakaṃ karissasī”ti vutte “mama
tika-vin09t0:1225_5: santakaṃ karomi, mama santakaṃ hotu, mama santakaṃ karissāmī”ti vadati, duddinnaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1225_6: duggahitañca. Neva dātā dātuṃ jānāti, na itaro gahetuṃ. Sace pana “tava santakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1225_7: karohī”ti vutte “sādhu, bhante, mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti gaṇhāti, suggahitaṃ, sace pana
tika-vin09t0:1225_8: eko “gaṇhāhī”ti vadati, itaro “na gaṇhāmī”ti vadati, puna so “dinnaṃ mayā tuyhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1225_9: gaṇhāhī”ti vadati, itaropi “na mayhaṃ iminā attho”ti vadati. Tato purimopi “mayā
tika-vin09t0:1225_10: dinna”nti dasāhaṃ atikkāmeti, pacchimopi “mayā paṭikkhitta”nti, kassāpattīti? Na
tika-vin09t0:1225_11: kassaci. Yassa pana ruccati, tena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Yo pana adhiṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:1225_12: vematiko, tena kiṃ kātabbaṃ? Vematikabhāvaṃ ārocetvā “sace anadhiṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati,
tika-vin09t0:1225_13: evaṃ me kappiyaṃ hotī”ti vatvā vuttanayeneva nissajjitabbaṃ. Na hi evaṃ jānāpetvā
tika-vin09t0:1226_0: Yathā ca idaṃ, evaṃ ito parānipīti yathā idaṃ atirekacīvaradhāraṇasikkhāpadaṃ ācāravipatti,
tika-vin09t0:1226_1: evaṃ ito parānipi sikkhāpadāni ācāravipattiyevāti attho. Tenāha “ubhatopātimokkhesū”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1226_2: Ājīvavipattipaccayā pana ṭhapetvā dubbhāsitaṃ cha āpattikkhandhā paññattāti –
tika-vin09t0:1227_0: “Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1227_1: ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa. Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā sañcarittaṃ samāpajjati, āpatti
tika-vin09t0:1227_2: saṅghādisesassa. Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā ‘yo te vihāre vasati, so bhikkhu arahā’ti
tika-vin09t0:1227_3: bhaṇati, paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa. Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhu paṇītabhojanāni
tika-vin09t0:1227_4: agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa. Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā
tika-vin09t0:1227_5: bhikkhunī paṇītabhojanāni agilānā attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
tika-vin09t0:1227_6: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhu sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā
tika-vin09t0:1228_0: Evaṃ pārājikādivasena ṭhapetvā dubbhāsitaṃ ājīvavipattipaccayā cha āpattikkhandhā
tika-vin09t0:1228_1: paññattā. Diṭṭhivipattipaccayā pācittiyadukkaṭavasena dve āpattikkhandhā paññattāti
tika-vin09t0:1228_2: samanubhāsanāya pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissajjane ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, kammavācāpariyosāne
tika-vin09t0:1228_3: pācittiyanti evaṃ diṭṭhivipattipaccayā pācittiyadukkaṭavasena dve āpattikkhandhā
tika-vin09t0:1229_0: Gaṇanupagatāti divasagaṇanaṃ upagatabhāvo. Aññehi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa demā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1229_1: parahatthe dinnampi “na tāva taṃ gaṇanupagaṃ, yāva na hatthaṃ gacchatī”ti cammakkhandhake
tika-vin09t0:1229_2: vuttattā yāva āharitvā vā na dinnaṃ, “tumhākaṃ, bhante, cīvaraṃ uppanna”nti pahiṇitvā
tika-vin09t0:1229_3: vā anārocitaṃ, tāva divasagaṇanaṃ na upeti, anadhiṭṭhitaṃ vaṭṭati. Yadā pana ānetvā
tika-vin09t0:1229_4: dinnaṃ hoti, “uppanna”nti vā sutaṃ, tato paṭṭhāya gaṇanupagaṃ hoti, antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1229_6: dvisamuṭṭhānanti attho. Kāyavācāhi kattabbaadhiṭṭhānavikappanānaṃ akaraṇena kāyavācato,
tika-vin09t0:1229_7: citte pana sati kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Anadhiṭṭhānāvikappanavasena
tika-vin09t0:1229_8: āpajjanato akiriyaṃ. Ajānantopi āpajjatīti nosaññāvimokkhaṃ. Kāyadvāre ca vacīdvāre
tika-vin09t0:1232_0: Bhikkhunāti bhikkhussāti attho, sāmiatthe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Tenāha “purimasikkhāpade
tika-vin09t0:1232_1: viyā”tiādi. Atha kasmā karaṇavaseneva karaṇavacanassa atthaṃ aggahetvā sāmivasena
tika-vin09t0:1232_2: attho veditabboti āha “karaṇavasena hī”tiādi. Hīti kāraṇatthe nipāto. Chinnapalibodhoti
tika-vin09t0:1232_3: chinnacīvarāvāsapalibodho. Ekāva ratti ekarattaṃ, samāsantagatassa atthaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1232_4: cīvarānaṃ samāhāroti ticīvaraṃ. Tena ticīvarena, tīhi cīvarehīti attho. Ekena vippavutthopi
tika-vin09t0:1232_5: hi ticīvarena vippavuttho nāma hoti paṭisiddhapariyāpannena vippavutthattā, avayavepi
tika-vin09t0:1233_1: udositādīnaṃ vasena akatāya patissayavikatiyā adhivacanaṃ. Udositoti yānādīnaṃ bhaṇḍānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1233_2: sālā. Yo “udavasito”tipi vuccati. Aṭṭoti paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ iṭṭhakāhi kato
tika-vin09t0:1233_4: gopānasiyo aggahetvā iṭṭhakāhi eva chadanaṃ hotī”ti apare. “Aṭṭākārena karīyatī”tipi
tika-vin09t0:1233_5: vadanti. Māḷoti ekakūṭasaṅgahito caturassapāsādo, ekakūṭasaṅgahito vā anekakoṇavanto
tika-vin09t0:1233_6: patissayaviseso. “Māḷoti vaṭṭākārena katasenāsana”nti apare. Pāsādoti dīghapāsādo,
tika-vin09t0:1233_7: aḍḍhayogādibhedo aṭṭamāḷahammiyavajjito sabbo vā pāsādo. Hammiyanti muṇḍacchadanapāsādo.
tika-vin09t0:1233_8: “Candiyaṅgaṇayutta”nti apare. Nāvāti thalaṭṭhaudakaṭṭhavasena dvidhā nāvā. Satthoti
tika-vin09t0:1233_9: jaṅghasattho, sakaṭasattho vā. Dhaññakaraṇanti khalaṃ vuccati. Ārāmoti pupphārāmo,
tika-vin09t0:1233_10: phalārāmo vā. Vihāroti saparikkhitto vā aparikkhitto vā sakalo āvāso. “Gehampī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1233_11: keci. Nivesanādīni cettha gāmato bahi niviṭṭhāni gahitāni. Antogāme ṭhitānaṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:1233_13: bahi niviṭṭhā”ti apare. Hatthapāsātikkameti ettha hatthapāso nāma aḍḍhateyyaratanappamāṇo
tika-vin09t0:1233_14: padeso, tassa atikkamo hatthapāsātikkamo, tasmiṃ hatthapāsātikkame. Hatthapāsabbhantare
tika-vin09t0:1233_15: pana vatthuṃ vaṭṭati. Taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā sacepi iddhimā bhikkhu ākāse aruṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1234_0: Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo – sace gāmo ekassa rañño vā bhojakassa vā vasena ekakulassa
tika-vin09t0:1234_1: hoti, pākārādinā parikkhittattā ekūpacāro ca, evarūpe gāme cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā tasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1234_2: gāmabbhantare yathārucitaṭṭhāne vasitabbaṃ, sace aparikkhitto, yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1234_3: nikkhittaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ ghare vasitabbaṃ, tassa gharassa samantato hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1235_0: Sace gāmo vesālikusinārādayo viya nānārājūnaṃ vā bhojakānaṃ vā hoti, vuttappakārena
tika-vin09t0:1235_1: parikkhitto ca, evarūpe gāme yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ ghare vā
tika-vin09t0:1235_2: vatthabbaṃ, tassa gharassa hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ. Yassā vīthiyā gharaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1235_3: tassā vīthiyā tassa gharassa sammukhāṭṭhāne sabhāyaṃ vā gharadvāre vā vatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1235_4: tesaṃ sabhādvārānaṃ hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1236_0: Sace so gāmo aparikkhitto, yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tattha vā tassa hatthapāse
tika-vin09t0:1236_1: vā vatthabbaṃ. Nivesane pana sace ekakulassa nivesanaṃ hoti, parikkhittañca, antonivesane
tika-vin09t0:1236_2: cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā antonivesane vatthabbaṃ. Aparikkhittaṃ ce hoti, yasmiṃ gabbhe
tika-vin09t0:1236_3: cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tasmiṃ vatthabbaṃ, tassa gabbhassa hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1237_0: Sace nānākulassa nivesanaṃ hoti, parikkhittañca, yasmiṃ gabbhe cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1237_1: tasmiṃ gabbhe vatthabbaṃ, sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇadvāramūle vā tesaṃ gabbhadvāramūlānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1237_2: hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ. Aparikkhittaṃ ce, yasmiṃ gabbhe cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1237_3: tasmiṃ gabbhe vatthabbaṃ, tassa gabbhassa hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ. Esa nayo udositādīsupi.
tika-vin09t0:1238_0: Sattho pana jaṅghasattho vā hotu, sakaṭasattho vā. Sace ekakulassa sattho hoti, satthe
tika-vin09t0:1238_1: cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā purato vā pacchato vā sattabbhantarā na vijahitabbā, passato
tika-vin09t0:1238_2: abbhantaraṃ na vijahitabbaṃ. Sace sattho gacchanto gāmaṃ vā nadiṃ vā pariyādiyitvā
tika-vin09t0:1238_3: tiṭṭhati, antopaviṭṭhena saddhiṃ ekābaddho hutvā orañca pārañca pharitvā ṭhito hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1238_4: satthaparihārova labbhati. Atha gāme vā nadiyā vā pariyāpanno hoti antopaviṭṭho,
tika-vin09t0:1238_5: gāmaparihāro ceva nadiparihāro ca labbhati. Sace vihārasīmaṃ atikkamitvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:1238_6: antosīmāya ca cīvaraṃ hoti, vihāraṃ gantvā vasitabbaṃ. Sace bahisīmāya cīvaraṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1238_7: satthasamīpeyeva vasitabbaṃ. Sace gacchanto sakaṭe vā bhagge, goṇe vā naṭṭhe antarā
tika-vin09t0:1238_8: chijjati, yasmiṃ koṭṭhāse cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ, tattha vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1239_0: Khettepi sace ekakulassa khettaṃ hoti, parikkhittañca, antokhette cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin09t0:1239_1: antokhette vatthabbaṃ. Sace aparikkhittaṃ, hatthapāsā cīvaraṃ na vijahitabbaṃ. Sace
tika-vin09t0:1239_2: nānākulassa khettaṃ hoti, parikkhittañca, antokhette cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā khettadvāramūle
tika-vin09t0:1239_3: vā vatthabbaṃ, tassa hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ. Sace aparikkhittaṃ, cīvaraṃ hatthapāsā
tika-vin09t0:1239_4: na vijahitabbaṃ. Esa nayo dhaññakaraṇārāmesu dvīsupi. Vihāre pana nivesane vuttasadisova vinicchayo.
tika-vin09t0:1240_0: Rukkhamūle pana yaṃ majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati, tasmiṃ ṭhāne aviraḷe
tika-vin09t0:1240_1: padese tassa chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsassa antoyeva nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace viraḷasākhassa
tika-vin09t0:1240_2: rukkhassa ātapena phuṭṭhokāse ṭhapeti, aruṇuggamane ca so bhikkhu tassa hatthapāse
tika-vin09t0:1240_3: na hoti, aññasmiṃ ṭhāne tassa chāyāyapi hoti, nissaggiyaṃ hoti. Sace nānākulassa
tika-vin09t0:1240_4: rukkho hoti, cīvarassa hatthapāsā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1241_0: Ajjhokāse pana viñjhāṭaviādīsu araññesupi samuddamajjhe macchabandhānaṃ agamanapathadīpakesupi
tika-vin09t0:1241_1: cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā tato samantā sattabbhantare padese yattha katthaci vasitabbaṃ, ito
tika-vin09t0:1241_2: aññattha vasanto vippavuttho nāma hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1242_0: Imassa pana vitthārassa idha avuttattā, samantapāsādikāyañca vuttattā “ayamettha
tika-vin09t0:1242_1: saṅkhepo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Etthāti “ticīvarena vippavaseyyā”ti etasmiṃ pade. Saṅkhepoti
tika-vin09t0:1242_2: saṅkhepavaṇṇanā. Ettha pana pāḷiyaṃ “gāmo ekūpacāro nānūpacāro”tiādinā avisesena
tika-vin09t0:1242_4: “gāmo ekūpacāro nāma ekakulassa gāmo hoti parikkhitto ca aparikkhitto cā”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1242_6: pana evaṃ avatvā “ekakulassa aṭṭo hoti, nānākulassa aṭṭo hotī”tiādinā nayena ekakulanānākulavasena
tika-vin09t0:1242_7: ca ante “ajjhokāso ekūpacāro nāma agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā ekūpacāro,
tika-vin09t0:1242_8: tato paraṃ nānūpacāroti ca evaṃ ekūpacāranānūpacāratā vibhattā. Tasmā gāmādīsu parikkhittaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1242_9: ekūpacāraṃ, aparikkhittaṃ nānūpacāranti ca, aṭṭādisu yaṃ ekakulassa, taṃ ekūpacāraṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1242_10: yaṃ nānākulassa, taṃ nānūpacāranti ca gahetabbaṃ. Ajjhokāse vuttanayena gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1242_11: Upacāroti hi “gāmo ekūpacāro nānūpacāro”tiādīsu dvāraṃ, “ajjhokāso ekūpacāro”ti ettha
tika-vin09t0:1243_0: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti bhikkhuno saṅghena dinnā sammuti bhikkhusammuti, taṃ vināti
tika-vin09t0:1243_1: attho. Tenāha “yaṃ saṅgho”tiādi. Avippavāsasammutiṃ detīti avippavāsā sammuti, avippavāsāya
tika-vin09t0:1243_2: vā sammuti avippavāsasammuti, taṃ ñattidutiyena kammena detīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1244_1: antarena uttaraṃ santaruttaraṃ, tena santaruttarena, saha antaravāsakena uttarāsaṅgenāti
tika-vin09t0:1244_2: attho. Antoaruṇe paccuddhaṭeti nivattitvā sampāpuṇitumasakkontena tattheva ṭhatvā
tika-vin09t0:1244_3: anto aruṇe paccuddhaṭe. Paccāgantabbanti yathā rogo na kuppati, tathā puna cīvarassa
tika-vin09t0:1244_4: ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ āgantabbaṃ. Yato paṭṭhāya hi satthaṃ vā pariyesati, “gacchāmī”ti ābhogaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1244_5: vā karoti, tato paṭṭhāya vaṭṭati. “Na dāni gamissāmī”ti evaṃ pana dhuranikkhepaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1244_7: ṭhitena paccuddharitabba”nti. Soti yassa sammuti dinnā, so rogo. Laddhakappiyameva
tika-vin09t0:1245_0: Adhiṭṭhitacīvaratāti ticīvarādhiṭṭhānanayena adhiṭṭhitacīvaratā. Vippavāso nāma yadi
tika-vin09t0:1245_1: baddhasīmāyaṃ cīvaraṃ hoti, tato bahi aruṇuṭṭhāpanaṃ. Atha abaddhasīmāyaṃ, yathāvuttagāmādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1245_2: bahi hatthapāsātikkame aruṇuṭṭhāpanaṃ. Baddhasīmāyaṃ pana yattha katthaci cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1245_3: ṭhapetvā antosīmāyameva yattha katthaci vasituṃ vaṭṭati. Idha apaccuddharaṇaṃ akiriyāti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1248_0: Purimasikkhāpade viya etthāpi bhikkhunāti sāmiatthe karaṇavacananti āha “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1248_1: bhikkhunā”tiādi. “Akālacīvaraṃ nāma anatthate kathine ekādasamāse uppannaṃ, atthate
tika-vin09t0:1248_2: kathine sattamāse uppannaṃ, kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ, etaṃ akālacīvaraṃ nāmā”ti padabhājaniyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1248_3: vuttattā “yvāyaṃ anatthate kathine”tiādimāha. Yvāyaṃ cīvarakālo vuttoti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1248_4: Vassānassāti vassānasaṅkhātassa utuno. Pacchimo māso nāma cīvaramāso. Tasmiñhi anatthatepi
tika-vin09t0:1248_5: kathine uppannaṃ cīvaraṃ anadhiṭṭhitaṃ, avikappitaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Pañca māsāti
tika-vin09t0:1248_6: pacchimakattikamāso, hemantikā cattāro cāti pañca māsā. Aññadāti anatthate kathine
tika-vin09t0:1248_7: ekādasamāse, atthate kathine sattamāse. Kālepīti “anatthate kathine cīvaramāso, atthate
tika-vin09t0:1248_8: kathine pañca māsā”ti yathāvuttacīvarakālepi. “Ādinā nayenā”ti iminā “dadāmi dajjāmī”tiādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1248_9: saṅgaho. Kiñcāpi cetāni sabbāni “akālacīvara”nti vuttāni, tathāpi piṭṭhisamayeyeva
tika-vin09t0:1249_0: “Kāle saṅghassa idaṃ akālacīvara”nti dinnaṃ pana akālacīvarasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena
tika-vin09t0:1249_1: vuttaṃ. Yathā piṭṭhisamaye uppannaṃ cīvaraṃ vuṭṭhavassehi, sesehi ca sammukhībhūtehi
tika-vin09t0:1249_2: bhājetuṃ labbhatīti akālacīvaraṃ nāma jātaṃ, tathevidampīti tadidaṃ akālacīvarasāmaññaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1249_3: Yadi evaṃ “puggalassa vā idaṃ tuyhaṃ ‘dammī’tiādinā nayena dinna”nti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1249_4: na hi puggalassa ādissa dinnaṃ kenaci bhājanīyaṃ hotīti? Nāyaṃ virodho, ādissa dānasāmaññato
tika-vin09t0:1249_5: labbhamānamatthaṃ dassetuṃ tathā vuttanti. Attano vā dhanenāti attano kappāsasuttādinā
tika-vin09t0:1249_6: dhanena. Imassa “uppajjeyyā”ti iminā sambandho veditabbo. “Sīmāya detī”tiādi puggalādhiṭṭhānanayena
tika-vin09t0:1249_7: vuttaṃ. Ettha pana sīmāya dānaṃ ekā mātikā, katikāya dānaṃ dutiyā…pe… puggalassa dānaṃ aṭṭhamā.
tika-vin09t0:1250_1: paṭhamaleḍḍupātassa anto upacārasīmāti dasseti. Idāni dutiyaleḍḍupātassapi anto upacārasīmāyevāti
tika-vin09t0:1250_3: Āvāse vaḍḍhante vaḍḍhatīti sace upacārato abahibhūto hutvā āvāso vaḍḍhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1250_4: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “bhikkhūsupi vaḍḍhantesu vaḍḍhatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Sace vihāre sannipatitabhikkhūhi
tika-vin09t0:1250_5: saddhiṃ ekābaddhā hutvā yojanasatampi pūretvā nisīdanti, yojanasatampi upacārasīmāva
tika-vin09t0:1250_6: hoti, sabbesaṃ lābho pāpuṇātī”ti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhikkhunīnaṃ ārāmapavesanasenāsanāpucchanānīti
tika-vin09t0:1250_8: Tathā hi āgantukāya bhikkhuniyā ārāmapavesanaṃ āpucchitabbaṃ, gamikāya saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1250_9: dasavidhaṃ senāsanaṃ. Ettha ca kiñcāpi “bhikkhunīna”nti vuttaṃ, gamikassa pana bhikkhussāpi
tika-vin09t0:1251_2: senāsanaggāhavidhānanti attho. Ādisaddena nissayapaṭippassaddhi, lābhaggāho āgantukavattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1251_3: pūretvā ārāmapavesananti evamādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Imissāva sīmāya vasenāti upacārasīmāyevāti
tika-vin09t0:1251_4: yathāsambhavaṃ anto, bahi ca imassa sabbassa labbhanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1252_0: Lābhatthāya ṭhapitā sīmā lābhasīmā, sā ca kho neva sammāsambuddhena anuññātā, na
tika-vin09t0:1252_1: dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi ṭhapitā, apica kho lābhadāyakehi. Tenāha “yaṃ rājarājamahāmattādayo”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1252_2: Samantāti vihārassa samantā. Yanti suṅkasassādi. “Sīmaṃ ṭhapentī”ti pāṭhaseso. Ekassa
tika-vin09t0:1252_3: rañño āṇāpavattiṭṭhānanti coḷabhogo keraḷabhogoti evaṃ ekekassa rañño āṇāpavattiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1252_4: Dvidhā āpo gato etthāti dīpo, oghena anajjhotthato bhūmibhāgo, sova sīmā dīpasīmā.
tika-vin09t0:1252_5: Tenāha samuddantenā”tiādi. Cakkavāḷasīmā cakkavāḷapabbateneva paricchinnāti āha “ekacakkavāḷapabbataparikkhepabbhantaraṃ cakkavāḷasīmā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1253_0: Sesāti khaṇḍasīmādayo. Khaṇḍasīmāya demāti dinnanti khaṇḍasīmāya kenaci kammena sannipatitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1253_1: saṅghaṃ disvā “khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ saṅghassa demā”ti dinnaṃ. Khaṇḍasīmāya ṭhite rukkhe
tika-vin09t0:1253_2: vā pabbate vā ṭhitopi heṭṭhā vā pathavivemajjhagatopi khaṇḍasīmāyeva ṭhitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1253_3: Samānasaṃvāsasīmāya dinnanti “samānasaṃvāsasīmāya dammī”ti dinnaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi.
tika-vin09t0:1253_4: Khaṇḍasīmā sīmantarikaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti tattha samānasaṃvāsasīmāya abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1253_6: dinnaṃ gāmaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Kasmā? “Ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:1253_7: “Samānasaṃvāsasīmāya dammī”ti dinnaṃ pana gāme ṭhitānampi pāpuṇātīti. Abbhantarasīmāudakukkhepasīmāsu
tika-vin09t0:1253_8: dinnanti tattha uposathādiatthāya sannipatite disvā “imissā abbhantarasīmāya demā”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1253_10: āha “janapadasīmādīsū”tiādi. Ekopi gantvā sabbesaṃ saṅgaṇhituṃ labhatīti ekopi gantvā
tika-vin09t0:1253_11: idha vassaggena bhājetvā gahetvā āgantuṃ labhatīti attho. Ekoti sabhāgo eko bhikkhu,
tika-vin09t0:1253_12: ayampi bhāgameva gahetuṃ labhati. Tenāha “sabhāgānaṃ bhāgaṃ gaṇhātī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1254_0: Evaṃ tāva yo sīmaṃ parāmasitvā deti, tassa dāne vinicchayaṃ vatvā idāni yo “asukasīmāyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1254_1: vattuṃ na jānāti, kevalaṃ “sīmā”ti vacanamattameva jānanto vihāraṃ āgantvā “sīmāya
tika-vin09t0:1254_2: dammī”ti vā “sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghassa dammī”ti vā bhaṇati, tattha vinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1254_3: “yo pana vihāraṃ pavisitvā”tiādimāha. Kataranti katarasīmaṃ. Ahametaṃ bhedaṃ na jānāmīti
tika-vin09t0:1254_4: ahaṃ “asukā sīmā”ti etaṃ vibhāgaṃ na jānāmi. Upacārasīmaṭṭhehi bhājetabbaṃ lābhassa
tika-vin09t0:1255_0: Yattha mayhaṃ dhuvakārā karīyantīti ettha yasmiṃ vihāre tassa cīvaradāyakassa santakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1255_1: saṅghassa pākavattaṃ vā vattati. Yasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū attano bhāraṃ katvā sadā gehe
tika-vin09t0:1255_2: bhojeti, yattha vā anena āvāso vā kārito, salākabhattādīni vā nibaddhāni, ime dhuvakārā
tika-vin09t0:1255_3: nāma. Yena pana sakalopi vihāro patiṭṭhāpito, tattha vattabbameva natthi. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1255_4: “yattha tassa pākavattaṃ vā vattatī”tiādi. Tattha pākavattanti dānavattaṃ. Vattatīti
tika-vin09t0:1255_5: pavattati. Yatoti yasmā vihārā. Yatthāti yasmiṃ vihāre. Sabbatthāti sabbesu vihāresu.
tika-vin09t0:1255_6: Mātikaṃ āropetvāti ekasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū bahutarā, ekasmiṃ thokatarā, ekañca vatthaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1255_7: dhuvakāraṭṭhānañca bahukaṃ, kattha demāti pucchitvā, yadi pana mañco vā pīṭhaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:1255_8: ekameva hoti, taṃ pucchitvā yassa vā vihārassa, ekavihārepi vā yassa senāsanassa
tika-vin09t0:1255_9: so vicāreti, tattha dātabbaṃ. Sacepi “asukabhikkhu gaṇhatū”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Atha
tika-vin09t0:1255_10: “mayhaṃ dhuvakāre dethā”ti vatvā avicāretvāva gacchati, saṅghassapi vicāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1255_11: Evaṃ pana vicāretabbaṃ – “saṅghattherassa vasanaṭṭhāne dethā”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace tattha
tika-vin09t0:1255_12: senāsanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, yattha nappahoti, tattha dātabbaṃ. Sace eko bhikkhu “mayhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1255_13: vasanaṭṭhāne senāsanaparibhogabhaṇḍaṃ natthī”ti vadati, tattha dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1256_0: Saṅghassa dammīti dinnanti “imāni cīvarāni saṅghassa dammī”ti evaṃ dinnaṃ. Tato bahiddhāpīti
tika-vin09t0:1256_1: upacārasīmāto bahiddhāpi. Tehi saddhinti upacārasīmāgatehi saddhiṃ. Ekābaddhānañca
tika-vin09t0:1256_2: pāpuṇāti parisāvasena vaḍḍhitā sīmā hotīti katvāti adhippāyo. Tasmāti yasmā upacārasīmāgatānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1256_3: pāpuṇāti, yasmā ca tato bahiddhāpi upacārasīmokkantehi ekābaddhānaṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmā.
tika-vin09t0:1256_4: Tesanti upacārasīmāgatānaṃ, tato bahiddhā tehi saddhiṃ ekābaddhānañca. Gāhate satīti
tika-vin09t0:1256_5: antevāsikādike gaṇhante sati. Asampattānampīti upacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitehi ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā
tika-vin09t0:1256_6: kālaṃ ghosetvā lābhabhājanaṭṭhānaṃ asampattānampi upacārasīmāya paviṭṭhānaṃ, tehi
tika-vin09t0:1256_7: vā saddhiṃ ekābaddhānaṃ hutvā attano vihāradvāre vā antovihāreyeva vā ṭhitānañcāti
tika-vin09t0:1256_8: attho. Bhāgo dātabboti saṅghanavakassa dinnepīti adhippāyo. Dutiyabhāge pana therāsanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1256_9: āruḷhe āgatānaṃ paṭhamabhāgo na pāpuṇāti. Dutiyabhāgato vassaggena dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1257_0: Sace pana “bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitānaṃ dethā”ti vadanti, na dātabbaṃ. Yadi pana vihāro
tika-vin09t0:1257_1: mahā hoti, therāsanato paṭṭhāya vatthesu dīyamānesu alasajātikā mahātherā pacchā
tika-vin09t0:1257_2: āgacchanti, “bhante, vīsativassānaṃ dīyati, tumhākaṃ ṭhitikā atikkantā”ti na vattabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1257_3: Ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ datvā pacchā ṭhitikāya dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1258_0: “Asukavihāre kira bahucīvaraṃ uppanna”nti sutvā yojanantarikavihāratopi bhikkhū āgacchanti,
tika-vin09t0:1258_1: sampattasampattānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dātabbaṃ, ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro
tika-vin09t0:1259_0: Evaṃ vihāraṃ pavisitvā “imāni cīvarāni saṅghassa dammī”ti dinnesu vinicchayaṃ vatvā
tika-vin09t0:1259_1: idāni bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā “saṅghassa dammī”ti dinnesu vinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1259_2: “yaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ekābaddhaparisāya pāpuṇātīti sace yojanaṃ pharitvā parisā
tika-vin09t0:1259_3: ṭhitā hoti, ekābaddhā ce, sabbesaṃ pāpuṇātīti attho. Ekābaddhatā cettha dvādasahatthabbhantarato
tika-vin09t0:1260_1: dvinnaṃ saṅghānaṃ dammi, bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunisaṅghassa ca dammī”ti vuttepi
tika-vin09t0:1260_2: ubhatosaṅghassa dinnameva hoti. Upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dātabbanti
tika-vin09t0:1260_3: dve bhāge same katvā eko bhāgo bhikkhūnaṃ, eko bhāgo bhikkhunīnaṃ dātabbo. Gahetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1260_4: labhati ubhatosaṅghaggahaṇena gahitattāti adhippāyo. Cetiyassāti thūpādino. Tañhi
tika-vin09t0:1260_5: dhātāyatanādibhāvena citattā, lokassa cittīkāraṭṭhānatāya ca “cetiya”nti vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:1260_6: Na koci visesoti āha “idha pana cetiyassā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1261_0: “Ubhatosaṅghassa ca tuyhañca cetiyassa cā”ti vutte pana dvāvīsatikoṭṭhāse katvā dasa
tika-vin09t0:1261_1: bhikkhūnaṃ, dasa bhikkhunīnaṃ, eko puggalassa, eko cetiyassa dātabbo. Tattha puggalo
tika-vin09t0:1261_2: saṅghatopi attano vassaggena puna gahetuṃ labhati, cetiyassa ekoyeva. Ayaṃ pana vāro
tika-vin09t0:1261_3: yathāvutteneva nayena ñāyatīti katvā idha na vutto. Samantapāsādikāyaṃ pana vuttoyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1262_0: Na majjhe bhinditvā dātabbaṃ “bhikkhunīna”nti puggalikavasena vuttattā. Puggalo visuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1262_1: na labhatīti pubbe viya visuṃ puggalikakoṭṭhāsaṃ na labhati. Pāpuṇanaṭṭhānato ekameva
tika-vin09t0:1262_2: labhatīti attano vassaggena pattabbaṭṭhānato ekameva koṭṭhāsaṃ labhati. Kasmā? Bhikkhusaṅghaggahaṇena
tika-vin09t0:1262_3: gahitattā. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañca tuyhañca cetiyassa cā”ti vuttepi cetiyassa
tika-vin09t0:1262_4: ekapuggalapaṭivīso labbhati, puggalassa visuṃ na labbhati. Tasmā ekaṃ cetiyassa datvā
tika-vin09t0:1262_5: avasesaṃ bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca gaṇetvā bhājetabbaṃ. Tenāha “cetiyassa cāti vutte panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1263_0: Tehi saddhiṃ puggalacetiyaparāmasanaṃ anantaranayasadisamevāti tehi bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi
tika-vin09t0:1263_1: saddhiṃ puggalassa ca cetiyassa ca gahaṇaṃ anantaranayasadisamevāti attho. “Bhikkhūnañca
tika-vin09t0:1263_2: bhikkhunīnañca tuyhañca, bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca cetiyassa ca, bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca
tika-vin09t0:1263_3: tuyhañca cetiyassa cā”ti vuttepi cetiyassa ekapaṭivīso labbhati, puggalassa visuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1263_4: natthi, bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca gaṇetvāva bhājetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. Puggalassa
tika-vin09t0:1263_5: visuṃ na labbhatīti puggalassa visuṃ paṭivīso na labbhati, vassaggena ekova labbhatīti
tika-vin09t0:1263_6: attho. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca cetiyassa cā”ti vutte pana cetiyassa visuṃ paṭivīso labbhatīti
tika-vin09t0:1263_7: āha “cetiyassa pana labbhatī”ti. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tuyhañca cetiyassa cā”ti vuttepi
tika-vin09t0:1263_8: cetiyasseva visuṃ labbhati, na puggalassa. Cetiyassa pana labbhatiyevāti “bhikkhūnañca
tika-vin09t0:1263_9: cetiyassa cā”ti vutte pana cetiyassa visuṃ paṭivīso labbhatīti attho. “Bhikkhūnañca
tika-vin09t0:1263_10: tuyhañca cetiyassa cā”ti vuttepi cetiyasseva visuṃ labbhati, na puggalassa. Bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1264_0: Etthāha – yaṃ panetarahi paṇḍitamanussā sadhātukaṃ paṭimaṃ vā cetiyaṃ vā ṭhapetvā
tika-vin09t0:1264_1: buddhappamukhassa ubhatosaṅghassa dānaṃ denti, paṭimāya vā cetiyassa vā purato ādhārake
tika-vin09t0:1264_2: pattaṃ ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā “buddhānaṃ demā”ti, tattha yaṃ paṭhamaṃ khādanīyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1264_3: bhojanīyaṃ denti, vihāraṃ vā āharitvā “idaṃ cetiyassa demā”ti piṇḍapātañca mālāgandhādīni
tika-vin09t0:1264_4: ca denti, tattha kathaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti? Vuccate – mālāgandhādīni tāva cetiye āropetabbāni,
tika-vin09t0:1264_5: vatthehi paṭākā, telena padīpā kātabbā, piṇḍapātamadhuphāṇitādīni pana yo nibaddhacetiyajaggako
tika-vin09t0:1264_6: hoti pabbajito vā gahaṭṭho vā, tassa dātabbāni. Nibaddhajaggake asati āhaṭabhattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1264_7: ṭhapetvā vattaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Upakaṭṭhe kāle bhuñjitvā pacchāpi vattaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1265_0: Mālāgandhādīsu ca yaṃ kiñci “idaṃ haritvā cetiyapūjaṃ karothā”ti vutte dūrampi haritvā
tika-vin09t0:1265_1: pūjetabbaṃ. “Bhikkhusaṅghassa harā”ti vuttepi haritabbaṃ. Sace pana “ahaṃ piṇḍāya
tika-vin09t0:1265_2: carāmi, āsanasālāyaṃ bhikkhū atthi, te harissantī”ti vutte “bhante, tuyhaṃyeva dammī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1265_3: vadati, bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Atha pana “bhikkhusaṅghassa dassāmī”ti harantassa gacchato
tika-vin09t0:1265_4: antarāva kālo upakaṭṭho hoti, attano pāpetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1266_0: Vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassa dammīti vadatīti “vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassa imāni cīvarāni dammī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1266_1: vadati. Tesaṃ bahisīmaṭṭhānampi pāpuṇātīti atthate kathine bahisīmaṭṭhānampi yāva
tika-vin09t0:1266_2: kathinassa ubbhārā pāpuṇāti, tasmā disāpakkantassāpi sati paṭiggāhake dātabbaṃ. Anatthate
tika-vin09t0:1266_3: pana kathine antohemante, evañca pana vatvā dinnaṃ pacchimavassaṃvuṭṭhānampi pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin09t0:1266_4: Yattha katthacīti yesu kesuci vihāresu. Evaṃ vadatīti “vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassa dammī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1266_5: vadati. Tatra sammukhībhūtānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā. Sace pana
tika-vin09t0:1266_6: “vassaṃ vasantānaṃ dammī”ti vadati, antovasseyeva vassaṃ vasantāva labhanti, chinnavassā
tika-vin09t0:1266_7: na labhanti. Cīvaramāse pana “vassaṃ vasantānaṃ dammī”ti vutte pacchimikāya vassūpagatānaṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:1266_8: pāpuṇāti, purimikāya vassūpagatānañca chinnavassānañca na pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin09t0:1267_0: Cīvaramāsato paṭṭhāya yāva hemantassa pacchimo divaso, tāva “vassāvāsikaṃ demā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1267_1: vutte kathinaṃ atthataṃ vā hotu, anatthataṃ vā, atītavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃyeva pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin09t0:1267_2: Gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya vutte pana mātikā āropetabbā “atītavassāvāsassa
tika-vin09t0:1267_3: pañca māsā atikkantā, anāgato catumāsaccayena bhavissati, kataravassāvāsassa desī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1267_4: Sace “atītavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ dammī”ti vadati, taṃantovassaṃvuṭṭhānameva pāpuṇāti, disā
tika-vin09t0:1268_0: Sace “anāgate vassāvāsikaṃ dammī”ti vadati, taṃ ṭhapetvā vassūpanāyikadivase gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1268_1: Atha “agutto vihāro, corabhayaṃ atthi, na sakkā ṭhapetuṃ, gaṇhitvā vā āhiṇḍitu”nti
tika-vin09t0:1268_2: vutte “sampattānaṃ dammī”ti vadati, bhājetvā gahetabbaṃ. Sace vadati “ito me, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1268_3: tatiye vasse vassāvāsikaṃ na dinnaṃ, taṃ dammī”ti, tasmiṃ antovasse vuṭṭhabhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1268_4: pāpuṇāti. Sace te disā pakkantā, añño vissāsiko gaṇhāti, dātabbaṃ. Atha ekoyeva avasiṭṭho,
tika-vin09t0:1268_5: sesā kālaṅkatā, sabbaṃ ekasseva pāpuṇāti. Sace ekopi natthi, saṅghikaṃ hoti, sammukhībhūtehi bhājitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1269_0: Yehi nimantitehi yāgu pītāti nimantitehi yehi bhikkhūhi yāgu pītā, yehi pana bhikkhācāravattena
tika-vin09t0:1269_1: gharadvārena gacchantehi vā gharaṃ paviṭṭhehi vā yāgu laddhā, yesaṃ vā āsanasālato
tika-vin09t0:1269_2: pattaṃ āharitvā manussehi nītā, yesaṃ vā therehi pesitā, tesaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Sace
tika-vin09t0:1269_3: pana nimantitabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ aññepi bahū āgantvā antogehañca bahigehañca pūretvā
tika-vin09t0:1269_4: nisinnā, dāyako ca evaṃ vadati “nimantitā vā hontu, animantitā vā, yesaṃ mayā yāgu
tika-vin09t0:1269_5: dinnā, sabbesaṃ imāni vatthāni hontū”ti, sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti. Yehi pana therānaṃ hatthato
tika-vin09t0:1269_6: yāgu laddhā, tesaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Atha so “yehi mayhaṃ yāgu pītā, sabbesaṃ hotū”ti
tika-vin09t0:1269_7: vadati, sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti. Bhattakhajjakādīhīti ettha ādisaddenapi cīvarasenāsanabhesajjānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1270_0: Puggalassāti sammukhāsammukhabhūtassa puggalassa. Tenāha “idaṃ cīvara”ntiādi. Sace
tika-vin09t0:1270_1: pana “idaṃ tumhākañceva tumhākaṃ antevāsikānañca dammī”ti evaṃ vadati, therassa ca
tika-vin09t0:1270_2: antevāsikānañca pāpuṇāti. Uddesaṃ gahetuṃ āgato, gahetvā gacchanto ca atthi, tassāpi
tika-vin09t0:1270_3: pāpuṇāti. Tumhehi saddhiṃ nibaddhacārikabhikkhūnaṃ dammī”ti vutte uddesantevāsikānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1270_4: vattaṃ katvā uddesaparipucchādīni gahetvā vicarantānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti. Etthāti
tika-vin09t0:1270_5: aṭṭhasu mātikāsu. Yadi pana ayamettha saṅkhepakathā, vitthāro pana kathaṃ ñātabboti
