tika-vin09t0:1270_6: āha “samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto”ti. Samantapāsādikāyaṃ cīvarakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttoti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1271_0: “Ñātakehi vā me cīvaratthāya pesitaṃ, mittehi vā pesitaṃ, te ābhate cīvare dassantī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1271_1: evaṃ ñātito vā mittato vā paccāsā hotīti veditabbaṃ. Kappiyabhaṇḍenāti kappāsasuttādinā
tika-vin09t0:1271_2: attano dhanena. Saṇhanti sukhumaṃ. Aññaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ labhitvā eva kālabbhantare
tika-vin09t0:1271_3: kāretabbanti aññaṃ mūlacīvarasadisaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ labhitvāyeva māsabbhantare kāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1271_4: Tañca kho satiyāyeva paccāsāya, asatiyā pana paccāsāya mūlacīvaraṃ dasāhaṃ ce sampattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1271_5: tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. Tenāha “sace na labhatī”tiādi. Paccāsācīvarampi parikkhāracoḷaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1271_6: adhiṭṭhātabbanti paṭhamataraṃ uppannaṃ thūlapaccāsācīvarampi sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pi-saddena
tika-vin09t0:1274_0: “Amhākameva ñātī”ti ñāyatīti ñāti, sāva ñātikā, na ñātikā aññātikā, tāya aññātikāya.
tika-vin09t0:1274_1: Tenāha “na ñātikāyā”ti. Mātito vā pitito vāti mātipakkhato vā pitipakkhato vā. Yāva
tika-vin09t0:1274_2: sattamaṃ yuganti yāva sattamassa purisassa, sattamāya vā itthiyā āyuppamāṇaṃ, yāva
tika-vin09t0:1274_3: pitāmahayugaṃ pitāmahiyugaṃ mātāmahayugaṃ mātāmahiyuganti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā yāva
tika-vin09t0:1274_4: sattamaṃ yuganti yāva sattamadvandanti attho. Yugasaddo cettha ekasesanayena daṭṭhabbo
tika-vin09t0:1274_5: “yugo ca yugo ca yugā”ti. Evañhi tattha tattha dvandaṃ gahitaṃ hoti. Kenaci ākārena
tika-vin09t0:1274_6: asambaddhāyāti bhātubhaginibhāgineyyaputtapaputtādīsu yena kenaci ākārena asambaddhāya.
tika-vin09t0:1274_7: Pitā, pitupitā, tassa pitā, tassāpi pitāti evaṃ yāva sattamā yugā, pitā, pitumātā,
tika-vin09t0:1274_8: tassā pitā ca mātā ca bhātā ca bhaginī ca, puttā ca, dhītaro cāti evampi uddhañca
tika-vin09t0:1274_9: adho ca yāva sattamā yugā, pitā, pitubhātā, pitubhaginī, pituputtā, pitudhītaro,
tika-vin09t0:1274_10: tesampi puttadhītuparamparāti evampi yāva sattamā yugā, mātā, mātumātā, tassā mātā,
tika-vin09t0:1274_11: tassāpi mātāti evaṃ yāva sattamā yugā, mātā, mātupitā, tassa pitā ca mātā ca bhātā
tika-vin09t0:1274_12: ca bhaginī ca puttā ca dhītaro cāti evampi uddhañca adho ca yāva sattamā yugā, mātā,
tika-vin09t0:1274_13: mātubhātā, mātubhaginī, mātuputtā, mātudhītaro, tesampi puttadhītuparamparāti evampi
tika-vin09t0:1274_14: yāva sattamā yugā, tāva neva mātusambandhena, na pitusambandhena yā sambaddhā, sā
tika-vin09t0:1275_0: Sākiyāniyo viyāti pañcasatamattā sākiyāniyo viya. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ, tasmā bhikkhubhāve
tika-vin09t0:1275_1: ṭhatvā parivattaliṅgā bhikkhuniyopi idha suddhabhikkhusaṅghe “upasampannā” icceva
tika-vin09t0:1275_2: veditabbā. Ubhatosaṅghe vāti bhikkhunisaṅghe ñatticatutthena, bhikkhusaṅghe ñatticatutthenāti
tika-vin09t0:1275_3: evaṃ ubhatosaṅghe vā. Purāṇacīvaranti ettha cīvaranti nivāsanapārupanupagameva adhippetanti
tika-vin09t0:1275_4: āha “rajitvā”tiādi. Kappaṃ katvāti kappabinduṃ datvā. “Iminā adinnakappaṃ pācittiyavatthu
tika-vin09t0:1275_5: na hotīti dassetī”ti vadanti. Paribhogasīsenāti kāyena phusitvā paribhogasīsena.
tika-vin09t0:1275_6: Aṃseti jattumhi. Matthaketi sīsamatthake. Sace pana paccattharaṇassa heṭṭhā katvā
tika-vin09t0:1275_7: nipajjati, hatthehi vā ukkhipitvā ākāse vitānaṃ katvā sīsena asamphusanto gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1276_0: Kāyavikāraṃ vā karotīti yathā sā “dhovāpetukāmo aya”nti jānāti, evaṃ kāyavikāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1276_1: karoti. “Antodvādasahatthe okāse ṭhatvā upari vā khipatī”ti iminā upacāraṃ muñcitvā
tika-vin09t0:1276_2: orato khipantassa anāpattīti dasseti. Aññassa vā hatthe pesetīti antodvādasahatthe
tika-vin09t0:1276_3: okāse ṭhatvā sikkhamānasāmaṇerasāmaṇeriupāsakaitthiyādīsu yassa kassaci aññassa hatthe
tika-vin09t0:1276_4: vā peseti. Soti upāsako ca sāmaṇero ca. Upasampajjitvā dhovatīti ettha upāsako liṅge
tika-vin09t0:1276_5: parivatte bhikkhunīsu pabbajitvā upasampajjitvā dhovati, sāmaṇero liṅge parivatte
tika-vin09t0:1276_6: bhikkhunīsu upasampajjitvā dhovatīti yathāyogaṃ attho gahetabbo. Sace pana bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin09t0:1276_7: hatthe dinnaṃ hoti, sace liṅge parivatte dhovati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1277_0: Ettha ca ekassa tikkhattuṃ nissajjanābhāvato tīṇipi kārentassa ekena nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1277_1: dvīhi dve dukkaṭāni. Dve kārentassa ekena nissaggiyaṃ, dutiyena dukkaṭaṃ. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1277_2: “dhovanādīni tīṇī”tiādi. “Ekena vatthunā”ti paṭhamaṃ katvā niṭṭhāpitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1277_3: Sace pana “imaṃ cīvaraṃ rajitvā dhovitvā ānehī”ti vutte sā bhikkhunī paṭhamaṃ dhovitvā
tika-vin09t0:1277_4: pacchā rajati, nissaggiyena dukkaṭameva, evaṃ sabbesu viparītavacanesu nayo netabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1277_5: Sace pana “dhovitvā ānehī”ti vuttā dhovati ceva rajati ca, dhovāpanapaccayā eva āpatti,
tika-vin09t0:1277_6: rajane anāpatti. Evaṃ sabbattha. Tenāha “sace pana‘dhovā’ti vuttā”tiādi. Bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1277_7: vasena ekato upasampannāya dhovāpentassa yathāvatthukamevāti āha “bhikkhunisaṅghavasenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1278_0: Aññassa vā santakanti aññassa santakaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpentassāti attho. Nisīdanapaccattharaṇanti
tika-vin09t0:1278_1: aññassa vā attano vā santakaṃ nisīdanañceva paccattharaṇañca. Nivāsanapārupanupagasseva
tika-vin09t0:1278_2: ca idha “purāṇacīvara”nti adhippetattā attano santakampi nisīdanapaccattharaṇaṃ dhovāpentassa
tika-vin09t0:1278_3: dukkaṭameva hoti, na nissaggiyaṃ. Avuttā vā dhovatīti uddesāya vā ovādāya vā āgatā
tika-vin09t0:1278_4: kiliṭṭhacīvaraṃ disvā ṭhapitaṭṭhānato vā gahetvā, “detha ayya, dhovissāmī”ti āharāpetvā
tika-vin09t0:1278_5: vā dhovati ceva rajati ca ākoṭeti ca, ayaṃ avuttā dhovati nāma. Yāpi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1278_6: dhovā”ti daharaṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā āṇāpentassa bhikkhuno vacanaṃ sutvā “āharathayya,
tika-vin09t0:1278_7: ahaṃ dhovissāmī”ti dhovati, tāvakālikaṃ vā gahetvā dhovitvā rajitvā deti, ayampi
tika-vin09t0:1279_1: yaṃ kiñci. “Upacāre ṭhatvā”ti vacanato pesitvā dhovanepi anāpatti. Upacāreti antodvādasahatthe okāse.
tika-vin09t0:1282_0: Channanti khomādīnaṃ channaṃ cīvarānaṃ majjhe. Upacāraṃ muñcitvāti dvādasahatthūpacāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1282_1: muñcitvā. Pi-saddena dhammakathaṃ kathentassa catasso parisā cīvarāni ca nānāvirāgavatthāni
tika-vin09t0:1282_2: ca āharitvā pādamūle ṭhapenti, upacāre vā ṭhatvā upari khipanti, “sace sādiyati,
tika-vin09t0:1282_3: paṭiggahitamevā”ti ettha vattabbameva natthīti dasseti. Khipatūti divā vā rattibhāge
tika-vin09t0:1282_4: vā khipatu. Paṭiggahitameva hotīti kiñcāpi “idaṃ bhikkhuniyā, idaṃ aññesa”nti ñātuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1282_5: na sakkā, tathāpi acittakabhāvena gahitameva hoti. Yassa kassaci pana anupasampannassāti
tika-vin09t0:1282_7: bhikkhuniyā ṭhapitaṃ. Paṃsukūlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvāti “assāmikaṃ ida”nti saññaṃ uppādetvā.
tika-vin09t0:1282_9: gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Aññatra pārivattakāti parivattetabbaṃ parivattaṃ, parivattameva
tika-vin09t0:1282_10: pārivattakaṃ, parivattetvā diyyamānaṃ, taṃ vināti attho. Tenāha “yaṃ antamaso harīṭakakkhaṇḍampī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1282_11: Ābhogaṃ katvāti cittena samannāharitvā. Sace bhikkhunī vassāvāsikampi deti, tampi
tika-vin09t0:1282_12: yathāvuttavidhānaṃ akatvā gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1283_0: Paṭilābhenāti gahaṇena. Tikapācittiyanti tīṇi parimāṇāni assāti tikaṃ,tikañca taṃ
tika-vin09t0:1283_2: tīṇi pācittiyānīti attho. Ekatoupasampannāyāti bhikkhunīnaṃ santike upasampannāya.
tika-vin09t0:1283_3: Tāya hi hatthato aññatra pārivattakā cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ, bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1283_4: santike upasampannāya pana pācittiyameva. “Pattatthavikādimhi ca anadhiṭṭhātabbaparikkhāre”ti
tika-vin09t0:1283_5: iminā bhisicchavimpi saṅgaṇhāti. Sā hi mahantāpi senāsanasaṅgahitattā cīvarasaṅkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1283_6: na gacchatīti neva adhiṭṭhānupagā, na vikappanupagā ca. Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1283_7: “sacepi mañcappamāṇā bhisicchavi hoti, vaṭṭatiyevā”ti. “Hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhātī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1283_8: vacanato pana aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā pesitaggahaṇepi anāpatti. Paṭiggahaṇato, parivattanākaraṇato ca kiriyākiriyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1286_0: Gehassa pati jeṭṭhoti gahapati, taṃ gahapatiṃ, idha pana apabbajito yo koci manusso
tika-vin09t0:1286_1: adhippeto. Tenāha “bhikkhūsu apabbajitamanussa”nti. Eseva nayo gahapatāninti etthāpi.
tika-vin09t0:1286_2: “Viññāpeyyā”ti idaṃ suddhakattuatthe ca hetukattuatthe ca vattatīti āha “yāceyya
tika-vin09t0:1286_3: vā yācāpeyya vā”ti. Yācāpanañcettha attano atthāyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañca pana katvā
tika-vin09t0:1286_4: “anāṇattika”nti idaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Aññatra samayāti sameti ettha, etena vā saṃgacchati
tika-vin09t0:1286_5: satto, sabhāvadhammo vā sahajātādīhi, uppādādīhi vāti samayo, kālo, dhammappavattimattatāya
tika-vin09t0:1286_6: atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ, karaṇaṃ viya ca kappanāmattasiddhena
tika-vin09t0:1286_7: rūpena voharīyati, taṃ samayaṃ ṭhapetvāti attho. Tenāha “yo acchinnacīvaro vā hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1286_8: Tattha rājādīsu yehi kehici acchinnaṃ cīvaraṃ etassāti acchinnacīvaro. Yathāha “acchinnacīvaro
tika-vin09t0:1286_9: nāma bhikkhussa cīvaraṃ acchinnaṃ hoti, rājūhi vā corehi vā dhuttehi vā yehi kehici
tika-vin09t0:1286_10: vā acchinnaṃ hotī”ti. Aggiādīsu yena kenaci naṭṭhaṃ cīvarametassāti naṭṭhacīvaro.
tika-vin09t0:1286_11: Yathāha “naṭṭhacīvaro nāma bhikkhussa cīvaraṃ agginā vā daḍḍhaṃ hoti, udakena vā
tika-vin09t0:1286_12: vūḷhaṃ hoti, undūrehi vā upacikāhi vā khāyitaṃ hoti, paribhogajiṇṇaṃ vā hotī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1286_13: Samayāti aññatrasaddāpekkhāya upayogatthe nissakkavacananti āha “taṃ samaya”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1287_0: Tikapācittiyanti aññātake aññātakasaññivematikaññātakasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1287_1: Samayeti yathāvutte acchinnacīvarakāle ca naṭṭhacīvarakāle ca. Ñātakappavārite vā
tika-vin09t0:1287_2: viññāpentassāti ñātake, pavārite ca “tumhākaṃ santhataṃ dethā”ti yācantassa. Ettha
tika-vin09t0:1287_3: ca saṅghavasena pavārite pamāṇameva yācituṃ vaṭṭati, puggalikavasena pavārite pana
tika-vin09t0:1287_4: yaṃ yaṃ pavārenti, taṃ tameva viññāpetabbaṃ. Yo hi catūhi paccayehi pavāretvā sayameva
tika-vin09t0:1287_5: sallakkhetvā kālānukālaṃ cīvarādīni divase divase yāgubhattādīni deti, evaṃ yena
tika-vin09t0:1287_6: yena attho, taṃ taṃ deti, tassa viññāpanakiccaṃ natthi. Yo pana pavāretvā bālatāya
tika-vin09t0:1287_7: vā satisammosena vā na deti, so viññāpetabbo. Yo “mayhaṃ gehaṃ pavāremī”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1287_8: tassa gehaṃ gantvā yathāsukhaṃ nisīditabbaṃ nipajjitabbaṃ, na kiñci gahetabbaṃ. Yo
tika-vin09t0:1287_9: pana “yaṃ mayhaṃ gehe atthi, taṃ pavāremī”ti vadati, yaṃ tattha kappiyaṃ, taṃ viññāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1287_10: Gehe pana nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā na labbhati. Tassevatthāyāti “aññassā”ti laddhavohārassa
tika-vin09t0:1287_11: tasseva buddharakkhitassa vā dhammarakkhitassa vā atthāya. Attano dhanena gaṇhantassāti
tika-vin09t0:1287_12: attano kappiyabhaṇḍena kappiyavohāreneva gaṇhantassa cetāpentassa, parivattāpentassāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1290_0: Taṃ-saddo cettha pakatatthavacano. Ceti nipātamattaṃ. Ceti vā yadīti attho, tassa
tika-vin09t0:1290_1: “pavāreyyā”ti iminā sambandho veditabbo. Pavāreyya ceti yadi pavāreyyāti attho. “Abhīti
tika-vin09t0:1290_2: upasaggo”ti iminā tassa atthavisesābhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “haritunti attho”ti. Pavārasaddassa
tika-vin09t0:1290_3: icchāyaṃ vattamānattā “icchāpeyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Icchaṃ uppādeyyāti paccaye icchaṃ uppādeyya.
tika-vin09t0:1290_5: Daṭṭhūti daṭṭhuṃ. Chandānurakkhaṇatthañhettha anunāsikalopo. Khematoti nibbhayato.
tika-vin09t0:1290_6: Kāyena vā vācāya vā abhiharitvā nimanteyyāti sambandho. Yathā ca kāyena abhihareyya,
tika-vin09t0:1290_7: vācāya ca, taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ “upanetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ saantaranti antaravāsakasahitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1290_8: Uttaranti uttarāsaṅgaṃ. Paramanti avasānaṃ. Assa cīvarassāti assa samudāyabhūtassa
tika-vin09t0:1290_9: haritabbassa cīvarassa. Tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo hi ayaṃ bāhiratthasamāso yathā “lambakaṇṇo”ti
tika-vin09t0:1290_10: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “nivāsanenā”tiādi. Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena hi sabbe taṃparamaṃyeva gahetuṃ labhanti.
tika-vin09t0:1291_0: Yasmā acchinnasabbacīvarena ticīvaramattakeneva bhikkhunā evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ, aññena
tika-vin09t0:1291_1: pana aññathāpi, tasmā taṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Adhiṭṭhitacīvarassāti
tika-vin09t0:1291_2: ticīvarādhiṭṭhānanayena vā parikkhāracoḷavasena vā yena kenaci adhiṭṭhitacīvarassa,
tika-vin09t0:1291_3: idañca yebhuyyena adhiṭṭhahitvā cīvaraṃ paribhuñjato vuttaṃ, na pana anadhiṭṭhitacīvarassa
tika-vin09t0:1291_4: cīvare acchinne ayaṃ vidhi na sambhavatīti. Yassa vā ticīvarato adhikampi cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1291_5: aññattha atthi, tattha natthi, tenāpi tadā tattha abhāvato dve sādituṃ vaṭṭati. Pakatiyāva
tika-vin09t0:1291_6: santaruttarena caratīti atthatakathinattā vā sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavasena vā avippavāsasammutivasena
tika-vin09t0:1291_7: vā tatiyassa alābhena vā carati. “Dve naṭṭhānī”ti adhikārattā vuttaṃ “dve sāditabbānī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1291_8: Ekaṃ sādiyanteneva samo bhavissatīti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ dvīsu naṭṭhena ekaṃ sādiyantena
tika-vin09t0:1291_9: samo bhavissati ubhinnampi santaruttaraparamatāya avaṭṭhānato. Yassa ekaṃyeva hoti
tika-vin09t0:1292_0: Pañcasu naṭṭhesūti ticīvaraṃ udakasāṭikā saṃkaccikāti imesu pañcasu cīvaresu naṭṭhesu.
tika-vin09t0:1292_1: “Ekasmiṃ vā naṭṭhe”ti vacanavipariṇāmaṃ katvā yojetabbaṃ. Tato uttarīti santaruttaraparamato uttari.
tika-vin09t0:1293_0: Sesakaṃ āharissāmīti dve cīvarāni katvā “sesakaṃ puna āharissāmī”ti attho. Sesakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1293_1: tuyhaṃyeva hotūti vuttassāti dānasamaye evaṃ vuttassa. Sace pana “sesakaṃ āharissāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1293_2: vatvā gahetvā gamanasamayepi “sesakaṃ tuyhaṃyeva hotū”ti vadanti, laddhakappiyameva.
tika-vin09t0:1293_3: Na acchinnanaṭṭhakāraṇā dinnanti bāhusaccādiguṇavasena dinnaṃ. Vuttanayenāti “ñātakappavārite
tika-vin09t0:1293_4: vā viññāpentassa, samaye ca aññassa vā ñātakappavārite tassevatthāya viññāpentassa”ti vuttanayena.
tika-vin09t0:1296_0: Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissāti ettha panāti nipātamattaṃ, tathā eva-saddopi. Tenāha “itthannāmassā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1296_1: Apadisitvāti kathetvā, ārabbhāti vā attho. Aññātakassa gahapatissāti aññātakagahapatināti
tika-vin09t0:1296_2: attho. Karaṇatthe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana idaṃ suviññeyyanti na vicāritaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1296_3: Cīvaraṃ cetāpenti parivattenti etenāti cīvaracetāpannaṃ, cīvaramūlaṃ, na-kāro panettha
tika-vin09t0:1296_4: āgamo, “cīvaracetāpana”ntipi paṭhanti. Taṃ pana yasmā hiraññādīsu aññataraṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1296_5: tasmā “hiraññādika”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha hiraññanti kahāpaṇo vuccati. Ādisaddena suvaṇṇādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1296_6: gahaṇaṃ. Upakkhaṭanti upaṭṭhāpitaṃ. Taṃ upakkharaṇaṃ tesaṃ tathā sajjitanti āha “upakkhaṭaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1296_7: hotīti sajjitaṃ hotī”ti. Saṃharitvā ṭhapitanti rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ. Parivattanañca
tika-vin09t0:1296_8: akatassa kārāpanaṃ, katassa kiṇananti āha “kāretvā vā kiṇitvā vāti attho”ti. Acchādessāmīti
tika-vin09t0:1296_9: pārupessāmīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “vohāravacanameta”nti. Vohāravacananti ca upacāravacananti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1297_0: “Tatra ce so bhikkhū”tiādīsu ko padasambandhoti āha “yatra so gahapati vā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1297_1: Pubbe appavāritoti “dassāmi, kīdisena te, bhante, cīvarena attho, kīdisaṃ te cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1297_2: cetāpemī”ti pubbe avutto. Upasaṅkamitvāti gantvā. Padabhājane pacuravohāravasena
tika-vin09t0:1297_3: “gharaṃ gantvā”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca pacuravohāravasenāti yebhuyyavohāravasena. Yebhuyyena
tika-vin09t0:1297_4: hi gharasāmikaṃ daṭṭhukāmā tassa gharaṃ gacchantīti tatheva bahulavohāro. Vikappanti
tika-vin09t0:1297_5: visiṭṭho kappo vikappo, vi-saddo cettha visiṭṭhattho. Tenāha “visiṭṭhakappa”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1297_6: Iminā vacanatthamāha. “Adhikavidhāna”nti iminā pana adhippāyatthaṃ. Yathā pana tamāpajjatīti
tika-vin09t0:1297_7: yenākārena taṃ vikappaṃ āpajjati. Taṃ dassetunti taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1298_1: “sādhu, bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1301_0: Sundare, “sādhu me, bhante bhagavā, saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu āyācane, idhāpi
tika-vin09t0:1301_1: āyācaneyeva daṭṭhabboti āha “sādhūti āyācane nipāto”ti. Tattha āyācaneti abhimukhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1301_2: yācane, abhipatthanāyanti attho. Parivitakke nipātoti sambandho. Ālapatīti āmanteti.
tika-vin09t0:1301_3: Āyatādīsūti ettha ādisaddena vitthataappitasaṇhānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Yasmā pana na imassa
tika-vin09t0:1301_4: āpajjanamatteneva āpatti sīsaṃ eti, tasmā “tassa vacanenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Payogeti
tika-vin09t0:1302_0: Mahagghaṃ cetāpetukāmaṃ appagghanti vīsatiagghanakaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpetukāmaṃ “alaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1302_1: mayhaṃ tena, dasaagghanakaṃ vā aṭṭhagghanakaṃ vā dehī”ti vadantassāti attho. Evarūpanti
tika-vin09t0:1302_2: evaṃ samabhāgaṃ, iminā samakanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tañca kho agghavaseneva, na pamāṇavasena.
tika-vin09t0:1305: Kasmā iminā nayena attho veditabboti āha “idañhī”tiādi. Hīti kāraṇatthe nipāto. Na koci visesoti āha “kevala”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1308_0: Rājato bhogganti rājato laddhabhoggaṃ. Rājabhoggoti rājāmatto. Rājato bhogoti raññā
tika-vin09t0:1308_1: dinnaṃ issariyaṃ. Iminātiādīti “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1308_2: bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehī”ti idaṃ. Āgamanasuddhinti mūlasuddhiṃ. Yadi hi iminā
tika-vin09t0:1308_3: kappiyanīhārena apesetvā “idaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti peseyya, sopi dūto
tika-vin09t0:1308_4: taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya “idaṃ kho, bhante, āyasmantaṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1308_5: ābhataṃ, paṭiggaṇhātu āyasmā cīvaracetāpanna”nti, tadā paṭikkhipitvāpi kappiyakārakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1308_6: puṭṭhena taṃ niddisituṃ na vaṭṭati. Tenāha “sace hī”tiādi. Akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbhāti
tika-vin09t0:1308_7: hiraññādiṃ ārabbha. Īdisena dūtavacanenāti “paṭiggaṇhātu āyasmā cīvaracetāpanna”nti
tika-vin09t0:1308_8: evarūpena dūtavacanena. Tasmāti yasmā sampaṭicchituṃ akappiyaṃ hoti, tasmā. Suvaṇṇanti
tika-vin09t0:1308_9: jātarūpaṃ. Rajatanti rūpiyaṃ. Kahāpaṇenāti suvaṇṇamayo vā rūpiyamayo vā pākatiko
tika-vin09t0:1308_10: vā kahāpaṇo. Māsakoti lohamāsako vā hotu, dārumāsako vā hotu, jatumāsako vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:1308_11: yo yo yattha yattha janapade yadā yadā vohāraṃ gacchati, antamaso aṭṭhimayopi cammamayopi
tika-vin09t0:1308_12: rukkhaphalabījamayopi samuṭṭhāpitarūpopi asamuṭṭhāpitarūpopi sabbo idha māsakoti
tika-vin09t0:1308_13: veditabbo. Ettha ca yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ rūpiyasikkhāpade vakkhāma.
tika-vin09t0:1309_0: Muttāti hatthikumbhajādikā aṭṭhavidhā muttā. Tathā hi hatthikumbhaṃ varāhadāṭhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1309_1: bhujaṅgasīsaṃ, valāhakaṃ, veḷu, macchasiro, saṅkho, sippīti aṭṭha muttāyoniyo. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:1309_2: yā macchasaṅkhasippijātā, sā sāmuddikā, bhujaṅgajāpi kāci sāmuddikā hoti. Itarā asāmuddikā.
tika-vin09t0:1309_3: Yasmā pana bahulaṃ sāmuddikāva muttā loke dissanti, tatthāpi sippijāva, itarā kadāci.
tika-vin09t0:1309_4: Tasmā sammohavinodaniyaṃ “muttāti sāmuddikamuttā”ti vuttaṃ. Maṇīti ṭhapetvā veḷuriyādike
tika-vin09t0:1309_5: antamaso jātiphalikaṃ upādāya sabbopi nīlapītādivaṇṇabhedo maṇīti veditabbo, pacitvā
tika-vin09t0:1309_6: kato pana kācamaṇiyeveko pattādibhaṇḍamūlatthaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Veḷuriyo
tika-vin09t0:1309_7: nāma vaṃsavaṇṇamaṇi. Saṅkhoti dhamanasaṅkho dhotaviddho ratanamisso, pānīyasaṅkho
tika-vin09t0:1309_8: pana ratanāmissakato, so ca añjanādibhesajjatthāya, bhaṇḍamūlatthāya ca sampaṭicchituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1309_9: vaṭṭati. Silāti dhotaviddhā ratanasaṃyuttā muggavaṇṇā silā. Ratanena pana amissā
tika-vin09t0:1309_10: satthakanisānādiatthāya paṭiggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Ettha ca “ratanasaṃyuttāti suvaṇṇena
tika-vin09t0:1309_11: saddhiṃ yojetvā pacitvā katā”ti vadanti. Pavāḷanti dhotampi adhotampi sabbaṃ pavāḷaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1309_12: Lohitaṅkoti rattamaṇi. Masāragallanti kabaramaṇi. Yaṃ “marakata”ntipi vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:1310_0: Satta dhaññānīti sānulomāni sāliādīni satta dhaññāni. Nīvārādiupadhaññassa pana sāliādimūladhaññantogadhattā
tika-vin09t0:1310_2: nāma antojātadhanakkītakaramarānītappabhedā. Tathā dāso. Khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1310_3: ruhati. Vatthu nāma yasmiṃ aparaṇṇaṃ ruhati. Yattha vā ubhayampi ruhati, taṃ khettaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1310_4: Tadatthāya akatabhūmibhāgo vatthu. Khettavatthusīsena cettha vāpitaḷākādīnipi saṅgahitāneva.
tika-vin09t0:1310_5: Vassikādīnaṃ pupphanako pupphārāmo. Ambaphalādīnaṃ phalanako phalārāmo. Na kevalañca
tika-vin09t0:1310_6: attanoyevatthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati, sacepi koci jātarūparajataṃ ānetvā “idaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1310_7: saṅghassa dammi, ārāmaṃ vā karotha, cetiyaṃ vā bhojanasālādīnaṃ vā aññatara”nti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1310_8: idampi sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati. “Yassa kassaci hi aññassa atthāya sampaṭicchantassa
tika-vin09t0:1310_9: dukkaṭaṃ hotī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha “cetiyasaṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ vā atthāya
tika-vin09t0:1311_0: Sace pana saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā puggalaṃ vā anāmasitvā “idaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ cetiyassa
tika-vin09t0:1311_1: dema, vihārassa dema, navakammassa demā”ti vadanti, paṭikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati. “Ime
tika-vin09t0:1311_2: idaṃ bhaṇantī”ti kappiyakārakānaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. “Cetiyādīnaṃ atthāya tumhe gahetvā
tika-vin09t0:1311_3: ṭhapethā”ti vutte pana “amhākaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1312_0: Veyyāvaccakaroti kiccakaro. Idha pana sabbo kiccakarova “veyyāvaccakaro”ti adhippetoti
tika-vin09t0:1312_1: āha “kappiyakārako”ti. Eso khoti “asukavīthiyaṃ asukaghare asukanāmo”ti parammukhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1312_2: vadati. Itarampīti parammukhāniddiṭṭhampi. “Attho me, āvuso, cīvarenā”ti etaṃ codanālakkhaṇanidassananti
tika-vin09t0:1312_3: sambandho. Tattha codanālakkhaṇanidassananti vācāya codanālakkhaṇanidassanaṃ. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1312_4: “sace hī”tiādi. Idaṃ vā vacanaṃ vattabbanti sambandho. Etassa vā attho yāya kāyaci
tika-vin09t0:1312_5: bhāsāya vattabboti sambandho. “Dehi me cīvaraṃ, āhara me cīvaraṃ, parivattehi me
tika-vin09t0:1312_6: cīvaraṃ, cetāpehi me cīvara”nti etāni pana vacanāni etesaṃ vā attho yāya kāyaci bhāsāya
tika-vin09t0:1312_7: na vattabbo. Tenāha “dehi me”tiādi. Sādheyyāti nipphādeyya. Iccetaṃ kusalanti evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1312_8: yāvatatiyaṃ codanena tassa cīvarassa yadetaṃ abhinipphādanaṃ, etaṃ kusalaṃ sādhu
tika-vin09t0:1313_0: Chakkhattuṃ paramo paricchedo assāti chakkhattuparamaṃ. Idañhi “ṭhātabba”nti imissā
tika-vin09t0:1313_1: kiriyāya visesanaṃ, chakkhattuparamaṃ ṭhānaṃ kātabbanti attho. Tenāha “bhāvanapuṃsakavacanameta”nti,
tika-vin09t0:1313_2: etaṃ bhāve ṭhātabbanti vuttadhātvatthamatte sādhetabbe napuṃsakaliṅgavacananti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1313_3: Na nisīditabbanti “idha, bhante, nisīdathā”ti vuttepi na nisīditabbaṃ. Na āmisaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1313_4: paṭiggahetabbanti yāgukhajjakādibhedaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ “gaṇhatha, bhante”ti yāciyamānenāpi
tika-vin09t0:1313_5: na gaṇhitabbaṃ. Na dhammo bhāsitabboti “maṅgalaṃ vā anumodanaṃ vā bhāsathā”ti yāciyamānenāpi
tika-vin09t0:1313_6: na kiñci bhāsitabbaṃ. Ṭhānaṃ bhañjatīti ṭhitiṃ vināseti. Ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ gahetuṃ āgatena
tika-vin09t0:1313_7: hi taṃ uddissa tuṇhībhūtena ṭhātabbameva, na nisajjādikaṃ kātabbaṃ. Iminā pana taṃ
tika-vin09t0:1313_8: katanti ṭhānaṃ vināsitaṃ hoti. Tenāha “āgatakāraṇaṃ vināsetī”ti. “Āgatakāraṇaṃ nāma
tika-vin09t0:1313_9: ṭhānameva, tasmā ‘na kātabba’nti vāritassa katattā nisajjādīsu katesu chasu ṭhānesu
tika-vin09t0:1313_10: ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ bhañjatī”ti ayamettha adhippāyo. Chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtena uddissa
tika-vin09t0:1313_11: ṭhātabbaṃ. “Na aññaṃ kiñci kātabba”nti hi idaṃ ṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ. Tenevāha “ida”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1313_12: Tattha idanti “catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ, chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtena uddissa
tika-vin09t0:1313_13: ṭhātabba”nti vacanaṃ. Ettha ca “nisīdanādimhi kate puna cīvaraṃ gahetuṃ na labhatī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1313_14: keci. “Dve ṭhānāni parihāyantī”ti aññe. “Ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ parihāyatī”ti apare. Ubhayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1314: “Tatra tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhatī”ti idaṃ codakassa ṭhitaṭṭhitaṭṭhānato apakkamma tatra tatra cīvaraṃ uddissa ṭhānaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Etthāti etesu dvīsu codanāṭṭhānesu.
tika-vin09t0:1315_0: Kiṃ pana sabbakappiyakārakesu evaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti? Na paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Ayañhi
tika-vin09t0:1315_1: kappiyakārako nāma saṅkhepato duvidho niddiṭṭho ca aniddiṭṭho ca. Tattha ca niddiṭṭho
tika-vin09t0:1315_2: duvidho bhikkhunā niddiṭṭho, dūtena niddiṭṭhoti. Aniddiṭṭhopi duvidho mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako,
tika-vin09t0:1315_3: parammukhakappiyakārakoti. Tesu bhikkhunā niddiṭṭho sammukhāsammukhavasena catubbidho
tika-vin09t0:1316_0: Kathaṃ? Idhekacco bhikkhussa cīvaratthāya dūtena akappiyavatthuṃ pahiṇati, dūto ca
tika-vin09t0:1316_1: taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā “idaṃ, bhante, itthannāmena tumhākaṃ cīvaratthāya pahitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1316_2: gaṇhatha na”nti vadati. Bhikkhu “idaṃ na kappatī”ti paṭikkhipati. Dūto “atthi pana
tika-vin09t0:1316_3: te, bhante, veyyāvaccakaro”ti pucchati, puññatthikehi ca upāsakehi “bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1316_4: karothā”ti āṇattā vā bhikkhūnaṃ vā sandiṭṭhā sambhattā keci veyyāvaccakarā honti,
tika-vin09t0:1316_5: tesaṃ aññataro tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhussa santike nisinno hoti, bhikkhu taṃ niddisati
tika-vin09t0:1316_6: “ayaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti. Dūto tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “therassa
tika-vin09t0:1316_7: cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti gacchati, ayaṃ bhikkhunā sammukhāniddiṭṭho.
tika-vin09t0:1317_0: No ce bhikkhussa santike nisinno hoti, apica kho bhikkhu niddisati “asukasmiṃ nāma
tika-vin09t0:1317_1: gāme itthannāmo bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti. So gantvā tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1317_2: datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dadeyyāsī”ti āgantvā bhikkhussa ārocetvā gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1318_0: Na heva kho so dūto attanā āgantvā āroceti, apica kho aññaṃ pahiṇati “dinnaṃ mayā,
tika-vin09t0:1318_1: bhante, tassa hatthe cīvaracetāpannaṃ, cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti, ayaṃ dutiyo bhikkhunā asammukhāniddiṭṭho.
tika-vin09t0:1319_0: Na heva kho aññaṃ pahiṇati, apica kho gacchantova bhikkhuṃ vadati “ahaṃ tassa hatthe
tika-vin09t0:1319_1: cīvaracetāpannaṃ dassāmi, tumhe cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti, ayaṃ tatiyo bhikkhunā asammukhāniddiṭṭhoti
tika-vin09t0:1319_2: evaṃ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho tayo asammukhāniddiṭṭhāti ime cattāro bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhaveyyāvaccakarā
tika-vin09t0:1319_3: nāma. Etesu imasmiṃ rājasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1320_0: Aparo bhikkhu purimanayeneva dūtena pucchito natthitāya vā avicāretukāmatāya vā “natthamhākaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1320_1: kappiyakārako”ti vadati, tasmiñca khaṇe koci manusso āgacchati, dūto tassa hatthe
tika-vin09t0:1320_2: akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “imassa hatthato cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā gacchati, ayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1321_0: Aparo dūto gāmaṃ pavisitvā attanā abhirucitassa kassaci hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā
tika-vin09t0:1321_1: purimanayeneva āgantvā vā āroceti, aññaṃ vā pahiṇati, “ahaṃ asukassa nāma hatthe
tika-vin09t0:1321_2: cīvaracetāpannaṃ dassāmi, tumhe cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā vā gacchati, ayaṃ tatiyo
tika-vin09t0:1321_3: dūtena asammukhāniddiṭṭhoti evaṃ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho, tayo asammukhāniddiṭṭhāti
tika-vin09t0:1321_4: ime cattāro dūtena niddiṭṭhaveyyāvaccakarā nāma. Etesu meṇḍakasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1323_0: “Santi, bhikkhave, manussā saddhā pasannā, te kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe hiraññaṃ upanikkhipanti
tika-vin09t0:1323_1: ‘iminā ayyassa yaṃ kappiyaṃ, taṃ dethā’ti. Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ tato kappiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1323_2: taṃ sādituṃ, na tvevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1324_0: Ettha ca codanāya parimāṇaṃ natthi. Mūlaṃ asādiyantena sahassakkhattumpi codanāya
tika-vin09t0:1324_1: vā ṭhānena vā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ sādituṃ vaṭṭati. No ce deti, aññaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetvāpi
tika-vin09t0:1324_2: āharāpetabbaṃ. Sace icchati, mūlasāmikānampi kathetabbaṃ. No ce icchati, na kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1325_0: Aparo bhikkhu purimanayeneva dūtena pucchito “natthamhākaṃ kappiyakārako”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1325_1: tadañño samīpe ṭhito sutvā “āhara, bho, ahaṃ ayyassa cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā dassāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1325_2: vadati. Dūto “handa, bho, dadeyyāsī”ti tassa hatthe datvā bhikkhussa anārocetvāva
tika-vin09t0:1326_0: Aparo bhikkhuno upaṭṭhākassa vā aññassa vā hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “therassa
tika-vin09t0:1326_1: cīvaraṃ dadeyyāsī”ti ettova pakkamati, ayaṃ parammukhakappiyakārakoti ime dve aniddiṭṭhakappiyakārakā
tika-vin09t0:1327_0: Sace sayameva cīvaraṃ ānetvā denti, gahetabbaṃ. No ce, na kiñci vattabbā. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1327_2: “Dāyako sayamevā”ti iminā bhikkhuṃ paṭikkhipati, na dūtaṃ. Tasmā dūtena niddiṭṭhopi
tika-vin09t0:1327_3: yathāruci codetuṃ vaṭṭati. Mukhaṃ vivaritvā sayameva kappiyakārakattaṃ upagatoti
tika-vin09t0:1327_4: mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako. Evanti “eso kho”tiādinā yathāvuttena ākārena. Dassitā
tika-vin09t0:1328_1: Santikanti samīpaṃ. Tatthāti ettha kathamayamattho labbhatīti āha “samīpatthe hi
tika-vin09t0:1328_2: idaṃ bhummavacana”nti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “gaṅgāyaṃ goyūthāni caranti, kūpe gaggakūla”ntiādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1328_3: viya yasmā samīpādhāre idaṃ sattamīvibhattivacanaṃ, tasmā ayamattho labbhatīti. Evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1328_4: akarontoti sāmaṃ vā agacchanto, dūtaṃ vā apāhento.
tika-vin09t0:1329_0: Ajjaṇho, bhante, āgamehīti, bhante, ajja ekadivasaṃ amhākaṃ tiṭṭha, adhivāsehīti
tika-vin09t0:1329_2: vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni. Tikkhattuṃ codanāya chakkhattuṃ ṭhānena, ūnakatikkhattuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1329_3: codanāya ūnakacchakkhattuṃ ṭhānena laddhepi anāpatti. Appitatāti patiṭṭhāpitatā,
tika-vin09t0:1334_0: Kosiyamissakanti “kosakārakā”ti laddhavohārānaṃ pāṇakānaṃ kosato nibbattaṃ aṃsu kosiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1334_1: tena missaṃ kosiyamissakaṃ. Tena pana kosiyena appakenāpi missitaṃ kosiyamissakameva,
tika-vin09t0:1334_2: na idaṃ abbohārikanti vattuṃ labbhā. Tenāha “ekenāpī”tiādi. Kosiyaṃsunāti kimikosasambhavena
tika-vin09t0:1334_3: aṃsunā. “Antamaso”tiādikaṃ pana imassa sikkhāpadassa acittakattā vuttaṃ. Santhataṃ
tika-vin09t0:1334_4: nāma santharitvā kataṃ avāyimaṃ. Tenāha “same bhūmibhāge”tiādi. Imasseva vacanassa
tika-vin09t0:1335_0: Aññassatthāya kārāpane dukkaṭattā attano atthāya kārāpanavasena “sāṇattika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1335_1: Attanā vippakatapariyosāpananayenāti “attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1335_2: pācittiyaṃ. Attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Parehi
tika-vin09t0:1335_3: vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Parehi vippakataṃ parehi
tika-vin09t0:1335_4: pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti iminā nayena. Vitānādikaraṇeti vitānabhūmattharaṇasāṇipākārabhisibibbohanakaraṇe.
tika-vin09t0:1335_5: Yathā ca vitānādikaraṇe, evaṃ tenākārena paribhogepi anāpatti. “Avāyima”nti vuttattā
tika-vin09t0:1338_0: Kāḷakānanti sabhāvena vā rajanena vā kāḷakānaṃ. Yathāha “kāḷakaṃ nāma dve kāḷakāni
tika-vin09t0:1338_1: jātiyā kāḷakaṃ vā rajanakāḷakaṃ vā”ti. Aññehi amissitānanti aññehi amissitakāḷakānanti
tika-vin09t0:1338_2: attho. “Yathā paṭhame ‘ekenāpi kosiyaṃsunā’ti vuttaṃ, tathā idhāpi ‘ekenāpi aññena
tika-vin09t0:1338_3: amissetvā’ti avuttattā aññena pana missakabhogepi apaññāyamānarūpakaṃ ce ‘suddhakāḷaka’micceva vuccatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1339_0: Ettha ca “idaṃ me, bhante, suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhata”ntiādinā nissajjanavidhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1339_1: veditabbaṃ. Sesanti pubbapayogadukkaṭacatukkapācittiyādikaṃ. Aṅgesu pana “suddhakāḷakabhāvo”ti ayaṃ viseso.
tika-vin09t0:1342_0: Gahetabbāti yathā kāḷakā adhikā na honti, tathā gahetabbā. Ṭhapetvā cettha kāḷakaodāte
tika-vin09t0:1342_1: avasesā gocariyesuyeva saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca dve bhāgāti ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo
tika-vin09t0:1342_2: kāḷakānaṃ adhikaggahaṇassa paṭikkhepavasena sikkhāpadassa paññattattā. Tasmā kāḷakānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1342_3: bhāgadvayato adhikaṃ na vaṭṭati, ūnakaṃ vaṭṭati. Tenāha “ekassāpī”tiādi. Ekassāpi
tika-vin09t0:1342_4: kāḷakalomassa atirekabhāveti tulāya dhārayitvā ṭhapitesu antamaso vātavegenapi pahitassa
tika-vin09t0:1342_5: ekassāpi kāḷakalomassa adhikabhāve satīti attho. “Tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ, catutthaṃ gocariyāna”nti
tika-vin09t0:1342_6: idaṃ pana heṭṭhimaparicchedo tesaṃ adhikaggahaṇe paṭikkhepābhāvato. Tasmā tesaṃ vuttappamāṇato adhikampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1343_0: Ettha ca “idaṃ me, bhante, santhataṃ anādiyitvā dve tule suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1343_1: tulaṃ odātānaṃ, tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena
tika-vin09t0:1343_2: nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ādāya ca vuttaparicchedena anādāya ca karaṇato kiriyākiriyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1343_3: Sesanti pubbapayogadukkaṭacatukkapācittiyādikaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tulaṃ odātānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1343_4: tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karaṇe, bahutaraṃ odātānaṃ bahutaraṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā
tika-vin09t0:1343_5: karaṇe, suddhaṃ odātānaṃ suddhaṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karaṇe ca anāpattīti.
tika-vin09t0:1344_0: Aṅgesu pana paṭhamaṅgaṃ kāḷakānaṃ dvebhāgato atirekabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imāni tīṇi
tika-vin09t0:1344_1: na kevalaṃ anissaṭṭhāneva paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭantīti āha “imāni panā”tiādi. “Paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1344_2: na vaṭṭantī”ti iminā yadi paribhuñjati, dukkaṭanti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1347_0: Yaṃ santhatasammutiṃ detīti sambandho. Gilānassa bhikkhunoti yassa vinā santhatā
tika-vin09t0:1347_1: na phāsu hoti, na sakkoti ca santhataṃ ādāya pakkamituṃ, evaṃbhūtassa gilānassa bhikkhuno.
tika-vin09t0:1347_2: Santhatasammutiṃ detīti “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu gilāno
tika-vin09t0:1347_3: na sakkoti santhataṃ ādāya pakkamitu”ntiādinā padabhājane vuttāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya
tika-vin09t0:1348_0: Sāti santhatasammuti. Vūpasanto vā puna kuppatīti vūpasanto vā so ābādho puna kuppati,
tika-vin09t0:1348_1: anuvassampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati, puna sammutidānakiccaṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Na kevalaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1348_2: tasmiṃyeva roge kuppite, atha kho aññasmiṃ roge kuppitepi gatagataṭṭhāne anuvassaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1348_3: kātuṃ labhati. Teneva hi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “sace arogo hutvā puna mūlabyādhināva
tika-vin09t0:1348_4: gilāno hoti, soyeva parihāro, natthaññaṃ ‘sammutikicca’nti phussadevatthero āha.
tika-vin09t0:1348_5: Upatissatthero pana so vā byādhi paṭikuppatu, añño vā, sakiṃ ‘gilāno’ti nāmaṃ laddhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1348_6: laddhameva, puna ‘sammutikiccaṃ natthī’ti āhā”ti upatissattheravādo pacchā vutto.
tika-vin09t0:1349_0: Ettha ca “idaṃ me, bhante, santhataṃ ūnakachabbassāni kārāpitaṃ aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā
tika-vin09t0:1349_1: nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. “Sesaṃ paṭhamasadisamevā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1349_2: iminā “attanā kataṃ parehi pariyosāpetī”tiādikaṃ atidiṭṭhaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – paripuṇṇe
tika-vin09t0:1349_3: chabbasse vā atirekachabbasse vā anāpatti. Aṅgesu ca chabbassānaṃ antobhāvo nānāttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1352_0: Nisīdanasanthatanti “nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti ettha padabhājaniyaṃ vuttattā
tika-vin09t0:1352_1: sadasaṃ santhataṃ, ettha ca nisīdanaggahaṇaṃ santhate cīvarasaññānivāraṇatthaṃ, yato
tika-vin09t0:1352_2: te bhikkhū kambalacīvarasaññāya santhataṃ chaḍḍetvā dhutaṅgāni samādiyiṃsu. Sayanāsanappayojanattā
tika-vin09t0:1352_3: santhatassa “purāṇasanthataṃ nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yatthāti yasmiṃ santhate. Vidatthimattanti
tika-vin09t0:1352_4: sugatavidatthimattaṃ. Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo cāyaṃ “anāpatti alabhanto thokataraṃ ādiyitvā
tika-vin09t0:1352_5: karotī”ti padabhājane vuttattā. Ekadeseti idāni kattabbanavasanthatassa ekappadese.
tika-vin09t0:1352_6: Vijaṭetvāti viddhaṃsetvā. Anādāti ya-kāralopenāyaṃ niddesoti āha “sati purāṇasanthate aggahetvā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1353_0: Ettha ca “idaṃ me, bhante, nisīdanasanthataṃ anādiyitvā purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā
tika-vin09t0:1353_1: sugatavidatthiṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1353_2: Santhatavissajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattanti bhagavatā santhatāni vippakiṇṇāni disvā
tika-vin09t0:1353_3: “saddhādeyyavinipātane kāraṇaṃ natthi, paribhogupāyaṃ nesaṃ dassessāmī”ti santhatavissajjanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1353_4: paññattaṃ. Kiriyākiriyattā imassa sikkhāpadassa “sesaṃ tatiyasadisamevā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1353_5: dvebhāgasikkhāpadasadisamevāti attho. Ayaṃ pana viseso – purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā
tika-vin09t0:1353_6: sugatavidatthiyā ādāya karaṇe, alabhantassa thokataraṃ ādāya karaṇe, sabbathā alabhantassa
tika-vin09t0:1353_7: anādāya karaṇe ca anāpattīti. Aṅgesu panettha paṭhamaṅgapurāṇasanthatassa sāmantā
tika-vin09t0:1356_0: Addhānamaggappaṭipannassāti addhānameva maggo addhānamaggo, taṃ paṭipannassāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1356_3: addhayojanampi addhānamaggo hoti. Eḷakalomāni cetāni addhānamaggato aññattha uppannāni
tika-vin09t0:1356_4: paṭiggahetuṃ na vaṭṭanti, yato “addhānamaggappaṭipannassā”tiādikaṃ vuttanti anuyogaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1356_6: eḷakalomāni uppajjeyyu”ntiādikaṃ etaṃ sabbaṃ. Vatthumattadīpanamevāti “tena kho pana
tika-vin09t0:1356_7: samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchantassa antarāmagge
tika-vin09t0:1356_8: eḷakalomāni uppajjiṃsū”tiādikassa vatthumattassa dīpanameva. Yattha katthacīti addhānato
tika-vin09t0:1356_9: aññatthāpi yattha katthaci ṭhānesu. Sahatthāti karaṇatthe nissakkavacananti āha “sahatthenā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1356_10: Lakkhaṇavacanañcetaṃ, tasmā yena kenaci sarīrāvayavenāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1356_11: “attanā haritabbānīti attho”ti. Asante hāraketi ettha padānaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇato
tika-vin09t0:1357_0: Ettha ca “imāni me, bhante, eḷakalomāni tiyojanaṃ atikkāmitāni nissaggiyānī”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1357_2: vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni. Vāsādhippāyena gantvā tato paraṃ haraṇeti yattha gato, tattha
tika-vin09t0:1357_3: uddesaparipucchādīnaṃ vā paccayādīnaṃ vā alābhena tato paraṃ aññattha haraṇe, tatopi
tika-vin09t0:1357_4: aññatthāti evaṃ yojanasatampi haraṇe anāpatti. Acchinnaṃ vā nissaṭṭhaṃ vāti corehi
tika-vin09t0:1357_5: acchinnaṃ vā vinayakammakataṃ vā. Katabhaṇḍanti kataṃ bhaṇḍaṃ kambalakojavasanthatādi
tika-vin09t0:1357_6: yaṃ kiñci antamaso suttakena baddhamattampi. Tenāha “antamaso”tiādi. Yo pana tanukapattatthavikantare
tika-vin09t0:1357_7: vā āyogaaṃsabaddhakakāyabandhanādīnaṃ antaresu vā pipphalikādīnaṃ malarakkhaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1357_8: sipāṭikāyaṃ vā antamaso vātābādhiko kaṇṇacchiddepi lomāni pakkhipitvā gacchati, āpattiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1357_9: Suttakena pana bandhitvā pakkhittaṃ katabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, veṇiṃ katvā harati,
tika-vin09t0:1358_0: Paṭhamappaṭilābhoti attano atthāya eḷakalomānaṃ paṭhamuppatti. Etena acchinnanissaṭṭhappaṭiladdhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1358_1: paṭikkhepo. Aññassa ajānantassa yāne pakkhipitvāti gacchante rathādike vā hatthipiṭṭhiādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1358_2: vā sāmikassa ajānantasseva “harissatī”ti pakkhipitvā. Agacchantepi eseva nayo. Sace
tika-vin09t0:1358_3: pana agacchante rathādimhi vā hatthipiṭṭhiādīsu vā ṭhapetvā ārohitvā sāreti, heṭṭhā
tika-vin09t0:1358_4: vā gacchanto codeti, pakkosanto vā anubandhāpeti, “aññaṃ harāpetī”ti vacanato anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1358_5: Ettha ca “ajānantassa yāne”ti iminā jānantassa ce yāne pakkhipati, aññaṃ harāpeti
tika-vin09t0:1361_0: Sakkesūti “sakyā vata, bho kumārā”ti udānaṃ paṭicca “sakyā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ nivāso
tika-vin09t0:1361_1: ekopi janapado ruḷhisaddena “sakkā”ti vuccati, tasmiṃ sakkesu janapade. Chabbaggiyā
tika-vin09t0:1361_2: nāma paṇḍukalohitakādayo chamūlakā, tesaṃ sissā ca.
tika-vin09t0:1364_0: Rajatanti na kevalaṃ rūpiyameva idhādhippetaṃ, atha kho yaṃ kiñci vohāragamanīyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1364_1: kahāpaṇādi ca etaṃ adhippetanti āha “apicā”tiādi. Tattha kahāpaṇoti suvaṇṇamayo vā
tika-vin09t0:1364_2: rūpiyamayo vā pākatiko vā. Lohamāsako nāma tambalohādīhi katamāsako. Dārumāsako nāma
tika-vin09t0:1364_3: sāradārunā vā veḷupesikāya vā antamaso tālapaṇṇenapi rūpaṃ chinditvā katamāsako.
tika-vin09t0:1364_4: Jatumāsako nāma lākhāya vā niyyāsena vā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā katamāsako. “Ye vohāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1364_5: gacchantī”ti iminā pana padena yo yo yattha yattha janapade yadā yadā vohāraṃ gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1364_6: antamaso aṭṭhimayopi cammamayopi rukkhaphalabījamayopi samuṭṭhāpitarūpopi asamuṭṭhāpitarūpopi
tika-vin09t0:1364_7: sabbo saṅgahito. Tadevāti jātarūparajatameva. Hiraññaṃ nāma kahāpaṇo.
tika-vin09t0:1365_0: “Sādiyatī”ti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “gaṇhitukāmo hotī”ti. Na kevalaṃ kāyavācāhi
tika-vin09t0:1365_1: paṭikkhittameva paṭikkhittaṃ hoti, atha kho manasāpi paṭikkhittaṃ paṭikkhittameva
tika-vin09t0:1365_2: hotīti āha “kāyavācāhī”tiādi. Sace pana kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā cittena adhivāseti,
tika-vin09t0:1365_3: kāyavācāhi kattabbassa paṭikkhepassa akaraṇato akiriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyavacīdvāre āpattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1365_4: āpajjati. Manodvāre pana āpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin09t0:1366_0: Eko sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā pādamūle ṭhapeti “tuyhidaṃ hotū”ti, bhikkhu “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1366_1: paṭikkhipati. Upāsako “pariccattaṃ mayā tumhāka”nti gato, añño tattha āgantvā pucchati
tika-vin09t0:1366_2: “kiṃ, bhante, ida”nti. Yaṃ tena ca attanā ca vuttaṃ, taṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. So ce vadati
tika-vin09t0:1366_3: “gopessāmi, bhante, guttaṭṭhānaṃ dassethā”ti, sattabhūmikampi pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā
tika-vin09t0:1366_4: “idaṃ guttaṭṭhāna”nti ācikkhitabbaṃ, “idha nikkhipāhī”ti na vattabbaṃ. Ettāvatā kappiyañca
tika-vin09t0:1366_5: akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitaṃ hoti, dvāraṃ pidahitvā rakkhantena vasitabbaṃ. Sace kiñci
tika-vin09t0:1366_6: vikkāyikabhaṇḍaṃ pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā āgacchati, “idaṃ gahessatha, bhante”ti vutte
tika-vin09t0:1366_7: “upāsaka, atthi amhākaṃ iminā attho, vatthu ca evarūpaṃ nāma saṃvijjati, kappiyakārako
tika-vin09t0:1366_8: natthī”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace so vadati “ahaṃ kappiyakārako bhavissāmi, dvāraṃ vivaritvā
tika-vin09t0:1366_9: dethā”ti, dvāraṃ vivaritvā “imasmiṃ okāse ṭhapita”nti vattabbaṃ, “imaṃ gaṇhā”ti na
tika-vin09t0:1366_10: vattabbaṃ. Evañca kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitameva hoti. So cetaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin09t0:1366_11: tassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ deti, vaṭṭati. Sace adhikaṃ gaṇhāti, “na mayaṃ tava bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1367_0: Saṅghamajjheyeva nissajjitabbanti ettha yasmā rūpiyaṃ nāma akappiyaṃ, tasmā “nissajjitabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1367_1: saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā”ti na vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana taṃ paṭiggahitamattameva,
tika-vin09t0:1367_2: na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpitaṃ, tasmā upāyena paribhogadassanatthaṃ “saṅghamajjheyeva
tika-vin09t0:1367_3: nissajjitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Ādi-saddena telādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Soti yo gahaṭṭho “sappi
tika-vin09t0:1367_4: vā telaṃ vā vaṭṭati upāsakā”tiādinā nayena vutto, so. Aññena labhitvāti bhikkhunā
tika-vin09t0:1367_5: vā ārāmikena vā attano vassaggena labhitvā. Tato nibbattarukkhacchāyāpīti nissaggiyavatthunā
tika-vin09t0:1367_6: āhaṭabījato nibbattarukkhaparicchedena ṭhitacchāyāpi, paricchedātikkantā pana āgantukattā
tika-vin09t0:1367_7: vaṭṭati. No ce chaḍḍetīti atha neva gahetvā gacchati, na chaḍḍeti, “kiṃ mayhaṃ iminā
tika-vin09t0:1367_8: byāpārenā”ti yenakāmaṃ pakkamati. Pañcaṅgasamannāgato “yo na chandāgatiṃ gaccheyya,
tika-vin09t0:1367_9: na dosāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṃ gaccheyya, chaḍḍitāchaḍḍitañca
tika-vin09t0:1367_10: jāneyyā”ti evaṃ vuttapañcaṅgehi samannāgato. Sammannitabboti “suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1367_11: saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ rūpiyachaḍḍakaṃ sammanneyyā”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1368_0: Animittaṃ katvā gūthaṃ viya chaḍḍetabbanti patitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhaṇavasena nimittaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1368_1: akatvā gūthaṃ viya chaḍḍetabbaṃ, akkhīni nimīletvāva nadiyā vā papāte vā vanagahane
tika-vin09t0:1368_2: vā gūthaṃ viya anapekkhena patitokāsaṃ asamannāharantena pātetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1368_4: vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni. Arūpiye rūpiyasaññinoti kharapattādīsu suvaṇṇādisaññino.
tika-vin09t0:1368_5: Ratanasikkhāpadanayenāti “ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā”ti ettha vuttavidhinā.
tika-vin09t0:1371_2: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “purimasikkhāpadena hī”tiādi. Parivattananti sāditarūpiyassa
tika-vin09t0:1372_1: dosaṃ adisvā rūpiyaparivattane. Tassa vāti parivattitassa vā. Dhanassa vāti attano
tika-vin09t0:1372_2: mūladhanassa vā. Attano vā hi arūpiyena parassa rūpiyaṃ cetāpeyya, attano vā rūpiyena
tika-vin09t0:1372_3: parassa arūpiyaṃ, ubhayathāpi rūpiyasaṃvohāro katova hotīti.
tika-vin09t0:1375_0: Rūpiyasaṃvohārassa pana heṭṭhāsikkhāpadena gahitattā kappiyabhaṇḍānamevettha gahaṇanti
tika-vin09t0:1375_1: āha “cīvarādīna”ntiādi. Tattha cīvarādīnaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍānanti antamaso dasikasuttaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1375_2: upādāya cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayānaṃ yesaṃ kesañci kappiyabhaṇḍānaṃ. Kayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1375_3: nāma parabhaṇḍassa gahaṇaṃ. Vikkayaṃ nāma attano bhaṇḍassa dānaṃ. Tenāha “iminā imaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1375_4: dehī”tiādi. Parassāti ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike aññassa. Ettha ca “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1375_5: nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjiṃ, idaṃ me nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1375_6: nayena nissajjitabbaṃ. Tenāha “vuttalakkhaṇavasenā”tiādi. Nanu cettha cīvaradhovane
tika-vin09t0:1375_7: vā kesacchedane vā bhūmisodhanādinavakamme vā parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ nissajjitabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1375_8: nāma natthi, tattha kiṃ kātabbanti āha “asante pācittiyaṃ desetabbamevā”ti. Yathā
tika-vin09t0:1375_9: nissaggiyavatthumhi paribhutte vā naṭṭhe vā pācittiyaṃ deseti, evaṃ idhāpi desetabbamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1376_0: Idaṃ amhākaṃ atthīti idaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ telaṃ vā sappi vā amhākaṃ saṃvijjati. Amhākañca
tika-vin09t0:1376_1: iminā ca iminā ca atthoti amhākañca tadaññena iminā ca iminā ca appaṭiggahitakena
tika-vin09t0:1376_3: ca vematikassa ca dukkaṭa”nti imaṃ nayamatidisati.
tika-vin09t0:1381_0: Avikappitoti “imaṃ pattaṃ tuyhaṃ vikappemī”tiādinā nayena avikappito. Aḍḍhāḷhakodanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1381_1: gaṇhātīti magadhanāḷiyā dvinnaṃ taṇḍulanāḷīnaṃ odanaṃ gaṇhāti. “Magadhanāḷi nāma
tika-vin09t0:1381_2: aḍḍhaterasapalā hotī”ti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Sīhaḷadīpe pakatināḷi mahantā,
tika-vin09t0:1381_3: damiḷanāḷi khuddakā, magadhanāḷi pamāṇayuttā, tāya magadhanāḷiyā diyaḍḍhanāḷi ekā
tika-vin09t0:1381_4: sīhaḷanāḷi hotī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Anuttaṇḍulanti pākato ukkantaṃ taṇḍulaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1381_5: uttaṇḍulaṃ, na uttaṇḍulaṃ anuttaṇḍulaṃ. Sabbasambhārasaṅkhatoti jīrakādisabbasambhārehi
tika-vin09t0:1381_6: saṅkhato. Ālopassa catutthabhāgappamāṇaṃ byañjanaṃ ālopassa anurūpabyañjanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1382_0: Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhapattaṃ dassetvā idāni majjhimomakāni dassetuṃ “ukkaṭṭhato”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1382_1: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – sace nāḷikodanādi sabbampi pakkhittaṃ vuttanayeneva heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1382_2: tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ majjhimo nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:1382_3: ayaṃ majjhimomako nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ na sampāpuṇāti, antogadhameva hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1382_4: ayaṃ majjhimukkaṭṭho nāma patto. Sace pattodanādi sabbampi pakkhittaṃ heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1382_5: tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ omako nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1382_6: omakomako nāma patto. Sace taṃ rājiṃ na sampāpuṇāti, antogadhameva hoti, ayaṃ omakukkaṭṭho
tika-vin09t0:1382_7: nāma pattoti. Tenāha “tesampi vuttanayeneva bhedo veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1383_1: Tattha ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhoti ukkaṭṭhato ukkaṭṭho. Tato hi so “apatto”ti vutto. Omakomakoti
tika-vin09t0:1383_2: omakato omako. Tato hi so “apatto”ti vutto. Ete pana bhājanaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbā,
tika-vin09t0:1383_3: na adhiṭṭhānupagā na vikappanupagā, itare pana satta adhiṭṭhahitvā vā vikappetvā
tika-vin09t0:1383_4: vā paribhuñjitabbā. Tenāha “sesā satta pattā pamāṇayuttā nāmā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1384_0: Tasmāti yasmā satta pattā pamāṇayuttā, tasmā. Samaṇasāruppena pakkanti ettha ayopatto
tika-vin09t0:1384_1: pañcahi pākehi pakko samaṇasāruppena pakko hoti, mattikāpatto dvīhi pākehi. Sace
tika-vin09t0:1384_2: eko pāko ūno hoti, na adhiṭṭhānupago. Yathā ca samaṇasāruppena pakkoyeva adhiṭṭhānupago,
tika-vin09t0:1384_3: tathā ubhopi yaṃ mūlaṃ dātabbaṃ, tasmiṃ dinneyeva adhiṭṭhānupagā. Yadi pana appakampi
tika-vin09t0:1384_4: adinnaṃ hoti, na adhiṭṭhānupagā. Tenāha “sace panā”tiādi. “Kākaṇikamattaṃ nāma diyaḍḍhavīhī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1384_5: vadanti. Sacepi pattasāmiko vadati “yadā tumhākaṃ mūlaṃ bhavissati, tadā dassatha,
tika-vin09t0:1384_6: adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjathā”ti, neva adhiṭṭhānupago hoti. Pākassa hi ūnattā pattasaṅkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1384_7: na gacchati. Mūlassa sakalassa vā ekadesassa vā adinnattā sakabhāvaṃ na upeti, aññasseva
tika-vin09t0:1384_8: santako hoti. Tasmā pāke ca mūle ca niṭṭhiteyeva adhiṭṭhānupago hoti. Yo adhiṭṭhānupago,
tika-vin09t0:1384_9: sveva vikappanupago ca. Tenāha “apaccuddharantenā”tiādi. Apaccuddharantena vikappetabboti
tika-vin09t0:1384_10: purāṇapattaṃ apaccuddharantena navo patto vikappetabboti attho, ṭhapetabboti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1384_11: Kaṅgusitthanti sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ lāmakadhaññasitthanti āha “kaṅgusitthanikkhamanamattena chiddenā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1387_0: Assāti imassa pattassa. Tena ūnapañcabandhanenāti tena ūnapañcabandhanena pattena
tika-vin09t0:1387_1: upalakkhito hutvāti attho. Ūnapañcabandhano hi patto ettha lakkhaṇabhāvena gahito.
tika-vin09t0:1387_2: Tenevāha “itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇe karaṇavacana”nti. Tattha itthambhūtassāti kañci
tika-vin09t0:1387_3: pakāraṃ pattassa. Lakkhīyate anenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, tatiyāvibhattīti
tika-vin09t0:1387_4: attho. “Pakāro”ti ca sāmaññassa bhedako viseso vuccati. Tathā hi ūnapañcabandhanena
tika-vin09t0:1387_5: pattenāti ettha bhikkhubhāvasāmaññassa ūnapañcabandhanapattabhāvo pakāro, taṃ bhikkhu
tika-vin09t0:1387_6: āpanno, tassa patto lakkhaṇaṃ. Yadi aparipuṇṇapañcabandhano patto ūnapañcabandhano
tika-vin09t0:1387_7: nāma hoti, atha kasmā imassa padabhājaniyaṃ abandhanopi vuttoti āha “tatthā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1387_8: Tattha tatthāti vākyopaññāse. Bandhanokāse sati vā asati vā bandhanavirahito patto
tika-vin09t0:1387_9: abandhano, pañcabandhanānaṃ okāso assāti pañcabandhanokāso. Apattoti patto nāma na
tika-vin09t0:1387_10: hotīti attho, pākatikaṃ kātuṃ asamatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. Idañca aññassa viññāpane kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1388_0: Bandhanañca nāmetaṃ yasmā bandhanokāse sati hoti, asati na hoti, tasmā tassa lakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1388_1: bandhanavidhiñca dassetuṃ “yasmiṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Mukhavaṭṭisamīpe pana pattavedhakena
tika-vin09t0:1388_2: vijjhiyamāne kapālassa bahalattā bhijjati, tasmā heṭṭhā vijjhitabbo. Tenāha “heṭṭhimapariyante”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1388_3: Sukhumaṃ vā chiddaṃ katvā bandhitabboti sukhume chidde tipupaṭṭādīhi payojanaṃ natthi,
tika-vin09t0:1388_4: suttaṃ pakkhipitvāva adhiṭṭhātabboti adhippāyo. Na kevalaṃ tipusuttakādināva bandhitabboti
tika-vin09t0:1388_5: āha “phāṇita”ntiādi. Phāṇitaṃ jhāpetvā pāsāṇacuṇṇenāti pāsāṇacuṇṇena saddhiṃ phāṇitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1388_6: pacitvā tathāpakkena pāsāṇacuṇṇenāti attho. Nissajjitabboti “ayaṃ me, bhante, patto
tika-vin09t0:1388_7: ūnapañcabandhanena pattena cetāpito nissaggiyo, imāhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti nissajjitabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1389_0: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1389_1: pattaggāhāpakaṃ sammanneyya, esā ñatti. Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1389_2: bhikkhuṃ pattaggāhāpakaṃ sammannati, yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin09t0:1389_3: pattaggāhāpakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa. Yassa nakkhamati, so bhāseyya. Sammato saṅghena
tika-vin09t0:1389_4: itthannāmo bhikkhu pattaggāhāpako, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin09t0:1390_0: Evaṃ padabhājane vuttāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya sammatena. Pattassa vijjamānaguṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1390_1: vatvāti “ayaṃ, bhante, patto pamāṇayutto sundaro therānurūpo”tiādinā vijjamānānisaṃsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1390_2: vatvā. Pattapariyantoti pariyante ṭhitapatto. Adeseti mañcapīṭhacchattanāgadantakādike
tika-vin09t0:1390_3: adese. Pattassa hi nikkhipanadeso “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ādhāraka”ntiādinā nayena
tika-vin09t0:1390_5: Antarāmagge pana byādhimhi uppanne aññasmiṃ bhājane asati mattikāya limpitvā yāguṃ
tika-vin09t0:1390_6: pacituṃ, udakaṃ vā tāpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Vissajjetīti aññassa deti. Sace pana saddhivihāriko
tika-vin09t0:1390_7: vā antevāsiko vā aññaṃ varapattaṃ ṭhapetvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ sāruppo, ayaṃ therassā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1390_8: gaṇhāti, vaṭṭati. Añño vā taṃ gahetvā attano pattaṃ deti, vaṭṭati. “Mayhameva pattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1391_0: Ñātakappavāriteti ettha saṅghavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne pañcabandhaneneva vaṭṭati, puggalavasena
tika-vin09t0:1391_1: pana pavāritaṭṭhāne ūnapañcabandhanenāpi. Akataviññatti nāma “vada, bhante, paccayenā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1394_0: Uggahetvāti uggahitakaṃ katvā, appaṭiggahitaṃ sayameva gahetvāti attho. Sattāhātikkamepi
tika-vin09t0:1394_1: anāpattikatā cettha anajjhoharaṇīyataṃ āpannattāti veditabbaṃ. Kasmā etena idaṃ dassitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1394_2: hotīti āha “tāni hī”tiādi. Bhisakkassa imāni tena anuññātattāti bhesajjāni, yesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1394_3: kesañci sappāyānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tenāha “bhesajjakiccaṃ karontu vā, mā vā, evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1394_4: laddhavohārānī”ti. Idāni sattāhakālikaṃ nissaggiyavatthubhūtaṃ sappinavanītaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1394_5: “sappi nāma gavādīna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ādisaddena ajikādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. “Yesaṃ maṃsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1394_6: kappatī”ti iminā pākaṭehi goajikādīhi aññānipi migarohitādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Yesañhi
tika-vin09t0:1394_7: khīraṃ atthi, sappipi tesaṃ atthiyeva. Taṃ pana sulabhaṃ vā hotu, dullabhaṃ vā, asaṃmohatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1394_8: vuttaṃ. Makkhikāmadhumevāti khuddakabhamaramadhukarīhi tīhi makkhikāhi kataṃ madhumeva.
tika-vin09t0:1394_9: Ucchurasanti suddhodakasambhinnānaṃ vasena duvidhampi ucchurasaṃ. “Agilānassa guḷodaka”nti
tika-vin09t0:1394_10: pana uddissa anuññātattā udakasambhinno agilānassa vaṭṭati. “Avatthukapakkā vā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1394_11: iminā savatthukapakkā na vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “etaṃ savatthukapakkaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1394_12: vaṭṭati, no vaṭṭatīti pucchaṃ katvā ucchuphāṇitaṃ pacchābhattaṃ novaṭṭanakaṃ nāma
tika-vin09t0:1394_13: natthī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ yuttanti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ucchuvikatīti ucchumhā
tika-vin09t0:1394_14: nibbattā rasalasikādikā. Pakatattānaṃ paṭiniddesattā taṃ-saddassa tena pakatānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1394_15: bhesajjānaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ, na tesaṃ vatthūnanti āha “tāni bhesajjānī”tiādi. Na tesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1394_16: vatthūnīti tesaṃ sappiādīnaṃ kāraṇāni khīrādīni appaṭiggahetvāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1395_0: Vasātelanti “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vasāni bhesajjāni acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ susukāvasaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1395_1: sūkaravasaṃ gadrabhavasa”nti evaṃ anuññātavasānaṃ telaṃ. Yānīti yāni bhesajjāni.
tika-vin09t0:1395_2: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vasāni bhesajjāni acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ susukāvasaṃ sūkaravasaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1395_3: gadrabhavasaṃ kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ telaparibhogena paribhuñjitu”nti
tika-vin09t0:1395_4: evaṃ telatthaṃ vasāpaṭiggahaṇassa anuññātattā “vasātelaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāleti
tika-vin09t0:1395_5: purebhattaṃ. Saṃsaṭṭhanti parissāvitaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā anuññātaṃ, tasmā. “Acchavasa”nti
tika-vin09t0:1395_6: vacanena ṭhapetvā manussavasaṃ sabbesaṃ akappiyamaṃsānaṃ vasāya anuññātattā “ṭhapetvā
tika-vin09t0:1396_0: Sāmaṃ pacitvāti kāleyeva sāmaṃ pacitvā. Nibbattitatelampīti kāleyeva attanā vivecitatelampi.
tika-vin09t0:1396_1: Tividhampi cetaṃ kāleyeva vaṭṭati. Vuttampi cetaṃ “kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1396_2: kāle nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ ce paribhuñjeyya, anāpattī”ti. Pacchābhattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1396_3: pana paṭiggahetuṃ vā kātuṃ vā na vaṭṭatiyeva. Vuttampi cetaṃ “vikāle ce, bhikkhave,
tika-vin09t0:1396_4: paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle nippakkaṃ vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ ce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti tiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1396_5: dukkaṭānaṃ. Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle nippakkaṃ vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1396_6: taṃ ce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dvinnaṃ dukkaṭānaṃ. Kāle ce, bhikkhave, paṭiggahitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1396_7: kāle nippakkaṃ vikāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ ce paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti. “Sattāhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1396_8: nirāmisaparibhogena vaṭṭatī”ti iminā pana “kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ kāle
tika-vin09t0:1396_9: saṃsaṭṭhaṃ telaparibhogena paribhuñjitu”nti idaṃ nirāmisaparibhogaṃ sandhāya vuttanti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1397_0: Yaṃ panettha sukhumarajasadisaṃ maṃsaṃ vā nhāru vā aṭṭhi vā lohitaṃ vā hoti, taṃ
tika-vin09t0:1397_1: abbohārikaṃ. Sace pana anupasampanno tāya paṭiggahitavasāya telaṃ katvā deti, taṃ
tika-vin09t0:1397_2: kathanti āha “anupasampannenā”tiādi. Tadahūti yasmiṃ ahani paṭiggahitaṃ, tadahu.
tika-vin09t0:1397_3: Pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya pana sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati. Tatrāpi abbohārikaṃ abbohārikameva.
tika-vin09t0:1397_4: Yāvakālikavatthūnaṃ aññesaṃ vatthuṃ pacituṃ na vaṭṭatīti sambandho. Tattha yāvakālikavatthūnanti
tika-vin09t0:1397_5: yāvakālikaṃ vatthu etesanti yāvakālikavatthūni, tesaṃ, yāvakālikavatthumantānanti
tika-vin09t0:1397_6: attho. Aññesanti vasātelato aññesaṃ sappiādīnaṃ. Vatthunti khīrādikaṃ yāvakālikabhūtaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1397_7: vatthuṃ, pacituṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva, sāmaṃpākattāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1398_0: Nibbattitasappiṃ vāti yāvakālikavatthuto vivecitasappiṃ vā. Yathā tattha dadhigataṃ
tika-vin09t0:1398_1: vā takkagataṃ vā khayaṃ gamissati, evaṃ jhāpitaṃ vāti attho. Navanītaṃ vāti takkabindūnipi
tika-vin09t0:1398_2: dadhiguḷikāyopi apanetvā sudhotanavanītaṃ pacituṃ vaṭṭati sāmaṃpakkābhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1398_3: Yadi sayaṃpacitasattāhakālikena saddhiṃ āmisaṃ bhuñjati, taṃ āmisaṃ sayaṃpacitasattāhakālikena
tika-vin09t0:1398_4: missitaṃ attano yāvakālikabhāvaṃ sattāhakālikena gaṇhāpeti. Tathā ca yāvakālikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1398_5: apakkampi sayaṃpakkabhāvaṃ upagacchatīti “taṃ pana tadahupurebhattampi sāmisaṃ paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1398_6: na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā sayaṃpakkasattāhakālikaṃ vasātelaṃ, sayaṃbhajjitasāsapādiyāvajīvikavatthūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1398_7: telañca sāmisaṃ tadahupurebhattampi na vaṭṭati, tathā navanītasappīti veditabbaṃ. Vuttañca –
tika-vin09t0:1403_0: Khīrāditoti ettha ādisaddena tilādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Sāmisānipīti na kevalaṃ nirāmisānevāti
tika-vin09t0:1403_1: attho. Pacchābhattato pana paṭṭhāya na vaṭṭantiyeva. Sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti savatthukānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1403_2: paṭiggahitattā. “Tāni paṭiggahetvā”ti hi vuttaṃ. Tenāha “pacchābhattato paṭṭhāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1403_3: Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitakehi kataṃ pana abbhañjanādīsu upanetabbaṃ, purebhattampi
tika-vin09t0:1403_4: ca uggahitakehi kataṃ. Ubhayesampi sattāhātikkamepi anāpatti. Antosattāheti sattāhabbhantare.
tika-vin09t0:1403_6: Adhiṭṭhahitvāti “idāni na mayhaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya bhavissati, idaṃ sappi ca telañca
tika-vin09t0:1403_7: vasā ca muddhanitelatthaṃ vā abbhañjanatthaṃ vā bhavissati, madhu arumakkhanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1403_8: vā phāṇitaṃ gharadhūpanatthaṃ vā bhavissatī”ti evaṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā.
tika-vin09t0:1404_0: Ko panettha yāvakālikayāvajīvikavatthūsu visesoti āha “yāvajīvikānī”tiādi. Yāva aruṇassa
tika-vin09t0:1404_1: uggamanā tiṭṭhatīti sattamadivase katatelaṃ sace yāva aruṇuggamanā tiṭṭhatīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1404_2: Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatasappiādīnanti ettha tāva migarohitādīnaṃ sappi pāḷiyaṃ anāgatasappi,
tika-vin09t0:1404_3: tathā navanītaṃ, nāḷikeranimbakosambakaramandasāsapaādīnaṃ telaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ anāgatatelaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1404_4: tathā madhukapupphaphāṇitaṃ pāḷiyaṃ anāgataphāṇitanti veditabbaṃ. Na sabbaṃ madhukapupphaphāṇitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1404_5: phāṇitagatikanti āha “sītudakenā”tiādi. Sītudakena katanti madhukapupphāni sītudake
tika-vin09t0:1404_6: pakkhipitvā amadditvā puppharase udakagate sati taṃ udakaṃ gahetvā pacitvā kataṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1404_7: “Phāṇitagatikamevā”ti iminā sattāhakālikanti dasseti, na pana nissaggiyavatthunti.
tika-vin09t0:1404_8: Tasmā sattāhaṃ atikkāmayato dukkaṭanti veditabbaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1404_9: sītudakena kataṃ madhukapupphaphāṇitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisaṃ vaṭṭati, pacchābhattato
tika-vin09t0:1404_10: paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva, sattāhātikkame vatthugaṇanāya dukkaṭa”nti. Sace pana
tika-vin09t0:1404_11: khīraṃ pakkhipitvā kataṃ, yāvakālikaṃ. Khaṇḍasakkharaṃ pana khīrajallikaṃ apanetvā
tika-vin09t0:1404_12: sodhenti, tasmā vaṭṭati, ambajambupanasakadalikhajjuriciñcādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ yāvakālikaphalānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1405_0: Kāyikaparibhogaṃ vaṭṭatīti kāyassa vā kāye aruno vā makkhanaṃ vaṭṭati, ajjhoharituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1405_1: pana na vaṭṭati. Yanti sattāhātikkantaṃ bhesajjaṃ. Nirapekkho pariccajitvāti anapekkho
tika-vin09t0:1405_2: sāmaṇerassa datvā. Tanti evaṃ pariccajitvā puna laddhabhesajjaṃ. Evañhi dinnaṃ bhesajjaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1405_3: sace so sāmaṇero abhisaṅkharitvā vā anabhisaṅkharitvā vā tassa bhikkhuno dadeyya,
tika-vin09t0:1405_4: gahetvā natthukammaṃ vā kātabbaṃ, aññaṃ vā kañci paribhogaṃ. Tenāha “ajjhoharitumpi
tika-vin09t0:1405_5: vaṭṭatī”ti. Sace so bālo hoti, dātuṃ na jānāti, aññena bhikkhunā vattabbo “atthi
tika-vin09t0:1405_6: te, sāmaṇera, bhesajja”nti, “āma, bhante, atthī”ti. “Āhara, therassa bhesajjaṃ karissāmā”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1405_7: evampi vaṭṭati. Vatthugaṇanāyāti sappiādivatthugaṇanāya ceva sappipiṇḍādivatthugaṇanāya
tika-vin09t0:1405_8: ca. Missitesu pana ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Ettha ca “idaṃ me, bhante, bhesajjaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1405_9: sattāhātikkantaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1406_0: Sādhāraṇapaññatti. Sattāhaṃ anatikkantepi atikkantasaññino ceva vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1406_1: Atikkante anatikkantasaññinopi vematikassapi nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyameva, tathā anadhiṭṭhitāvissajjitānaṭṭhāvinaṭṭhādaḍḍhāviluttesu
tika-vin09t0:1406_2: adhiṭṭhitādisaññino. Antosattāhaṃ adhiṭṭhite, vissajjite, naṭṭhe, vinaṭṭhe, daḍḍhe,
tika-vin09t0:1406_3: acchinne, vissāsena gahite ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Ācāravipatti. Sappiādīnaṃ attano
tika-vin09t0:1406_4: santakatā, gaṇanupagatā, sattāhātikkamoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Kathinasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1406_5: akiriyaṃ, nosaññāvimokkhaṃ, acittakaṃ, paṇṇattivajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, ticittaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1406_6: tivedanaṃ. Tenāha “sesaṃ cīvaravaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabba”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1409_1: paṭṭhāya. Tāvāti tāva parimāṇe kāle. Jeṭṭhamūlapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchimapāṭipadadivasato
tika-vin09t0:1409_2: paṭṭhāya yāva kattikapuṇṇamā, imasmiṃ pañcamāseti attho. Kālo vassikasāṭikāyātiādināti
tika-vin09t0:1409_3: ettha ādisaddena “samayo vassikasāṭikāya, aññepi manussā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ dentī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1409_4: imesaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Detha me vassikasāṭikacīvarantiādikāyāti ettha ādisaddena pana “āharatha
tika-vin09t0:1409_5: me vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ, parivattetha me vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ, cetāpetha me vassikasāṭikacīvara”nti
tika-vin09t0:1409_6: imesaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Attano aññātakaappavāritesu tadubhayaṃ karontassa kiṃ hotīti āha
tika-vin09t0:1409_8: adente sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ye pana pubbepi denti, tesu vattabhedo natthi. Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1409_9: “ye manussā pubbepi vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ denti, ime pana sacepi attano aññātakaappavāritā
tika-vin09t0:1409_10: honti, vattabhedo natthi tesu satuppādakaraṇassa anuññātattā”ti. Aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena
tika-vin09t0:1409_11: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti “yo pana bhikkhu aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1409_12: viññāpeyya aññatra samayā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti iminā sikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1409_13: pācittiyaṃ. Idaṃ pana pakatiyā vassikasāṭikadāyakesupi hotiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1410_0: Gimhānaṃ pacchimaddhamāsassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāyāti ettha jeṭṭhamūlakāḷapakkhūposathassa
tika-vin09t0:1410_1: pacchimapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva āsāḷhipuṇṇamā, ayamaddhamāso gimhānaṃ pacchimaddhamāso
tika-vin09t0:1410_2: nāma, tassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāyāti attho, addhamāsassa paṭhamapāṭipadadivasato
tika-vin09t0:1410_3: paṭṭhāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kattikamāsassa pacchimadivaso nāma pacchimakattikamāsassa
tika-vin09t0:1410_4: puṇṇamā. Ettāvatāti “māso seso gimhānanti bhikkhunā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1410_5: addhamāso seso gimhānanti katvā nivāsetabba”nti ettakena gaṇanena. Pariyesanakkhettanti
tika-vin09t0:1410_6: pariyesanassa khettaṃ. Etasmiñhi māse vassikasāṭikaṃ aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1410_8: sampiṇḍeti. Etasmiñhi addhamāse pariyesituṃ, kātuṃ, nivāsetuñca vaṭṭati, adhiṭṭhātuṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:1410_9: na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ katthaci potthake “jeṭṭhamūlapuṇṇamāsiyā
tika-vin09t0:1410_10: pacchimapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva kālapakkhuposatho, ayameko addhamāso pariyesanakkhettañceva
tika-vin09t0:1410_11: karaṇakkhettañca. Etasmiñhi antare vassikasāṭikaṃ aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ, laddhaṃ kātuñca
tika-vin09t0:1410_12: vaṭṭati, nivāsetuṃ, adhiṭṭhātuñca na vaṭṭatī”ti vacanaṃ dissati, taṃ pamādalikhitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1410_13: mātikāya virodhatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Addhamāso seso gimhānanti katvā nivāsetabba”nti
tika-vin09t0:1410_14: hi pāḷi. Sabbampīti pariyesanaṃ, karaṇaṃ, nivāsanaṃ, adhiṭṭhānañcāti sabbampi. Iminā
tika-vin09t0:1410_15: ime cattāro māsā pariyesanakaraṇanivāsanādhiṭṭhānānaṃ catunnampi khettanti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1410_16: Etesu hi catūsu māsesu aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ, laddhaṃ kātuṃ, nivāsetuṃ, adhiṭṭhātuñca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1411_0: Vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhīyatīti saṃvaccharaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhīyati vaḍḍhīyati, āruyhatīti attho,
tika-vin09t0:1411_1: vassānassa paṭhamamāsaṃ ukkaḍḍhitvā gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsameva karontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1411_2: Vassūpanāyikadivase adhiṭṭhātabbāti vassānato pubbeyeva dasāhassa atikkantattā vassūpanāyikadivaseyeva
tika-vin09t0:1411_3: adhiṭṭhātabbā. Tañhi divasaṃ atikkāmetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Antovasse pana laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā
tika-vin09t0:1411_4: ca tasmiṃyeva antovasse laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ nātikkāmetabbā, dasāhātikkame
tika-vin09t0:1411_5: niṭṭhitā pana tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbā. Dasāhe appahonte cīvarakālaṃ nātikkāmetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1411_6: Ayaṃ tāva katāya parihāro. Akatāya pana ko parihāroti āha “sace”tiādi. Ekāhampi na
tika-vin09t0:1412_0: So kuto hotīti āha “yāva hemantassa paṭhamadivaso”ti, jeṭṭhamūlapuṇṇamāsito paṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:1412_1: yāva kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchimapāṭipadadivaso, tāvāti attho. Etesu sattasu piṭṭhisamayamāsesūti
tika-vin09t0:1412_3: etesu sattasu piṭṭhisamayanāmakesu māsesu. Satuppādakaraṇenāti “kālo vassikasāṭikāyā”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1412_5: nayena viññattiṃ karontassa. Tena sikkhāpadena anāpattīti aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena
tika-vin09t0:1412_6: anāpatti, iminā pana sikkhāpadena āpattiyeva asamayattā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhadantabuddhadattācariyena –
tika-vin09t0:1416: Tesuyeva ca viññattiṃ, katvā nipphādane tathā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1417_0: Ettha ca “idaṃ me, bhante, vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ atirekamāse sese gimhāne pariyiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1417_1: atirekaddhamāse sese gimhāne katvā paridahitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1418_2: tīṇi pācittiyāni, ekasesaniddeso cāyaṃ, sāmaññaniddeso vā. Ūnakamāsaddhamāsesūti
tika-vin09t0:1418_3: ūnakamāse ceva ūnakaddhamāse ca. Atirekasaññino, vematikassa vā dukkaṭanti ettha
tika-vin09t0:1418_4: “pariyesananivāsanaṃ karontassā”ti pāṭhaseso. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “ūnakamāse sese
tika-vin09t0:1418_5: gimhāne atirekasaññino, vematikassa vā pariyesantassa dukkaṭaṃ, ūnakaddhamāse sese
tika-vin09t0:1418_6: gimhāne ca atirekasaññino, vematikassa vā nivāsentassa dukkaṭa”nti. “Tathā”ti iminā
tika-vin09t0:1418_7: dukkaṭaṃ atidisati, tañca dukkaṭaṃ udakaphusitagaṇanāya akatvā nhānapariyosānavasena
tika-vin09t0:1418_8: payoge payoge kāretabbaṃ, tañca kho vivaṭaṅgaṇe ākāsato patitaudakeneva nhāyantassa,
tika-vin09t0:1418_9: na nhānakoṭṭhakavāpiādīsu ghaṭehi āsittūdakena nhāyantassa. Tenevāha “satiyā vassikasāṭikāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1418_10: Pokkharaṇiyādīsu pana naggassa nhāyantassa anāpattīti sambandho, pokkharaṇiyādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1418_11: pana satiyāpi vassikasāṭikāya naggassa nhāyantassa natthi dukkaṭāpattīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1419_0: Evaṃ antarāpattiyā anāpattiṃ dassetvā idāni nissaggiyena anāpattiṃ dassetuṃ “acchinnacīvarassā”tiādi
tika-vin09t0:1419_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha acchinnacīvarassāti acchinnasesacīvarassa. Tassāpi asamaye nivāsato
tika-vin09t0:1419_2: anāpatti. Esa nayo naṭṭhacīvarassa vāti etthāpi. Yathā cettha nivāsentānaṃ tesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1419_3: anāpatti, evaṃ tattha pariyesantānampīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha pana mahagghavassikasāṭikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1419_4: ṭhapetvā nhāyantassa corūpaddavo āpadā nāmāti āha “anivattha”ntiādi. Āpadāsu vā nivāsayatoti
tika-vin09t0:1419_5: āpadāsu vijjamānāsu asamaye nivāsentassa. Yaṃ pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ “acchinnacīvarassāti
tika-vin09t0:1419_6: etaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tesañhi naggānaṃ kāyovassāpane anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1419_7: Ettha ca mahagghavassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsetvā nhāyantassa corūpaddavo āpadā nāmā”ti acchinnacīvarādino
tika-vin09t0:1419_8: nissaggiyena anāpattiṃ adassetvā naggassa nhāyato dukkaṭeneva anāpattidassanaṃ, taṃ
tika-vin09t0:1419_9: yuttaṃ viya na dissati. Sabbasikkhāpadesu hi mūlāpattiyā eva āpattippasaṅge anāpattidassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1419_10: anāpattivāro ārabhīyati, na antarāpattiyāti, tasmā upaparikkhitabbaṃ. Sacīvaratāti
tika-vin09t0:1422_0: “Datvā”ti yaṃ kiñci paccāsīsamānasseva dānamiha adhippetaṃ, na nissaṭṭhadānanti āha
tika-vin09t0:1422_2: Cajitvā dinnampi hi sakasaññāya gaṇhato natthi pārājikaṃ. Acchindantassāti ekato
tika-vin09t0:1422_3: abaddhāni, visuṃ ṭhapitāni ca bahūni acchindato, “saṅghāṭiṃ āhara, uttarāsaṅgaṃ āharā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1422_4: evaṃ āharāpayato ca. Tenāha “vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo”ti. “Mayā dinnāni sabbāni āharā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1422_5: vadatopi ekavacaneneva sambahulā āpattiyo. Ekaṃ cīvaraṃ pana ekābaddhāni ca bahūni
tika-vin09t0:1422_6: acchindato ekā āpatti. “Acchindā”ti āṇattiyā dukkaṭanti “mayā dinnāni sabbāni gaṇhā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1422_7: āṇattiyā ekaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, acchinnesu pana ekavacaneneva sambahulā pācittiyo. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1422_8: “acchinnesu vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo”ti. Acchinnesūti tenāṇattena acchinnesu cīvaresu.
tika-vin09t0:1422_9: Yattha pana potthakesu “acchinnesu yattakāni āṇattāni, tesaṃ gaṇanāya āpattiyo”ti
tika-vin09t0:1422_10: pāṭho, tattha yattakāni āṇattānīti yattakāni cīvarāni gaṇhituṃ āṇattānīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1422_11: Yaṃ pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ “cīvaraṃ ‘gaṇhā’ti āṇāpeti, ekaṃ dukkaṭaṃ. Āṇatto bahūni
tika-vin09t0:1422_12: gaṇhāti, ekaṃ pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ ekābaddhaṃ sandhāya. Evañca katvā samantapāsādikāya
tika-vin09t0:1422_13: saddhiṃ imāya aṭṭhakathāya na koci virodho. Sace pana “saṅghāṭiṃ gaṇha, uttarāsaṅgaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1422_14: gaṇhā”ti āṇāpeti, vācāya vācāya dukkaṭaṃ. Acchinnesu vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo. Ettha
tika-vin09t0:1422_15: ca “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ bhikkhussa sāmaṃ datvā acchinnaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā
tika-vin09t0:1423_1: tīṇi pācittiyāni. Aññaṃ parikkhāranti pattādiṃ aññaṃ parikkhāraṃ, antamaso sūcimpīti
tika-vin09t0:1423_2: attho. Na kevalaṃ anupasampannassa cīvaraṃyeva acchindato dukkaṭanti āha “anupasampannassa
tika-vin09t0:1423_3: cā”tiādi. Tattha yaṃ kiñcīti cīvaraṃ vā hotu, pattādi, yaṃ kiñci parikkhāraṃ vā.
tika-vin09t0:1423_4: Tassa vissāsaṃ gaṇhantassāti yassa dinnaṃ, tassa vissāsena gaṇhantassa, tatiyatthe
tika-vin09t0:1423_5: cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Upasampannatāti acchindanasamaye upasampannabhāvo. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin09t0:1423_6: upasampannabhāvo pāḷiyaṃ, mātikaṭṭhakathāyañca dānaggahaṇesu dissati, tathāpi anupasampannakāle
tika-vin09t0:1423_7: cīvaraṃ datvā upasampannakāle acchindantassa āpattito acchindanakāleyeva upasampannatā aṅganti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1426_0: Chabbidhaṃ khomasuttādinti “suttaṃ nāma cha suttāni khomaṃ kappāsikaṃ koseyyaṃ kambalaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1426_1: sāṇaṃ bhaṅga”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ chabbidhaṃ khomasuttādiṃ. Tattha khomanti khomavākehi
tika-vin09t0:1426_2: katasuttaṃ. Kappāsikanti kappāsato nibbattaṃ. Koseyyanti kosiyaṃsūhi kantitvā katasuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1426_3: Kambalanti eḷakalomasuttaṃ. Sāṇanti sāṇavākena katasuttaṃ. Bhaṅganti pāṭekkaṃ vākasuttamevāti
tika-vin09t0:1426_4: eke. Pañcahipi missetvā katasuttaṃ pana “bhaṅga”nti veditabbaṃ. Tesaṃ anulomanti
tika-vin09t0:1426_5: tesaṃ khomādīnaṃ anulomaṃ dukūlaṃ pattuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭṭaṃ cīnapaṭṭaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnanti chabbidhaṃ suttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1427_0: Turīti vāyanūpakaraṇo eko daṇḍo, vītavītaṭṭhānaṃ yattha saṃharitvā ṭhapenti. Vemanti
tika-vin09t0:1427_1: vāyanūpakaraṇo eko daṇḍo, suttaṃ pavesetvā yena ākoṭento ghanabhāvaṃ sampādenti.
tika-vin09t0:1427_2: Tassa sabbappayogesu dukkaṭanti tantavāyassa ye te turivemasajjanādikā payogā, tesu
tika-vin09t0:1427_3: sabbesu payogesu bhikkhussa dukkaṭaṃ, tassa tantavāyassa payoge payoge bhikkhussa
tika-vin09t0:1427_4: dukkaṭanti vuttaṃ hoti. Turiādīnaṃ abhāve tesaṃ karaṇatthaṃ vāsipharasuādīnaṃ maggananisānarukkhacchedanādisabbappayogepi
tika-vin09t0:1427_5: eseva nayo. Tantūnaṃ attano santakattā vītavītaṭṭhānaṃ paṭiladdhameva hotīti āha
tika-vin09t0:1427_7: hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Teneva vakkhati “dīghato vidatthimatte, tiriyañca hatthamatte
tika-vin09t0:1427_8: vīte nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti. Ettha ca “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā
tika-vin09t0:1427_9: tantavāyehi vāyāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1428_0: Tenevāti viññāpitatantavāyeneva. Evaṃ idha dukkaṭanti idhāpi tantavāyeneva dīghato
tika-vin09t0:1428_1: vidatthimatte, tiriyaṃ hatthamatte vīte dukkaṭanti attho. Akappiyasuttamayeti viññāpitasuttamaye.
tika-vin09t0:1428_2: Itarasminti aviññattisuttamaye paricchede. Tato ce ūnatarāti vuttappamāṇato ce ūnatarā,
tika-vin09t0:1428_3: antamaso acchimaṇḍalappamāṇāpīti adhippāyo. Kappiyatantavāyenapi akappiyasuttaṃ vāyāpentassa
tika-vin09t0:1428_4: yathā pubbe nissaggiyaṃ, evamidha dukkaṭaṃ. Teneva kappiyañca akappiyañca suttaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1428_5: vāyāpentassa sace pacchimacīvarappamāṇā vā ūnakā vā akappiyasuttaparicchedā honti,
tika-vin09t0:1428_6: tesu paricchedagaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ. Kappiyasuttaparicchedesu anāpatti. Atha ekantarikena
tika-vin09t0:1428_7: vā suttena, dīghato vā kappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ akappiyaṃ katvā vītaṃ hoti, pamāṇayutte paricchede
tika-vin09t0:1429_0: Yadi pana dve tantavāyā honti eko kappiyo eko akappiyo, suttañca akappiyaṃ, te ce
tika-vin09t0:1429_1: vārena vinanti, akappiyatantavāyena vīte pamāṇayutte paricchede paricchede pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1429_2: ūnatare dukkaṭaṃ. Itarena vīte ubhayattha dukkaṭaṃ. Sace dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā ekato
tika-vin09t0:1429_3: vinanti, pamāṇayutte paricchede paricchede pācittiyaṃ. Atha suttaṃ kappiyaṃ, cīvarañca
tika-vin09t0:1429_4: kedārabaddhādīhi saparicchedaṃ, akappiyatantavāyena vīte paricchede paricchede dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1429_5: itarena vīte anāpatti. Sace dvepi ekato vinanti, pamāṇayutte paricchede paricchede
tika-vin09t0:1429_6: dukkaṭaṃ. Atha suttampi kappiyañca akappiyañca, te ce vārena vinanti, akappiyatantavāyena
tika-vin09t0:1429_8: pācittiyaṃ, ūnataresu kappiyasuttamayesu ca dukkaṭaṃ. Kappiyatantavāyena akappiyasuttamayesu
tika-vin09t0:1429_9: pamāṇayuttesu vā ūnakesu vā dukkaṭameva, kappiyasuttamayesu anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1430_0: Atha ekantarikena vā suttena, dīghato vā akappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ akappiyaṃ katvā vinanti,
tika-vin09t0:1430_1: ubhopi vā te vemaṃ gahetvā ekato vinanti, aparicchede cīvare pamāṇayutte paricchede
tika-vin09t0:1430_2: paricchede dukkaṭaṃ, saparicchede paricchedavasena dukkaṭāni. Tenāha “eteneva upāyenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1431_0: Ettha ca tantavāyo tāva aññātakaappavāritato viññattiyā laddho akappiyo, seso kappiyo.
tika-vin09t0:1431_1: Suttampi sāmaṃ viññāpitaṃ akappiyaṃ, sesaṃ, ñātakādivasena uppannañca kappiyanti
tika-vin09t0:1431_3: tīṇi pācittiyāni. Cīvaratthāya viññāpitasuttanti sāmaṃ vā aññena vā cīvaratthāya
tika-vin09t0:1431_4: viññāpitasuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ “sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā”ti vuttaṃ, tathāpi idha
tika-vin09t0:1431_6: aṅgesu vuttattā aññena cīvaratthāya viññāpitasuttampi saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1431_7: Akappiyaviññattiyāti “cīvaraṃ me, āvuso, vāyathā”ti evaṃbhūtāya akappiyaviññattiyā.
tika-vin09t0:1434_0: Cīvarasāmikehi pubbe appavārito hutvāti “kīdisena te, bhante, cīvarena attho, kīdisaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1434_1: te cīvaraṃ vāyāpemi, vada, bhante, yadicchasī”ti cīvarasāmikehi pubbe avutto hutvā.
tika-vin09t0:1434_2: Ettha ca āyatādīhi tīhi suttavaḍḍhanākārena saha vāyanākāraṃ dasseti, suvītādīhi
tika-vin09t0:1434_4: na pana aṅgadassanaṃ suttavaḍḍhanavaseneva āpajjitabbattāti āha “na bhikkhuno piṇḍapātadānamattenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1434_5: Ettha ca “idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ pubbe appavāritena aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye
tika-vin09t0:1434_6: upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpannaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1434_7: veditabbaṃ. Tikapācittiyanti aññātake aññātakasaññivematikañātakasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1437_1: Tāni divasānīti tesu divasesu. Accantamevāti nirantarameva, tesu dasāhesu yattha
tika-vin09t0:1437_2: katthaci divaseti vuttaṃ hoti. Pavāraṇāmāsassāti pubbakattikamāsassa. So hi idha
tika-vin09t0:1437_4: ādiṃ katvā. Pavāraṇāmāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamitoti vā pavāraṇāmāsassa pakāsanato
tika-vin09t0:1437_5: purimassa juṇhapakkhassa pañcamito paṭṭhāyāti attho. Yo panettha “kāmañcesa ‘dasāhaparamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1437_6: atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba’nti imināva siddho, aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya
tika-vin09t0:1437_7: atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapita”nti pāṭho dissati, so pamādapāṭho “dasāhānāgata”nti
tika-vin09t0:1437_8: iminā virodhatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiñca “juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāyā”ti vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyeva
tika-vin09t0:1438_0: Accekacīvaranti accāyikacīvaraṃ vuccati, so ca accāyikabhāvo dāyakassa gamikādibhāvenāti
tika-vin09t0:1438_2: gamiko nāma “senāya vā gantukāmo hoti, pavāsaṃ vā gantukāmo hotī”ti vutto. Aññatarena
tika-vin09t0:1438_3: “vassāvāsikaṃ dassāmī”ti evaṃ ārocetvā dinnanti gamikādīnaṃ aññatarena gamanādīhi
tika-vin09t0:1438_4: kāraṇehi dātukāmena dūtaṃ vā pesetvā, sayaṃ vā āgantvā “vassāvāsikaṃ dassāmī”ti evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1438_5: ārocetvā dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ. Ettha ca “idaṃ me, bhante, accekacīvaraṃ cīvarakālasamayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1438_6: atikkāmitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1439_0: Sesanti “sādhāraṇapaññattī”tiādikaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tattha atirekacīvare atirekacīvarasaññiādino
tika-vin09t0:1439_1: dasāhātikkamo, idha accekacīvare accekacīvarasaññiādino cīvarakālātikkamo. Tathā
tika-vin09t0:1439_2: anaccekacīvare accekacīvarasaññino, vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Jātippamāṇasampannassa
tika-vin09t0:1439_3: accekacīvarassa attano santakatā, dasāhānāgatāya kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamāya uppannabhāvo,
tika-vin09t0:1442_0: Upasampajjantiādīsu viyāti “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti imassa vibhaṅge
tika-vin09t0:1442_2: Ādisaddena pana “anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyyā”tiādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Upagantvāti
tika-vin09t0:1442_3: upasaddassatthamāha. Vasitvāti akkhaṇḍaṃ vasitvā. “Yena yassa hi sambandho, dūraṭṭhampi
tika-vin09t0:1442_4: ca tassa ta”nti vacanato “imassa…pe… iminā sambandho”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha imassāti “upavassa”nti
tika-vin09t0:1442_5: padassa. Vinayapariyāyena araññalakkhaṇaṃ adinnādānapārājike āgataṃ. Tattha hi “gāmā
tika-vin09t0:1442_6: vā araññā vā”ti anavasesato avahāraṭṭhānapariggahena tadubhayaṃ asaṅkarato dassetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1442_7: “ṭhapetvā gāmañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Gāmūpacāro hi loke gāmasaṅkhameva gacchatīti. Idha
tika-vin09t0:1442_8: pana suttantapariyāyena “pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti āgataṃ āraññakaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1442_9: sandhāya. Na hi so vinayapariyāyike araññe vasanto “āraññako panthasenāsano”ti sutte
tika-vin09t0:1442_10: vutto, tasmā tattha āgatameva lakkhaṇaṃ gahetabbanti dassento “sabbapacchimāni āropitena
tika-vin09t0:1442_12: Jiyāya pana āropitāya catuhatthapamāṇa”nti vadanti. Gāmassāti parikkhittassa gāmassa.
tika-vin09t0:1442_13: Indakhīlatoti ummārato. Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānatoti pariyante ṭhitagharassa upacāre
tika-vin09t0:1442_14: ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa paṭhamaleḍḍupātato. Kittakena maggena minitabbanti
tika-vin09t0:1442_15: āha “sace”tiādi. Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vihārassāpi gāmasseva upacāraṃ nīharitvā
tika-vin09t0:1442_16: ubhinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antarā minitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Corānaṃ niviṭṭhokāsādidassanenāti
tika-vin09t0:1442_17: ārāme, ārāmūpacāre ca corānaṃ niviṭṭhokāsādidassanena kāraṇena. Ādisaddena bhuttokāsaṭṭhitokāsanisinnokāsanipannokāsānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1442_18: gahaṇaṃ. Corehi manussānaṃ hataviluttākoṭitabhāvadassanatoti ārāme, ārāmūpacāre ca
