tika-vin09t0:1443_0: Antaraghare nikkhipeyyāti antare antare gharāni ettha, etassāti vā antaragharaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1443_1: gāmo, tasmiṃ ṭhapeyyāti attho. Tenāha “āraññakassā”tiādi. Tañcāti nikkhipanañca.
tika-vin09t0:1443_2: “Mahāpavāraṇāya pavārito hotī”ti idaṃ vassacchedaṃ akatvā vuṭṭhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1443_3: na pana pavāraṇāya aṅgabhāvaṃ. Teneva hi byatirekaṃ dassentena samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1443_4: vuttaṃ “sace pacchimikāya vā upagato hoti chinnavasso vā, nikkhipituṃ na labhatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1443_5: Kattikamāso nāma pubbakattikamāsassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva aparakattikapuṇṇamā,
tika-vin09t0:1443_6: tāva ekūnattiṃsa rattindivā. Eva-saddena kattikamāsato paraṃ na labhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1443_7: Ūnappamāṇe tāva araññalakkhaṇāyogato na labhatu, kasmā gāvutato atirekappamāṇe na
tika-vin09t0:1443_8: labhatīti āha “yatra hī”tiādi. Nimantito pana addhayojanampi yojanampi gantvā vasituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1443_9: pacceti, idamappamāṇaṃ. Sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayameva hotīti sāsaṅkañceva sappaṭibhayañca
tika-vin09t0:1443_10: hoti. Eva-saddena anāsaṅkaappaṭibhayehi aṅgayuttepi senāsane vasanto nikkhipituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1443_11: na labhatīti dasseti. Ettāvatā purimikāya upagantvā akkhaṇḍaṃ katvā vuṭṭhavasso yaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1443_12: gāmaṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā pañcadhanusatikapacchime āraññakasenāsane viharati, tasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1443_13: gāme cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā sakalakattikamāsaṃ tasmiṃyeva senāsane tena cīvarena vinā vatthuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1443_14: anujānitvā idāni vihārato aññattha vasantassa chārattaṃ vippavāsaṃ anujānanto “siyā
tika-vin09t0:1443_15: ca tassa bhikkhuno”tiādimāha. Asamādānacārañhi atthatakathinā eva labhanti, netareti
tika-vin09t0:1443_16: ettha idampi kāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha chārattaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena
tika-vin09t0:1443_17: vippavasitabbanti yo bhikkhu vihāre vasanto tato aññattha gamanakicce sati antaraghare
tika-vin09t0:1443_18: cīvaraṃ nikkhipati, tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena chārattaparamaṃ vippavasitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1443_19: cha rattiyo tamhā vihārā aññattha vasitabbāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vuttañhi bhadantena buddhadattācariyena –
tika-vin09t0:1444: “Yaṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā, bhikkhu āraññake vase;
tika-vin09t0:1445: Tasmiṃ gāme ṭhapetuṃ taṃ, māsamekaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1448_0: Tenevāha “tato ce uttari vippavaseyyāti chārattato uttari tasmiṃ senāsane sattamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1448_1: aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyā”tiādi. Tathā asakkontenāti gataṭṭhānassa dūratāya senāsanaṃ āgantvā
tika-vin09t0:1448_2: sattamaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontena. Evampi asakkontena tatreva ṭhitena paccuddharitabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1448_3: “atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhassatī”ti. Vasitvāti aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā. Bhikkhusammuti udositasikkhāpade vuttāva.
tika-vin09t0:1449: Sesanti “aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti ayamettha anupaññattī”tiādikaṃ. Tattha hi aṅgesu yaṃ rattivippavāso catutthamaṅgaṃ, taṃ idha chārattato uttari vippavāso hotīti ayameva viseso.
tika-vin09t0:1452_0: Nanu cāyaṃ saṅghassa pariṇato, na pariccatto, atha kathaṃ saṅghasantako hotīti āha
tika-vin09t0:1452_1: “so hī”tiādi. Tattha soti lābho. Ekena pariyāyenāti pariṇatabhāvasaṅkhātena ekena
tika-vin09t0:1452_4: dasikasuttampi. Pariṇatanti saṅghassa ninnaṃ saṅghassa poṇaṃ saṅghassa pabbhāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1452_5: hutvā ṭhitanti attho. Yena pana kāraṇena so pariṇato hoti, taṃ dassetvā tassa atthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1452_6: dassetuṃ “dassāma karissāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Attano pariṇāmentassāti “idaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1452_7: saṅghassa pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā attano pariṇāmetvā gaṇhantassa. Payogeti pariṇāmanappayoge.
tika-vin09t0:1452_8: Ettha ca “idaṃ me, bhante, jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmikaṃ nissaggiya”nti
tika-vin09t0:1453_0: Saṅghacetiyapuggalesūti ettha ca antamaso sunakhaṃ upādāya yo koci satto “puggalo”ti
tika-vin09t0:1453_1: veditabbo. Aññasaṅghādīnanti aññasaṅghacetiyapuggalānaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “saṅghassa
tika-vin09t0:1453_2: pariṇataṃ aññassa saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā puggalassa vā, cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññassa
tika-vin09t0:1453_3: cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā, puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññassa puggalassa
tika-vin09t0:1453_4: vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmentassa dukkaṭa”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1454_0: Idāni anāpattiṃ dassetuṃ “apariṇatasaññino”tiādimāha. Pariṇate, apariṇate ca apariṇatasaññino
tika-vin09t0:1454_1: cāti sambandho, pariṇate, apariṇate cāti ubhayatthāpi anāpattīti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1454_2: “pariṇate apariṇatasaññī attano pariṇāmeti, anāpatti. Apariṇate apariṇatasaññī anāpattī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1454_3: Deyyadhammoti cattāro paccayā. Ādisaddena “paṭisaṅkhāraṃ vā labheyya, ciraṭṭhitiko
tika-vin09t0:1454_4: vā assa, yattha vā pana tumhākaṃ cittaṃ pasīdati, tattha dethā”ti vacanānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1454_5: Sace pana dāyakā “mayaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ kattukāmā, cetiyapūjaṃ kattukāmā, ekassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin09t0:1454_6: parikkhāraṃ dātukāmā, tumhākaṃ ruciyā dassāma. Bhaṇatha, kattha demā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin09t0:1454_7: evaṃ vutte tena bhikkhunā “yattha icchatha, tattha dethā”ti vattabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1463_0: Sampajānamusāvādeti ettha musāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu, vādoti tassa bhūtato tacchato
tika-vin09t0:1463_1: viññāpanaṃ, sampajānassa musāvādo sampajānamusāvādo, tasmiṃ sampajānamusāvādeti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1463_2: Tenāha “pubbe”tiādi. So ca pana musāvādo pubbabhāgakkhaṇe, taṅkhaṇe ca vijānantassa
tika-vin09t0:1463_3: hoti “pubbevassa hoti ‘musā bhaṇissa’nti, bhaṇantassa hoti ‘musā bhaṇāmī”’ti vuttattāti
tika-vin09t0:1463_4: āha “pubbepi jānitvā vacanakkhaṇepi jānantassā”ti. Etañhi dvayaṃ aṅgabhūtaṃ, itaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1463_5: pana hotu vā, mā vā, akāraṇametaṃ. Nanu cetaṃ bhaṇanameva ñāyatīti āha “bhaṇanañca
tika-vin09t0:1464_0: Hatthakaṃ sakyaputtanti ettha hatthakoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ. Sakyānaṃ puttoti sakyaputto.
tika-vin09t0:1464_1: Buddhakāle kira sakyakulato asīti purisasahassāni pabbajiṃsu, tesaṃ so aññataro.
tika-vin09t0:1464_2: Avajānitvā paṭijānanādivatthusminti ettha avajānitvā paṭijānanaṃ nāma titthiyehi
tika-vin09t0:1464_3: saddhiṃ kathento attano vāde kañci dosaṃ sallakkhento “nāyaṃ mama vādo”ti avajānitvā
tika-vin09t0:1464_4: puna kathento kathento niddosataṃ sallakkhetvā “mameva ayaṃ vādo”ti paṭijānāti. Ādisaddena
tika-vin09t0:1464_5: paṭijānitvā avajānanaṃ, aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ, sampajānamusābhāsanaṃ, saṅketaṃ katvā
tika-vin09t0:1465_0: Anupadhāretvā sahasā bhaṇantassāti avīmaṃsitvā vegena diṭṭhampi “adiṭṭhaṃ me”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1465_1: bhaṇantassa. “Aññaṃ bhaṇissāmī”ti aññaṃ bhaṇantassāti yo mandattā momūhattā pakkhalanto
tika-vin09t0:1465_2: “cīvara”nti vattabbe “cīra”ntiādīni bhaṇati, ayaṃ “aññaṃ bhaṇissāmī”ti aññaṃ bhaṇati
tika-vin09t0:1465_3: nāma. Yo pana sāmaṇerena “api, bhante, mayhaṃ upajjhāyaṃ passitthā”ti vutto keḷiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1465_4: kurumāno “tava upajjhāyo dārusakaṭaṃ yojetvā gato bhavissatī”ti vā siṅgālasaddaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1465_5: sutvā “kassāyaṃ saddo”ti vutto “mātuyā te yānena gacchantiyā kaddame laggacakkaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1465_6: uddharantānaṃ ayaṃ saddo”ti vā evaṃ neva davā, na ravā aññaṃ bhaṇati, so āpattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1465_7: āpajjatiyeva. Aññā pūraṇakathā nāma hoti – eko gāme thokaṃ telaṃ labhitvā vihāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1465_8: āgato sāmaṇeraṃ bhaṇati “tvaṃ ajja kuhiṃ gato, gāmo ekatelo ahosī”ti vā, pacchikāya
tika-vin09t0:1465_9: ṭhapitaṃ pūvakhaṇḍaṃ labhitvā “ajja gāme pacchikāhi pūve cāresu”nti vā, ayaṃ musāvādova
tika-vin09t0:1465_10: hoti. Visaṃvādanapurekkhāratāti visaṃ vādenti etenāti visaṃvādanaṃ, vañcanādhippāyavasappavattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1465_11: cittaṃ, tassa purekkhāratā visaṃvādanapurekkhāratā, visaṃvādanacittassa purato karaṇanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1468_0: Omasavādeti khuṃsanagarahaṇavacane. Yasmā pana taṃ neva kaṇṇasukhaṃ, na hadayasukhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1468_1: tasmā tena kaṇṇañceva hadayañca vijjhatīti āha “ovijjhanavacane”ti, jātiādīhi ghaṭetvā
tika-vin09t0:1468_2: vacaneti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “jātināmā”tiādi. Tattha jāti nāma brāhmaṇādi ukkaṭṭhā
tika-vin09t0:1468_3: ceva caṇḍālādi hīnā ca jāti. Nāmaṃ nāma avakaṇṇakādi hīnañceva buddharakkhitādi ukkaṭṭhañca
tika-vin09t0:1468_4: nāmaṃ. Gottaṃ nāma kosiyādi hīnañceva gotamādi ukkaṭṭhañca gottaṃ. Kammaṃ nāma pupphachaḍḍakādi
tika-vin09t0:1468_5: hīnañceva kasivaṇijjādi ukkaṭṭhañca kammaṃ. Sippaṃ nāma naḷakārādi hīnañceva muddāgaṇanādi
tika-vin09t0:1468_6: ukkaṭṭhañca sippaṃ. Ābādho nāma sabbopi rogo hīnoyeva. Atha vā madhumeho ukkaṭṭho,
tika-vin09t0:1468_7: seso hīnoti veditabbo. Liṅgaṃ nāma atidīghādi hīnañceva nātidīghādi ukkaṭṭhañca liṅgaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1468_8: Kileso nāma rāgādiko sabbopi kileso. Āpatti nāma sotāpattādikā ukkaṭṭhā ceva pārājikādi
tika-vin09t0:1468_9: anukkaṭṭhā ca āpatti. Akkoso nāma “oṭṭhosī”tiādiko hīno ceva “paṇḍitosī”tiādiko ukkaṭṭho ca akkoso.
tika-vin09t0:1469_0: Yathā tathāti pāḷiāgatānāgatapadānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena. Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade ṭhapetvā
tika-vin09t0:1469_1: bhikkhuṃ bhikkhuniādayo sabbe sattā anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti āha “idha cā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1469_2: Davakamyatā nāma keḷihasādhippāyatā. Sabbatthāti upasampannānupasampannesu ceva pāḷiāgatānāgatapadesu
tika-vin09t0:1469_4: atthaṃ vaṇṇento atthapurekkhāro nāma. Pāḷiṃ vācento dhammapurekkhāro nāma. Anusiṭṭhiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1469_5: ṭhatvā “idānipi caṇḍālosi, pāpaṃ mā akāsi. Mā tamotamaparāyaṇo ahosī”tiādinā nayena
tika-vin09t0:1472_0: Bhikkhupesuññeti pisatīti pisuṇā, yāya vācāya samagge satte avayavabhūte vagge bhinne
tika-vin09t0:1472_1: karoti, sā vācā pisuṇā, pisuṇā eva pesuññaṃ, tāya vācāya samannāgato pisuṇo, tassa
tika-vin09t0:1472_2: kammaṃ pesuññaṃ, bhikkhussa pesuññaṃ bhikkhupesuññaṃ, tasmiṃ bhikkhupesuññe, bhikkhuto
tika-vin09t0:1472_3: sutvā bhikkhunā, bhikkhussa vā upasaṃhaṭapesuññeti attho. Tenāha “jātiādīhī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1472_4: Tañca kho dvīhi kāraṇehi upasaṃharatīti āha “bhikkhuno piyakamyatāya vā”tiādi. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:1472_5: bhikkhuno piyakamyatāyāti yassa taṃ bhāsati, tassa bhikkhuno “evamahaṃ etassa piyo
tika-vin09t0:1472_6: bhavissāmī”ti attano piyabhāvaṃ patthayamānatāya. Bhedādhippāyenāti “evamayaṃ tena
tika-vin09t0:1472_7: saddhiṃ bhijjissatī”ti parassa parena bhedaṃ icchantena. Atha vā piyasuññakaraṇato
tika-vin09t0:1472_8: pesuññaṃ niruttinayena, yāya vācāya yassa taṃ bhāsati, tassa hadaye attano piyabhāvaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1472_9: parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ karoti, sā vācā, “bhikkhussa pesuññaṃ bhikkhupesuñña”ntiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1473_1: pana pesuññakaraṃ tassa kiriyaṃ, vacanaṃ vā piyakamyatāya upasaṃharantassa kiñcāpi
tika-vin09t0:1473_2: iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti na dissati, tathāpi dukkaṭena bhavitabba”nti vadanti. Pāpagarahitāya
tika-vin09t0:1473_3: vadantassāti ekaṃ akkosantaṃ, ekañca khamantaṃ disvā “aho nillajjo, īdisampi nāma
tika-vin09t0:1473_4: bhavantaṃ puna vattabbaṃ maññissatī”ti evaṃ kevalaṃ pāpagarahitāya bhaṇantassa.
tika-vin09t0:1476_0: Padaso dhammaṃ vāceyyāti ekato padaṃ padaṃ dhammaṃ vāceyya, koṭṭhāsaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ vāceyyāti
tika-vin09t0:1476_1: attho. Yasmā na kevalaṃ tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhadhammaṃyeva padaso vācentassa āpatti,
tika-vin09t0:1476_2: tasmā “saṅgītittayaṃ anāruḷhampī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ādi-saddena sīlūpadesa dhutaṅgapañhaārammaṇakathā
tika-vin09t0:1476_4: sakappaṭibhāne anāpatti. Yaṃ rañño saññāpanatthaṃ āharitvā vuttaṃ, tattha āpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1477_0: Yasmā pana taṃ padaṃ catubbidhaṃ hoti, tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ “padānupadaanvakkharānubyañjanesū”ti
tika-vin09t0:1477_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha padanti eko gāthāpādo adhippeto. Anupadanti dutiyapādo. Anvakkharanti
tika-vin09t0:1477_2: ekekaṃ akkharaṃ. Anubyañjananti purimabyañjanena sadisaṃ pacchābyañjanaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin09t0:1477_3: vā ekaṃ akkharaṃ anvakkharaṃ. Akkharasamūho anubyañjanaṃ. Akkharānubyañjanasamūho
tika-vin09t0:1477_4: padaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ padaṃ padameva, dutiyaṃ anupadanti evamettha nānākaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1477_5: Etesu padādīsu yaṃ kañci koṭṭhāsaṃ bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā avasesapuggalehi
tika-vin09t0:1477_6: saddhiṃ ekato bhaṇantassa padādigaṇanāya pācittiyanti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1478_0: Ettha gāthābandhesu tāva “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti ekamekaṃ padaṃ sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1478_1: ekato ārabhitvā ekatoyeva niṭṭhāpentassa padagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ. Therena “manopubbaṅgamā
tika-vin09t0:1478_2: dhammā”ti vutte taṃ padaṃ apāpuṇitvā “manoseṭṭhā manomayā”ti vacanakāle pattena sāmaṇerena
tika-vin09t0:1478_3: ekato bhaṇantassa anupadagaṇanāya. “Rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādi vacanakāle tena saddhiṃ “rū”
tika-vin09t0:1478_4: kāramattameva vācentassa anvakkharagaṇanāya. Esa nayo gāthābandhepi. “Rūpaṃ, bhikkhave,
tika-vin09t0:1478_5: aniccaṃ, vedanā aniccā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ vācayamāno therena “rūpaṃ anicca”nti vuccamāne
tika-vin09t0:1478_6: sāmaṇero sīghapaññatāya “vedanā aniccā”ti imaṃ aniccapadaṃ therassa “rūpaṃ anicca”nti
tika-vin09t0:1478_7: etena aniccapadena saddhiṃ ekato bhaṇanto vācaṃ nicchāreti, evaṃ vācentassa anubyañjanagaṇanāya
tika-vin09t0:1479_1: tīṇi pācittiyāni. Anupasampannena saddhiṃ ekato uddesaggahaṇe ekato bhaṇantassa anāpattīti
tika-vin09t0:1479_2: sambandho. Esa nayo “sajjhāyakaraṇe, tassa santike uddesaggahaṇe”ti etthāpi. Tatrāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1479_3: vinicchayo – upasampanno ca anupasampanno ca nisīditvā uddisāpenti. Ācariyo “nisinnānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1479_4: bhaṇāmī”ti tehi saddhiṃ ekato vadati, ācariyasseva āpatti. Anupasampannena saddhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1479_5: gaṇhantassa anāpatti. Dvepi ṭhitā gaṇhanti, eseva nayo. Daharabhikkhu nisinno, sāmaṇero
tika-vin09t0:1479_6: ṭhito, “nisinnassa bhaṇāmī”ti bhaṇato anāpatti. Sace daharo tiṭṭhati, itaro nisīdati,
tika-vin09t0:1479_7: “ṭhitassa bhaṇāmī”ti bhaṇatopi anāpatti. Sace bahūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antare eko sāmaṇero
tika-vin09t0:1479_8: nisinno hoti, tasmiṃ nisinne padaso dhammaṃ vācentassa acittakā āpatti. Sace sāmaṇero
tika-vin09t0:1479_9: upacāraṃ muñcitvā ṭhito vā nisinno vā hoti, yesaṃ vāceti, tesu apariyāpannattā ekena
tika-vin09t0:1479_10: disābhāgena palāyanakaganthaṃ nāma gaṇhātīti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, tasmā anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1480_0: Sajjhāyakaraṇeti anupasampannena saddhiṃ ekato sajjhāyakaraṇe. Tassa santike uddesaggahaṇeti
tika-vin09t0:1480_1: anupasampannassa santike uddesaggahaṇe. Yebhuyyena paguṇaganthaṃ bhaṇantassāti sace
tika-vin09t0:1480_2: ekagāthāya eko pādo nāgacchati, avasesā āgacchanti, ayaṃ yebhuyyena paguṇagantho
tika-vin09t0:1480_3: nāma. Etena nayena suttepi veditabbo, taṃ bhaṇantassa. Osārentassa cāti parisāmajjhe
tika-vin09t0:1483_0: Idha “bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāmā”ti vacanato tiracchānagatopi anupasampannoyeva,
tika-vin09t0:1483_1: so ca kho na sabbo, methunadhammāpattiyā vatthubhūtovāti āha “antamaso”tiādi. Tassa
tika-vin09t0:1483_2: ca paricchedo methunadhammāpattiyā vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Dirattatirattanti ettha
tika-vin09t0:1483_3: dirattavacanena na koci visesattho labbhati, kevalaṃ lokavohāravasena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya,
tika-vin09t0:1483_4: mukhāruḷhatāya evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā rattīnanti pana vacanatthamattadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1483_5: vuttaṃ, nirantaratirattadassanatthaṃ vā dirattaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sahaseyyanti
tika-vin09t0:1483_6: ekato seyyaṃ. Seyyāti ca kāyappasāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ sayanampi vuccati “sayanaṃ seyyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1483_7: katvā, yasmiṃ senāsane sayanti, tampi “sayanti etthāti seyyā”ti katvā. Tadubhayampi
tika-vin09t0:1483_8: idha sāmaññena, ekasesanayena vā gahitanti āha “sabbacchannaparicchanne”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1484_0: Tattha yaṃ senāsanaṃ upari pañcahi chadanehi, aññena vā kenaci antamaso vatthenāpi
tika-vin09t0:1484_1: sabbameva paricchannaṃ, bhūmito paṭṭhāya yāva chadanaṃ āhacca, anāhaccāpi vā sabbantimena
tika-vin09t0:1484_2: pariyāyena diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārena vā aññena vā kenaci antamaso vatthenāpi
tika-vin09t0:1484_3: parikkhittaṃ, idaṃ sabbacchannasabbaparicchannaṃ nāma. Yassa pana upari bahutaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1484_4: ṭhānaṃ channaṃ, appaṃ acchannaṃ, samantato ca bahutaraṃ parikkhittaṃ, appaṃ aparikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1484_5: idaṃ yebhuyyena channaṃ yebhuyyena paricchannaṃ nāma. Tasmiṃ sabbacchannaparicchanne,
tika-vin09t0:1485_0: Vidaheyyāti kareyya, tañca kho atthato sampādananti āha “sampādeyyā”ti. Ayañhettha
tika-vin09t0:1485_1: saṅkhepattho “senāsanasaṅkhātaṃ seyyaṃ pavisitvā kāyappasāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ seyyaṃ kappeyya
tika-vin09t0:1485_2: vidaheyya sampādeyyā”ti. Diyaḍḍhahatthubbedho vaḍḍhakihatthena gahetabbo. Ekūpacāroti
tika-vin09t0:1485_3: valañjanadvārassa ekattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Satagabbhaṃ vā catusālaṃ ekūpacāraṃ hotīti
tika-vin09t0:1485_4: sambandho. Tattha vāti purimapurimadivase yattha vuṭṭhaṃ, tasmiṃyeva senāsane vā.
tika-vin09t0:1485_5: Aññattha vā tādiseti yathāvuttalakkhaṇena samannāgate aññasmiṃ pubbe avuṭṭhasenāsane
tika-vin09t0:1485_6: vā. Tena vāti yena saha purimapurimadivase vuṭṭhaṃ, tena vā. Aññena vāti yena saha
tika-vin09t0:1485_7: purimapurimasmiṃ divase vuṭṭhaṃ, tato aññena vā. Saṅkhepoti saṅkhepavaṇṇanā. Yadi
tika-vin09t0:1485_8: evaṃ vitthāro kathaṃ veditabboti āha “vitthāro panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1486_1: yebhuyyena channe cūḷakaparicchanne dukkaṭaṃ, sabbaparicchanne cūḷakacchanne dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1486_2: yebhuyyena paricchanne cūḷakacchanne dukkaṭa”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1486_3: Tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasantassāti tatiyāya rattiyā aruṇato
tika-vin09t0:1486_4: puretarameva nikkhamitvā aruṇaṃ bahi uṭṭhāpetvā catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye
tika-vin09t0:1486_5: puna vasantassa. Sabbacchannasabbāparicchannādīsūti ettha pana ādisaddena “sabbaparicchanne
tika-vin09t0:1486_6: sabbaacchanne, yebhuyyena acchanne yebhuyyena aparicchanne”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ, “upaḍḍhacchanne
tika-vin09t0:1486_7: cūḷakaparicchanne anāpatti, upaḍḍhaparicchanne cūḷakacchanne anāpatti, cūḷakacchanne
tika-vin09t0:1489_1: anupādinnapakkhe pana ṭhitattā sahaseyyāpattiṃ na karotī”ti vadanti. Adissamānarūpāhi
tika-vin09t0:1489_2: pana yakkhipetīhi, methunassa avatthubhūtāya ca tiracchānagatitthiyā anāpatti. Paṭhamadivasepīti
tika-vin09t0:1489_3: paṭhamasmiṃ viya sikkhāpade na catuttheyeva divase, atha kho idha paṭhamadivasepīti
tika-vin09t0:1489_4: attho. Iminā idha divasaparicchedo natthīti dasseti. Aṅgesu pana pācittiyavatthukasenāsanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1489_5: tattha mātugāmena saha nipajjanaṃ, sūriyatthaṅgamananti tīṇi aṅgānīti ayampi viseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1492_0: Chappañcavācāhīti chahi pañcahi vācāhi. Vācāparicchedo panettha kathaṃ veditabboti
tika-vin09t0:1492_1: āha “uttari chappañcavācāhī”tiādi. Sabbatthāti sutte, aṭṭhakathāyañca. Sace aṭṭhakathaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1492_2: dhammapadaṃ, jātakādivatthuṃ vā kathetukāmo hoti, chappadamattameva kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1492_3: Pāḷiyā saddhiṃ kathentena ekaṃ padaṃ pāḷito, pañca aṭṭhakathātoti evaṃ cha padāni
tika-vin09t0:1492_4: anatikkamitvāva kathetabbo. Purisenāti manussapurisena. Tenāha “manussaviggahaṃ gahetvā panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1493_0: Tikapācittiyanti mātugāme mātugāmasaññivematikaamātugāmasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1493_1: Aññassa vā mātugāmassāti ekassa mātugāmassa desetvā nisinne puna āgatassa aññassa
tika-vin09t0:1493_2: mātugāmassa, evaṃ pana ekāsane nisinnena mātugāmasatassāpi desetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Viññumanussitthiyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1493_3: vacanato aviññitthiyāpi desayato anāpatti. Iriyāpathaparivattābhāvoti attano vā mātugāmassa
tika-vin09t0:1493_5: dutiyāniyate vuttalakkhaṇassa manussassa abhāvoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kiriyākiriyanti ettha
tika-vin09t0:1493_6: uttari chappañcavācāhi dhammadesanā kiriyā, kappiyakārakassa aggahaṇaṃ akiriyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1496_0: Nippariyāyenāti “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji”ntiādinā ujukameva. Pariyāyena ārocitanti
tika-vin09t0:1496_1: “yo te vihāre vasi, so bhikkhu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji, samāpajjati, samāpanno”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1496_2: aññāpadesena bhaṇitaṃ. Parinibbānakāle, pana antarā vā atikaḍḍhiyamānena upasampannassa
tika-vin09t0:1496_3: bhūtaṃ ārocetuṃ vaṭṭati. Anatikaḍḍhiyamānenāpi tathārūpe kāraṇe sati ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1496_4: Teneva aññatarena daharabhikkhunā upavadito aññataro thero “āvuso, uparimaggatthāya
tika-vin09t0:1496_5: vāyāmaṃ mā akāsi, khīṇāsavo tayā upavadito”ti āha. Therena ca “atthi te, āvuso, imasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1496_6: sāsane patiṭṭhā”ti puṭṭho daharabhikkhu “āma, bhante, sotāpanno āha”nti avoca. “Kārako
tika-vin09t0:1496_7: aya”nti ñatvāpi paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanena samuttejanāya, sampahaṃsanāya ca
tika-vin09t0:1496_8: ariyā attānaṃ pakāsentiyeva. Tenāha “tathārūpe kāraṇe sati upasampannassa ārocayato”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1496_9: Sutapariyattisīlaguṇaṃ pana anupasampannassapi ārocetuṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā na idha ummattakādayo
tika-vin09t0:1496_10: gahitāti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi. Ādisaddena khittacittavedanāṭṭānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Tasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1496_11: satīti ummattakādibhāve sati. Idha na gahitāti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade padabhājaniyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1496_12: na gahitā. Acittakanti paṇṇattijānanacittābhāvena acittakaṃ. Kusalābyākatacittehi
tika-vin09t0:1496_13: dvicitta”nti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena ariyapuggaleyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi paṇṇattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1496_14: ajānantā jhānalābhino puthujjanā vatthumhi lobhavasena akusalacittenāpi na ārocentīti.
tika-vin09t0:1496_15: Dukkhavedanāya vā abhāvato “dvivedana”nti imassa anurūpaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1499_1: Āyatiṃ saṃvaratthāyāti “evamesa paresu hirottappenāpi āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjissatī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1499_2: āyatiṃ saṃvaratthāya. Āpattīnañca kulānañca pariyantaṃ katvā vā akatvā vāti “ettakā
tika-vin09t0:1499_3: āpattiyo ārocetabbā, ettakesu kulesu ārocetabbā”ti evaṃ āpattīnañca kulānañca pariyantaṃ katvā vā akatvā vā.
tika-vin09t0:1500_1: aduṭṭhullāya āpattiyā. Avasese cha āpattikkhandheti saṅghādisesavajjite sese cha
tika-vin09t0:1500_3: ādito pañcasikkhāpadassa vītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ. Itaraṃ aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāranti
tika-vin09t0:1500_5: aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāraṃ. Vatthumattanti “ayaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ āpanno, duṭṭhullaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1500_6: attakāmaṃ, kāyasaṃsaggaṃ āpanno”ti evaṃ vatthumattaṃ vā ārocentassa. Āpattimattanti
tika-vin09t0:1500_7: “ayaṃ pārājikaṃ āpanno, saṅghādisesaṃ, thullaccayaṃ, pācittiyaṃ, pāṭidesanīyaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1500_8: dubbhāsitaṃ āpanno”ti evaṃ āpattimattaṃ vā ārocentassa. Vuttalakkhaṇassāti “pārājikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1500_9: anajjhāpannassā”ti kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. duṭṭhullārocanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇassa.
tika-vin09t0:1503_0: Pāsāṇasakkharakathalamarumbavālukādīsūti ettha muṭṭhippamāṇato upari pāsāṇāti veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1503_1: Muṭṭhippamāṇā sakkharā. Kathalāti kapālakhaṇḍāni. Marumbāti kaṭasakkharā. Vālukā
tika-vin09t0:1503_2: vālikāyeva. Aññatarassa tatiyabhāgo hotīti tatiyo bhāgo hoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –
tika-vin09t0:1503_3: yato paṃsuṃ vā mattikaṃ vā āharāpetvā visuṃ visuṃ kate dve koṭṭhāsā paṃsu vā mattikā
tika-vin09t0:1503_4: vā eko pāsāṇādīsu aññataro hoti, ayaṃ missakapathavī nāmāti. Ovaṭṭho nāma devena
tika-vin09t0:1503_5: ovaṭṭho. Vuttanti padabhājaniyaṃ, sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyameva vā vuttaṃ. Adhikatarapāsāṇādimissāti
tika-vin09t0:1503_6: adhikatarapāsāṇādīhi missā, adaḍḍhāpi vuttappamāṇato adhikatarapāsāṇādimissāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1503_7: Vā-saddo avuttavikappattho, tena ūnakacatumāsovaṭṭhapathaviṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Suddhapāsāṇādibhedāyāti
tika-vin09t0:1503_8: suddhā pāsāṇā etthāti suddhapāsāṇā, sā ādi yassa bhedassa so suddhapāsāṇādi. Ādi-saddena
tika-vin09t0:1503_9: suddhasakkharādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Suddhapāsāṇādibhedo yassā sā suddhapāsāṇādibhedā, tāya
tika-vin09t0:1504_0: Sayaṃ khaṇatīti ettha yo antamaso pādaṅguṭṭhakenapi khaṇati, udakampi chaḍḍento bhindati,
tika-vin09t0:1504_1: pādaṅguṭṭhakenapi vilikhati, pattampi pacanto dahati, so sabbo khaṇatiyevāti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1504_2: Tenāha “khaṇanabhedanavilekhanapacanādīhi vikopetīti. Pattaṃ pacantena hi pubbe pakkaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-vin09t0:1504_3: pacitabbo. Adaḍḍhāya pathaviyā aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Pattapacanakapālassa pana
tika-vin09t0:1504_4: upari aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Dārūnaṃ upari ṭhapeti, so aggi tāni dahanto gantvā
tika-vin09t0:1504_5: pathaviṃ dahati, na vaṭṭati. Iṭṭhakapāsāṇādīsupi eseva nayo. Tatrāpi hi iṭṭhakādīnaṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:1504_6: upari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Tesaṃ anupādānattā. Na hi tāni aggissa upādānasaṅkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1504_7: gacchanti. Sukkhakhāṇurukkhādīsupi aggiṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace pana “pathaviṃ apattameva
tika-vin09t0:1504_8: nibbāpetvā gamissāmī”ti deti, vaṭṭati. Pacchā nibbāpetuṃ na sakkoti, avisayattā anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1505_0: “Pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Khatāyeva pokkharaṇī nāma hoti, tasmā ayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1505_1: kappiyavohāro. Esa nayo “vāpiṃ, taḷākaṃ, āvāṭaṃ khaṇā”tiādīsupi. “Imaṃ okāsaṃ khaṇa,
tika-vin09t0:1505_2: imasmiṃ okāse pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇā”ti pana vattuṃ na vaṭṭati. “Kandaṃ khaṇa mūlaṃ khaṇā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1505_3: aniyametvā vattuṃ vaṭṭati. “Imaṃ valliṃ khaṇa, imasmiṃ okāse kandaṃ vā mūlaṃ vā khaṇā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1505_4: vattuṃ na vaṭṭati. Tenāha “okāsaṃ aniyametvā…pe… bhaṇantassā”ti. Ātapena sukkhakaddamo
tika-vin09t0:1505_5: ca phalati, tatra yo heṭṭhā pathaviyā asambaddho, tameva apanetuṃ vaṭṭati. Esa nayo
tika-vin09t0:1505_6: gokaṇṭakepi. Tenāha “ātapena…pe… asambaddha”nti. Tattha gokaṇṭako nāma gāvīnaṃ khuracchinnakaddamo
tika-vin09t0:1505_7: vuccati. Sace pana heṭṭhimatalena bhūmisambandho, vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Bhijjitvā
tika-vin09t0:1505_8: patitanaditaṭanti bhijjitvā nadisāmantā patitaṃ omakacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhaṃ naditaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1505_9: Sace pana bhijjitvā udakeyeva pakati, deve atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhepi udakeyeva udakassa
tika-vin09t0:1505_10: patitattā vaṭṭati. Mahantampi naṅgalacchinnamattikāpiṇḍanti mahantampi kasitaṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:1505_11: heṭṭhā pathaviyā asambaddhaṃ naṅgalacchinnamattikāpiṇḍaṃ. Evamādisaddena kūṭāsiñcanayoggatanukakaddamādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1505_12: gahaṇaṃ. Asañcicca rukkhādipavaṭṭanena bhindantassāti pāsāṇarukkhādīni vā pavaṭṭentassa,
tika-vin09t0:1505_13: kattaradaṇḍena vā āhacca āhacca gacchantassa pathavī bhijjati, sā “tena bhindissāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1505_14: evaṃ sañcicca abhinnattā asañcicca bhinnā nāma hoti, iti asañcicca rukkhādippavaṭṭanena
tika-vin09t0:1505_15: bhindantassa anāpatti. Asatiyā pādaṅguṭṭhakādīhi vilikhantassāti yo aññavihito kenaci
tika-vin09t0:1505_16: saddhiṃ kiñci kathento pādaṅguṭṭhakena vā kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā pathaviṃ vilikhanto
tika-vin09t0:1505_17: tiṭṭhati, tassa evaṃ asatiyā pādaṅguṭṭhakādīhi vilikhantassa anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1510_0: “Bhavantī”ti iminā viruḷhamūle nīlabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā vaḍḍhamānake taruṇagacche dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1510_1: “Ahesu”nti iminā pana vaḍḍhitvā ṭhite mahante rukkhagacchādike dasseti. Tenāha “jāyantī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1510_2: Ettha ca “bhavantī”ti imassa vivaraṇaṃ “jāyanti vaḍḍhantī”ti, “ahesu”nti imassa “jātā
tika-vin09t0:1510_3: vaḍḍhitā”ti. Gāmoti samūho. Patiṭṭhitaharitatiṇarukkhādīnanti bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitassa
tika-vin09t0:1510_4: haritatiṇassa ceva haritarukkhādīnañca. Ādisaddena osadhigacchalatādayo veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1510_5: Nimittatthe ca bhummaṃ. Yo attho sampajjati, tamāha “bhūtagāmapātabyatāyā”tiādinā.
tika-vin09t0:1511_0: Nanu ca rukkhādayo cittarahitatāya na jīvā, cittarahitatā ca pariphandābhāvato, chinnepi
tika-vin09t0:1511_1: viruhanato, visadisajātikabhāvato, catuyoniyaṃ apariyāpannato ca veditabbā, vuḍḍhi
tika-vin09t0:1511_2: pana pavāḷasilālavaṇānampi vijjatīti na tesaṃ jīvabhāve kāraṇaṃ, visayaggahaṇañca
tika-vin09t0:1511_3: nesaṃ parikappanāmattaṃ supanaṃ viya ciñcādīnaṃ, tathā dohaḷādayo, atha kasmā bhūtagāmassa
tika-vin09t0:1511_5: ca. Tenevāha “jīvasaññino hi moghapurisā manussā rukkhasmi”ntiādi. Sāsapabījakasevālampīti
tika-vin09t0:1511_6: sāsapabījakasaṅkhātaṃ sevālampi, sāsapasevālaṃ, bījakasevālampīti attho. Tattha sāsapasevālo
tika-vin09t0:1511_7: nāma sāsapamatto khuddakasevālo. Bījakasevālo nāma upari khuddakapatto heṭṭhā khuddakamūlo sevālo.
tika-vin09t0:1512_1: Evaṃ sesesupi. Tattha mūlabījaṃ haliddiādikaṃ. Khandhabījaṃ assatthādikaṃ. Phaḷubījaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1512_2: ucchuādikaṃ. Aggabījaṃ hiriverādikaṃ. Bījaṃbījaṃ pubbaṇṇādikaṃ. Bhājanagatanti sarāvādibhājanagataṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1512_3: Nikkhantaṃ mūlamattaṃ etasmāti nikkhantamūlamattaṃ. Matta saddena cettha paṇṇassa
tika-vin09t0:1512_4: nikkhamanaṃ paṭikkhipati. Esa nayo nikkhantaaṅkuramattanti etthāpi. Sace pana mūlañca
tika-vin09t0:1512_5: paṇṇañca niggataṃ, bhūtagāmasaṅkhaṃ gacchati. Vidatthimattā pattavaṭṭi niggacchatīti
tika-vin09t0:1512_6: vidatthimattā anīlavaṇṇā pattavaṭṭi nikkhamati. Tenāha “nikkhante”tiādi. Harito na
tika-vin09t0:1512_7: hotīti nīlavaṇṇo na hoti. Muggādīnaṃ pana paṇṇesu uṭṭhitesu, vīhiādīnaṃ vā aṅkure
tika-vin09t0:1512_8: harite bhūtagāmasaṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Esa nayo ambaṭṭhiādīsu.
tika-vin09t0:1513_0: Bhūtagāmabījagāmeti ettha bhūtagāmato viyojitaṃ viruhanasamatthameva mūlabījādikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1513_1: bījagāmo nāmāti veditabbaṃ. Ubhayatthāti bhūtagāmabījagāmesu. Atathāsaññissāti abhūtagāmābījagāmasaññissa.
tika-vin09t0:1513_2: Ko pana vādo abhūtagāmābījagāmesu abhūtagāmābījagāmasaññissa. Asañciccāti pāsāṇarukkhādīni
tika-vin09t0:1513_3: vā pavaṭṭentassa, sākhaṃ vā kaḍḍhantassa, kattaradaṇḍena vā bhūmiṃ paharitvā gacchantassa
tika-vin09t0:1513_4: tiṇāni kuppanti. Tāni tena “vikopessāmī”ti evaṃ sañcicca avikopitattā asañcicca vikopitāni
tika-vin09t0:1513_5: nāma honti. Iti asañcicca vikopentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1514: Asatiyāti aññavihito kenaci saddhiṃ kiñci kathento pādaṅguṭṭhakena vā hatthena vā tiṇaṃ vā lataṃ vā vikopento tiṭṭhati, evaṃ asatiyā vikopentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1515_0: Ajānitvāti ettha abbhantare “bījagāmo”ti vā “bhūtagāmo”ti vā na jānāti, “vikopemī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1515_1: pana jānāti. Evaṃ tiṇe vā palālapuñje vā khaṇittiṃ vā kudālaṃ vā saṅgopanatthāya
tika-vin09t0:1515_2: ṭhapeti, ḍayhamānahattho vā aggiṃ pāteti. Tatra ce tiṇāni chijjanti vā ḍayhanti vā,
tika-vin09t0:1516_0: Yena kenaci aggināti kaṭṭhaggigomayaggiādīsu yena kenaci agginā, antamaso lohakhaṇḍenapi
tika-vin09t0:1516_1: ādittena. “Kappiya”nti vatvāvāti yāya kāyaci bhāsāya “kappiya”nti vatvāva. Eva-saddena
tika-vin09t0:1516_2: paṭhamaṃ agginā phusitvā pacchā “kappiya”nti vattuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti dasseti. “Paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1516_3: aggiṃ nikkhipitvā taṃ anuddharitvāva ‘kappiya’nti vutte pana vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1516_4: Esa nayo sesesupi. Tathevāti ‘kappiya’nti vatvāva. Assamahiṃsasūkaramigagorūpānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1516_5: pana khurā atikhiṇā, tasmā tehi na kātabbaṃ, katampi akataṃ hotīti āha “ṭhapetvā
tika-vin09t0:1516_6: gomahiṃsādīnaṃ khure”ti. Hatthinakhā pana khurā na honti, tasmā tehi vaṭṭati. Tiracchānānanti
tika-vin09t0:1516_7: sīhabyagghadīpimakkaṭānaṃ, sakuntānañca. Tesañhi nakhā tikhiṇā honti, tasmā tehi
tika-vin09t0:1516_8: kātabbaṃ. “Antamaso chinditvā āhaṭenapī”ti iminā yehi kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tehi tatthajātakehi
tika-vin09t0:1516_9: kātabbanti ettha vattabbameva natthīti dasseti. “Satthe vuttanayenevā”ti iminā chedaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1516_10: vā vedhaṃ vā dassentena “kappiyanti vatvāvā”ti vuttamatidisati. Ettha ca kiñcāpi
tika-vin09t0:1516_11: “kappiyanti vatvāva kātabba”ntiādinā kappiyaṃ karontena kattabbākārameva dassitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1516_12: tathāpi bhikkhunā “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti vutteyeva anupasampannena “kappiya”nti vatvā
tika-vin09t0:1516_13: aggiparijitādi kātabbanti gahetabbaṃ. Avacanaṃ pana “punapi kappiyaṃ karohīti kāretvāva
tika-vin09t0:1517_0: Ekasmiṃ…pe… kappiye kate sabbaṃ kataṃ hotīti ekaṃyeva “kappiyaṃ karomī”ti adhippāyenapi
tika-vin09t0:1517_1: kappiye kate ekābaddhattā sabbaṃ kataṃ hoti. Dārukaṃ vijjhatīti jānitvā vā ajānitvā
tika-vin09t0:1517_2: vā vijjhati vā vijjhāpeti vā, vaṭṭatiyeva. Bhattasitthe vijjhatīti etthāpi eseva
tika-vin09t0:1517_3: nayo. Taṃ vijjhati, na vaṭṭatīti valliādīnaṃ bhājanagatikattāti adhippāyo. Bhindāpetvā
tika-vin09t0:1517_4: kappiyaṃ kāretabbanti bījato muttassa kaṭāhassa bhājanagatikattā vuttaṃ. Abījanti
tika-vin09t0:1517_6: abīja”nti. Nibbattabījaṃ nāma bījaṃ nibbattetvā visuṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1517_7: ambapanasādiphalaṃ. Tenāha “bījaṃ apanetvā paribhuñjitabba”nti. Tattha kappiyakaraṇakiccaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1520_0: Yamatthanti “tvaṃ kira dukkaṭāpattiṃ āpanno”tiādikaṃ yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ. Tato aññanti
tika-vin09t0:1520_1: pucchitatthato aññamatthaṃ. Aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇassāti vinayadharena yaṃ vacanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1520_2: dosapucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, tato aññena vacanena paṭicchādanassa. Paṭicchādanatthopi
tika-vin09t0:1520_3: hi carasaddo hoti anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ. Vuttanti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1521_0: Sāvasesaṃ āpattiṃ āpannoti ettha ṭhapetvā pārājikaṃ sesā sāvasesāpatti nāma, taṃ
tika-vin09t0:1521_1: āpanno. Anuyuñjiyamānoti “kiṃ, āvuso, itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti pucchiyamāno.
tika-vin09t0:1521_2: Aññena vacanenāti “ko āpanno? Kiṃ āpanno? Kismiṃ āpanno? Kathaṃ āpanno? Kaṃ bhaṇatha?
tika-vin09t0:1521_3: Kiṃ bhaṇathā”ti aññena vacanena. Aññanti “kiṃ tvaṃ itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī”tiādikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1521_4: anuyuñjakavacanaṃ. Tathā tathā vikkhipatīti tena tena pakārena vikkhipati. Kiṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1521_5: hoti? So kiñci vītikkamaṃ disvā “āvuso, āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā
tika-vin09t0:1521_6: anuyuñjiyamāno “ko āpanno”ti vadati. Tato “tva”nti vutte “ahaṃ kiṃ āpanno”ti vadati.
tika-vin09t0:1521_7: Atha “pācittiyaṃ vā dukkaṭaṃ vā”ti vutte “ahaṃ kismiṃ āpanno”ti vadati. Tato “amukasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1521_8: nāma vatthusmi”nti vutte “ahaṃ kathaṃ āpanno, kiṃ karonto āpannomhī”ti pucchati.
tika-vin09t0:1521_9: Atha “idaṃ nāma karonto āpanno”ti vutte “kaṃ bhaṇathā”ti vadati. Tato “taṃ bhaṇāmā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1521_10: vutte “kiṃ bhaṇathā”ti evamanekehi pakārehi vikkhipatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1522_0: Yo pana bhikkhu sāvasesaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno, taṃ na kathetukāmo tuṇhībhāvena vihesetīti
tika-vin09t0:1522_2: viheseti, parissamaṃ tesaṃ karotīti attho. Parissamo hi vihesā nāma. Aññavādakakammanti
tika-vin09t0:1522_3: aññavādakassa bhikkhuno aññavādakāropanatthaṃ kātabbaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ. Vihesakakammanti
tika-vin09t0:1522_4: etthāpi eseva nayo. Tasmiṃ saṅghena kateti tasmiṃ aññavādakakamme ca vihesakakamme
tika-vin09t0:1522_5: ca saṅghena ñattidutiyakammavācāya kate. Tathā karontānanti taṃ pakāraṃ karontānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1523_0: “Vihesaketi ayamettha anupaññattī”ti avacanañcettha “āpattikarā ca hoti aññavādakasikkhāpadādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1523_1: viyā”ti vuttattāyeva paññāyatīti katvā. Esa nayo upari sikkhāpadesu. Dhammakamme
tika-vin09t0:1523_3: tīṇi pācittiyāni. Adhammakamme tikadukkaṭanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Anāropiteti kammavācāya
tika-vin09t0:1523_4: anāropite, appatiṭṭhāpiteti attho. Gelaññenāti yena kathetuṃ na sakkoti, mukhe tādisena
tika-vin09t0:1523_5: byādhinā. Saṅghassa bhaṇḍanādīni bhavissantīti saṅghamajjhe kathite tappaccayā saṅghassa
tika-vin09t0:1523_6: bhaṇḍanaṃ vā kalaho vā viggaho vā vivādo vā saṅghabhedo vā saṅgharāji vā bhavissantīti
tika-vin09t0:1523_7: iminā vā adhippāyena na kathentassa. Ettha ca adhammenāti abhūtena vatthunā.
tika-vin09t0:1524: “Samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisānī”ti avisesaṃ atidisitvā visesaṃ dassetuṃ “idaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Siyā kiriyaṃ aññenaññaṃ paṭicarantassa. Siyā akiriyaṃ tuṇhībhāvena vihesentassa.
tika-vin09t0:1527_0: Yena vacanenāti “chandāya itthannāmo idaṃ nāma karotī”tiādikena yena vacanena. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1527_2: viya liṅgavipallāso esa. Idaṃ nāma karotīti attano sandiṭṭhasambhattānaṃ paṇītaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1527_3: senāsanaṃ vā paññapeti, bhattādikaṃ vāti adhippāyo. Senāsanapaññāpakādibhedanti ettha
tika-vin09t0:1527_5: jhe-saddo olokanatthopi hotīti āha “avaññāya olokāpentī”ti. Cintanatthoyeva vā gahetabboti
tika-vin09t0:1527_6: āha “lāmakato vā cintāpentī”ti. Tatheva vadantāti “chandāya itthannāmo idaṃ nāma
tika-vin09t0:1527_7: karotī”tiādīni vadantā. Vuttanti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. “Khiyyanake”ti ayamettha anupaññatti.
tika-vin09t0:1528_0: Asammatassāti saṅghena kammavācāya asammatassa. Kevalaṃ “taveso bhāro”ti saṅghena
tika-vin09t0:1528_1: āropitabhārassa, bhikkhūnaṃ vā phāsuvihāratthāya sayameva bhāraṃ vahantassa, yatra
tika-vin09t0:1528_2: vā dve tayo bhikkhū viharanti, tatra tādisaṃ kammaṃ karontassāti adhippāyo. Yassa
tika-vin09t0:1528_3: kassacīti upasampannassa vā anupasampannassa vā yassa kassaci. Anupasampannassa pana
tika-vin09t0:1528_4: sammatassa vā asammatassa vāti ettha pana kiñcāpi anupasampannassa terasa sammatiyo
tika-vin09t0:1528_5: dātuṃ na vaṭṭanti, tathāpi yo upasampannakāle laddhasammutiko pacchā anupasampannabhāve
tika-vin09t0:1528_6: ṭhito, taṃ sandhāya “sammatassa vā”ti vuttaṃ. Yassa pana byattassa sāmaṇerassa kevalaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1528_7: saṅghena vā sammatena vā bhikkhunā “tvaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ karohī”ti bhāro kato, taṃ sandhāya
tika-vin09t0:1528_8: “asammatassa vā”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā ujjhāpanañca khiyyanañca musāvādavasena pavattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1528_9: tasmā ādikammikassa imināva anāpatti, musāvādena pana āpattiyevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1531_0: Mañcaṃ vāti masārako, bundikābaddho, kuḷīrapādako, āhaccapādakoti imesu catūsu yaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1531_1: kañci mañcaṃ vā. Pīṭhaṃ vāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Bhisiṃ vāti uṇṇabhisi, coḷabhisi,
tika-vin09t0:1531_2: vākabhisi, tiṇabhisi, paṇṇabhisīti imāsu pañcasu bhisīsu yaṃ kañci bhisiṃ vā. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1531_4: migājeḷakacammena. Ettha pana migacamme eṇimigo, vātamigo, pasadamigo, kuruṅgamigo,
tika-vin09t0:1531_5: migamātuko, rohitamigoti etesaṃyeva cammāni vaṭṭanti, aññesaṃ pana –
tika-vin09t0:1533: Ye ca vāḷamigā keci, tesaṃ cammaṃ na vaṭṭatīti. ;
tika-vin09t0:1534_0: Tattha vāḷamigāti sīhabyagghaacchataracchā. Na kevalañca eteyeva, yesaṃ pana cammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1534_1: vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ, te ṭhapetvā avasesā antamaso gomahiṃsasasabiḷārādayopi sabbe imasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1534_2: atthe “vāḷamigā”tveva veditabbā. Etesañhi sabbesaṃ cammaṃ na vaṭṭati. Tālīsapattanti
tika-vin09t0:1534_3: suddhaṃ tamālapattaṃ, aññena missaṃ pana vaṭṭati. Tiṇavākacoḷesu akappiyaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-vin09t0:1534_4: Kiṃ panettha bibbohane viya nisīdituñca nipajjituñca na vaṭṭatīti āha “tatthā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1534_5: Na kevalañcedamevāti āha “pamāṇaparicchedopi cettha natthī”ti, “ettakameva kātabba”nti
tika-vin09t0:1534_7: etāsaṃ pana anurūpato sallakkhetvā attano rucivasena pamāṇaṃ kātabbaṃ. Anto saṃvellitvā
tika-vin09t0:1534_8: baddhanti yathā vemajjhaṃ saṃkhittaṃ hoti, evaṃ majjhe suṭṭhu veṭhetvā baddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1535_0: Ye aṭṭha māsāti sambandho. “Avassikasaṅketā”ti etasseva vivaraṇaṃ “vassānamāsāti
tika-vin09t0:1535_1: evaṃ apaññātā”ti, appatitā appasiddhāti attho. “Asaññitā”tipi pāṭho, tattha aviññātāti
tika-vin09t0:1535_2: attho. Aṭṭha māsāti cattāro hemantikā, cattāro gimhikā māsāti aṭṭha māsā. Ovassakamaṇḍapeti
tika-vin09t0:1535_3: sākhāmaṇḍapapadaramaṇḍapānaṃ yattha katthaci ovassake maṇḍape. Yatthāti yesu janapadesu.
tika-vin09t0:1535_4: Sabbatthāti sabbesu janapadesu. Kākādīnaṃ nibaddhavāsarukkhamūleti yattha dhuvanivāsena
tika-vin09t0:1535_5: kākā vā kulālā vā aññe vā sakuntā kulāvake katvā vasanti, tādisassa kākādīnaṃ nibaddhavāsassa
tika-vin09t0:1535_6: yassa kassaci rukkhassa heṭṭhā. Yattha pana gocarappasutā sakuntā vissamitvā gacchanti,
tika-vin09t0:1535_7: tassa rukkhassa mūle nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati. “Kadācipī”ti iminā na kevalaṃ vassikasaṅketeyevāti
tika-vin09t0:1535_8: dasseti. Yatthāti yasmiṃ padese. Yadāti yasmiṃ kāle.
tika-vin09t0:1536_0: Soti yassatthāya santhato, so. Pakatisanthateti pakatiyāva santhate, yaṃ nevattanā
tika-vin09t0:1536_1: santhataṃ, na parena santharāpitaṃ, tasminti vuttaṃ hoti. Lajjī hotīti lajjanasīlo
tika-vin09t0:1536_2: hoti, parikkhāravināsane bhītoti attho. Tenāha “attano palibodhaṃ viya maññatī”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1536_3: iminā alajjiṃ āpucchitvā gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Nirapekkhoti “āgantvā uddharissāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1536_4: apekkhārahito, iminā sāpekkho ce gacchati, anāpattīti dasseti. Teneva hi anāpattivāre
tika-vin09t0:1536_5: “otāpento gacchatī”ti vuttaṃ. Aññattha gacchantoti taṃ maggaṃ atikkamitvā aññattha
tika-vin09t0:1536_6: gacchanto. Leḍḍupātūpacārato bahi ṭhitattā “pāduddhārena kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ, aññattha
tika-vin09t0:1536_7: gacchantassa paṭhamapāduddhāre dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyapāduddhāre pācittiyanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1537_0: Tikapācittiyaṃ saṅghike saṅghikasaññivematikapuggalikasaññīnaṃ vasena. Imināva nayena
tika-vin09t0:1537_1: tikadukkaṭampi veditabbaṃ. Cimilikādīnaṃ attho dutiyasikkhāpade dassitova. Pādapuñchanī
tika-vin09t0:1537_2: nāma rajjukehi vā pilotikāhi vā pādapuñchanatthaṃ katā. Phalakapīṭhaṃ nāma phalakamayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1537_3: pīṭhaṃ. Na kevalaṃ cimilikādīniyeva ajjhokāse ṭhapetvā gacchantassa dukkaṭanti āha
tika-vin09t0:1537_4: “yaṃ vā panā”tiādi. Yaṃ kiñci dārubhaṇḍaṃ, yaṃ kiñci mattikābhaṇḍanti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1538_0: Araññe paṇṇakuṭīsu vasantānaṃ sīlasampadāya pasannacittā manussā mañcapīṭhādīni denti
tika-vin09t0:1538_1: “saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjathā”ti, tattha kiṃ kātabbanti āha “āraññakena panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1538_2: Tattha asati anovassaketi pabbhārādianovassakaṭṭhāne asati. Idañca lakkhaṇavacanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1538_3: “sabhāgānaṃ abhāve”ti ca icchitabbattā. Āraññakena hi bhikkhunā tattha vasitvā aññattha
tika-vin09t0:1538_4: gacchantena sāmantavihāre bhikkhūnaṃ pesetvā gantabbaṃ. Sabhāgānaṃ abhāve anovassake
tika-vin09t0:1538_5: nikkhipitvā gantabbaṃ. Anovassake asati rukkhe laggetvā gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1539_0: Na kevalaṃ idaṃyeva katvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “yathā vā”tiādi. Yathā vā upacikāhi
tika-vin09t0:1539_1: na khajjatīti yathā ṭhapite upacikāhi senāsanaṃ na khajjati, evaṃ tathā pāsāṇānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1539_2: upari ṭhapanaṃ katvāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – catūsu pāsāṇesu mañcaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin09t0:1539_3: mañce avasesamañcapīṭhāni āropetvā upari bhisiādikaṃ rāsiṃ katvā dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1540_0: Abbhokāsikenāpi “ahaṃ ukkaṭṭhaabbhokāsiko”ti cīvarakuṭimpi akatvā asamaye ajjhokāse
tika-vin09t0:1540_1: paññapetvā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā na vaṭṭatīti dassento āha “abbhokāsikenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1540_2: Sace pana catugguṇenapi cīvarena katakuṭi atementaṃ rakkhituṃ neva sakkoti, sattāhavaddalikādīni
tika-vin09t0:1540_3: bhavanti, bhikkhuno kāyānugatikattā vaṭṭati. Rukkhamūlikassāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:1541_0: Yasmiṃ vissāsaggāho ruhati, tassa santakaṃ attano puggalikamiva hotīti āha “vissāsikapuggalike”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1541_1: Yasmiṃ pana vissāso na ruhati, tassa santake dukkaṭameva. Amanussoti yakkho vā peto
tika-vin09t0:1544_0: Yaṃ kiñci cammanti kappiyākappiyaṃ yaṃ kiñci cammaṃ. Nanu “na, bhikkhave, mahācammāni
tika-vin09t0:1544_1: dhāretabbāni sīhacammaṃ byagghacammaṃ dīpicammaṃ, yo dhāreyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1544_2: khandhake sīhacammādīnaṃ paṭikkhepo katoti āha “sīhacammādīnañhī”tiādi. Pariharaṇeyeva
tika-vin09t0:1544_3: paṭikkhepoti attano santakaṃ katvā taṃ taṃ vihāraṃ haritvā mañcapīṭhādīsu attharitvā
tika-vin09t0:1544_4: paribhogeyeva paṭikkhepo, senāsanasantakaṃ katvā bhūmattharaṇavasena pana paribhoge
tika-vin09t0:1544_5: nevatthi doso. Tenāha “senāsanaparibhoge pana akappiyacammaṃ nāma natthī”ti. Pāvārenti
tika-vin09t0:1544_6: sañchādenti sarīraṃ etenāti pāvāro. Kojavoti uddalomiekantalomiādikojavattharaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1544_7: Sesanti bhisi nisīdanaṃ tiṇasanthāro paṇṇasanthāroti avasiṭṭhaṃ senāsanaṃ. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:1544_8: bhisīti mañcakabhisi vā pīṭhakabhisi vā. Nisīdananti sadasaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tiṇasanthāroti
tika-vin09t0:1544_9: yesaṃ kesañci tiṇānaṃ santhāro. Esa nayo paṇṇasanthāre. Ettha ca bhisi heṭṭhā vuttattā
tika-vin09t0:1544_10: pākaṭā. Nisīdanaṃ nisīdanasikkhāpadeneva pākaṭaṃ. Tiṇasanthārapaṇṇasanthārāni pana
tika-vin09t0:1545_0: Neva uddhareyya, na uddharāpeyyāti attanā vā uddharitvā patirūpe ṭhāne na ṭhapeyya,
tika-vin09t0:1545_1: parena vā tathā na kāreyya. Tenāha “yathā ṭhapita”ntiādi. Taṃ ṭhapentena ca “catūsu
tika-vin09t0:1545_2: pāsāṇesū”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayeneva antogehe anovassake nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace pana
tika-vin09t0:1545_3: senāsanaṃ ovassati, chadanatthañca tiṇaṃ vā iṭṭhakā vā ānītā honti. Sace ussahati,
tika-vin09t0:1545_4: chādetabbaṃ. No ce sakkoti, yo okāso anovassako, tattha nikkhipitabbaṃ. Sace sabbampi
tika-vin09t0:1545_5: ovassati, ussahantena antogāme upāsakānaṃ ghare ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace tepi “saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1545_6: nāma, bhante, bhāriyaṃ, aggidāhādīnaṃ bhāyāmā”ti na sampaṭicchanti, ajjhokāse pāsāṇānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1545_7: upari mañcaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva nikkhipitvā tiṇehi ca paṇṇehi ca
tika-vin09t0:1545_8: paṭicchādetabbaṃ. Yañhi tattha aṅgamattampi avasissati, taṃ aññesaṃ tattha āgatānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1545_9: bhikkhūnaṃ upakāraṃ bhavissatīti. Upacāranti sabbapacchimasenāsanato dve leḍḍupātā.
tika-vin09t0:1546_0: Ayamettha āpucchitabbānāpucchitabbavinicchayo – yā tāva bhūmiyaṃ dīghasālā vā paṇṇasālā
tika-vin09t0:1546_1: vā hoti, yaṃ vā rukkhatthambhesu katagehaṃ upacikānaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tato pakkamantena
tika-vin09t0:1546_2: āpucchitvāva pakkamitabbaṃ. Tasmiñhi katipayāni divasāni ajaggiyamāne vammikāva santiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin09t0:1546_3: Yaṃ pana pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu vā katasenāsanaṃ siluccayaleṇaṃ vā sudhālittasenāsanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1546_4: vā, yattha upacikāsaṅkā natthi, tato pakkamantassa āpucchitvāpi anāpucchitvāpi gantuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1546_5: vaṭṭati. Tenāha “yattha panā”tiādi. Sace tādisepi senāsane ekena passena upacikā
tika-vin09t0:1546_6: ārohanti, āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ. Āpucchanaṃ pana vattanti āpucchanaṃ gamikavattaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1546_7: Idañca itikattabbatādassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana vattabhedadukkaṭanti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1546_8: Keci pana “dukkaṭanti dassanattha”nti vadanti, taṃ na yujjati vattakkhandhakaṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin09t0:1546_9: “yaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā pāsāṇatthambhesu vā katasenāsanaṃ, yattha upacikānārohanti,
tika-vin09t0:1546_10: taṃ anāpucchantassāpi anāpattī”ti vuttattā. Āpucchantena pana bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu
tika-vin09t0:1546_11: āpucchitabbo, tasmiṃ asati sāmaṇero, tasmiṃ asati ārāmiko, tasmimpi asati yena vihāro
tika-vin09t0:1546_12: kārāpito, so vihārasāmiko, tassa vā kule yo koci āpucchitabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1547_0: “Upacāre”ti etasseva vivaraṇaṃ “bahi āsanne”ti, vihārassa bahi āsannaṭṭhāneti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1547_1: Upaṭṭhānasālāya vāti bhojanasālāyaṃ vā. Dukkaṭamevāti vuttappakārañhi dasavidhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1547_2: seyyaṃ antogabbhādimhi guttaṭṭhāne paññapetvā gacchantassa yasmā seyyāpi senāsanampi
tika-vin09t0:1547_3: upacikāhi palujjati, vammikarāsiyeva hoti, tasmā pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Bahi pana upaṭṭhānasālādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1547_4: paññapetvā gacchantassa seyyāmattameva nasseyya ṭhānassa aguttatāya, na senāsanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1547_5: tasmā ettha dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Mañcapīṭhaṃ pana yasmā na sakkā sahasā upacikāhi khāyituṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1547_6: tasmā taṃ vihārepi santharitvā gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. Vihārūpacāre pana taṃ
tika-vin09t0:1548_0: Uddharaṇāni katvāti ettha uddharitvā gacchantena mañcapīṭhakavānaṃ sabbaṃ apanetvā
tika-vin09t0:1548_1: saṃharitvā cīvaravaṃse laggetvā gantabbaṃ. Pacchā āgantvā vasanakabhikkhunāpi puna
tika-vin09t0:1548_2: mañcapīṭhaṃ vā paññapetvā sayitvā gacchantena tatheva kātabbaṃ. Antokuṭṭato seyyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1548_3: bahikuṭṭe paññapetvā vasantena gamanakāle puna gahitaṭṭhāneyeva paṭisāmetabbaṃ. Uparipāsādato
tika-vin09t0:1548_4: oropetvā heṭṭhāpāsāde vasantassāpi eseva nayo. Rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu mañcapīṭhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1548_5: paññapetvāpi gamanakāle puna gahitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetabbaṃ. Uddharāpetvā gamanepi
tika-vin09t0:1548_6: eseva nayo. Āpucchitvā gacchantena pana “bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu āpucchitabbo”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1551_0: “Jāna”nti vutte “anuṭṭhāpanīyo ‘aya’nti jānanto”ti ayaṃ viseso kuto labbhatīti āha
tika-vin09t0:1551_1: “tenevassā”tiādi. Nanu padabhājanepi vuḍḍhabhāvādijānanameva vuttaṃ, na tu anuṭṭhāpanīyabhāvanti
tika-vin09t0:1551_3: Na kevalaṃ idamevāti āha “guṇavisiṭṭhatañcā”tiādi, tena bahūpakārattepi guṇavisiṭṭhattābhāve,
tika-vin09t0:1551_4: guṇavisiṭṭhattepi bahūpakārattābhāve dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti. “Bhaṇḍāgārikassa
tika-vin09t0:1551_5: bahūpakārataṃ, dhammakathikādīnaṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca sallakkhetvā”ti keci. Dhuvavāsatthāyāti
tika-vin09t0:1551_6: niccavāsatthāya. Sammannitvāti apalokanena kammena sammannitvā. Kāmañcettha gilānassāpi
tika-vin09t0:1551_7: saṅghoyeva anucchavikaṃ senāsanaṃ deti, gilāno pana apaloketvā saṅghena adinnasenāsanopi
tika-vin09t0:1551_8: na pīḷetabbo anukampitabboti dassetuṃ visuṃ vutto.
tika-vin09t0:1552_0: Samantā diyaḍḍho hatthoti majjhe paññattaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ekapassena
tika-vin09t0:1552_1: ce pahonakadisā dissati, tato gahetabbaṃ. Pādadhovanapāsāṇatoti dvāre nikkhittapādadhovanapāsāṇato.
tika-vin09t0:1552_2: Nisīdantassa vā nipajjantassa vā pācittiyanti ettha nisīdanamattena, nipajjanamatteneva
tika-vin09t0:1552_3: vā pācittiyaṃ. Punappunaṃ karontassāti uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nisīdato vā nipajjato vā.
tika-vin09t0:1556: Anekakoṭṭhakānīti anekadvārakoṭṭhakāni. “Nikkhamāti vacanaṃ sutvā attano ruciyā ce nikkhamati, anāpattī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1557_0: Tassa parikkhāranikkaḍḍhaneti tassa santakaṃ yaṃ kiñci pattacīvaraparissāvanadhammakaraṇamañcapīṭhabhisibibbohanādibhedaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1557_1: antamaso rajanachallipi atthi, tassa parikkhārassa nikkaḍḍhane. Tañcāti dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1557_2: parāmasati. Nikkaḍḍhāpanepi eseva nayo. Gāḷhaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapitesu pana ekāva āpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1558_0: Bhaṇḍanakārakakalahakārakameva sakalasaṅghārāmato nikkaḍḍhituṃ labhati. So hi pakkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1558_1: labhitvā saṅghampi bhindeyya. Alajjiādayo pana attano vasanaṭṭhānatoyeva nikkaḍḍhitabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1561_0: Uparivehāsakuṭiyāti uparimatale asanthatapadarāya kuṭiyā. Tenāha “upari acchannatalāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1561_1: Yā hi kāci upari acchannatalā dvibhūmikakuṭikā vā tibhūmikādikuṭikā vā, sā “vehāsakuṭī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1561_2: vuccati. Idañhi vehāsakuṭilakkhaṇaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā padabhājane “majjhimassa purisassa
tika-vin09t0:1561_3: asīsaghaṭṭā”ti vuttanti āha “padabhājane panā”tiādi. Idha adhippetaṃ kuṭiṃ dassetunti
tika-vin09t0:1561_4: imasmiṃ sikkhāpade adhippetaṃ vehāsakuṭiṃ dassetuṃ. Majjhimassa purisassāti pamāṇamajjhimassa
tika-vin09t0:1561_5: purisassa. Sabbaheṭṭhimāhi tulāhi sīsaṃ na ghaṭṭetīti asīsaghaṭṭā. Aṅge vijjhitvāti
tika-vin09t0:1561_6: aṭaniyo vijjhitvā. Pavesitapādakanti pavesitapādasikhaṃ. Tasmāti “bhūmatthe vā”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1561_7: vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati. Yasmā āhaccapādakādīsu yathāvutto attho
tika-vin09t0:1562_0: Sahasāti abhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā. Avehāsakuṭikāyāti bhūmiyaṃ katapaṇṇasālādīsu,
tika-vin09t0:1562_1: tattha anāpatti. Na hi sakkā tattha parassa pīḷā kātuṃ. Sīsaghaṭṭāyāti yā sīsaṃ ghaṭṭā
tika-vin09t0:1562_2: hoti, tatthāpi anāpatti. Na hi sakkā tattha heṭṭhāpāsāde anoṇatena vicarituṃ, tasmā
tika-vin09t0:1562_3: asañcaraṇaṭṭhānattā parapīḷā na bhavissati. Uparitalaṃ vā padarasañcitanti uparimatalaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1562_4: dāruphalakehi ghanasanthataṃ. Kiñci gaṇhāti vāti upari nāgadantakādīsu laggitaṃ cīvarādiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1562_5: yaṃ kiñci gaṇhāti vā. Laggati vāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Paṭipakkhabhūtā āṇi paṭāṇi.
tika-vin09t0:1562_6: Yassā dinnāya nisīdantepi pādā na nipatanti, evaṃbhūtā āṇi mañcapīṭhānaṃ pādasikhāsu
tika-vin09t0:1565_0: Piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassāti dvārabandhassa. Sāmantā aḍḍhateyyahattho padesoti yassa vemajjhe
tika-vin09t0:1565_1: dvāraṃ hoti, uparibhāge ca uccā bhitti, tassa tīsu disāsu sāmantā aḍḍhateyyahattho
tika-vin09t0:1565_2: padeso. Khuddakassa pana vihārassa dvīsu disāsu. Tatrāpi yaṃ bhittiṃ vivariyamānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1565_3: kavāṭaṃ āhanati, sā aparipuṇṇūpacārāpi hoti. Sace pana dvārassa adhobhāgepi lepokāso
tika-vin09t0:1565_4: atthi, tampi limpituṃ vaṭṭati. Aggaḷaṭṭhapanāyāti ettha aggaḷasaddena taṃsambandhato
tika-vin09t0:1565_6: iminā tañca kho ṭhapanaṃ idha niccalabhāvenāti dasseti. Ko panettha adhippāyoti āha
tika-vin09t0:1565_7: “kavāṭañhī”tiādi. Kampatīti calati. Yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya punappunaṃ limpitabbo
tika-vin09t0:1565_8: vā lepāpetabbo vāti aggaḷaṭṭhapanatthāya yāva dvārakosā punappunaṃ attanā limpitabbo
tika-vin09t0:1566_0: Nanu cāyamattho neva mātikāyaṃ, na padabhājane vutto, atha kuto daṭṭhabboti āha “tatthā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1566_1: Kiñcāpīti yadipi. Aṭṭhuppattiyanti sikkhāpadassa nidāne. Adhikāratoti anuvattanato.
tika-vin09t0:1566_2: Ālokaṃ sandheti pidhetīti ālokasandhi. Tenāha “ālokasandhīti vātapānakavāṭakā vuccantī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1566_3: Tattha vātapānakavāṭakāti vātapānaphalakā. Anuññātappadesato pana aññattha punappunaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1566_4: vilimpituṃ vā vilimpāpetuṃ vā na vaṭṭati. “Mattikāya kattabbakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā puna
tika-vin09t0:1566_5: catutthalepe dinne pācittiya”nti keci. “Punappunaṃ lepadānassa vuttappamāṇato aññattha
tika-vin09t0:1566_6: paṭikkhittamattaṃ ṭhapetvā pācittiyassa avuttattā dukkaṭa”nti apare.
tika-vin09t0:1567_0: Adhiṭṭhātabbanti saṃvidhātabbaṃ. Appahariteti ettha appasaddo “appiccho”tiādīsu viya
tika-vin09t0:1567_1: abhāvatthoti āha “aharite”ti. Sālivīhiādi pubbaṇṇaṃ “purakkhataṃ sassaphala”nti katvā,
tika-vin09t0:1567_2: tabbipariyāyato muggamāsādi aparaṇṇaṃ. Vuttanti vapitaṃ. “Tasmiṃ ṭhatvā adhiṭṭhahanto
tika-vin09t0:1567_3: dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatī”ti iminā yasmiṃ padese samantā vuttappamāṇe paricchede pubbaṇṇādīni
tika-vin09t0:1567_4: na santi, tattha vihāro kāretabbo. Yattha pana santi, tattha kārāpetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin09t0:1567_5: dasseti. Tathevāti mukhavaṭṭiantena. Tasmiṃ ṭhātabbaṃ patantassa vihārassa apatanokāsattā,
tika-vin09t0:1567_6: tassa bhikkhuno upari na pateyyāti adhippāyo. Yathāparicchinnassa pana okāsassa abbhantaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1567_7: vihārassa patantassa okāso hotīti appaharitepi tasmiṃ ṭhatvā adhiṭṭhātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin09t0:1567_8: Tenāha “tassa anto aharitepi ṭhātuṃ na labhatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1568_0: Tato ce uttarīti tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vā pariyāyānaṃ vā upari catutthe magge vā pariyāye
tika-vin09t0:1568_1: vāti attho. Tenāha “maggena chādiyamāne”tiādi. Tattha maggena chādiyamāneti aparikkhipitvā
tika-vin09t0:1568_2: ujukameva chādiyamāne. Pariyāyenāti parikkhepena. Tattha maggena chādanaṃ iṭṭhakasilāsudhāhi
tika-vin09t0:1568_3: labbhati, pariyāyena chādanaṃ tiṇapaṇṇehīti āha “iṭṭhakasilāsudhāhī”tiādi. Tasmā
tika-vin09t0:1568_4: yathā icchati, tathā dve magge vā dve pariyāye vā adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyaṃ maggaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:1568_5: pariyāyaṃ vā “evaṃ chādehī”ti āṇāpetvā pakkamitabbaṃ. Sace na pakkamati, tuṇhībhāvena
tika-vin09t0:1568_6: ṭhātabbaṃ. Sabbampi cetaṃ chadanaṃ chadanūpari veditabbaṃ. Uparūparichanno hi vihāro
tika-vin09t0:1568_7: ciraṃ anovassako hotīti maññamānā evaṃ chādenti. Tiṇamuṭṭhigaṇanāyāti tiṇakaraḷagaṇanāya.
tika-vin09t0:1569_2: karaṇe. Leṇaguhātiṇakuṭikādīsūti ettha leṇanti dvārabaddhaṃ. Guhāti kevalā pabbataguhā.
tika-vin09t0:1572_0: Ekasmiṃ ghaṭe ekāva āpattīti ekasmiṃ udakaghaṭe ekāva āpatti. Esa nayo sabbabhājanesu.
tika-vin09t0:1572_1: Vicchindantassāti dhāraṃ vicchindantassa. Ekekaṃ pakkhipantassāti ekekaṃ tiṇaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:1572_2: paṇṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kaṭṭhagomayādiṃ pakkhipantassa. Pariyādānanti khayaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1573_0: “Padīpe patitvā paṭaṅgādipāṇakā marissantī”ti jānantassāpi kusalacittena padīpujjalanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1573_1: viya “siñcanena pāṇakā marissantī”ti pubbabhāge jānantassāpi “idaṃ jalaṃ siñcāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1573_2: siñcantassa vadhakacittaṃ na hotīti āha “vinā vadhakacetanāyā”tiādi. Evañca katvā
tika-vin09t0:1573_4: ticittaṃ. Tathā hi paṇṇattiṃ madditvā siñcantassa vā siñcāpentassa vā akusalacittena
tika-vin09t0:1573_5: hoti, “āsanaṃ dhovissāmī”ti cittena dhovanatthaṃ siñcantassa vā siñcāpentassa vā
tika-vin09t0:1573_6: kusalacittena hoti, paṇṇattiṃ ajānatā arahatā siñcanādikaraṇe abyākatacittena hotīti
tika-vin09t0:1578_0: Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatassāti “sīlavā hotī”tiādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatassa. Anuññātāti
tika-vin09t0:1578_2: Tattha sāmīcikammanti maggasampadānabījanapānīyāpucchanādikaṃ anucchavikaṃ vattaṃ. Ādisaddena –
tika-vin09t0:1579_0: “Na bhikkhuniyā abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ, anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato
tika-vin09t0:1579_1: dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā uposathapucchakañca ovādūpasaṅkamanañca, vassaṃvuṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:1579_2: bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretabbaṃ diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya
tika-vin09t0:1579_3: vā, garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1579_4: dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya ubhatosaṅghe upasampadā
tika-vin09t0:1579_5: pariyesitabbā, na bhikkhuniyā kenaci pariyāyena bhikkhu akkositabbo paribhāsitabbo,
tika-vin09t0:1579_6: ajjatagge ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu vacanapatho, anovaṭo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho”ti –
tika-vin09t0:1580: Ime satta dhamme saṅgaṇhāti. Garudhammeti garuke dhamme. Te hi gāravaṃ katvā bhikkhunīhi sampaṭicchitabbattā “garudhammā”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin09t0:1581_0: Aññena vā dhammenāti ṭhapetvā aṭṭha garudhamme aññena yena kenaci dhammena. Bhikkhunīsu
tika-vin09t0:1581_1: upasampannamattaṃ vā ovadatoti bhikkhunīsu upasampannamattaṃ garudhammena ovadato
tika-vin09t0:1581_2: vā. Bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannāya yathāvatthukameva. “Adhammakamme”tiādīsu bhikkhunovādasammutikammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1581_3: “kamma”nti veditabbanti āha “sammatassāpī”tiādi. Vagge bhikkhunisaṅghe ovadato tikapācittiyanti
tika-vin09t0:1581_4: vagge bhikkhunisaṅghe ovadato vaggasaññivematikasamaggasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1581_5: Tathā vematikassa cāti adhammakamme vematikassa ca vagge bhikkhunisaṅghe ovadato
tika-vin09t0:1581_6: tikapācittiyanti attho. Esa nayo dhammakammasaññino cāti etthāpi. Yathā ca vagge
tika-vin09t0:1581_7: bhikkhunisaṅghe ovadato nava pācittiyāni, evaṃ adhammakamme adhammakammasaññino samagge
tika-vin09t0:1581_8: bhikkhunisaṅghe ovadato tasmiṃ saṅghe vaggasaññivematikasamaggasaññīnaṃ vasena tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1581_9: tathā vematikassa ca dhammakammasaññino cāti nava pācittiyāni. Tenāha “samaggepi
tika-vin09t0:1581_10: bhikkhunisaṅghe navā”tiādi. Dhammakamme pana adhammakammasaññino vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1581_11: ovadato tikadukkaṭaṃ, tathā vematikassa, dhammakammasaññino cāti nava dukkaṭāni.
tika-vin09t0:1581_12: Samaggaṃ pana bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ ovadato aṭṭhāti sattarasa dukkaṭāni. Tenāha “sace
tika-vin09t0:1581_13: panā”tiādi. Aññaṃ dhammanti aññaṃ suttantaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā. “Samaggāmhāyyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1581_14: vacanena hi ovādaṃ paccāsīsanti. Tasmā ṭhapetvā ovādaṃ aññaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa
tika-vin09t0:1581_15: dukkaṭaṃ. Ovādañca aniyyātetvāti “eso bhagini ovādo”ti avatvā. Paripucchaṃ detīti
tika-vin09t0:1581_16: tassāyeva paguṇāya garudhammapāḷiyā atthaṃ bhaṇati. Osārehīti uccārehi, kathehīti
tika-vin09t0:1581_17: attho. Osāretīti aṭṭhagarudhammapāḷiṃ vadati. Pañhaṃ puṭṭhoti garudhammanissitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1581_18: vā khandhādinissitaṃ vā pañhaṃ bhikkhuniyā puṭṭho.
tika-vin09t0:1584: Ekatoupasampannanti bhikkhunisaṅghe upasampannamattaṃ. Ito parampi ca yattha yattha “ekatoupasampanna”nti vuccati, sabbattha ayameva attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1590_0: Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi āmasitabbato āmisaṃ, cīvarādi, āmisameva hetu āmisahetu. Tenāha “cīvarādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1591_2: Tatheva adhammakamme tikadukkaṭaṃ veditabbaṃ. Asammatanti sammatena vā saṅghena vā
tika-vin09t0:1591_3: bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ upasampannaṃ. Nanu ovādasammuti upasampannasseva dīyati, na
tika-vin09t0:1591_4: sāmaṇerassāti āha “tatthā”tiādi. Sammatena vā saṅghena vā ṭhapito pana bahussuto
tika-vin09t0:1591_5: sāmaṇero “asammato”ti veditabbo. Pakatiyā cīvarādihetu ovadantaṃ pana evaṃ bhaṇantassāti
tika-vin09t0:1591_6: pakatiyā cīvarādihetu ovadantaṃ “esa cīvarādihetu ovadatī”ti saññāya evaṃ bhaṇantassa.
tika-vin09t0:1591_7: “Na cīvarādihetu ovadatī”ti saññāya pana evaṃ bhaṇantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Anāmisantaratāti
tika-vin09t0:1591_8: āmisacittābhāvo, “āmisahetu ovadissāmī”ti evaṃ pavattaajjhāsayābhāvoti attho. Cittapariyāyo
tika-vin09t0:1591_9: hettha antarasaddo “yassantarato na santi kopā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin09t0:1597_0: Sūciṃ pavesetvā pavesetvā nīharaṇeti ārāpathe ārāpathe pācittiyaṃ. “Sibbissāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1597_1: pana vicārentassa, chindantassāpi dukkaṭaṃ. Satakkhattumpi vijjhitvā sakiṃ nīharantassāti
tika-vin09t0:1597_2: sakalasūciṃ anīharanto dīghasuttappavesanatthaṃ satakkhattumpi vijjhitvā sakiṃ nīharantassa.
tika-vin09t0:1597_3: “Sibbā”ti vuttoti sakiṃ “cīvaraṃ sibbā”ti vutto. Niṭṭhāpetīti sabbaṃ sūcikammaṃ pariyosāpeti.
tika-vin09t0:1597_4: Tassa ārāpathe ārāpathe pācittiyanti āṇattassa sūciṃ pavesetvā pavesetvā nīharaṇe
tika-vin09t0:1598: Udāyittheranti lāḷudāyittheraṃ. Vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sibbanaṃ vā sibbāpanaṃ vāti “sūciṃ pavesetvā”tiādinā vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sibbanaṃ vā sibbāpanaṃ vā.
tika-vin09t0:1601_0: Saṃvidahitvāti “ehi, asukagāmaṃ gacchāmā”ti vā “sve ahaṃ gacchāmi, tvampi āgaccheyyāsī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1601_1: vā vatvā. Tañca kho saṃvidahanaṃ atthato saṅketakammanti āha “gamanakāle saṅketaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1601_2: katvāti attho”ti. Akappiyabhūmiyaṃ saṃvidahantassāti antogāme, bhikkhuniupassayadvāre,
tika-vin09t0:1601_3: rathikāya, aññesu vā catukkasiṅghāṭakahatthisālādīsu ṭhatvā saṃvidahantassa. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1601_5: Aññassa gāmassāti yato nikkhamati, tato aññassa gāmassa. Taṃ okkamantassāti taṃ antaragāmassa
tika-vin09t0:1601_6: upacāraṃ okkamantassa. Sace dūraṃ gantukāmo hoti, gāmūpacāragaṇanāya okkamante okkamante
tika-vin09t0:1601_7: purimanayeneva āpatti. Tenāha “iti gāmūpacārokkamanagaṇanāya pācittiyānī”ti. Tassa
tika-vin09t0:1601_8: tassa pana gāmassa atikkamane anāpatti. Gāme asatīti addhayojanabbhantare gāme asati.
tika-vin09t0:1601_9: Tasmiṃ pana gāme sati gāmantaragaṇanāyeva pācittiyāni. Addhayojanagaṇanāya pācittiyanti
tika-vin09t0:1601_10: addhayojane addhayojane pācittiyaṃ, ekamekaṃ addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassa “idāni atikkamissāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1601_11: paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ, dutiyapāde pācittiyanti attho. Imasmiñhi naye atikkamane āpatti, okkamane anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1602_0: Visaṅketenāti ettha “purebhattaṃ gamissāmā”ti vatvā pacchābhattaṃ gacchanti, “ajja
tika-vin09t0:1602_1: vā gamissāmā”ti sve gacchanti, evaṃ kālavisaṅketeyeva anāpatti. Dvāravisaṅkete, pana
tika-vin09t0:1602_2: maggavisaṅkete, vā satipi āpattiyeva. Āpadāsūti raṭṭhabhede cakkasamāruḷhā jānapadā
tika-vin09t0:1602_3: pariyāyanti, evarūpāsu āpadāsu anāpatti. Cakkasamāruḷhāti ca iriyāpathacakkaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:1602_4: sakaṭacakkaṃ vā samāruḷhāti attho. Mātugāmasikkhāpadenāti sappāṇakavagge sattamasikkhāpadena.
tika-vin09t0:1605_1: Agāmakatīrapassenāti addhayojanabbhantare gāmānaṃ abhāvato agāmakatīrapassena. Pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1605_2: “uddhaṃgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ vā”ti vacanato pana vāpisamuddādīsu kīḷāpurekkhāratāyapi
tika-vin09t0:1605_3: gacchantassa anāpatti. Tenāha “samudde pana yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Visaṅketenāti
tika-vin09t0:1605_4: idhāpi kālavisaṅketeneva anāpatti, titthavisaṅketena, pana nāvāvisaṅketena vā gacchantassa āpattiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1606_0: Sesanti saddhiṃ samuṭṭhānādīhi avasesaṃ, keci pana “kīḷāpurekkhāro ‘saṃvidahitvā’ti
tika-vin09t0:1606_1: vacanato imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ akusalacittaṃ lokavajjaṃ, tasmā sesaṃ nāma ṭhapetvā ‘paṇṇattivajjaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1606_2: ticitta’nti idaṃ dvayaṃ avasesa”nti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Kīḷāpurekkhāratāya
tika-vin09t0:1606_3: hi abhiruhitvāpi gāmantarokkamane, addhayojanātikkame vā saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā arahattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1606_4: vā sacchikareyya, niddaṃ vā okkameyya, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasi karonto gaccheyya,
tika-vin09t0:1606_5: kuto cassa akusalacittasamaṅgitā, yenidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ akusalacittaṃ, lokavajjañca siyāti.
tika-vin09t0:1609_0: Paripācitanti paripākamāpāditaṃ, yathā labhati, tathā katvā ṭhapitanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1609_1: Tenāha “neva tassā”tiādi tassāti yo paribhuñjeyya, tassa bhikkhuno. Bhikkhussa guṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1609_2: pakāsetvāti “ayyo bhāṇako, ayyo bahussuto”tiādinā guṇaṃ pakāsetvā. Piṇḍapātanti pañcannaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1609_3: bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ. Kammasādhanoyaṃ samārambhasaddoti āha “samāraddha”nti. Paṭiyāditassāti
tika-vin09t0:1609_4: sampāditassa. Yasmā ñātakappavāritehi bhikkhussa atthāya asamāraddhopi piṇḍapāto
tika-vin09t0:1609_5: atthato samāraddhova hoti yathāsukhaṃ harāpetabbato, tasmā “ñātakappavāritānaṃ vā santaka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1610: Ubhayatthāti paripācitāparipācitesu. Avaseseti bhikkhuniparipācitepi yāgukhajjakaphalāphalādike sabbattha. Nimittobhāsaparikathāviññattivasena pana avasesepi dukkaṭato na muccati.
tika-vin09t0:1613_0: Uparīti acelakavagge. Upanandassa catutthasikkhāpadenāti appaṭicchanne mātugāmena
tika-vin09t0:1613_1: saddhiṃ rahonisajjasikkhāpadena. Tañhi upanandattheraṃ ārabbha paññattesu catutthabhāvato
tika-vin09t0:1613_2: “upanandassa catutthasikkhāpada”nti vuttaṃ. Yadi ekaparicchedaṃ, atha kasmā visuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1613_3: paññattanti āha “aṭṭhuppattivasena pana visuṃ paññatta”nti. Tattha aṭṭhuppattivasenāti
tika-vin09t0:1613_4: atthassa uppattivasena, bhikkhuniyā eva rahonisajjāya uppattivasenāti attho. Ayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1613_5: hetthādhippāyo – catutthasikkhāpadavatthuto imassa sikkhāpadassa vatthuno paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1613_6: uppannattā ekaparicchedepi idaṃ paṭhamaṃ visuṃ paññattanti.
tika-vin09t0:1618_0: “Agilāno”ti ettha antamaso dvigāvutaṃ gantuṃ samattho adhippetoti āha “addhayojanampi
tika-vin09t0:1618_1: gantuṃ samatthenā”ti. Āvasathapiṇḍoti āvasathe piṇḍo, sālādīsu anodissa yāvadatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1618_2: paññattaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojananti attho. Tenāha “imesaṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1618_3: Tattha imesaṃ vāti imesaṃ pāsaṇḍānaṃ vā. Ettakānaṃ vāti imasmiṃ pāsaṇḍe ettakānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1618_4: pāsaṇḍānaṃ vā. Pāsaṇḍanti channavutividhaṃ samaṇaparibbājakādiṃ. Te hi taṇhāpāsañceva
tika-vin09t0:1618_5: diṭṭhipāsañca ḍenti oḍḍentīti pāsaṇḍāti vuccanti. Anodissāti anuddisitvā, aparicchinditvāti
tika-vin09t0:1618_6: attho. Sālādīsu yattha katthacīti sālārukkhamūlaabbhokāsādīsu yattha katthaci ṭhānesu.
tika-vin09t0:1618_7: Ekadivasameva bhuñjitabboti ekadivasaṃ sakiṃyeva bhuñjitabbo, ekasmiṃ divase punappunaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1618_8: bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāyāti bhuttadivasassa dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin09t0:1618_9: Ajjhohāre ajjhohāre pācittiyanti ālope ālope kabaḷe kabaḷe pācittiyaṃ. Nānākulehi
tika-vin09t0:1618_10: pana nānāṭṭhānesu paññattaṃ, ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitvā dutiyadivase aññattha
tika-vin09t0:1618_11: bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, paṭipāṭiṃ pana khepetvā puna ādito paṭṭhāya bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1618_12: Ekapūganānāpūgaekagāmanānāgāmesupi eseva nayo. Yopi ekakulassa vā nānākulānaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:1618_13: ekato paññatto taṇḍulādīnaṃ abhāvena antarantarā chijjati, sopi na bhuñjitabbo. Sace
tika-vin09t0:1618_14: pana “na sakkoma dātu”nti upacchinditvā puna kalyāṇacitte uppanne dātuṃ ārabhanti,
tika-vin09t0:1619_0: Tikapācittiyanti agilāne agilānasaññivematikagilānasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1619_1: Gilānassa gilānasaññinoti gilānassa pana “gilāno aha”nti saññino anuvasitvā bhuñjantassa
tika-vin09t0:1619_2: anāpatti. Sakiṃ bhuñjatīti ekadivasaṃ bhuñjati. “Gacchanto vā”ti idaṃ addhayojanavasena
tika-vin09t0:1619_3: gahetabbaṃ, tathā “paccāgacchanto”ti idampīti vadanti. Kenaci upaddavenāti nadipūracorabhayādinā
tika-vin09t0:1619_4: kenaci upaddavena. Aññanti yāgukhajjakaphalāphalādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci aññaṃ. Anuvasitvāti puna vasitvā.
tika-vin09t0:1622_0: Gaṇabhojaneti gaṇena laddhattā gaṇassa santake bhojane. Tenāha “gaṇassa bhojane”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1622_1: Nanu cettha “gaṇassa bhojane”ti vuccati, so ca kho gaṇo “katthaci dvīhi, katthaci
tika-vin09t0:1622_2: tīhī”tiādinā anekadhā adhippeto, idha katihīti āha “idha cā”tiādi. Taṃ panetaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1622_3: dvīhi pakārehi pasavati nimantanato vā viññattito vāti āha “tesaṃ nimantanato vā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1622_4: Tattha nimantanato vāti akappiyanimantanato vā. Odanādīnaṃ pañcannanti odanasattukummāsamacchamaṃsānaṃ pañcannaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1623_0: “Odanena nimantemi, odanaṃ me gaṇhathā”tiādinā nayena yena kenaci vevacanena vā bhāsantarena
tika-vin09t0:1623_1: vā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā nimantetīti sambandho. Cattāroti ekaṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:1623_2: vā nānāṭṭhānesu vā ṭhite cattāro bhikkhū. Lakkhaṇavacanañcetaṃ, tasmā cattāro vā
tika-vin09t0:1623_3: tato vā adhike bhikkhūti attho. Vevacanena vāti bhattaannādipariyāyasaddena vā. Bhāsantarena
tika-vin09t0:1623_4: vāti andhadamiḷādibhāsantarena vā. Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvāti pañcannaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1623_5: bhojanānaṃ aññatarassa nāmaṃ gahetvā. Odanena nimantemīti tumhe bhante odanena nimantemi.
tika-vin09t0:1623_6: Ādisaddena “ākaṅkhatha oloketha adhivāsetha paṭimānetha, sattunā nimantemi, sattuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1623_7: me gaṇhatha ākaṅkhatha oloketha adhivāsetha paṭimānethā”tiādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Ekato vāti
tika-vin09t0:1623_8: ekattha ṭhite vā nisinne vā bhikkhū disvā “tumhe, bhante, odanena nimantemī”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1623_9: evaṃ ekato nimantitā. Nānāto vā nimantitāti cattāri pariveṇāni vā vihāre vā gantvā
tika-vin09t0:1623_10: nānāto vā nimantitā. Ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitesuyeva vā eko puttena, eko pitarāti evampi nimantitā
tika-vin09t0:1623_11: nānātoyeva nimantitā nāma honti. Ekato gaṇhantiti aññamaññassa dvādasahatthūpacāre ṭhitā gaṇhanti.
tika-vin09t0:1624_0: Kasmā pana nānāto bhuttepi gaṇabhojanaṃ hotīti āha “paṭiggahaṇameva hettha pamāṇa”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1624_1: Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā pāḷiyaṃ “gaṇabhojanaṃ nāma yattha cattāro bhikkhū pañcannaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1624_2: bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantitā bhuñjanti, etaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ?
tika-vin09t0:1624_3: Taṃ paṭiggahaṇaniyamanatthameva. Na hi appaṭiggahitakaṃ bhikkhū bhuñjantīti “bhuñjantī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1624_4: padaṃ paṭiggahaṇaniyamavacanaṃ hoti. Ekato vā nānāto vā viññāpetvāti cattāro bhikkhū
tika-vin09t0:1624_5: ekato ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā upāsakaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ catunnampi bhattaṃ dehī”ti vā pāṭekkaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1624_6: pavisitvā “mayhaṃ bhattaṃ dehi, mayhaṃ bhattaṃ dehī”ti vā ekato vā nānāto vā viññāpetvā.
tika-vin09t0:1624_7: Tassa duvidhassāpīti yañca nimantanato laddhaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ, yañca viññattito laddhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1624_8: tassa duvidhassāpi gaṇabhojanassa. Evaṃ paṭiggahaṇeti ekato paṭiggahaṇe.
tika-vin09t0:1625_0: Pādānampi phalitattāti antamaso pādānampi yathā mahācammassa parato maṃsaṃ dissati,
tika-vin09t0:1625_1: evaṃ phalitattā. Na sakkā piṇḍāya caritunti vālikāya vā sakkharāya vā phuṭṭhamatte
tika-vin09t0:1625_2: dukkhuppattito antogāme piṇḍāya carituṃ na sakkoti. Cīvare kariyamāneti sāṭakañca
tika-vin09t0:1625_3: suttañca labhitvā cīvare kariyamāne. Yaṃ kiñci cīvare kattabbakammanti cīvaravicāraṇachindanamoghasuttāropanādi
tika-vin09t0:1625_4: yaṃ kiñci cīvare kattabbaṃ kammaṃ, antamaso sūcivedhanampīti adhippāyo. “Addhayojanampī”tiādi
tika-vin09t0:1625_5: avakaṃsato vuttaṃ. Yo pana dūraṃ gantukāmo, tattha vattabbameva natthi, gacchanto
tika-vin09t0:1625_6: addhayojanabbhantare gāvutepi bhuñjituṃ labhati, gato pana ekadivasaṃ. Yadā nāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1625_7: abhiruhitukāmo vā hoti āruḷho vā oruḷho vā, ayaṃ nāvābhiruhanasamayo nāmāti āha “nāvābhiruhanasamayepi
tika-vin09t0:1625_8: eseva nayo”ti. Ayaṃ pana viseso – abhiruḷhena icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvāpi yāva na orohati,
tika-vin09t0:1625_9: tāva bhuñjitabbaṃ. Cattāro bhikkhūti antimaparicchedo. Yattha pana sataṃ vā sahassaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1625_10: vā sannipatitaṃ, tattha vattabbameva natthi. Tasmā tādise kāle “mahāsamayo”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā
tika-vin09t0:1625_11: bhuñjitabbaṃ. Yo koci pabbajitoti sahadhammikesu vā titthiyesu vā aññataro.
tika-vin09t0:1626_0: Ye ca dve tayo ekato gaṇhantīti yepi akappiyanimantanaṃ sādiyitvā dve vā tayo vā
tika-vin09t0:1626_1: ekato gaṇhanti, tesampi anāpatti. Paṇītabhojanasūpodanaviññattīhi pana āpattiyevāti
tika-vin09t0:1626_2: vadanti, upaparikkhitabbaṃ. Niccabhattādīsūti niccabhatte salākabhatte pakkhike uposathike
tika-vin09t0:1626_3: pāṭipadike. Tattha niccabhattanti dhuvabhattaṃ vuccati. “Niccabhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1626_4: vadanti, bahūnampi ekato gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. Salākabhattādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:1629_0: Gaṇabhojane vuttanayenevāti bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā “tumhe, bhante, odanena nimantemi,
tika-vin09t0:1629_1: odanaṃ me gaṇhathā”tiādinā nayena yena kenaci vevacanena vā bhāsantarena vā pañcannaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1629_2: bhojanānaṃ aññatarassa nāmaṃ gahetvā nimantetīti vutteneva nayena. Nimantitassāti
tika-vin09t0:1629_4: apariccajitvāti attho. Ayañhi bhattavikappanā nāma sammukhāparammukhāpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1630_0: Aññatra nimantanabhojanavatthusminti aññatra paṭhamaṃ nimantitā hutvā aññasmiṃ nimantane
tika-vin09t0:1630_1: bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ. Yadi tividhā anupaññatti, atha kasmā parivāre “catasso anupaññattiyo”ti
tika-vin09t0:1630_2: vuttanti āha “parivāre panā”tiādi. Vikappanampi gahetvāti vikappanānujānanampi anupaññattisamānanti
tika-vin09t0:1630_3: anupaññattibhāvena gahetvā. Ekasaṃsaṭṭhānīti ekasmiṃ missitāni. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
tika-vin09t0:1630_4: – dve tīṇi kulāni nimantetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīdāpetvā ito cito ca āharitvā bhattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1630_5: ākiranti, sūpabyañjanaṃ ākiranti, ekamissakaṃ hoti, ettha anāpattīti. Sace pana mūlanimantanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1630_6: heṭṭhā hoti, pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ upari, taṃ uparito paṭṭhāya bhuñjantassa āpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1630_7: Hatthaṃ pana anto pavesetvā paṭhamanimantanato ekampi kabaḷaṃ uddharitvā bhuttakālato
tika-vin09t0:1630_8: paṭṭhāya yathā tathā vā bhuñjantassa anāpatti. Dve tīṇi nimantanāni ekato vā katvā
tika-vin09t0:1630_9: bhuñjatīti dve tīṇi nimantanāni ekato pakkhipitvā missetvā ekaṃ katvā bhuñjatīti
tika-vin09t0:1630_10: attho. “Sakalena gāmena vā”tiādīsu sakalena gāmena ekato hutvā nimantitasseva yattha
tika-vin09t0:1630_11: katthaci bhuñjato anāpatti. Pūgepi eseva nayo. Nimantiyamāno vā “bhikkhaṃ gahessāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1630_12: vadatīti “bhattaṃ gaṇhā”ti nimantiyamāno “na mayhaṃ tava bhattena attho, bhikkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1630_13: gahessāmī”ti bhaṇati. Kiriyākiriyanti ettha bhojanaṃ kiriyaṃ, avikappanaṃ akiriyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1633_0: Paheṇakatthāyāti paṇṇākāratthāya. Pātheyyatthāyāti maggaṃ gacchantānaṃ antarāmaggatthāya.
tika-vin09t0:1633_1: Sattūti baddhasattu, abaddhasattu ca. Dvattipattapūre paṭiggahetvāti mukhavaṭṭiyā
tika-vin09t0:1633_2: heṭṭhimalekhāya samaṃ pūre dvattipattapūre gahetvāti attho. Imassa catthassa heṭṭhā
tika-vin09t0:1633_3: vuttanayeneva pākaṭattā tattha kattabbappakārameva dassetuṃ “etthā”tiādimāha. Sesanti
tika-vin09t0:1633_4: tato ekapattato aññaṃ pattaṃ. Sace tayo pattapūrā gahitā dve, sace dve gahitā, ekanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1634: Gamane vā paṭippassaddheti antarāmagge upaddavaṃ disvā, anatthikatāya vā “mayaṃ idāni na pesissāma na gamissāmā”ti evaṃ gamane upacchinne dentānanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1637_0: Bhuttavāti katabhattakicco. Sāsapamattampi ajjhoharitanti evaṃ parittampi bhojanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1637_1: saṅkhāditvā vā asaṅkhāditvā vā gilitaṃ. Pavāritoti paṭikkhepito. Yo hi bhuñjanto
tika-vin09t0:1637_2: parivesakena upanītaṃ bhojanaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati, so tena pavārito paṭikkhipito
tika-vin09t0:1637_3: nāma hoti. Byañjanaṃ pana anādiyitvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ “katappavāraṇo katappaṭikkhepoti
tika-vin09t0:1637_4: attho”ti vuttaṃ. Sopi ca paṭikkhepo yasmā na paṭikkhepamattena, atha kho pañcaṅgavasena.
tika-vin09t0:1638_0: Bhojanaṃ paññāyatīti pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ pattādīsu dissati. Tenāha “pavāraṇappahonakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1638_1: ce bhojana”ntiādi. Sālīti antamaso nīvāraṃ upādāya sabbāpi sālijāti. Vīhīti sabbāpi
tika-vin09t0:1638_2: vīhijāti. Yavagodhumesu bhedo natthi. Kaṅgūti setarattakāḷabhedā sabbāpi kaṅgujāti.
tika-vin09t0:1638_3: Varakoti antamaso varakacorakaṃ upādāya sabbāpi setavaṇṇā varakajāti. Kudrūsakoti
tika-vin09t0:1638_4: kāḷakodravo ceva sāmākādibhedā ca sabbāpi tiṇadhaññajāti.
tika-vin09t0:1639_1: yaṃ kiñci yāguṃ. Imināva pāyāsassāpi gahitattā “ambilapāyāsādīsu aññataraṃ pacāmāti
tika-vin09t0:1639_2: vā”ti na vuttaṃ. Pavāraṇaṃ janetīti anatirittabhojanāpattinibandhanaṃ paṭikkhepaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1639_3: sādheti. Sace pana odhi na paññāyati, yāgusaṅgahaṃ gacchati, pavāraṇaṃ na janeti.
tika-vin09t0:1639_4: Puna pavāraṇaṃ janeti ghanabhāvagamanato paṭṭhāya bhojanasaṅgahitattāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1640_0: Udakakañjikakhīrādīni ākiritvāti udakañceva kañjikañca khīrādīni ca ākiritvā tehi
tika-vin09t0:1640_1: saddhiṃ amadditvā bhattamissake katvā. Tenāha “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”tiādi. Sace pana bhatte
tika-vin09t0:1640_2: udakakañjikakhīrādīni ākiritvā madditvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti denti, pavāraṇā na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1640_3: Yāguyāpīti evaṃ yāgusaṅgahaṃ gatāya vā aññāya vā yāguyāpi. Suddharasako, pana rasakayāgu vā na janeti.
tika-vin09t0:1641_1: khāditāni honti…pe… na pavāretī”ti vuttaṃ. Akappiyamaṃsaṃ, akappiyabhojanañca buddhapaṭikuṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1641_2: paṭikkhipato pavāraṇāya avatthutāya na pavāraṇā hotīti āha “yo panā”tiādi. Yañhi
tika-vin09t0:1641_3: bhikkhuno khādituṃ vaṭṭati, taṃ eva paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti. Idaṃ pana jānanto
tika-vin09t0:1641_4: akappiyattā paṭikkhipati. Ajānantopi paṭikkhipitabbaṭṭhāne ṭhitameva paṭikkhipati
tika-vin09t0:1641_5: nāma, tasmā na pavāreti. Sace pana akappiyamaṃsaṃ khādanto kappiyamaṃsaṃ vā bhojanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1641_6: vā paṭikkhipati, pavāreti. Kasmā? Vatthutāya. Yañhi tena paṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ pavāraṇāya
tika-vin09t0:1641_7: vatthu. Yaṃ pana khādati, taṃ kiñcāpi paṭikkhipitabbaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ, khādiyamānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1641_8: pana maṃsabhāvaṃ na jahati, tasmā pavāreti. Ko pana vādo kappiyamaṃsaṃ khādato kappiyamaṃsabhojanappaṭikkhepe.
tika-vin09t0:1642_0: Bhojane satīti pañcasu bhojanesu ekasmimpi bhojane sati. Aññaṃ vuttalakkhaṇaṃ bhojananti
tika-vin09t0:1642_1: pattādigatato aññaṃ vuttalakkhaṇaṃ pañcasu bhojanesu ekampi bhojanaṃ. “Nirapekkho
tika-vin09t0:1642_2: hotī”ti etasseva vivaraṇaṃ “yaṃ pattādīsū”tiādi. Na kevalaṃ nirapekkho vāti āha “aññatra
tika-vin09t0:1642_3: vā”tiādi. So paṭikkhipantopi na pavāretīti tasmiṃ ce antare aññaṃ bhojanaṃ abhihaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1642_4: taṃ so paṭikkhipantopi na pavāreti. Kasmā? Vippakatabhojanabhāvassa upacchinnattā.
tika-vin09t0:1643_0: “Upanāmetī”ti iminā kāyābhihāraṃ dasseti. Hatthe vā ādhārake vāti ettha vā-saddo
tika-vin09t0:1643_1: avuttavikappattho, tena “ūrūsu vā”ti vikappeti. Dūre nisinnassa daharabhikkhussa
tika-vin09t0:1643_2: pattaṃ pesetvā “ito odanaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vadati, gaṇhitvā pana gato tuṇhī tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:1643_3: tampi paṭikkhipato eseva nayo. Kasmā? Bhikkhussa dūrabhāvato, dūtassa ca anabhiharaṇato.
tika-vin09t0:1643_4: Sace pana gahetvā āgato bhikkhu “imaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadati, taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā
tika-vin09t0:1644_0: Bhattapacchiṃ gahetvā parivisantassāti ekena hatthena bhattapacchiṃ gahetvā ekena
tika-vin09t0:1644_1: hatthena kaṭacchuṃ gahetvā parivisantassa. Añño “ahaṃ dhāressāmī”ti gahitamattakameva
tika-vin09t0:1644_2: karotīti añño āgantvā “ahaṃ pacchiṃ dhāressāmi, tvaṃ odanaṃ dehī”ti vatvā gahitamattakameva
tika-vin09t0:1644_3: karoti. Abhihaṭāva hotīti parivesakeneva abhihaṭāva hoti. Idāni asati tassa dātukāmābhihāre
tika-vin09t0:1644_4: gahaṇasamayepi paṭikkhipato na hotīti dassetuṃ “sace panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Uddhaṭeti
tika-vin09t0:1644_5: uddhaṭe bhatte. Kaṭacchuabhihāroyeva hi tassa abhihāroti adhippāyo. Anantarassa diyyamāneti
tika-vin09t0:1644_6: anantarassa bhikkhuno bhatte diyyamāne. Kāyavikārenāti “aṅguliṃ vā hatthaṃ vā macchikabījaniṃ
tika-vin09t0:1644_7: vā cīvarakaṇṇaṃ vā cāleti, bhamukāya vā ākāraṃ karoti, kuddho vā oloketī”ti evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1644_8: vuttena aṅgulicalanādinā kāyavikārena. “Alaṃ mā dehī”tiādinā vacīvikārenāti “ala”nti
tika-vin09t0:1644_9: vā “na gaṇhāmī”ti vā “mā ākirā”ti vā “apagacchā”ti vā evaṃ yena kenaci vacīvikārena.
tika-vin09t0:1645_0: Abhihaṭe pana bhatte pavāraṇāya bhīto hatthe apanetvā punappunaṃ patte odanaṃ ākirantaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1645_1: “ākira ākira, koṭṭetvā pūrehī”ti vadato pavāraṇā na hoti. Esa nayo bhattaṃ abhiharantaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1645_2: bhikkhuṃ sallakkhetvā “kiṃ, āvuso, itopi kiñci gaṇhissasi, dammi te kiñcī”ti vadatopi.
tika-vin09t0:1646_0: “Rasaṃ paṭiggaṇhathā”ti appavāraṇājanakassa nāmaṃ gahetvā vuttattā “taṃ sutvā paṭikkhipato
tika-vin09t0:1646_1: pavāraṇā natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Maṃsarasanti ettha pana na kevalaṃ maṃsassa rasaṃ “maṃsarasa”micceva
tika-vin09t0:1646_2: viññāyati, atha kho maṃsañca rasañca maṃsarasanti evaṃ pavāraṇājanakanāmavasenāpi.
tika-vin09t0:1646_3: Tasmā taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇāva hotīti āha “maṃsarasanti vutte pana paṭikkhipato
tika-vin09t0:1646_4: pavāraṇā hotī”ti. Parato macchamaṃsaṃ byañjananti etthāpi eseva nayo. Yasmiṃ iriyāpathe
tika-vin09t0:1646_5: pavāreti, taṃ avikopenteneva bhuñjitabbanti yo gacchanto pavāreti, tena gacchanteneva
tika-vin09t0:1646_6: bhuñjitabbaṃ. Kaddamaṃ vā udakaṃ vā patvā ṭhitena atirittaṃ kāretabbaṃ. Sace antarā
