tika-vin09t0:1646_7: nadī pūrā hoti, naditīre gumbaṃ anupariyāyantena bhuñjitabbaṃ. Atha nāvā vā setu
tika-vin09t0:1646_8: vā atthi, taṃ abhiruhitvāpi caṅkamanteneva bhuñjitabbaṃ, gamanaṃ na upacchinditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1646_9: Esa nayo itarairiyāpathesupi. Taṃ taṃ iriyāpathaṃ kopentena atirittaṃ kāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1646_10: Yo ukkuṭikova nisīditvā pavāreti, tena ukkuṭikeneva bhuñjitabbaṃ. Tassa pana heṭṭhā
tika-vin09t0:1646_11: palālapīṭhaṃ vā kiñci vā nisīdanaṃ dātabbaṃ. Pīṭhake nisīditvā pavāritena pana āsanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1646_12: acāletvāva catasso disā parivattantena bhuñjituṃ labbhati. Mañce nisīditvā pavāritena
tika-vin09t0:1646_13: ito vā etto vā saṃsarituṃ na labbhati. Sace pana saha mañcena ukkhipitvā aññatra
tika-vin09t0:1646_14: nenti, vaṭṭati. Nipajjitvā pavāritenāpi nipanneneva bhuñjitabbaṃ. Parivattantena
tika-vin09t0:1646_15: yena passena nipanno, tassa ṭhānaṃ nātikkametabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1647_0: Alametaṃ sabbanti etaṃ sabbaṃ alaṃ pariyattaṃ, idampi te adhikaṃ, ito aññaṃ na lacchasīti
tika-vin09t0:1647_1: adhippāyo. Yo atirittaṃ karotīti yo “alametaṃ sabba”nti atirittaṃ karoti. Paṭipakkhanayenāti
tika-vin09t0:1647_2: “kappiyakataṃ, paṭiggahitakataṃ, uccāritakataṃ, hatthapāse kataṃ, bhuttāvinā kataṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1647_3: bhuttāvinā pavāritena āsanā avuṭṭhitena kataṃ ‘alametaṃ sabba’nti vutta”nti imehi
tika-vin09t0:1647_4: sattahi vinayakammākārehi yaṃ atirittaṃ kappiyaṃ kataṃ, yañca gilānātirittaṃ, tadubhayampi
tika-vin09t0:1647_5: atirittanti evaṃ tasseva paṭipakkhanayena. Ettha ca “alametaṃ sabba”nti tikkhattuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1647_6: vattabbaṃ, ayaṃ kira āciṇṇo. Vinayadharā pana “sakiṃ eva vattabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1648_0: Kasmā taṃ so puna kātuṃ na labhatīti āha “yañhī”tiādi. Tattha yañhi akatanti yena
tika-vin09t0:1648_1: paṭhamaṃ kappiyaṃ kataṃ, tena yaṃ akataṃ, taṃ kātabbaṃ. Paṭhamabhājane pana kātuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1648_2: na labbhati. Yena ca akatanti aññena bhikkhunā yena paṭhamaṃ na kataṃ, tena ca kātabbanti
tika-vin09t0:1648_3: attho. Vuttanti sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Aññasmiṃ pana bhājaneti yasmiṃ pana bhājane
tika-vin09t0:1648_4: paṭhamaṃ kataṃ, tato aññasmiṃ patte vā kuṇḍe vā pacchiyaṃ vā yattha katthaci purato
tika-vin09t0:1649_0: Aññatra bhuñjanavatthusminti bhuttāvinā pavāritena hutvā aññatra bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1649_1: Tikapācittiyanti anatiritte anatirittasaññivematikaatirittasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1649_2: Ajjhoharato ca dukkaṭanti ajjhoharato ajjhohāre ajjhohāre dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana āmisasaṃsaṭṭhāni
tika-vin09t0:1649_3: honti, āhāratthāyapi anāhāratthāyapi paṭiggahetvā ajjhoharantassa pācittiyameva.
tika-vin09t0:1649_5: pipāsāya sati pipāsacchedanatthaṃ, sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikañca tena tena upasametabbake
tika-vin09t0:1649_6: ābādhe sati tassa upasamanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. Idampi ajjhoharaṇato kāyakammaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1649_7: vācāya “atirittaṃ karotha bhante”ti akārāpanena vacīkammanti āha “samuṭṭhānādīni
tika-vin09t0:1649_8: paṭhamakathinasadisānevā”ti. Kiriyākiriyanti ettha paṭikkhipitvā bhuñjanaṃ kiriyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1652: Sutvā vāti aññena vā teneva vā ārocitaṃ sutvā. “Bhuttasmiṃ pācittiya”nti vuttattā bhojanapariyosāne pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1655_0: Vikāleti ettha aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhiko, ayaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1655_1: āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo nāma. Tadañño vikālo “vigato kālo”ti katvā. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1655_2: “vigate kāle”tiādi. Ṭhitamajjhanhikopi kālasaṅgahaṃ gacchati. Tato paṭṭhāya pana
tika-vin09t0:1655_3: khādituṃ vā bhuñjituṃ vā na sakkā. Sahasā pivituṃ sakkā bhaveyya, kukkuccakena pana
tika-vin09t0:1655_4: na kātabbaṃ. Kālaparicchedajānanatthañca kālatthambho yojetabbo. Kālabbhantareva
tika-vin09t0:1655_5: bhattakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ. “Yaṃ kiñci…pe… khādanīyaṃ vā”ti iminā yaṃ tāva sakkhalimodakādi
tika-vin09t0:1655_6: pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇamayaṃ, tattha vattabbameva natthīti dasseti. Bhojanīyaṃ nāma pañca bhojanāni.
tika-vin09t0:1656_0: Sati paccayeti pipāsādikāraṇe vijjamāne. Romaṭṭhakassāti romaṭṭhakassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin09t0:1656_1: ajjhoharitvā uggiritvā mukheva ṭhapito bahi mukhadvārā viniggato bhojanassa maggā
tika-vin09t0:1656_2: bahi niggato “romaṭṭho”ti pavuccati. Idha pana ajjhoharitvā uggiritvā mukheva ṭhapitoti
tika-vin09t0:1656_3: adhippeto. Tenāha “na ca, bhikkhave”tiādi. Ṭhapetvā romaṭṭhakaṃ sesānaṃ āgataṃ uggāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1656_4: mukhe sandhāretvā gilantānaṃ āpatti. Sace pana asandhārentameva paragalaṃ gacchati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1659_0: “Kāro karaṇaṃ kiriyāti atthato eka”nti etena kārasaddassa bhāvatthataṃ dasseti. Sammā
tika-vin09t0:1659_1: nidhānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ sannidhi. “Paṭiggahetvā ekarattaṃ vītināmitassetaṃ nāma”nti iminā
tika-vin09t0:1659_2: paṭiggahetvā ekarattaṃ vītināmite imassa duddhotabhāvaṃ dasseti. Kiñcāpi yāmakālikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1659_3: khādanīyaṃ, bhojanīyaṃ vā na hoti, “anāpatti yāmakālikaṃ yāme nidahitvā bhuñjatī”tiādi
tika-vin09t0:1659_4: vacanato pana tatthāpi yāmātikkame sannidhipaccayā pācittiyena bhavitabbanti “yaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1659_5: kiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ. Idāni duddhotabhāvameva vibhāvetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1659_6: “yaṃ aṅguliyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ aṅguliyā ghaṃsantassa lekhā paññāyatīti yaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1659_7: pattaṃ dhotaṃ aṅguliyā ghaṃsantassa patte aṅgulilekhā paññāyati, so patto duddhoto
tika-vin09t0:1659_8: hotīti attho. Telavaṇṇapatte pana aṅgulilekhā paññāyati, sā abbohārikā. Snehoti telaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1659_9: Sandissatīti yāguyā upari sandissati. Tādise pattepīti paṭiggahaṇaṃ avissajjitvā
tika-vin09t0:1659_10: sayaṃ vā aññena vā bhojanaṃ nīharitvā na sammā dhote pattepi. Punadivase bhuñjantassa
tika-vin09t0:1659_11: pācittiyanti patte laggaṃ avijahitappaṭiggahaṇaṃ hotīti dutiyadivase bhuñjantassa
tika-vin09t0:1659_12: pācittiyaṃ. Pariccatte pana patte punadivase bhuñjantassa anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1660_0: Yaṃ panāti yaṃ bhojanaṃ pana. Apariccattameva hīti anapekkhavissajjanena vā anupasampannassa
tika-vin09t0:1660_1: nirapekkhadānena vā apariccattameva. Kappiya bhojananti antamaso ekasitthamattampi
tika-vin09t0:1660_2: kappiyabhojanaṃ. Akappiyesūti akappiyamaṃsesu. Sesesūti manussamaṃsato avasesesu
tika-vin09t0:1660_4: ca. Pāḷiyaṃ “sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1660_5: sannihitesu sattāhakālikayāvajīvikesu purebhattampi āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇepi dukkaṭassa
tika-vin09t0:1660_6: vuttattā yāmakālikepi āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇepi visuṃ dukkaṭenāpi bhavitabbanti āha
tika-vin09t0:1660_8: bhuñjantassā”tiādinā vuttesu sabbesu vikappesu aparampi pācittiyaṃ vaḍḍhati. Idaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1660_9: vuttaṃ hoti – kappiyabhojane dve pācittiyāni, manussamaṃse thullaccayena saddhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1660_10: dve pācittiyāni, avasesesu pana akappiyamaṃsesu dukkaṭena saddhiṃ dve pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1660_11: Yāmakālikaṃ sati paccaye sāmisena mukhena ajjhoharato dve pācittiyāni, nirāmisena
tika-vin09t0:1660_12: ekameva. Āhāratthāya ajjhoharato vikappadvayepi dukkaṭena saddhinti.
tika-vin09t0:1661_0: Avasesesūti yāmakālikādito avasesesu. Pācittiyaṃ vaḍḍhatiyevāti aparampi pācittiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1661_1: vaḍḍhatiyeva. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace vikāle ajjhoharati, pakatibhojane sannidhipaccayā
tika-vin09t0:1661_2: ca vikālabhojanapaccayā ca dve pācittiyāni, akappiyamaṃsesu manussamaṃse thullaccayena
tika-vin09t0:1661_3: saddhiṃ dve pācittiyāni, avasesesu dukkaṭena saddhiṃ dveti.
tika-vin09t0:1662_0: Belaṭṭhasīso nāma jaṭilasahassassa abbhantare eko mahāthero. Tikapācittiyanti sannidhikārake
tika-vin09t0:1662_2: saṃsaṭṭharasāni. Sambhinnarasaṃ sandhāyeva hi “tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ kāle kappatī”tiādi
tika-vin09t0:1662_3: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “tasmā”tiādi. Ettha ca asambhinnarasanti amissitarasaṃ. Idañca sītalapāyāsādinā
tika-vin09t0:1662_4: saha laddhaṃ sappipiṇḍādikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Sudhotaṃ vā”ti idaṃ pana piṇḍapātena
tika-vin09t0:1662_5: saddhiṃ laddhaṃ takkolajātiphalādiṃ, yāguādīsu pakkhipitvā dinnasiṅgīverādikañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1663_0: Tenāti sattāhakālikena. Tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ assāti tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ, tena tadahupaṭiggahitena.
tika-vin09t0:1663_1: Esa nayo “dvīhapaṭiggahitenā”tiādīsupi. Tasmāti yasmā purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitampi
tika-vin09t0:1663_2: vaṭṭati, tasmā. Paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhaṃ kappatīti vuttanti “sattāhakālikena, bhikkhave,
tika-vin09t0:1663_3: yāvajīvikaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhaṃ kappati, sattāhātikkante na kappatī”ti bhesajjakkhandhake
tika-vin09t0:1663_4: vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi mukhe ekarattaṃ na vuttaṃ, tathāpi mukhe pakkhittameva yasmā sannidhi
tika-vin09t0:1664_0: Catasso kappiyabhūmiyoti ussāvanantikā, gonisādikā, gahapati, sammutīti catasso kappiyakuṭiyo.
tika-vin09t0:1664_1: Tattha ussāvanantikā nāma gehe kariyamāne samparivāretvā ṭhitehi “kappiyakuṭiṃ karoma,
tika-vin09t0:1664_2: kappiyakuṭiṃ karomā”ti vā “kappiyakuṭi kappiyakuṭī”ti vā vadantehi ṭhapitapaṭhamiṭṭhakathambhādikā
tika-vin09t0:1664_3: saṅghassa vā ekassa bhikkhuno vā kuṭi. Yo pana ārāmo yebhuyyena vā aparikkhitto hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1664_4: sakalopi vā, so “gonisādī”ti vuccati. Gahapatīti yā ṭhapetvā bhikkhuṃ sesehi “kappiyakuṭiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1664_5: demā”ti dinnā, tesaṃ vā santakā. Sammuti nāma kammavācāya sāvetvā katā. Kathaṃ panetāsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1664_6: vinicchayo jānitabboti āha “tāsaṃ vinicchayo samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1667_0: “Paṇītabhojanānī”ti idaṃ majjhe padalopaṃ katvā niddiṭṭhanti āha “paṇītasaṃsaṭṭhānī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1667_1: Sabbopi “odako”ti vuttalakkhaṇo macchoti “maccho nāma odako vuccatī”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge
tika-vin09t0:1667_2: vuttalakkhaṇo, sabbopi maccho eva. Yo koci udake jāto maccho nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1668: “Agilānena bhikkhunā catumāsapaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā aññatra punapavāraṇāya aññatra niccapavāraṇāya. Tato ce uttari sādiyeyya, pācittiya”nti –
tika-vin09t0:1669_0: Iminā sikkhāpadena. Ettha hi saṅghavasena gilānapaccayapavāraṇāya pavāritaṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:1669_1: sace tattha rattīhi vā bhesajjehi vā paricchedo kato hoti “ettikāyeva rattiyo, ettakāni
tika-vin09t0:1669_2: vā bhesajjāni viññāpetabbānī”ti, tato rattipariyantato vā bhesajjapariyantato vā
tika-vin09t0:1669_3: uttari nabhesajjakaraṇīyena vā bhesajjaṃ, aññabhesajjakaraṇīyena vā aññaṃ bhesajjaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1669_4: viññāpentassa pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā agilāno gilānasaññīpi hutvā pañca bhesajjāni
tika-vin09t0:1669_5: viññāpento nabhesajjakaraṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpento nāma hotīti “mahānāmasikkhāpadena
tika-vin09t0:1670_0: Yo pana nabhesajjatthāya viññāpeti, atha kho kevalaṃ attano bhuñjanatthāya, so sūpodanaviññattiyāyeva
tika-vin09t0:1670_1: kāretabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “suddhāni sappiādīni viññāpetvā bhuñjanto
tika-vin09t0:1670_2: pācittiyaṃ nāpajjati, sekhiyesu sūpodanaviññattidukkaṭaṃ āpajjatī”ti. Sūpodanaviññattiyā
tika-vin09t0:1670_3: kāretabboti “na sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno”tiādinā sikkhāpadena kāretabbo, dukkaṭena
tika-vin09t0:1670_4: kāretabboti vuttaṃ hoti. Imināti iminā paṇītabhojanasikkhāpadena.
tika-vin09t0:1671_0: “Sappibhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte kiṃ hotīti āha “sappibhattaṃ ‘dehī’ti vutte panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1671_1: Sūpodanaviññattiyā dukkaṭameva hotīti sambandho. Kasmāti āha “yasmā”tiādi. Atha yathā
tika-vin09t0:1671_2: “paṇītabhojanānī”ti, evaṃ “sappibhatta”nti idampi kasmā na viññāyatīti ce? Anekantikattā.
tika-vin09t0:1671_4: ayamattho ekantato paññāyati, “sappibhatta”nti vutte pana “sappimayaṃ bhattaṃ sappibhatta”ntipi
tika-vin09t0:1671_5: viññāyamānattā ‘sappisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ bhattaṃ sappibhatta”nti ayamattho na ekantato paññāyati.
tika-vin09t0:1672_0: Purimanayenevāti “bhattaṃ datvā sappiṃ katvā bhuñjā”ti purimeneva nayena. Sace pana
tika-vin09t0:1672_1: “sappinā”ti vutte kevalaṃ sesesu navanītādīsu aññatarena deti, visaṅketameva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1672_2: Anāpattīti visaṅketattā sabbāhiyeva āpattīhi anāpatti. “Kiñcāpi anāpatti, attano
tika-vin09t0:1672_3: pana payogena nibbattattā na bhuñjitabba”nti vadanti. Kappiyasappināti kappiyamaṃsasappinā.
tika-vin09t0:1672_4: Esa nayo akappiyasappināti etthāpi. Kappiyākappiyatā hi maṃsānaṃyeva, na sappiādīnaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1672_5: Ṭhapetvā ekaṃ manussavasātelaṃ sabbesaṃ khīradadhisappinavanītavasātelesu akappiyaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-vin09t0:1673_0: Paribhogepi dukkaṭameva idha anadhippetattāti adhippāyo. Sace asati akappiyasappimhi
tika-vin09t0:1673_1: purimanayeneva akappiyanavanītādīni deti “sappiṃ katvā bhuñjā”ti, akappiyasappināva
tika-vin09t0:1673_2: dinnaṃ hoti. Yathā ca “kappiyasappinā dehī”ti vutte akappiyasappinā deti, visaṅketaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1673_3: evaṃ “‘akappiyasappinā’ti vutte kappiyasappinā detī”ti etthāpi paṭipāṭiyā ekamekaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1673_4: vitthāretvā vuccamānepi ayamevattho vattabbo siyā, so ca saṅkhepenapi sakkā viññātunti
tika-vin09t0:1673_5: vitthāranayaṃ hitvā imināva nayena sabbapadesu vinicchayo veditabboti vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha
tika-vin09t0:1673_6: saṅkhepattho – yena yena viññatti hoti, tasmiṃ vā tassa mūle vā laddhe taṃ taṃ laddhameva
tika-vin09t0:1673_7: hoti. Sace pana aññaṃ pāḷiyā āgataṃ vā anāgataṃ vā deti, visaṅketanti. Nānāṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:1673_8: vāti tasmiṃyeva ghare sappiṃ, itarasmiṃ navanītantiādinā nānāṭṭhāne vā.
tika-vin09t0:1676_0: Kāyenāti hatthādīsu yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena, antamaso pādaṅguliyāpi gaṇhanto kāyena
tika-vin09t0:1676_1: gaṇhāti nāmāti veditabbo. Dānepi eseva nayo. Kāyappaṭibaddhenāti pattādīsu yena kenaci
tika-vin09t0:1676_2: sarīrasambaddhena upakaraṇena. Dānepi eseva nayo. Kaṭacchuādīsu yena kenaci upakaraṇena
tika-vin09t0:1676_3: dinnaṃ kāyappaṭibaddhena dinnaṃyeva hoti. Aññatarenāti kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena
tika-vin09t0:1676_4: vā nissaggiyena vāti attho. Tattha nissaggiyenāti kāyato ca kāyappaṭibaddhato ca
tika-vin09t0:1676_5: mocetvā hatthapāse ṭhitassa kāye vā kāyappaṭibaddhe vā pātiyamānañhi nissaggiyena
tika-vin09t0:1676_6: payogena dinnaṃ nāma hoti. Tassāti paṭiggahitakassa. Vuttavipallāsavasenāti vuttassa
tika-vin09t0:1676_7: paṭipakkhavasena. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ kāyakāyappaṭibaddhanissaggiyānaṃ aññatarena
tika-vin09t0:1676_8: diyyamāne kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā gaṇhāti, etaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ nāmāti.
tika-vin09t0:1677_0: Saṃhārimenāti thāmamajjhimena purisena saṃhārimena, iminā asaṃhārime phalake vā pāsāṇe
tika-vin09t0:1677_1: vā paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhatīti dasseti. Dhāretuṃ samatthenāti sandhāretuṃ yoggena, iminā
tika-vin09t0:1677_2: sukhumesu tintiṇikādipaṇṇesu paṭiggahaṇaṃ na ruhatīti dasseti. Atatthajātakarukkhapaṇṇenāti
tika-vin09t0:1677_3: jātaṭṭhānato cutena paduminipaṇṇādinā, iminā pana mahantepi tatthajātake paduminipaṇṇe
tika-vin09t0:1677_4: vā kiṃsukapaṇṇādimhi vā paṭiggahetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Na hi taṃ kāyappaṭibaddhasaṅkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1677_5: gacchatīti dasseti. Yathā ca tatthajātake, evaṃ khāṇuke bandhitvā ṭhapitamañcādimhipi.
tika-vin09t0:1677_6: Nanu paṭibaddhappaṭibaddhenāpi pattādhārādinā paṭiggaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇaṃ ruhati,
tika-vin09t0:1677_7: atha kasmā kāyakāyappaṭibaddhehiyeva paṭiggahaṇaṃ idha vuttaṃ, na paṭibaddhappaṭibaddhenāpīti
tika-vin09t0:1677_8: āha “paṭibaddhappaṭibaddhaṃ nāma idha natthī”ti. Keci pana “ādhārakena paṭiggahaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1677_9: kāyappaṭibaddhappaṭibaddhena paṭiggahaṇaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin09t0:1677_10: taṃ vacanamattameva. Atthato pana sabbampi taṃ kāyappaṭibaddhameva hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1678: Akallakoti gilāno. Mukhena paṭiggaṇhātīti sahatthena gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ asakkonto mukhena paṭiggaṇhāti. Abhihaṭabhājanato patitarajampi vaṭṭati abhihaṭattāti adhippāho.
tika-vin09t0:1679_0: Tasmiṃ ṭhatvāti tādise hatthapāse ṭhatvā. Yanti yaṃ bhāraṃ. Majjhimo purisoti thāmamajjhimapuriso.
tika-vin09t0:1679_1: Vinaye paññattaṃ dukkaṭaṃ vinayadukkaṭaṃ. Taṃ anupasampannassa datvāti piṇḍāya caritvā
tika-vin09t0:1679_2: vihāraṃ vā āsanasālaṃ vā gantvā taṃ bhikkhaṃ anupasampannassa datvā, idañca pubbābhogassa
tika-vin09t0:1679_3: anurūpavasena vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana taṃ “anupasampannassa dassāmī”ti cittuppādamattena
tika-vin09t0:1679_4: taṃsantakaṃ nāma na hoti, tasmā vināpi tassa dānādiṃ paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1680_0: Assukheḷasiṅghāṇikādīsūti ettha assu nāma akkhijalaṃ. Kheḷo nāma lālā. Siṅghāṇikāti
tika-vin09t0:1680_1: antosīsato pūtisemhabhāvaṃ āpannaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ galitvā tālumatthakavivarena otaritvā
tika-vin09t0:1680_3: sarīre uṭṭhitaloṇassa ca gahaṇaṃ. Ṭhānatoti akkhikūpādito. Antarā ce gaṇhāti, kiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1680_4: hotīti āha “uggahitakaṃ nāma hotī”ti, duṭṭhu gahitakaṃ nāma hotīti attho. Phalininti
tika-vin09t0:1680_5: phalavantaṃ. Tatthajātakaphalinisākhāya vāti tasmiṃ rukkhe jātāya phalinisākhāya
tika-vin09t0:1680_6: vā. Durupaciṇṇadukkaṭanti “na kattabba”nti vāritassa katattā duṭṭhu āciṇṇaṃ caritanti
tika-vin09t0:1680_7: durupaciṇṇaṃ, tasmiṃ dukkaṭaṃ durupaciṇṇadukkaṭañca āpajjatīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1681_0: Āharīyatīti āhāro, ajjhoharitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci, idha pana cattāri kālikāni adhippetānīti
tika-vin09t0:1681_1: āha “yaṃ kiñcī”tiādi. Tattha aruṇuggamanato yāva ṭhitamajjhanhikā bhuñjitabbato yāva
tika-vin09t0:1681_2: kālo assāti yāvakālikaṃ. Aruṇuggamanato yāva yāmāvasānā pipāsāya sati pipāsacchedanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1681_3: pātabbato yāmo kālo assāti yāmakālikaṃ. Yāva sattāhaṃ nidahitvā paribhuñjitabbato
tika-vin09t0:1681_4: sattāhaṃ kālo assāti sattāhakālikaṃ. Yāvajīvampi pariharitvā paribhuñjitabbato yāva
tika-vin09t0:1682_0: Vanamūlapattapupphaphalādīti ettha tāva mūlaṃ nāma mūlakakhārakacaccutambakādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1682_1: tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthañceva bhojanīyatthañca
tika-vin09t0:1682_2: pharaṇakaṃ sūpeyyapaṇṇamūlaṃ. Pattaṃ nāma mūlakakhārakacaccutambakādīnaṃ tādisaṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:1682_3: pattaṃ. Pupphaṃ nāma mūlakakhārakādīnaṃ tādisaṃyeva pupphaṃ. Phalaṃ nāma panasalabujādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1682_4: tesu tesu janapadesu pakatiāhāravasena manussānaṃ khādanīyatthañceva bhojanīyatthañca
tika-vin09t0:1683_0: Ambapānanti āmehi vā pakkehi vā ambehi katapānaṃ. Tattha āmehi karontena ambataruṇādīni
tika-vin09t0:1683_1: bhinditvā udake pakkhipitvā ātape ādiccapākena pacitvā parissāvetvā tadahupaṭiggahitehi
tika-vin09t0:1683_2: madhusakkarakappūrādīhi yojetvā kātabbaṃ. Evaṃ kataṃ purebhattameva kappati. Anupasampannena
tika-vin09t0:1683_3: kataṃ labhitvā pana purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisaparibhogenāpi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:1683_4: pacchābhattaṃ nirāmisaparibhogena yāva aruṇuggamanā vaṭṭati. Esa nayo sabbapānesu.
tika-vin09t0:1684_0: Tesu pana jambupānanti jambuphalehi katapānaṃ. Cocapānanti aṭṭhikehi kadaliphalehi
tika-vin09t0:1684_1: katapānaṃ. Mocapānanti anaṭṭhikehi kadaliphalehi katapānaṃ. Madhukapānanti madhukānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1684_2: jātirasena katapānaṃ. Taṃ pana udakasambhinnaṃ vaṭṭati, suddhaṃ na vaṭṭati. Muddikāpānanti
tika-vin09t0:1684_3: muddikā udake madditvā ambapānaṃ viya katapānaṃ. Sālūkapānanti rattuppalanīluppalādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1684_4: sālūke madditvā katapānaṃ. Phārusakapānanti phārusakehi ambapānaṃ viya katapānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1684_5: Imināva nayena vettapānādīni veditabbāni. Etāni ca pana sabbāni pānāni aggipākāni
tika-vin09t0:1685_0: Khādanīyatthanti khādanīyena kattabbakiccaṃ. Neva pharatīti na nipphādeti. Anāhārepi
tika-vin09t0:1685_1: udake āhārasaññāyāti “āhāraṃ āhareyyā”ti padassa padabhājane vuttamatthaṃ sammā asallakkhetvā
tika-vin09t0:1685_2: “āharīyatīti āhāro”ti anāhārepi udake āhārasaññāya kukkuccāyantānaṃ. Dantapone ca
tika-vin09t0:1685_3: “mukhadvāraṃ āhaṭaṃ ida”nti saññāyāti mukhadvāraṃ anāhaṭampi dantaponaṃ “mukhadvāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1685_4: āhaṭaṃ idaṃ dantapona”nti vipallatthasaññāya kukkuccāyantānaṃ. Yathāsukhaṃ pātunti
tika-vin09t0:1685_5: paṭiggahetvā vā appaṭiggahetvā vā yathākāmaṃ pātuṃ. Dantaponaparibhogenāti dantakaṭṭhaparibhogena,
tika-vin09t0:1685_6: dantadhovanādināti attho, iminā tassa pana rasaṃ gilituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1686_0: Cattāri mahāvikaṭānīti gūthaṃ, muttaṃ, chārikā, mattikā ca “āsayādivasena virūpāni
tika-vin09t0:1686_1: jātānī”ti katvā vikaṭānīti vā apakatibhojanattā vikaṭāni “virūpāni jātānī”ti vā attho.
tika-vin09t0:1686_2: Sati paccayeti kāraṇe sati, sappadaṭṭheti attho. Dhūmādiabbohārikābhāvoti dhūmapupphagandhadantakhayādiabbohārikābhāvo.
tika-vin09t0:1691_0: Acelakassāti yassa kassaci pabbajjāsamāpannassa naggassa. Paribbājakassāti ṭhapetvā
tika-vin09t0:1691_1: bhikkhuñca sāmaṇerañca avasesassa yassa kassaci pabbajjāsamāpannassa. Paribbājikāyāti
tika-vin09t0:1691_2: ṭhapetvā bhikkhuniṃ, sikkhamānaṃ, sāmaṇeriñca avasesāya yāya kāyaci pabbajjāsamāpannāya.
tika-vin09t0:1691_3: Ete ca sabbe aññatitthiyā veditabbā. Tenāha “etesaṃ acelakādīnaṃ aññatitthiyāna”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1692: Tesanti aññatitthiyānaṃ. Bhājanaṃ nikkhipitvāti āmisabharitaṃ bhājanaṃ nikkhipitvā. Bāhirālepanti telādiṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1701_0: Gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vāti ettha nagarampi gāmaggahaṇeneva gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pavisissāmāti
tika-vin09t0:1701_1: ettha gahetvā “gantvā”ti pāṭhaseso, asamannāhāro vā tassā itthiyā tasmiṃ gāme sannihitabhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1701_2: ajānanto vā “ehāvuso, gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā”ti bhikkhuṃ gahetvā
tika-vin09t0:1701_3: gantvāti attho. Yaṃ kiñci āmisanti yāguādikaṃ yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ. Uyyojeyyāti attano
tika-vin09t0:1701_4: kīḷānurūpaṃ itthiṃ disvā uyyojeyya pahiṇeyya. Tenāha “mātugāmena saddhi”ntiādi. Ādisaddena
tika-vin09t0:1701_6: na me tayā saddhiṃ kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hoti, ekakassa me kathā vā nisajjā vā
tika-vin09t0:1701_7: phāsu hotī”ti vatvā. Etaṃ anācāramevāti etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ hasanādianācārameva. Na
tika-vin09t0:1701_8: aññaṃ patirūpaṃ kāraṇanti ṭhapetvā vuttappakāraṃ anācāraṃ ubhinnaṃ ekato na yāpanādiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1701_9: aññaṃ patirūpakāraṇaṃ paccayaṃ karitvā na hotīti attho. Assāti uyyojakassa. Soti yo uyyojito, so.
tika-vin09t0:1702_0: Anupasampanneti sāmaṇere. Sova idha anupasampannoti adhippetoti vadanti. Ubhinnampīti
tika-vin09t0:1702_1: upasampannassa vā anupasampannassa vāti dvinnampi. Kalisāsanāropaneti kalīti kodho,
tika-vin09t0:1702_2: tassa sāsanaṃ āṇaṃ kalisāsanaṃ, tassāropaneti attho, “appeva nāma imināpi ubbāḷho
tika-vin09t0:1702_3: pakkameyyā”ti kodhavasena ṭhānanisajjādīsu dosaṃ dassetvā “passatha bho imassa ṭhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1702_4: nisajjaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ, khāṇu viya tiṭṭhati, sunakho viya nisīdati, makkaṭo
tika-vin09t0:1702_5: viya ito cito ca viloketī”ti evaṃ amanāpavacanassa bhaṇaneti vuttaṃ hoti. Suddhacittena
tika-vin09t0:1702_6: panevaṃ bhaṇane doso natthi. Evamādīhīti ettha ādisaddena “mahagghaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ passitvā
tika-vin09t0:1702_7: lobhadhammaṃ uppādessatī”ti uyyojeti, “mātugāmaṃ passitvā anabhiratiṃ uppādessatī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1702_8: uyyojeti, “gilānassa vā ohiyyakassa vā vihārapālassa vā yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1702_9: vā nīharā”ti uyyojeti, “na anācāraṃ ācaritukāmo sati karaṇīye uyyojetī”ti etesaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1705_0: “Sabhojane”ti bāhiratthasamāsoyaṃ, ubhasadde ukārassa ca lopoti āha “saha ubhohi
tika-vin09t0:1705_1: janehī”tiādi. Tattha ubhohi janehīti jāyā ca pati cāti ubhohi janehi. Bhuñjitabbanti
tika-vin09t0:1705_2: vā bhojanaṃ, itthī ca puriso ca, tena saha vattatīti sabhojananti āha “atha vā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1705_4: attho. Mahallakassāti mahallakassa sayanigharassa. Piṭṭhasaṅghāṭatoti dvārabāhato
tika-vin09t0:1705_5: khuddakassa vāti yathā tathā vā katassa khuddakassa sayanigharassa. Vemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā
tika-vin09t0:1705_6: nisīdeyyāti piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā nisīdeyya. Khuddakaṃ nāma sayanigharaṃ vitthārato
tika-vin09t0:1705_7: pañcahatthappamāṇaṃ hoti, tassa ca majjhimaṭṭhānaṃ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇameva
tika-vin09t0:1705_8: hoti, tasmā tādise sayanighare piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā nisinno piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1705_9: atikkamitvā nisinno nāma hoti. Evaṃ nisinno ca vemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā nisinno nāma
tika-vin09t0:1705_10: hoti. Tena vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā nisīdatī”ti. Sacittakañcettha
tika-vin09t0:1708: Catutthapañcamasikkhāpade yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ aniyatadvaye vuttamevāti āha “seso kathānayo aniyatadvaye vuttanayeneva veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1711_0: Antoupacārasīmāya dassanūpacāre bhikkhuṃ disvāti yattha ṭhitassa kulāni payirupāsanacittaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1711_1: uppannaṃ, tato paṭṭhāya gacchanto antoupacārasīmāya dassanūpacāre bhikkhuṃ passe
tika-vin09t0:1711_2: vā abhimukhe vā disvā. Pakativacanenāti yaṃ dvādasahatthabbhantare ṭhitena sotuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1711_3: sakkā, tādisena vacanena, ito cito ca pariyesitvā ārocanakiccaṃ pana natthi. Yo hi
tika-vin09t0:1711_4: evaṃ pariyesitabbo, so asantoyeva. Tenāha “tādisa”ntiādi. Anāpucchitvāti anārocetvā.
tika-vin09t0:1712_1: antogāme vihāro. Paṭikkamananti āsanasālā. Bhattiyagharanti nimantitagharaṃ vā salākabhattādidāyakānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1712_2: vā gharaṃ. Āpadāsūti jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyesu. Kiriyākiriyanti ettha kulesu cārittāpajjanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1715_0: Sabbañcetaṃ vatthuvasena vuttanti “agilānena bhikkhunā catumāsapaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā
tika-vin09t0:1715_1: aññatra punapavāraṇāya aññatra niccapavāraṇāyā”ti etaṃ sabbaṃ sikkhāpadanidānasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin09t0:1715_2: vatthuno vasena vuttaṃ. Tattha hi mahānāmena sakkena “icchāmahaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1715_3: catumāsaṃ bhesajjena pavāretu”ntiādinā ussannussannena ca bhesajjena catumāsaṃ puna
tika-vin09t0:1715_4: niccaṃ pavāraṇā katā, tasmā bhagavatā tassa vasena evaṃ vuttanti vuttaṃ hoti. Aññatra
tika-vin09t0:1715_5: punapavāraṇāyāti yadi punapavāraṇā atthi, taṃ ṭhapetvā. Aññatra niccapavāraṇāyāti
tika-vin09t0:1715_6: etthāpi eseva nayo. Yadi pana tāpi atthi, sāditabbāvāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “ayaṃ panettha
tika-vin09t0:1715_7: attho”tiādi. Tatthāti tissaṃ pavāraṇāyaṃ. Bhesajjehi vā paricchedo kato hotīti “sappi
tika-vin09t0:1715_8: tela”nti evamādinā nāmavasena vā “patthena nāḷiyā āḷhakenā”tiādinā parimāṇavasena
tika-vin09t0:1715_9: vā “ettakāni vā bhesajjāni viññāpetabbānī”ti bhesajjehi paricchedo kato hoti. Nabhesajjakaraṇīyeti
tika-vin09t0:1715_10: missakabhattenāpi ce yāpetuṃ sakkoti, nabhesajjakaraṇīyaṃ nāma hoti. Aññaṃ bhesajjanti
tika-vin09t0:1715_11: sappinā pavārito telaṃ, āḷhakena pavārito doṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1716_0: Yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhitvāti “imehi tayā bhesajjehi pavāritamhā, amhākañca iminā ca iminā
tika-vin09t0:1716_1: ca bhesajjena attho, yāsu tayā rattīsu pavāritamhā, tā rattiyo vītivattā, amhākañca
tika-vin09t0:1716_2: bhesajjena attho”ti yathābhūtaṃ ārocetvā. Evañca viññāpetuṃ gilānova labhati, na itaro.
tika-vin09t0:1719_0: Caturaṅgininti hatthiassarathapattīti cattāri aṅgāni etissāti caturaṅginī, taṃ caturaṅginiṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1719_1: “Dvādasapuriso hatthī, tipuriso asso, catupuriso ratho, cattāro purisā sarahatthā
tika-vin09t0:1719_2: pattī”ti ayaṃ pacchimakoṭiyā caturaṅgasamannāgatā senā nāma, īdisaṃ senanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1719_3: Taṃ pana vijahitvāti kenaci antaritā vā ninnaṃ oruḷhā vā na dissati, idha ṭhatvāna
tika-vin09t0:1719_4: sakkā daṭṭhunti taṃ dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā.
tika-vin09t0:1720_0: Senādassanavatthusminti senaṃ dassanāya gamanavatthusmiṃ. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Hatthiādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1720_1: ekamekanti hatthiādīsu catūsu aṅgesu ekamekaṃ, antamaso ekapurisāruḷhahatthimpi ekampi
tika-vin09t0:1720_2: sarahatthaṃ purisanti attho. Anuyyuttā nāma rājā uyyānaṃ vā nadiṃ vā gacchati, evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1720_3: anuyyuttā hoti. Tathārūpappaccayeti “mātulo senāya gilāno hotī”tiādike anurūpakāraṇe
tika-vin09t0:1720_4: sati. Āpadāsūti jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyesu “ettha gato muccissāmī”ti gacchato anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1723: Paṭisenāruddhāyāti yathā sañcāro chijjati, evaṃ paṭisenāya ruddhāya senāya. Kenaci palibuddhassāti verikena vā issarena vā kenaci ruddhassa.
tika-vin09t0:1726_0: Sampahāraṭṭhānassāti yuddhabhūmiyā. Balassa aggaṃ jānantīti “ettakā hatthī, ettakā
tika-vin09t0:1726_1: assā, ettakā rathā, ettakā pattī”ti balassa koṭṭhāsaṃ jānanti. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
tika-vin09t0:1726_2: vihāraggenā”tiādīsu viya koṭṭhāsattho hettha aggasaddo. Tenāha “balagaṇanaṭṭhānanti
tika-vin09t0:1726_3: attho”ti. Senāya viyūhanti “ito hatthī hontu, ito assā hontu, ito rathā hontu, ito
tika-vin09t0:1726_4: pattī hontū”ti senāya ṭhapanaṃ, rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapananti attho. Tenāha “senāsannivesassetaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1726_5: nāma”nti. Dvādasapuriso hatthīti cattāro ārohakā, ekekapādarakkhakā dve dveti evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1726_6: dvādasapuriso hatthī. Tipuriso assoti eko ārohako, dve pādarakkhakāti evaṃ tipuriso
tika-vin09t0:1726_7: asso. Catupuriso rathoti eko sārathi, eko yodho, dve āṇirakkhakāti evaṃ catupuriso rathoti.
tika-vin09t0:1731_0: Piṭṭhādīhi kataṃ majjaṃ surāti piṭṭhapūvaodanakiṇṇasambhārehi kataṃ majjaṃ surāti
tika-vin09t0:1731_1: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – piṭṭhasurā, pūvasurā, odanasurā, kiṇṇapakkhittā, sambhārasaṃyuttāti
tika-vin09t0:1731_2: imāni pañca surā nāmāti. Tattha piṭṭhaṃ bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā
tika-vin09t0:1731_3: katā piṭṭhasurā. Evaṃ sesāsupi. Kiṇṇāti pana tassā surāya bījaṃ vuccati. Ye “surāmodakā”tipi
tika-vin09t0:1731_4: vuccanti, te pakkhipitvā katā kiṇṇapakkhittā. Harītakisāsapādinānāsambhārehi saṃyojitā sambhārasaṃyuttā.
tika-vin09t0:1732_0: Pupphādīhi kato āsavo merayanti pupphaphalamadhuguḷasambhārehi kato ciraparivāsito
tika-vin09t0:1732_1: merayanti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – pupphāsavo, phalāsavo, madhvāsavo, guḷāsavo,
tika-vin09t0:1732_2: sambhārasaṃyuttoti pañcamerayaṃ nāmāti. Tattha madhukatālanāḷikerādi puppharaso ciraparivāsito
tika-vin09t0:1732_3: pupphāsavo. Panasādiphalaraso phalāsavo. Muddikāraso madhvāsavo. Samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1732_4: pana “phalāsavo nāma muddikāphalādīni madditvā tesaṃ rasena kato. Madhvāsavo nāma
tika-vin09t0:1732_5: muddikānaṃ jātirasena kato, makkhikāmadhunāpi karīyatīti vadantī”ti vuttaṃ. Ucchuraso
tika-vin09t0:1732_7: Ettha ca surāya, merayassa ca samānepi sambhārasaṃyoge madditvā katā surā, ciraparivāsitamattena
tika-vin09t0:1732_8: merayanti evamimesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Bījato paṭṭhāyāti sambhāre paṭiyādetvā
tika-vin09t0:1732_9: cāṭiyaṃ pakkhittakālato ceva tālanāḷikerādīnaṃ puppharasassa abhinavakālato ca paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin09t0:1733_0: Loṇasovīrakaṃ vā suttaṃ vāti ime dve anekehi bhesajjehi abhisaṅkhatā āsavavisesā.
tika-vin09t0:1733_1: Vāsaggāhāpanatthanti sugandhabhāvagāhāpanatthaṃ. Vatthuṃ ajānanatāya cettha acittakatā
tika-vin09t0:1733_2: veditabbā. Akusaleneva pātabbatāya lokavajjaṃ. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1737_0: Ettha ca bhikkhunimpi hasādhippāyena phusato bhikkhussa dukkaṭaṃ. Tathā bhikkhumpi
tika-vin09t0:1737_1: phusantiyā bhikkhuniyāti āha “idha pana bhikkhunīpi bhikkhussa, bhikkhu ca bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin09t0:1737_2: anupasampanno evā”ti. Kāyappaṭibaddhādīsu sabbatthāti “kāyena kāyappaṭibaddhe, kāyappaṭibaddhena
tika-vin09t0:1737_3: kāye, kāyappaṭibaddhena kāyappaṭibaddhe, nissaggiyena kāye, nissaggiyena kāyappaṭibaddhe,
tika-vin09t0:1737_4: nissaggiyena nissaggiye”ti sabbattha. Sati karaṇīye āmasatoti sati karaṇīye purisaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1737_5: āmasato anāpatti. Itthī pana sati karaṇīyepi āmasituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1740_0: Uparigopphaketi gopphakānaṃ uparibhāgappamāṇe. Hasādhippāyoti kīḷādhippāyo. Yena
tika-vin09t0:1740_1: yena aṅgenāti hatthapādādīsu yena yena aṅgena. Tathā nāvāya kīḷatoti phiyārittādīhi
tika-vin09t0:1740_2: nāvaṃ pājentassa vā tīre ussārentassa vā dukkaṭanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1743_1: vā”tiādi. Tattha yo bhikkhu upasampannena paññattena vuccamāno “ayaṃ ukkhittako vā
tika-vin09t0:1743_2: vambhito vā garahito vā, imassa vacanaṃ akataṃ bhavissatī”ti anādariyaṃ karoti, ayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1743_3: puggale anādariyaṃ karoti nāma. Yo pana paññattena vuccamāno “kathāyaṃ nasseyya vā
tika-vin09t0:1743_4: vinasseyya vā antaradhāyeyya vā”ti, taṃ vā nasikkhitukāmo anādariyaṃ karoti, ayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1744_0: Idaṃ na sallekhāya saṃvattatīti sammā kilese likhatīti sallekho, appicchatā, tadatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1744_1: nayidaṃ saṃvattati. Ādisaddena “idaṃ na dhutatthāya saṃvattati, na pāsādikatāya,
tika-vin09t0:1744_2: na apacayāya, na vīriyārambhāya saṃvattatī”ti idaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Apaññattenāti sutte
tika-vin09t0:1744_3: vā abhidhamme vā āgatena. Paveṇiāgatanti saṅgītikālato paṭṭhāya mahākassapādiācariyaparamparāya
tika-vin09t0:1744_4: āgataṃ. Sace pana yasmā ucchuraso sattāhakāliko, tassa kasaṭo yāvajīviko, dvinnaṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:1744_5: samavāyo ucchuyaṭṭhi, tasmā vikāle ucchuyaṭṭhiṃ khādituṃ vaṭṭati guḷaharītakaṃ viyāti
tika-vin09t0:1744_6: evamādikaṃ gārayhācariyuggahaṃ gahetvā “evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho paripucchā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1750: Agilānoti yassa vinā agginā phāsu hoti, so idha agilāno nāma. Jotinti aggiṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1751_0: Bhaggesūti evaṃnāmake janapade. Bhaggānāma jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi
tika-vin09t0:1751_1: janapado ruḷhisaddena “bhaggā”ti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ “bhaggesūti evaṃnāmake janapade”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1751_2: Tathā patilātaṃ ukkhipantassāti ḍayhamānaṃ alātaṃ patitaṃ ukkhipantassa tathā dukkaṭanti
tika-vin09t0:1751_3: attho. Tañcāti dukkaṭaṃ parāmasati. Avijjhātanti anibbutālātaṃ. Padīpajotikajantāghareti
tika-vin09t0:1751_5: attho. Tathārūpappaccayeti ṭhapetvā padīpādīni aññasmimpi tathārūpapaccaye. Āpadāsūti
tika-vin09t0:1754_0: “Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhāna”nti “vassānassa paṭhamo māso”iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo,
tika-vin09t0:1754_1: pariḷāhasamayoti gimhānaṃ seso diyaḍḍho māso uṇhasamayo, vassānassa paṭhamo māso
tika-vin09t0:1754_2: pariḷāhasamayoti evaṃ ete aḍḍhateyyamāsā kamena uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo nāma hotīti
tika-vin09t0:1754_3: attho teneva padabhājaniyaṃ “uṇhasamayo nāma diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhāna”nti, “pariḷāhasamayo
tika-vin09t0:1754_4: nāma vassānassa paṭhamo māso”ti vuttaṃ. Yadā vinā nahānena na phāsu hoti, ayaṃ gilānasamayo.
tika-vin09t0:1754_5: Padabhājaniyaṃ pana gilāne nicchite gilānakālo nicchitova hotīti “yassa vinā nahānena
tika-vin09t0:1754_6: na phāsu hoti, ‘gilānasamayo’ti nahāyitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Pariveṇasammajjanamattampīti
tika-vin09t0:1755: Vālukaṃ ukkiritvāti sukkhāya nadiyā vālikaṃ uttiritvā. Āvāṭesupīti pi-saddena nadiyaṃ vattabbameva natthīti dasseti. Āpadāsūti bhamarādīhi anubandhesu.
tika-vin09t0:1758_0: Lābhasaddoyaṃ kammasādhano “ko bhavatā lābho laddho”tiādīsu viya, so cettha atītakālikoti
tika-vin09t0:1758_1: āha “alabbhīti labho”ti, laddhanti attho. “Labho eva lābho”ti iminā sakatthe ṇapaccayoti
tika-vin09t0:1758_2: dasseti. Kiṃ alabbhīti kiṃ laddhaṃ. Navanti abhinavaṃ. Ettāvatā ca navañca taṃ cīvarañcāti
tika-vin09t0:1758_3: navacīvaraṃ, navacīvaraṃ lābho etenāti navacīvaralābhoti evamettha samāso daṭṭhabboti.
tika-vin09t0:1758_4: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ “navaṃ cīvaralābhenā”ti vuttanti āha “iti navacīvaralābhenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1758_5: Ettha ca “vikappanupagaṃ pacchima”nti na vuttattā cīvaranti yaṃ nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1758_6: vā sakkā hoti, tadeva veditabbanti āha “nivāsanapārupanupagaṃ cīvara”nti. “Dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1758_7: ādātabba”nti etaṃ kappabinduṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na nīlādīhi sakalacīvaraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1758_8: tañca pana kappaṃ ādiyantena cīvaraṃ rajitvā catūsu vā koṇesu, tīsu vā dvīsu vā ekasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1758_9: vā koṇe morassa akkhimaṇḍalamattaṃ vā maṅgulapiṭṭhimattaṃ vā ādātabbanti āha “tassā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1758_10: Kaṃsanīlenāti cammakāranīlena. Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “ayomalaṃ lohamalaṃ, etaṃ kaṃsanīlaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1758_11: nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Pattanīlenāti yena kenaci nīlavaṇṇena paṇṇarasena. Kappabinduṃ ādiyitvāti
tika-vin09t0:1759_0: Pāḷikappakaṇṇikakappādayo pana sabbaṭṭhakathāsu paṭisiddhā. Aggaḷādīni kappakatacīvare
tika-vin09t0:1759_1: pana pacchā āropetvā kappakaraṇakiccaṃ natthīti āha “pacchā āropitesū”tiādi. Aggaḷaanuvātaparibhaṇḍesūti
tika-vin09t0:1762_0: Sammukhena vikappanā sammukhavikappanā. Parammukhena vikappanā parammukhavikappanā.
tika-vin09t0:1762_1: Sannihitāsannihitabhāvanti āsannadūrabhāvaṃ. Āsannadūrabhāvo ca adhiṭṭhāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1763_0: Mittoti daḷhamitto. Sandiṭṭhoti diṭṭhamatto nātidaḷhamitto. Akatapaccuddhāranti “mayhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1763_1: santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā”tiādinā akatapaccuddhāraṃ. Yena vinayakammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1764: Paribhogena kāyakammaṃ, apaccuddhārāpanena vacīkammanti āha “samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamakathinasadisānevā”ti. Kiriyākiriyanti ettha paribhuñjanaṃ kiriyaṃ. Apaccuddhārāpanaṃ akiriyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1767: Adhiṭṭhānupaganti adhiṭṭhānayoggaṃ ayopattañceva mattikāpattañca. Sūkarantakaṃ nāma kuñcikākoso viya anto susiraṃ katvā koṭṭitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1768_0: Aññaṃ parikkhāranti pāḷiyā anāgatapattatthavikādiṃ. Dhammakathaṃ katvāti “samaṇena
tika-vin09t0:1768_1: nāma anihitaparikkhārena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti evaṃ “dhammakathaṃ kathetvā dassāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1773_0: Pācittiyanti antamaso mañcapīṭhaṃ sodhento maṅgulabījakepi pāṇasaññī nikkāruṇikatāya
tika-vin09t0:1773_1: taṃ bhindanto apaneti, pācittiyaṃ. Tenāha “taṃ khuddakampī”tiādi. Upakkamamahantatāya
tika-vin09t0:1773_2: akusalaṃ mahantaṃ hotīti bahukkhattuṃ pavattajavanehi laddhāsevanāya sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya
tika-vin09t0:1773_3: vasena payogassa mahantattā akusalaṃ mahantaṃ hoti, mahāsāvajjaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1776: Ettha ca paṭaṅgapāṇakānaṃ patanaṃ ñatvāpi suddhacittatāya padīpujjalane viya sappāṇakabhāvaṃ ñatvāpi udakasaññāya paribhuñjitabbato paṇṇattivajjatā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1779_0: Tassa tassa bhikkhunoti yena yena vūpasamitaṃ, tassa tassa bhikkhuno. “Akataṃ kamma”ntiādīni
tika-vin09t0:1779_1: vadantoti “akataṃ kammaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ kammaṃ, puna kātabbaṃ kammaṃ, anihataṃ dunnihataṃ
tika-vin09t0:1779_2: puna nihanitabba”nti vadanto. Yathāṭhitabhāvena patiṭṭhātuṃ na dadeyyāti tesaṃ pavatti
tika-vin09t0:1779_3: ākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha “yaṃ pana dhammena adhikaraṇaṃ nihataṃ, taṃ sunihatamevā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1782_0: Cattāri pārājikāni atthuddhāravasena padabhājaniyaṃ dassitānīti āha “duṭṭhullanti
tika-vin09t0:1782_1: saṅghādisesaṃ adhippeta”nti. Yena kenaci upāyenāti “sāmaṃ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa
tika-vin09t0:1782_2: ārocenti, so vā ārocetī”ti vuttesu yena kenaci upāyena. Pācittiyaṃ dhuraṃ nikkhittamatteyevāti
tika-vin09t0:1782_3: adhippāyo. Sace pacchāpi āroceti, dhuranikkhepane āpattito na muccati. Tenāha “sacepī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1782_4: Samaṇasatampi āpajjatiyevāti samaṇasatampi sutvā yadi chādeti, pācittiyaṃ āpajjatiyevāti
tika-vin09t0:1782_5: attho. Yenassa ārocitanti yena dutiyena assa tatiyassa ārocitaṃ. Tassevāti tassa
tika-vin09t0:1782_6: dutiyasseva. Ārocetīti paṭicchādanatthameva “mā kassaci ārocesī”ti vadati. Koṭichinnā
tika-vin09t0:1782_7: hotīti yasmā paṭicchādanapaccayā āpattiṃ āpajjitvāva dutiyena tatiyassa ārocitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1782_8: tasmā tappaccayā puna tena āpajjitabbāpattiyā abhāvato āpattiyā koṭi chinnā nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1783_0: Ādipadeti duṭṭhullāpattisaññī, vematiko, aduṭṭhullāpattisaññīti imesu tīsu “duṭṭhullāpattisaññī
tika-vin09t0:1783_1: paṭicchādetī”ti imasmiṃ paṭhamapade. Itaresu dvīsūti “vematiko paṭicchādeti, aduṭṭhullāpattisaññī
tika-vin09t0:1783_2: paṭicchādetī”ti imesu padesu. Aduṭṭhullāyāti avasesapañcāpattikkhandhe. Anupasampannassa
tika-vin09t0:1783_3: duṭṭhulle vā aduṭṭhulle vā ajjhācāreti anupasampannassa purimapañcasikkhāpadavītikkamasaṅkhāte
tika-vin09t0:1783_4: duṭṭhulle vā itarasmiṃ aduṭṭhulle vā ajjhācāre. Yaṃ pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ “anupasampannassa
tika-vin09t0:1783_5: sukkavisaṭṭhi ca kāyasaṃsaggo cāti ayaṃ duṭṭhullaajjhācāro nāmā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ duṭṭhullārocanasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāya
tika-vin09t0:1783_6: na sameti, na cāpi evaṃ vattuṃ yujjati “ārocane anupasampannassa duṭṭhullaṃ aññathā
tika-vin09t0:1783_7: adhippetaṃ, paṭicchādane aññathā”ti visesakāraṇassānupalabbhanato, tasmā taṃ upaparikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1786_0: Gabbhavīsopi hi “paripuṇṇavīso” tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti āha “paṭisandhiggahaṇato
tika-vin09t0:1786_1: paṭṭhāyā”tiādi. Tattha paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāyāti yaṃ mātukucchismiṃ paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1786_2: cittaṃ uppannaṃ paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṃ pātubhūtaṃ, taṃ ādiṃ katvā. Soti yo puggalo ūnavīsativasso
tika-vin09t0:1786_3: upasampādito, so puggalo. Aññaṃ upasampādetīti upajjhāyo vā kammavācācariyo vā hutvā
tika-vin09t0:1786_4: aññaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādeti. Tanti ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ. Sīmaṃ vā sammannatīti
tika-vin09t0:1789_0: Rājānaṃ vā vañcetvāti rājānaṃ thenetvā rañño santakaṃ kiñci gahetvā, “idāni tassa
tika-vin09t0:1789_1: na dassāmā”ti maggappaṭipannā akatakammā ceva katakammā ca corāti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa
tika-vin09t0:1790: Kālavisaṅketenāti kālassa visaṅketena, divasavisaṅketenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Maggavisaṅketena, pana aṭavivisaṅketena vā gacchato āpattiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1793_0: Mātugāmenāti itthiyā. Ekatoupasampannā, pana sikkhamānā, sāmaṇerī cāti imā tissopi
tika-vin09t0:1793_1: idha saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Imāsaṃ pana tissannaṃ samayo rakkhati. Ayametāsaṃ, mātugāmassa
tika-vin09t0:1796_0: Taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti
tika-vin09t0:1796_1: antarāyo, diṭṭhadhammikādianattho, anatikkamanatthena tasmiṃ antarāye niyuttā, antarāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1796_2: vā phalaṃ arahanti, antarāyassa vā karaṇasīlāti antarāyikā. Tenāha “saggamokkhānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1796_4: pañcavidhāti ettha ca pañcānantariyakammaṃ kammantarāyikaṃ nāma, tathā bhikkhunidūsakakammaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1796_5: Taṃ pana mokkhasseva antarāyaṃ karoti, na saggassa. Niyatamicchādiṭṭhidhammā kilesantarāyikā
tika-vin09t0:1796_7: Ariyūpavādā upavādantarāyikā nāma. Te pana yāva ariye na khamāpenti, tāvadeva, na
tika-vin09t0:1796_8: tato paraṃ. Sañcicca āpannā āpattiyo paññattivītikkamantarāyikā nāma. Tāpi yāva bhikkhubhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1796_9: vā paṭijānāti, na vuṭṭhāti vā na deseti vā, tāvadeva, na tato paraṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1797_0: Tatrāyaṃ ariṭṭho bhikkhu bahussuto dhammakathiko sesantarāyike jānāti, vinaye pana
tika-vin09t0:1797_1: akovidattā paṇṇattivītikkamantarāyike na jānāti, tasmā rahogato evaṃ cintesi “ime
tika-vin09t0:1797_2: āgārikā pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi honti,
tika-vin09t0:1797_3: bhikkhūpi manāpikāni cakkhuviññeyyāni rūpāni passanti…pe… kāyaviññeyye phoṭṭhabbe
tika-vin09t0:1797_4: phusanti, mudukāni attharaṇapāvuraṇādīni paribhuñjanti, etaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:1797_5: Itthirūpā…pe… itthiphoṭṭhabbā eva na vaṭṭanti, etepi vaṭṭantī”ti evaṃ rasena rasaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1797_6: saṃsanditvā sacchandarāgaparibhogañca nicchandarāgaparibhogañca ekaṃ katvā thūlavākehi
tika-vin09t0:1797_7: saddhiṃ atisukhumasuttaṃ ghaṭento viya, sāsapena saddhiṃ sineruṃ upasaṃharanto viya
tika-vin09t0:1797_8: ca pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppādetvā “kiṃ bhagavatā mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena viya mahatā
tika-vin09t0:1797_9: ussāhena paṭhamapārājikaṃ paññattaṃ, natthi ettha doso”ti sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1797_10: paṭivirujjhanto bhabbapuggalānaṃ āsaṃ chindanto jinassa āṇācakke pahāramadāsi. Tenāha “tesū”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1798_0: Tattha tesūti yathāvuttesu antarāyesu. Aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmāti ettha aṭṭhikaṅkalaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1798_1: nāma uraṭṭhi vā piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ vā sīsaṭṭhi vā. Tañhi nimmaṃsattā “kaṅkala”nti vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:1798_2: Vigatamaṃsāya hi aṭṭhisaṅkhalikāya ekaṭṭhimhi vā kaṅkalasaddo niruḷho, taṃsadisā
tika-vin09t0:1798_3: kāmā appassādaṭṭhenāti attho. Ādisaddena “maṃsapesūpamā kāmā, tiṇukkūpamā kāmā, aṅgārakāsūpamā
tika-vin09t0:1798_4: kāmā, supinakūpamā kāmā, yācitakūpamā kāmā, rukkhaphalūpamā kāmā, asisūnūpamā kāmā,
tika-vin09t0:1798_5: sattisūlūpamā kāmā, sappasirūpamā kāmā”ti etesaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1799_0: Tattha maṃsapesūpamā kāmā bahusādhāraṇaṭṭhena. Tiṇukkūpamā kāmā anudahanaṭṭhena.
tika-vin09t0:1799_1: Aṅgārakāsūpamā kāmā mahābhitāpanaṭṭhena. Supinakūpamā kāmā ittarapaccupaṭṭhānaṭṭhena.
tika-vin09t0:1799_2: Yācitakūpamā kāmā tāvakālikaṭṭhena. Rukkhaphalūpamā kāmā sabbaṅgapaccaṅgapalibhañjanaṭṭhena.
tika-vin09t0:1799_3: Asisūnūpamā adhikuṭṭanaṭṭhena. Sattisūlūpamā vinivijjhanaṭṭhena. Sappasirūpamā sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayaṭṭhena.
tika-vin09t0:1800_0: Tathevāti “mā āyasmā”tiādīhi. Itaresanti so saṅghamajjhaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā yehi “mā āyasmā”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1800_1: vutto, tattha tehi aññesaṃ sutānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ. Ñatticatutthena kammenāti “suṇātu
tika-vin09t0:1800_2: me, bhante, saṅgho, itthannāmassa bhikkhuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppanna”ntiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1803_0: Akatānudhammenāti ukkhipitvā anosāritena. Tenāha “anudhammo vuccatī”tiādi. Ettha
tika-vin09t0:1803_1: anudhammoti osāraṇā vuccatīti sambandho. Ukkhepanīyakammassānurūpo, pacchā kattabbo
tika-vin09t0:1803_2: vā dhammoti anudhammo. Anulomavattaṃ disvāti “na upasampādetabbaṃ, na nissayo dātabbo”tiādikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1803_3: aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ vattaṃ disvā, etesu aṭṭhārasasu anulomavattesu vattantaṃ disvāti
tika-vin09t0:1803_4: adhippāyo. Āmisasambhogaṃ vā dhammasambhogaṃ vāti ettha yaṃ kiñci āmisassa dānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1803_5: paṭiggahaṇañca āmisasambhogo. Dhammassa uddisanaṃ, uddisāpanañca dhammasambhogo.
tika-vin09t0:1803_6: Saṃvaseyyāti “uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti evaṃ padabhājaniyaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1803_7: tividhaṃ saṃvāsaṃ kareyya. Yasmā panettha uposathapavāraṇāpi saṅghehiyeva kātabbattā
tika-vin09t0:1803_8: saṅghakammāniyeva honti, tasmā “uposathādikaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kareyyā”ti vuttaṃ. Payoge
tika-vin09t0:1803_9: payogeti dāne dāne, gahaṇe gahaṇe cāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1804: Paṇṇattiṃ ajānantena arahatāpi kiriyābyākatacittena āpajjitabbattā “ticitta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1807_0: Pireti nipātapadaṃ sambodhane vattamānaṃ parasaddena samānatthaṃ vadantīti āha “para
tika-vin09t0:1807_1: amāmakā”ti, amhākaṃ anajjhattikabhūtāti attho. Pireti vā “parato”ti iminā samānatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1807_2: nipātapadaṃ, tasmā cara pireti parato gaccha, mā idha tiṭṭhāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1812_0: Sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānoti sahadhammikena vuccamāno. Karaṇatthe cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1812_1: “Pañcahi sahadhammikehi sikkhitabbattā, tesaṃ vā santakattā ‘sahadhammika’nti laddhanāmena
tika-vin09t0:1812_2: buddhapaññattena sikkhāpadena vuccamānoti attho”ti dubbacasikkhāpade vuttattā “sahadhammikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1812_3: vuccamānoti imassattho dubbacasikkhāpade vutto”ti vuttaṃ. Anādariyabhayāti anādarakaraṇe
tika-vin09t0:1812_4: bhayā, tattha pācittiyabhayāti attho. Lesena evaṃ vadantassāti ujukaṃ “na sikkhissāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1812_5: avatvā “yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhu”ntiādinā lesena vadantassa.
tika-vin09t0:1815_0: Khuddakehi ca anukhuddakehi cāti saṅghādisesādīhi khuddakehi ceva thullaccayādīhi
tika-vin09t0:1815_1: anukhuddakehi ca. Ṭhapetvā hi cattāri pārājikāni avasesāni sabbāni sikkhāpadāni pariyāyena
tika-vin09t0:1815_2: khuddakāni ceva honti anukhuddakāni ca. Vuttañhetaṃ pañcasatikakkhandhake –
tika-vin09t0:1816_0: “Katamāni pana, bhante, khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānīti? Ekacce therā evamāhaṃsu
tika-vin09t0:1816_1: – ‘cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā avasesāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī’ti. Ekacce
tika-vin09t0:1816_2: therā evamāhaṃsu – ‘cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā terasa saṅghādisese ṭhapetvā avasesāni
tika-vin09t0:1816_3: khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī’ti. Ekacce therā evamāhaṃsu – ‘cattāri pārājikāni
tika-vin09t0:1816_4: ṭhapetvā terasa saṅghādisese ṭhapetvā dve aniyate ṭhapetvā avasesāni khuddānukhuddakāni
tika-vin09t0:1816_5: sikkhāpadānī’ti. Ekacce therā evamāhaṃsu – “cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā terasa saṅghādisese
tika-vin09t0:1816_6: ṭhapetvā dve aniyate ṭhapetvā tiṃsa nissaggiye pācittiye ṭhapetvā avasesāni khuddānukhuddakāni
tika-vin09t0:1816_7: sikkhāpadānī’ti. Ekacce therā evamāhaṃsu – ‘cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā terasa saṅghādisese
tika-vin09t0:1816_8: ṭhapetvā dve aniyate ṭhapetvā tiṃsa nissaggiye pācittiye ṭhapetvā dvenavutipācittiye
tika-vin09t0:1816_9: ṭhapetvā avasesāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī’ti. Ekacce therā evamāhaṃsu ‘cattāri
tika-vin09t0:1816_10: pārājikāni ṭhapetvā terasa saṅghādisese ṭhapetvā dve aniyate ṭhapetvā tiṃsa nissaggiye
tika-vin09t0:1816_11: pācittiye ṭhapetvā dvenavutipācittiye ṭhapetvā cattāro pāṭidesanīye ṭhapetvā avasesāni
tika-vin09t0:1817_0: Yaṃ pana nāgasenattherena milindaraññā puṭṭhena vuttaṃ “dukkaṭaṃ, mahārāja, khuddakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1817_1: sikkhāpadaṃ, dubbhāsitaṃ anukhuddaka”nti, tattha antimakoṭṭhāsameva gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1818_1: tāya niyamavasena yo paricchedo, tassa vacanaṃ saṃvattanamariyādaparicchedavacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1818_2: Idāni taṃ mariyādaṃ vivaritvā dassetuṃ “idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha uddisantīti
tika-vin09t0:1818_3: ācariyā attano ruciyā uddisanti. Uddisāpentīti ācariyaṃ yācitvā antevāsikā uddisāpenti.
tika-vin09t0:1818_4: Sajjhāyantīti dhārenti. Kukkuccavippaṭisāroti kukkuccasaṅkhāto vippaṭisāro. Vihesāvicikicchāmanovilekhāti
tika-vin09t0:1819: Anupasampannassa vivaṇṇaneti anupasampannassa santike nindato tassa tasmiṃ vimatiṃ uppādetuṃ vinayavivaṇṇane.
tika-vin09t0:1822_0: Tasmiṃ anācāreti tasmiṃ anācāre āciṇṇe. Mokkho natthīti tassā āpattiyā mokkho natthi.
tika-vin09t0:1822_1: Tassa teti tassa tava. Alābhāti ye aññesaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne sādhukaṃ aṭṭhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1822_2: katvā manasikaraṇassa ānisaṃsasaññitā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikā ca lābhā icchitabbā,
tika-vin09t0:1822_3: te sabbe tuyhaṃ alābhā eva honti. Dulladdhanti puññavisesena laddhampi manussattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1822_4: dulladdhaṃ. Sādhukanti suṭṭhu. Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti atthikabhāvaṃ katvā, atthiko hutvāti
tika-vin09t0:1822_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Ñattidutiyena kammenāti “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”tiādinā padabhājaniyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1826_0: Pahāraṃ dadeyyāti antamaso uppalapattaṃ upādāya kāyakāyappaṭibaddhanissaggiyānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1826_1: aññatarena pahāraṃ dadeyya. Evaṃ pana pahāre dinne hattho vā bhijjatu, pādo vā sīsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1827_0: Anupasampanneti gahaṭṭhe vā pabbajite vā itthiyā vā purise vā antamaso tiracchānagatepi.
tika-vin09t0:1827_1: Sace pana rattacitto itthiṃ paharati, saṅghādiseso. Kenaci viheṭhiyamānassāti manussena
tika-vin09t0:1827_2: vā tiracchānagatena vā viheṭhiyamānassa. Mokkhādhippāyassāti tato attano mokkhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1827_3: patthayamānassa. Sacepi antarāmagge coraṃ vā paccatthikaṃ vā viheṭhetukāmaṃ disvā
tika-vin09t0:1827_4: “upāsaka, ettheva tiṭṭha, mā āgamitthā”ti vatvā vacanaṃ anādiyitvā āgacchantaṃ “gaccha
tika-vin09t0:1827_5: re”ti muggarena vā satthakena vā paharitvā yāti, so ce tena pahārena marati, anāpattiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1830_0: Talasattikanti talameva talasattikaṃ. “Pothanasamatthaṭṭhena sattika”nti eke. Uccāreyyāti
tika-vin09t0:1830_1: ukkhipeyya. Napaharitukāmatāya dinnattā dukkaṭanti ettha paharitukāmatāya paharite
tika-vin09t0:1830_2: purimasikkhāpadena pācittiyaṃ. Uccāretukāmatāya kevalaṃ uggiraṇamatte kate iminā
tika-vin09t0:1830_3: pācittiyaṃ. Iminā pana virajjhitvā pahāro dinno, tasmā dukkaṭaṃ. Ettha pana “tiracchānagatādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1830_4: asucikaraṇādīni disvā kujjhitvāpi uggirantassa mokkhādhippāyoyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1836_0: Kukkuccaṃ uppādentassāti saṃsayaṃ janentassa. Paro kukkuccaṃ uppādetu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin09t0:1836_1: taṃ appamāṇaṃ. Maññeti takkayāmi. Ādisaddena “vikāle maññe tayā bhuttaṃ, majjaṃ maññe
tika-vin09t0:1836_2: tayā pītaṃ, mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho maññe tayā nisinna”ntiādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Anupasampanneti sāmaṇere.
tika-vin09t0:1839_0: Suyyatīti suti, saddo, sutiyā samīpaṃ upassutīti āha “sutisamīpa”nti, saddasamīpanti
tika-vin09t0:1839_1: attho. Yattha pana ṭhitena sakkā hoti saddaṃ sotuṃ, tattha tiṭṭhanto saddasamīpe
tika-vin09t0:1839_2: tiṭṭhati nāmāti āha “yattha ṭhatvā”tiādi. Atha vā upecca suyyati etthāti upassuti,
tika-vin09t0:1839_3: ṭhānaṃ, yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatena sakkā hoti kathentānaṃ saddaṃ sotuṃ, tatthāti evampettha
tika-vin09t0:1839_4: attho daṭṭhabbo. Turitagamanepīti pacchato gacchantassa purato gacchantānaṃ saddasavanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1839_5: sīghagamanepi. Ohīyamānepīti purato gacchantassa pacchato gacchantānaṃ vacanasavanatthaṃ ohīyamānepi.
tika-vin09t0:1840_0: Vūpasamissāmīti upasamaṃ gamissāmi, kalahaṃ na karissāmi. Attānaṃ parimocessāmīti
tika-vin09t0:1840_1: mama akārakabhāvaṃ kathetvā attānaṃ parimocessāmi. Siyā kiriyanti kadāci sotukāmatāya
tika-vin09t0:1840_2: gamanavasena samuṭṭhānato siyā kiriyaṃ. Siyā akiriyanti kadāci ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā
tika-vin09t0:1843_0: Dhammikānanti dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena katattā dhammo etesu atthīti dhammikāni,
tika-vin09t0:1843_1: tesaṃ dhammikānaṃ. Kammānanti catunnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ. Tenāha “dhammenā”tiādi. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:1843_2: dhammenāti bhūtena vatthunā. Vinayenāti codanāya ceva sāraṇāya ca. Satthusāsanenāti
tika-vin09t0:1843_3: ñattisampadāya ceva anussavanāsampadāya ca. Samaggassa saṅghassāti sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1843_4: sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā kattabbattā kāyena ceva cittena ca ekībhūtassa
tika-vin09t0:1843_5: saṅghassa. Taṃ taṃ vatthunti avaṇṇabhaṇanādiṃ taṃ taṃ vatthu.
tika-vin09t0:1844_0: Osārenti saṅghamajjhaṃ etenāti osāraṇaṃ. Nissārenti saṅghamhā etenāti nissāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1844_1: Bhaṇḍukammanti muṇḍakaraṇaṃ, kesacchedanāpucchananti attho. Kammameva lakkhaṇaṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1844_2: Osāraṇādayo viya kammañca hutvā aññañca nāmaṃ na labhati, kammameva hutvā lakkhīyatīti
tika-vin09t0:1844_3: kammalakkhaṇanti attho. “Osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇa”nti cettha padasiliṭṭhatāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1844_4: Paṭhamaṃ pana nissāraṇā hoti, pacchā osāraṇāti āha “tattha kaṇṭakasāmaṇerassā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1844_5: Kaṇṭakasāmaṇerassa nāsanā viya nissāraṇāti yathā kaṇṭakasāmaṇerassa daṇḍakammanāsanā
tika-vin09t0:1844_6: nissāraṇā, tathā buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhaṇato, akappiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1844_7: “kappiya”nti dīpayato, micchādiṭṭhikassa antaggāhikāya diṭṭhiyā samannāgatassa aññassāpi sāmaṇerassa –
tika-vin09t0:1845_0: “Saṅghaṃ, bhante, pucchāmi ‘ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa
tika-vin09t0:1845_1: vā avaṇṇavādī micchādiṭṭhiko, yaṃ aññe sāmaṇerā labhanti dirattatirattaṃ bhikkhūhi
tika-vin09t0:1845_2: saddhiṃ sahaseyyaṃ, tassa alābhāya nissāraṇā ruccati saṅghassā’ti. Dutiyampi…pe…
tika-vin09t0:1845_3: tatiyampi, bhante, saṅghaṃ pucchāmi ‘ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero…pe… ruccati saṅghassā’ti,
tika-vin09t0:1846_0: Kattabbanāsanā nissāraṇāti attho. Tādisaṃyeva sammāvattantaṃ disvā pavesanā osāraṇāti
tika-vin09t0:1846_1: tādisaṃyeva aparena samayena “ahaṃ, bhante, bālatāya aññāṇatāya alakkhikatāya evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1846_2: akāsiṃ, svāhaṃ saṅghaṃ khamāpemī”ti khamāpentaṃ disvā yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā –
tika-vin09t0:1847_0: “Saṅghaṃ, bhante, pucchāmi ‘ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa
tika-vin09t0:1847_1: vā avaṇṇavādī micchādiṭṭhiko, yaṃ aññe sāmaṇerā labhanti bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ dirattatirattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1847_2: sahaseyyaṃ, tassa alābhāya nissārito, svāyaṃ idāni sorato nivātavutti lajjidhammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1847_3: okkanto hirottappe patiṭṭhito katadaṇḍakammo accayaṃ deseti, imassa sāmaṇerassa yathā
tika-vin09t0:1847_4: pure kāyasambhogasāmaggidānaṃ ruccati saṅghassā’ti. Dutiyampi…pe… tatiyampi, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1849_0: Kesacchedanāpucchananti sīmāpariyāpanne bhikkhū sannipātāpetvā pabbajjāpekkhaṃ tattha
tika-vin09t0:1849_1: netvā “saṅghaṃ, bhante, imassa dārakassa bhaṇḍukammaṃ āpucchāmī”ti tikkhattuṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:1849_2: dvikkhattuṃ vā sakiṃ vā vacanaṃ. Idha ca “imassa dārakassa bhaṇḍukammaṃ āpucchāmā”tipi
tika-vin09t0:1850: Mukharassāti mukhena kharassa. Yaṃ avandiyakammaṃ anuññātanti sambandho. Ūruṃ vivaritvā dassanādivatthūsūti –
tika-vin09t0:1851_0: “Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo kaddamodakena osiñcanti ‘appeva
tika-vin09t0:1851_1: nāma amhesu sārajjeyyu’nti, kāyaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ dassenti, ūruṃ vivaritvā
tika-vin09t0:1851_2: bhikkhunīnaṃ dassenti, aṅgajātaṃ vivaritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ dassenti, bhikkhuniyo obhāsenti,
tika-vin09t0:1851_3: bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ sampayojenti ‘appeva nāma amhesu sārajjeyyu”’nti –
tika-vin09t0:1853_3: Tathārūpaṃ vā dhammikaṃ katikaṃ karontehīti cīvarapiṇḍapātatthāya dinnato āvāsajagganādikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1853_4: tādisaṃ vā aññampi dhammikaṃ katikaṃ karontehi.
tika-vin09t0:1854_0: Neva suttaṃ āgacchatīti na mātikā āgacchati. No suttavibhaṅgoti vinayopi na paguṇo.
tika-vin09t0:1854_1: Byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhatīti byañjanamattameva gahetvā atthaṃ paṭisedheti.
tika-vin09t0:1854_3: disvā “kiṃ ime āpattiyā kāretha, nanu ‘jātarūparajatappaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī’ti
tika-vin09t0:1854_4: evaṃ sutte paṭiviratimattameva vuttaṃ, natthi ettha āpattī”ti vadati. Aparo dhammakathiko
tika-vin09t0:1854_5: suttassa āgatattā olambetvā nivāsentānaṃ āpattiyā āropiyamānāya “kiṃ imesaṃ āpattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1854_6: āropetha, nanu ‘parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā’ti evaṃ sikkhākaraṇamattameva
tika-vin09t0:1854_7: vuttaṃ, natthi ettha āpattī”ti vadati. Ubbāhika vinicchayeti samathakkhandhake vuttaubbāhikavinicchaye
tika-vin09t0:1854_8: “sīlavā hotī”tiādikāya hi dasaṅgasampattiyā samannāgate dve tayo bhikkhū uccinitvā
tika-vin09t0:1855_0: Pavāraṇappaccukkaḍḍhanāti pavāraṇāya ukkassanā, uddhaṃ kaḍḍhanāti attho. Tiṇavatthārakasamathe
tika-vin09t0:1855_1: sabbasaṅgāhikañatti cāti “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, amhākaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ…pe…
tika-vin09t0:1855_2: ṭhapetvā gihippaṭisaṃyutta”nti evaṃ tiṇavatthārakasamathe katā sabbapaṭhamā sabbasaṅgāhikañatti ca.
tika-vin09t0:1856_0: Alābhāya parisakkanādikehīti catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ alābhatthāya payogakaraṇādikehi.
tika-vin09t0:1856_2: bhikkhū bhikkhūhi bhedanaṃ, buddhassa avaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ, dhammassa avaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ, saṅghassa
tika-vin09t0:1856_3: avaṇṇabhaṇana”nti avasesaṃ sattaṅgaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgatassāti aṭṭhahi
tika-vin09t0:1856_4: ceva aṅgehi ekekenapi aṅgena ca samannāgatassa. Asambhogakaraṇatthanti tena dinnassa
tika-vin09t0:1856_6: na adhomukhaṭṭhapanavasena. Pattukkujjanavasenāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tassevāti yo
tika-vin09t0:1856_7: pattanikkujjanavasena katanissāraṇo, tasseva upāsakassa. Sammāvattantassāti yena
tika-vin09t0:1856_8: samannāgatassa pattukkujjanaṃ, tena samannāgatassa. Sāti yathāvuttā nissāraṇā, osāraṇā ca.
tika-vin09t0:1857_0: Sūciyādiappamattakaṃ taṃtadatthikānaṃ vissajjeti detīti appamattakavissajjako. Sāṭiyaggāhāpakoti
tika-vin09t0:1857_1: vassikasāṭiyaggāhāpako. Kammaṃ karonte ārāmike pesanatthāya dātabbā sammuti ārāmikapesakasammuti.
tika-vin09t0:1858_0: Tajjanīyakammādīnaṃ sattannanti tajjanīyaṃ, niyasaṃ, pabbājanīyaṃ, paṭisāraṇīyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1858_1: tividhañca ukkhepanīyanti tajjanīyādīnaṃ sattannaṃ. Aṭṭhayāvatatiyakāti bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1858_2: vasena cattāro, bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena cattāroti aṭṭha saṅghādisesā.
tika-vin09t0:1859_1: daḷhataraṃ hoti, tasmā kātabba”nti ekacce vadanti. Evaṃ pana sati kammasaṅkaro hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1859_2: tasmā na kātabbanti paṭikkhittameva. Sace pana akkharaparihīnaṃ vā padaparihīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1859_3: vā duruttapadaṃ vā hoti, tassa sodhanatthaṃ punappunaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Idaṃ akuppakammassa
tika-vin09t0:1859_4: daḷhīkammaṃ hoti, kuppakamme kammaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati. Sakalakkhaṇenevāti ñattiñca catasso
tika-vin09t0:1859_5: ca kammavācāyo sāvetvāva. Na sesakammavasenāti apalokanakammādinā avasesakammavasena na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1862_0: Ārocitaṃ vatthu avinicchitanti ārocitavatthu āpattikabhāvena na vinicchitaṃ. Ettha
tika-vin09t0:1862_1: ca codakena ca cuditakena ca attano kathā kathitā, anuvijjako sammato, ettāvatā vatthumeva
tika-vin09t0:1862_2: ārocitaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkameyyāti “kathaṃ idaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1862_3: kammaṃ kuppaṃ assa, vaggaṃ assa, na kareyyā”ti iminā adhippāyena chandaṃ adatvā nisinnāsanato
tika-vin09t0:1862_4: uṭṭhāya gaccheyya. Tenāha “yo bhikkhū”tiādi. Kiriyākiriyanti ettha gamanaṃ kiriyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1865_0: Yathāsanthutanti yathāmittaṃ. Tenāha “yo yo”ti ādi. Tattha mittasandiṭṭhasambhattavasenāti
tika-vin09t0:1865_1: mittasandiṭṭhasambhattānaṃ vasena. Tattha mittā mittāva. Sandiṭṭhā tattha tattha
tika-vin09t0:1865_2: saṅgamma diṭṭhamattā nātidaḷhamittā. Sambhattā suṭṭhu bhattā sinehavanto daḷhamittāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1866_0: Pañca garubhaṇḍānīti rāsivasena pañca garubhaṇḍāni, sarūpavasena panetāni bahūni
tika-vin09t0:1866_1: honti. Tenāha “rāsivasena pañca garubhaṇḍāni vuttānī”ti. Ārāmo nāma pupphārāmo vā
tika-vin09t0:1866_2: phalārāmo vā. Ārāmavatthu nāma tesaṃyeva ārāmānaṃ atthāya paricchinditvā ṭhapitokāso,
tika-vin09t0:1866_3: tesu vā ārāmesu vinaṭṭhesu tesaṃ porāṇakabhūmibhāgo. Vihāro nāma yaṃ kiñci pāsādādisenāsanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1866_4: Vihāravatthu nāma tassa patiṭṭhānokāso. Mañco nāma masārako bundikābaddho, kuḷīrapādako,
tika-vin09t0:1866_5: āhaccapādakoti imesaṃ pubbe vuttānaṃ catunnaṃ mañcānaṃ aññataro. Pīṭhaṃ nāma masārakādīnaṃyeva
tika-vin09t0:1866_6: catunnaṃ pīṭhānaṃ aññataraṃ. Bhisi nāma uṇṇabhisiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ bhisīnaṃ aññatarā.
tika-vin09t0:1866_7: Bibbohanaṃ nāma rukkhatūlalatātūlapoṭakitūlānaṃ aññatarena puṇṇaṃ. Lohakumbhī nāma
tika-vin09t0:1866_8: kāḷalohena vā tambalohena vā yena kenaci lohena katā kumbhī. Lohabhāṇakādīsupi eseva
tika-vin09t0:1866_9: nayo. Ettha pana bhāṇakanti arañjaro vuccati. Vārakoti ghaṭo. Kaṭāhaṃ kaṭāhameva.
tika-vin09t0:1866_10: Vāsiādīsu, valliādīsu ca duviññeyyaṃ nāma natthi. Evaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:1871_0: Vissajjetuṃ vā vibhajituṃ vā na vaṭṭatīti mūlacchejjavasena vissajjetuṃ vā vibhajituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1871_1: vā na vaṭṭanti. Parivattanavasena pana vissajjantassa, vibhajantassa ca anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1871_3: ārāmaṃ ārāmavatthuṃ vihāraṃ vihāravatthuṃ. Itarenāti athāvarena, pacchimarāsittayenāti
tika-vin09t0:1871_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Akappiyenāti suvaṇṇamayamañcādinā ceva akappiyabhisibibbohanehi ca.
tika-vin09t0:1871_5: Mahagghakappiyenāti dantamayamañcādinā ceva pāvārādinā ca. Itaranti athāvaraṃ. Kappiyaparivattanena
tika-vin09t0:1871_6: parivattetunti yathā akappiyaṃ na hoti, evaṃ parivattetuṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1872_0: Tatrāyaṃ parivattananayo – saṅghassa nāḷikerārāmo dūre hoti, kappiyakārakāva bahutaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1872_1: khādanti, yampi na khādanti, tato sakaṭavetanaṃ datvā appameva āharanti. Aññesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1872_2: pana tassārāmassa avidūre gāmavāsīnaṃ manussānaṃ vihārassa samīpe ārāmo hoti, te
tika-vin09t0:1872_3: saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sakena ārāmena taṃ ārāmaṃ yācanti, saṅghena “ruccati saṅghassā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1872_4: apaloketvā sampaṭicchitabbo. Sacepi bhikkhūnaṃ rukkhasahassaṃ hoti, manussānaṃ pañcasatāni,
tika-vin09t0:1872_5: “tumhākaṃ ārāmo khuddako”ti na vattabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi ayaṃ khuddako, atha kho itarato
tika-vin09t0:1872_6: bahutaraṃ āyaṃ deti. Sacepi samakameva deti, evampi icchiticchitakkhaṇe paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1872_7: sakkāti gahetabbameva. Sace pana manussānaṃ bahutarā rukkhā honti, “nanu tumhākaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1872_8: bahutarā rukkhā”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace “atirekaṃ amhākaṃ puññaṃ hotu, saṅghassa demā”ti
tika-vin09t0:1872_9: vadanti, jānāpetvā sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhūnaṃ rukkhā phaladhārino, manussānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1872_10: rukkhā na tāva phalaṃ gaṇhanti. Kiñcāpi na gaṇhanti, na cirena gaṇhissantīti sampaṭicchitabbameva.
tika-vin09t0:1872_11: Manussānaṃ rukkhā phaladhārino, bhikkhūnaṃ rukkhā na tāva phalaṃ gaṇhanti, “nanu
tika-vin09t0:1872_12: tumhākaṃ rukkhā phaladhārino”ti vattabbaṃ. Sace “gaṇhatha, bhante, amhākaṃ puññaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1872_13: bhavissatī”ti denti, jānāpetvā sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Evaṃ ārāmena ārāmo parivattetabbo,
tika-vin09t0:1872_14: eteneva nayena ārāmavatthupi vihāropi vihāravatthupi ārāmena parivattetabbaṃ. Ārāmavatthunā
tika-vin09t0:1872_15: ca mahantena vā khuddakena vā ārāmaṃ ārāmavatthuṃ vihāraṃ vihāravatthunti.
tika-vin09t0:1873_0: Kathaṃ vihārena vihāro parivattetabbo? Saṅghassa antogāme gehaṃ hoti, manussānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1873_1: vihāramajjhe pāsādo, ubhopi agghena samakā. Sace manussā tena pāsādena taṃ gehaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1873_2: yācanti, sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhūnaṃ ce mahagghataraṃ gehaṃ hoti, “mahagghataraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1873_3: amhākaṃ geha”nti vutte “kiñcāpi mahagghataraṃ pabbajitānaṃ asāruppaṃ, na sakkā tattha
tika-vin09t0:1873_4: pabbajitehi vasituṃ, idaṃ pana sāruppaṃ, gaṇhathā”ti vadanti, evampi sampaṭicchituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1873_5: vaṭṭati. Sace pana manussānaṃ mahagghaṃ hoti “nanu tumhākaṃ gehaṃ mahaggha”nti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1873_6: “Hotu, bhante, amhākaṃ puññaṃ bhavissati, gaṇhathā”ti vutte pana sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1873_7: Evaṃ vihārena vihāro parivattetabbo. Eteneva nayena vihāravatthupi ārāmopi ārāmavatthupi
tika-vin09t0:1873_8: vihārena parivattetabbaṃ. Vihāravatthunā ca mahagghena vā appagghena vā vihāraṃ vihāravatthuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1873_9: ārāmaṃ ārāmavatthuṃ. Evaṃ tāva thāvarena thāvaraparivattanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1874_0: Itarena itaraparivattane pana mañcapīṭhaṃ mahantaṃ vā hotu, khuddakaṃ vā, antamaso
tika-vin09t0:1874_1: caturaṅgulapādakaṃ gāmadārakehi paṃsvāgārakesu kīḷantehi katampi saṅghassa dinnakālato
tika-vin09t0:1874_2: paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Sacepi rājā vā rājamahāmattādayo vā ekappahāreneva mañcasataṃ
tika-vin09t0:1874_3: vā mañcasahassaṃ vā denti, sabbe kappiyamañcā sampaṭicchitabbā, sampaṭicchitvā vuḍḍhappaṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin09t0:1874_4: “saṅghikaparibhogena paribhuñjathā”ti dātabbā, na puggalikaparibhogena dātabbā. Atirekamañce
tika-vin09t0:1874_5: bhaṇḍāgārādīsu paññapetvā pattacīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā paribhuñjitumpi vaṭṭati. Bahisīmāya
tika-vin09t0:1874_6: “saṅghassa demā”ti dinnamañco saṅghattherassa vasanaṭṭhāne dātabbo. Tattha ce bahū
tika-vin09t0:1874_7: mañcā honti, mañcena kammaṃ natthi. Yassa vasanaṭṭhāne kammaṃ atthi, tattha “saṅghikaparibhogena
tika-vin09t0:1874_8: paribhuñjathā”ti dātabbo, na puggalikabhogena. Mahagghena satagghanakena vā sahassagghanakena
tika-vin09t0:1874_9: vā mañcena aññaṃ mañcasataṃ labhati, parivattetvā gahetabbaṃ. Na kevalaṃ mañcena
tika-vin09t0:1874_11: vaṭṭati. Eseva nayo pīṭhabhisibibbohanesupi. Varasenāsanādīnaṃ saṃrakkhaṇatthanti
tika-vin09t0:1874_12: sace dubbhikkhaṃ hoti, bhikkhū piṇḍapātena na yāpenti, ettha rājarogacorabhayāni,
tika-vin09t0:1874_13: aññattha gacchantānaṃ vihārā palujjanti, tālanāḷikerādike vināsenti, senāsanapaccayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1874_14: sandhāya yāpetuṃ sakkā hoti, evarūpe kāle varasenāsanādīnaṃ saṃrakkhaṇatthaṃ. Lāmakāni
tika-vin09t0:1874_15: vissajjetunti lāmakaṃ lāmakaṃ vissajjetuṃ, lāmakakoṭiyā vissajjetunti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1874_16: Vissajjetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti vissajjetvā tato laddhayāgubhattacīvarādīni paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin09t0:1874_18: kittimalohaṃ. Tīṇi hi kittimalohāni kaṃsalohaṃ, vaṭṭalohaṃ, ārakūṭanti. Tattha tiputambe
tika-vin09t0:1874_19: missetvā kataṃ kaṃsalohaṃ, sītatambe missetvā kataṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ, rasakatambe missetvā
tika-vin09t0:1874_20: kataṃ ārakūṭaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “kaṃsalohaṃ, vaṭṭalohañca kittimaloha”nti. Tato atirekanti
tika-vin09t0:1875_0: Sarakoti majjhe makuḷaṃ dassetvā mukhavaṭṭivitthataṃ katvā piṭṭhito nāmetvā kātabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1875_1: ekaṃ bhājanaṃ. “Sarāva”ntipi vadanti. Ādisaddena kañcanakādīnaṃ gihiupakaraṇānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1875_2: gahaṇaṃ. Tāni hi khuddakānipi garubhaṇḍāneva gihiupakaraṇattāti. Pi-saddena pageva
tika-vin09t0:1875_3: mahantānīti dasseti. Imāni pana bhājanīyāni bhikkhūpakaraṇattāti adhippāyo. Yathā
tika-vin09t0:1875_4: ca etāni, evaṃ kuṇḍikāpi bhājanīyā. Vakkhati hi “yathā ca mattikābhaṇḍe, evaṃ lohabhaṇḍepi
tika-vin09t0:1875_5: kuṇḍikā bhājanīyakoṭṭhāsameva bhajatī”ti. Saṅghikaparibhogenāti āgantukānaṃ vuḍḍhatarānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1875_6: datvā paribhogena. Gihivikaṭāti gihīhi vikatā paññattā, attano vā santakakaraṇena
tika-vin09t0:1875_7: virūpaṃ katā. Puggalikaparibhogena na vaṭṭatīti āgantukānaṃ adatvā attano santakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1875_8: viya gahetvā pariharitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati. Pipphalikoti kattari. Ārakaṇṭakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1875_9: sūcivedhakaṃ. Tāḷaṃ yantaṃ. Kattarayaṭṭhivedhako kattarayaṭṭhivalayaṃ. Yathā tathā
tika-vin09t0:1875_10: ghanakataṃ lohanti lohavaṭṭi lohaguḷo lohapiṇḍi lohacakkalikanti evaṃ ghanakataṃ
tika-vin09t0:1876_0: Gihivikaṭānipi na vaṭṭanti anāmāsattā. Pi-saddena pageva saṅghikaparibhogena vā puggalikaparibhogena
tika-vin09t0:1876_1: vāti dasseti. Senāsanaparibhogo pana sabbakappiyo. Tasmā jātarūpādimayā sabbepi senāsanaparikkhārā
tika-vin09t0:1877_0: Sesāti tato mahattarī vāsi. Yā panāti yā kudārī pana. Kudālo antamaso caturaṅgulamattopi
tika-vin09t0:1877_1: garubhaṇḍameva. Nikhādanaṃ caturassamukhaṃ vā hotu, doṇimukhaṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā ujukaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1877_2: vā, antamaso sammuñjanidaṇḍakavedhanampi daṇḍabandhaṃ ce, garubhaṇḍameva. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:1877_3: “kudālo daṇḍabandhanikhādanaṃ vā agarubhaṇḍaṃ nāma natthī”ti. Sipāṭikā nāma khurakoso.
tika-vin09t0:1877_4: Sikharaṃ pana daṇḍabandhanikhādanaṃ anulometīti āha “sikharampi nikhādaneneva saṅgahita”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1877_5: Sace tampi pana adaṇḍakaṃ phalamattaṃ, bhājanīyaṃ. Upakkhareti vāsiādibhaṇḍāni.
tika-vin09t0:1878_2: imāni cettha tīṇi pipphalikaṃ anulomentīti āha “ayaṃ pana viseso”tiādi. Itarānīti mahākattariādīni.
tika-vin09t0:1879_0: Aḍḍhabāhuppamāṇāti kapparato paṭṭhāya yāva aṃsakūṭappamāṇā, vidatthicaturaṅgulappamāṇāti
tika-vin09t0:1879_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Tatthajātakāti saṅghikabhūmiyaṃ jātā. Ārakkhasaṃvidhānena rakkhitattā
tika-vin09t0:1879_2: rakkhitā ca sā mañjūsādīsu pakkhittaṃ viya yathā taṃ na nassati, evaṃ gopanato gopitā
tika-vin09t0:1879_3: cāti rakkhitagopitā. Tatthajātakāpi pana arakkhitā garubhaṇḍameva na hoti. “Saṅghakamme
tika-vin09t0:1879_4: ca cetiyakamme ca kate”ti iminā saṅghasantakena cetiyasantakaṃ rakkhituṃ, parivattituñca
tika-vin09t0:1879_5: vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Suttaṃ panāti vaṭṭitañceva avaṭṭitañca suttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1880_0: Aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattoti antamaso dīghaso aṭṭhaṅgulamatto, pariṇāhato sīhaḷapaṇṇasūcidaṇḍamatto.
tika-vin09t0:1880_1: Etthāti veḷubhaṇḍe. Daḍḍhaṃ gehaṃ yesaṃ teti daḍḍhagehā. Na vāretabbāti “mā gaṇhitvā
tika-vin09t0:1880_2: gacchathā”ti na nisedhetabbā. Desantaragatena sampattavihāre saṅghikāvāse ṭhapetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1881_0: Avasesañca chadanatiṇanti muñjapabbajehi avasesaṃ yaṃ kiñci chadanatiṇaṃ. Yattha
tika-vin09t0:1881_1: pana tiṇaṃ natthi, tattha paṇṇehi chādenti. Tasmā paṇṇampi tiṇeneva saṅgahitanti
tika-vin09t0:1882_1: Saṅghassa dinno vāti dārudullabhaṭṭhāne saṅghassa dinno vā. Kurundiyaṃ vuttakkamena
tika-vin09t0:1882_2: dārubhaṇḍavinicchayaṃ vatvā idāni mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttakkamena vattuṃ “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1882_3: Āsandikādīnīti ettha āsandikoti caturassapīṭhaṃ vuccati. “Uccakampi āsandika”nti
tika-vin09t0:1882_4: vacanato ekatobhāgena dīghapīṭhameva hi aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ vaṭṭati. Caturassāsandiko
tika-vin09t0:1882_5: pana pamāṇātikkantopi vaṭṭhatīti veditabbo. Ādisaddena “sattaṅgo, bhaddapīṭhakaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1882_6: eḷakapādakapīṭhaṃ, āmalakavaṭṭakapīṭhaṃ, phalakaṃ, kocchaṃ, palālapīṭhaka”nti ime
tika-vin09t0:1882_7: saṅgaṇhantīti veditabbaṃ. Tenāha “antamaso”tiādi. Paṇṇehi vāti kadalipaṇṇādīhi vā.
tika-vin09t0:1883_0: Ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ nāma yattha ṭhapetvā rajitacīvaraṃ hatthena ghaṭṭenti. Ghaṭṭanamuggaro
tika-vin09t0:1883_1: nāma anuvātādighaṭṭanakoti vadanti. Daṇḍamuggaro nāma yena rajitacīvaraṃ pothenti.
tika-vin09t0:1883_2: Ambaṇanti phalakehi pokkharaṇī viya kataṃ pānīyabhājanaṃ. Rajanadoṇīti pakkarajanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1884_0: Akappiyacammanti sīhādīnaṃ cammaṃ. “Bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ akappiyacammaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1884_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Paccattharaṇagatika”nti iminā mañcapīṭhepi attharituṃ vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin09t0:1884_2: dīpeti. Pāvārādipaccattharaṇampi garubhaṇḍanti eke. Noti apare. Vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1885_1: pana yānaṃ bhājanīyaṃ. Anuññātavāsi nāma yā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharituṃ sakkāti
tika-vin09t0:1885_2: vuttā. Muṭṭhipaṇṇanti tālapattaṃ. Tañhi muṭṭhinā gahetvā pariharantīti “muṭṭhipaṇṇa”nti
tika-vin09t0:1885_3: vuccati. Muṭṭhipaṇṇanti chattacchadanapaṇṇamevāti keci. Araṇisahitanti araṇiyugaḷaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1886_0: Phātikammaṃ katvāti antamaso taṃagghanakavālikāyapi thāvaraṃ vaḍḍhikammaṃ katvā.
tika-vin09t0:1886_1: Phātikammaṃ akatvā gaṇhantena tattheva valañjetabbo. Gamanakāle saṅghike āvāse ṭhapetvā
tika-vin09t0:1886_2: gantabbaṃ. Asatiyā gahetvā gatena pahiṇitvā dātabbo. Desantaragatena sampattavihāre
tika-vin09t0:1886_3: saṅghikāvāse ṭhapetabbo. Etthāti mattikābhaṇḍe. Kuṇḍikāti ayokuṇḍikā ceva tambalohakuṇḍikā
tika-vin09t0:1886_4: ca. Bhājanīyakoṭṭhāsameva bhajatīti bhājanīyapakkhameva sevati, na tu garubhaṇḍanti
tika-vin09t0:1886_5: attho. Kañcanako pana garubhaṇḍamevāti adhippāyo. Itaranti garubhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1894_0: Anikkhantarājake aniggataratanaketi ettha “sayanighare”ti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabboti āha
tika-vin09t0:1894_1: “anikkhanto rājā ito”tiādi. Tattha itoti sayanigharato. Sayanighareti sayanīyaghare.
tika-vin09t0:1894_2: Yattha rañño sayanaṃ paññattaṃ hoti, antamaso sāṇipākāraparikkhittampi, tasminti
tika-vin09t0:1894_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, hatthiādi. Idha pana itthiratanaṃ adhippetanti
tika-vin09t0:1895: Ubhosūti rājamahesīsu. Kiriyākiriyanti ettha indakhīlātikkamo kiriyaṃ, appaṭisaṃviditaṃ akiriyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1898_0: Muttādidasavidhanti “muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ lohitaṅko
tika-vin09t0:1898_1: masāragalla”nti dasavidhaṃ ratanaṃ. Ajjhāvasatheti gehe. Tenāha “parikkhittassā”tiādi,
tika-vin09t0:1898_2: parikkhittassa āvasathassāti attho. Āvasathoti cettha antogāme niviṭṭhagehaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1898_3: Ārāme niviṭṭhagehaṃ pana ajjhārāmaggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ. “Āvasathoti cettha antoārāme
tika-vin09t0:1898_4: vā hotu, aññattha vā, attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vuccatī”ti keci. Sabbesampi atthāya dukkaṭamevāti
tika-vin09t0:1898_5: attano vā tesaṃ saṅghādīnaṃ vā atthāya uggaṇhantassa vā uggaṇhāpentassa vā dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin09t0:1898_6: Sace pana mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ avassaṃ paṭisāmetabbaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ hoti, attano
tika-vin09t0:1898_7: atthāya gahetvā paṭisāmetabbanti āha “tādisaṃ panā”tiādi. Tādisanti yaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1898_8: santakaṃ avassaṃ paṭisāmetabbaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ, tādisaṃ. Chandenapi bhayenapīti vaḍḍhakiādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1899_0: Tādise ṭhāneti mahāvihārasadisassa mahārāmassa pākāraparikkhitte pariveṇe. Saññāṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1899_1: katvāti “ettakā kahāpaṇā”tiādinā rūpena vā lañchanādinimittena vā saññāṇaṃ katvā,
tika-vin09t0:1899_2: sallakkhetvāti attho. Patirūpānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ hattheti lajjīnaṃ kukkuccakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1899_3: hatthe. Lolajātikānañhi hatthe ṭhapetuṃ na labbhati. Neva pakkamatīti neva tamhā
tika-vin09t0:1899_4: āvāsā pakkamati. “Thāvaraṃ senāsanaṃ vā”tiādinā attano cīvarādimūlaṃ na kātabbanti
tika-vin09t0:1899_5: dasseti. Taṃ dassetvāti yaṃ thāvarasenāsanādi kataṃ, taṃ upāsaka tava santakena idaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1899_6: nāma katanti evaṃ dassetvā. Samādapetvāti aññaṃ samādapetvā, “uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin09t0:1899_7: esā ariyāna yācanā”ti vuttanayena yācitvāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1900: Anuññātaṭṭhāneti ajjhārāmaajjhāvasathe. Āmāsanti āmasitabbañceva paṭisāmetabbañca vatthādi.
tika-vin09t0:1903_0: Cāritteti cārittasikkhāpade. Upacāranti dutiyaleḍḍupātaṃ. Aññaṃ gāmaṃ gacchantānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1903_1: puna āpucchanakiccaṃ natthīti ussāhaṃ appaṭippassambhetvā aññaṃ gāmaṃ gacchantānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1903_2: gāmasatampi hotu, puna āpucchanakiccaṃ natthīti attho. Tenāha “sace panā”tiādi. Ussāhanti
tika-vin09t0:1903_3: gāmappavisanussāhaṃ. Antarārāmādīsu na kevalaṃ anāpucchā gacchantasseva, kāyabandhanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1903_4: abandhitvā saṅghāṭiṃ apārupitvā gacchantassāpi anāpatti. Āpadāsūti sīho vā byaggho
tika-vin09t0:1903_5: vā āgacchati, megho vā uṭṭheti, añño vā koci upaddavo uppajjati, anāpatti. Evarūpāsu
tika-vin09t0:1906: Taṃ assa atthīti paṭhamaṃ bhinditvā pacchā desetabbattā taṃ bhedanakaṃ assa pācittiyassa atthīti.
tika-vin09t0:1907: Araṇiketi araṇidhanuke. Vidheti vedhake. Vāsijaṭeti vāsidaṇḍake ca.
tika-vin09t0:1910: Aṭṭhaṅgulapādakanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso. “Chedanakaṃ bhedanakasadisamevā”ti iminā “chedanameva chedanakaṃ, taṃ assa atthīti chedanaka”nti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin09t0:1911_0: Yathā pamāṇameva upari dissati, evaṃ nikhaṇitvā vāti sace pana na chinditukāmo hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1911_1: yathā pamāṇameva upari dissati, evaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇitvā vā. Aṭṭakaṃ vā bandhitvāti
tika-vin09t0:1914: Cimilikaṃ pattharitvā tūlaṃ pakkhipitvāti mañcapīṭhānaṃ upari cimilikaṃ pattharitvā tassa upari tūlaṃ pakkhipitvāti attho. Upari cimilikāyāti uparimabhāge cimilikāya.
tika-vin09t0:1915_0: Sīsappamāṇanti yattha galavāṭakato paṭṭhāya sabbasīsaṃ upadahanti, taṃ sīsappamāṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1915_1: Tañca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato tiriyaṃ muṭṭhiratanaṃ hoti, dīghato dviratananti dassetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:1915_2: “yassa vitthārato tīsu koṇesū”tiādimāha. Dvinnaṃ antaraṃ vidatthi caturaṅgulaṃ hotīti
tika-vin09t0:1915_3: dvinnaṃ koṇānaṃ antaraṃ miniyamānaṃ vidatthi ceva caturaṅgulañca hoti. Majjhe muṭṭhiratananti
tika-vin09t0:1915_4: bibbohanassa majjhaṃ tiriyato muṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ hoti. Ayañhi sīsappamāṇassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo.
tika-vin09t0:1915_5: Tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati, heṭṭhā vaṭṭati. Agilānassa sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti
tika-vin09t0:1915_6: dvayameva vaṭṭati. Gilānassa bibbohanāni santharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1921_0: Adhonābhiubbhajāṇumaṇḍalanti nābhiyā heṭṭhā jāṇumaṇḍalānaṃ upari. Kaṇḍupīḷakaassāvathullakacchābādhānanti
tika-vin09t0:1921_1: ettha kaṇḍūti kacchu. Pīḷakāti lohitatuṇḍikā sukhumapīḷakā. Assāvoti arisabhagandalamadhumehānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1932_0: Antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāyāti rathikaṃ byūhaṃ siṅghāṭakaṃ gharaṃ paviṭṭhāya. Asappāyanti
tika-vin09t0:1932_1: saggamokkhānaṃ ahitaṃ ananukūlaṃ. Bhikkhuniyā antaraghare ṭhatvā dadamānāya vasenettha
tika-vin09t0:1932_2: āpatti veditabbā, bhikkhussa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ pana appamāṇaṃ. Tenāha “antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāyāti
tika-vin09t0:1932_4: Rathiyābyūhasiṅghāṭakagharānanti ettha rathiyāti racchā. Byūhanti anibbijjhitvā ṭhitā
tika-vin09t0:1932_5: gatapaccāgataracchā. Siṅghāṭakanti catukkoṇaṃ vā tikoṇaṃ vā maggasamodhānaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1932_6: Gharanti kulagharaṃ. Yathā ca rathiyādīsu ṭhatvā dadamānāya gaṇhato āpatti, evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1933_0: “Yāmakālikādīsu paṭiggahaṇepi ajjhoharaṇepi dukkaṭa”nti idaṃ āmisena asambhinnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1933_1: sandhāya vuttaṃ, sambhinne pana ekarase pāṭidesanīyameva. Ekato upasampannāyāti bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1933_2: santike upasampannāya, bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannāya pana yathāvatthukameva.
tika-vin09t0:1934_0: Ñātikāya vā dāpentiyāti sayaṃ adatvā yāya kāyaci ñātikāya dāpentiyā, aññātikāyāti
tika-vin09t0:1934_1: attho. Upanikkhipitvā vā dadamānāyāti bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā “idaṃ, ayya, tumhākaṃ dammī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1934_2: dadamānāya. Evaṃ dinnaṃ “sādhu, bhaginī”ti sampaṭicchitvā tāya eva vā bhikkhuniyā,
tika-vin09t0:1934_3: aññena vā kenaci paṭiggahāpetvā idaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1937_0: Yo ca paṭiggahetvā bhuñjatīti sambandho. Attano vā bhattaṃ dāpentiyāti ettha sacepi
tika-vin09t0:1937_1: attano bhattaṃ deti, iminā sikkhāpadena anāpattiyeva, purimasikkhāpadena āpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1937_2: Aññesaṃ vā bhattaṃ dentiyāti ettha pana sace dāpeyya, iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti bhaveyya,
tika-vin09t0:1937_3: dentiyā pana neva iminā, na purimena āpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1940_0: Laddhasekkhasammutikānīti ñattidutiyena kammena laddhasekkhasammutikāni. Yañhi kulaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1940_1: saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati, evarūpassa kulassa ñattidutiyena kammena sekkhasammutiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1941_0: Gharato nīharitvāti gharato āsanasālaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā ānetvā. Tenāha “āsanasālādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1941_1: vā”ti. Imassa “dentī”ti iminā sambandho. Dvāramūle vā ṭhapitaṃ dentīti dvāramūle
tika-vin09t0:1941_2: ṭhapitaṃ pacchā sampattassa denti. Bhikkhuṃ pana disvā antogehato nīharitvā diyyamānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1941_3: na vaṭṭati. Niccabhattaketi niccaṃ dātabbabhattake. Salākabhatteti rukkhasāramayāya
tika-vin09t0:1941_4: salākāya vā veḷuvilīvatālapaṇṇādimayāya paṭṭikāya vā “asukassa nāma salākabhatta”nti
tika-vin09t0:1941_5: evaṃ akkharāni upanibandhitvā gāhāpetvā dātabbabhatte. Pakkhiketi ekasmiṃ pakkhe
tika-vin09t0:1941_6: ekadivase dātabbabhatte. Uposathiketi uposathe dātabbabhatte. Pāṭipadiketi pāṭipadadivase dātabbabhatte.
tika-vin09t0:1944_0: Tassa parivāraṃ katvā, aññaṃ vā tena saddhiṃ bahukampīti yāguyā paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā
tika-vin09t0:1944_1: “kiṃ suddhāya yāguyā dinnāya, pūvabhattādīnipi etissā yāguyā parivāraṃ katvā, dassāmā”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1944_2: tassa khādanīyassa vā bhojanīyassa vā parivāraṃ katvā, aññaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci tena saddhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1944_3: bahukampi āharīyatu. Khādanīyanti nidassanamattaṃ “bhojanīyaṃ vā”tipi icchitabbattā.
tika-vin09t0:1944_4: Tena saddhiṃ āharantūti tena saddhiṃ attano deyyadhammaṃ āharantu. “Yāguyā paṭisaṃviditaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1944_5: katvā pūvaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā āharanti, etampi vaṭṭatī”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1945_0: Paṭisaṃviditagilānāvasesakaṃ vāti paṭisaṃviditañca gilāno ca paṭisaṃviditagilānā,
tika-vin09t0:1945_1: tesaṃ avasesakaṃ, paṭisaṃviditassa ca gilānassa ca sesakanti attho. Ekassatthāya
