tika-vin09t0:1945_2: paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā āhaṭaṃ, tassa sesakaṃ aññassāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Catunnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1945_3: vā pañcannaṃ vā paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā bahūnaṃ āhaṭaṃ hoti, aññesampi dātuṃ icchanti,
tika-vin09t0:1945_4: etampi paṭisaṃviditasesakameva, sabbesampi vaṭṭati. Atha adhikameva hoti, sannidhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1945_5: mocetvā ṭhapitaṃ dutiyadivasepi vaṭṭati. Gilānassāhaṭāvasesepi eseva nayo. Yaṃ pana
tika-vin09t0:1945_6: appaṭisaṃviditameva katvā ābhataṃ, taṃ bahiārāmaṃ pesetvā paṭisaṃviditaṃ kāretvā
tika-vin09t0:1945_7: āharāpetabbaṃ, bhikkhūhi vā gantvā antarāmagge gahetabbaṃ. Yampi vihāramajjhena gacchanto
tika-vin09t0:1945_8: vā vanacarakādayo vā vanato āharitvā denti, purimanayeneva paṭisaṃviditaṃ kāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1945_9: Katthaci pana potthakesu “paṭisaṃviditaṃ katvā āhaṭaṃ vā gilānāvasesakaṃ vā”ti pāṭho
tika-vin09t0:1945_10: dissati, so na gahetabbo. Tatthajātakameva vāti ārāme jātakameva. Mūlaphalādinti
tika-vin09t0:1945_11: mūlaphalatacapattādiṃ aññena kappiyaṃ katvā dinnaṃ paribhuñjato anāpatti. Sace pana
tika-vin09t0:1945_12: taṃ gāmaṃ haritvā pacitvā āharanti, na vaṭṭati. Paṭisaṃviditaṃ kāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1952_0: “Antaraghare”ti visesetvā na vuttattā “ārāmepi antaragharepi sabbatthā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1952_1: Ārāmepīti buddhūpaṭṭhānādikālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yathā “tatrime cattāro pārājikā
tika-vin09t0:1952_2: dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchantī”tiādinā tattha tattha paricchedo kato, evametthāpi “tatrime
tika-vin09t0:1952_3: pañcasattati sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchantī”ti kasmā paricchedo na katoti āha
tika-vin09t0:1952_5: Idañca nidassanamattaṃ aññesampi khandhakavattānaṃ ettheva saṅgahassa icchitabbattā.
tika-vin09t0:1952_6: Ayañhettha adhippāyo – sekhiyaggahaṇena cettha vattakkhandhakādīsu āgatavattādīnampi
tika-vin09t0:1952_7: gahaṇaṃ. Tepi hi sikkhitabbaṭṭhena “sekhiyā”ti icchitā. Tasmā mātikāyaṃ pārājikādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1952_8: viya sekhiyānaṃ paricchedo na katoti. Na kevalaṃ vattakkhandhakādīsu āgatavattādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1952_9: gahaṇatthamevāti āha “cārittavinayadassanatthañcā”ti. Etthāpi paricchedo na katoti
tika-vin09t0:1952_10: ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. Mātikāya “dukkaṭa”nti avutte kathaṃ panettha dukkaṭanti veditabbanti āha “yo panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1953: Aṭṭhaṅgulamattanti pakataṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ. Yo pana sukkhajaṅgho vā mahāpiṇḍikamaṃso vā hoti, tassa sāruppatthāya aṭṭhaṅgulādhikampi otāretvā nivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1955_0: Aparimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsessāmīti “purato vā pacchato vā olambetvā nivāsessāmī”ti evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1955_1: asañcicca. Kiñcāpi parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetuṃ ajānantassa anāpatti, tathāpi nivāsanavattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1955_2: sādhukaṃ uggahetabbameva. Sañcicca anuggahaṇañhi anādariyaṃ siyāti āha “apica nivāsanavattaṃ uggahetabba”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1958_0: Paṭikkhittaṃ gihipārutanti khuddakavatthukhandhake paṭikkhittaṃ gihipārutaṃ. Idāni
tika-vin09t0:1958_2: Yaṃ kiñci aññathā pārutanti sambandho. Tasmāti yasmā setapaṭapārutādi gihipārutaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1958_3: nāma, tasmā. Setapaṭāti etasseva vivaraṇaṃ. Aḍḍhapālakanigaṇṭhāti aḍḍhaṃ pālentīti
tika-vin09t0:1958_4: aḍḍhapālakā, aḍḍhapālakā ca te nigaṇṭhā cāti aḍḍhapālakanigaṇṭhā. Te hi upari ekameva
tika-vin09t0:1958_5: setavatthaṃ upakacchake pavesetvā paridahanti, heṭṭhā naggāpi aḍḍhameva pālenti.
tika-vin09t0:1958_6: Paribbājakāti gihibandhanaṃ pahāya pabbajjūpagatā. Uraṃ vivaritvāti hadayamajjhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1958_7: vivaritvā. Akkhitārakāmattanti akkhimattaṃ. Ārāme vāti buddhūpaṭṭhānādikālaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin09t0:1958_8: vuttaṃ. Antaraghare vāti antare gharāni ettha, etassāti vā “antaraghara”nti laddhanāme gāme.
tika-vin09t0:1961_0: Suṭṭhu paṭicchannoti jattumpi urampi avivaritvā paṭicchādetabbaṭṭhāne paṭicchādanena
tika-vin09t0:1961_1: paṭicchanno, na sīsapāruto. Tenāha “gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā”tiādi. Tattha gaṇṭhikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1961_2: paṭimuñcitvāti gaṇṭhikaṃ pāsake paṭimuñcitvā. Antaraghare vāti gocaragāme. Ekadivasampi
tika-vin09t0:1961_3: vāsūpagatassa santikaṃ yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati, ko pana vādo catuppañcāhaṃ vāsamadhiṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:1962: Vāsūpagatassāti rattivāsatthāya upagatassa rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā kāyaṃ vivaritvā nisīdato anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1965: Susaṃvutoti susaṃyato. Yathā panettha susaṃvuto nāma hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “hatthaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1968_0: Kittakena pana okkhittacakkhu hotīti āha “yugamattaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ pekkhamāno”ti. Yugayuttako
tika-vin09t0:1968_1: hi danto ājāneyyo yugamattaṃ pekkhati, purato catuhatthappamāṇaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ, imināpi
tika-vin09t0:1968_2: ettakaṃ pekkhantena gantabbaṃ. Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca taṃ taṃ disābhāgaṃ pāsādaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1968_3: vīthiṃ olokento gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Hatthiassādiparissayābhāvanti parissayanaṭṭhena,
tika-vin09t0:1968_4: abhibhavanaṭṭhena, viheṭhanaṭṭhena vā parissayo, hatthiassādiyeva parissayo hatthiassādiparissayo,
tika-vin09t0:1968_5: tassābhāvaṃ, hatthiassādi upaddavābhāvanti attho. “Yathā ca ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā,
tika-vin09t0:1968_6: evaṃ gacchantopi parissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ labhatiyeva, tathā gāme pūja”nti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1971: Antoindakhīlato paṭṭhāyāti parikkhittassa gāmassa antoummārato paṭṭhāya, aparikkhittassa pana dutiyaleḍḍupātato paṭṭhāya na evaṃ gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1974: Hasanīyasmiṃ vatthusminti nimittatthe bhummaṃ, hasitabbavatthukāraṇāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1977: Kittāvatā appasaddo hotīti āha “ayaṃ panetthā”tiādi. Saddameva suṇātīti aparibyattakkharaṃ saddamattameva suṇāti. Tenāha “kathaṃ na vavatthapetī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1980_0: “Kāyādīni paggahetvā”ti etasseva vivaraṇaṃ “niccalāni ujukāni ṭhapetvā”ti gantabbañceva
tika-vin09t0:1980_1: nisīditabbañcāti samena iriyāpathena gantabbañceva nisīditabbañca. Kāyappacālakādiyuttaṃ chakkaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1987: Satiṃ upaṭṭhāpetvāti chaḍḍetukāmo viya ahutvā piṇḍapāte satiṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā, “piṇḍapātaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti satiṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā.
tika-vin09t0:1990: Upanibaddhasaññī hutvāti piṇḍapātaṃ dente anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ anoloketvā patte ābhogasaññī hutvā.
tika-vin09t0:1993_0: Samasūpakanti pamāṇayuttaṃ sūpavantaṃ katvā, bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso cāyaṃ. Byañjanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1993_1: pana anādiyitvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ “samasūpako nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sabbāpi sūpeyyabyañjanavikatīti
tika-vin09t0:1996_0: Samatittikanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, samatittikaṃ katvāti attho. Evamaññesupi īdisesu
tika-vin09t0:1996_1: ṭhānesu attho daṭṭhabbo. Samapuṇṇanti pattassa antomukhavaṭṭilekhāsamapuṇṇaṃ. Samabharitanti
tika-vin09t0:1996_2: etthāpi eseva nayo. Tañca kho adhiṭṭhānupagapattasseva, netarassa. Tenāha “adhiṭṭhānupagapattassā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1996_3: Racitanti kataṃ, pakkhittaṃ pūritanti attho. Yaṃ kiñci yāvakālikanti yāgubhattaphalāphalādiṃ
tika-vin09t0:1996_4: yaṃ kiñci āmisajātikaṃ. Yattha katthacīti adhiṭṭhānupago vā hotu, anadhiṭṭhānupago
tika-vin09t0:1996_5: vā yattha katthaci patte. Thūpīkatānīti thūpaṃ viya katāni, adhiṭṭhānupagassa pattassa
tika-vin09t0:1996_6: antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṃ atikkamitvā katānīti attho. Idañca “yāmakālikādīnī”ti imassa
tika-vin09t0:1996_7: vasena vuttaṃ, “yāvakālika”nti imassa pana vasena vacanabyattayaṃ katvā “thūpīkatampi
tika-vin09t0:1996_8: vaṭṭatī”ti yojetabbaṃ. Pi-saddena athūpīkatāni vaṭṭantīti ettha kathāva natthīti
tika-vin09t0:1996_9: dasseti. Heṭṭhā orohatīti samantā okāsasabbhāvato cāliyamānaṃ heṭṭhā bhassati. Takkolavaṭaṃsakādayoti
tika-vin09t0:1996_10: ettha matthake ṭhapitatakkolameva vaṭaṃsakasadisattā takkolavaṭaṃsakaṃ. Ādisaddena
tika-vin09t0:1996_11: pupphavaṭaṃsakakaṭukaphalādivaṭaṃsakānaṃ gahaṇaṃ, na taṃ thūpīkataṃ nāma hoti pāṭekkaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1999_0: Sapadānanti ettha dānaṃ vuccati avakhaṇḍanaṃ, apetaṃ dānato apadānaṃ, anavakhaṇḍanti
tika-vin09t0:1999_1: attho, saha apadānena sapadānaṃ, avakhaṇḍanavirahitaṃ, anupaṭipāṭiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:2002: Māghātasamayādīsūti ettha yasmiṃ samaye “pāṇo na hantabbo”ti rājāno bheriṃ carāpenti, ayaṃ māghātasamayo nāma. Byañjanaṃ paṭicchādetvā dentīti byañjanaṃ channaṃ katvā denti.
tika-vin09t0:2005_0: Ekādasameti sūpodanaviññattiyaṃ. Ettha pana yassa mukhe pakkhipitvā vippaṭisāre uppanne
tika-vin09t0:2005_1: puna uggiritukāmassāpi sace sahasā pavisati, ayaṃ asañcicca paribhuñjati nāma. Yo
tika-vin09t0:2005_2: pana viññattampi aviññattampi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ sahasā anupadhāretvā gahetvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin09t0:2008: Ujjhāyati etenāti ujjhānaṃ, cittaṃ, tasmiṃ saññā ujjhānasaññāti āha “ujjhānasaññī”tiādi. Olokentassāti paresaṃ pattaṃ olokentassa.
tika-vin09t0:2011_0: “Mayūraṇḍaṃ atimahanta”nti vacanato mayūraṇḍappamāṇopi kabaḷo na vaṭṭati. Keci pana
tika-vin09t0:2011_1: “mayūraṇḍato mahantova na vaṭṭati, na mayūraṇḍappamāṇo”tipi vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2011_2: Kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ atikhuddakanti etthāpi eseva nayo, gilānassa pana atikhuddakaṃ kabaḷaṃ karotopi anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:2014_0: Sakalaṃ hatthanti sakalā aṅguliyo. Hatthasaddo cettha tadekadesesu aṅgulīsu daṭṭhabbo
tika-vin09t0:2014_1: “hatthamuddā”tiādīsu viya. Evañca katvā sabbaggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Aññathā sakalaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2014_2: hatthaṃ mukhe pavesetumasakkuṇeyyattā sabbaggahaṇamasamatthitameva siyā. Samudāye
tika-vin09t0:2014_3: pavattassa ca vohārassa avayavepi pavattanato ekaṅgulimpi tato ekadesampi mukhe pakkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:2017: Tattake sati vaṭṭatīti tattake mukhamhi sati kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:2020_0: “Capu capū”ti evaṃ saddaṃ katvāti “capu capū”ti evaṃ anukaraṇasaddaṃ katvā. “Pañcavīsatimepi
tika-vin09t0:2020_1: eseva nayo”ti iminā “surusurukārakanti ‘surū surū’ti evaṃ saddaṃ katvā”ti imamatthamatidisati.
tika-vin09t0:2024_0: Yaṃ kiñci chattanti setacchattakilañjacchattapaṇṇacchattesu yaṃ kiñci chattaṃ. Yampi
tika-vin09t0:2024_1: tatthajātakadaṇḍakena kataṃ ekapaṇṇacchattaṃ hoti, tampi chattameva. Yattha katthaci
tika-vin09t0:2027_0: Sabbāpi dhanuvikatīti cāpakodaṇḍādibhedā sabbāpi dhanuvikati. Cāpoti majjhe vaṅkā
tika-vin09t0:2027_1: kājadaṇḍasadisā dhanuvikati. Kodaṇḍoti vaṭṭaladaṇḍā dhanuvikati. Paṭimukkanti pavesitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2027_2: laggitaṃ. Yāva na gaṇhātīti yāva hatthena na gaṇhāti, ayameva vā pāṭho. Tāva vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin09t0:2030: Kevalaṃ akkantassāti kevalaṃ pādukaṃ akkamitvā ṭhitassa. Paṭimukkassāti paṭimuñcitvā ṭhitassa. Tenāha “pavesetvā ṭhānavasenā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:2033_0: Yānagatassāti “yānaṃ nāma vayhaṃ, ratho, sakaṭaṃ, sandhamānikā, sivikā, pāṭaṅkī”ti
tika-vin09t0:2033_1: vuttaṃ yānaṃ upādāya antamaso hatthasaṅghāṭamhi gatassa. Tenāha “sacepi dvīhi janehī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:2033_2: Vayhādiketi ettha vayhanti upari maṇḍapasadisaṃ padaracchadanaṃ, sabbapāliguṇṭhimaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2033_3: vā chādetvā kataṃ sakaṭavisesaṃ “vayha”nti vadanti. Ādisaddena rathādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2036_1: ca sacittakaṃ. “Anādariyaṃ paṭiccā”ti vuttattā yasmā anādariyavaseneva āpajjitabbato
tika-vin09t0:2036_2: idaṃ sabbaṃ kevalaṃ akusalameva, tañca pakatiyā vajjaṃ, sañcicca vītikkamanañca domanassikasseva
tika-vin09t0:2036_3: hoti, tasmā “lokavajjaṃ akusalacittaṃ dukkhavedana”nti vuttaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:2042_0: Gaṇanaparicchedoti saṅkhyāparicchedo. Adhikarīyanti etthāti adhikaraṇāni. Ke adhikarīyanti?
tika-vin09t0:2042_1: Samathā. Kathaṃ adhikarīyanti? Samanavasena. Tasmā te tesaṃ samanavasena pavattantīti
tika-vin09t0:2042_2: āha “adhikaraṇāni samentī”tiādi. Uppannānaṃ uppannānanti uṭṭhitānaṃ uṭṭhitānaṃ. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin09t0:2042_3: adhikaraṇaṭṭhena ekavidhaṃ, tathāpi vatthuvasena nānā hotīti “adhikaraṇāna”nti bahuvacanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2042_4: kataṃ. Idāni tassa nānāttaṃ dassetvā vivarituṃ “vivādādhikaraṇa”ntiādimāha. Vivādoyeva
tika-vin09t0:2042_5: adhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Samathatthanti samanatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2043_1: sativepullappattassa khīṇāsavasseva dātabbo vinayo sativinayo. Sammūḷhassa gaggabhikkhusadisassa
tika-vin09t0:2043_2: ummattakassa dātabbo vinayo amūḷhavinayo. Paṭiññātena karaṇabhūtena karaṇaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2043_3: Atha vā paṭiññāte āpannabhāvādike karaṇaṃ kiriyā, “āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti parivāsadānādivasena
tika-vin09t0:2043_4: ca pavattaṃ vacīkammaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ. Yassā kiriyāya dhammavādino bahutarā, esā
tika-vin09t0:2043_5: yebhuyyasikā nāma. Yo pāpussannatāya pāpiyo, puggalo, tassa upavāḷabhikkhusadisassa
tika-vin09t0:2043_7: Yathā hi gūthaṃ vā muttaṃ vā ghaṭṭiyamānaṃ duggandhatāya bādhati, tiṇehi avattharitvā
tika-vin09t0:2043_8: suppaṭicchāditassa panassa gandho na bādhati, evameva yaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ mūlānumūlaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2043_9: gantvā vūpasamiyamānaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvattati, taṃ iminā kammena
tika-vin09t0:2043_10: vūpasantaṃ gūthaṃ viya tiṇavatthārakena paṭicchannaṃ suvūpasantaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2044_0: Tatrāti tesu sattasu adhikaraṇasamathesu. “Aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhī”ti lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2044_1: “yadi me byādhikā bhaveyyuṃ, dātabbamidamosadha”ntiādinā viya. Tasmā tesu aññatarena
tika-vin09t0:2044_2: vivadantā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantīti vuccati. Vivādoti vipaccanīkavādo. Upavadanāti
tika-vin09t0:2044_3: akkoso. Codanāti anuyogo. Dveti thullaccayadubbhāsitāpattiyo dve. Catunnaṃ kammānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2044_4: karaṇanti catunnaṃ kammānaṃ antare yassa kassaci kammassa karaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2045_0: Evaṃ adhikaraṇāni dassetvā idāni tesu idaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ettakehi samathehi sammatīti
tika-vin09t0:2045_1: dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmiṃ vihāre uppannaṃ, tasmiṃyeva vā sammatīti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:2045_2: Evaṃ sesesupi. Tattha yasmiṃ vihāre uppannanti “yasmiṃ vihāre mayhaṃ iminā patto
tika-vin09t0:2045_3: gahito, cīvaraṃ gahita”ntiādinā nayena pattacīvarādīnaṃ atthāya vivādādhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2045_4: uppannaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃyeva vā sammatīti tasmiṃ vihāreyeva āvāsikehi sannipatitvā “alaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:2045_5: āvuso”ti atthapaccatthike saññāpetvā pāḷimuttakavinicchayeneva vūpasamentehi sammati.
tika-vin09t0:2045_6: Sace pana taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ nevāsikā vūpasametuṃ na sakkonti, athañño vinayadharo āgantvā
tika-vin09t0:2045_7: “kiṃ, āvuso, imasmiṃ vihāre uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā ṭhitā”ti pucchati, tehi ca tasmiṃ
tika-vin09t0:2045_8: kāraṇe kathite taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ khandhakato ca parivārato ca suttena vinicchinitvā
tika-vin09t0:2046_0: Aññattha vūpasametuṃ gacchantānaṃ antarāmagge vā sammatīti “na mayaṃ etassa vinicchaye
tika-vin09t0:2046_1: tiṭṭhāma, nāyaṃ vinaye kusalo, amukasmiṃ nāma gāme vinayadharā therā vasanti, tattha
tika-vin09t0:2046_2: gantvā vinicchinissāmā”ti gacchantānaṃ antarāmagge vā kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2046_3: saññāpentehi, aññehi vā te bhikkhū nijjhāpentehi sammati. Na heva kho pana aññamaññasaññattiyā
tika-vin09t0:2046_4: vā sabhāgabhikkhunijjhāpanena vā vūpasantaṃ hoti, apica kho paṭipathaṃ āgacchanto
tika-vin09t0:2046_5: eko vinayadharo disvā “katthāvuso, gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “amukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ iminā
tika-vin09t0:2046_6: nāma karaṇenā”ti vutte “alaṃ, āvuso, kiṃ tattha gatenā”ti tattheva dhammena vinayena
tika-vin09t0:2046_7: taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameti. Evampi antarāmagge vūpasammati nāma.
tika-vin09t0:2047_0: Yattha gantvā saṅghassa niyyātitaṃ, tattha saṅghena vāti sace pana “alaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin09t0:2047_1: kiṃ tattha gatenā”ti vuccamānāpi “mayaṃ tattheva gantvā vinicchayaṃ pāpessāmā”ti
tika-vin09t0:2047_2: vinayadharassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā yattha gantvā sabhāgabhikkhusaṅghassa adhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2047_3: niyyātitaṃ, tattha saṅghena “alaṃ, āvuso, saṅghasannipātaṃ nāma garuka”nti tattheva
tika-vin09t0:2047_4: nisīditvā vinicchitaṃ sammati. Na heva kho pana sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ saññattiyā vūpasantaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2047_5: hoti, apica kho saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā ārocitaṃ saṅghamajjhe vinayadharā vūpasamenti.
tika-vin09t0:2047_6: Evampi tattha saṅghena vinicchitaṃ sammati nāma.
tika-vin09t0:2048_0: Ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitanti apaloketvā vā khandhake vuttāya vā ñattidutiyakammavācāya
tika-vin09t0:2048_1: sammatehi puggalehi visuṃ vā nisīditvā, tassāyeva vā parisāya “aññena na kiñci kathetabba”nti
tika-vin09t0:2048_2: sāvetvā vinicchitaṃ. Ayanti ayaṃ yathāvuttā catubbidhā sammukhatā.
tika-vin09t0:2049_1: sammukhībhāvoti “yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā, te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando
tika-vin09t0:2049_2: āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosantī”ti evaṃ vuttasaṅghasāmaggivasena sammukhībhāvo,
tika-vin09t0:2049_3: etena yathā tathā padhānakārakapuggalānaṃ sammukhatāmattaṃ saṅghasammukhatā nāma
tika-vin09t0:2049_4: na hotīti dasseti. Bhūtatāti tacchatā. Saccapariyāyo hi idha dhammasaddo “dhammavādī”tiādīsu
tika-vin09t0:2049_5: viya. Vineti etenāti vinayo, tassa tassa adhikaraṇassa vūpasamanāya bhagavatā vuttavidhi,
tika-vin09t0:2049_6: tassa vinayassa sammukhatā vinayasammukhatā. Tenāha “yathā taṃ…pe… vinayasammukhatā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:2049_7: Yenāti yena puggalena. Atthapaccatthikānanti vivādavatthusaṅkhāte atthe paccatthikānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2050_0: Nanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ. Pañcaṅgasamannāgatanti “na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ
tika-vin09t0:2050_1: gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ gacchati, na bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, gahitāgahitaṃ jānātī”ti
tika-vin09t0:2050_2: vuttehi pañcahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ. Gūḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu tīsu salākaggāhesūti
tika-vin09t0:2050_3: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saññattiyā tayo salākaggāhake gūḷhakaṃ, vivaṭakaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:2050_4: sakaṇṇajappaka”nti samathakkhandhake vuttesu tīsu salākaggāhesu. Salākaṃ gāhetvāti
tika-vin09t0:2050_5: dhammavādīnañca adhammavādīnañca salākāyo nimittasaññaṃ āropetvā cīvarabhoge katvā
tika-vin09t0:2050_6: samathakkhandhake vuttanayena gāhāpetvā. Evañhi tattha vuttaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:2051_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, gūḷhako salākaggāho hoti? Tena salākaggāhāpakena bhikkhunā
tika-vin09t0:2051_1: salākāyo vaṇṇāvaṇṇāyo katvā ekameko bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo ‘ayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2051_2: evaṃvādissa salākā, ayaṃ evaṃvādissa salākā, yaṃ icchasi, taṃ gaṇhāhī’ti. Gahite
tika-vin09t0:2051_3: vattabbo ‘mā ca kassaci dassehī’ti. Sace jānāti ‘adhammavādī bahutarā’ti, ‘duggaho’ti
tika-vin09t0:2051_5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, gūḷhako salākaggāho hoti.
tika-vin09t0:2052: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, vivaṭako salākaggāho hoti? Sace jānāti ‘dhammavādī bahutarā’ti, vissaṭṭheneva vivaṭena gāhetabbo. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, vivaṭako salākaggāho hoti.
tika-vin09t0:2053_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, sakaṇṇajappako salākaggāho hoti? Tena salākaggāhāpakena bhikkhunā
tika-vin09t0:2053_1: ekamekassa bhikkhuno upakaṇṇake ārocetabbaṃ ‘ayaṃ evaṃvādissa salākā, ayaṃ evavādissa
tika-vin09t0:2053_2: salākā, yaṃ icchasi, taṃ gaṇhāhī’ti. Gahite vattabbo ‘mā ca kassaci ārocehī’ti. Sace
tika-vin09t0:2053_4: bahutarā’ti, ‘suggaho’ti sāvetabbaṃ. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sakaṇṇajappako salākaggāho hotī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:2054_0: Ettha ca alajjussannāya parisāya gūḷhako salākaggāho kātabbo, lajjussannāya vivaṭako,
tika-vin09t0:2054_1: bālussannāya sakaṇṇajappakoti veditabbo. Dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāyāti dhammavādīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2054_2: ekenapi adhikatāya, ko pana vādo dvīhi tīhi.
tika-vin09t0:2055_0: “Catūhi samathehi sammatī”ti idaṃ sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttaṃ, tattha pana dvīhi
tika-vin09t0:2055_1: eva vūpasamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ vinicchitanti sace āpatti natthi, ubho khamāpetvā,
tika-vin09t0:2055_2: atha atthi, āpattiṃ dassetvā ropanavasena vinicchitaṃ. Paṭikammaṃ pana āpattādhikaraṇasamathe
tika-vin09t0:2055_3: parato āgamissatīti. Na samaṇasāruppaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ, samaṇehi akattabbaṃ, tasmiṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2056_0: Pārājikasāmantena vāti dukkaṭena vā thullaccayena vā. Methunadhamme hi pārājikasāmantā
tika-vin09t0:2056_1: nāma dukkaṭaṃ hoti, adinnādānādīsu thullaccayaṃ. Paṭicaratoti paṭicchādentassa. Acchinnamūlo
tika-vin09t0:2056_2: bhavissatīti pārājikaṃ anāpanno bhavissati, sīlavā bhavissatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sammā
tika-vin09t0:2056_3: vattitvāti vattaṃ pūretvā. Osāraṇaṃ labhissatīti kammappaṭippassaddhiṃ labhissati.
tika-vin09t0:2057: Tassāti āpattādhikaraṇassa. Sammukhāvinayeneva vūpasamo natthi paṭiññāya, tathārūpāya khantiyā vā vinā avūpasamanato. Yā pana paṭiññāti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:2058_0: Etthāti āpattidesanāyaṃ. Siyāti avassaṃ. Kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāyāti kakkhaḷabhāvāya
tika-vin09t0:2058_1: ceva vāḷabhāvāya ca. Thullavajjanti pārājikañceva saṅghādisesañca. Gihippaṭisaṃyuttanti
tika-vin09t0:2059_0: Yathānurūpanti “dvīhi samathehi, tīhi, catūhi, ekenā”ti evaṃ vuttanayeneva yathānurūpaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2059_1: Etthāti imasmiṃ samathādhikāre. Vinicchayanayoti vinicchayanayamattaṃ. Tenāha “vitthāro
tika-vin09t0:2059_2: panā”tiādi. Assāti vitthārassa. Samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttoti samantapāsādikāya nāma
tika-vin09t0:2059_3: vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto. Tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabboti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:2068: Nātho bhikkhunīnaṃ hitatthāya yaṃ pātimokkhaṃ pakāsayīti sambandho. Tattha pakāsayīti desayi, paññāpayīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:2071_0: Abhilāpamattanti vacanamattaṃ, na atthoti adhippāyo. Liṅgabhedamattanti purisaliṅgaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2071_1: itthiliṅganti visesamattaṃ. Visesoti nānāttaṃ. Chandena cevāti pemena ceva, sinehena
tika-vin09t0:2071_2: cevāti attho. Ruciyā cāti icchāya ca. Padhaṃsitāyāti dūsitāya. Paripuṇṇā upasampadā
tika-vin09t0:2071_3: yassā sā paripuṇṇūpasampadā, ubhatosaṅghena upasampannāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:2075: Ubbhakapparanti dutiyamahāsandhito uddhaṃ. Ito cito ca sañcaraṇanti hatthassa vā kāyassa vā tiriyaṃ ito cito ca sañcaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2076_0: Ekatoavassuteti bhikkhuniyā avassave, bhikkhuniyā kāyasaṃsaggarāgena avassutabhāve
tika-vin09t0:2076_1: satīti attho. Bhikkhuniyā vaseneva ca ekatoavassutabhāvo gahetabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:2077: “Ekatoavassuteti ettha kiñcāpi ‘ekato’ti avisesena vuttaṃ, tathāpi bhikkhuniyā eva avassute sati ayaṃ āpattibhedo vuttoti veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin09t0:2078_0: Purisassa kāyanti purisassa yaṃ kañci kāyaṃ. Ubhatoavassutepīti bhikkhuniyā ceva
tika-vin09t0:2078_1: purisassa ca kāyasaṃsaggarāgena avassutabhāve satipi. Kāyenāti yathāparicchinnena
tika-vin09t0:2078_2: attano kāyena. Kāyappaṭibaddhanti purisassa kāyappaṭibaddhaṃ. Avasesakāyena vāti
tika-vin09t0:2078_4: kāyenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tassa kāyanti avassutassa tassa purisassa yaṃ kañci kāyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2078_5: Yathā cettha sayaṃ āmasantiyā thullaccayaṃ, evaṃ tassa āmasanaṃ sādiyantiyāpīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2078_6: Purisassa kāyasaṃsaggarāgo natthīti purisassa methunarāgo, gehasitapemaṃ, suddhacittaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2078_7: vā. Avaseseti pārājikakhettato avasese. Kāyappaṭibaddhena kāyappaṭibaddhādibhedeti
tika-vin09t0:2078_9: “Asañciccā”tiādīsu virajjhitvā vā āmasantiyā, aññavihitāya vā, “ayaṃ puriso”ti vā
tika-vin09t0:2078_10: “itthī”ti vā ajānantiyā vā, tena phuṭṭhāyapi taṃ phassaṃ assādayantiyā vā āmasanepi sati anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:2081_0: Pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannanti bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇānaṃ catunnaṃ, asādhāraṇānaṃ catunnañcāti
tika-vin09t0:2081_1: aṭṭhannamaññataraṃ ajjhāpannaṃ. Idañca pārājikaṃ pacchā paññattaṃ, saṅgītikārakācariyehi
tika-vin09t0:2081_2: pana purimena saddhiṃ yugaḷaṃ katvā imasmiṃ okāse ṭhapitanti veditabbaṃ. “Aṭṭhannaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2081_3: pārājikānaṃ aññatara”nti vacanato pana vajjappaṭicchādikaṃ yā paṭicchādeti, sāpi
tika-vin09t0:2081_4: vajjappaṭicchādikā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi vajjappaṭicchādanaṃ pemavasena hoti,
tika-vin09t0:2081_5: tathāpi sikkhāpadavītikkamacittaṃ domanassameva hotīti katvā dukkhavedanaṃ hotīti
tika-vin09t0:2084_0: Satthusāsanenāti ñattisampadāya ceva anussāvanasampadāya ca. Idha pana codanāsāraṇāpubbakameva
tika-vin09t0:2084_2: anussāvanāvacanañca. Anādaranti puggale ceva dhamme ca ādaravirahitaṃ. Tenāha “yenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:2084_3: Tattha pariyāpannagaṇe vāti tasmiṃ saṅghe pariyāpanne sambahulapuggalasaṅkhāte gaṇe
tika-vin09t0:2084_4: vā. “Sammāvattanāya avattamānanti attho”ti iminā adhippāyattho vutto. Ekakammādiketi
tika-vin09t0:2084_5: ekakammaekuddesasamasikkhātāya. Saha ayanabhāvenāti saha vattanabhāvena. Samāno saṃvāso
tika-vin09t0:2085_0: Idāni yena saṃvāsena te “samānasaṃvāsakā”ti vuttā, so saṃvāso tassa ukkhittakassa
tika-vin09t0:2085_1: tehi saddhiṃ natthi, yehi ca saddhiṃ tassa so saṃvāso natthi, na tena te bhikkhū
tika-vin09t0:2085_2: attano sahāyā katā honti, tasmā so akatasahāyo nāmāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “yassa
tika-vin09t0:2085_3: panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ padavaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni atthamattaṃ dassetuṃ “samānasaṃvāsakabhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2085_4: anupagatanti attho”ti vuttaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ anuvattananti kassaci āsaṅkā siyāti taṃ sarūpato
tika-vin09t0:2085_5: dassento “yaṃdiṭṭhiko so hotī”tiādimāha. Tattha soti yo ukkhittako, so.
tika-vin09t0:2088_1: tanti āha “kāyasaṃsaggarāgenā”ti. Kāyasaṃsaggarāgeneva tintā idha avassutā nāma,
tika-vin09t0:2088_2: na methunarāgenāti. Kathametaṃ viññāyatīti āha “ayameva hī”tiādi. Kiṃ panettha kāraṇanti
tika-vin09t0:2088_3: āha “samantapāsādikāyaṃ panassa vicāraṇā katā”ti. Tatthāyaṃ vicāraṇā – ettha ca asaddhammoti
tika-vin09t0:2088_4: kāyasaṃsaggova veditabbo, na methunadhammo. Na hi methunassa sāmantā thullaccayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2088_5: hoti. “Viññū paṭibalo kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjitu”nti vacanampi cettha sādhakanti.
tika-vin09t0:2088_6: Yaṃ yena kataṃ, taṃ tasseva hotīti. Purisapuggalassāti sāmivacananti dassetuṃ “yaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2088_7: purisapuggalenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha hatthoti attano hattho. Na kevalañcettha hatthaggahaṇanti
tika-vin09t0:2088_8: “hattho nāma kapparaṃ upādāya yāva agganakhā”ti vuttassa hatthasseva gahaṇaṃ, atha
tika-vin09t0:2088_9: kho tassa ca aññassapi apārājikakhettassa gahaṇaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā “hatthaggahaṇa”nti
tika-vin09t0:2088_10: vuttaṃ. Tathā saṅghāṭikaṇṇaggahaṇanti na kevalaṃ saṅghāṭikaṇṇasseva gahaṇaṃ, atha
tika-vin09t0:2088_11: kho tassa ca aññassapi yassa kassaci cīvarappadesassa gahaṇaṃ vuttanti dassetuṃ “ettha
tika-vin09t0:2088_12: ca yassa kassacī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Itthannāmaṃ ṭhānanti evaṃnāmakaṃ ṭhānaṃ. “Paṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin09t0:2088_13: vā uppaṭipāṭiyā vā pūretvā”ti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ. Tasmā paṭipāṭiyā vā uppaṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin09t0:2088_14: vā ekantarikāya vā yena tena nayena pūretvāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:2089_0: Tā āpattiyoti tā āpannā āpattiyo. Yathā cekekasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ sattasu
tika-vin09t0:2089_1: vatthūsu satakkhattumpi vītikkantesu tā āpattiyo desetvā muccati. Gaṇanūpikāti desitagaṇanaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2089_2: upagacchati. Dhuranikkhepaṃ katvāti “aññaṃ vatthuṃ āpajjissāmī”ti ussāhaṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin09t0:2096_0: Mānussayavasena kodhūssayavasenāti bāhullanayena vuttaṃ. Teneva vakkhati “ticittaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2096_1: tivedana”nti. Aḍḍakaraṇatthāyāti ettha aḍḍoti vohārikavinicchayo vuccati. Yaṃ pabbajitā
tika-vin09t0:2096_2: “adhikaraṇa”ntipi vadanti, tassa karaṇatthāya vohārikavinicchayatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:2096_3: Vītikkamakkhaṇeyevāti vatthujjhācārakkhaṇeyeva, na tatiyāya samanubhāsanāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:2096_4: Bhikkhuniṃ saṅghato nissāretīti āpannaṃ bhikkhuniṃ bhikkhunisaṅghamhā nissāreti.
tika-vin09t0:2097_0: Yattha ṭhitāyāti upassayabhikkhācāramaggādīsu yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitāya. Tato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:2097_1: gacchantiyāti tato paṭṭhāya vohārikānaṃ santikaṃ gacchantiyā. Dutiyeti dutiyārocane.
tika-vin09t0:2097_2: Tenāti upāsakena. Evaṃ vuttāyāti “mama ca tava ca kathaṃ tvaṃyeva ārocehī”ti vuttāya.
tika-vin09t0:2097_3: Aññena kathāpetīti kappiyakārakena kathāpeti. Yathā vā tathā vā hi ārociyamāneti
tika-vin09t0:2097_4: kappiyakārako vā bhikkhuniyā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ ārocetu, itaro vā attano kathaṃ. Kappiyakārako
tika-vin09t0:2097_5: vā ubhinnampi kathaṃ, itaro vā ubhinnampi kathaṃ ārocetūti evaṃ yathā tathā ārociyamāne.
tika-vin09t0:2097_6: Ubhinnampi pana kathaṃ sutvāti yathā tathā vā ārocitaṃ pana ubhinnampi kathaṃ sutvā.
tika-vin09t0:2098_0: Ākaḍḍhiyamānā gacchatīti vuccamānā vohārikānaṃ santikaṃ gacchati, imassa “tassā anāpattī”ti
tika-vin09t0:2098_1: iminā sambandho. Evaṃ sesesupi. Rakkhaṃ yācatīti dhammikaṃ rakkhaṃ yācati. Idāni
tika-vin09t0:2098_2: yathā yācitā rakkhā dhammikā hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “upassaye aññehi kataṃ anācāraṃ anodissa
tika-vin09t0:2098_3: ācikkhantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha atītaṃ ārabbha atthi odissa ācikkhanā, atthi anodissa
tika-vin09t0:2098_4: ācikkhanā, anāgataṃ ārabbhāpi atthi odissa ācikkhanā, atthi anodissa ācikkhanā.
tika-vin09t0:2099_0: Kathaṃ atītaṃ ārabbha odissa ācikkhanā hoti? Bhikkhunupassaye gāmadārakā, dhuttādayo
tika-vin09t0:2099_1: vā ye keci anācāraṃ vā ācaranti, rukkhaṃ vā chindanti, phalāphalaṃ vā haranti, parikkhāre
tika-vin09t0:2099_2: vā acchindanti. Bhikkhunī vohārike upasaṅkamitvā “amhākaṃ upassaye idaṃ nāma kata”nti
tika-vin09t0:2099_3: vadati. “Kenā”ti vutte “asukena ca asukena cā”ti ācikkhati. Evaṃ atītaṃ ārabbha odissa
tika-vin09t0:2099_4: ācikkhanā hoti, sā na vaṭṭati. Tañce sutvā te vohārikā tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti, sabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2099_5: bhikkhuniyā gīvā hoti. “Daṇḍaṃ gaṇhissantī”ti adhippāyepi sati gīvāyeva hoti. Sace
tika-vin09t0:2099_6: pana tassa “daṇḍaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, pañcamāsakamatte gahite pārājikaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:2100_0: Tehi “kenā”ti vutte pana “asukenā’ti vattuṃ amhākaṃ na vaṭṭati, tumheyeva jānissatha.
tika-vin09t0:2100_1: Kevalañhi mayaṃ rakkhaṃ yācāma, taṃ no detha, avahaṭabhaṇḍampi āharāpethā”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2100_2: Evaṃ anodissa ācikkhanā hoti, sā vaṭṭati. Evaṃ vutte sacepi te vohārikā te kārake
tika-vin09t0:2100_3: gavesitvā tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti, sabbaṃ sāpateyyampi gahitaṃ, bhikkhuniyā neva gīvā, na āpatti.
tika-vin09t0:2101_0: Parikkhāraṃ harante disvā tesaṃ anatthakāmatāya “coro coro”ti vattumpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:2101_1: Evaṃ vuttepi hi yaṃ tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti, sabbaṃ bhikkhuniyā gīvā hoti. Attano vacanakaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:2101_2: pana “iminā me parikkhāro gahito, taṃ āharāpehi, mā cassa daṇḍaṃ karothā”ti vattuṃ
tika-vin09t0:2101_3: vaṭṭati. Dāsadāsivāpiādīnaṃ atthāya aḍḍaṃ karonti, ayaṃ akappiyaaḍḍo nāma, na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:2102_0: Kathaṃ anāgataṃ ārabbha odissa ācikkhanā hoti? Vuttanayeneva parehi anācārādīsu katesu
tika-vin09t0:2102_1: bhikkhunī vohārike evaṃ vadati “amhākaṃ upassaye idañcidañca karonti, rakkhaṃ no
tika-vin09t0:2102_2: detha āyatiṃ akaraṇatthāyā”ti. “Kena evaṃ kata”nti vutte “asukena ca asukena cā”ti
tika-vin09t0:2102_3: ācikkhati. Evaṃ anāgataṃ ārabbha odissa ācikkhanā hoti, sāpi na vaṭṭati. Tesañhi
tika-vin09t0:2102_4: daṇḍe kate purimanayeneva sabbaṃ bhikkhuniyā gīvā. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
tika-vin09t0:2103_0: Sace pana vohārikā bhikkhunupassaye evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ karontānaṃ “imaṃ nāma daṇḍaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2103_1: karomā”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā āṇāya atiṭṭhamāne pariyesitvā daṇḍaṃ karonti, bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin09t0:2104_0: Yo cāyaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vutto, bhikkhūnampi eseva nayo. Bhikkhunopi hi odissa ācikkhanā
tika-vin09t0:2104_1: na vaṭṭati, yaṃ tathā ācikkhite tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti, taṃ sabbaṃ gīvā hoti. Vuttanayeneva
tika-vin09t0:2104_2: daṇḍaṃ gaṇhāpentassa pārājikaṃ. Yo pana “daṇḍaṃ karissantī”ti jānantopi anodissa
tika-vin09t0:2104_3: katheti, te ca pariyesitvā daṇḍaṃ karontiyeva, na doso. Vihārasīmāya rukkhādīni chindantānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2104_4: vāsipharasuādīni gahetvā pāsāṇe koṭṭenti, na vaṭṭati. Sace dhārā bhijjati, kārāpetvā
tika-vin09t0:2104_5: dātabbā. Upadhāvitvā tesaṃ parikkhāre gaṇhanti, tampi na kātabbaṃ. Lahuparivattañhi
tika-vin09t0:2107_0: Mallagaṇabhaṭiputtagaṇādikantiādīsu mallagaṇo nāma nārāyanabhattiko tattha tattha
tika-vin09t0:2107_2: Dhammagaṇoti sāsanabhattiko anekappakārapuññakammakārako gaṇo. Gandhikaseṇīti anekappakārasugandhivikatikārako
tika-vin09t0:2108_0: Vuṭṭhāpentiyāti upasampādentiyā. Kenaci karaṇīyena pakkantāsu bhikkhunīsu agantvā
tika-vin09t0:2108_1: khaṇḍasīmaṃ yathānisinnaṭṭhāneyeva attano nissitakaparisāya saddhiṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā
tika-vin09t0:2108_2: vācācittato samuṭṭhāti, aññaṃ sīmaṃ vā nadiṃ vā gantvā vuṭṭhāpentiyā kāyavācācittato
tika-vin09t0:2108_4: Paññattiṃ ajānantā ariyāpi vuṭṭhāpentīti vā kammavācāpariyosāne āpattikkhaṇe vipākābyākatasamaṅgitāvasena vā ticittaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2111_0: Añño gāmo gāmantaraṃ. Nadipāranti nadiyā pārimatīraṃ. “Gāmantaraṃ gaccheyyā”ti vuttattā
tika-vin09t0:2111_1: aññasmiṃ gāmeyeva āpatti, na sakagāmeti āha “sakagāmato tāvā”tiādi. Parikkhepe vā
tika-vin09t0:2111_2: upacāre vā atikkanteti parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepe vā aparikkhittassa gāmassa
tika-vin09t0:2111_3: parikkhepārahaṭṭhāne vā atikkante. Dutiyena atikkantamatteti dutiyena pādena itarassa
tika-vin09t0:2111_4: gāmassa parikkhepe vā upacāre vā atikkantamatte. Yesu pana potthakesu “ekena pādena
tika-vin09t0:2111_5: itarassa gāmassa parikkhepe vā atikkante, upacāre vā okkante thullaccayaṃ, dutiyena
tika-vin09t0:2111_6: atikkantamatte, okkantamatte vā saṅghādiseso”ti pāṭho dissati, tattha “okkante, okkantamatte
tika-vin09t0:2111_7: vā”ti etāni dve padāni pāḷiyā virujjhanti. “Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkāmentiyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:2111_8: hi pāḷi. Tathā samantapāsādikāyapi virujjhanti. Tattha hi –
tika-vin09t0:2112_0: “Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ ekena pādena atikkamati, thullaccayaṃ. Dutiyena atikkantamatte
tika-vin09t0:2112_1: saṅghādiseso. Apicettha sakagāmato…pe… ekena pādena itarassa gāmassa parikkhepe vā
tika-vin09t0:2112_2: upacārevā atikkantamatte thullaccayaṃ, dutiyena atikkantamatte saṅghādiseso”ti –
tika-vin09t0:2113_0: Vuttaṃ. “Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentiyā”tiādivacanato padasā gamanameva idhādhippetanti
tika-vin09t0:2113_1: āha “padasā pavisantiyā āpattī”ti. Iminā sacepi hatthipiṭṭhiādīhi vā iddhiyā vā pavisati,
tika-vin09t0:2113_2: vaṭṭatiyevāti dasseti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāya vuttoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:2114_0: Nadipāragamane vuttalakkhaṇāya nadiyāti “nadī nāma timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā yattha
tika-vin09t0:2114_1: katthaci uttarantiyā antaravāsako temiyatī”ti nadipāragamanavibhaṅge vuttalakkhaṇāya
tika-vin09t0:2114_2: nadiyā. Nadipāragamanavibhaṅgo hi idha nadipāragamanasaddena vutto. Puna orimatīrameva
tika-vin09t0:2114_3: paccuttarantiyā vāti paratīraṃ gantukāmatāya otiṇṇattā vuttaṃ. Itarissā pana ayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2114_4: pakkantaṭṭhāne ṭhitā hoti, tasmā paratīraṃ gacchantiyā anāpatti. Sace sajjhāyaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:2114_5: padhānaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci kammaṃ kurumānā “pure aruṇeyeva dutiyikāya santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:2114_6: ābhogaṃ karoti, ajānantiyā eva tassā aruṇo uggacchati, anāpattīti āha “pure aruṇeyevā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:2114_7: Atha pana “yāva aruṇuggamanā idheva bhavissāmī”ti vā anābhogena vā vihārassa ekadese
tika-vin09t0:2114_8: acchati, dutiyikāya hatthapāsaṃ na otarati, aruṇuggamane saṅghādiseso. Hatthapāsoyeva
tika-vin09t0:2114_9: hi idha pamāṇaṃ. Hatthapāsātikkame ekagabbhopi na rakkhati. Tenāha “ekagabbhe…pe… āpattī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:2115_0: Dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ vāti ettha dassanūpacāro nāma yattha ṭhitaṃ dutiyikā
tika-vin09t0:2115_1: passati. Savanūpacāro nāma yattha ṭhitā maggamūḷhasaddena viya, dhammassavanārocanasaddena
tika-vin09t0:2115_2: viya ca “ayye”ti saddāyantiyā saddaṃ suṇāti. Tasmāti yasmā ohīyanaṃ nāma dassanūpacārasavanūpacārānamaññatarassa
tika-vin09t0:2115_3: vijahanaṃ, tasmā. Antogāme pana ohīyanaṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “indakhīlātikkamato paṭṭhāyā”ti
tika-vin09t0:2115_4: ādi. Tattha indakhīlātikkamatoti ummārātikkamato. Bahigāmeti gāmassa bahipadese.
tika-vin09t0:2115_5: Maggamūḷhā uccāsaddaṃ karontīti āha “maggamūḷhasaddena viyā”ti. Maggamūḷhaṃ avhāyantassa
tika-vin09t0:2115_6: saddena viyātipi vadanti. Saddāyantiyāti saddaṃ karontiyā. “Saddassavanātikkame āpattiyevā”ti
tika-vin09t0:2115_7: iminā dassanūpacāro evarūpe savanūpacāre vijahite na rakkhati, jahitamatteva āpatti
tika-vin09t0:2116_0: Maggaṃ gacchantīti ekamaggaṃ gacchanti. Sace purimāyo aññena maggena gacchanti, pakkantā
tika-vin09t0:2116_1: nāma honti, anāpattiyeva. Dvinnaṃ gacchantīnaṃ ekā anubandhituṃ asakkontī “gacchatu
tika-vin09t0:2116_2: aya”nti ohīyati, itarāpi “ohīyatu aya”nti gacchati, dvinnampi āpatti. Sace pana gacchantīsu
tika-vin09t0:2116_3: purimāpi aññaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhāti, pacchimāpi aññaṃ, ekā ekissā pakkantaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, dvinnampi anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:2117_0: “Saṅghādisesā caturo”ti ayaṃ pañho aruṇuggamane gāmantarapariyāpannaṃ nadipāraṃ okkantabhikkhuniṃ
tika-vin09t0:2117_1: sandhāya vutto. Sā hi sakagāmato paccūsasamaye nikkhamitvā aruṇuggamanakāle vuttappakāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:2118: Pakkhasaṅkantāya vāti titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantāya. Anantarāyenāti hatthimocanādiantarāyaṃ vinā.
tika-vin09t0:2121: Tasseva kārakasaṅghassāti yo ukkhepanīyakammakārako gaṇo, tasseva kārakasaṅghassa. Vatte vā vattantinti tecattālīsappabhede netthāravatte vattamānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2124_0: Ekatoavassuteti puggalassa vā bhikkhuniyā vā avassute. Mahāpaccariyaṃ panettha “bhikkhuniyā
tika-vin09t0:2124_1: avassutabhāveti daṭṭhabba”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ “anavassutoti jānantī paṭiggaṇhātī”ti imāya
tika-vin09t0:2124_2: pāḷiyā na sameti. Yadi hi puggalassa avassutabhāvo nappamāṇaṃ, kiṃ “anavassutoti
tika-vin09t0:2124_3: jānantī”ti iminā vacanena, “anāpatti ubhatoanavassutā honti, anavassutā paṭiggaṇhātī”ti
tika-vin09t0:2124_4: ettakameva vattabbaṃ siyā. Ubhosu anavassutesūti puggalo ceva bhikkhunī cāti ubhosu
tika-vin09t0:2124_5: anavassutesu gaṇhantiyā sabbathāpi anāpatti. “Anavassuto”ti vā ñatvā gaṇhantiyāti
tika-vin09t0:2124_6: sayaṃ anavassutā samānā avassutepi “anavassuto aya”nti saññāya tassa hatthato paṭiggaṇhantiyā.
tika-vin09t0:2124_7: Atha sayaṃ anavassutāpi aññaṃ avassutaṃ vā anavassutaṃ vā “avassuto”ti ñatvā paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:2124_8: dukkaṭameva. Vuttañhetaṃ anantarasikkhāpade “kissa tvaṃ, ayye, na paṭiggaṇhāsīti,
tika-vin09t0:2124_9: avassutā, ayyeti, tvaṃ pana, ayye, avassutāti, nāhaṃ, ayye, avassutā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:2127: Dukkaṭādikā saṅghādisesapariyosānā āpattiyo iminā sikkhāpadena uyyojikāyeva, itarissā pana āpattibhedo paṭhamasikkhāpadenāti āha “sā evaṃ uyyojanenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:2134_0: Bhikkhunī saṅghaṃ na bhindatīti kammaṃ, uddeso cāti dvīhi bhedo, so tāya saddhiṃ
tika-vin09t0:2134_1: natthīti bhikkhunī saṅghaṃ na bhindati. Na kevalaṃ parivāsābhāvoyevāti āha “chādanapaccayāpī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:2134_2: Ettha ca “chādanapaccayāpi na dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatī”ti pāṭho daṭṭhabbo, chādanapaccayāpi
tika-vin09t0:2134_3: dukkaṭaṃ na āpajjatīti attho. Evañca katvā –
tika-vin09t0:2137: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjaṃ;
tika-vin09t0:2139_0: Ettha bhikkhuninisedho upapanno hoti. Yesu pana potthakesu “chādanapaccayā pana dukkaṭaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2139_1: āpajjatī”ti vinā na-kāraṃ pāṭho dissati, so pamādalekhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā
tika-vin09t0:2139_2: parivāso nāma natthi, tasmā. Attano sīmaṃ sodhetvā vihārasīmāya vāti vihāre baddhasīmameva
tika-vin09t0:2139_3: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sodhetuṃ asakkontīhīti vihārasīmaṃ sodhetuṃ asakkontīhi.
tika-vin09t0:2140_0: Mukhamattanidassananti pavesopāyamattanidassanaṃ. Etthāha – atha kasmā yathā bhikkhumānattakathāya
tika-vin09t0:2140_2: dve leḍḍupāte atikkammā”ti vuttaṃ, evamavatvā “gāmūpacārato ca bhikkhūnaṃ vihārūpacārato
tika-vin09t0:2140_3: ca dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā”ti idha vuttanti? Tatra ceke vadanti “bhikkhūnaṃ vuttappakāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:2140_4: padesaṃ atikkamitvā gāmepi taṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, bhikkhunīnaṃ pana gāme na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:2140_5: tasmā evaṃ vutta”nti. Apare pana bhaṇanti “bhikkhūnampi gāme na vaṭṭati, bhikkhuvihāro
tika-vin09t0:2140_6: nāma pubbeyeva gāmūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā tiṭṭhati, tasmā gāmaṃ avatvā vihārūpacārameva
tika-vin09t0:2140_7: heṭṭhā vuttaṃ. Bhikkhunīnaṃ pana vihāro gāmeyeva, na bahi, tasmā gāmūpacārañca vihārūpacārañca
tika-vin09t0:2140_8: ubhayamevettha dassitaṃ. Tasmā ubhayatthāpi atthato nānātthaṃ natthī”ti. Vīmaṃsitvā
tika-vin09t0:2152_0: Yaṃ attanā laddhaṃ, taṃ nissaggiyaṃ hotīti yaṃ cīvaraṃ bhājāpitāya attanā laddhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:2152_1: tameva nissaggiyaṃ hoti, taṃ vinayakammaṃ katvāpi attanā na labbhati. Tenāha “nissaṭṭha”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:2152_2: Tattha nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvāpīti “ayyāya, dammī”ti evaṃ nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvāpi.
tika-vin09t0:2152_3: Yathādāneyeva upanetabbanti yathā dāyakehi dinnaṃ, tatheva upanetabbaṃ, akālacīvarapakkheyeva
tika-vin09t0:2155: Metanti me etaṃ. Sakasaññāya gahitattā pācittiyañceva dukkaṭañca vuttaṃ, itarathā bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2159_0: Tasmiṃ appahonte puna taññevāti yaṃ paṭhamaṃ viññattaṃ, thokattā tasmiṃ appahonte
tika-vin09t0:2159_1: puna taññeva viññāpentiyāti attho. Aññenapi atthe satī ti paṭhamaṃ viññattito aññenapi
tika-vin09t0:2159_2: atthe sati. Tena saddhiṃ aññañcāti yaṃ paṭhamaṃ viññattaṃ, tena saddhiṃ aññañca.
tika-vin09t0:2159_3: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Sace paṭhamaṃ sappi viññattaṃ, “yamakaṃ pacitabba”nti ca vejjena
tika-vin09t0:2159_4: vuttattā telenāpi attho hoti. Tato “telenāpi me attho”ti evamādinā aññañca viññāpentiyāti
tika-vin09t0:2159_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvāti “sace kahāpaṇassa sappi ābhataṃ hoti, iminā mūlena
tika-vin09t0:2159_6: dviguṇaṃ telaṃ labbhati, telenāpi ca idaṃ kiccaṃ nippajjati, tasmā telaṃ āharā”ti
tika-vin09t0:2162: Tato aññaṃ cetāpeyyāti paṭhamaṃ cetāpitato yaṃ kiñci aññaṃ cetāpeyya.
tika-vin09t0:2165: Aññassatthāya dinnenāti yaṃ cetāpeti, tato aññassatthāya dinnena. Aññuddisikenāti purimassevatthadīpanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2166_0: Sesakaṃ upanentiyāti yadatthāya dinno, taṃ cetāpetvā avasesaṃ aññassatthāya upanentiyā.
tika-vin09t0:2166_1: Sāmike apaloketvāti dāyake āpucchitvā. Evarūpāsū āpadāsu upanentīnanti evarūpesu
tika-vin09t0:2166_2: upaddavesu aññassa yassa kassaci atthāya upanentīnaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2169_0: Na kevalaṃ teneva parikkhārenāti āha “sayaṃ yācitakenāpī”ti. Vuttañhetaṃ pāḷiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2169_1: “bhikkhuniyo tena ca parikkhārena sayampi yācitvā bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā paribhuñjiṃsū”ti.
tika-vin09t0:2169_2: Mātikāyaṃ pana gamyamānattā pi-saddo nappayutto. Gamyamānatthassa hi saddassa payogaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2177_0: Yasmā pavāritaṭṭhāne viññatti nāma na paṭisedhetabbā, tasmā bhagavā dhammanimantanavasena
tika-vin09t0:2177_2: paricchedaṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ. Teneva “cetāpetabbanti ṭhapetvā sahadhammike ca
tika-vin09t0:2177_3: ñātakappavārite ca aññena kismiñcideva guṇe parituṭṭhena ‘vadethāyye, yenattho’ti
tika-vin09t0:2189: “Lasuṇa”nti kiñcāpi avisesena vuttaṃ, tathāpi magadhesu jātaṃ lasuṇameva idhādhippetaṃ, tampi bhaṇḍikalasuṇamevāti āha magadharaṭṭhe jāta”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:2190_1: ekadvitimiñjaka”nti. Ajjhohāre ajjhohāreti ettha sace dve tayo bhaṇḍike ekatoyeva
tika-vin09t0:2190_2: saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharati, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Bhañjitvā ekekamiñjakaṃ khādantiyā pana
tika-vin09t0:2191_0: Palaṇḍukādīnaṃ vaṇṇena vā miñjāya vā nānāttaṃ veditabbaṃ – vaṇṇena tāva palaṇḍuko
tika-vin09t0:2191_1: nāma paṇḍuvaṇṇo hoti, bhañjanako lohitavaṇṇo, haritako haritapaṇṇavaṇṇo. Miñjāya
tika-vin09t0:2191_2: pana palaṇḍukassa ekā miñjā hoti, bhañjanakassa dve, haritakassa tisso. Cāpalasuṇo
tika-vin09t0:2191_3: amiñjako. Aṅkuramattameva hi tassa hoti. Mahāpaccariyādīsu pana “palaṇḍukassa tīṇi
tika-vin09t0:2191_4: miñjāni, bhañjanakassa dve, haritakassa eka”nti vuttaṃ. Ete palaṇḍukādayo sabhāveneva
tika-vin09t0:2191_5: vaṭṭanti. Sūpasampākādīsu pana māgadhakampi vaṭṭati. Tañhi paccamānesu muggasūpādīsu
tika-vin09t0:2191_6: vā macchamaṃsavikatiyā vā tele vā badarasāḷavādīsu vā ambilasākādīsu vā uttaribhaṅgesu
tika-vin09t0:2191_7: vā yattha katthaci antamaso yāgubhattepi pakkhittaṃ vaṭṭati. Badarasāḷavaṃ nāma badaraphalāni
tika-vin09t0:2194: “Paṭicchannokāse”ti etassa vibhāgadassanatthaṃ “upakacchakesu ca muttakaraṇe cāti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2195: Ābādhapaccayāti kaṇḍukacchuādiābādhapaccayā saṃharāpentiyā anāpatti. “Bhikkhussa ettha ca lasuṇe ca dukkaṭa”nti porāṇā.
tika-vin09t0:2198_0: Talaghātaketi matthake pahāradāne, tañca kho talaṃ “muttakaraṇe pahāraṃ detī”ti padabhājaniyaṃvuttattā
tika-vin09t0:2198_2: sāṇattikanti attano atthāya aññaṃ āṇāpentiyā sāṇattikaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2201: Vatthuvasenetaṃ vuttanti “jatumaṭṭhake”ti etaṃ nidānavasena uppannassa vatthuno vaseneva vuttaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci pana daṇḍakaṃ pavesentiyā āpattiyeva. Tenāha “kāmarāgena panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:2204_0: Ādātabbanti pavesetabbaṃ. Aggapabbanti kesaggamattampi aggapabbaṃ. Tatiyaṃ pabbaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2204_1: pavesetīti kesaggamattampi tatiyaṃ pabbaṃ paveseti. Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2204_2: “gambhīrato dvinnaṃ pabbānaṃ upari kesaggamattampi pavesentiyā pācittiya”nti.
tika-vin09t0:2205: Atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyanavatthusminti atianto pavesetvā udakadhovanakaraṇavatthusmiṃ. Udakasuddhipaccayena pana satipi phassassādiyane yathāvuttaparicchede anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:2208: Takkādīsu vā aññatarenāti takkadadhimatthurasakhīrādīsu aññatarena. Yāya kāyaci bījaniyāti antamaso cīvarakaṇṇaṃ upādāya yāya kāyaci bījaniyā.
tika-vin09t0:2209: Imaṃ pivathāti imaṃ pānīyaṃ vā sūpādiṃ vā pivatha. Iminā bījathāti iminā tālavaṇṭena bījatha. Dāpentiyāti aññena ubhayampi dāpentiyā.
tika-vin09t0:2212_0: Tasmāti yasmā viññatti ceva bhojanañca pamāṇaṃ, tasmā. Na kevalañcettha paṭiggahaṇeyeva
tika-vin09t0:2212_1: dukkaṭaṃ hoti, paṭiggaṇhitvā pana araññato āharaṇepi sukkhāpanepi vaddalidivase bhajjanatthāya
tika-vin09t0:2212_2: uddhanasajjanepi kapallasajjanepi dabbisajjanepi dārūni ādāya aggikaraṇepi kapallamhi
tika-vin09t0:2212_4: koṭṭanapapphoṭanadhovanādīsupi yāva mukhe ṭhapetvā ajjhoharaṇatthaṃ dantehi saṅkhādati,
tika-vin09t0:2212_5: tāva sabbappayogesu dukkaṭānīti āha “paṭiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dantehi saṃkhādanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:2215_0: Tirokuṭṭeti gharakuṭṭassa parabhāge. Tiropākāreti parikkhepapākārassa tirobhāge,
tika-vin09t0:2215_1: te ca kho kuṭṭapākārā iṭṭhakasiladārūnaṃ vasena tippakārāti āha “yassa kassaci kuṭṭassa
tika-vin09t0:2215_2: vā pākārassa vā parato”ti. Sabbānipetāni ekato chaḍḍentiyāti etāni cattāripi vatthūni
tika-vin09t0:2215_3: ekato chaḍḍentiyā. Pāṭekkaṃ pana chaḍḍentiyā vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo. Āṇattiyampi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:2219_0: Bhikkhuniyāpīti pi-saddena bhikkhuṃ samuccinoti. Anikkhittabījesu pana khettesu koṇādīsu
tika-vin09t0:2219_1: vā asañjātaropimesu khettamariyādādīsu vā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati. Manussānaṃ kacavarachaḍḍanaṭṭhānepi
tika-vin09t0:2219_2: vaṭṭatiyeva. Chaḍḍitakhetteti manussesu sassaṃ uddharitvā gatesu chaḍḍitakhettaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2219_3: nāma hoti, tattha vaṭṭati. Yattha pana “lāyitampi pubbaṇṇādi puna uṭṭhahissatī”ti
tika-vin09t0:2219_4: rakkhanti, tattha yathāvatthukameva. Sāmike apaloketvāti ettha khettapālakā, ārāmādigopakā
tika-vin09t0:2219_5: ca sāmikāva. Iminā ca saṅghasantake bhikkhussa chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati saṅghapariyāpannattā,
tika-vin09t0:2219_6: na bhikkhunīnaṃ. Bhikkhunīnaṃ pana attano santake bhikkhusantake vuttanayeneva vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin09t0:2222_0: Naccanti naṭādayo vā naccantu, soṇḍā vā antamaso morasuvamakkaṭādayopi, sabbametaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2222_1: naccameva. Tenāha “naccanti antamaso moranaccampī”ti. Gītanti naṭādīnaṃ vā gītaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2222_2: hotu, ariyānaṃ parinibbānakāle ratanattayaguṇūpasaṃhitaṃ sādhukīḷitagītaṃ vā, antamaso
tika-vin09t0:2222_3: “dantagītampi gāyissāmā”ti pubbabhāge okūjantā karonti, sabbametaṃ gītameva. Tenāha
tika-vin09t0:2222_4: “gītanti antamaso dhammabhāṇakagītampī”ti. Tattha dhammabhāṇakagītaṃ nāma asaññatabhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2222_5: taṃ taṃ vattaṃ bhinditvā atidīghaṃ katvā gītassarena dhammabhaṇanaṃ, tampi neva bhikkhuno,
tika-vin09t0:2222_6: na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭati. Tathā hi vuttaṃ paramatthajotikāya khuddakaṭṭhakathāya “dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2222_7: gītaṃ vaṭṭati, gītūpasaṃhito pana dhammo na vaṭṭatī”ti. Tasmā dhammaṃ bhaṇantena
tika-vin09t0:2222_8: jātakavattādiṃ taṃ taṃ vattaṃ avināsetvā caturassena vattena parimaṇḍalāni padabyañjanāni
tika-vin09t0:2222_9: dassetabbāni. Vāditanti tantibaddhādivādanīyabhaṇḍavāditaṃ vā hotu, kuṭabherivāditaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2222_10: vā antamaso udakabherivāditampi, sabbamevetaṃ vāditameva. Tenāha “vāditanti antamaso
tika-vin09t0:2222_11: udakabherivādita”nti. Yaṃ pana niṭṭhubhantī vā sāsaṅke vā ṭhitā accharikaṃ vā phoṭeti,
tika-vin09t0:2222_12: pāṇiṃ vā paharati, tattha anāpatti. Dassanena cettha savanampi saṅgahitaṃ virūpekasesanayena.
tika-vin09t0:2222_13: Ālocanasabhāvatāya vā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ savanakiriyāyapi dassanasaṅkhepasabbhāvato
tika-vin09t0:2222_14: “dassanāya”icceva vuttanti āha “etesu yaṃ kiñci dassanāya gacchantiyā”ti. Yattha
tika-vin09t0:2222_15: ṭhitāti evaṃ gantvā yasmiṃ padese ṭhitā.
tika-vin09t0:2223_0: Nanu ca sayaṃnaccanādīsu pācittiyaṃ pāḷiyaṃ na vuttaṃ, atha kathaṃ gahetabbanti āha
tika-vin09t0:2223_1: “sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vutta”nti, iminā pāḷiyaṃ avuttepi aṭṭhakathāpamāṇena gahetabbanti
tika-vin09t0:2223_2: dasseti. Samuṭṭhānādīni eḷakalomasadisānīti pana mātikāgatapācittiyasseva vasena
tika-vin09t0:2223_3: vuttaṃ, sabbesaṃ vasena pana chasamuṭṭhānanti gahetabbaṃ. “Ārāme ṭhatvā”ti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2223_4: sesairiyāpathehi yuttāya passantiyā anāpattiyā icchitabbattā. Itarathā hi nisinnāpi
tika-vin09t0:2223_5: passituṃ na labheyya. “Passissāmī”ti vihārato vihāraṃ gacchantiyā āpattiyeva. Āsanasālāya
tika-vin09t0:2223_6: nisinnā passati, anāpatti, “passissāmī”ti uṭṭhahitvā gacchantiyā āpatti. Vīthiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2223_7: ṭhatvā gīvaṃ parivattetvā passantiyāpi āpattiyeva. Bhikkhussāpi eseva nayo, āpattibhedova nānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2228: Arahopekkhāyāti narahoassādāpekkhāya. Aññavihitāyāti rahoassādato aññavihitāva hutvā ñātiṃ vā pucchantiyā, dāne vā pūjāya vā mantentiyā.
tika-vin09t0:2234_0: “Purimanayenevā”ti iminā “santiṭṭheyya vāti hatthapāse ṭhitamattāya pācittiyaṃ, sallapeyya
tika-vin09t0:2234_1: vāti tattha ṭhatvā gehasikakathaṃ kathentiyāpi pācittiyameva, nikaṇṇikaṃ vā jappeyyāti
tika-vin09t0:2234_2: kaṇṇamūle jappentiyāpi pācittiyamevā”ti imaṃ nayaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:2237_0: Āsīdanti etthāti āsananti āha “pallaṅkassokāsabhūte”ti, ūrubaddhāsanassa okāseti
tika-vin09t0:2237_1: attho. Anovassakanti nibbakokāsaṃ. Ajjhokāse upacāranti ajjhokāse nisīditvā dvādasahatthappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2237_2: padesaṃ. Gilānāyāti yā tādisena gelaññena āpucchituṃ na sakkoti. Āpadāsūti ghare
tika-vin09t0:2237_3: aggi vā uṭṭhito hoti, coro vā, evarūpe upaddave anāpucchā pakkamati, anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:2249_0: Manussadobhaggena vāti “kāṇā homi, kuṇī homi, itarā vā īdisā hotū”tiādinā manussavirūpabhāvena.
tika-vin09t0:2249_2: Dhammapurekkhārāyāti pāḷiṃ vācentiyā. Anusāsanipurekkhārāyāti “idānipi tvaṃ edisā,
tika-vin09t0:2249_3: sādhu viramassu, no ce viramasi, addhā puna evarūpāni kammāni katvā niraye uppajjissasi,
tika-vin09t0:2249_4: tiracchānayoniyā uppajjissasī”ti evaṃ anusāsaniyaṃ ṭhatvā vadantiyā.
tika-vin09t0:2261: Visibbetvāti vijaṭetvā. Dhuraṃ nikkhittamatteti dhure nikkhittamatte, dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā sacepi pacchā sibbati, āpattiyevāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:2264_0: “Idaṃ me cīvaraṃ mahagghaṃ īdise corabhaye na sakkā dhāretunti evarūpāsu āpadāsū”ti
tika-vin09t0:2264_1: ettha pāṭho. So pana kākapadasañjanitamohehi lekhakehi uparisikkhāpade likhito. Kiñcāpi
tika-vin09t0:2267: Āpadāsu vā dhāretīti sace apārutaṃ vā anivatthaṃ vā corā haranti, evarūpāsū āpadāsu dhāreti, anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:2270_0: Aññasmiṃ parikkhāreti yattha katthaci thālakādīnaṃ vā sappitelādīnaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2270_1: “Samagghakāle dassathā”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā nivārentiyāti “kittakaṃ agghanakaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2270_2: dātukāmatthā”ti pucchitvā “ettakaṃ nāmā”ti vutte “āgametha tāva, idāni vatthaṃ mahagghaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:2270_3: katipāhena kappāse āhaṭe samagghaṃ bhavissati, tasmiṃ kāle dassathā”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2273: Ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā paṭibāhantiyāti “ekissā ekaṃ sāṭakaṃ nappahoti, āgametha tāva, katipāhena uppajjissati, tato bhājessāmā”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā paṭibāhantiyā anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:2275_0: Sesanti “dhammike vematikāyā”tiādikaṃ avasesaṃ. Tattha ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā paṭibāhantiyāti
tika-vin09t0:2281: Vavatthānaṃ dassetvāti majjhe kāsāyaṃ vā kattarayaṭṭhiṃ vā antamaso kāyabandhanampi ṭhapetvā nipajjantīnaṃ anāpattīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:2285: Pariyesitvā alabhantiyāti aññaṃ upaṭṭhāyikaṃ alabhantiyā. Gilānāyāti sayaṃ gilānāya. Āpadāsūti tathārūpe upaddave sati.
tika-vin09t0:2289_0: Dhure nikkhittamatteti sace dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā pacchā pakkamati, āpattiyevāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:2289_1: Antarāye satīti dasavidhesu antarāyesu aññatarasmiṃ sati. “Gacchissāmī”ti nikkhantā,
tika-vin09t0:2289_2: nadī vā pūrā, vanadāho vā āgato, corā vā magge honti, megho vā uṭṭhahati, nivattituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:2294_0: Kīḷanacittasālanti na raññova kīḷanacittasālaṃ, atha kho yesaṃ kesañci manussānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2294_1: kīḷanatthaṃ yattha katthaci katasālaṃ. Esa nayo “kīḷanaupavana”ntiādīsupi. Yathāha
tika-vin09t0:2294_2: “rājāgāraṃ nāma yattha katthaci rañño kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kataṃ hotī”tiādiko vitthāro.
tika-vin09t0:2294_3: Tattha kīḷanaupavananti kīḷanatthaṃ antonagare kataṃ ārāmaṃ. Kīḷanuyyānanti tatheva
tika-vin09t0:2297: Atikkantappamāṇāti aṭṭhaṅgulato atikkantappamāṇapādakā. Vuttoti padabhājaniyaṃ vutto. “Akappiyarūpākulo akappiyamañco pallaṅko”ti sārasamāsācariyo.
tika-vin09t0:2300: Ujjavujjaveti uggiritvā uggiritvā veṭhane. Kantitasuttaṃ kantantiyāti dasikasuttādiṃ saṅghāṭetvā kantantiyā, dukkantitaṃ vā paṭikantantiyā.
tika-vin09t0:2303: Attano veyyāvaccakarassa cāti sacepi mātāpitaro āgacchanti, yaṃ kiñci bījaniṃ vā sammuñjanidaṇḍakaṃ vā kārāpetvā veyyāvaccakaraṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā yaṃ kiñci vā pacituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:2306: Anantarāyikinīti dasavidhesu antarāyesu ekenāpi anantarāyikinī. Dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā pacchā vinicchinantī āpattiṃ āpajjitvāva vinicchināti.
tika-vin09t0:2310: Āpadāsūti mahagghacīvaraṃ sarīrato mocetvā suppaṭisāmitampi corā haranti, evarūpāsu āpadāsu anissajjitvā nivāsentiyā anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:2313: Kavāṭabaddhavihāranti dvārabaddhavihāraṃ. Gilānāyāti vacībhedaṃ kātuṃ asamatthāya. Āpadāsūti raṭṭhe bhijjante āvāse chaḍḍetvā gacchanti, evarūpāsu āpadāsu.
tika-vin09t0:2316_0: Hatthiādīsupi sippasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo, tathā āthabbaṇādīsu mantasaddo. Tattha
tika-vin09t0:2316_1: tharūti khaggamuṭṭhi. Āthabbaṇamanto nāma āthabbaṇavedavihito parūpaghātakaro manto.
tika-vin09t0:2316_2: Khilanamanto nāma dārusārakhilaṃ mantetvā pathaviyaṃ pavesetvā māraṇamanto. Agadappayogo nāma visayojanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2319_0: Lekheti likhasippe. Dhāraṇāya vāti dhāraṇasatthe, yasmiṃ vuttanayena paṭipajjantā
tika-vin09t0:2319_1: bahūnipi ganthāni dhārenti. Nāgamaṇḍalādiketi ettha nāgamaṇḍalaṃ nāma sappānaṃ pavesanivāraṇatthaṃ maṇḍalabaddhamanto.
tika-vin09t0:2324_0: Sīsānulokikāyāti sīsaṃ anulokentiyā. Yattha vā bhikkhuniyo sannipatitāti yattha bhikkhuniyo
tika-vin09t0:2324_1: paṭhamataraṃ sajjhāyanacetiyavandanādiatthaṃ sannipatitā. Āpadāsūti kenaci upaddutā
tika-vin09t0:2328: Sesanti “atthadhammaanusāsanipurekkhārāyā”tiādikaṃ avasesaṃ. Tattha anusāsanipurekkhārāyāti “idānipi tvaṃ bālā abyattā”tiādinā nayena anusāsanipakkhe ṭhatvā vadantiyā anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:2332_0: Kule maccharo kulamaccharoti purimasmiṃ pakkhe sakatthe inīpaccayo, taṃ kulaṃ assaddhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2332_1: appasannanti kulassa aguṇaṃ, ayasaṃ vā bhāsantiyāti attho. Bhikkhunīnaṃ avaṇṇaṃ bhāsantiyāti
tika-vin09t0:2332_2: “bhikkhuniyo dussīlā pāpadhammā”ti bhikkhunīnaṃ aguṇaṃ, ayasaṃ vā bhāsantiyā.
tika-vin09t0:2333: Santaṃyeva ādīnavanti kulassa vā bhikkhunīnaṃ vā santaṃyeva aguṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2336: Samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttoti samantapāsādikāya ovādavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade vutto.
tika-vin09t0:2340: Uposathassa pucchanaṃ uposathapucchā, sāvakapaccayaṃ, rassattañca katvā “uposathapucchaka”nti vuttāti āha “uposathapucchana”nti. Ovādatthāyāti ovādayācanatthāya.
tika-vin09t0:2347: Thane bhavaṃ thaññaṃ, khīraṃ. Yaṃ pāyetīti yaṃ dārakaṃ pāyeti.
tika-vin09t0:2350_0: Padabhājane vuttanayenāti “pāṇātipātā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2350_1: samādiyāmi…pe… vikālabhojanā veramaṇiṃ dve vassāni avītikkamma samādānaṃ samādiyāmī”ti
tika-vin09t0:2350_2: padabhājanasamīpe aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ vuttanayena. Imā pana cha sikkhāyo saṭṭhivassāyapi
tika-vin09t0:2350_3: pabbajitāya dātabbāyeva, na etāsu asikkhitā upasampādetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:2353: Padabhājane vuttā upasampadāsammuti na dinnā hotīti padabhājanasamīpe aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ vuttā upasampadāsammuti ñattidutiyāya kammavācāya na dinnā hoti.
tika-vin09t0:2357: Dasavassāya gihigatāya sikkhāsammutiṃ datvā paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ upasampādetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:2363_0: Sabbapaṭhamā dve mahāsikkhamānāti gabbhinivagge vuttā dve sikkhamānā. “Sikkhamānā”icceva
tika-vin09t0:2363_1: vattabbāti sammutikammādīsu evaṃ vattabbā. “Gihigatā”ti vā “kumāribhūtā”ti vā na
tika-vin09t0:2363_2: vattabbāti sace vadanti, kammaṃ kuppatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:2374_0: Tesaṃ atthibhāvaṃ ajānantiyāti tesaṃ mātādīnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ ajānantiyā. Ananuññātasamuṭṭhānanti
tika-vin09t0:2374_1: yaṃ vācato, kāyavācato, vācācittato, kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhāti, taṃ ananuññātasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2374_2: Kathaṃ? Abbhānakammādīsu kenacideva karaṇīyena khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ nisinnā “pakkosatha
tika-vin09t0:2374_3: sikkhamānaṃ, idheva naṃ upasampādessāmā”ti upasampādeti, evaṃ vācato samuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin09t0:2374_4: “Upassayato uṭṭhāya upasampādessāmī”ti vatvā khaṇḍasīmaṃ gacchantiyā kāyavācato samuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin09t0:2374_5: Dvīsu ṭhānesu paṇṇattiṃ jānitvā vītikkamaṃ karontiyā vācācittato, kāyavācācittato
tika-vin09t0:2383: Mātikāyaṃ ekaṃ vassaṃ dveti ekantarike ekekasmiṃ saṃvacchare dve. Ekantarikaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyāti imasmiṃ vasse ekaṃ, puna ekantarikaṃ ekanti dve vuṭṭhāpentiyā anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:2388_0: Vuttalakkhaṇaṃ chattanti “chattaṃ nāma tīṇi chattāni – setacchattaṃ, kilañjacchattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:2388_1: paṇṇacchattaṃ maṇḍalabaddhaṃ, salākabaddha”nti evaṃ padabhājane vuttalakkhaṇaṃ chattaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2388_2: Tādisaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvāti gacchakaddamādīsu taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā.
tika-vin09t0:2389: Chattassevāti kaddamādīni patvā upāhanā omuñcitvā chattasseva dhāraṇaṃ. Upāhanānaṃyeva vāti gacchādīni disvā chattaṃ apanāmetvā upāhanānaṃyeva dhāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:2393: Saṅghāṇinti kaṭiyaṃ anubhavitabbaṃ ābharaṇaṃ. Tenāha “yaṃ kiñci kaṭūpaga”nti.
tika-vin09t0:2400: Gilānāyāti antamaso maggagamanaparissamenāpi ābādhikāya. Āpadāsūti corabhayādinā sarīrakampanādīsu.
tika-vin09t0:2407: Anodissāti “amukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne pucchāmī”ti evaṃ aniyametvā kevalaṃ “pucchitabbaṃ atthi, pucchāmi, ayyā”ti evaṃ vatvā.
tika-vin09t0:2410_0: Parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ, aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ atikkamantiyā vā okkamantiyā
tika-vin09t0:2410_1: vāti ettha parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantiyā vā aparikkhittassa gāmassa
tika-vin09t0:2410_2: upacāraṃ okkamantiyā vāti yathākkamaṃ sambandho veditabbo. Āpadāsūti mahagghaṃ saṃkaccikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2410_3: pārupitvā gacchantiyā upaddavo uppajjati, evarūpāsu āpadāsu.
tika-vin09t0:2417_0: Acittakānīti “nacca”ntiādinā ajānitvā dassanādiṃ karontiyā āpattisambhavato vatthuajānanacittena
tika-vin09t0:2417_1: acittakāni. Lokavajjānīti “nacca”ntiādinā jānitvā dassanādiṃ karontiyā akusaleneva
tika-vin09t0:2417_2: āpajjanato lokavajjāni. Tenāha “ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo”tiādi sacittakānīti “corī”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:2417_3: vatthuṃ jānitvā karaṇeyeva āpattisambhavato sacittakāni. Upasampadādīnaṃ ekantākusalacitteneva
tika-vin09t0:2421: Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatesu pana aṭṭhasupīti pāḷimuttakesu sappiādīsu aṭṭhasupi.
tika-vin09t0:2427_0: Sekhiyāni cevāti pañcasattati sekhiyāni ceva. “Bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
tika-vin09t0:2427_1: veditabbā”ti iminā yasmā tādisaṃyevettha atthavinicchayaṃ vidū vadanti, tasmā visuṃ
tika-vin09t0:2427_2: tesaṃ atthavaṇṇanā na vuttā. Tattha yā vuttā, sā idhāpi vuttāyevāti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:2433_0: Yaṃ pātimokkhassa vaṇṇanaṃ ārabhinti sambandho. “Mahāvihāravāsīna”nti idaṃ purimapacchimapadehi
tika-vin09t0:2433_1: saddhiṃ sambandhitabbaṃ, mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi vāti ca. Pāḷiyatthañca
tika-vin09t0:2433_2: kevalanti sakalaṃ pāḷiatthañca, ubhatovibhaṅgañcāti vuttaṃ hoti. Etthāti etissaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2433_3: kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ. Yasmā na hi atthīti sambandho. Yanti yaṃ padaṃ. Sīhaḷaṭṭhakathānayanti
tika-vin09t0:2433_5: atha vā vinayaṭṭhakathāsu atthasāraṃ. Tenetaṃ dasseti – sīhaḷamātikaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:2433_6: atthasāraṃ ādāya imaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiṃ karonto vinayaṭṭhakathāsupi idha vinicchaye
tika-vin09t0:2434_0: Idāni sadevakassa lokassa accantasukhādhigamāya attano puññaṃ pariṇāmento “yathā
tika-vin09t0:2434_1: ca niṭṭhaṃ sampattā”tiādigāthādvayamāha. Kalyāṇanissitāti kusalanissitā. Sabbasattānanti
